swencað hie hyhtaþ vel blyssieð gif ic bio onstyred ic soþlice on þine mildheortnesse gehyhte min heortæ winsumaþ vel blisseð on þine helo ic singe drihtne se me selde gode & ic singe þinum nomæn þæm hihstæn drihten of heofone gelocede ofer mannæ beærn þet he gesio gif is ongetende vel understandende oþþe secende gode eælle fram ahyldæþ somed & on unnytenesse sindon gewordene nis se þe do god ne is odð to æne openende is byrgen ciolæn vel hracen hioræ tungæn heore facenfullice hy deodon atter nedrana under welerum heore þæræ muð of awargednesse & of biternesse ful is & hiræ fet hræþe vel snelle to ægiotænæ vel to scedende blod forbrytednesse & ungeselignes on hieræ wegum & sibbe weg hie ne oncneowon ne is godes ege beforen hieræ eægum hie ne oncnewon eælle þa þe wircæþ unrihtnesse þa þe forswelgæþ min folc swæ mete hlafes gode hie ne gecygden ðær hie forhtodon þer ne nes næn ege forðon god on cneowrisse rihtwisne is geþeahtunge wedlon ðu gedrefdest forðan god hihte his is hwilc seleð of syon helo isræhelæ þanne acyrreð drihten heftnieþ his folces iacob blissæþ & gehyht ysrahel drihten wylc eærdæþ on þinre gesele vel eardungstowe vel teld oþðæ wylc resteþ on þinre hælgæn dune vel munte se ingeþ butæn wemme & wyrcþ rihtwisnesse se þe spryceþ soþfestnesse on his heortæn & ne deþ inwyd vel facn on his tungæn ne dyde his niextæn yfel & edwit vel hosp ne anfeng ongean his niextæn to næhte biþ geled on his gesihþe se æwyrgedæ soðlice þæ þe drihten ondredæþ he hig gemuclað se þe sweræþ his niextæn & hiene ne beswicð & his fioh ne seleþ to westme oðð to hyre & his læc ne onfehþ ofer ðone unscyldygen se þe þæs deþ ne bið he astyred vel gedrefed on ecnesse geheald me dryhten forðon on þe ic gewene vel hihte ic cwiþe min drihten god þu eært forðæn minræ gode þu na beðærft þæ hælgæn þe on his eorðæn beoð hie wundriæþ eælle mines wyllæn betwion hie gemonigfealdode sint soþlice hire untrumnesse efter þon þe hie efston ic ne gesomnige hieræ gemetinga vel somnunge of blodum ne ic ne bio gemindig hioræ nomæn þurh mine weleræs drihten del minre erfeweardnesse & calices mines þu eært þe me gesettest vel agefe yrfeweærdnesse mine rapes me gefeollon on bryhtum & soþlice yrfewardnes min bryhte is me ic bletsie drihten þe me salde andgyt ofer þæt & oðð nyhte begripen me lendene mine drihten ic foresceawode on minre gesihþe simle forðæn to ðæm swiðran he is me þæt ic astyred ne beo for þis gelustfullede min heorte & gefagenede tunge mine ofer þæt & min flesc rest on hyhte gehyr drihten mine ryhtwisnesse begem vel beheæld mine bene mid earum onfoh min gebed na on welerum facenfulle of andwlitum þinum minne dom yppæþ mine egæn gesioþ efennesse þu afandudest mine heortæn & þu neosodest me on niehte mid fire ameredest þu me vel streddest & ne is gemet on me unrihtwisnesse þeð ne sprece min muþ mænnæ weorcum for wordum þinræ weleræ ic gehyold heærde wegas fulfreme mine stepæs on þinum stigum þet ne sien astyred swaðu mine ic clipie forðon þu me gehierdest god onhyld þine eæræn to me & gehiere mine word gewunderlyc þine mildheortnesse þe hæle gedest hyhtende on ðe fram wiðerstondende þinre swiþren geheæld me drihten swæ þæræ sione eages under þinræ fiþræ scæde gescylde me fræm onsiene ærleæsræ þæ me swencton mine fiend mine sæulæ ymseældon ic lufie ðe drihten mine megne drihten þu eært min trymnes & min gescyld vel gehyht & min friolsend vel alysend min god min gefylstend vel fultumend & ic gehihte on hiene min scildend & horn hæle minne fultumend vel gefelstend min heriende ic gecige drihten & fræm minum fiondum ic bio hæl me ymbseældon deæþes geomrung & þæ burnan unrihtwisnesse me gedrefdon helle sær hie me ymbsealdon & me forecomon deæþæs gegryno on geswince vel eærfoþnesse minre ic gecigede drihten & to gode mine ic cleopode & he gehierde mine stemne of his þæn hælgæn temple & mine clipunge on his gesihþe ingeode on his eæræn and astyred is eorþe & forhtæde vel beuede & grundwealles vel dunæ gestæþelungæ siondon gedrefede & onstyrede forþon þe god him is yrre astagh smic vel rec on his yrre & fir byrneþ of his onsiene onheledæ sient gledæ from him heofones seægæþ vel bodieð godes wuldor & weorc his hændæ cyþæþ vel bodiað trvmnesse vel staðel vel fesnesse se deig of þem dege belceð word & seo nieht þere nieht gecyþeð vel bycneþ ingehygð vel wit vel wisdom ne sindon gespreca ne word þæræ ne bioþ gehired hieræ stemnæ on eælræ eorðæn utgeode sweg heore & on endes ymbwyrftes eorðan word heora on sunnæn he gesette his geteldunge vel ærdunge & he swæ se brydgumæ forþgongende of his brydbure vel gyftbure he winsumæde vel blitsode swæ swæ etenæs weg to iernenne from heofones hihþo utgang his & edryne vel gencyr his oððe to heahnesse his nis se ðe hine behyde fram hetan his drihtnes ee ungripendlic is to gecierrenne saule cyþnes vel witnesse drihtnes getrewful wisdom geærwiende litlingum vel childvm drihtnes ryhtwisnesse ryhta geblissiende heortæn bebod drihtnes bryht onlyhtende eægæn gehere þe drihten on dege þinre geswencnesse gescylde þe nomæ iæcobes godes he asende þe fultum of hælgum & of syon vel heahnesse he behealde þe he gemyndig sie eælre þinre onseigdnesse & þin offrung vel onseigdnesse fette sie selle þe drihten efter þinre heortæn & eæl þin geþeæht he getrymme we blissiæþ on þinre helo & on drihtnes namæn ures godes we beoð gemiclode drihten gefylle eællæ þinæ benæ vel gyrnenga nu ic oncneow forþæn halne gedeþ drihten kyning vel criest his gehereþ hine of his hælegæ heofone on his miehte vel anweldum helo his swyþre þa vel hy on wenum vel rynum & hy on horsum we soþlice on drihtnes nomæn ures godes beoð gemiclyde hi synt gewriðene & gefeollen we soþlice ærysæþ & ryhte bioþ gewordene drihten on þinum megne se kyning blissæþ & ofer hæle þine wynsumæde vel blissade swiþe vel ðearle gewilnunge vel gyrninge his sæwle þu him seældest & fram wyllæn his welere vel lippe þu hine ne becyredest vel bepehtes forðæn þu forecome hine on þinre bletsunge swetnesse þu settest on his heæfode helm vel coruna of þæm diorweorþestæn stænum lyf he bed fram þe & þu seældest him langnisse dage on worold aworlde micel is his wuldor on þinre helo wuldor & micelne wlite ðu asetst ofer him forðon þu hine selest on bletsunge on world aworlde þu hine geblissæst on gefeæn myd þinre onsine vel andwlitan forþæn þe se kyning geweneþ vel hyhteð on drihten & on þes hihstæn mildheortnesse he ne biþ onwended vel astyred bio gemet þin hand eællum þinum fyondum þin swiþræ gemete eælle þa þe fiogæþ vel hatedon god god min loce on me forwæn forlete þu me fyor fram hele minra word minræ ægyltæ min god ic cige þurh deg ne þu gehierest & on nyht & na to unsnyternesse vel unwisdome minre þu soþlice on hælgæn eardest lof israele vel haligen on þe hyhton vel hopedon ure federæs on þe hy gehopeden & þu hie alysdest to þe hie clipoden & hale hy gewordene synt on þe hie hopodon vel gehihton & ne syndon gescende ic soþlice eom wyrm & na mann ædwit vel hosp manne & aworpednysse folces eælle þa þe me gesægen hyrpæden vel anscunedon me hy sprecen mid welleron vel lippen & weagedon vel rysedon heofod he gehyhte vel hopade on drihten he hine generæþ vel alyseþ halne he gedeþ hine fordan he wile hine drihten me gerecht & nawuht me wane bið on þæræ stowe fosternoðes ðer he me gestæþelede ofer weteræs gereordunge he gefedde me sæwle mine he gecyrde he ledde me ofer siðfet vel stige rihtwisnesse for his nomæn witotlice & gef ic gange on myddæn deæþes sceaduwe ne ondræde ic yfæle forþæn þu myd me bist vel ært þin gierd & stef þin hy me frefredon þu geærwodest beod on minre gesihþe ongean þa þe eærfoþigæþ vel swencton me þu onbryddæs vel mestest min heæfod on ele & þin dryncefæt drungniende hu bryht vel mere is & þin mildheortnesse me efterfylgend eællum dægum mines lifes þet ic eærdige on drihtnes huse on langnesse minræ dægæ drihtnes is sio eorþe & gefelledness hire ymbwyrft eorðena & ælle þa ðe eærdiæþ on hieræ he ofer ses gegrundwallede hye vel gestæþolædæ & ofer streæmæs he geærwode hie hwylc æstigæþ on drihtnes dune oþðæ wylc stent on his þere ælgæn stowe þæ underiende hændæ & þæ clenæ heortæn se þe na onfeng on ydelnesse his sæwlæ ne ne swor on facne his niehxtæn þes onfehþ bletsunge from drihtne & mildheortnesse fram gode hæle his þios is cnyowris secændra drihten secændre onsiene iæcobes godes geopeniæþ gæto eowre eældormonne & upæhebbæþ þæ ecelecæn gæto & ingeþ se wuldorfestæ kyning hwilc is þes wuldorfestæ kyning drihten his mihtig & stræng drihtæn is stræng on gefiohte geopeniæþ gæto eowres eældormonnes ond upæhebbæþ ðæ ecelecæn gæto & ingeþ se wuldorfestæ kyning to þe drihten ic upahof mine sæwle min god on þe ic getreowe ic ne scæmige & na bysmrien me mine fiend & soþlice ealle þa ðe anbidigeð drihtne na hy beoð gescynde sien gescynde þa unrihtwisan doende idelu þine wegæs drihten gedo me cuþe & þine stygæ vel siþfatu gelere me gerece me on þine soþfestnesse & lere me forðon þu eært god min helend & ðe ic ærefne vel þyldgode æle deg gemune miltsunga þinre drihten & þinre mildheortnesse þe of worlde sindon ægyltæs iuguðhades minre & nitenesse minre ne gemune ðu drihten efter micle mildheortnesse þinre gemyndig byo ðu min god for þinre godnesse drihten swete & rihtwis drihtæn fore þissum æ he sette ðam agiltendum on wege he gereceþ bilewite vel eæþmoden on his dome he lereþ þam softon his wegæs dem me drihten forþan þe ic on mynre unscyldignesse ic ingange & on drihten hopiende na ic untrumie gecosta vel afanda me drihten & costa me bern edren mine & heortan mine forðæn þæ þin myldheortnesse is beforæn minum eægæn & ic gelicode on þinre soþfestnesse ic ne sæt on ydelnesse gemotstowe & myd þæm unrihtberendum vel dondum ic in ne gængæ ic fiode vel hatude gesomnige awyrgedra & myd þæm ærleæsum ic ne sitte ic ðwea mine hænde betwyoh ðæm unscyldige ic ymbgonge wifod þin drihten þet ic gehiere stemne þines lofes & þet ic secge vel cyþe eælle þine wundoru drihten ic lufude wlite þines huses & stowe eærdungæ þines wuldres ne forspil þu myd þæm ærleæsum mine sæwle & myd weræ blodum min lyf drithen is min onlihtnesse & mine helæ ðone ic me ondrede drihten is scyldon mines lifes for ðæn ic forhtie midþy genealæcað ofer me sceþðende þet hie eton flesc mine þa ðe swencat me fynd mine sint geuntromode & gefeælleð gif stondæþ ongean me weredu na ondredeð heorte min gif ærisæþ on me gefioht on þisum ic gehyhte vel gewene anes ic bæd fram drihtne þæs ic sece vel gegyrnde þet ic on drihtnes huse eærdie eælle dægæs mines lifes þet ic gesio mines drihtnes willæn & ic sie gescylded from his halgæn temple forðæn þe me gehidde on his geteldunge on dege þæræ yflæ gescilde me on gedygelnesse geteældunge his on þæn stænæ he upæhof me nu ðonne soðlice upæhefþ min hæfod ofer fiend mine ic ymbgonge & ic offrige on his geteældunge onsægdnesse lofes vel dremes ic singe & seælm ic cwiðe drihtne gehier drihten mine stemne þæ ic chige vel clypie to þe mildsæ me & ongehiere me þe sægde min heorte ic sohte ðine andwlitan vel onsine ðine dryhten ic sece ne acyrre ðu þine onsiene from me & ne hyld vel becyrre ðu on eorre þeowe þine gefylstend min þu beo ne forlet þu me ne forsioh þu me god mine helo to þe drihten ic clipode min god ne swiga þu from me & ic bio gelic þæm niþerstigendum on seþe gehire stemne mines gebedes midþie ic togebidde & ðonne ic uphebbe mine hænde to þinum hælgæn temple na somod þu selle me mid synfullum & mid þæm wircendum unrihtnesse ne forspil ðu me mid þysum þe her sprecæð sibbe mid hirum nixtum soðlice yfel sint on hioræ heortæn sele hem efter hioræ weorce & efter hiore niþhete hioræ gecneorþnisse vel tilengæ geedleænæ hem agield hioræ edleænængæ hem forðon þe hie ne ongeæton drihtnes weorc & on his worce his honde hie ne sceæwodon tobrec hie ne þu hie ne getimbre gebletsæd drihten forðon þe he gehierde stemne mines gebedes drihten is min fultum & min scyldend & on hine gehyhte vel geweneþ min heorte & gefultumod ic eom & blostmæt vel bleow min flesc & of minum willum ic ondette him drihtnes strengðo his folce & gescyld crist hiora helo is gedo hæl þin folc drihten & gebletsæ þine hyrfeweærdnesse & gerece hie & genim vel ahefe hie oþþe on world vel on ecnisse gebringað drihtne godes beærn gebrengæð drihtne weþræs vel romma beærn gebrengæð drihtne wuldor & arwurðunge gebrengæð drihten wundor his næmon gebiddæþ drihten on his hæligre hælla drihtnes stem ofer weteru & godes megenþrym ontyneþ vel onswegde drihten ofor monigo weteru drihtnes stem on megene drihtnes stem on micelnessæ drihtnes stem gebrecende þone cedorbeæm & drihten gebriceð cederas of libani & forgnideð hie swæ swæ þet sceælf on libani & leofne swæ swæ beærn ænhyrnedes diores drihten stem tosceaddendis leg þæm fire stefn drihtnes hrysiendis on westen & astyred drihten onwendeþ westen gefeællende drihtnes stem geærwiende þæ heortes & to onwreonne þiccettu vel hioræ den & on his temple eælle cweþæþ wuldor ic ahebbe þe drihten forðæn þu me onfenge me þu na tobreddest mine fiend ofer me min drihten god to þe ic chige vel cleopode & þu me geheldest drihten þu widtihx from helwarum mine sæwle & þe me geheldest from þæm niþerstigendum on þone seæþ singæð drihtne his hælgum & ondettæþ mid geminde his hælignisse forðæn eorre biþ on ebylgnesse his & lyf on his willæn on ðon efen bið wuniende woop & to þæm uhtlicum vel dægred blis ic soðlice cweð on minre genihtsumnisse þet ic me on onwende vel astyred on ecnesse drihten on þinum goðæn willæn þu geærwedest minum wlite þin megen þu æwirfdes þine onsine fram me & ic geworden eom gedrefed drihten to þe ic cliepie & to minum godum & ic bio biddende on þe drihten ic gewene vel hyhte þet ic ne sie gescynd on ecnesse on þinre soþfestnesse gefriolsæ vel alys me & nere me onhyld þin eæræ to me & þu hredlice vel efest nere me beo þu me on gode gescyldend & on stowe rotnisse oþþet þu me hæle gedo forðæn mine trimnesse & min gescyld west þu & for þinum nomæn min lættþeow þu bist & þu me afeddest & læddest þu me of gryne þissum þa me gedieledon forðon þu art gescyldend min drihten on þine hænde ic etfeste vel ic bebeode þe mine gæst þu me alisdest drihten god on soðfestnesse þu fiodes vel hatudest þæ beweardgende idelnesse ofer þæ emettgæn vel unnytlice ic soðlice on drihten hyhte ic winsumie vel fægcnie & blissiæ on þine mildheortnessæ forðæn þu gelocedes vel sawe eæþmodnesse mine & hele me gedydest of minum niedþeærfnessvm vel nedum sæwle mine ne ðu na beluce me on fiondæs hændum þu gesettest mine fet on stowe rumre vel widgilre ædige þara þe forgefene sint hioræ unrihtwisnesse & ðara þe bewrigene synt synna eadig wer þæm þe na ne ætwiteð dryhten his synnæ & ne nis on muðe his facn forþæn ic swigie & eælle mine bæn eældiæþ midþy þonne ic clipie to ðe ælce vel allan deige forðæn deges & niehtes gehefogod is ofer me þin hænd & ic eom gewyrfed on geriwo vel on angnisse mine þonne bið tobrocen hrycgban mine egyltæs ic dide þe oncnæwe & mine unsoðfestnesse ic ne oferwreah ic cweð þet ic sege vel bodige ongean vel wiþ me & mine unsoþfestnesse drihten & þu forlete arleasnesse minre heortæn for þisum gebiddæþ eælle hælige to þe on tide gehyþelicre ðeah hweþre soðlice þonne on flode wetra monigræ to him na togeneælecæþ þu eært min frofr fram ofðriccednisse þe ymbsealde me blis min alyse me fram ymbsellendum ondgiet ic þe selle & ic þe lære on þisum wege þe þu in ongangest ic getrymme ofer þe eagan mine nellen ge beon swa hors mul on þæm nis nenig ontgiet on þæm bridle & on þere walde ceocan heoræ gewyrð vel gebind þa na togenealecað to þe gefeinigað ryhtwise on drihtne ryhtwise gerist somodhering ondettæþ drihtne on eærpungum & on psalterum tyen strenga singæþ him singæþ him niewne song and wel singæþ him on wyndreame vel on lofe he lufæþ miltheortnesse & drihtnes dom his mildheortnesse drihtnes ful is eorþe drihtenes wordes & heofonæs sient getrimede & on gaste his muðes eæll hioræ megen gesomniende swæ swæ on bytt wætere sæs gesettende on goldhordum on niwolnesse vel grundas drihten him ondredæþ eælle eorþe from him soðlice bid onwended ond eælle þæ þe eærdigæþ on ymbhwirfte forþæn he cweð & gewordene sind he bebead and gesceæpene hy synd ic bletsige drihten on egwilc tid simle his lof on minum muðie on drihtne biþ hered min sawle hie geheren þæ geþwernesse vel bilewitan & blissiæn gemicliæþ drihtæn mid me & we upæhebbæn his nomæn eow betwionum ic sohte drihten & he me gehirde & of eællum minum eærfoþnessum he me generede genealæcet to him & hie bioþ onlihte & andwlitan eowre ne onsceæmiæþ ðes þeærfæ clipæde & drihten hiene gehyrde & of eællum his eærfoþnessum vel geswincum alysde hiene he alysde vel gefriolsæþ drihten onsendeð his englon ymbhwyrfte vel gænge hine ondredende & he hie genereþ onbirgæþ & gesioþ hu winsum drihten is eædig biþ se wer þe gehyht on hine dem drihten deriende me oferwin onwinnendes me gegrip wepn & scild & æris me on fultum ægiot ut sword & beluc vel betiene ongean hy þe me eahtað sege sæwle minre helo þin ic eom gescamigen & cirrede vel wandien mine fiend þæ þe secæþ mine sæwle sien gewirfede vel sin gecyrrede on becling ond scæmige þæ þe me þencæþ yfeles sin hie swæ þet dust beforæn onsine þes windes & drihtnes engel hie swencende sin wegas heora þystro & stlidornis & angel drihtnes ehtende hie forðæn gifum hy hyddon me forwirð grines heora on idel hy hyspton mine sawle cumo hem grin þet hi ne gecnawaþ & gegripennis þare þæ hie gedigledon gegripæ hy on grino hie gefeælled on þet selfe soðlice min sæwle blissode on drihtne lustfulleð ofer his helo cwæð se unrihtwise þet he forlet vel agylte on him selfum ne is ege beforæn his eægum forðæn facenfullic de dide on gesiehðe his þette he gemette unrihtwisnesse his & hatunge word his muðes unrihtwisnesse & facn he nolde ongetan þæt he wel dede unrihtwysnisse he smeade on his bedcliofum he etstod eælle wegæs ne god hetenið vel yfelnisse soðlice na he hatode drihten on heofonum þin mildheortnes & þin soðfestnes oþþet to wolcn vel genipum þin soþfestnes swæ swæ godes dun vel muntas & þine domæs deopnis vel niowelnesse felafæald men & niteno þu hæle gedest drihten swa swa þu gemonigfeældeæst þine mildheortnesse god mænnæ beærn soðlice on gescildnisse þinræ fiþræ hyhtat vel gewenæþ ondruncniende & of genyhtsumnisse þines huses & of burnan þines willæn þu drencæst hy nelle þu þe onscuniæn betwioh þæm awyrgendan ne onhyred þu beo ða dondan unrihtnesse forðæn swæ swæ heg hreadlice hy adrigiað & swa swa blæda vel leæf wyrta raðe hreosað vel feælleþ gewene vel hyht on drihten & do godnesse & þu eærdest on eorðæn & þu bist fed on his welum gelustfullæ on drihtæn & he þe seleþ bene þinre heortæn awrioh drihtne þinne weg & gewene vel hyht on hine ond he deð & he ðe ledeþ swæ swæ þet lioht þinre soðfestenesse & þinne dom swæ swæ middeig beo ðu drihtne underþied & halsa hine na onhyre ðu hine þe bið gesunfullod on wæge his on men dondum unrihtwisnesse ablin from yrræ & forlet hatheortnesse na anhyre ðu þæt nearolice þu do forðæn þæ þe heteniþ doþ beoð geteorode þa ðe soþlice geanbidiað drihten hie yrfeweærdnesse agon eorðæn dryhten ne on eorre þinum þu ðreage me na on hatheortnesse þinre þu nyrewe me forðæn þine strele vel flane on me sint gefestnode & þu getrimedest þin hænd ofer me na is hælþe on flæsce mina of andwlitan eorres þines & ne is sibbe banum minum of ansine minræ sinnæ forþæn mine unrihtnesse oferseton min heæfod swa swa byrþe hefige gehefogode sindon ofer me rotodon & wyrsodon dolswaðo mine of ansyne unwisdomes mines of yrmþum geswenced ic eom & gedrefed oþ on ende alla dæg geunrotsod ic ineode forþæn þe sæwl min gefylled is bysmrungum & na is hælþe on minum flescum gebyed ic am & geeæðmed ic am agehwar ic grymetede of geomrunga heortæn minre ic cwæð ic gehælde minne wegæs þet ic ne forlete vel agylte on minræ tungæ ic asette minum muþe geheordunga þonne standað se synfulla ongean me ic ædumbede & geædmed ic eom & ic swigeode fram godum & min sær geedniwod ys hatud min heortæ on me & on minre smeægunge bierned fyr ic eom sprecende on minre tungon gedo me cuþe drihten ende minn & getæl vel gerim minræ daga hwelc ys þet ic wite hwet wana sie me on gesihðe ealde þu gesettest minne dægæs & mine spedæ swæ swæ næht beforæn þe is þeah hweþre eæll ydelnessæ eælc man libbende þeæhþe on godes onlicnesse gænge se mon hweþre on ydel he bioþ gedrefed goldhordæþ & he ne wæt hwam he somnaþ þa & nu hwilc is min anbidung hu ne nu drihten & sped min swæ swæ næht beforæn þe is from eællum minum unrihtwisnesse genere me hosp & unsnytro vel unwisum þe me seældest geanbidigende ic onbad drihtnæs & me forlocede vel he beheold & gehierde mine bene & me utgeledde of seæþe yrmðæ & of fenne drosna & he gesette mine fet ofer stæn & gerehte mine stapæs & he ondsende on mine muð niwne song and ymnæd urum gode monegæ gesioð & ondredæþ & gewenæþ vel gehihtað on drihten eædi wer þes ðe næma is drihtnes his hiht & na beseah vel locæde on ydelnesse & on wedendum leæsingum monegæ þu dydest drihten min god þinræ wundræ & þinum geþohtum na is hwelc gelic þe ic cyþde & ic eom sprecende & gemonifældode sien ofer gerym onsegidnisse & tobrengnesse vel ofrunge ðu noldest soðlice lichomon þu me fulfremedest eæc swilce ansægidnisse vel offrunge fore scyld vel gylt na þu bede þonne ic sægde on gesihðe ic cume on heæfde þere boces awriten is be me þet ic do þinne willæn min god ic wolde & þine æe vel ewe on midre minre heortæn eadig se þe ongeteþ ofer þone wedlæ & þone þeærfæn on dage yfle drihtæn hi gefriolsæð vel alyseð drihten geheældeþ hine & geliffesteð hine & eædigne gedoþ hine & he geclensæþ on eordæn his sæwle & hine ne seleð on hændæ his fiondæs drihten spæde bringeð him ofer bedd sares his ælle strele his þu acyrdest on untrumnesse his ic cweð dryhten gemiltsa min hæl sawle mine forðan ic syngode þe fynd mine cweðon vel sægdon yfela to me hwonne swelteð & forwerþeð nama his & hy geoden in þæt hy gesawan idelu gesprec heorte heora hy gaderedon unryhtwisnesse him & hy geodon ut & hy sprecon somod on an hy bysmredon aelle fynd mine ongean me þohton yfelu me word unrihtwis hy bebudan ongean me cwystþu se þe slapð ne geycþ he vel teohað þæt he arise swæ se heort wylnæþ to þes weteres willæn swæ wilnæþ min sæwl to þe drihten min sæwle þirsteþ to þæm lifiendæn gode hwænne ic cume & etiewe beforæn godes onsiene me weron mine teæræs hlæfæs on dege & on niehte þonne bið cweðend me elce deg hwer is þin god þas ic gemunde & ægeæt on me mine sæwle forðæn ic ingænge on stowe eærdunge vel geteldes wundorlices oþ godes hus on stemne blisse vel winsumnesse & swegie onddetnesse wistfulgend vel simliende forhwy sari vel unrot eart þu min sæwl & forwæn gedrefest þu me hyht on god forðæn ic ændette him helo onsien vel andwlitan mines & god min from me silfum sæwl min gedrefed is forþan gemindy ic beo þin drihten of eorðan iordænis & hermonis from dune unmicelre dyopnes diopnesse chieð on stefne geheftræ rihtræ vel wæterædrana þinræ eællæ hihþo þine & yþa þine ofer me ferdon on dege bebeæð dryhten mildheortnesse his & on niht he gesweotolode mid me gebed gode lifes mines dem me god & toscead intingæn minne of þiode unhæligre fræm men unrihtwisum & facenfullen genere me forðæn ðu eært god min & strengþo min forwæn me ðu ædrife vel ðu aryddest & forwæn unrot ic inga þonne swencð me fiond asend lioht ðin & soðfestnesse þine hy me leddon & togeleddon on dune hælgæn ðine & on eærdunge ðine ic ingonge to wifode godes to gode þe geblissiæð giogoðe mine ic ændette ðe on heærpæn god god min forwæn sari þu ært sæwl min & forwæn gedrefest þu me gewene vel hyht on god forðæn ic ændette him helo ondwlitæn min & god min god eærum urum we gehierdon faderes ure cyþdon vel bodedon us weorc ðet þu worhtest on dagum hieræ ond on dagum eældum hand ðin ðiodæ forspilde & þu plantodest vel wirtwælædæst hie ðu gebigdest vel swenctest & þu utædrife hie na soðlice on sweorde his hy agon eorðæn & eærm hioræ ne gehelð hie ac swiðre ðin & eærm þin & onliehting andwlitan vel onsien þines forðæn gelicæde ðe on him ðu eært self king min & god min þu ðe bebiodest helo israhel vel iæcobe on þe fiond ure we windwioð & on nomæn þin we forhogyen onærisonde on us ne soðlice on bogan minum ic gewene & sweord min ne geheleð me ðu gefrolsedes soðlice us of ðæm swencendum us & þa þe us fiodon ðu gescyndest on gode we beoþ herede alne deg & on namæn þinum we ændetteþ on worolde belcette heorte min word god cwiðe ic wiorc mine kining tunge min writingfeþere gewriteres hredlice writendes wlitig heow fore beærnum mænnæ ægoten is gifu on welrum þinum forðæn gebletsode þe god on ecnesse to begirdænne sweorde ðinum ymb þæ lendeno mihtigliche vel þeoh riclicost wlite ðinne & fegernesse dine beheæld gesundfullice forðgæwit & rixæ fore soðfestnesse & geþwernesse & rihtwisnesse & geledeþ þe wundorliche swiðre ðin strelæ vel flane ðine sceærpe ðes mihtigestæn folc under ðe gefealleþ on heortæn find þes kinges setle þin god on woroldæ world gierd riht is gird rices þines ðu lufodest rihtwisnesse & þu fiodest vel hatudest unrihtwisnesse foreðæn smirede ðe god god ðin of ele blisse fore efnlinge þine murræ & swete dropen & swete wirt from girelæn ðinum of stapum ælpenbanenum of ðam gelustfulladon god ure gescildent vel frofr & megen fultumend on swincum vel eærfoþnessum þæ gemetton us swiðe forðæn we ne ondredæð þonne beoð gedrefed eorðe & bioð oferfarende vel borene dunæ on heortæn sæs swegdon & gedrefede sint wetere his gedrefede sint dunæ on strangnysse his streæmæs vel flodes onres geblissæþ ceæstre godes he gehælgæde geteld vel eærdungstowe his þu hihsta god on midle hise ne bið onwenden vel astired gefultumat hie god andwlitan vel onsine hie gedrefede sint ðiodæ & onhilde sint rice selde stefne his se hihsta & astyred is eorþe drihten megene mid us onfeng ure god iacobes cumæþ & gesioð wiorc drihtnes þa he gesette foretacne ofer eorðan ælle ðioðæ heofæð vel blissiad hændum winsumiæþ gode on stefne hihte vel blisse forðæn god heah egeslic & cing micel ofer ealle godas he underþeod folc us & ðiodæ under fet ure he geceæs us on yrfeweærdnesse him hiw iacobes ðone he lufode æstigæþ god on winsumnesse vel dræme & drihten on stefne bimæn singæð gode ure singæþ singæþ kining urum singæþ forðæn kining ælre eorðæn god is singæþ snytro vel wisliche rixæþ drihtæn on ofer eælle þiodæ god sitt ofer setle hæligam his michel drihten & hergendlic swide on ceæstre godes ure on dunæ hælie his gebredende hyhtes eælle eorðe munt vel dune sion siden norðdeles ceæster kininges miceles god on stepum his bioð gitende vel cnawen þonne he onfoð hie forðæn eællengæ kininges eorðe gesomnede beoð vel sint & togedere comen on ænum hy gesiende þa wundriende sint gedrefede sint & onfarede vel astyrede sint firhto vel bifung gegripþ hie ðer sar swa swæ æcniendes on gastæ swiþe brecende scypa tharsis swæ we gehirdon swæ & we gesæwon on ceæstre drihten megene on ceæstre godes ure god gestæðolode hy on ecnesse gehyrað ðæs eælle ðiodæ mid eærum onfoð þæ ðe eærdiæþ on ymbwirft & gefylce eorðware vel eordcende & beærn mænnæ semed on æn welig & þeærfæ muð min sprecð snytro vel wisdom & smeæung vel gemynd heorte minre gleawnisse vel wisdom ic onhilde to gelicnesse eære min ic ontine on spaltere foregesetenesse minre to hwon ic ondrede on dege yfelæn unrihtwisnesse spuran mine ymbseælde me ðæ þe getreiwæð on megene heora witoþlice on genihtsummunga vel fulsumnesse welenæ hiræ bioð wuldriende broðor ne ælisede ælisede mon ne seleð gode gecwemnesse vel licungæ his ne wiorþ alisnesse saul his & sceal swinccan on ecnesse god goda drihten sprecende is & chigð vel cleopede eorðæn from sunnæn upgange oððe setlgange of sione hyow his wlites god openliche cimeþ god ure & ne swigoð fyr on gesihþe his birnþ & ymbegænge his storm strang to he gechigde hefon up & eorðæn ðet he sceæwie folc his gesomniæð hredlice hælige his ðæ geendebyrdan cyþnesse his ofer offrungæ vel æsegdnessæ & cyþað hefonæs rihtwisnes his forðæn god demæ is geher folc min & sprece to isræhele & ic cyðe ðe ðætt god god þin ic eom na ofer æsegðnessæ þin ic þræwie þe ofrungæ vel onsegdnisse eællengæ ðine on gesiehðe minre sint simle ic ne onfo of huse þinum ceælfru ne of ewedum ðinum buccæn gemiltsa me god efter þere micelre mildheortnesse ðinre ond efter micelnesse vel manege mildsunga þinræ adilgæ unrihtwisnesse minre ma þweach me from unrihtwisnesse minre & from egyltum vel scylde minre clensæ me forðæn unrihtwisnesse minre ic ongite vel ancnawa & egylt vel scyld min beforæn me is simle ðe anum ic sinegode & yfel beforæn þe ic dyde þet þu beo gerihtwisad on wordum þinum & oferswiðe ðu midþi ðu demed eart eællengæ witoðlice on unrihtwisnesse geeæcnod ic eom & on egyltum cende me moder min eællenga witoþlice soðfestnesse ðu lufodes ungewissa & ðæ dihlu wisdomes vel snitro þines þu gecyþdes me ðu astregdest me myd ysopo & ic beo geclensod þu þweæhst me & ofer snæw ic bio gehwitad hwet wuldræst ðu on niþe vel on yfelnisse þu ðe mihtig ært on unrihtwisnesse ealchæ dege on unrihtwisnesse ðohte tungæ þin swa swæ scersæx scearpe þu dydest faken ðu lufedest hetenið vel yfelnysse ofer godnesse unrihtwisnesse mæ ðone gesprecæn rihcwisnesse ðu lufedest ealle word fortrugadnysse vel hryres on tungan facenfulre foreðæn tobreche vel toweorpð þe god on ende utaluceð þe & utadrifeð þe of ðinre eardunge vel tilde & wyrtwelæ ðin of eordæn lifigendra gesioð ðæ soðfestæn & ondreðæð & ofer hine hlethað & cweðæð eællengæ man se ne gesette god to fultome him æh gewenæde vel hyhte on manifeldnesse welena here & strongað on idelnesse his cwæþ se vnsnoter vel se unwise on heortan his ne is god gewemde sindon & onscunienliche gewordene sindon on hiora willum ne his se þe do god ne is oþðæ on anne drihten of hefeon foreseah ofer bearn monna þæt he gesio gif is ongetende oþþe secende god ealla onhyldon somed unnytte geworðene syndon ne his se þe deþ god ne his oðþe on ænne hwu ne oncnewæþ ealle þa ðe wirced unrihtwisnesse þa ðe forswelgað folc min swæ swæ mete hlæfes god ne gechigdon ðer hy forhtodon vel cwacedan of ege þer ne wes nan ege forðan god tostencæþ bæn manna him liciendræ vel cwemendra gescinde syndon forðon god forhogode hie hwylc seleð of sion helo israhele þanne acerreð drihten heftnied folces his hyhteð iacob & blissæð israhel god on næmæn þinum hælne me gædo & on mægne þine gefriolse me god gehir gebed minæ mid eærum onfoh word muðes mines forþan fremde onærison on me & strange sohten sawle mine & næ foregesetton god beforæn onsine vel sihðe his eællengæ soðlice god gefultumæð me & dryhten onfeng is sæwle minre æhwyrf yfele of findum minum & on soþfestnesse ðinre forspil hie wilsumlice ic offrie ðæ & ic ondette nomæn ðinnum drigten forðæn god he is forðæn of ællum eærfoþnesse vel geswince ðu generedest me & ofer fiend mine foreseah eagæ ðin gehyr god gebed min & ne forsioh bene mine beheæld on me & gehir me geunrotsod ic eom on ymbhwyrfte vel geswynce minum & gedrefed ic eom fram stemne fendes & from earfoðnesse ðes synfulles forðan hy onhyldon on me unrihtwisnesse & on erra hefigmode hy weron me min heorte gedrefed is on me & fyrhto deæþes gefyl ofer me ege & fyrhto comon ofer me & bewrigon me ðistro & ic cweð hwilc seleð me fyþræ swæ culfre & ic flio & reste eællenge ic aferrode flionde & ic wunode on westene ic onbidede him ðe me heælne dyde from medmiclum mode & hreohnesse gemildsa me driyhten forðæn træd me mæn ealnæ dei fiohtende swencte vel earfoðaþ me tredon me fiend mine ealnæ dei from hyhðo ðes deges forðan monige þe fiohteð wið me ondredeð ic soðlice on ðæ gewene drihten on gode ic herie word mine elce dege on gode ic wene ic ne ondrede hwet do me mon elche dege word mine onscunedon ongean me ealla gerun vel geþeæht hiræ on yfel oneardigað & gehydæð hie sporetengæ vel hælspuran mine gehealdæð swa swa onbidode sawle min fore næwihta hale þu dest hie on yrra folc þu gebricest god lif min ic segede ðæ ic gesette teæras mine on ðinre gesihðe swa swa on behate ðinre gemildsa me god mildsa me forðan on ðe getriwæð saul min & on scuadwe fiðra ðinre ic wene oððet forðgewite unrihtwisnesse ic scel clypien to godæ ðam hyhstum & to drihten se ðæ god dæde me he sende of heofonum & gefriolsede vel lisde me he sealde on edwite þa fortredende me sende god mildheortnesse his & soðfestnesse his saule mine he generede of middele hwælpæ leonæ ic slæp gedrefed bearn mannæ teð hiræ wæpn & strelæ vel arwen & tunga hira sweord scearpe upahefe ofer hefonæs god & ofer ealle eorðan wuldor ðin grino hi gearwodon fotum mine & hy gebygdon saulæ minæ hy dulfon beforan ænsinæ minre pit vel seæð & hie fiollon on hine gearwæ heortæ min god geærwæ hertæ min ic singæ & seælm ic cwiðæ drihtne aris wuldor min aris saltere & hearperas ic arise on morgen gyf soðlice gewitodlice rihtwisnessæ gesprecæð rihte demæð bearn manne & soðlice on heortæn unrichtwisnesse ge bioð wyrchende on eorðan unrihtwisnesse handæn eowre midswegæ vel syrwað afremdodæ sinðon ðæ senfullen of innoðæ hy gedwolodon of innoðe vel wombe sprecendæ synðon leæsingæ yrre him efter gelicnesse nedræn swæ nedræn deafe & fordemmende eæran hira ðæ ne gehiræð stemne wigeleren vel galendra & ætrene ðæ þe beoð gewigelode vel begalene fram wisvm vel snytro god tobriceð teð hiræ on muðæ hiræ wongtæð vel weohlan leonæ gebriceð drichten to næwihte hy becymeð swa swa weter irnende aþeneð bogæn his oððe hit bið geuntrumod swæ swæ weax meltende bioð æfirredæ ofer hie gefil fyr & ne gesioð sunnæ nere me of minum fiondum god min & from ðæm arisendum on me alys me genere me fram wyrcendum unrihtwisnesse & fram werum blodæ hel me forðæn eallengæ hy ofþrycton saul min onhruron on me strange & na unrihtwisnesse min ne synnæ min drihten butan unrihtwisnesse ic ern & ic gereht wæs aris on minum geænrynum & gesyoh & ðu drihten god megena god israel beheald to geneosienne ealla ðiodæ na þu mildsast eallum ðæ ðe wirceð unrihtwisnesse sin gecirrede to efenne & hunger þrowigen swæ hundes & ymbyrnað ceæstre eallenga hie spreceð on muðe heore & sweord is on welerum hiræ forðæn hwylc gehyrde & þu dryhten bismrast vel spest hie for naht þu heafst eallæ ðiodæ god ðu adrife us & tobrece us irre ðu ært & mildsod ært us ðu astiredest eorðæn & ðu gedrefdest hie hæl unrotnesse hire forðan æstyræð hyo is ðu oðiewdes folce ðinum herdnes þu drænctest us of wine onbryrdednesse ðu sealdes ondredendum þe getæcnunge þet hie flion from onsine bogan þet syn friolsede vel alysed gecorene ðine hælnæ me do of swiðren þinre & gehir me god sprec on halgum his blissige & ic todele swæ lyllæ & holedene eærdungæ vel teldum min is helm & min is to wunienne & to onfonne strengðo heæfedes mines iudæ kyning min gehyr god bene mine beheæld gebeda min from enðe eorðæn to ðæ ic clipode midðy bið genirwed hiorte min on stanæ þu upæhofe me ðu geleddest me forðæn geworden ært hyht min torr vel stepel strengnesse of ansene fiondæs ic oneærdie on eærdunge ðine on woroldæ ic beo scilded on wrignesse fyðræ þynræ forðæn ðu god ðu gehyrdest gebed mine ðu sealdest yrfewirðnese ondredendum næmæn ðinne dagæs ofer dagæs kyninges þu geæcest ger his oððet on dege woroldæ & worolde þurhwuniæð on ecnesse on gesihðæ godes mildheortnesse & soþfestnesse wylc seceð hyræ swæ ic singe namæn ðine god on worolde woruld ðæt ic gieldæ gehæt min of dege on dege hu ne nu godæ underþeod beoð sawl min fram him soðliche hele min he is god min & helo min fultumend min ne beo ic ma gestired hwu lange onhreosæ ge on man ge oncweælðeð eælle swæ swæ wagum onhyldon & stangaderunge onheldum þah hwæþre weorþunge min hy þohton anydan vel adrifon ic arn on þurst of muðe & he sie hy bletsodon & hyræ heorten hy yfelcweðon vel wyrgden soðlice hweðre gode underðid bið sawul mine forðæn from him is geðylð min & soðlice he is god min & helo min fultumend min ic ne afeorrie on godæ helo min & wuldor min god fultumes mines & hyht min on gode is hyhtað on hine ealc gemeting vel efenmeteð folces ageotað beforæn him heortæ eowra forðan god fultum ure is god god min to þe of liohte ic wecie ðyrste on ðæ sæul min hu monifealdlice & flesc min on westene & on wege & on weterige swæ on haligum ic atawede þe dæt ic gesage megne ðin & wuldor þin forðæn selre is milðheortnes ðin ofer lyf weleres mine herigæð ðæ swæ ic bletsye ðe on lyfe mine & on namæn ðinum ic upæhebbæ hænd mine swæ swa mid seime & mid fetnesse gefelled beoð sawul min & weleres upahefednysse herigað næman þinne swæ gemindig ic wæs ðines ofer bedd min on uhtlicum vel degrede ic smeægede on þe forðæn þu gewurðen ært felstend min & on oferbrædelse fiðræ ðinræ ic blissige togeþeodde saul min efter þe me onfeng swiðra þin gehyr god gebed min þanne ic bio geeærfoðod vel swenced from ege fyondæs genere saul min ðu bewruge me from gencyme vel metinge warigendra from menigo wyrcendra unrihtwisnesse forðæn hy hwetten swæ sweord tungen heora hy onðendon vel beheoldon bogæn ðing biter þet hy scotigen vel strelien on dygelnesse þa unwemme ferlice scotigen hine & ne ondredon hy trymedon him word yfel hy geteældon vel fliton þæt hy hydden grino hy cweðon hwylc gesihð hie hy smeageden unrihtwisnesse hy geteordon smeagenðe vel scrudniende smeægunge togenealehte mæn to heorton heagre & bioð upahafen god strelæ cilde gewordene sinðon wunden vel witu heræ & fore naht hefðo weron ongean hie tungan hera gedrefede sint ealle ðæ þe gesegen hie þe geriseð ymen vel lofsang god on sion & ðæ bið agolden gehæt vel lest on hierusalem gehier gebed min to ðæ ealc flesc cymeð word unrihtwisra strangoden vel rihsodon ofer us & arleasnæsse urum ðu gemiltsast eadig ðane ðu gecure & name vel afenge oneardæþ on geteldungum ðinum we beoð gefelled on godum huses þines hælig is tempel/ ðin wundorlic on efennesse gehir us god helo ure hyht ealræ ende eorðæn & on sewe vel sæ feor gearwienda dunæ on megene ðinum begierd of anwalde vel mihte þu drefest grund vel diop sæs sweig yða hira hwa arefneð bioð gedrefede ðioda & ondredað ealle ða þe eardiæð on endes eorðæn fram tæcnum ðinum utgæng uhtlecæn vel degredes on efene ðu gelustfullæst vel blissað herigað gode eal eorða seælm cweðað naman his sellað wuldor lofe his cweðæð vel secgað gode hu egeslecu sinðon wiorc ðin on manigfealnesse mægenes ðines liogenð ðe fiend ðine eal eorða gebide ðe & ic singe ðe psalmsang he secge næmon ðinne þu hyhsta cumæð & gesioð wiorc drihtnes hu egeslic is on geðeahte ofer bearn mænnæ se gehwyrfð vel cyrde sewe vel sæ on drege land & streæm vel flodas he oferfor mid fotum ðer we blissiæð on ðet selfe se weældeð on megne his on ecnesse eægæn his ofer ðiodæ gelociað þa on erra forðgeclypiað na hi beoð upahafen on him selfum bletsiað dioðæ god urne & gehlystað stefne lofes his se þe gesette saul mine to lyfe & ne seælde to astyrigenne fet mine god gemiltsie us & gebletsie us onliohte he andwlitæn his ofer us & mildsa us ðet we oncnæwen on eorðæn weg þinne on eallum ðiodum helo ðine ændetten ðe folc god ondettæn ðe folc ealle blissian & fægnien vel hyhtæn ðiodæ forðan ðu demest folc on emlicnesse vel efnesse & ðiodæ on eorðæn gerecest ændettæn ðe folc god andettæn ðe folc ealle eorðæ gef vel sealde westm hira bletsige us god god ure bletsige us god & ondredon hine eælle endes eorðæn arise god & beon todrefed fiend his & flion from ænsine his ðæ ðe hatodon hine swæ swa teorode smic hy geteorien swæ swa floweð weæx from ænsine fyres swæ forweorðen synfullæn from ænsine godes & soðfeste bioð simlende gehihtað on gesihðæ godes & bioð gelustfullod on blissæ singe god seælm cweðæð næman his wæg vel siþfet doð him ðe astæg ofer westdæl drihten næma is him gefahnieð on gesihðe his bioð gedrefede from ænsine his federes stiopcildæ & demen wildewenæ god on stowe hælig his god ðe eærdien deð anmode on huse se geledeð gebundene on strangnesse gelice & þa þe on irræ forðgecigæð þa eardæð on byrgenne god þanne þu utgest beforan folce ðine þonne þu færst þurh westen eorðe astyred is & soðlice hefonæs drupon from ansiene godes dune from ansine godes israela halne me do god forðan ingeodon wæteres oððe to saule minre afestnod ic æm on lame vel slim dipæ & ne is sped ic cam on deopnesse sæs vel sewe & hriohnes besencte me ic swanc chigende hase beoð geworðen goman mine geteoroden egan mine mydþi ic wene on god min gemonigfælldæ synðon ofer loccæs heafdes mines þæ ðe fiogædon vel hatedon me buton gewyrhtum gestrængode sindon ofer me þa ðe ehttæð me fiend mine unrihtlice þa ic ne reafode þa ic ageald vel tolesde god þu wast unwisdom minne & gyltas vel scyldes mine from þe ne sinðon behidde ne scamigen on me þa þe onbiduþ drihten god megena ne forwandien vel scunien ofer me ða þe secæþ þe god isræhelæ forðæn fore ðe ic forbær hosp vel edwite oferwreah mid scæme ansiene mine fremde geworden ic eom broþrum minum & gyst vel cume beærne moder minre god on fultum mine beheæld drihten & to gefultomiende me efste sien gesciende & forwandian vel scunian fiend mine þa ðæ secæð sæule mine sien gecirde on becling & scæmiæn ðæ þe þencæd me yfel sien gecirrede hræþe & scæmiende þa ðe cweðæþ me eowlæ eowlæ hiehtæð & blissiæd þa þe secæþ ðe dryhten & cweðæð simle si gemiclod drihten þæ þe lufigað helo þine ic soðlice wedlæ & þearfa eom god fylste me fultomond min & friolsiend vel alysend min ært ðu drihten ne letæ þu god on þe ic gewene drihten ne bio ic scended on eacnes on þinre rihtwisnesse gefriolse me & genere me onhyld to me eæræ þin & gefrilsæ vel alys me beo ðu me on god scildend & on stowe getrymede þet þu halne me do forðæn trymnes min & gescild vel gener min ært þu god min genere me of hande firænfulra synfulles & of hænde ongean æwe vel æ dondes & unrihtwises forðæn þu eært geðyld min drihten hyht min fram giogædhæde minum on þe ic eom getriemed of innoþe of wambe l innoðe modor minre þu eart min scildend on þe sang min simle swa swa foretacen ic eom geworðen monegum & þu fultumend strang sie gefillæd muð min of lofe þin þet ic mege singæn wuldor þin æle deg micelnes ðin ne awiorp þu me on tyde yldo midþi ðe ateorað megen min ne forlet ðu me god dom þinne kinege geof & rihtwisnesse ðine suna vel beærn kininges to demænne folc þin on ðine rihtwisnesse & ðeærfæn ðine on domo onfon muntes vel dunæ sibbe folces þines & hyllæ vel beorgas rihtwisnesse on his rihtwisnesse he demð þearfan þyses folces & hale he deþ beærn þeærfænæ & geeædmedeþ hearmcweðendre & þurhwuniæþ mid sunnan & beforæn monam on world worulde & he adunestah swæ ren on ueht vel flys & swæ dropunga dreopenda ofer eorðæn asprigð on dagæs his rihtwisnesse & genihtsumnes sibbe oððet biþ upahauen munæ & he walt from sæ oððet sæ & from flode oððet ða uteræn vel gemere ymbhwyrftes eorðe beforæn him feallað sielhearwæn & fiend his eorðen licciæð hwu god god israele þisum ðe rihte sindon heortæn min soðlice fulneh stired sindon fet fulneh ægotene sindon stiepæs mine forðæn geelnode on firenfullan sibbe firenfulræ vel synfullum gesionde forðan ne is onhyldnes deæðe hioræ ne trumnes on wite hioræ on gewinnum vel swincum monnæ ne syndon & mid monnum ne bioð swungene forðæn hyold hie oferhyd hiora oferwrigen sindon of unrihtnesse & ærleasneæssa his forðresde swæ swa of fetnisse unrihtwisnesse hiora hy ferðon on tosetednesse heortæn hy þohtæn & hy sprecen heteniþ unrihtwisnesse on hyhþo hio sprecen hy setton on hefon muð hieræ & tunga hiræ foreð ofer eorþæn towan onweg þu ædrife vel neddest us god on ende yrre is hatheortnesse ðin ofer sceæp ewedes þines gemyne gesamnungæ þinre þæ ðu gesceope from frumæn þu friolsedest vel alysdest gierde yrfeweærdnesse ðin munt sion on þæm þu eærdeast on þæt silfum upæhefe hænd ðine on oferhyde hiræ on ende hu monega awarigede sio fiond on hælgum þinum & wuldrode bioð ðæ þe hatedon on midlene cafertunes þines hio setton tæcn here tæcn & ne oncnewon swæ on wege ofer heahne swæ on wudæ treowæ mid exum hy æcurfon duræ his on þet selfe mid twibille & adese hy æwurpon hy hy oneldon vel berndon mid fire hælgunge þin on eorðæn besmiten vel befylden eærdung vel teld noman ðinum hy cweðon on heortan hiræ kyð vel cneoris hira betwiox hie cumað forðreccen we eælle dægæs symbel drihten from eorðæn tacn ura ne gesegon we nu ne is witegæ & us ne oncneweð mæ we ondetteð þe god we ondettæþ þe & we cigæð vel clypieð nomæn ðinne ic sege vel cyðe eælle wundor þine mydþi ic onfo tid ic rihtwisnesse deme gemolten is eorðe & eælle oneardende on hire ic getrimmede swioras hire ic cweð to ða unrihtwisum nellen ge unrihte don & ðam agiltendum nelleð ge upahebben horn nellen ge uphebben on hihþo horn eowerne & nellen ge sprecæn tongenes gode unrihtwisnesse forþæn ne of eæstdele ne of westdele ne from ða westæ dunum forðæn god demæ is þisne geeæðmedeþ & ðisne upæhefð forðæn cælic on hænde drihten win hluter vel scir ful is gemenged & onhylde of ðisum on ðis þæh hweðre dresten vel drosne his ne is on idelude vel amælled drinceð of him eælle ða senfullæn eorðan cuð on iudeum god on isræhelæ micel nomæ his & geworðen is on sibbe stow his & eærðung his on sion ðær he tobrec horn bogæn scild & sweord & gefioht onlihtende þu wundorlice from dunum vel muntum ecum gedrefede sindon eællæ unsnotor vel unwise heorte hie slepon sleep vel swefne hiræ to næht ne funden eælle weres of welenæ on hændæ hira from ðræwunge þinra god iæcobes slepon hnappodon þa æstigen hors ðu egeslic ært & hwilc widstondet þe of ðæm from irræ þinum of hefonum dom worpod vel scotod is eorðæ forhtæþ vel biuede & stilde vel restæt mid stefne mine to drihtne ich cigede vel clepode stefne min to dryghtne & he beheldeð me on deg eærfoþnesse mine god ic sohte mid hændum minum on niht beforæn þe & ic ne eom beswicen ic wiðsoc to frefræn saul mine gæmyndig ic wes godæs & gelustfullod ic eom bægængen ic eom & æspræng alythwon gast min forefengen wechen eagan mine gedrefed ic eom & ic ne sprech ic ðohte dagas ealda & geær þa echan on mode ic hebbe & ic gemunde on nichte mid heortæn min ic swanc vel bar & windwode on me gast min & ic cwið nis þes wæn on ecnesse forwirpeð god oððe ne toseteð þet wel gecwemed vel licige sie nugit oþþe on ende mildheortnesse his he cerfeð from worolde & cneorisse vel cynrede behaldeð vel begymað folc min lage vel ewe vel æ mine onhyldæþ eære eower on word muð min ic ontyne vel undo to bispelan muð min ic sprice foresetnesse from frumæn world hu monigæ we geherdon & we oncnewon þa & federes ure hie sedon us ne sindon gedihlede fram beærn monnæ on cneowrisne oþrum segende vel cyþende lof drihtes & megen his & wundor his ðe he worhte & æwehte witnesse vel cyðnesse on iæcobe & ewe vel æ he gesette on isræhele þæ he bebead fedrum urum þæt cuþ hio dydon ðæ beærnum here þætte oncnawa cneowrisne oþer beærn þe bioð acennede & arisæþ & segeþ vel cyðað ðæ beærn here þætte hio settæn on gode hyht here & ne ofergieten weorc godes here & bebodæ his secæþ þæt hy ne werðen swæ swa federæs hiræ kin þweor & þurhbiter kin þet ne gerehte heorte hiræ & ne is gelyfed mid gode gæst his beærn effrem bendende bogæn & sendende strelæ vel arwen his hy gecyrred sindon on deg gefihtes god comen þioda on yrfeweærdnesse ðin bæddon temple hali ðin setton ierusalem oþþet æpla gehioldon gesetton deæþlicnesse þeowa ðinræ mætas fuglas heuonas flesc haligra þinra wildordeora on þere eorðan guten blod hi æ swæ wætær on ymbegonge hierusalem & ne wes se bebyrgde geworderre we sien on edwite neæn urum on hlehtre & hyrwnessæ þisum se on ymbegænge ure sindon oþþete dryhten irsæþ on ende biþ onhæled oþþet fir ellenwodnes ðin gegoten irre þin unmiete þu ðe ne ne witon & on rice ðæ ne gecigðon namon ðinne forþan ðe heo heten iæcobes & stowe his tolysdon ne wes þu gemindig unrihtwisnesse ure erðæn þæ hredlice us ier onfehþ mildheortnes þin forþan ðearfæn geworþen ic eom swiþe gefultome us god hielo ure & fore wurþunge nomæn ðine drihten gefriolse us & orfest wes þu sinnæ ure for nomon þinum se gemearæ vel kynig israhelæs beheald hwilc gelædeþ oþþet scep iosepes þu sittest ouer cherubin gearwigean beforan effrem & beniamin & manassa awece mihtte þine & cum þet hæle ðu do us drithten god megen gehwyrfe us & atæuwa onsyne þinne & we gebeoð hihælede drithten god mægen oðþette yersaþ on gebede þeowes þines mettas us hlaf tæra & dryng svlest us on tearum gemæte þu gesettes us on wiþercwiðolnessæ nean urum & find urum bismreden us drihten god megen gehwyrfe us & oniewe onsien þin & we bioþ gehelede wingeard ob egyp æweganame þu towurpe þeoda & þu awirtwalodes þa wynsumiað gode fultumend urvm wynsumiað gode iacob nimad sealm & sellað swieg salter wynsum mid hearpan singoð on frumon monþum byman on dege fyr symbelnesse eowre forþan þe bebeod on israhelum is & dom godes iacobes kiþnesse on iosepes gesette hine midþi þe eode on eorðan egypti tungan ðeahþe ne ne wyste gehyrde forðbrohte on wiorþungum hricg his handa his on spyrtan ðeowigeaþ on earfoðnesse þu geciþes me & ic þe gefrielse & ic þe gehirde on gehydnesse hreonnesse costaþ ðe to wætrum wiðwiþorcwiðolnesse gehyre folc min & ic sprece israhel & ic kiþe þe israhel gif me gehirest god stod on gemotstowe be hira on midlene eallenga god astiehþ oþ þette demaþ unrihtnesse & doð syngiað genimað demaþ stiopcild & wieðlan eaþmodan & þearfan gesoðfestan generigan þearfan & wiedlan of handa firenfulra gefriolsað nieton ne ongietaþ on ðe þistron geangað bioþ wænde ealls staþelung eorðan ic cwiþe gode ge sindon & bearn hyhðo ealle ge soþlice swa men sweltoð & swa an be ealdormonnan feallaþ aris god deme eorþan forþan þu hyrfeweardast on eallum þiodum god hwylc gelic biþ þe ne swiga ne emngeniete gode forþon gesihþe find þine hieldon & to þe fiodon nimað heafod on filnesse þinre gesettas geþohtas geþeahtunge & ðohton wið healgan his cwieþon cumað & we forspildon hie of ðiode & neals gemyndig namon israhelæ gen ma forþan ðohton geþeafotunge on an wið þe gewitnesse gesetton eardunga diobulgild hira & þisum maelitum moab & aggareni gebal & amon & amalech & þa fremdon kynren mid geardungum tyrum & soþlice assur somed com mid hiom hu lufiende svnden erdungæ þine drythten megen gewilnað & aspring saulæ mine on akauertune drithten heorte min & fleas min hyhtað on god lyuiendne & soðlicæ spearwa onuidæþ him hus & turlæ nestð þer geseateð bryddas hys wiebed þin drythten megen kyning min & god min eadige þa eardiað on huse þin dryhten aworold aworold hergeað þe eadig wer þes is fultum from þe dryhten oneled on heorten gesette on denum teara on stowe ðone þu gesettest him & eallenga bletsunga selleþ þa æwe sealde gangað be miegne on miegen bið gesewen god goda on sion dryhten god megna gehyra benæ mine earum onfoh god iacobes þu gebletsedes dryhten eorðan þine þu ahwyrfdes hieftnied iacob þu forlete unrihtnesse folces þines þu ontyndes ealle synna hyra ðu geþwiærodes eall irre þin þu ahwyrfdes from irre on ebylnesse ðine gehwyrfe us god helo ure & ahwyrfe irre þin from us & neals on ecnesse irsast us nimðe aðenie irre þin from cneowrisne on cneowrisne god þu gehwyrfe geliffeste us & folc þin blissað on þe oþiewe us dryhten mildheortnesse þine & helo ðine sele us ic gehire hwet sprece on me dryhten god forþon sprece sibbe on folce his & ofer halga his & on him þa gehwyrfað to him silfon onhield dryhten eare ðin to me & gehire me forþan wiedla & þearfa eom ic geheald saula mine forþan halig eom halne gedo þew þinne god min gewenende on þe miltse me dryhten forþan to þe ic clipede elece diege geblisse saula þeow ðin forþan þe dryhten uphebbe saula mine forðan ðu dryhten swete & milde is & genihtsumnes on mildheortnes eallum ic cige þe earum onfoh dryhten gebed min & beheald stefne gebed min on deg earfoþnesse min ic clipige to þe forþan þu gehirdes me ne is gelic þe on godas dryhten & ne is efter worce þinum ealle þeoda ða midþy ðe ðu dides cumað & gebiddaþ beforan þe dryhten & wiorþiað noman þinne staðolas his on dunum halgum lufaþ dryhten gato syon ofer ealle eardung iacob þa wuldorfestan cweþene sien be ðe ceaster godes gemyndyg raab & babilonis witende þe gesihðe þa fremdan & tyrus & folc ethiopen þa weran on hiræ modor sion cwið man & man geworden is on hire & he staþolað hie se hyhsta dryhten siegð on gewyrtum folca hira & ealdordom hira þæ weron on hyra swa blissiendra ealra urra & eardung is on þe dryhten god helo minre on deige ic clipige & niht beforan ðe ongieð gebed min on gesihþe þinre onhilde eare ðin to bene min dryhten forþan gefylled is yfele saul min & lif min on helle tonealeceð gewenende ic eom mid niþerastigendum on seað geworden ic eom swa man butan fultome betuioh deade friols swa þa gewundadon slepende aworpene on byrgnessum ðara ne wære witende ma & witodlice hie of heanda ðinre cnysede sindon gesetton me on seaþ on þa yteran on þistrum & on scuwan deaðes on me getrymed is yrre þin & ealle upahefnesse þine ofer me ongeleddes fior þu dydes kuþe min from me gesetton me from onwealdendum him geseald ic eom & ic ne gangæ mildheortnesse þine dryhten on ecnesse ic singæ on cneowrisne & forecneowrisne ic foresecge soþfestnesse þine on muðe minum forþan þu cwæde on ecnesse mildheortnes biþ getimbred on heofonum gearwiende soþfestnesse þine gesette kyðnesse mine gecorene minum ic swor dauide þeowe minum oþþe on ecnesse ic gearwige sed ðin & ic getimbrige on worold aworld setl þin bioþ andettende heofonas wundor þin dryhten & soðfestnesse þine on circan haligra forþan hwylc on wolcnu emlice dryhtene oþþe hwylc gelic biþ gode betwih bearnum godes god se wuldraþ on geþeahtunge haligra micle & to ondrædonne ofer ealle þa on ymbegonge his sindon dryhten god megen hwylc gelic þe mihtig is dryhten & soþfestnes þin ða on ymbegonge dryhten gescild gewurden is us from cneowrisne & forecneowrisne erðan wæs duna oððet wes getrymed ymbhwyrft eorðan from world & oþþet on worlda worolde þu eart god ne ahwyrfe manna on eaðmodnesse & þu cwæde sin gecirde bearn monna forþan ðusend gearas toforan eagan þinum & swa deges of ean ðet forefered & swa gehyldon on nyht þe fore nawuhte hebbende gear hira on morhne swa wyrte feræt on morgen blosmað & þurhferet on efen gefeallað aheardað & forwisnað forþan we aspringað on irre þinum & on wreðða þinum gedrefede we sindon gesettest þu unrihtnesse ure on gesihþe þinre worlde urum on lihtnes onsin þin forþan ealle dagas ure ateoredon & we on irre ðinum ateoredon gear ure swa sand smeagað se þe eardaþ on fultome þes hyhstan on gescildnesse godes hefonas midwuniendum kwæð dryhten onfeng min wes & gescild min god min ic gewene on hine forþan he gefreolsa me of gegrine huntenda & from worde reðe sculdrum hira ymbscuan þe & under fiðrum his þu gewens scild ymbseleð þe soðfestnes his þu ne ondredes from ege ða nihtlican from strele fleogænde þurh deg ceapunga ðurhgongende on þistrum from hryre & diobola on midlene gefeallað of healfe ðine þusend & ten ðusenda of þa swyðran þinra þe eallenga ne tonealecð soþlice ðonne hweðren eagan þine þu sceawast & edleanenga firenfulra þu gesihts forþan þu eart dryhten hiht min þes hihstan þu settes gescild þin kweðað betwioh þioda wuldor his on eallum folc wunder his forðan micel dryhtnes & hergendlic swyðe egeslic is ofer ealle goda forðan ealle goda þioda diofla dryhten soþlice heofona worhte andetnes & fegernes on gesihte his haligdom & micelnesse on gehalgunge his tobrengað dryhtene eðles þioda tobrengað dryhtene wuldor & wiorðnyng tobryngað dryhtene wuldor noman his ontynað dura & ingangað on cafortune his gebiddaþ dryhten on ricedome halig his bið onstyred of onsiene his eall eorþæ dryhten rixað hyhteð eorða blissað eglondum monegum wolcn & þysternes on ymbegonge his soðfestnesse & dom gerecnes setl his fyr biforan him gearwað & onligeð on ymbehwyrfte fiend his onlihton þunreslege his ymbhwyrft eorðe gesihð & onstyred is eordæ duna swa weacx toflowað from ansiene dryhtenes from ansiene dryhtenes forhtaþ eall eorða siedon hefonas soðfestnesse his & gesioð eall folc wuldor his sin gescinde ealle þa ðe gebiddað þa sliðan & þa wuldriað on diofolgildum hira gebiddaþ hine ealle englas his gehirde & blissiende is sion & wynsumiað bearn iude fore domas þine dryhten forðan þu eart dryhten þes hyhstan ofer ealle eorðan swiðe upahefon eart ofer ealle godas singað dryhten sæng niwne forðon wundor worhte dryhten gehele hiene þæ swyþræn his & heærm hælige his cuþ dyde drihten helo his beforæn gesihþe ðiodæ onwrihð soðfestnesse his gemyndig wes þu mildheortnes þinre iæcob & soðfestnes his hus isræhele gesioþ eælle ende eorðæn helo godes ures wynsumiæþ gode eæll eorðe singæþ & hyhtæð & singað singæþ gode ure on hearpæn on heærpæn & stefne psealmæ on bymæn geleddon & stefne byme horn wynsumiaþ on gesihþe kynges onwendæþ siewe & fylnes his ymbwyrft eorðenæ & eællæ ðæ eærdiæþ on hire streæmæs heofæþ hændum on þet sylfe dunæ hyhtæþ beforæn onsine drihtnes forðon kymþ forðæn kymð to demanne eorðæn demæð ymbwyrft eorðæn on soþfestnesse & folc on emlicnesse drihten rixæþ yrsæþ folc se ðe siteþ ofer cherubin bið onstyred eorðe drihten on syon micel & on hihþo ofer eæll folc anddettæþ nomæn þinum mycel & egeslic forðæn hælig is & wiorðmynd kyninges dom lufæþ þu geærwodes emlicnesse dom & soþfestnesse on iacobe ðu worhtes wynsumiæþ drihten god urne & gebiddæþ scæmol fet his forþæn hælig is moyses & ææron on sæcerdhæd his & sæmuhel betwih hie þæ gecygæþ nomæn is gecigæþ drihten & he gehiræþ hie on swiorum wolcn sprecon to him gehyldon kyþnesse his & bebodæ his se sælde him drihten god ure ðu gehirest hie god þu ærfest were him & wrece on eællum tilenge hiræ hihtæþ drihten god urne & gebidæþ on dune hælig his forðæn hælig is drihten god ure dremeð gode eælle eorðæ ðeowiæþ drihtne on blyssæ ongængæþ on gesihþe his on hihte witæð ge þet drihten he is god he dyde us & ne he us us soðlice folc his & sceæp leswæ his ongæn gæþ gætu his anddetnesse cafortun his on ymenum anddetnesse hergæþ nomæ his forðæn swete is drihten on ecnesse mildheortnes his & oððet on world æworld soþfestnes his ic cwæð drihten gemildsa min hæl sawle mine forþan ic syngode þe þonne þu demest gesehðe soðlice on unrihtwisnessum geeacnod ic eom & on leahtrum cende me modor min gesehþe witodlice soðfæstnysse þu lufodes þa uncuþan & þa dieglan wisdomes þines þu gesweotoledest me ðu onstregdst me drihten mid ysopan & ic beo geclæsnod ðu þwehst me & ofer snaw ic beo ablæced & ahwitod god on naman þinum halne me do & on mægene þinum alyese me god gehier gebed min mid earum onfoh word muðes mines forþan fremde arysan on me & strange sohton sawle mine & na foresettan god beforan gesihðe hieora gesihþe soðlice god gefultumaþ me & drihten anfengend is sawle minre acier & ahwyrf yfel feondum minum & on soðfæstnesse þinre forspill hig wilsumlice ic onsecge ðe & ic ondette naman þinum drihten forðan good he is forðan of eallum geswince þu generedest me & ofer fiend mine gelocode & geseah eage þin gehier god gebed min þonne ic beo geswenced from ege feondes genere sawle mine ðu gescildest me from gesomnunge awergedra from mænio wyrcendra unrihtwisnesse forþon ascerptan swaswa sweord tungan hira aþenedon bogan wisan bitre þæt hie scotodon on digelnessum þone unwemman færinga scotodan hine & ne ondredon trymedon him word yfel fliton þæt hie ahyddon grinu cwædon hwylc gesihþ us smeagende sint unrihtwisnesse asprungon smeagende mid smeaunge genealæceð mon to heortan earre & byþ uphefen god strælas cilda gewordene sint wite hira & for noht hæbbende sint wið hie tungan hira gedrefede sint ealle ða þe gesawon hie god miltsige us & bletsige us onlihte he andwlitan his ofer us & gemiltsige us þæt we oncnawen on eorðan weg þinne on eallum þeodum hælo þine geandettæn þe folc god geandettæn þe folc ealle blissien & gefægenien þeoda forþan þe þu demst folc on efnesse & þeoda on eorþan gerecest geandetten þe folc god geandetten þe folc ealle eorþe sealde wæstm hiere bletsige us god god ure & bletsige us god & ondræden hiene ealle endas eorþan halne me do god forðan ineodon wæter oð sawle mine gefæstnod ic eom on lam grundes & ne is sped ic becom on heanesse sæs & hreones besengte me ic won cleopiende hase gewordene sint goman mine asprungon eagan mine þonne ic gehihte on god minne gemonifealdode sint ofer loccas heafdes mines þa ðe feodon me butan gewirhtum gestrongode sint ofer me þa ðe me ehteþ find mine unrihtlice ða þe ic ne reafode þa ic onlisde god þu wast unwisdom minne & scylda mina from þe ne sint ahydde ne sceamiaþ on me ða þe þe onbidað drihten god mægena ne sceamigen ofer me ða þe secað þe god israela forþon fore þe ic abær edwit ic oferwrah mid scome onsine mine fremde geworden ic eom broðrum minum & cuma bearnum meder minre drihten god on fultum minne beheald drihten to gefylstanne me efst sien gescynde & ascamien fynd mine þa þe secæað sawle mine syn acyrred under bæcling & areodigen þa ðe þencað me yfel syn acyrred sona & aryderende þa þe cweþæþ me egla eg egla eg wynsumien & blissien þa þe seceað þe drihten & cweþen symle sie gemiclad drihten þa þe lufigaþ hælo þine ic soðlice wædla & þearfa eom god fylsteþ me gefylsta min & alysend min eart þu drihten na þu lata god on þe ic hyhte drihten na ic beo gescynd on ecnesse on þine ryhtwisnesse alys me & genere me onhyld to me eare þin & alys me beo min on gode gescylded & on stowe getrymede þæt halne me þu do forðan trymnes min & frofer min þu eart god min genere me on handa synfulles & of handa ongean æ dondes & unryhtwisses forþan þu eart geþyld min drihten hyht min of geoguþe minre on þe getrymed ic eom of innoþe of wambe modor minre þu eart min gescyldend on þe ongalnis oððe sang min symle swaswa foretacen geworden ic eom manegum & þu gefylstend strang sie gefylled muþ min of lofe þinum þæt ic mæge singan wuldor þin ælce dæge gemiclunga þine ne aweorp þu me on tide ylde þonne teorað mægen min na þu forlæte me onhyld drihten eare þin to me & gehyr me forðon wædla & þearfa eom ic geheald saule mine forðon halig ic eom halne do þeow þinne god min hyhtende on þe gemiltsa me drihten forþon to þe ic clypode ælce dæg geblissa saule þeowes þines forðon to þe drihten ic ahof saule mine forðon þu drihten wynsum & biliwite þu eart & spedig on mildheortnesse eallum gecigendum þe mid earum anfoh drihten gebed min & begim stefne bene minre on dæg geswinces mines ic clypode to þe forþon þu gehyrdest me nis gelic þe on godum drihten & nys æfter weorcum þinum ealle þeoda swa hwelce swa þu worhtest hy cumað & gebiddað beforan þe drihten & arwurþiað naman þinne eadi wer se þe ne ferde ac on æ drihtenes willan is & on æ his smeaþ dæges & nihtes & bið swa þæt treow þæt geplantod is be þam rinum wætera þæt wæstm his syleþ on tide his & leafa his ne fealleþ & ealle swa hwæt swa deþ gesundfulliaþ nalæs swa þa arleasan nalæs swa ac swaswa mil vel dust þæt awurpeð wind fram ansine eorðan forþon nan arisaþ þa arleasan on dome na þa synfullan on geþeahte soðfæstra forðon wat drihten weg rihtwisra & siþfæt arleasra forwurðeþ forþan gnornode þeoda & folc smeagende synd on idel æt gestodon kyniges eorðan & ealdormen eft comon vel samod comon on an ongean drihtne & ongean criste his uton toslitan bendas heora & awurpen fram us geoc heora se eardaþ on heofonum bysmraþ hig & drihten ahiscð hig þonne he sprecð to heom on irre his & on hatheortnesse his he gedrefeþ hig ic soþlice wæs geset heom kyning fram him ofer sion munt þone halgan his bodigende bebod his drihten cwæþ to me bearn min eart þu ic todæge acænde þe bide þu fram me & sille þe þeoda yrfeweardnesse þine & æhta þine gemæro eorþan þu wissast vel þu reccest hig on girda irenre swaswa fæt lame þu tobritest hig & na cyningas ongitaþ ge beoð gelærede ge þe demaþ eorðan þeowiaþ drihtne on ege & blissiað him mid fyrhtu gegripað steore þilæs irsige drihten & ge forwurðaþ of wege rihtan la drihten tohwon gemonige vel hwæt gemonigfilde sindon þa þe swæncaþ me monige onarisaþ togeanes me monige secað sawle minre na is hælo hire on gode his þu soþlice drihten andfengend min eart wuldor min & upahebbende heafod min stæfne mine to drihtne ic clipode & he gehyrde me of munte halgum his ic slæpte & slæpingan ic eom & ic eft aras forþon drihten onfenc me ne ondræde ic me þusend folces ymbsillende me aris drihten halne me do god min forþon þe þu ofsloge ealle þa wiðerweardan me buton intingan toþas vel teþ synfulra þu geþreadest vel tobrittest drihtnes is hælo & ofer folc þin bletsung þin mid þi þe ic þe gecigde þu gehirdest me god rihtwisnesse minre on geswince þu tobræddest me mildsa þu me & gehir bene mine bearn manna hu lange hefige on heortan tohwan lufiaþ idelnesse & gesecaþ leasunga & witaþ ge forðon gemiclode vel gemærsode drihten haligne his drihten gehirð me mid þy ic clipige to him irsiaþ & nellan syngian þe cweðaþ on heortan eowrum & on incofum eowrum ge beoð onbrirde offriað onsægednesse rihtwisnesse & hihtað on drihtne monige cweðaþ hwilc æteowð us godu getacnod is ofer us leoht andwlitan þines drihten sealdest blisse on heortan mynre fram wæstme hwætes & wines & elas his gemonigefealdode syndon on sibbe on þare ilcan ic slæpte & ic reste forðon þu drihten synderlice on hihte þu gesettest me word min mid earum onfoh drihten ongit þu clypunga mine beeald stæfne gebedes mines kyning min & god min forþon to þe ic bidde drihten on mergen & þu gehyrdest stæfne mine on mergen ic ætstande þe & ic geseo forðon na god willende unrihtwisnesse þu eart ne ne eardaþ neah þe awirged ne ne þurhwuniaþ þa unrihtwisan beforan eagon þinum þu ascunodest ealle þa ðe wircaþ unrihtwisnesse þu forspillest ealle þa þe sprecað leasunga wer bloda & facenfulle onscuniaþ drihten ic soþlice on mænigfealdnesse mildheortnesse þinre ic ingange on hus þin ic gebidde to temple haligum þinum on ege þinum drihten gelæd me on rihtwisnesse þinre for feondum minum gewissa on gesihðe þinre weg minne forþon na is on muðe heora soþfæstnesse heorte heora idel is birge opnigende is þrota heora mid tungan heora facenfullice didon dem þu hig god hi feollan fram geþohtum heora æfter micelnesse arleasnesse heora utadrif ðu hig forðon hig gremedon þe drihten & blissian ealle þa þe gehihtað on þe on ecnesse blissiaþ & þu eardast on him & wuldriaþ on þe ealle þa þe lufiað naman þinne forðon þu bletsast þa rihtwisan drihten swa mid scilde godes willan þinne þu gewuldorbeagodest us drihten na on irre þinum ne þrea þu me ne on on graman þinum ne þrea þu me miltse þu me drihten forðon ic untrum eom hæl þu me drihten forðon gedrefede syndon ealle ban mine & sawle min gedrefed is swiðe & þu drihten hu lange gehwirf drihten & genera sawle mine halne me do for mildheortnesse þinre forþon þe ne is on deaðe se þe gemindig sy þin in on helle soþlice hwilc andettaþ þe ic wan vel ic swanc on gemerunge minre ic þwea þurh sindrige nihte bed vel reste min tearum minum beddincge minre ic geanlæte gedrefed is for irre eagon min ic ealdode betweoh eallum feondum minum onweg gewitaþ fram me ealle þa þe wircaþ unrihtwisnesse forðon gehirde drihten stæfne wopes mines gehirde drihten bene mine drihten gebed min onfengc scamiaþ & sind gedrefede swiþe ealle fynd mine syn gecirrede & scamiaþ swiðe rædlice drihten god min on þe ic hihte halne me do fram vel of eallum ehtendum me & ales me þilæs hwonne gereafige swaswa leo sawle mine þonne ne biþ se þe alise ne þe þe hi hale gedeþ drihten god min gif ic þas dyde gif is unrihtwisnes on handum minum gif ic ageald þam æftergildendum me yfele ic gefealle be gearnunga fram feondum minum on idelnesse ehteþ feond sawle mine & gegripað & fortredaþ on eorþan lif min & wuldor min on mill vel on dust gelædeþ aris drihten on irre þinum & upahefe þu on gemæru feonda minre aris drihten god min on bebode þæt þu bebude & seo gesomnung folca uton ymbsetteþ þe & for þisum on heannessum gang þu drihten dem þu folce dem me drihten æfter rihtwisnesse minre & æfter unscæþfulnesse minre ofer me si fornumen nyð synfulra & gerece þu vel rihtlæce rihtwisne smeagende heortan andlændena god rihtwisne fultum minne fram drihtne se þe halne gedeþ rihtwise heortan god dema rihtwis strang & geþyldig cwyst þu la irsaþ he þurh sindrige dagas buta gecirrede sind sweord his seceþ bogan his aþeneþ & gegearwaþ hine & on þam gegearwaþ fata deaþes strælas his byrnendum gefremeþ efne cænneþ on unrihtwisnesse & geeacnaþ sar & gecænþ unrihtwisnesse seaþ he geopede & adilf hine & gefealleþ on seaþ þe he geworhte biþ gecirred sar his on heafod his & on hnol his unriht his ofdune astigeþ ic andette drihtne æfter rihtwisnesse his & singe naman drihtnes þæs hihstan drihten drihten ure eala hu swiðe wundorlic is naman þin on ealra eorðan forþon upahafen is micelnesse þin ofer heofonas of muþe on cilda & meolc cigendra þu gefremodest lof for feondum þinum þæt þu toweorpe fynd & þone gescildend forðon ic geseo heofonas þine weorc fingra þinra monan & steorran þa þu gestaðelodest forðon is se man þæt þu is gemindig sy oððe bearn manna forþon þu geneosast hine þu litlodest hine hwæne læs fram englum mid wuldre & mid hare þu wuldorbeagodest hine & þu gesettest hine ofer weorc handa þinra ealle þu underþeoddest under fotum his sceap & oxan ealle on ufan & nitena feldes fugelas heofonas & fixas sæs þa ðe þurhgangeþ stige sæs drihten drihten ure eala hu swiðe wundorlic is naman þin on ealre eorþan ic andette þe drihten on ealre eortan minre ic secge vel ic recce ealle wundra þine ic blissie & ic winsumige on þe & singe naman þinne þam hihstan in togecirrende feondum minum on bæcc beoþ geuntromod & forweorþaþ on ansine þinre forþon þu gedidest dom minne & intingan minne þu sittest ofer þrimsetl þu þe demast rihtwisnesse þu þreadest þeoda & forweorþeð þa arleasan naman heora þu adilegadest on ecnesse & on worlda world fynd geteorodon cocor on ende & ceastre heora þu towurpe forweorþeð gemindig heora mid swege & drihten on ecnesse þurhwunaþ gegearwod on dome setl heora & he silf demþ ymbhwirft eorþan on emnesse he demþ folcum on rihtwisnesse & geworden is drihten gebeorh þearfan gefultumiend on gehiþlicnesse vel þæslicnesse on geswince & gehihtende on þe þa ðe ealle witon vel cunnon naman þinne forðon þe þu no forlætest secende þu drihten singan ge drihtne se eardaþ on sion bodiaþ betweonum þeodum wundra his forðon þe he secende blod heora he gemindig is na is ofergitol clypunga þearfena miltsa me drihten geseoh eadmodnesse mine of feondum minum þu þe upahefest me of geate deaþes þæt ic bodige ealle lofu þines on geatum dohtra sione ic winsumige on hæle þinre ongefæstnod synd þeoda on forwyrde þa þe geworhton on þisum grine þa þe hi ær digle dydon gegripen biþ fot heora oncnawan drihten domas donde on weorcum handa his gegripen is gesingod beoþ gecirrede þa synfullan in on helle ealle þeoda þa ðe ofergitaþ god forþon nalæs on ende ne bið ofergitol þearfena geþild þearfena ne forwurðaþ on ende aris drihten na bið gestrangod man beoð gedemede þeoda on gesihþe þinre gesete þu drihten æ lædend ofer hig þæt hi witon þeoda forðon hi men synd tohwon drihten þu gewite feor þu forsihst on gehidlicnesse/ on geswince þonne oferhidgaþ arleas biþ onæled þearfa beoþ gegripene on heore gaþeahtum þa þe hig þohton forþon þe bið geherod synful on gewilnungum sawle his & unrihtwis biþ gebletsod gebysmrað drihten sinfulle æfter mænigo his irres ne seceþ na is god on gesihðe is beoþ besmitene synd wegas his on ealle tide beoþ afirrede domas þine fram ansine his ealra feonda heora gewildeþ he cwæþ soþlice on heortan his ne beoð onstired of cneorisse on cneorisse buton yfele þæs wirigcwedolnesse muþ ful is & biternesse & facn under tungan his gewin & sar sitteþ on sirwungum mid welum on digolnessum þæt þe ofslihþ unscildigne eagon his on þearfan lociaþ serwaþ on diglum swaswa leo on his resthuse sirwað þæt he reafaþ þearfan strude þearfan þonne tihþ hine on grine his gehineþ hine onhildeþ hine & fealleþ þonne anwealdaþ biþ þam þearfan he cwæþ soþlice on heortan his ofergitol is god awegcirreð ansine his þilæs he geseo oþ ende aris drihten god & sy upahafen handa þin þilæs þu ofergitol si þearfena forþon bismraþ arleas drihten cwæþ soþlice on heortan his ne seceþ geseah forðon gewin & sar þu sceawas þæt þu sillest his on handum þinum þe forlæten is þearfa steopcildum þu bist gefultumiend forþræst earm synfulles & awirigdes biþ soht scild his & ne biþ gemeted drihten rixaþ on ecnesse & on worlda world forwurðeþ þeoda on eorðan his willum þearfa gehyrrende drihten gearcunge heortan heora gehirde eare þin deman steopcild & þam eadmodan þæt he ne tosette ofer þam gemicclian hine man ofer eorðan forðon efne þa sinfullan aþenodon bogan gearwodon strælas his on cocore þæt þe hi scotodon on heolstre þa rihtwisan heortan forðon þa þe þu gefremodest towurpon rihtwisnesse soþlice hwæt dyde drihten on temple haligum his drihten on heofonum setl his eagon his on þearfan lociaþ bræwas his axiaþ bearn manna drihten freniaþ rihtwisnesse & arleasnesse þe ðe þonne soþlice lufaþ unriht hataþ sawle his his rinþ ofer þa synfullan grin fyres & sweflenrec & gast storma dæl þrowung heora forðon rihtwis drihten & rihtwisnesse lufaþ efnesse gesihð andwlitan his halne me do drihten forðon geswiþraþ halig forþon gewunode/ syndon soþfæstnesse fram bearn manna idel sprecende wæron anra gehwilc to nihstan his weleras facenfulle on eortan & heortan sprecende wæron tostæncaþ drihten ealle weleras facenfulle & tungan ifel sprecende þa þe cweþað tungan ure gemicclian we weleras ure fram us syndon hwilc ure drihten is for yrmþum wædlum & geomrunga þearfena nu ic arise cwæþ drihten ic sece mine hælo bealdlice ic do on him gespreca drihtnes gespreca clæne seolfor mid fyre amered biþ gefandod eorþe & geclænsod seofonfealdlice þu drihten gehealdest us & þu gehealdest us fram cneorisse on ecnesse on ymbgange þa arleasan gangeþ æfter heanesse þinre þu gemænigfyldest bearn manna hu lange drihten ofergtalast þu me on ende oð þæt þu oncyrrest ansine þine fram me hu lange ic sette geþeaht on sawle minre sar on heortan minre þurh dæg hu lange beoþ upahafen fynd mine ofer me geloca & gehyr me drihten god min onliht þu eagon mine þilæs æfre ic slape on deaþe þilæs æfre cweþe find mine ic swigige wiþ vel ongean hine þa þe swæncaþ me winsumiaþ gif ic beo astired ic soþlice on mildheortnesse þinre ic gehihte wynsumiaþ heorte min on hæle þinre ic singe drihtne se þe god sylleþ me & ic singe naman drihtnes þam hihstan drihten of heofonum forþlocade ofer bearn manna þæt he geseo hwæt sy ongitende oþþe secende god ealle ahildon samod on unnytte gewordene synd na is se þe do god na is oð ende byrgen opnigende is raca heora tungan heora facenfullice doþ attor næddrena unde tungan heora þara muþ wirigcwedolnesse & biternesse full is raþe fet heora & to ageotende blod forþræstnes & ungesælignes on wegum heora & weg sibbe na hig oncnewon na is ege godes beforan eagon heora ac hig ne oncneowon ealle þa ðe wircaþ unriht ge þe fræton folc min swaswa mete hlafes drihten ne gecigdon þar forhtodon mid ege þar ne wæs se ege forþon drihten on cneorisse rihtwis is þæt geþeaht wændlena þu togute forðon drihten hiht his is hwilc sileþ ansine hæle israelo þonne awegceorrat drihten hæftnyd folc his blissiaþ iacob & wynsumiaþ israhel drihten hwilc eardaþ on getelde þinum oððe hwilc geresteþ on munte halgum þinum se þe ingangeþ buton wæmme & geweorcaþ rihtwisnesse se þe sprecþ soþfæstnesse on heortan his þe ne deþ facn on tungan his ne deþ þam nihstan his yfel & hosp ne onfehð wið vel ongean þam nyhstan his to nahte gelæded is on gesihþe his awirged ondrædenne soþlice drihten gemiccliaþ se þe sweraþ þam nihstan his & hine ne beswicþ se þe feoh his ne syleþ to eacan & lac ofer unscyldigne na onfehþ se þe deþ þas þonne ne biþ he unstired on ecnesse geheald þu me drihten forþon ic gehihte on þe ic cwæþ drihtne god min eart þu forðon goda minra þu ne beþearft halige þa þe synd on eorþan his gewundriaþ ealle willan minne betweoh gemonigfealde wæron untrumnessa heora æfter þon hig efston ne gesomnige ic gemittinge heora of blode ne beo ic gemindig naman heora þurh weleras mine drihten dælþ yrfeweardnesse mine & þrowunge mine þu eart þa ðe eft gesettest yrfeweardnesse mine me rapas gefeollon me on beorhtum & soþlice yrfes mines þurhbeorht wæs me ic bletsige drihten se þe silleþ me andgit ofer þæt & oð niht þreadon me lændena mine ic forseo drihten on gesihðe minre simle forðon swiðran is me ne beo ic onwændeþ for þisum gelustfullod is heorte min & winsumiaþ tunge mine on ufan þæt & flæs min geresteþ on hihte gehyr drihten rihtwisnesse mine beheald bene mine mid earum onfoh drihten gebedu mine nalæs on welerum facenfullum of ansyne þinre dom minne forðyppe eagon þine geseon efennesse þu cunnodest heortan minre & þu neosadest on niht mid fyre me þu ameredest & na is gemett on me unriht þæt ne sprece muþ min weorc manna for worde welera þinra ic behealde wegas hearde gefrema þu stapas mine on stigum þinum þæt þe hy ne syn onwændende swiðe mine ic clipige forþon þu hididest me god onhild þu eare þin me & gehir word min gewuldra mildheortnesse þine þu þe hale gedest gehihtende on þe fram þam wiþstandendum swiþran þinre geheald me drihten swaswa seon eagena under scade fyþera þinra gescild me fram ansine arleasra þa þe me swængton fynd mine sawle mine utan ymbsealdon ic lufige þe drihten mægn vel strengþ min drihten trimnes min & frofor min & alysend min god min gefultumiend min & gehihte on hine scild min & horn hælo minre & gefultumiend min heriende ic gecige drihten & fram feondon minum hal ic beo uton ymbsealdon me geomrunga deaþes & burnan unrihtes gedrefdon me sar on helle uton ymbsealdon me forecoman me grina deaþes on geswince minum ic gecige drihten & to gode minum ic clipige & he gehirde of temple haligum his stæfne min & clipung min on gesihþe his ineode on earan his awænded is & bifode eorþe & staþolas munta gedrefede syndon & onwænde syndon forðon irre he wæs him upastah smic vel rec on irre his & fyr fram ansyne his abarn gleda onælede wæron fram him heofonas secgaþ vel reccaþ wuldor godes & weorc handa his bodaþ rodor dæges þam dæge forþracette word & niht nihte gescade wisdom ne wæron gesprecene & na word þara ne beoþ gehyrede stæfne heora on ealre eorþan uteode sweg heora & on ende ymbhwyrfte eorþan word heora on sunnan gesette geteld his & he silf swaswa blidguma forþgangende of his brydhuse winsumiaþ swaswa ent to geyrnenne weg of þam hean heofonum utgang his & ongængan his oþ heannesse his ne is se þe hine behyde fram hetum his æ drihtnes ungewæmmedlicu gecirrende sawle cyþnesse godes getriwe snitro vel wisdon gearwigende þam litlan rihtwisnesse drihtnes rihta blissigende heortan bebod drihtnes leoht onlihtende eagon gehir þe drihten on dæge geswinces forþecce þe naman godes iacobes sænde þe fultum of halgum & of sion gescilde þe sy gemindig ealra þinra onsægednessa & lac þine fæt sy sy ealle þe æfter heortan þinre & ealle geþeaht þin getrimed we blissiaþ on hælo þinre & on naman godes ures we gemiccliaþ gefillaþ drihten ealle bene þine nu ic oncneow forþon hale gedeþ drihten þone gehalgodon his gehireþ hine of his þam halgan heofone on mihtum hælo þa swiðran his þas in crætum & þas horsum we soþlice on naman drihtnes godes ures we gemiccliaþ hig ofergiton wæron & gefeollon we soþlice arison & þe sind gerehte drihten on mægne þinum blissiaþ kyninc & ofer hælo þinre winsumiaþ swiþlice willan heortan his þu sealdest him & willan welera his þu ne þrute hine forðon þu foredome hine on bletsunga swetnessa þu gesettest on eafde his beah of stane deorwurþum lif he bead fram þe & þu sealdest him lengo daga on world & on worlda world micel is wuldor his on hælo þinre wuldor & micelne wlite þu asettest ofer hine forðon þu sillst hine on blesunge on worlda world þu blissast hine on gefean mid ansyne þinre forðon se cync hihteþ on drihtne & on mildheortnesse þæs hihstan ne bið onstired si gemeted hand þin eallum feondum þinum seo swiþre þin gemet ealle þa þe hatodon vel feodon god god min geloca on me forhwon forlete þu me feor fram hælo minre word scilda minra god min ic clipige þurh dæg & ne gehires & niht & nalæs on unwisum me þu soþlice on halgum þu eardast lof israela on þe ic gehihte fæderas ure gehihton & þu alisdest hig to þe clipedon & gewordene syndon on þe hihton & ne wæron gescinde ic soþlice eom wyrm & nalæs man hosp manna & onweg awearp folc ealle þa þe gesawon me forhogedon me sprecende wæron on welerum & onwændon heora heafod gehihton on drihtne generede hine halne gedide hine forþon þe he wolde hine drihten gereceþ me & nawiht me wana biþ on stowe læswe þar he me gestaþelode ofer wæter gereordnesse gelærde me
