sawle mine gecirred gelæddon me ofer stige rihtwisnesse for nama his soðlice & þeah þe ic gange on midle scadu deaþes ne ondræde ic yfelu forðon þu me mid eart gird þin & stæf þin þonne æfre frefrede wæron þu earwodest on gesihþe minre beoþ vel misan wið hig þa ðe swæncton me þu afættodost on ele heafod min & þinne drinc ondrængte eala hu beoht is & mildheortnes þin æfterfilgeþ me eallum dagum lifes mines & þæt ic oneardige on huse drihtnes on lenge dagena drihtnes is eorþe & fylnes his ymbhwyrftes eorþena & ealle þa þe eardiaþ on hine forþon he silf ofer sæs gestaðelode hine & ofer flodas gegearwode hine hwilc astah on munt drihtnes oþþ hwilc gestandeþ on stowe haligum his unscæþful on handum & clæne heorte se þe na onfehþ on idel sawle his ne he ne sweraþ on facne þam nihstan his þes onfehþ bletsunge fram drihtne & mildheortnesse fram gode hæle his þis is cneoris secendra hine secendra ansyne godes iacobes nimaþ gatu ealdormen eowre & upahebbaþ ge gatu ecnesse & ingangeþ kyninc wuldres hwil is þes cyninc wuldres drihten strang & mihtig drihten mihtig on gefeohte nimaþ gatu ealdormen eowre & upahebbaþ ge gatu ecnesse & ingangeþ cyninc wuldres to þe drihten ic upahebbe sawle mine god min on þe ic getriwe þæt ic ne gescamige ne bysmriaþ me fynd mine & soþlice ealle þa þe onbidaþ þe ne beoþ gescynde syn gescinde ealle þa unriht fram þeodum ofer do þu wegas þine drihten cuþe gedon me & stiga þine lær me gerece þu me on soþfæstnesse þinre & lær me forþon þu eart god hælend min & þe ic arefnde ealne dæg gemine þu me on soþfæstnesse þinre drihten & mildheortnesse þynre þe fram worlde wæron scilde geoguþhades mines & ne gemine æfter mildheortnesse þinre beo þu gemindig min þu for godnesse þinre drihten swete & rihtwis drihten for þisum æ gesette þam agiltendum on wege gereceþ on dome lær þu þam mildan wegas his dem þu me drihten forðon ic unscildig min ingangende ic eom & on drihtne ic hihte ne beo ic geuntrumod gecunna me drihten & costa þu me bearn lændenu mine & heortan mine forþon mildheortnes þin beforan eagon minum is & ic geefenlicige on soþfæstnesse þinre ne sæt ic on gemote ydelnesse & mid þam unrihte dondum na ic ic gange ic hatode on gesomnunge awirgedra & mid þam arleasum na ic ne sæt ic þwea betweoh þam unscildigum handa mine & ic ymbsylle wigbed þin drihten þæt ic gehire stæfne lofes þines & ic gecyþe vel asecge ealle wundra þine drihten ic lufode wlite huses þines & stowe eardunge wundres þine ne forspil ðu mid þam arleasum god sawle mine & mid weres blode lif min drihten onlihtend min & hælo min þone ic ondræde drihten is gescildend lifes mines fram þam ic forhtige þonne genealæcaþ ofer me scæþþende þæt hi eton flæsc min þa ðe swæncton me fynd mine hig geuntrumode synd & gefeollon gif ge undoþ wiþ me feondlic ne ondrædaþ heorte min gif gearisaþ ongean me gefeoht on þis ic gehihte an ic bæd fram drihtne þas ic sece þæt ic eardige on huse drihtnes eallum dagum lifes mines þæt ic geseo willan drihtnes & ic geneosige temple his forðon ahydeþ me on getelde his on dæge yfela gescild me on digolnesse geteldes his on stane upahof me & nu upahof heafod min ofer fynd mine ic ymbga & ic ofrige on getelde his onsægednesse mid clipunge ic singe & sealm ic cweþe drihtne gehir drihten stæfne mine mid þare ic clipode to þe mildsa min & gehir me to þe cwæþ heorte min ic sohte þe ansyne mine ansine þine drihten ic sohte vel ic sece ne acir þu ansine þine fram me ne ahild þu on irre fram þeowe þinum fultum min eart þu ne forlæt þu me ne forseoh þu me god hælend min to þe drihten ic clipige god min ne swiga þu fram me þilæs þu suwige fram me & ic beo gelice astigendum on seaþ gehir drihten stæfne bene minre þonne ic gebidde to þe þonne ic upahebbe handa mine to temple halgum þinum ne samad ne sile þu me mid þam synfullum & mid wircendum unrihtwisnesse ne forspil þu me þa þe sprecaþ sibbe mid þam nihstan his yfel soþlice on heortan heora syle him æfter weorce heora & æfter niþe wiþmetendra heora æfter weorce handa heora syle him agild edlean heora hym forþon hi ne ongeaton weorc drihtnes & on weorce handa his towurp hig & ne timbrast hig gebletsod sy þu drihten forþon þu gehirdest stæfne bene mine drihtne fultum min & scildend min & on hine gehihteþ heorte min & gefultumod ic eom & bleow flæsc min & of willan min ic andette him drihten getranga folc his & scildend halwændra cristenan his is hal þu do folc þin drihten & bletsa yrfeweardnesse þine & rice his & uphefe hig oþ on ecnesse tobringaþ drihtne bearn godes tobringaþ drihtne bearn ramma tobringaþ drihtne wuldor & tobringaþ drihtne wuldor naman his wurþiaþ drihten on healle halgum his stæfn drihtnes ofer wæter god mægenþrimme hleoþriaþ drihten ofer wæter miccle stæfn drihtnes on mægne stæfn drihtnes on micelnesse stæfn drihtnes gebringende ceadarbeamas & gebringaþ drihten cederbeamas þæs muntes & scæneþ vel gewanaþ hig swaswa cealf þæs muntes & seo leofa vel gecorena on þam gemete sunu anhyrna stæfn drihtnes betweoh ceorfendes ligræsc fires stæfn drihtnes tosettendes astah westen & astired drihten of westen fealleð stæfn drihtnes gearwigendes heortes & unwreah þa þiccan & on temple his ealle cwedaþ wuldor ic uphebbe þe drihten forðon þu onfenge me ne þu tobræddest fynd mine ofer me drihten god min ic clipige to þe & þu gehældest me drihten þu agute fram helle sawle mine þu gehældest me fram ofdune astigende on seaþ singaþ drihtne halignesse his & andettaþ gemynde halignesse his forðon irra on æbilignesse his & lif on willan his æt æfen wunaþ wop & to mergen vel on dægred blis ic soþlice cwæþ on genihtsumnesse minre ne beo ic astired on ecnesse drihten on willan þinum þu gearwodest wlite minum mægen þu forcirdest ansyne þine fram me & geworden ic eom gedrefed to þe drihten ic clipige & to gode minum ic bidde on þe drihten ic hihte na ic beo gescynd on ecnesse on rihtwisnesse þinre alis me onhyld to me eare þin raþe þæt þu generige me beo þu me on god gescildend & on huse gebeorges þæt þu me halne me gedo forðon strenþ min & gebeorh min eart þu & for naman þinum drihten gelændest me & feddest me þu gelæddest me of grine þisum þæt bedigledon me forþon þu eart scildend min on handum þinum drihten ic beode gast minne þu alisdest me drihten god soþfæst þu feodest healdende idelnesse ofer idellice ic soþlice on drihtne gehihte ic gefeo & blissige on mildheortnesse þin forþon þu gelocodest eadmodnesse mine hæle of nydþearfnessum sawle mine ne beluc þu me on handum feondum þu gesettest on stowe rumre fet mine eadige þara þe forlætene synd unrihtwisnesse & þara bewrigene synd synna eadig wer þam ne getealde drihten synne ne is on gaste his facn forðon ic singode ealdodon ban mine þonne ic clipode ealne dæg forðon dæges & nihtes gehefegod is ofer me handa þine gecirred ic eom on yrmþum minre þonne biþ tobrocen ricg scild minne cuþe þe ic dide & unrihtwisnesse mine na ic oferwreah he cwæþ ic andette togeanes me on unrihtwisnesse minre drihtne & þu forlete arleasnesse synna minre for þisum gebiddaþ to þe ealle halige on tide gelimplicre vel gehiþlicre hwæþere soþlice on cealdum flote wætera manigra to him na togenealæhton þu eart frofor vel gebeorh min fram geswince se þe ymbsealde me winsumnes min alis me fram ymbsyllendum me andgit þe ic sille & ic getimbrige þe on wege þisum on þam þu gegæst ic getrimme ofer þe eagon mine nellaþ ge beon swaswa hors & mulas on þam ne is andgit on bridelse & midle ceacan heora geteoh þa to ne genealæhton to þe gefeoþ rihtwise on drihtne riht gedafenaþ hirenes andettaþ drihtne on hearpan on saltere tyn strengodan singaþ him singaþ him sang niwne wel singað him on stæfne forþon riht is word drihtnes & ealle weorc his on geleafan lufað mildheortnesse & dom mildheortnesse drihtnes ful is eorðe word drihtnes heofonas getrimede sind & gast muþes his ealle mægen heora gesomnigende swaswa in on cille wæter sæs settende on goldhord neolnysse ondrædende drihten ealle eorþan fram him soþlice beoþ onstirede ealle oneardiaþ ymbhwyrft forþon þe cweþ & gewordene synd he bebead & gescapene syndon ic bletsige drihten on ealle tide symle lof his on muþe minum on drihtne biþ gehered sawle min gehiran þa manþwæran & blissian gemiccliaþ drihten mid me & upahebban we naman his betweonum ic sohte vel rece drihten & he gehirde me & of eallum geswæncednessum minum he generede me genealæceþ to him & beoþ onlihte & andwlitan eowre ne beoþ gescynde þes þearfa clypode & drihten gehirde hine & of eallum geswæncednessum his he gehælde hine onsænde engel drihten on ymbhwyrfte ondrædende hine & he generaþ hig birgaþ & geseoþ forðon winsum is drihten eadig wer se þe gehihtaþ on him dem drihten þa unscæþþigan me oferfeoht oferfeohtendan me gegrip wæpn & scild & aris on fultum me asænd sweord vel mece & beluc wiþ hig þa ðe ehtaþ me cweþ to sawle minre hælo þin ic eom syn gescænde & onscuman vel ondrædan secende sawle mine sy gecirred on bæcc & syn gescænde þencende me yfel synd swaswa dust vel myll beforan ansyne windes & engel drihtnes swæncende hig synd wegas heora þeostru & glidd vel sclidd & engel drihtnes ehtende hig forþon be ungewirhtum ahiddon me on forwyrd grina heora ofer on idel edwit sawle minre cume him grin þa hig ne gecnawaþ & gehæftedne þone þa he behidde gegripaþ hine & on grine fealleþ on þæt sylfe vel on þæt ilce sawle soþlice min upahefþ on drihtne & bið gelustfullod ofer hælo his cwæþ se unrihtwisa þæt þe agilde on him sylfum ne is ege godes beforan eagon his forðon facenlice he dide on gesihþe his unrihtwisnesse his to læþþe word muþes his unrihtwisnes & facn nolde ongitan þæt he wel dide unrihtwisnesse smeagende is on bedclyfan his ætstod on eallum wegum naht gode hete soþlice ne feode drihten on heofonum mildheortnesse þin & soþfæstnesse þin oð to wolcne rihtwisnesse þin swaswa munt godes domas þine neowelnes micclu men & nytena þu gehældest drihten on þam gemete þu gemonigfyldest mildheortnesse þine god bearn soþlice manna on gescildnesse fyþera þinra gehihtaþ beoð ondrængte fram nihtsumnesse huses þines & of burnan willan þines þu dreccest his nelle þu efnian & yfelsacigan & na donde unrihtwisnesse forðon swaswa hig rædlice adruwaþ & on þam gemete wyrta gærswyrta raþa feallaþ gehiht on drihtne & do godnesse & eorþan & þu bist gelustfulla on drihtne & he silleþ þe bene heortan þinre unwreoh drihtne weg þinne & gehihte on hine & he deþ & utalædeþ swaswa leoht rihtwisnesse þine & dom þinne swaswa midne dæg underþeodeþ bodu drihtne & gebide þe to him nelle þu efnian on him se biþ gesundfullod on wege his on men donde unrihtwisnesse ablin fram irre & forlæt hatheortnesse nelle þu elnian þæt þu wirige forðon þa ðe wiriaþ beoþ abrytte þa ge þildigan soþlice drihten hig yrfeweardnesse eorðan drihten na on hatheortnesse þinre þu þreage me & na on irre þinum þu nirewest me forðon strælas þine gefæstnode synd me & getrimedest ofer me handa þine ne is hælo on flæsce minum fram ansine irres þines ne is sib banum minum fram ansyne synna minra forðon unrihtwisnesse mine ofer gesetton synd heafod min swaswa bynden hefig gehefegode synd ofer me afulodon & wyrsodon synd dolhswaþa mine fram ansyne unwisdomes mines yrmþum geworden ic eom & gedrefed ic eom oð on ende ealne dæg geunrotsod ic ineode forðon sawle min gefilled is besmyrnessum & na is hælo on flæsce minum gebrigged ic eom & geeadmed ic eom swiðe ic getrimmeþe fram geomrunge heortan minre ic cweþe ic healde wegas mine þæt ic ne agilte on tunga minre ic sette muþe minum gehealdnesse þonne gestandeþ se synfulla wiþ vel ongean me ic adumbode & eadmod ic eom & ic swigode fram godu & sar min geedniwod is gehatode heorte min binnon me & smeagung min abarn swa fyr sprecende ic eon on tungan minre cuþne do me drihten ende minne & gerim vel getæl dagas heora hwilc is þæt ic wite hwæt wana sy me on gesihþe gemetegode þu settest dagas mine & sped min swaswa naht beforan þe þeah hwæþere eall idelnesse ælc man leofað soþlice on anlicnesse þurhfærð man on idel biþ gedrefed goldhordaþ & nat hwam he gesomnaþ þa & nu hwilc vel hwæt is ic abad vel anbidung min hunenu drihten & sped min mid þe is fram eallum unrihtwisnessum minum genera me hosp vel edwit þam unwisum þu sealdest me biddende vel geanbidod ic abad drihtnes & he begimde me & he gehyrde bene mine & utalædde me of seaðe yrmþe & of lame dide vel geworhte & sette ofer stan fet mine & gerehte gangas mine & he onsænde on muð minne sang vel cantic nywne mid flæsce gode ure geseoð monige & ondrædaþ & gehihtaþ on drihtne eadig wer þæs is naman drihtnes hiht his & ne gelocode on idelnesse & on wændan þa leasan fela didest þu drihten god min wundor þin & geþohtum þinum ne is hwilc gelic sy þe ic sæde & sprecende ic eom gemonigfealdode synd ofer getæl vel gerim onsægednesse & ofrunga þu noldest earan soþlice þu gefremodest me onsægednesse & for scilde vel for sinne na þu ne bæde þonne ic cwæþ efne ic cume on eafde bec awriten is be me þæt ic do willan þinne god min ic wolde & æ þine on midle heortan minre eadig se þe ongyteþ ofer wædlan & þearfan on dæge yfel gefreoþ vel alisseþ hine drihten drihten gehæleþ hine & geliffæstaþ hine & eadige gedoþ hine on eorðan & ne silleþ hine on sawla feonda his drihten welan fultum biraþ him ofer bed sares his ealle streone his þu gecirdest vel þu gehwirfdest on untrumnesse his ic cweþe drihten mildsa min gehæl sawle mine forþon ic gesingode þe fynd mine cwædon yfel me hwænne swilteþ & forwirþeð naman his & gif ineode þæt he gesawe þa idlan spræc heorte his gesomnode vel gegadorodon unrihtwisnesse him hig eodon ut & hi spræcon him betweonum wiþ vel ongean me þohton ealle fynd mine wiþ vel ongean me þohton yfel me word unriht hi gesetton ongean me cwist þu se þe hnappaþ to na geiceþ þæt he arise on þam gemete wilniaþ heort to willan wætera swa gewilnað sawle min to þe god þirteþ sawle minre to gode þam lifigendum hwænne ic cume & ætiwe beforan ansyne godes wæron me tearas mine hlafas dæges & nihtes þonne biþ cweden me dægwamlice hwar is god þin þas gemunnende ic eom & oneat on me sawle min forþon ic fare on stowe geteldes wundorlic oð on hus godes on stæfne winsumnesse & andetnesse sweg symbligendis forhwon unrot eart þu sawle min & forhwon gedrefest þu me ic gehihte on gode forðon nugit ic andette him hælo onwlitan mines & god min to me silfum sawle min gedrefed is forþon gemindig ic beo þin of eorþan iordane fram muntte þam litlan vel medmicclan neolnessa neolnys gecigeþ on stæfne wæterþeotena þinra ealle þa hean þine & yþa þine ofer me foron vel ferdon on dæge bebead drihten mildheortnesse his & on niht cantic vel sang his mid me gebed godes lifes mines dem þu me god & toscad intingan minne of þeode naht haligre fram men unrihtwisum & facenfullum genera me forðon þu eart god strengþ min forhwon me þu awegdrife forhwon unrot ic inga þonne swænceþ me fynd mine onsænd leoht þin & soþfæstnesse þine hig me gelæddon & togelæddon on munt halgum þinum & on getelde þinum & ic inga to weofode godes to gode se geblissaþ iuguþe mine ic andette þe on hearpan god god min forhwon unrot eart sawle min & forhwi gedrefst þu me ic hihte on god forðon nugit ic andette him hælo andwlitan min & god min god mid earum urum we gehirdon fæderas ure bododon vel sædon us weorc þæt wyrcende þu eart on dagum heora on dagum ealdum hand þin þeoda tostænced & ðu plantodost hig & þu swængtest folc & weg adrife hig nalæs soþlice on sweorde his hig agon vel besæton eorþe & earm heora ne gehæleþ hig ac swiþre þin & dom þin & onlihtnes andwlitan þin forðon gelicode on him þu eart se ilca cyninc min & god min þu onbude hælo iacobes on þe fynd ure we windwiað horn & on naman þinum we forhicgaþ vel we forseoþ arisende on us nalæs soðlice on bogum minum ic hihte & sweord min ne gehæleþ me þu gehældest soþlice us of þam unswæncendum us & hatigende us þu gescændest on gode we beoð geherede ælcne dæg & on naman þinum we andettaþ on worlde forlæteþ heorte min word god cweþe ic weorc min cyninge tunge min reodwrite fæder writ rædlice writendes wlitig on hiwe for bearnum manna togoten is gifu on welerum þinum forþam bletsode þe god on ecnesse begird sweord þin ofer lændena þine hiw þin & fægernesse þine beheald gesundfullice forþga & rixa for soþfæstnesse & manþwærnesse & rihtwisnesse & gelædeþ þe wundorlice seo swiþre þin strælas þine scearp folc under þe fealleþ on heortan feonda cyninges setl þin god on worlda world gird gird rices þines þu lufodest rihtwisnesse & atodest unrihtwisnesse forþon he smerede þe god god þin mid ele blisse for geferrædenum þinum god ure gebeorh vel gener & mægen fultum on geswincum þa gemetton us swiðe forþam we ne ondrædaþ þonne biþ eorþe & beoþ forcired vel & forlorene vel & forlætene beoþ muntas on heortan sæs swegdon vel hleoþredon & gedrefede synd wæter heora gedrefede synd muntas on strengþe his flodes onræs geblissaþ ceastra godes gehalgaþ geteld his þæs hihstan god on middele his ne bið onstired gefultumaþ hig god on mergen on æfengloman gedrefede synd þeoda & onylde synd sealde stæfne his onstired is eorðe drihten mægna mid us andfeng ure god iacobes cumaþ & geseoþ weorc drihtnes þe sette foretacn ofer eorðan ealle þeoda blissiaþ handum gefeogiaþ gode on stæfne blisse forðon god bregenlic kyninc micel ofer ealle eorðan he underþeodde folc us & þeoda under fotum urum he geceas us yrfeweardnesse his hiw iacobes þe he lufode astah god on wyndreame & drihten on stæfne singan ge gode ure singaþ ge singaþ cyninge ure singaþ forðon cininc ealre eorþan god singaþ wislice rixsaþ god ofer þeoda god sit ofer setle haligan his micell drihten & heriendlic swiðe on ceastre gode urum on munte haligum his upahefennisse ealre eorðan side norþdæl ceastre cininge micles god on huse his biþ tocnewen þonne he anfehþ his forðon sihþe cininges gesomnode synd tosomne comon on annesse hig geseonde swa wundriende sind gedrefede wæron onstir wæron cwacung vel bifung vel ege befeng hig þar sar swaswa cænnende vel eacnigende on gaste strangum forþræstende scipu þæs landes swa we gehirdon swa we gesawon on ceastre drihtnes mægen on ceastre godes ures god gestaþelode hig on ecnesse gehirað þas ealle þeodum earum onfoþ ealle þe bugiaþ ymbhwyrft gehwilce eorcinne & bearn manna samod on annisse welig & þearfa muþ min sprecaþ wisdom & smeagung heortan minre geleawnesse ic onhidde on bispelle eare min ic untine on saltere foresetnesse minre ic ondræde on dæge yfel unrihtwisnesse helspuran mine ymbsyleþ me þa þe getriwaþ on mægne heora & on mænigfealdnesse welena heor a hi wuldriaþ broþor na aliseð aliseþ man ne sileþ gode gecwemnesse his & wurh alisnes sawle his & won on ecnesse god goda drihten sprecende is & gecigde eorðam fram sunnan upgange oð setlgang of sion hiwes wlites his god switollice cymeþ god ure & fyr on gesihþe his birneþ & on ymbhwyrfte his storm strang & togeciged vel genemnod heofon uppon & eorþe þæt he toscade folc his gesomniaþ þar halige his cyþnessa his ofer onsægednessa & sædon vel bododon heofonas rihtwisnesse his forðon god dema is gehir folc min & ic sprece to israela folce & ic cyþe þe god god þin ic eom nalæs on ofrunga þine ic þreage þe onsægednessa soþlice þine on gesihþe minre synd sind mildsa me god æfter micclan mildheortnesse þinre & æfter mænigo mildsa þinra adilga unrihtwisnesse mine git ma aþweah me fram unrihtwisnesse minre & fram scilde minum geclænsa me forðon unrihtwisnesse mine ic oncnawe & þe anum asingode & yfel beforan þe ic dide þæt þu beo gerihtwisode on spræcum þinum & þu oferswiþe þonne þu demed eart on gesihðe soþlice on unrihtwisnesse geeacnod ic eom & on modor min on gesihþe soþlice soþfæstnesse þu lufudest ungewissu & dihlu wisdomes þines þu geswutelodest me þu onstridest me drihten mid isopon & ic beo geclænsod þu þreahst me & ofer snaw ic beo ahwitod hwæt wuldras ðu on yfelnesse þu þe mihtig eart on unrihtwisnesse ealne dæg unrihtwisnesse þohte tunge þin swaswa scerseax scearp þu didest facn þu lufodest hete vel wirinesse ofer fremsumnesse unrihtwisnesse ma þonne sprecan efennesse þu lufodest ealle word for strangnesse tungan facenfulre forþon god towurpeþ þe on ende ute unluceþ þe & awegafirreþ þe of getelde þine & wyrttruma þine of eorðan lifigendra geseoþ rihtwise & ondrædaþ & ofer hine hlihhaþ & cweðaþ efne man se þe ne gesette god fultumiend his ac gehihte on mænigo welena heora & strangaþ on idelnesse his cwæþ se unrihtwisa on heortan his na is god gewænde synd & onscuniendlic gewordene synd on unrihtwisnessum na is se þe do god god of heofone locade ofor suna manna þæt he geseo is ongitende oððe secende god ealle ahyldon samod on unnytte gewordene synd na is se ðe do god na is oþ ænne hu ne witon ealle þa þe yrraþ unrihtwisnesse þa ðe swelgaþ folcc min swaswa mete hlafes god ne gecigdon þær hi forhtodon of ege þæg na wæs ege forðon god tostæncþ ban heora þe mannu licigaþ gescynde synd forðon god forhigede hig hwilc selleþ exione hælo israel þonne acirþ drihten hæfned folces his fraþan iacob & blissaþ israel god on naman þinum halne me do & on mægne þinum dem me god gehir gebed min mid earum onfoh word muþes min forþon fremde arison wið vel ongean me & stronge sohton sawle mine & na forsetton god beforan beforan gesihþe his gesihþe soþlice god gefilsteþ me & drihten andfend is sawle minre acir yfelu on feondum minum & on soþfæstnesse þine þu generedest hyg winsumlice ic ofrige þe & ic andette naman þinum drihten forðon god he is forðon of eallum geswince þu generedest me & ofer fynd mine eagan mine gehyr god gebed min & na forseah bene mine beheald on me & gehyr me geunrotsod ic eom on geswince minum & gedrefed ic eom of stafne feondes & of geswencede synfulles forðon onhildon on me unrihtwisnessa & on eorre hefigmode hi wæron me heortan min gedrefed is on me & fyrhto deades hreas ofer me ege & firhto vel bifung comon ofer me & bewreah me þeostro & ic cwæþ hwilc selþ me fædera swaswa culfre & ic fleo & ic reste efnenu ic afeorrode fleonde & ic wunode on westene ic anbidode hine þe me halne me dyde fram medmiclum gast & heortnessa mildsa me god forðon fortræd me man ælce dæge onfeohtende swencte me fortrædon me fynd mine ælce dæge forðon monige feohtende eagenas vel biþ me fram heanesse dæge ic ondræde ic soþlice on þe ic hihte on gode ic herige spræca mine on gode ic hihte na ic ondræda hwæt do me flæsc ælce dæge word min hi onscunodon ongean me ealle geþohtas heora on yfell hy eardiaþ & behidaþ hy hoh minne begymeþ swaswa hi forþildegodon sawle min for nahte hale þu dest hyg on eorre folc þu tobrycst god lif min ic cyþe þe þu settest tearas mine on gesihþe þinre swaswa on behate þinum gemildsa me god mildsa me forðon on þe getriwþ sawl min & on sceade fiðra þinra ic hihte oþ aleore vel forþgewite unrihtwisnes ic clipige to gode þam hihstan god þe wel dyde me he sende of heofone & alysde me he sealde on hosp þu fortredendan me he sende god mildheortnesse þin & soþfæstnesse his & he generode sawle mine of middele hwelpa leona ic slep gedrefed suna manna teþ heora wæpn & stræla & tunge heora sweord scearp upahefe ofer heofones god & ofer eallum eorðan wundor þin grin hi gearwodon fotum minum & hi gebigdon sawle mine hy dulfon beforan ansine mine seað & feollon on þone gearo heorte min god gearo heorte min ic singe & sealm ic secge drihtne aris wuldor min aris sealmleoþ & hearpan ic anrise on dægred gif soþlice witodlice rihtwisnesse gesprecaþ þa rihtan demaþ suna manna & soþlice on heortan unrihtwisnessa wircaþ ge on eorþan unrihtwisnessa handa eowre syrðaþ fremedlæcende synfulle fram innoþe hi dweledon of innoþe hy spræcan leasunga hatheortnes him æfter gelicnesse nædran swaswa nædran dumbe & forcliccende earan heora swa na gehiraþ stæfne ongalendra & ættrene beoþ begalene wisdom god forbriteþ teþ heora on muðe heora geahlas leona tobricþ drihten to nahte hi becumaþ swaswa wæter yrnende behylt bogan his oð þæt hit biþ geungetrimmed swaswa weax þe flewþ beoð afirrede ofer reas fyr & na hi gesawon sunnan nere me of feondum minum god min & fram arisendum on me alis me nere me fram wircendum unrihtwisnesse & fram werum bloda hæle me forðon on gesihþe hi ongunnon sawle mine onhruron on me þreafulle & ne unrihtwisnes min & na syn min drihten butan unrihtwisnesse ic arn & ic geriht wæs aris on geanrine min & geseoh & þu drihten god mægena god israel beheald to geneosienne ealle þeoda na þu miltsast ealle þe wyrcaþ unrihtwisnesse syn gecirrede to æfene & hungor þrowian & hundas & ymbirnaþ ceastre on gesihþe sprecaþ on heore muðe & sweord on welerum heora forðon hwilc gehyrde & þu drihten bysmrast hig to nahte gelæddest ealle þeoda god þu eart us & tobræce us eowre is & gemiltsod þu eart us þu astiredest eorðan & þu drefdest hig hæl gedrefednessa his forðon he astired is þu aþeowdes folce þinum heardu þu drenctest us of wine onbrirdnesse þu sealdest me ondrædendum þe tacnunga þæt hy fleon of ansine bogan þæt sin alysede gecorene þine halne do of swiðran þinra & gehir me god spræc is on halgum his ic blissie & ic todælde byrþen lim & hole dene eardung min is galaaþ & min is manases & wæstmbærnes strangnes heafdes mines iudea cyninc min gehir god halsunga mine beheald gebede mine fram gemærum eorðan to þe cleopode þaþa angud wearþ heorte min on stane þu upahefdest me þu gelæddest me forþon geworden is hiht min stypel strangnisse of ansyne feondes on ic eardige on eardunge þinre on woruld ic beo gescilded ofer brædelse fyðera þinra forðon þu god min þu gehyrdest gebed min þu sealdest yrfeweardnesse ondrædendum nama þin dagas ofer dagas cyninges þu geic gear his oð dæg cynren & cynren þurhwunaþ on ecnesse on gesihþe gode mildheortnesse & soþfæstnesse his hwilc seceþ swa sealme ic secge naman þine on worulda woruld þæt ic agilte gehat mine of dæge on dæg hunenu god underþeod biþ sawl min fram him soþlice hælo min & he god min & hælo min andfeng min na ic beo astired ma hu lange onreowsaþ ge on men ge ofsleaþ ealle eow swaswa wage onhildum & stangæderunge gecnysed þeah hwæþere sceat min hi þohton anydan ic arn on þurst of muðe hy bletsedon & heortan heora hy wirgdon hwæþere god underþeoded biþ sawle min forðon fram him geþild on min forðon he god min & hælend min fultum min na feorsige on gode hælo min & wundor min god fylstes min & hiht min on gode is hihtaþ on hine ealle gegaderunge folces ageotaþ beforan him heortan eowre god fultum ure on ecnesse god god min to þe of leohte ic wacige þyrste on þe sawle mine hu mænigfealdlice þe flæsc min on eorðan westen & on wæterigum & on wæterum swa on haligum ic oþeowde þe þæt ic sawe mægen þin & wuldor þin forðon betere is mildheort þin ofer lif weleras mine heriað þe swa ic bletsiaþ þe on life minum & on naman þinum ic upahebbe handa mine swaswa of fætnesse & gefillednesse gefilled bið sawl min & weleras upahefednisse heriaþ muð minne swa gemindig ic wæs þin ofer bedd min on dægredum ic gemindige on þe forþon þu wære gefilstend min & on oferbrædelse siþra þinra ic blissie togeþeodde sawl min æfter þe me andfeng swiþre þin gehir god gebed min þonne ic bidde fra ege feondes genera sawle mine þu gescildest me fram gesomnunge awirgedra ofer manegum wyrcendra unrihtwisnesse forðon ascirpton swaswa sweord tungan heora aþenedon bogan & þinc wisan biter & hi scotodon on digolnessum þone unwæmman færinga scotodon hine & na ondrædon trimedon him spræce manfulle hig geteohhodon þæt hig ahiddon grinu hi cwædon hwilc gesihþ hig smeagende wæron unrihtwisnesse hi geteorodon smeagende smeagunge togenealæceþ man eortan eare & biþ upahafen god strælas cilda gewordene synd wita heora & geuntrumode synd wiþ hy tungan heora gedrefede sind ealle þa þe gesawon hig þe gedafanaþ ymensang god on sion & ðe biþ agifen gehat on hierusalem gehir gebed min to þe æghwilc flæsc cymeþ word unrihtwisra gestrangodon ofer us & arleasnessum urum þu mildsast eadig þone þu gecure & gename hy oneardiaþ on cafertunum þinum gefillede we beoþ on godum huses þines halig is templ þin wundorlic on efennesse gehir us god se halwænda ure hiht ealra gemæro eorþan & on sæ feorr gearwigende muntas on mægne þinum begirdeþ mid mihte þu gedrefest grunddeopan sæs sweg yþa his beoþ gedrefede þeoda & ondrædaþ þa ðe eardiaþ gemæru eorþan fram tacnum þinum utgang uhtontid & æfentid þu bist gelustfullod heriaþ gode eall eorðe sealm secgaþ naman his sillaþ wuldor lofe his secgaþ gode hu egeslice synd weorc þine drihten on mænigfealdnesse mægnes þines leogaþ þe find þine eall eorþe gebiddeþ þe & singað þe sealmum he secge naman þinum cumaþ & geseoh weorc godes egeslic on geþeahtum ofer suna manna se gecirde sæ on drige land flodas hi oferforan mid fet þær we blissiaþ on him se wildeþ on mægne his on ecnesse eagon his ofer þeoda gelociaþ na hi beoþ upahafen on him silfum bletsiaþ þeoda god urne & gehirað stæfne lof his se þe gesette sawle mine to life & na he sealde beon astired fet mine god gemildsige ure & gebletsige us onlihte andwlitan his ofer us & mildsige ure & we oncnawan on eorþan wegas þine on eallum þeodum hælo þin we andettaþ þe folc god we andettaþ þe folc ealle blissia & gefeon þeoda forðon þu demest folce on efennesse & þeoda on eorðan þu gereccest we andettaþ þe folc god we andettaþ þe folc ealle eorþe syleþ wæsm hyre gebletsige us god god ure gebletsige us god & ondrædan hine ealle endas eorðan arisaþ god & toscariaþiað fynd his & beoþ geflimde þa ðe hatodon hine fram ansine his swaswa geteoraþ smic litliaþ swaswa milteþ vel flewþ weax fram ansyne fyres swa forweorþað þa sinfullan fram ansine godes & þa rihtwisan blissian hihtaþ on gesihþe godes & syn gelustfullode on blisse singaþ gode sealm cweþaþ naman his siþfæt doþ him se astah ofer westdæl drihten naman him blissiaþ on gesihþe his beoþ gedrefede fram ansyne his fæderas steopcilda & deman wuduwan god on stowe halgum his god se þe eardian deþ anmode þeawas on huse se utalædeþ gebundene on strengþe gelice hig þa ðe æbilgaþ þa eardiaþ on byrignum god mihtig þu utgæst on gesihðe folces þines þonne þu ofergæst on westenne eorþe onstired is & soþlice heofonas dropodon fram ansine godes sinai fram ansyne godes israel halne me do god forþon ineodon wæter oþ to sawle minre gefæstnod ic eom on lam grundes & na is sped vel miht cymeþ on heannessum sæs & reohnes besæncte me ic hwon clipode hase gewordene synd gemon mine geteorodon eagan mine þonne ic gehihte on gode minum gemonifealdode synd ofer loccas heafdes mines þa ðe hatodon me buton gewirhtum gestrangode synd þa ðe ehtiaþ me fynd mine unrihtlice þa ðe ic ne reafige þa ic onlisde god þu wast unwisdom minne & scilda mine fram þe ne sind behidde ne scamiaþ on me þa ðe biddaþ þe drihten drihten mægna ne beoþ gescænde ofer me þa ðe secaþ þe god israel forðon for þe ic abær hosp vel edwit oferwreah gescindnesse ansine mine fremde geworden ic eom broþrum minum & ælþeodig bearn modor minre god on fultum mine beheald drihten to gefultumigenne me æfest sin gescænde & onscunode þa ðe secaþ sawle mine sin forcirrede on bæc & scamian þa ðe willaþ me yfelu syn forcirrede sona & scamigende þa þe cweþaþ me eala eala gefeon & blissian on þe ealle þa ðe secaþ þe & cweþaþ symle sin gemicclode drihten þa þe lufiaþ hælo þine ic soþlice wædla & þearfa ic eom god þu gefultuma me fultumiend min & alisend min þu eart drihten on þe drihten ic gehihte ic ne sy gescænded on ecnesse on rihtwisnesse þinre alis me & genera me onhild to me eare þin & hæl me beo þu me on god gescildend & on stowe gefæstnode þæt þu halne me gedo forðon trimnes min & frofor min eart þu god min genera me of handa synfulra & of handa ongean æ donde & unrihtlice forþon þu eart geþild min drihten drihten hiht min fram iuguþhade minum on þe getrimed ic eom of innoþe of wambe modor minre forðon þu eart scildend min on þe sang min symle swaswa forebeacn geworden ic eom monigum & þu fultum strang si gefilled muþ min mid lofe þæt ic singe wuldor þin ealne dæg micelnesse þine ne awurp þu me on tide ende þonne aspringþ mægen min ne forlæt þu me god dom þinne cyninge syle & rihtwisnesse þine sunu cyninges dem folce þinum on rihtwisnesse & þearfan þine on dome onfon muntas sibbe folces & hylla rihtwisnesse demaþ þearfan folces & hale he gedeþ bearn þearfan & geeadmedeþ þone earmcweþendan & þurhwunaþ mid sunna & ær beforan monan cneorisse & cneorisse niþer astah swa ren on flise & swaswa dropunga dripende ofer eorðan upcymeþ on dagum his rihtwisnesse & genihtsumnes sibbe oþ þæt ahafen biþ se mona & wealdeþ to sæ oð to sæ & fram flode oð gemæru ymbhwirfte eorðan beforan him forþgaþ & sylhearwan & fynd his eorþan licciaþ swiþe god israela god þa ðe rihte synd heortan mine soþlice fulneah astirede synd fet fulneah agotene synd stapas mine forþon ic elnode ofer unrihtwisnesse sibbe sinfulra geseonde forþon na is ofersewen deaþes heora & trymnes on wita heora on geswince manna ne synd & mid mannum ne beoþ sprungene forþon nam hig oferhido oferwrigene synd mid unrihtwisnesse & arleasnessa heora forþirpeþ swaswa of smerwe unrihtwisnesse heora hi ferdon on gewilnunge heortan hi þohton & sprecende wæron niþ unrihtwisnesse on heannesse sprecende wæron setton on heofonum muþ heora & tungan heora ferde on eorþan tohwon god aweg adrife þu on ende irre is ofer sceap eowdes þines gemindig ic beo gesomnunga þinre þa þu settest fram fruman þu gefreodest gird yrfeweardnesse þine munt sion on þam þu eardodest on him hefe handa þine on oferhida heora on ende hu fela wirged is feond on halgum & gewuldrode synd þa þe hatedon þe on middele cafertunes þines setton tacn heora tacn & na oncneowon swaswa on utgange ofer þa heannesse swaswa on wudu treowa mid æxum curfon dura his on þæt hilce twibile & adesan awurpon hig forbærndon mid fyre halig weorc þine on eorðan besmiton geteld naman þines hi cwædon on heortan heora cneoris heora samod reste donde ealle dagas symbellice godes fram eorðan tacne ure we ne gesawon soþlice na is witega & us na oncnawaþ ma we andettaþ þe god we andettaþ & we gecyþaþ naman þinne we reccaþ wundra þine þonne ic onfo tid ic rihtwisnesse deme gemeltid geworden is eorðe & ealle þe eardiaþ on hira ic getrimede sweras his ic cwæþ to þam unwisan nellan ge unrihtlice don & þam agiltendum nellan ge upahebban horn nellan ge uphebban on heannessum horn heowerne nellan ge sprecan ongean god unrihtwisnesse forþon ne fram eastdæle ne fram westdæle ne fram westenum muntum forðon god dema is þisne gehinþ & þisne uphefþ forðon calic on handa drihtnes wines scires ful gemænged & onhildeþ of þisum on þæt þeah hwæþere drosna his na is ameallad drincaþ ealle sinfulle eorþan cuþ on iudeum god on israela folce micel nama his & geworden is on sibbe stow his & eardung his on sion þær gebræc mihta bogan scild & sweord & gefeoht þu onlihtest þu wundorlice fram muntum ecum gedrefede synd ealle ða unwisan heortan slepon slæp heora & naht gemetton ealle weras welena on handum heora fram þreagunge þinre god iacobes hnæppodon þa astigon hors þu egesful eart & hwilc wiþstandeþ þe nu siþþan irre þinum of heofonum gehired þu didest on dome eorðe cwacode & gestilde stæfne mine to drihtne ic clipige stæfne mine to gode & behealdaþ me dæge geswinces mines god ic sohte mid handum minum on niht ongean him & na ic eom beswicen forwyrnde beon afrefrod sawle min gemindig ic wæs & gelustfullod ic eom & ic geworht eom & geteorode gast min toforon setton wæccan eagon mine gedrefed ic eom & na ic eom sprecende ic þohte dagas ealde & gear ece on mode ic hæfde & leornigende ic eom of nihte mid heortan minre & ic swanc & ic sweop gast minne cwyst þu on ecnesse awyrpþ god & na togeteohhie þæt gecwemre sy nugyt oþþe on ende mildheortnesse his aslideþ of cneorisse on cneorisse begimaþ folc min æ mine onhildaþ eare eower on worde muþes mines ic untine on bigspellum muþ minne ic sprece foresetnesse of frimþe hu manega we gehirdon & we gecneowon þa & fæderas ure hy ciddon us na synd bediglode fram bearnum heora on cneorisse oþra cyþenda lof drihtnes & mægen his & wundra his þe he dide & he awehte cyþnesse on iacob & æ he sette on israel hu fela bebead he fæderum urum cyþe he dyde hig sunum heora þæt he oncnawa cneoris oþer sunu þe beoþ acænned & hi arisaþ & cyþað sunu heora þæt hi setton on gode hiht heora & na ofergiten weorc godes & bebodu his hi secan ne syn hi swaswa fæderas heora cneoris þweor & teonful cneoris þe ne gerehte heortan his & na is gelifed mid gode gast his sunu efrem begimende & scænddende bogan hi gecirrede synd on dæge gefeoht god comon þeoda on yrfeweardnesse þinre hi besmiton templ halig þin hi setton ierusalem on æpla hordera hi setton deadlican þeowan þinra mettas fugelum heofonas flæsc haligra þinra wildeorum eorþan hi aguton blod heora swaswa wæter on hymbhwyrfte ierusalem & na wæs þe bebirigde gewordene we sindon edwit neahheburum urum & on bismere þam þe on ymbhwyrfte urum synd hu lange drihten þu irsast on ende bið onæled swaswa fyr irre þin ageot irre þin on þeoda þa þe na ne cuþon & on ricu þa naman þinne na gecigdon forðon hig æton iacob & stow his hi forleton ne gemin þu unrihtu ure eall raþe foresette us mildheortnesse þine forþon þearfan gewordene we synd swiþe gefilst us god hælend ure for wuldor naman þinne drihten alis us & milde beo þu sinnum urum for nama þinum þu þe reccest israel beheald þu ðe læddest swaswa sceap ioseph þu þe syttest ofer cherubin geswutelian beforan effrem beniamin & manase awece anweald þinne & cum þæt hale do þu us god gecir us & oþeow ansine þine & hale we beoþ drihten god mægna hu lange irsast þu ofer gebed þeowes þines þu mærsest us of hlafe teara & drinc þu silest us on tearum on gemete þu settest us on wiþercwedolnesse neahgeburum urum & fynd ure ahnyscton us god mægna gecir us & oðyw ansyne þine & hale we beoþ wingeard of egiptalande þu feredest þu awurpe þeoda & þu plantodest hine blissiaþ gode gefilsta ure singað gode iacobes nimaþ sealm & sillaþ glibeam salter wynsume mid hearpan blawaþ on him of biman on mærum dæge symbelnesse eowre forðon bebod on israel is & dom godes iacobes cyþnesse on ioseph he sette hine mid he eode of eorþan egiptum tungan þa þa he ne wiste he gehirde & he cirde fram birdenum ricg his hand his wiligan þeowodon on geswince þu cigdest me & ic alisde þe & ic gehirde þe on bediglinge reohnesse ic afandode þe æfter wæterum wiþercwedolnesse gehir folc min & ic geseþe þe israel gif þu gehirst me god stod on gesomnunga goda on middele soþlice god he fordemþ hu lange demaþ ge unrihtwisnesse & ansyne singigendra genimaþ demaþ wædlan & steopcilde eadmodum & þearfan gerihtwisiaþ neriaþ þearfan & wædlan of handa synfulra alisaþ hi niston & na hig oneaton on þistrum hi langaþ beoþ astired ealle grundwealles eorþan ic cwæþ godes we sindon & bear þæs mæra ealle ge soþlice swaswa men ge swilteþ & swaswa an of ealdrum ge reosaþ aris god dem eorþan forðon þu yrfeweardast on eallum þeodum god hwilc gelic biþ þe ne swiga þu & na þu ne forhafa god forðon efne fynd þine swegdon & þa ðe hatodon þe hi ahofon heafod ofer folc þin hi wirigdon geþeaht & hi þohton ongean halige þine hi cwædon cumaþ & uton forspillan hig of þeodum & ne biþ genumen nama israel ofer þæt forðon hi þohton anrædlice samod ongean þe cyþnessa þine todihtnodon geteld þara eorðlicra & synnahyrendra moab & agarreni gebal & amon & amalech þa ælfremedon mid eardigendum on tirum & soþlice assur com mid him gewordene synd on fultume bearnum loþes hu luflice eardunga þine drihten mægna gewilnode & geteorode sawle min on cafertune drihtnes heorte min & flæsc min upahefe vel blissodon on god lifigende & soþlice spearwa gemette him hus & turtle nest him þar he sette briddas his altras þine drihten mægna cyninc min & god min eadige þam þe eardiaþ on huse þinum on worlda world we heriaþ þe eadig wer þæs þe is fultum fram þe upastige on heortan his tosette on dene teara on stowe þa þu tosettest & soþlice bletsunga he silð æ sillende faraþ of mægne on mægen biþ gesewen god goda on sion drihten god mægna gehir gebed min mid earum onfoh god iacobes þu bletsodest drihten eorþe þine þu acirdest gehæftnesse iacobes þu forgeafe unrihtwisnesse folces þines þu oferwruge ealle synna heora þu þe liþgodest ealle irre þine þu acirdest fram irre æbilignesse þine gecir us god hælo ure & framacir irre þin fram us þætte nalæs on ecnesse þu irsige us oðð þu aþenedest irre þin fram cneorisse on cneorisse god þu gecirrende geliffæst us & folc þin blissiaþ on þe oðyw us drihten mildheortnesse þine & hælo þine syle us ic gehire hwæt sprecþ on me drihten god forðon he sprecþ sibbe on folce his & ofer halige his & on hig þe beoþ gecirrede to heortan onhild drihten eare þin & gehir me forðon wanhafa & þearfa eom ic geheald sawle mine forðon halig ic eom halne gedo þeow þinne god min hihtende on þe mildsa min drihten forðon to þe ic clipode ealne dæg geblissa sawle þeowes þines forðon to þe drihten sawle mine ic ahof forðon þu drihten winsum & bilewite & manega mildheortnesse eallum gecigendum þe mid earum onfoh drihten gebed min & beheald stæfne bene minre on dæg geswinces mines ic clipode to þe forðon þu gehyrdest me na is gelica þin on godum drihten & na is æfter weorcum þinum ealle þeoda swa hwilce swa þu worhtest cumaþ & gebiddaþ beforan þe drihten & wuldriaþ naman þinne grundweallas his on muntum haligum lufaþ drihten gatu sion ofer ealle eardunga iacobes wundorfulle gecwedon synd be þe ceaster godes gemindig ic beo meretrix ic wæs & babilonis þam witendum me efne ælfremode & tyrus & folc & sylhearwena þa beoþ þar cwist þu sion cwiþ man & man acænned is on hire & he gestaþolode hig se hihsta drihten cydde on writum folca & ealdormanna heora þa wæron on hine swaswa blissigendra ealra eardung is on þe drihten god hælo min on dæge ic clipode & on nihte beforan þe ic ga on gesihþe þinre gebed min onhild eare þin to bene minre forþon gefilled is yfele sawle min & lif min on helle tonealæhte gewæned ic eom mid adunestigendum on seaþ geworden ic eom swaswa man buton fultume betweox deadum freoh swaswa gewundode slæpende on birignum þara na is gemind ma & hi of handa þinra anydde synd hig asetton me on scaðe þam niðeran on þystrum & on scadu deaþes ofer me getrimed is hatheortnes þin & ealle yþa þine ingelæddest ofer me feor þu didest cuþe mine fram me hi setton me fram ascununge him seald ic eom & na ic uteode mildheortnesse drihtnes on ecnesse singeþ on cneorisse & forcynrene ic bodige soþfæstnesse þine on muþe minum forðon þu cwæde on ecnesse mildheortnesse biþ getimbrod on heofonum biþ gegearwod soþfæstnes þin on him ic tosette cyþnesse gecorenum minum ic swor dauide þeowe minum oþ on ecnesse gegearwode sæd þin & ic timbrode on cynrene & forcynrene setl þin we andettaþ heofonas wundra þine drihten & soþlice soþfæstnes þin on gesomnunge haligra forðon hwilc on genipum biþ geefenlæced drihtne gelic biþ drihtne on bearnu godes god þe biþ gewuldraþ on geþeahte haligra micel & angrislic ofer ealle þe on ymbhwirfte his synd drihten god mægna hwilc gelic þe rice þu eart drihten & soþfæstnes þin on ymbhwirfte þinum drihten frofor geworden is us fram cneorisse & on cneorisse ærþam þe wæron muntas geworden & trymed eorþe & ymbhwirft fram worlde & oð on worlda þu eart god ne acir ðu man on geniþerunga & þu cwæde gecirraþ bearn manna forðon þusænd geara beforan eagon þinum swaswa dæg estra se forþgæþ & heordnes on nihte seo for naht synd hæfde heora gear beoþ on mergen swa wyrt gewiteþ on mergen blowaþ & faraþ on æfen afilð astiþað & adruwaþ forðon on we geteorodon on irre þine & on hatheortnesse þinre gedrefed we sind þu asettest unrihtwisnesse ure on gesihþe þinre worulde ure on alihtnesse andwlitan þines forðon ealle dagas ure geteorodon & on irre þinum geteorodon gear ure swaswa ren gesmeadan se eardiaþ on fultume þæs hihstan on gescildnesse godes heofonas hu wunaþ he cwæþ drihtne andfenc min eart þu & frofor min god min ic hihte on hine forþon he alisde me of grine huntigendra & fram worde wiðerweardum on eaxlum his he scadewode þe & under fiðerum his þu hihstest of scilde ymbsyleþ þe soþfæstnesse his nu ðu ondrædest fram ege nihtlicum fram flane fleogendre on dæge fram gestreone þurhgangendum on þystrum fram ansyne & deofle suðernum hi feallaþ fram sidan þinre þusend & tin þusend fram swiðrum þinum to þe soþlice na genealæcaþ þeah hwæþere eagon þinum þu besceawast & edlean sinna þu gesihst forðon þu eart drihten hiht min se hihsta þu settest frofor þin god is andettan drihtne & singan naman þinum þæs hihstan to bodigenne on mergen mildheortnesse þine & soþfæstnesse þine þurh niht on tinstrængedum saltere mid cantice on hearpan forþon þu geliþegodest me drihten on geweorce þinum & on weorcum handa þinra ic blissige hu gemicclode synd weorc þine drihten swiþe deope gewordene synd geþohtas þine wer unwis na ongit & disig na ongitaþ þinc þonne upaspringaþ sinfulle swaswa hig & oþeowdon ealle þa þe wircaþ unrihtwisnesse þæt hi forwurðan on worlda world þu soþlice se hihsta on ecnesse drihten drihten rixode mid wlite gescrid is gescrid is drihten strangnesse & he begirde hine & soþlice he getrimede ymbhwyrft eorðan þe na biþ onstired geara setl þin god siþðan fram worlde þu eart upahofon flodas drihten upahofon flodas stæfne his upahofon flodas yþa his fram stæfne wæterum manegum wundorlic ahafennessa sæs wundorlic on heanessum drihten cyþnessa þine geleaflica gewordene synd swiðe husum þinum geriseþ halig drihten on halignesse daga god wraca drihten god wraca freolice dyde ahefe þe þu ðe demest eorðan agild edlean ofermodum hu lange sinfulla drihten hu lange sinfulla wuldriaþ hi geseþaþ & sprecaþ unrihtwisnesse sprecaþ ealle þa þe wyrcaþ unrihtwisnesse folc þin drihten hi niþerodon & yrfeweardnesnesse þine hi drehton wuduwan & wreccan hig ofslogon & steopcild hi acwealdon & hi cwædon na geseah drihten na ongit god iacobes ongitaþ unwise on folce & disige æt sumum cirre ongitaþ þe plantode eare he ne gehirþ oþþe se betynþ eagon na he besceawaþ cumaþ uton bletsian drihtne uton dreman gode hælende urum we ofþriccan ansyne his on andetnesse & on sealmum we driman him forðon god micel drihten & cyninc micel ofer ealle godas forðon na anideþ & drihten folc his forþon on handa his sind ealle endas eorðan & heahnessa munta his synd forðon him is sæ & he worhte hig & handa his cumaþ uton gebiddan & uton aþenian beforan gode þe wepan beforan drihtne þe worhte us forþon he is drihten god ure & us folc fostornoþes his & sceap handa his todæg gif stæfne his ge gehiraþ nelle ge wiþherdian heortan eowre swaswa on æbilignesse æfter dæge costnunge on westene þar costodon me fæderas eowre hi fandodon & gesawon weorc min singaþ drihtne cantic niwne singaþ drihtne ealle eorðe singaþ drihtne & bletsiaþ naman his bodiaþ of dæge on dæg hælo his bodiaþ betweox þeoda wuldor his on eallum folcum wuldra his forðon micel drihten & hergendlic swiðe egeslic is ofer ealle godas forðon ealle godas þeoda demonia drihten soþlice heofonas geworhte andetnes & fægernes on gesihþe his halignes & micelnes on halignesse his bringaþ drihtne fæder þeoda bringaþ drihtne wuldor & arwurþunga bringaþ drihtne wuldor naman his undoþ dura & ingaþ on cafertunas his gehiddaþ drihten on cafertune haligum his si astired of ansine his ealle eorþe drihten rixode fægman eorðan blissiaþ iland manega genipu & þicnes on ymbhwirfte his rihtwisnes & dom gerecednes setles his fir beforan him forþstæpð & onæleþ on ymbhwirfte feonda his tolihton ligræscas his ymbhwirft eorðan geseah & gedrefed is eorðan muntas swaswa weax fleowon of ansine drihtnes of ansine drihtnes ealle eorþan bododon heofonas rihtwisnesse his & gesawon ealle folc wuldor his gescænde beoþ ealle þe gebiddaþ deofolgild & þa þe wuldriaþ on deofolgildum heora gebiddaþ hine ealle englas his gehirde & geblissod is sion & fægnodon doctra iude for fomum þinum drihten forðon þu drihten se hihsta ofer ealle eorðan swiðe upahafen eart ofer ealle godas singaþ drihtne cantic niwne forþon wuldra he dide gehælde him seo swiðre his & earm halig his cuðe he dide drihten hælo his beforan gesihðe þeoda he unwreah rihtwisnesse his gemindig he wæs mildheortnesse his & soþfæstnesse his huses israelaeles gesawon ealle gemæru eorðan hælo godes ures drimaþ drihtne ealle eorþe singaþ & blissiaþ & singaþ sealmiaþ drihtne on hearpan on hearpan & stæfne sealmas on bimum gelædenlicum & of stæfne byme hyrnene drimaþ on gesihþe cininges drihtnes sy astired sæ & gefillednes his ymbhwirft eorðena & þa eardiaþ on hine flodas þametaþ handa samod muntes blissodon on gesihþe drihtnes forðon he com deman eorðan he demþ ymbhwirft eorðan on rihwisnesse & folc on efennesse drihten rixaþ irsiaþ folc þu þe settest ofer cherubin biþ astired eorðe drihten on sion micel & mære ofer ealle folc andettat naman þinum micclum forðon egeslic & halig he is & wirþmynt cininges dom lufaþ þu geearwodest gerecednesse dom & rihtwisnes on iacob þu didest upahebbaþ drihten god urne & gebiddaþ þe scamel fota his forðon halig he is moyses & aaron on sacerdos his & samuel betweox him þa ðe cigaþ naman his hi gecigdon drihten & he gehirde hig on swere genipes he spræc to him hi beheoldon cyþnessa his & bebod þæt he sealde him drihten god ure þu gehirdest hig god þu gemildsodest þu wære him & wregende on eallum wiþmetednessa heora upahebbaþ drihten god urne & gebiddaþ on munte haligum his forðon halig drihten god ure drimaþ drihtne ealle eorðan þeowiað drihtne on blisse infarað on gesihðe his on bliþnesse wite ge forðon drihten he is god he geworhte us & na silfe we folc is & sceap fostornoþes his infaraþ on gatum his on andetnesse of cafertunas his on ymenum andettaþ him heriaþ naman his forðon winsum is drihten on ecnesse mildheortnes his & oð on cneorisse & cneorisse soþfæstnesse his 1onfoh me æfter spræce þinre & ic lifige && na þu gescænd me fram anbidunge minre & on wege synfulr na stod & on heahsetle cwyldes uel wawan na sætac on æ drihten willa his & on æ his smeað uel foreþænð dæges & nihtes& biþ swa swa treow þæt plantud is wið ryne wætera þæt wæstm his selð on tide his & leaf his na & ealle swa hwilc swa he deþ beoþ gesundfulludena swa arlease na swa ac swa swa dust þæt wyrpþ wind of ansyne eorðanforþan na arisaþ arlease on dome & ne synfullehwi grimetedon þeoda & folc smeadon unnite uel ideleætstodon cyningas eorþan & ealdormen becomon tosomne ongean drihten & ongean crist hiswe tosliton bændas heora & utun awyrpan fram us geoc heorase þe eardað on heofonum hiscð hi & drihten hyspeþ hiþonne he spycþ to him on his yrre & on hatheortnesse gedrefð hiic soþlice geseted eom cyncg fram him ofer sion munt haligne his bodiende bebod hismin eart þu ic todæg cænde þegyrn fram me & ic sille þe þeoda yrfeweardnisse þine & æhta þine gemæro eorðanþu geræcest hi on girde isernre swa swa fæt tigelwyrhtan þu tobrecest hi& nu cynincgas ongytað beoð gelærede ge demað eorþanþeowiað drihten on ege & geblissiað hi on fyrhtogegripað lare þylæs hwonne yrsige drihten & ge forweorðen of þam rihtan wegeþonne byrneþ annunga yrre his eadig ealle þa þe on hine getriwaðid est pater tohwi gemænigfylde sind þa ðe swæncað me mænige onarisað ongean mecweþað uel secað sawle minre hælo on gode his uel hyreonfoend wuldor min & uphebbende heafodstæfne minre ic cleopode & he gehyrde me of his þam halgan munteic slep onfeng mepater miforþon þu ofsloge ealle wiþergende me intingan teþ synfulfra þu forbryttestdrihten is is hælo & ofer folc þin bletsuncg þinonseccað onsægðnesse rihtwisnesse & gehihte ge monige cweþað hwylc þeowð us godgetacnod is ofer leoht andwlitan þines þu sealdest blisse on heortan minrehwætes wines & eles his hi sind gemænigfyldon sibbe on þæt sylfe ic slape & restesynderlice on hihte þu gesetest meword mine earum onfoh ongyt clypunge minebegym stæfne gebedes mines cyning min & god minforþon to þe ic gebidde on mergen & þe gehyrst stæfne minreon mergen ic ætstande þe & ic geseo þætte na willende unrihtwise& na eardað wið þe awyrged & na þurhwuniað unrihtwise ongean eagan þineatedest uel þu feodest ealle þe wyrcað unrihtwisnesse þu forspillest þe sprecað leasunge wer bloda & facenfulne onscunaðic soþlice on mengeo mildheortnesse þinre ic inga on hus þin ic gebidde to temple halgum þinum on ege þinumdrihten gelæd ne on rihtwisnesse þinre fore feondum minum gerece on gesihþe þinre weg minneforþon nis on muþe heora soþfæstnys heorte heora idel isbyrigen onpengende is hrace heora tungum heora facenfulle dydon dem hi god hi areosen fram geþohtum heora æfter mænego arleasnesse heora adræf hi& geblissigen hihtað on ecnesse hi ahebbað & þu oneardast on him & hi wuldrian on þe ealle lufiað naman þinneswa of scylde godes willan þines þu gehelmedest uson yrre þinum þu þrea uel cide meuntrum ic eom hæle me gedrefede syndon ban mine& saul min gedrefed is swiþe & þu drihten hu langebeo gecyrred drihten & nere sawle mine halne me gedo fore mildheortnesse þinreon deaðe gemyndig si þin on helle soðlice hwylc geandetteð þeis swang on geomrunga minre ic swylige þurh syndriga nihta bedd min of tearum stræle mine ic lecce uel wætegedrefed is eahge min ic ealdode betweox ealle fynd minegewitað fram me ealle þe wyrcaþ unrihtwisnessa forðan gehyrde drihten stæfne wopes minesgehyrde drihten bene minre gebeddablysigen uel scamien & syn drefed ealle fynd mine syn gecyrred & aswarnigen swiþe hrædlice uel onungaon þe ic gehihte ehtendumðilæs hwonne gegripe uel reafige swa swa leo saule mine þonne nis alyse & na þe halne dogyf ic dyde þis gif is unrihtwisnes on handum minumgyf ic ageald gildendum me yfelu ic areose be gewyrhtum fram feondum minum idelehte feond saule mine & gripe & fortredeð on eorðan lif min & wuldor min on dust gelæde hearis on eorre þinum upahefe on endum feonda on bebode þe þu bebude& gesomnunge folca ymbsylleð þe & fore þas on heahnesse gehwyrfþdrihten dem folcc dem me æfter rihtwisnesse unscyldignessesi geændad nið synfulra & gerece riht scrudniende heortan & æddran rihtfultum se hale deþ rihtwise on heortedema rihtwis strang & cwyst þu eorseð þurh sindrige dagasnimþe sweord his ascæcð bogan his he aþenede & gyrede hinefatu deaðes flana his byrnendum gefremedeongesyhþe he geeacnað unrihtwisnesse he onfeng sar & he cende unrihtwisnesseseaþ openude & adealf hine & hreas on seað þone he worhtebyþ gecyrred sar his on heafde his & on hnol unrihtwisnes astahic andette drihtene rihtwisnesse his & ic singe naman þæs hihstanure hu wundurlic is nama þin on ealre eorðan upahauen is gemiclung uel mærð þin heofenasof muþe cildra & succendra þu fulfremedest lof fore feondum þinum þæt þu toweorpe feondforþon ic geseo heofonas weorc fingra þinra monam & steorran hwylce þu gestaþolodesthwæt is man þæt gemindig eart his oððe sunu mannes þæt þu neosast hineþu wanodest hine lytle læs fram englum of wuldre & arweorðunga þu gehelmudest hine& gesetst hine ofer weorc handa þinraeal þing þu underþeoddest under fotum his sceap & oxan ealle & ufon on & þæt neat feldesfugelas heofonas & fixas sæs ða þurhgaþ stiga sæsdrihten drihten ure hu wundorlic is nama þin on ealrae eorþanic andette þe drihten on ealre heortan minre ic secge uel rece ealle wuldor þineic blissige & ic wunsumige on þe & singe naman þinne þam hihstanin togecyrrenne feondum minum on bæc beoð geuntrumod & forweorðað on ðynre ansyneforðon þu gedydest dom minne & intingan mine þu siest ofer þrymstel þu þe demest rihtwisnesseþu þreadest þeoda & forweorðað þa arleasan nama heora þu adilegadest on ecnesse & on worlda worldfynd geteorodon cocor on ænde & ceaster þu towurpe forweorðeð gemynd heora mid swege& drihten on ecnesse þurhwunað gegearwod on dome stel his& sylf demð ymbhwyrft eorðan on emnesse he demð folcum mid uel on rihtwysnesse& geworden is drihten gebeorh þearfan gefultumend on gehiðlicnesse uel þæslicnesse on geswince& hihten on þe cuþon þu na forlæst secende þe drihtensingaþ drihtne þe eardaþ on besceawodnisse bodiað betweox þeodasecende blod heora he na ofergeat þearfenamildsa me geseoh eaðmodnesse mine feondum minumic blissige on hælo þinre gefestnode synd þeoda on forwyrde þe hi worhton on grine þyssum þe hi digledon gegripen is fot heorabyð oncnawen domas fremmende on weorcum handa his gegripen is se synfullasin gecyrred þa synfullan on helle ealle þeoda þe ofergytaðon ende ofergitulnis þearfena geþyld þearfana na forweorðeð on endearis drihten man syn demed þeoda on gesihðe þinregesete æs lædend ofer hy witen þeoda þæt men syndon gerecum on geswinceþonne ofermodgaþ þe arleasa bið anæled þearfa beoð gegripene on geþohtum hi þohtanbið hered se synfulla on gewilnungum saule his he bið gebletsodse synfulla æfter mænigfealdnisse his yrre ne secðnis on gesihþe wegas on ælcere tide beoð afyrred domas þine on ansyne ealra feonda his bewylthe cwæð soþlice in heortan ic ne beo astyred of cneorisse on cneorisse butan yfeleþæs of wirignesse muð full is & biternesse & of facne under his geswinc & sarhe siteð on searwum mid welum on digelnissum þæt he ofslea unscyldigneegan his on þearfan beseoð he syrwð he syrwð þæt gripe þearfan gegripan þearfan þonne he hine fram tyþ hineon his grine his geniþrað hine he onhildeþ & gehreowseþ þonnehe cwæð soðlice on heortan his oferget he acyrde ansyne þilæs he geseo oð endesy upahefen hand ne ofergyt ðu þearfanafore hwæt bysmrade se arleasa cwyð soþlice on heortan his secð uel myngaðþu gesihst þæt þu geswinc & sar besceawast þæt þu sylle hy on handum þinum þe læfed is þearfa þu byst gefylstaþu forbrytest earm synfulles & awyrgydes bið soht & na he meted biþrixað on ecnesse forweorðað ge þeoda of eorðangyrninge þearfana gehyrde heortan heora gehyrde eare þinanticrist ofer eorþanon drihtne ic getrywe humeta secgað ge saule minre aleor on munt swa swa spearwaforðon ongesyhðe sinfulle aþenedon bogan hy gyredon flana heora on cocore þæt hi scotigen on þystrum rihtwise on heortanþa þu dydest hy tobræcon se rihtwisa hwæt he dydeon temple halgum his setl his egan on þearfan beseoð bræwas acsiað bearn mannaacsað rihtwisne & arleasne þe soþlice lufaþ unrihtwisnesse he hatat saule hishe rinð ofer synfulle grin fyres sweflþrosm & gast ysta dæl cælcis heorarihtwis & rihtwisnesse he lufude efennesse gesyhð andwlita hishalne teorode halig forðon gewanede synd soðfæstnessa fram bearnum mannaidelu hi spræcon anra gehwilc to nyhstan welere facenfullum on heortan & of heortan hy spræconforspille ealle weleras fæcne tungan þa felaspeculanþa cwædon tungan ure we gemicliað weleras ure of us synd hwylc ure drihtenfore yrmþe unspedigra & geomrumge þearfana nu ic arise cwæð drihten ic asette on hælo uel on halwendnesse getreowfullice ic dem on þæmspræca spræca syfra seolfor of fyre amered eorþan aclænsod seofanfealdliceþu gehealdst us & beweardast us fram cneorisse þysre on ecnisseon trundelnesse arleasæ gangað æfter heahnesse þinre þu gemænigfyldest bearn mannahu lange drihten ofergyst þu me on ænde oð hwæt acyrrest þu ansyne þine fram mehu lange sette ic geþeaht on saule minre sar on heortan min þurh dægbið upahafen feondbeseoh & gehyr me onliht eagan mine þylæs æfre ic slape on deaðeic magude ongean hine þa þe swencað me gif ic gedrefedic soðlice mildheortnesse þine hyhte blissað heorte min hælo þinre ic singe drihtene þe god sealde me ic singe naman drihtnes þæs hystancwæð unwis on heortan his na is god gewænde syndon & onscunigendlic gewordene syndon on heora lustum ne is se þe do god ne is oð endedrihten on heofonum forð locode ofer bearn manna þæt he gesyhð hwæt sy ongitende oððe secende godealle ahyldon samod on unnytte gewordene syndon ne is se þe do god ne is oð ende byrgen opnigen is raca heora tungan heora facenfullice doð attor næddrena tungan under heora þara muð wirigcwedolnesse & biternesse full is hraðe fet heora to ageotenne blod forðræstnes & ungesælignes on wegum heora & weg sybbe hig ne ongeaton ne is ege godes beforan eagan heoraac hig ne oncneowon ealle þa þe weorcað unriht ge þe fræton folc min swa swa mete hlafesdrihten ne gecigdon þær forhtodon mid ege þar se ne wæs egeforðon in cneorisne rihtwis is þæt geþeaht wædlena þu togute forþon drihten his hiht ishwylc syleð ansyne hælo israelo þonne awegcirreþ drihten hæftnyd folc his blissiað iacob & wunsumiað israhelhwelc eardað on eardungstowe oððe hwelc geresteð on þinum þam halgan munteþe ingæð butan wæmme & wyrcð rihtwisnessesprycþ soþfæstnesse on heortan his ne dyde facn on tungan ne ne dyde nyhstan yfel & osp ne anfeng angean nyhstan hisin gloria swereð nyhstan his & ne beswycðfeoh his ne sealde to gytsunge uel gestreone & metsceattes ofer unscyldigan ne anfeng deþ þas ne bið gedrefed uel astyred on ecnyssegeheald forðon ic hihte on þeic sæde drihtne god min forðon goda minra þu na beþearfthalgum þe synd on eorþan his he gewundrudude ealle willan minegemenigfylde synd untrumnessa heora siþþan hy efston ic gesomnige gemettinga heora of blodum ne ic gemyndig beo naman heora þurh weleras minesdæl yrfewerdnisse minre calicis mines þu eart þe gesettes yrfeweardnisserapas gefeollon me on beorhtum yrfeweardnis beorhtu is meic bletsige drihten sealde me andgyt oferþæt & oðð niht onhreadan æddran mineic foresceawade drihten on gesihðe minre symble forðon to ða swiðran is ne ic astyred beo uel gedrefedcuðe me ðu dydest wegas lifes þa gefyllest me of blisse mid andwlitan þinum gelustfulnessa on þinre swiran oðð endegehyr drihten rihtwisnesse minre begym bene minremid earum onfoh gebed min na on welerum facenfullum of andwlitan þinum dom min yppe egan þine geseon efennisseþu afandudest heortan mine & þu neosodest on niht fyrene þu ameredest & na is gemet on me unrihtwisnesþæt ne sprece muð min weorc manna fore wordum welera þinra ic geheold wegas heardefulfreme stepas minum on stigum þinum þæt ne sin astyred fotswaþa minaic cleopode þu gehyrdest onhyld eare þine me & gehyr word minegewundurlæc mildheortnessa þina þe hale dest hyhtende on þefram wiðerstandendum þinre swiðran geheald me swa seon eages under sceadwe fiðera þinra gescyld meic soðlice rihtwisnesse oðiwe on gesihðe þinre ic beo gefylled wuldor þinic lufuge þe drihten mindrihten trumnes min & tohiht min & alysend min god min gefylsten min & ic hyhte on hine gescyldend min & horn hæle minreheregende ic gecige drihten & fram feondum minum hal ic beoymbsealdon me deaðes & burnan unrihtwisnesse gedrefdonsar helle ymbsealdon me grinu deaðeon geswince minum ic gecigde drihten & to gode minum ic clypode & gehyrde of temple his þam haligan stæfne mine & clypung min on gesyhþe his ineode on earan hineastyred is & forhtude eorðan & grundwealles muntas gedrefede synt & astyrede synd forðon eorre is himgemicel cyninges his & donde mildheornesse cynincg his dauide & sæde his oð woruldeheafanas bodiað uel cyðað wuldor godes & weorc handa his bodiað staþolnessedæg dæge elcet word & niht nihte bicneð ingehygdne synd spræca ne word þara ne syn gehyred stæfna heoraon ealle eorðan ut eode son uel hlisa heora & on endas ymbhwyrftes eorðan word heoraon sunnan he gesette eardunge his & he swa swa brydguma forðgewitende of giftbure his he blyssade swa swa gigant to yrnenne weg hisfram heon heofone utgang his & edryne uel gecnirr his oððe to heahnesse his nis se þe hine behyde fram hætan hisæe drihtnes gecyrrende sawle cyðnes getreow wisdom gearwiende lytlingum& beoð þætte geliciað spræca muðes mines & gemynd heortan minre on gesihðe þinre symble gefylstent min & alysend mingehyrde on dæge geswinces gescylde þe naman godes iacobeshe asende fultum of halgum & of heanesse he behealde þehe gemyndig sige ealra offrunga þinre & offrung þin fet sieselle þe æfter heortan þinre & eall geþeat þin he getrymmewe blissiað on hælo þinre & on naman godes ure we beoð gemiclodegefyll drihten ealle wyrnynga þinre nu ic ancneow forðon halne drihten cyning his gehyrð hine of heofone þa halgan his on andwealdum hæle þære swiþran hisþa uel hy on wægnum uel crætum & hi horsum we on naman uresdrihten halne do cyning & gehyr þu us on dæge þam þe we gecygen þedrihten on mægene þinum blyssað & ofer hælo þinre he blyssode þealregyrninge heortan his þu sealdest him & fram willan welera his þu ne becyredest hineforðon þu fore hine on bletsunge swetnisse þu gesettest on heafode his hroðgyrelan of stane deorwyrðumlif he bæd fram þe & þu sealdast him langnissa daga on woruld & on worulda woruldmicel wuldur on hælo þinre wuldur & micelne wlite þu asetst ofer hineforðon þu selst hine on gebletsunge on woruld woruld þu blisast hine on gefean mid andwlitan þinumgehihte & on mildheortnesse ðæs hyhstan he ne byð astyredupahefe drihten on mægene þinum we singað & drymað mægenu þinebeseoh hwi þu forlete feor fram hælo minre word scylda minraic clypige þurh dæg & na þu gehyrest & on niht & na to unwisdomeon halgum eardast lof þæs haligan folceson ðe hyhte fæderas ure hy hyhton & þu alysdest hyto ðe ic clypedon & hale hy gewordene syndon on ðe hy gehyhton & na synd gescyndeic soðlice wyrm & na man hosp manna & aworpennis folcesealle hy spræcon welerum & hrysedon heafodbið bodad cneoris toweardu heofonas rihtwisnesse his folce þe acenne bið þæt dyde drihtengereht naht wana biðon stowe fostornoðes þær he gestaþolode ofer wæter gereordunge he feddesaule mine he gecyrde he lædde ofer siþfæt uel stige rihtwisnesse fore naman hiswitodlice & gif ic gange fare on middele sceaduwe deaðes na ic ondræde yfelu forþon mid me gyrd þin & stæf þin hy me frefredonþu gearwodest on gesihðe minre beod ongean þa þe swencton þu mæsthest on ele heafod min & druncengende hu beorht uel mære is& mildheortnes þine fylgeð me eallum dagum liues mines & þæt ic eardige on langnisse dagadrihtnes is eorðe & gefyllednis hire ymbhwyrft eorðana & ealle þa þe eardigað on hirehe ofer seas gegrundweallude hine & ofer flodas he gegearwode hinehwylc astah uel astihð on munt oððe hwylc standeð on stowe þære halgan hisunderigende handum & clænre heortan se þe na onfeng on idel sawle his ne ne swor on facne his nixstanþes onfehð bletsunga & mildheortnysse hælo hisþis is cneowres secendra secendra onsiene getreowfulratadoð gatu ealdormen eowre & upahebbaþ gatu ecelice & ingangeð cyning wuldreshwylc is þes cyning wuldres strang & rice rice on gefeohtecyning mægene he is cyning wuldresto ðe ic ahof saule mineic getreow ic na sceamige& na bysmrigen fynd & soðlice ealle na hy beoð gescyndesin gescynde uel forscamod þa unrihtwisan donde ofer wegas þine & siþ þine lær megerece me on soðfæstnesse þine lær me forþon þu eart min & þe ic geþyldgode ælce dægegemyne mildsunga þinra & gemildheortnesse þinre þe of worulde syndscyldas iuguðhades & nytennissa ne gemun ðu æfter mildheortnisse þinre min for godnisse þinreswete & rihtwis fore þam æe þam agyltendum on wegefide of ealle geswincum hisdem forðon ic on unscyldignisse minre ic ingange hyhtende na ic untrumigeof handa & costa bearn ædran mine & heortan minemildheortnis þin beforan egan & gelicode on soðfæstnysse þinreic ne sæt mid geþeahte ydelnisse & mid unrihte dondum na ic ineodeic hatude & mid arleasum na ic sitteic swea betweohx unscyldig handa mina altre þineþæt ic gehyre stæfne lofes & ic cyðe ealle wundruic lufade wlite huses þines stowe eardunge wuldres þinesfot min stod on halgum gesomnungum ic bletsigedrihten onlyhtnis min & hælo min þone ic ondræde lifes mines fram hwam ic forhtigeþonne genealæcað ofer me scæðþende þæt hie etan flæsc mine þa þe swencað me fynd hy untrumude synd & hy feollongif standað ongean me weredu na ondrædeð heorte min gyf arise gefeoht on þæt ic hyhtean ic bæd þæt ic gegyrnde þæt ic oneardige on huse drihten ealle dagum lifes mines þæt ic geseo willanbehydde on eardunge uel getelde his on dæge yfelra he scylde on digelnisse eardunge hison stane he upahof me nu he upahefð heafod min ofer fynd mine ic ymbga & ic ofrige on eardungstowe his onsægdnisse mid clypunge ic syngige & sealm ic cweðe drihtengehyr drihten stæfne mine mid þare ic clypode gemildsa min & gehyr meto þe cwæð heorte min ic sohte þe ansyne þine drihten ic setegeanbida drihten wærlice do & sie gestrangod heorte þinum & geanbida drihtenic clypige god min na swiga þu þam stigendum on seaðbene minre þonne ic gebidde to þe þonne ic uphebbe handa mine to temple haligum þinumna samod þu selle mid synfullum & mid wyrcendum unriht ne forspil þu þe sprecað sibbe mid neahstan heora yfelu soðlice on heortum heorasele him weorcu & æfter nearoþancum heora æfter weorc handa heora agyld him agyld edlean heora himna hy angeaton weorc handa his tobrec hy & na þu getimbre hygebletsod drihten he gehyrde stæfne bene minregefylsta gescyldend & on him gehyhte & gefultumod & bleow flæsc min & of willan minum ic andettestrengo folces his & gescyldend cyninge his he ishal do folc þin & bletsa & gerece hy & ahefe oð on ecnessebringað drihtne bearn bearn rammawuldur & arwurðunge naman his gebiddaðstefn ofer wæteru mægenþrymmes swegde ofer wæteru manegumsefn on mægene on gemiclungaforbrecendis langestefnas & forbryhð cedras þæs muntes& gescæneð gewanað hyg swa swa cealf þæs muntes & se leofa sunu anhyrnrastæfn drihten betweoh ceorfendes læg fyrstæfn drihnes toscecendes astah westen & onstired drihten westenmægen folce his bletsaþ on sibbeic ahebbe þu afenge ne þu na tobreddest fynd ofer meic clypode & þu hældestsawle mine þu hældest fram stigendum on seaðsingað halige & geandettað þam gemynde halignesse hiseorre on æbygilgnesse his & lif on willan his on æfen wunað & on dægredon genihstumnesse minre na ic beo gestyred on ecnesseon willan þinum þu gegearwodest wlite minum mægen þu acyrdest onsine þinre fram me & geworden gedrefedþæt ic singe þe wuldur min & na ic beo abryrd drihten god min on ecnesse ic andette þeon þe drihten ic hyhte na ic gescynd beo on ecnesse on unrihtwisnesse þinre alys meahyld to me eare þin efst þæt þu nerige me beo þu gescyldend & on huse rotnisse halne þu domin & frofr min fore naman þinum þu lædest & þu fedest meþu lædest me of grine þysum me þu eart gescyldend minon handa ic bebeode gast mine þu alysdest soþfæstnisseþu hatudest beweardgende idelnessa ofer unnytlice ic soþlice hyhteic fægnige & bliðgge on mildheortnesse þinre forðon þu gesawe eadmodnesse mine of nedum saule minewærlice doð & sie gestrangod heorte eower ealle þe hyhten on drihteneeadige þara þe forgifene sind unrihtwisnessa & þara þe bewrigene sind naeadig wer þam na ne ætwiteþ synne & nis his facnic swigode ealdedon ban mine þonne ic clypode ælce dægedæges & rihtes gehefegod is ofer hand þine gehwyrfed ic eom on angnesse þonne bið tobrocen hryrcgscyld minne cuðne ic dyde & unrihtwisnesse/ mine na ic ne hydde ic cwæð ongean me on unrihtwisnessa mina drihten & þu forgeafe arleasnesse synne minrefor ðysse gebied ælc halig on tide gehyðelicre þeah hwæþere on flode wætra manigra to him na togenealæcaðfrofr þa ymbsealde me blis min fram ymbsellendum meandgit þe ic selle & ic lære þe on wege þys þe þu stepst ic getrimme ofer þe eagan minegeblyssiað on drihten & fægniað rihtwise & wuldriað ealle rihtwise heortanfægniað rihtwise on drihtne rihtwise gerisþ heringandettaþ on heapan tyn strenga singaðsingað him cantic niwne wel singað himriht is word drihten & ealle weorc his on geleafanhe lufað mildheortnesse dom of mildheortnessaeof worde heofones getrymede synd & gast muþes his ealle mægen heoragesomnigende swa swa on bytte wæteru sæs settende on goldhordum grundasondræde ealle eorþe fram him beon astyrede ealle oneardigende ymbhwyrftsy mildheortnis þin ofer us gehyhton on þeic bletsige drihten on ælcre tide symle lof his on muðe minunon drihtne byð hered saul min gehyren þa bylwitan & blissiengemicliað mid me & we upahebben naman hisic sohte & he gehyrde me & of eallum geswincum minum he neredegenealæcað to him & ge beoð onlyhte eowre ne beoð gescendeþes þearfa cleopode gehyrde hine & lof eallum geswincum his hineasendeþ engel on ymbhwyrftte ondrædendra hine & he genereþ hyalyseþ uel nereð drihten saula þeowra hys & na forlæteð he ealle þa þe hyhtað on þedem deriende me oferwin onwinnende megegrip wæpn & scyld & aris on fultum meageot ut flane & beluc ongean hy þe me ehtaþ me sege sawle hælo þin ic eomgesceamien & wandien sawle mine syn gecyrrede underbæcling & gesceamien yueluhy syn swa swa dust beforan ansiene windes & engel hysie weg þystro & slidornis & engel ehtende hygifum hy behyddon on forwyrd grines his hy hyspton sawle minecume him grin þæt hy ne gecnæwað & gegripennis gegripe hyne & on grine fealle on þæt seluetunge min smeað rihtwisnesse þine ælce dæge lof þinbeforan eagan hisfacenfullice he dyde on gesihð his þæt unrihtwisne his hatungeword muðes his unrihtwisnes & facn he nolde ongitan þæt he wel dydeunrihtwisnesse he smeade on incleofe his he ætstod ælcum wege na godum yfelnesse na he hatodeon heofone mildheortnes & soðfæstnes þin oð to genipumrihtwisnes þin swa swa muntas domas þin deopnes felafeald men & nytenuswa swa þu gemænigfyldest bearn manna fyðera þinra hyhtaðþær hruron uel feollon þe wyrcað unrihtwisnesse ut acnyssed hy sind ne hi mihton standannelle þu onhyrian betwox þa awyrgendan ne þu ne anda þa dondan unrihtwisnesseswa swa heg hrædlice hi adrugiað bleda wyrta raðe hreosaðgehyht & do godnisse earda eorðan & þu bist fed on welum hiregelustfulla on drihten & he sylþ þe girninge heortan þinesawreoh drihten weg þinne & hyht on hyne & he deþ& he gelædeð leoht rihtwisnesse þine & dom þinne middægunderþeod beo þu drihtne he bið gesundfullod on wege his on men dondum unrihtwisnesseablin fram yrre & forlæt hatheortnessegefylsteþ hy alyseþ hy genereð hy fram synfullum hy forðon hy hyhton on hinena on hatheortnesse þinre þu ðreage me & na on yrrum þinum þu nerewe meflana þina ongefæstnode synd me & þu getremedest ofer me handa þinenis hælo on flæsce minum of ansyne eorres þines nis sibb banum minum of ansyne synna minraonrihtwisnessa ofer heafod min swa swa byrðen hefig gehefegode synd ofer merotode & hi gemmede synd dolhswaðo mine of ansiene unwisdomes minesoð ende ælce dæge geunrotsod ic ineodebismrungum na is hælo on flæsce minumbeheald on fultum minne hæle minreic cwæð ic gehealde wegas mine þæt ic ne agylte on tunga minre ic asette muð minum geheordunga þonne se synfulla ongean meic adumbude geeadmed ic eom & ic swigode fram godum sar min geedniwod ishatode heorte min on me smeaunge minre byrnð fyric spræc on tungan minre cuðne do me ende minne getel uel gerim daga minra hwilc is þæt ic wite hwæt wana sie meþe settest dagas mine & sped min swa swa beforan þe þeah hwæþere eall idelnis ælc man liuiendeon anlicnesse man he goldhordaþ & nat hwam he somnað þa& nu hwylc is anbidung min hunenu sped min isforlæt me þæt ic gecele ærþam þe & ma ic ne beogeanbidiende ic anbad drihten& he gehyrde & he gelædde of seaðe yrmþe & of fenne drosna & he gesette ofer stan fet mine & he gerehte stæpas mine& he onsende on muþ minne cantic niwne gode urum geseoþ monige & ondrædað gehihtaðeadig wer þæs þe is nama hyht his na beseah on ydelnessa swæceheow leasefela þu dydest þu wundru & geþohtum þinum nis hwelc gelic si þe ic cyþde & ic spræc gemænigfylde synd ofer gerimonsægdnesse & ofletan þu noldest soðlice þu fulfremedest me onsægnissa na þu bædeþonne ic sæde onsæde ic cume on heafde boces awriten is be meic eom & þearfa gefylsta min þu eart ne yld þueadig se þe angyteþ ofer elþeodigne & þearfan on dæge yuelum alyseð hine drihtengehealdeð hine & geliffæstað hine eadigne he gedeð on eorðan & na he silþ hinespede bringe him bed sares his ealle stræle his þu acyrdest on untrumnesse hisic cwæð drihten mildsa min hæl sawle min ic singode þefynd min cwædon uel sædon yuelu hwonne swelteð & forweorðeð nama hisþæt he gesawe idelu he gegaderede unrihtwisnesse him hy eodon utongean me hy bysmredon uel grymetodon ealle fynd mine þohton yuelu megebletsod israhela fram worulde & on worulde sie sieon þa gemete wilnaþ heort to willum wætera swa wilnað saul min to ðe godþyrsthe saul min to gode lifiendum hwonne ic cume & þeowe beforan ansiene godesweron me tearas mine hlafas on dæg & on niht þonne byð cweden me dæghwamlice hwar is god þinþas ic gemunde & ic ageat on me saule mine forðon on stowe geteldes wulderlices oð on hus godes on stefne blisse & andetnisse sweg gewistfulgendforhwi unrot eart saul min & forhwy drefst me hyht on gode ic ande him hælo andwlitan mines& godes to me syluum saul min gedrefed is forþon gemyndig ic beo þin of eorðan fram munte medmiclumdeopnis deopnisse cigð on stæfne wæterædrana þinra ealle hea þina & yþa þin ofer me foronforhwi unrot is sawle mine & forhwi drefst hyhte on gode forðon ic andette him hælo andwlitan mines & god mindem me god & toscead intingan minne of þeode unhaligre fram men unrihtwisum & facenfullum nere meforðon þu eart god freamiht min forhwi þu anyddest & for unrot ic inga þonne swencþ me feondasend leoht þin & soþfæstnesse þin hy me læddon & togelæddon on munt haligne þinne & on eardunge þine& ic inga to weofede godes to gode þe geblissað geogoðe mine ic andette þe on hearpan god god minforhwy unrot þu eart sawl min & forhwy þu drefst me hihte on gode forðon ic andette him hælo andwlitan min & god mingod earum urum we gehyrdon fæderas ure bodedon us weorc þæt þu worhtest on dagum heora on dagum ealdumhanda þin þeoda forspildet & þu plantodest hy þu swenctest folc & þu ut anyddest hyna soþlice on sweorde his hy agon eorðan & earm heora na hæleð hy ac swiðre þin & earm þin & onlyhting andhwlitan þin forðon gelicodest on himþu eart self cyning min & god min þu þe bebeodest hæloon þe fynd ure we awindfiað we forhycgað onarisende on usna soðlice on bogan minum ic gehyhte & sweord min na hælð mesoþlice us fram swencendum us & þu gescyndestaris gefylst us & alys us fore naman þinbelcette heorte min word god secge ic weorc min cyninge tunge min writeingfeðer hrædlice writendeswlitig hyw fore bearnum manna togoten is gifu on welerum þinum forþon bletsode þe god on ecnesseymbgyrdan sweorde þinum þeoh þinre riclicost uel fromlicostwlite þinum & fægernisse þinre beloca uel beheald gesundfullice forð & rixa fore soðfæstnisse geþwærnisse & rihtwisnesse gelædeð þe wundur seo swiþre þinflana þine scearpe folc under feallað on heortan feonda cyningessetl þin on woruld woruld gyrd rice þinþu lufudest rihtwisnesse & þu hatudest unrihtwisnesse forþon smyrede þe god þin of ele blisse for gehlyttum þinumnaman þines re cneoresse forðon & folc andettað þe on ecnisse aworuldgod ure frofr & mægen gefylstað on geswincum þa gemittan us swiðeforðon na we andrædað þonne byð eorðan & beoð borene muntas on heortan sæsswegdon & gedrefede synd wæter gedrefede synd muntas on strangnisse hisflodes onræs geblissaþ ceaster he halgude geteld his þe hyhstaon middele hyre ne byð astyred gefultumað hygedrefede synd þeoda & ahylde sealde stæfne his astyred ismægena mid us andfoend uredrihten mægena mid us anfoend ure godealle þeoda blissiað handum gefeogiaþ gode on stæfne blissebregendlic cyning micel ofer ealle eorðanhe underþeodde folc us & þeoda under fotum urehe geceas us on yrfeweardnisse hwy þe he lufudeastah in celos on wyndreame drihten on stæfne bymansingan ge singaþ ge singað cyning singaþcyning ealre eorðan god wisliceealdormen folces mid gode abrahames strange eorðan upahafene syndmicel & heriendlic swiðe on ceastre on munte haligum hisupahefennisse ealre eorðan muntas side norðdæles ceaster cyninges micleshis byð tocnewen þonne he anfehþongesihðe cyningas gesomnode synd togædere becomon on anhy geseonde wundredun gedrefede astyredefyrto uel bifung gegrap hy þær saron gaste swiþlicum forbrytendeþes on ecnisse & on worulde worulde recð us on woruldagehyraþ þas ealle þeoda earum onfoð þe bugiað ymbhwyrft& ge eorðware & bearn manna on an welig & þearfamin spricð wisdom gemynd heortan gleawnisseic ahylde eare min ic atyne saltere race mineandræde ic on dæge yuelum unrihtwisnes spuran mines ymb meþa þe getreowað on mægene heora welena heorabroþur na onlysde he alysde man ne selð gode gecwemnisse hisman þa he on woruldscype wæs he ne ageat he wæs wiðmeten nytenum unwisum & gelic geworden he is himgoda drihten spræc & cleopode eorðan of sunnan oð setlganhiw wlites hiseawunga cymeð & he na swigaþ fyr on gesihþe & on ymbhwirfte his hreoh strangto he gecigde heofon uppe eorðan tosceadon folc hisgesamniað him halig his þa endebyrden cyðnesse his offrungacyþ heofones rihtwisnesse his forðon god demagehyr folcc min & ic sprece & ic cyþe þe god þin ic eomna on offrungum þinum ic þreage onsægd soþlice þina on gesihþe synd symbleonsægdnis leofes arweorðað me & þær siþfæt ic oðeowe hælogemildsa me god æfter micelre mildheortnesse þin & æfter mænigo mildsunga þinra adilga unrihtwisnesse minema þweah me minre minum clænsa meic oncnawe symbleþe anum ic singode yfel beforan þe ic dyde þæt þu beo gerihtwisod on spræcum þinum & þu oferswiðe þonne þu demed eartongesihðe soðlice on unrihtwisnesse geeacnod ic eom modor
