minsoðfæstnisse þu lufudest ungewissu & dihlu wisdomes þines þu swutoludest meþonne þu anfehst offrunge rihtwise bringas & ofrunga þonne hy asettað ofer þibed þin cealfruhwæt wuldrast þu on yfelnesse þe rice is unrihtwisnesseælce dæge unrihtwisnesse þohte tuncge þin swa swa scyrfeax scearp ðu dydest facenþu lufodest yfelnesse ofer modignesse unriht ma þonne specan efennisseealle word hryres tunga facenfulreforðon god towyrfþ utaluceþ þe & afæwð þe of eardunge þinre & wyrttruman þine of eorðan lifiendrageseoð rihtwise & adrædað & ofer hine hlihað & cweðaðic andette þe on woruld forþon þu dydest & ic anbide naman þinne forðon god he is on gesihþe haligra þinracwæð se unwisa on heortan his na is godwewemmede synd & ascuniend gewordene synt na is þe do godof heofone loca ofer sunu manna þæt he geseo is oððe secendeealle ahyldon somod unnytte gewordene synt na is oð ænneþa þe cyrrað unrihtwisnesse þa ðe swelgað folcc min hlafesgecigdon þær hi forhtodon of ege þær na wæs ege tostencð ban gescynde synd forðon god forhigede highwilc selleþ hælo þonne acyrð hæfned folces his freaðan & blissaþgod on naman þinum halne me do & on mægene þingehyr gebed min mid earum onfoh word muðes minesforðon fremde arison wið uel ongean me & strange sohton sawle mine na forsetton god beforan gesihðe hissoðlice gefylsteþ me & drihten andfeng sawle minreacyr yuelu on feondum minum on soþfæstnisse þina þu generedest hywinsumlice ic ofrige þe ic andette naman þinum drihtene forðon god he isforþon of eallum geswince þu generedest me ofer fynd mine eage minegehyr god gebed min & na forseah bene minebeheald me & gehyr me geunrotsod on geswince minum & gedrefed ic eomof stæfne feondes & of geswencede synfulles on me unrihtwisnessa & on eorre hefigmode hy wæron meheortan min gedrefed is on me & fyrhto deaðes hreas ofer meege & fyrhto uel bifung ofer me & bewreah me þeostro& ic cwæð hwilc selð me feþera swa swa culfre & ic fleo & ic resteefnenu ic afeorrode fleonde & ic wunode on westennesoðlice læddest hy on pyt forwyrde weras bloda & facenfulle na healfe getyllað dagas heora ic soðlice hyhte on þe drihtengemiltsa me god forðon fortræd ælce dæge feohtende swencte mefortrædon fynd minefram heanesse dæge hyhteic herige spræca mine ic hyhte na ic ondræde hwætælce dæge word hi onscunedon ongean me heora on yfellhy eardiað & behydað hy hoh minne begymeð swa swafor nahte hale þu dest on yrre folcc þu tobricstforðon þu generedest of deaðe fet fram slide þæt ic cweme beforan on leohte lifiendramiltsa min gemildsa on þe getriwð sawl min & on sceade fiðera þinra ic hyhte oð aleore uel forðgewite unrihtwisnesic clypie gode þam hyhstan þe wel dyde mehe sende of heofone & alisde he sealde on hosp þa fortredendan me sende mildheortnesse his & soðfæstnisse hishe generede sawle mine of middele hwelpa leona ic slep gedrefed suna manna teþ heora wæpn & stræla & tunge heoraupahefe ofer heofonas eorðan wuldur þingrin hy gearwodon fotum minum & hi gebygdon sawle mine hy dulfon beforan ansiene seað & feollon on þonegearo heorte min ic singe & sealm ic secgeupahefe ofer heofonas & ofer ealle eorðan wuldur þingif soþlice witodlice rihtwisnesse gesprecað demað suna manna& soðlice on heortan unrihtwisnessa wyrcaþ ge on eorþan handa eowra syrwdonfremedlæcede synfulle hy dweledon of innoðe hy spræcan leasungahim æfter gelicnesse nædræ swa nædran dumbe & forcliccende earan heoraþa na gehyrað stæfne ongalendra & ætrene beoð begaleneforbryteð teþ heora on muðe heora geahlas leona tobricðto nahte hi becumað swa swa wæter yrnende beylt bogan his oðð hit byð geuntrymed& cwið man gif witodlice wæstm rihtwisum soðes god demende hy on eorðannere of feondum minum god & fram onarisendum on me alys mefram wyrcendum unrihtwisnesse & fram werum bloda hæle meforþon ongesihþe sawle onhruron on me þreafulle& ne unrihtwisnes min & na syn butan unrihtwisnesse ic arn & ic geriht wæsaris ongean ryne & geseoh & þu mægena beheald to geneosienne ealle þeoda na þu miltsast ealle þe wyrcað unrihtsyn gecyrred to æfene & hungor hy þolien & hundas & ymbyrnað ceastreongesihðe sprecað on heora muðe & sweord on welerum heora hwelc gehyrdegefylston min þe ic singe andfeng þu eart god min mildheortnis mingod þu eart us & tobræce us eorre & gemildsod usþu astyredest eorðan & þu drefdest hy hæl gedrefednessa his forðon he astyred isþu aþeowdest folce þinum heardu þu drenctest of wine onbrydnesseðu sealdest me ondrædendum þe tacnuncga þæt hy fleon of ansine bogan þæt syn alysede gecorene þinehalne do of swiþran þinre & gehyr mespræc on halgum his ic blissige þen & hole dene eardungon gode we don mægen & he to nahte gelædeþ swenccende usgehyr halsunga mine beheald gebede minefram gemærum eorðan to þe ic cleopode þa þa angud wearð heorte min on stane þu upahefdest meþu gelæddest me forðon geworden is hiht min stypel stragnisse of ansyne feondeson ic eardige on eardunge þinre on woruld ic beo gescylded oferbrædelse fyþera þinraþu min þu gehyrdest gebed min þu sealdest yrfeweardnisse ondrædendum naman þindagas ofer cyninges þu geic gear his oþ on dægþurhwunað on ecnesse on gesihðe mildheortnesse & soðfæstnisse his hwilc seceþswa naman on worulde þæt ic agylde gehat mine of dæge on dæghunenu underþeod biþ sawl min fram him soðlice hælo min& he hælo na ic beo astyred mahulange heos ge on men ge ofsleaþ ealle swa swa wage onhyldum & stangæderunge gecnysedhwæþere hi þohton anydan ic arn on þurst of muðe hy bletsedon & heortan heora hy wirigdonhwæþere fram him geþyld minhe ic na feorrigeon gode hælo min wuldor min fylstes mines & hyhtæne spræc twa þas ic gehyrde forðon anweald mildheortnes agyltstof leohte ic wacige þyrste saul hu mænigfealdlice/ flæsc minon westenne & onwæterigum swa on haligum ic oþeode þe þæt ic gesawe mægen þin & wuldor þinbetere is mildheortnes þin ofer lif weleras mine heriaþ þeic bletsige on life minum & on naman þinum ic upahebbe handa mineswa swa of fæstnisse & gefyllednisse gefylled byð sau min & weleras upahefednisse herigaðswa gemyndig ic wæs þin ofer bedd min on dægeredum ic gemyndiggegefylstend min & on oferbrædelse fiðera þinra ic blissigecyning soðlice blissað heriað ealle þa þe sweriað on him fordyt muð sprecendra unrihtugebed min fram ege feondes nere saule mineþu bewruge fram gemetinge wyrgendra of mænigo wyrcendra unrihtwisnessehy hwetton swa sweord tungan heora hy beheoldon bogan þing biterþæt hy strælien on digelnessum unwæmnesona hy stræliað hine & na hy adrædað hy getrymedon him þæt hy hyddon grinu hy cwædon hwilc gesihð hyhy scrutnodon unrihtwisnesse hy geteorodon scrutniende scrutnunge togenealehte man heahre& byþ upahafen stræla lytlynga gewordene synd witu heorablissaþ rihtwis on drihtne & gehyhteð on him & hy beoð herede ealle rihtwisegeriseþ lofsang god on heanesse & þe bið agolden gelastgehyr gebed min to þe ælc flæsc cymeþword unrihtwisra rihsodon ofer us & arleasnessum urum þu mildsasteadig þone þu gecure & afenge oneardað we beoþ gefylled in godum huses þines halig templ corpuswundurlic on efnesse gehyr us hælo ure hyht ealra enda eorþan & on sæ feorgyrigende muntas on mægene begyrd of anwealdeþu drefst sæs son yþa hyre beoð gedrefede þeodagescyrdde synd rammas sceapa & dena genihtsumiað of hwæte hy clypiað & soþlice lofsang cweþaþheriað gode ealle eorðesealm secað naman his sellað wuldor lofe hissecgað hu egeslicu synd weorc on mænifealdnisse mægenis þine leogaþ þe fynd þinegebiddeþ þe & singað þe sealm he secge naman þinumcumaþ & geseoð weorc egeslic on geþeahtum ofer suna mannase gecyrde sæ on drige land flodas hy oferforan mid fet þær we blissiaðse wyldeþ on mægene his on ecnesse eagan his ofer þeoda gelociað na hy beoð upahafen on himselfumbletsiað þeoda urne stæmne lofes hisgebletsod god & mildheortnesse his fram megod mildsa & bletsige us onlihte he andwlitan his ofer usþæt we oncnawað on eorðan weg þin on eallum þeodum hælo þinegeanddette þe folcc folcc ealleblissien & gefægnien þeoda þu demst folc on efnisse & þeoda ðu gereccestsealde wæstm hyre& ondræden hine ealle endas eorðanarise god & syn todrefed fynd his & fleon þa ðe hatedon hine fram ansiene hisswa swa teorade smic hy geterien flewð weax of ansiene fyres swa forweorðen synfulle fram ansiene godesrihtwise gewistfullian hy blissien on gesihðe godes & gegladien on blissesingað gode sealm cweþað naman his siþfæt doþ him þe astah ofer west drihtene naman blissiað on gesihþe his beoþ gedrefed of ansiene hisfæderes steopcilda & deman wudewana on stowe haligre hisþe eardian deþ on huse se alædeð gebundene on strangnesse gelice þa þa eardiað on byrgenumþonne þu ut gæst on gesihðe folces þine þonne þu færst on westenwuldurlic on halgum his he mægen & stragnesse folces his gebletsod godhalne me do god forþon ineodon wæteru oð to saule mineastæfnod on lime grundes & na is sped ic com on depnysse sæs & hreohnis besencte meic swanc clypiende hase geworden synd goman mine geteorodon eagan mine þonne ic hihte on god minnegemænigfylde synd ofer loccas heafdes mine þa hatedon me buton gestrangode synd fynd mine unrihtlice þa na ic reafode þa ic tolysdeþu eart unwisdom minne & scyldas mine ne sint behyddasceamigen on me þe anbidiað þe drihten drihtene mægena þa ðe seccað ofer me þa þe secað þe godfor þe ic forþylgode hosp oferwhreah gescyndnys mine& sæd þeowra his hy & þa ðe lufiað naman his eardiað on hyregod on fultum minne beheald to fylstanne me efstgesceamien & forwandien þa þe secað saule minesyn acyrred underbæcling & areodigen me yuelu sona aryderende þa þe secgað egla eglaupahebben & blissien þa ðe secað cweðen symle sie gemiclod þa ðe lufiað hælo þinesoþlice wædla þearfa gefylst gefylsta alysend minic hyhte na ic gesceamige on ecnesseon rihtwisse þine alys me & nere me onhyld eare þinbeo gescyldend & on stowe getrymede þæt halne me do trymnes min & frofr uel gener eart þuof handa synfulles ongean æ dondes & unrihtwisesforðon þu eart geþyld min drihten hyht min of iuguðe minregetrymed of innoðe of wambe modor minre gescyldend min sang min symleswa swa foretacen geworden manegum gefylstend strangsie gefylled muð of lofe wuldor þin ælce dægac tunge min smeað rihtwisnesse þine þonne gescynde & aswarcode beoð þa ðe secað yfelu megod dom þinne cyninge & rihtwisnesse þine suna cyninges deman folc þin on rihtwisnesse & þearfan þine on domeonfon muntas sibbe folce & beorgas rihtwisnessehe demð þearfan folces & hale he deþ suna þearfena & he geeaðmed hyspend& he wunað a mid sunnan & beforan monanhe adunestah swa swa ren on flys & swa swa dropunga dreopenda ofer eorðanaspringþ on dagum his riht & genihtsumnes sybbe oð mona& he wylt fram sæ oð & fram flode oð gemæru ymbhwyrftes& gebletsod naman mægenþrymmes hire on ecnisse & byþ gefylled of mægenþrymme his eall eorþan sy syhu god god þam þe rihtwise syndmine nean astyred fet nean agoten stepas mineic æfstgode sibbe sinfulra geseondenis deaðe heora trumnis on wite heoraon geswince manna na synd & mid mannum na beoð swungenforþon nam hy ofermodnis oferwrigen of unrihtnesse & of arleasnesse hisforðræsde swa swa of fætnisse unrihtwisnes heora hy ferdon heortanhy þohton & hy spræcon nið unrihtwisnesse þearle hi spræconme togeþeodan god is asetton on drihtne hyht minne þæt ic bodige þine on gatum dohtorto hwon god þu anyddest on ende eorre is hatheortnes þin ofer sceapgemun gesomnunge fram fryþe gyrde yrfeweardnesse þin munt on þæm þu eardodesthefe handa þine on ofermodnesse heora on ende þu fela awurgde feond on haligum& gewuldrode synd þa þe hatedon on middum hy asetton tacnu heora& na hy oncnewon swa swa ofer heahne swa on wuda treowa æhsumhy aheowon dura his on þæt selfe & adesan hy ut awurpon hyhy onældon fyr haligern þin on eorþan hy besmiton eardungstowe naman þineshi cwædon on heortan heora cyþþ heora dagas syml fram eorþanna ofergit þu stefna ofermodnes heora þa ðe hatedonwe andetað þe god & we cigað naman þinne wundru þineþonne ic afo tid ic rihtwisnesse demegemolten is eorðe & ealle on hire ic getrymede sweras hireic sæde unrihtwisum nellen ge unrihte don & agyltendum nellen ge upahebban hornon yplen eowerne sprecan ongean unrihtwisnesseforðon & na fram eastdæle fram westdæle & na fram westumdema is þysne geeaðmedeþ & þisne he ahefþ& ælc hornas synfulra hornas unrihtwisescuþ on iudeum god on micel nama his& geworden is on sibbe stow his & eardungþær he forbricþ bogana scyld & sweord & gefeohtonlihtende þu wundurlice fram muntum ecumgedrefede ealle unwise heortan hi splepun swefnum his & nauht gemitton ealle weras welena on handum hisfram þreaunge þinre hy hnappodon þa astigon horsþu egeslic & hwilc wiðstandeð þe forðonne& þam þe afyrseþ gast ealdra wyð cyningas eorðanof stefne mire ic cleopode & he behealdeþ meon dæge geswinces mines god ic sohte handum minum of nihte & na ic eom beswicen sawle minegemyndig ic wæs & gelustfullod eom & ic worhte & geteorode gast mintoforon gesetton wæccan eagan mine gedrefed & na gespræcenic þohte dagas & gear on mode ic hæsde& ic gemunde of nihte mid heortan & ic swanc gast minnecwiþ þu on ecnesse awyrpþ & na togeteohige sy nu gyttþu swa swa sceap folcc þin on handabegymaþ folcc min æ mine onhyldað eare eower on word muðes minesic atyne on bispellum muþ minne ic sprece foresetednessa of frymþehumanega we gehyrdon & we gecneowon þa & fæderas ure hy cyþdon usna synd bedihlede fram sunum heora on cneorisse oþerre cyðende lofo & mægenu his & wundru his þe he dyde& he awehte cyðnesse & æ he sette he bebead fæderum urum cuðe sunu heorahe ancnawe cneores oþer sunu þe beoþ acenned & hy risaþ cyþaþ sunum heoraþæt hi setten on gode hiht hira & na ofergiten weorca godes & bebodu his hi secenne syn hi swa swa fæderas heora sweor ne gerehte heortan his & na is gelyfed mid gode gast his& he fedde hy heortan his handa his he lædde hygod comon þeoda on yrfewerdnesse þine hy besmiton templ halig þin hy setton upplaþeowa mettas fugelum heofones flæsc þinra wildeorum eorþanhy aguton blod heora swa swa wæter on ymb & næs þe bebyrgdegeworden we syndon hosp neahgeburum þam þe on ymbhwyrftehu lange þu yrsast on ende bið anæled swa fyr eorre þingeot yrre þin on þeoda þa þe na cvþon & on ricu þa naman þinne cigdonforðon æton stow his hy forletonne gemun ðu unrihtu ure raðe foresette us mildheortnes þin þearfan geworden we synd swiþeus soðlice folc þin & sceap fostornoþes þines we andettað þe on worulde we cyðað lof þinþu þe recest beheald þu ðe lædst swa swa sceap þu ðe sitst oferbeforan awece anweald þin & cum þæt hale þu do usgecyr us & oðeow ansyne þine & hale we beoðmægena hu lange eorsast þu ofer gebeda þeowes þinesþu metsast us of hlafe teara & drinc þu selst us on tearum on gemeteþu settest us on wiþercwedulnisse neahgeburum urum & fynd ure usgecyr us & oðwymægena gecyr us & oþeow ansiene þine & hale we beoðblissiaþ gefylstan urumnimaþ psealm & sellað gligbeam salter wyndsumne mid hearpanof byman on mærum dæg simbelnesseforðon bebod is & dom godecyþnesse he sette þa he eode of lande tungan þe na he wiste he gehyrde& he acyrde fram byrðenum hric his handa his on wilegan þeowodonon geswince þu gecigdest me & ic alysde ðe ic gehyrde þe on bedihlinge reðnisse ic afandode þe wiþercwedolnesse& he metsode hy of genihtsumnesse hwætes & of stane of hunige he fylde hygod stod on gesomnunge goda on middelehu lange demað ge unrihtwisnesse & onsyne genimaðdemað wædlan & steopcilde eaðmodne & þearfan gerihtwisiaþneriað þearfan & wædlan of handa alysaðhy nyston & na hy angeatan on þystrum hy gangað beoð styred ealle grundwealles eorðanic cwæþ godas ge sindon & bearn þæs mæran eallege soþlice swa swa men ge swyltaþ & swa swa an of ealdrum ge hreosaþaris dem eorðan forðon ðu yrfeweardest on eallum þeodumgod hwilc gelic bið þe ne swiga þu & na þu forhafaforðon fynd þin swigdon & þa þe hatedon þe hy ahofon heafod& hi ða þohton ongean halige ðinehi cwædon cumað & utan forspillan hy of þeode & na bið gemunen namanhi þohton ongean ðe cyðnesse todihtnodongeteld þara eorðlicra heora & synnehyrendraþa ælfremdan mid eardgendumancnawen þætte nama þe þu ana se hehsta on ealre eorðanhu eardunga þine mægenagewilnode & geteorode saule min on cafertunas drihtnes heorte min & flæsc min blissodon on god lifiendne& soþlice spearwa gemette him hus & turtle nest sette briddas hyre altras þine mægena cyning mineadige þa þe eardiað on huse þinum on woruld worulde heriað þeeadig wer þæs þe is fultum fram þe on heortan tosetteon dene teara on stowe þa& soþlice bletsunga he selþ gangað of mægene on mægene bið gesewen god godana bescyreð of godum hy on unscyldignesse mægen eadig man þe hiht on þeþu bletsodest drihten eorþan þine þu acyrdest hæfnedþu forgeafe unrihtwisnesse folces þines þu oferwruge ealle synna heoraþu geliðgodest eall yrre þin þu acyrdest yrre on æbylgnesse þinegecyr us hælo ure & framacyr yrre þin fram uson ecnesse þu eorsige us þu aþene yrre þingecyrred þu geliffæstas us & folc þin blissaþ on ðeoðeow us mildheortnesse þine & hælo þine sele usrihtwisnes beforan hine eode & set on wege stæpas hisanhyld eare þin & gehyr me & þearfa ic eom icgeheald sawle mine halne do þeowne þinne hihtende on þemildsa me forðon to þe ic cleopode ælce dægegeblissa sawle þeowes to þe sawle min ic ahofwynsum & bilwite mildheortnis eallum gecigendum þemid earum anfoh gebed min & begim stefne bene minreon dæge swinces mines ic cleopode to þe þu gehyrdest menis is gelic on godum & nis æfter weorcum þinumdo mid me tacn on gode þæt hy geseon þa þe hatedon me & aswarnien þu fultomedest & þu frefrodest megrundwealles his on muntum haligumlufað drihten gatu ofer ealle eardungawulderfulle gecweden sind be þe ceastre godesgemyndig ic beo þam witendum me ongesihþe ælfremde & folc sigelhearwana þacwið man is on hire & he gestaþolede hy se hyhstacyðde on gewritum folca & ealdra þara þe wæron on hyreswa swa blissiendra ealra eardung on ðehæle minre on dæg ic cleopode & nihte beforan þeinga on gesihþe þinre gebed min ahyld eare þin to bene minreforþun gefilled is yfelum saul min & lif min on helle togeneahlæhtegewened ic em mid adunestigendum on seað geworden ic eom swa swa man butan fultumebetweox deade freoh swa swa gewundode slæpende þara ma & hy of handa þinre anydde syndhy asetton on seaðe þam neoþeran on þystrum & on sceade deaþesgetrymed is & ealle þu ingelæddest ofer meðu ascihtest freond & nyhstan & cuðe mine fram yrmðemildheortnessa on ecnesse ic singe on cynrene ic bodige soþfæstnesse on muþe minumþu cwæde on ecnesse mildheortnes bið getimbred on heofonum biþ gegearwod soþfæstnesic tosette cyþnesse gecorenum minum ic swor þeowe minumoþ on ecnesse ic gearwige sæd þin & ic timbrie setl þingeandettað heofonas wundru þine soþfæstnisse þine on gesomnung haligrahwilc on genipum bið geefenlæced gelic bið on bearn godesþe bið gewuldrud on geþeahte haligra micel & egeslic ealle þe on ymbhwyrfte his his syntgebletsod on ecnessedrihten frofr geworden usærþam muntas þe wæren gehiwod wære eorðe & ymbhwyrftes fram worulde & oþ on woruld þu eartne acyr þu man on geniþerunga & þu cwæde gecyrrað suna mannaþusend geara beforan eagan þine swa swa dæg gystra þe forsceoc & heordnes on nihteseo for naht sind hæfde heora gearon mergen swa wyrt gewiteð bloweð & fareð/ on æfen afylþ astiþaþ & adruwaðforðon we geteorodon on eorre þinum & on hatheortnes þine gedrefed we syndþu asettest unrihtwisnessa ura on gesihþe þinre worulde ure on alyhtnessa& sie beortnes ures ofer us & weorc handa ura gerece ofer usse eardað on fultume þæs hyhstan on gescyldnesse heofones he wunaðhe cwið andfeng min & frofr min god min ic hyhte on hinehe alysde me of grine hungendra &eahslum his he sceadewode & under feþerum his þu hihstof scylde ymbselþ þe soþfæstnes his na þu ondrædst fram ege nihtlicumfram flane fleondre fram gestreone gangendum on ðystrum & deofle suðernumhy feallað fram sidan þinre þusend & tyn þusenda fram swiþrun þinum na genealeacðhwæþere þeah eagum þinum þu besceawast & edlean synna þu gesihstlangnesse daga ic gefylle hine & ic oðiwe him hælo minegod is andettan & singan naman þinum þu hehstato bodianne on mergen mildheortnes þine & soðfæstnesse þine þurh nihton tynstrengedum saltere mid cantice on hearpanforðon þu gebliþgodest me on geweorce þinum & on weorcum handa þinra ic blissigehu gemiclode synd weorcu þine swiðe deope gewordene synd geþohtas þinewer unwis na oncnawþ & dysig na ongit þaswa swa hyg & oðeowden ealle þa þe weorcað unrihtþæt hy cyþen & nis unrihtwisnes on himricsode wlite gescryd strangnisse & he begyrde hine & soþlice he getrymede ymb eorðan þe na byþ astyredgearo setl þin siðþan fram worulde þu eart upahofon flodas stæfna heorafram stefnum wætera manigra wuldurlica ahafennissa sæs wuldurlic on heanessumcyðnessa þine geleaffullicra gewordene sind swiþe huse þinum gerisaþ halige on langnesse dagawraca drihten freolice dydeahefe þu þe demst eorðan gyld edlean ofermodumhu lange synfulle wuldriað& sprecað unrihtwisnesse sprecað ealle þa ðe wyrcað unrihtwisnessefolc þin hy nyþeredon & yrfeweardnesse þine hy drehtonwydewan & wreccan hy ofslogan & steopcyld hy cwealdon& hy cwædon na gesihð na angitongytað unwise on folce & dysige æt suman cyrre angytað& agylt unrihtwisnessa heora & on yfelnesse heora forleoseþ hy hy drihten god urecumaþ uton blissian drihtne uton dryman gode hælende urumwe ofþriccen ansyne hys on andetnesse & on sealmum we dryman hinmicel & cyning mære ofer ealle godasforðon on handa his endas eorðan & heahnessa munta hishis sæ & he worhte hy & handa hiscumað uton gebiddan & utan aþenian & we wepen þe worhte usforðon he is god ure & we folc fostornoþes his & sceap histodæg gif stæfne his ge gehyrað nellen ge wiðheardian heortan eowrana oncneowan wegas mines ic swor on eorre minum gyf hy inga on reste minesingað cantic niwne eall eorþesingað & bletsiaþ naman hisbodiaþ betweox þeoda wuldur his on eallum folcum wundru hismicel & hergendlic swiþe æþreclic ofer ealle godasgodas þeoda woddreamas soþlice heofonas dydeandetnes & fægernes on gesihðe his & miclung on halignesse hisbringað drihtne eþelas þeoda & arwurþunga wuldur naman hisadoþ dura & gað in on cafertunasbeforan ansine com deman eorþan he demð ymbhwyrft eorðan on efnnesse & folc on soþfæstnesse hisdrihten rihsode gefægnie eorðe blissiaþ igland manegugenipu & þycnes on ymbhwyrfte his rihtwisnes & dom gereced setles hisfyr beforan foregæþ & onælþ ad iram on ymbhwyrfte fynd hisonlihton ligræscas his ymbhwyrfte geseah & gedrefed is eorþemuntas swa swa weax fleowan of ansiene eall eorðebodedon heofonas riht his & gesawon ealle folcu wuldur hisasceamien ealle þe gebiddað defolgild þa þe wuldriaþ on deofolgildum heora gebiddaþ ealle englas hishe gehyrde & geblissod is & fægnodon dohtra fore domum þinublissiaþ riht on drihtne & andettaþ gemynde halignesse hissingaþ drihtne niwne forþon wuldru dyde hælde him seo swiþre his & earm halig hiscuþe dyde hælo his on gesihþe þeoda he awreah rihtwisnessa hisgemyndig he wæs mildheortnesse his & soþfæstnesse his huse gesawon ealle eorþan hælodrymað eall eorðe singað & blissiað & sealmiaþon hearpan & stefne sealmeson bymum geglædendlicum & stefne byman hyrnenre drymaþ on gesihþe cyningessy astyred sæ & gefylled his ymbhwyrft eorþana & þe eardiaþ on hireflodas hafettaþ muntasbeforan ansiene he com deman eorþan he demð ynbhwyrft on rihtwisnesse & folc on efnesserihsode folc þu þe sittest ofer beoð astyred eorþamicel & heah ofer ealle folcandettan naman þinum miclum egeslicum he is& wyrðment cyninges dom lufaþ þu gearwodest dom & rihtwisnesse þu dydestupahebbaþ & gebiddaþ scamul fota his forðon halig he ison preostum his betweox hy þa gecigaþ naman his hy cygdon & he gehyrde hyon swere genipes he spræc to him hy heoldon cyþnessa his & bebod þe þe sealda himþu gehyrdest hy gemildsod þu þære him & wreccende heora& upahebbaþ drihten ure & togebiddað on munte haligum his halig drihten god uredrymað ealle eorða þeowiað on blisse ingaþ on gesihþe his on bliþnessewitað he is god he worhte us & na selfe we folc his & sceap fostornoþes hisingaþ on gatu his on andetnesse cafertunas on ymnum heriað naman hisþa þe andrædað hihte on drihten gefylsta heora & gescyld heora isse eardað in heofenum bismerad hie & dryhten hyspeð hie ðonne spriceð to him in eorre his & in hatheortnisse his gedroefeð hie ic soðlice geseted ic eam cyning from him ofer sion mont ðone halgan his bodiende bibod dryhten dryhten cwæð to me sunu min ðu earð ic to dege ic cende ðec bide from me & ic sellu ðe ðeode erfeweardnisse ðine & on æhte ðine gemæru eorðan ðu reces hie in gerde iserre & swe swe fet lames ðu gebrices hie & nu cyningas ongeotað bioð gelærde alle ða ðe doemað eordan ðeowiað dryhtne in ege & wynsumiað him mid cwaecunge gegripað ðy les hwonne eorsie dryhten & ge forweorðen of wege ðonne beorneð in scortnisse eorre his eadge alle ða ðe getreowað in hine dryhten hwet gemonigfaldade sindun ða ðe swencað mec monge arisað wið me monge cweoðað salwle minre nis haelu hire in dom hire ðu soðlice dryhten ondfenge min earð wuldur min & uphebbende heafud min mid id stefne minre to dryhten ic cleopede & geherde mec of munte ðæm halgan his ic hneappade & slepan ongon & ic eftaras for ðon dryhten onfeng mec ne ondredu ic ðusend folces ymsellendes me aris dryhten halne me doa god min for ðon ðu sloge alle wiðerbrocan me butan intingan toeð synfulra ðu forðræstes dryhtnes is haelu & ofer folc ðin bledsung ðin mid ðy ic gecede ðe ðu geherdes me god rehtwisnisse minre in geswencednisse ðu gebreddes me mildsa me dryhten & geher gebed min bearn monnan hu longe hwefie on heortan to hwon lufiað ge idelnisse & soecað leasunge weotað ðætte gemiclað dryhten ðone halgan his dryhten gehereð me ðonne ic cleopiu to him eorsiað & nyllað syngian ða ðe cweoðað in heortum eowrum & in bedcleofum eowrum bioð geinbryrde onsecgað onsegdnisse rehtwisnisse & gehyhtað in dryhten monge cweoðað hwelc oteaweð us god getacnad is ofer us leht ondwlitan ðines dryhten ðu saldes blisse in heortan minre from tide hwetes wines & eles his gemonigfaldade sindun in sibbe in ða ilcan ic neapiu & gerestu for ðon ðu dryhten synderlice in hyhte gesettes me word min mid earum onfoh dryhten onget cleopunge mine behald stefne gespreces mines cynin min & god min for ðon to ðe ic gebidu dryhten on marne & ðu geheres stefne mine on marne ic ætstondu ðe & gesio for ðon ne wellende god unrehtwisnisse ðu earð ne eardað neh ðe awerged ne ðorhwuniað ða unrehtwisan biforan egum ðinum ðu fedest dryhten alle ða ðe wircað unrehtwisnisse ðu forspildes hie ða ða spreocað leasunge wer bloda & ðone fæcnan onscunað dryhten ic soðlice in mengu mildheortnisse ðinre ic inga dryhten in hus ðin ic gebidda to temple ðæm halgan ðinum in ege ðinum gelaed me dryhten in ðine rehtwisnisse fore feondum minum gerece in gesihðe ðinre weg minne for ðon nis in muðe heara soðfestnis heorte heara idel is byrgen open is hraece heara tungum heara faccenlice dydun doem hie god gefallen from geðohtum heara efter mengu arleasnissa heara on weg adrif hie for ðon onscunedon ðe dryhten & blissien alle ða gehyhtað in ðe in ecnisse gefioð & ðu ineardas in him & wuldriað in ðe alle ða ðe lufiað noman ðinne for ðon ðu dryhten ðu bledsas ðone rehtwisan dryhten swe swe mid scelde godes willan dines ðu gebegades usic dryhten nales in eorre ðinum ðu dreast me ne in hatheortnisse ðinre ðu ðreast me mildsa me dryhten for ðon untrum ic eam hael me dryhten for ðon gedroefed sindun all ban min & sawl min gedroefed is swiðe & ðu dryhten hu longe gecer & genere sawle mine halne me do fore mildheortnisse ðine for ðon nis in ðeaðe se gemyndig sie ðin in helle soðlice hwelc ondetteð ðæ ic won in geamrunge minre ic ðwea ðorh syndrie neht bed min mid tearum strene mine ic wetu gedroefed is fore eorre ege min ic aldade betwih alle feond mine gewitað from me alle ða wircað unrehtwisnisse for ðon geherde dryhten stefne wopes mines geherde dryhten boene mine dryhten gebed min genom scomien & sien gedroefde alle feond mine sien forcerred on bec & scomien swiðe hreðlice dryhten god min in ðe ic gehyhte gefrea me from allum oehtendum me & genere me ðy les æfre geslæcce swe swe lea sawle mine ðonne nis se ðe alese ne se ðe hie hale gedoe dryhten god min gif ic dyde ðis gif is unrehtwisnis in hondum minum gif ic agald ðaem geldendum me yfel ic gefallu bi gewyrhtum from feondum minum idelhende oehteð se feond sawle mine & gegripeð hie & fortrideð in eorðan lif min & wuldur min in dust gelaedeð aris dryhten in eorre ðinum & hefe up in endum feonda ðinra aris dryhten god min in bebode ðæt ðu bibude & gesomnunge folca ymbseleð ðe & fore ðissum in heanisse gaa eft dryhten doem folc doem mec dryhten efter rehtwisnisse minre & efter unsceðfulnisse honda minra ofer me sie fornumen nið ðeara synfulra & gerece ðone rehtwisan smegende heortan & eðre god rehtwisne fultum minne from dryhten se hale gedoeð ða rehtan on heortan god doema rehtwis strong & longmod ah eorsað ðorh syndrie dægas nemne ge sien gecerde sweord his cweceð bogan his ðeneð & gearwað ðone & in him gearwað featu deaðes strelas his beornedvm gefremede sehðe cenneð unrehtwisnisse geecnað sar & cenneð unrehtwisnisse seað ontynde & dalf ðone & ingefeol in seað ðone ðe he dyde sie gecerred sar his in heafde his & in hnolle his unrehtwisnis his astigeð ic ondettu dryhtne efter rehtwisnisse his & ic singu noman dryhten ðæs hestan dryhten dryhten ur hu wundurlic is noma ðin in alre eorðan for ðon upahefen is micelnis ðin ofer heofenas of muðe cilda & milcdeondra ðu gefremedes lof fore feondum ðinum ðæt ðu toweorpe feond & gescildend for ðon ic gesie heofenas werc fingra ðinra monan & steorran ða ðu gesteaðulades hwet is mon ðæt gemyndig ðu sie his oððe sunu monnes for ðon ðu neosas hine ðu gewonedes hine hwoene laessan from englum mid wuldre & mid are ðu gebegades hine & gesettes hine ofer werc honda ðinra all ðu underdeodes under fotum his scep & oxan all ec ðon & netenu feldes fuglas heofenes & fiscas saes ða geondgað stige saes dryhten dryhten ur hu wundurlic is noma ðin in alre eorðan ic ondetto ðe dryhten in alre heortan minre ic secgo all wundur ðin ic biom geblissad & ic gefie in ðe & singu noman ðinum ðu hehsta in forcerringe fienda min on bec bioð geuntrumad & forweordað from onsiene ðinre for ðon ðu dydest dom minne & intingan minne ðu sites ofer ðrymseld ðu doemes efennisse ðu ðreades ðeode & forweorðed se arleasa noman heara ðu adilgades in ecnisse & in weoruld weorulde feond asprungun mid sweorde in ende & cestre heara ðu towurpe forwearð gemynd heara mid swoege & dryhten in ecnesse ðorhwunað gearwade in dome seld his & he doemeð ymbhwyrft earðan in efennisse doemeð folc mid rehtwisnisse & geworden is dryhten geberg ðearfena fultum in gelimplicnissum in geswencednisse & gehtað in ðe alle ða cunnun noman ðinne for ðon ðu ne forletes ða soecendan ðe dryhten singað dryhten se eardað in sion secgað betwih ðeode wundur his for ðon soecende blod heara gemynd is & nis ofergeotol gebed ðearfena mildsa me dryhten & geseh eaðmodnisse mine of fiendum minum ðu uphest mec of geatum deaðes ðæt ic secge all lofu ðin in geatum doehter sine ic gefio in haelu ðinre gefestnade sindon ðeode in forwyrd ða dydun in grin ðissum ða gedegladon gegripen is fot heara oncnaweð dryhten dryht domas donde in wercum honda his bifongen bið se synfulla bioð gecerde ða synfullan in helle alle ðeode ða ðe ofergeoteliað dryhten for ðon nales in ende ofergeotulnis bið ðearfena geðyld ðearfena ne forweorðeð in ende aris dryhten ne meg mon sien doemed ðeode in gesihðe ðinre gesete dryhten aeeladtow ofer hie ðæt witen ðeode ðette men hie sindun to hwon dryhten gewite ðu feor ðu forsist in gemalicnissum in geswencednisse ðonne oferhygdgað se arleasa bið inæled ðearfa bioð bifongne in geðohtum heara ða hie dencað for ðon bið hered se synfulla in lustum sawle his & se ða unrehtan doeð bið bið bledsad bismerað dryhten se synfulla efter mengu eare his he ne soeceð nis god in gesihðe his bioð bismiten wegas his in alle tid bioð afirred domas ðine from onsiene his allra fienda his waldeð cweð soðlice in heortan his ne biom ic onstyred of cneorisse in cneorisse butan yfle ðes muð awergednisse & bitternisse ful is & facne under tungan his gewin & sar siteð in searwum mid ðæm weoligum in degulnissum det he ofsle ðone unscyldgan egan his in ðearfan gelociað setað in degulnisse swe swe lea in bedcleofan his setað þæt he geræafie ðearfan gereafian ðearfan ðonne he atið hine in gerene his geeaðmodað hine onheldeð hine & falleð ðonne he waldeð ðearfan cweð soðlice in his heortan ofergeotul is god forcerreð onsiene his ðæt he ne gese oð ende aris dryhten god min & sie upahefen hond ðin ne ofergeotela ðu ðearfena in ende for ðon bismirað se arleasa dryhten cwæð soðlice in heortan his ne soeceð god ðu gesist ðætte ðu gewin & sar ðu sceawas ðæt ðu selle hie in honda ðine ðe soðlice forlen is ðearfa feadurleasum ðu bist fultum forðræst earm ðes synfullan & ðes awergdan bið soht scyld his ne bið gemoeted ricsað dryhten in in ecnisse & in weorulde weoruld forweorðað ðeode of eorðan his lust ðearfena geherde dryhten lustas heortan heara geherde eare ðin doem ðæm freondleasan & ðæm heanan ðætte no tosette mae gemicla hine mon ofer eorðan in dryhtne ic getreowu hu cweaðað ge to minre sawle fer in mont swe swe spearwa for ðon sehde ða synfullan ðenedon bogan gearwadon strelas heara in cocere ðæt hie scoteden in degelnisse ða rehtan on heortan for ðon ða ðu gefredes hie towurpun se rehtwisa soðlice hwet dyde he dryhten in temple ðæm halgan his dryhten in heofene seld his egan his in ðearfan gelociað bregas his frignað bearn monna dryhten frigneð ðone rehtwisan & ðone arleasan se soðlice lufað unrehtwisnisse fiað sawle his rineð ofer ða synfullan giren fyres & swefelrec & gast ysta dael calices heara for ðon rehtwis dryhten & rehtwisnisse lufað rehtwisnesse gesið ondwleota his halne me doo dryhten for ðon asprong se halga for ðon gewonade sind soðfestnisse from bearnum monna ða idlan spreocende is anra gehwelc to ðæm nestan his welure faecne in heortan & heortan spreocende sindun ða yflan tostrigdeð dryhten alle weolure faecne & tungan yfel spreocende ða cwedun tungan ure we micliað weolre ure from us sindun hwelc ur is dryhten fore ermðe weðlena & geamrunge ðearfena nu ic arisu cwið dryhten ic setto ofer helu mine getrewlice ic dom in hine gesprec dryhtnes gesprec clæne seolfur fyre amearad earðan geclasnad seofenfaldlice ðu dryhten aldes usic & gehaldes usic from cneorisse ðisse in ecnisse in ymbhwyrfte ða arleasan gongað efter hehnisse ðinre ðu gemonigfaldades bearn monna hu longe dryhten ofergeotulas ðu mec in ende hu longe acerres ðu onsiene ðine from me hu longe settu ic geðaeht in saule mine sar in heortan minre ðorh deg hu longe bið upahefen se feond min ofer mec geloca & geher me dryhten god min inliht egan min ne æfre ic aslepe in deaðe ne æfre cweðe feond min ic strongade wið him ða swencað me gefiað gif onstyred ic beam ic soðlice in ðinre mildhertnisse ic gehyhtu gefið heorte min in haelu ðinre ic singu dryhtne se god selð me & ic singu noman ðinum ðu hehsta cweð se unwisa in his heortan nis god gewemde sindun & onscuniendlice gewordne sind in lustum heara nis se ðe doe god nis oð enne dryhten of heofene forðlocað ofer bearn monna ðæt he gese hweðer sie ongeotende oððe soecende god alle onhaeldon somud unnytte gewordne werun nis se ðe doe god nis oð enne byrgen open is hraecae heara tungum heara faecenlice dydun atur nedrena under weolerum heara ðeara muð awergednisse & bitternisse ful bið hreðe foet heara to ageotenne blod forðrestednis & ungeselignis in wegum heara & weg sibbe ne oncneowun nis ege godes biforan egum heara ah ne oncnawað alle ða ða wircað unrehtwisnisse ða forswelgad folc min swe mete hlafes god ne gecedun der forhtaðum mid ege ðer ne wes ege dryhten hwelc eardað in selegescote ðinum oððe hwelc geresteð in munte ðæm halgan ðinum se ingeð butan womme & wirceð rehtwisnisse se spriceð soðfestnisse in heortan his & nis facæn in tungan his ne he dyde ðæm nestan his yfel & edwit ne onfeng wið ðæm nestan his to nowihte gelaeded bið in gesihðe his se awergda ondredende soðlice dryten gemiclað se swereð ðæm nestan his & ne bswac hine se feh his ne salde to westemscette & gefe ofer ðone unsceðfullan ne onfeng se doeð ðas ne bið he onstyred in ecnisse gehald me dryhten for ðon in de ic gehyhte ic cweð to dryhten god min ðu earð for ðon goda minra ðu ne biðearft halge ða in eorðan sindun his gewundrade alle willan mine bitwih hie gemonigfaldade sindun soðlice medtrymnisse heara efter ðon hreaðedon ne gesomniu ic gesomnunge heara of blodum ne gemyndig ic biom nomena heara ðorh weolure mine dryhten dael erfewordnisse minre & celces mines ðu earð ðu gesettes me erfeweardnisse mine rapas gefeollun me in berhtnisse & soðlice erfeweardnis min berht is me ic bledsiu dryhten se me seleð ondget ec ðon & oð neht ðreadun me eðre mine ic foresaeh dryhten in gesihðe minre aa for ðon to ðere swiðra is me ne biom ic onstyred fore ðissum gelustfullad is heorte min & gefiht tunge min ec ðon & flesc min geresteð in hyhte geher dryhten rehtwisnisse mine bihald boene mine mid earum onfoh gebed min nales in weolerum faecnum of ondwlitan ðinum dom minne forðyppeð egan min gesiað efennisse ðu acunnadest heortan mine & neasades on næht mid fyre me amearedes & nis gemoeted in me unrehtwisnis ðætte he ne sprece muð min wirc monna fore wordum weolura ðinra ic heold weagas ða heardan gefreme gongas mine in stigum ðinum ðæt ne sien onwende sweðe mine ic cleapede for ðon ðu geherdes me god onhæld eare ðin me & geher word min gewundra mildheornisse ðine se hale gedoest ða gehyhtendan in ðec from ðæm wiðstondendum ðere swiðra ðinre gehald mec dryhten swe swe sean egan under scuan fiðra ðinra gesild me from onsiene arleasra ða me swencton fiond mine sawle mine ymbsaldun smeoru his bilucun muð heara spreocende wes in oferhygde ic lufiu ðe dryhten megen min dryhten trymenis min & geberg min & gefrigend min god min fultum min ic gehyhtu in hine gescildend min & horn haelu minre fultum min hergende ic gecegu dryhten & from feondum minum hal ic biom ymbsaldon me geamrunge deaðes & burnan unrehtwisnisse gedroefdon me sar helle ymbsaldon me forecwomon me gerene deaðes & in geswencednisse minre ic gecede dryhten & to gode minum ic cleopede & he geherde of temple ðæm halgan his stefne mine & cleopung min in gesihðe his ineode in earan his & onstyred wes & cwecede eorðe & steaðelas munta gedroefde sind & onstyrede sind for ðon eorre is him god astag rec in eorre his & fyr from onsiene his born colu onelde sind from him & he onhaelde heofenas & ofdune astag & dimnis under fotum his heofenas asecgað wuldur godes & werc honda his segeð trymenis deg dege roccetteð word & neht nehte getacnað wisdom ne sind gespreocu ne word ðeara ne bioð geherde stefne heara in alle eorðan uteode swoeg heara & in endas ymbhwyrftes eorðan word heara in sunnan he sette geteld his & he swe swe brydguma forðgande of brydbure his gefaeh swe swe gigent to earnenne on weg from ðæm hean heofene utgong his & eftyrn his oð hehnisse his ne is se ðe hine ahyde from haeto his eew dryhten untelwyrðe gecerrende sawle cyðnis dryhten getreowu ro gearwiende cilde rehtwisnisse dryhten rehtlice blissiende heortan bibod dryhten leht inlihtende egan ege dryhten halig ðorhwunað in weoruld weorulde domas godes soðe gerehtwisade in him seolfum gehere ðe dryhten in dege geswinces gescilde ðe noma godes iacefes sende ðe fultum of halgum & of sion gescilde ðe gemyndig sie dryhten alre onsegdnisse ðinre & onsegdnisse ðine gefaettie selle ðe dryhten efter heortan ðinre & all gedaeh ðin getrymme we bioð geblissade in haelu ðinre & in noman dryhten godes ures we bioð gemiclade gefylleð dryhten alle boene ðine nu ic oncneow ðætte halne doeð ðryhtum crist his & gehereð hine of heofene ðæm halgan his in maehtum haelu swiðran his ðas in creatum & ðas in horsum we soðlice in noman dryhten godes ures we bioð gemiclade hie gebundne sindun & gefeollun we soðlice aresun & uparehte sindun dryhten halne do cyning & geher us in dege in ðæm we gecegað ðec dryhten in megne ðinum bið geblissad cyning & ofer haelu ðine gefihð swiðlice lust sawle his ðu saldes him & willan weolera his ðu ne bisceredes hine for ðon ðu forecwome hine in bledsunge swoetnisse ðu settes heafde his beg of stane deorwyrðum lif bed & ðu saldes him lengu dega in weoruld weorulde micel is wuldur his in haelu ðinre wuldur & micelne wlite ðu onsetes ofer hine for ðon ðu selest hine in bledsunge in weoruld weorulde ðu geblissas hine in gefian mid ondwleotan ðinum for ðon cyning gehyhteð in dryhtne & in mildheortnisse ðes hestan ne bið onstyred sie bið gemoeted hond ðin allum feondum ðinum sie swiðre ðin gemoeteð alle ða ðe ðe figað ðu setes hie swe swe ofen fyres in tid ondwliotan ðines dryhten in eorre his gedroefeð his & forswilgeð hie fyr god god min geloca in me for hon me forleorte ðu feor from haelu minre word scylda minra god min ic cleopiu ðorh deg ne ðu geheres & on naeht & nales to unwisdome me ðu soðlice in halgum eardas lof in ðe gehyhtan fedras ure gehyhton & ðu gefreodes hie to ðe cleopedon & hale gewordne sind in ðe gehyhton & ne werun gescende ic soðlice eam wyrm & nales mon edwit monna & aworpnes folces alle ða gesegun me herwdun me spreocende werun mid weolerum & hrisedon heafud gehyhteð in dryhten genereð hine halne doe hine for ðon he wile hine for ðon ðu earð ðu atuge me of wombe hyht min from breostum modur minre in ðe aworpen ic eam of innoðe of wombe modur minre god min ðu earð ne gewit ðu from me for ðon geswinc on neoweste is & nis se ðe gefultume dryhten receð me & nowiht me wonu bið in stowe leswe ðer mec gesteaðelade ofer weter gereodnisse aledde mec sawle mine gecerde gelaedde me ofer stige rehtwisnisse fore noman his weotudlice & ðæh ðe ic gonge in midle scuan deaðes ne ondredu ic yfel for ðon ðu mid me erð gerd ðin & cryc ðin hie me froefrende werun ðu gearwades in gesihðe minre biod wið him ða swencað mec ðu faettades in ele heafud min & drync ðinne indrecende swide freaberht is & milheortniss ðin efterfylgeð mec allum degum lifes mines ðæt ic ineardie in huse dryhten in lengu dega dryhten is earðe & fylnis his ymbhwyrft eorðena & alle ða eardiað in hire he ofer seas gesteaðelade hie & ofer flodas gearwað ða hwelc astigeð in munt dryhten oððe hwelc stondeð in stowe ðere halgan his unsceððende on hondum & clænre heortan se ne onfeng in idelnisse sawle his ne he swor in facne ðæm nestan his ðes onfoeð bledsunge from dryhten & mildheortnisse from gode ðæm halwendan his ðis is cneoris soecendra dryhten socendra onsiene godes iacobes onhebbað geatu aldres eowres & bioð upahefene geatu ecelice & ingaeð cyning wuldres hwelc is ðes cyning wuldres dryhten strong & maehtig dryhten maehtig in gefehte onhebbað geatu aldermen eowres & bioð upahefene geatu ecelice & ingaeð cyning wuldres to ðe dryhten ic upahof sawle mine god min in ðe ic getreowu ne scomiu ic ne bismeriað mec feond mine & soðlice alle ða ðe bidað dryhten ne sien gescende sien gescende ða unrehtwisan donde ða idlan wegas ðine dryhten cuðe doo me & stige ðine lær me gerece me in soðfestnisse ðinre & lær me for ðon ðu earð god haelend min & ðe ic arefnde alne deg gemyne mildsa ðinra dryhten & mildheortnis ðin ða from werulde sind scyld guiuðu & unondcyðignisse minre ne ðu gemynes efter miclan mildheortnisse ðinre gemyndig bio ðu min god fore godnisse ðine dryhten swoete & reht dryhten fore ðissum aee gesette gyltendum in wege gereceð ða mildan in dome lereð ða monðweran wegas heara alle wegas dryhten mildheortnis & soðfestnis soecendum cyðnisse his & cyðnisse his doem mec dryhten for ðon ic in unsceðfulnisse minre ingongende ic eam & in dryhten gehyhtende ic ne biom geuntrumad acunna me dryhten & costa me bern eðre mine & heortan mine for ðon mildheortnis ðin biforan egum minum is & ic gelicade in soðfestnisse ðinre ic ne set in geðaehte idelnisse & mid ða unrehtan ðondum ic in ne ga ic fiode gesomnunge awergedra & mid arleasum ic ne sitto ic ðwea betwih alle unsceðende honda mine & ic ymbgaa wibed ðin dryhten ðæt ic geheru stefne lofes ðines & ic asecgu all wvndur ðin dryhten ic lufade wlite huses ðines & stowe getedes wuldres ðines ne forspild ðu mid ðæm arleasum sawle mine & mid weorum bloda lif min in ðeara hondum unrehtwisnisse sindun dryhten inlihtnis mine & haelu min ðone ic ondredo dryhten gescildend lifes mines from dæm ic forhtiu ðonne toneolicað ofer me sceððende ðæt hie eten flæsc min ða ðe me fiond mine hie geuntrumede sind & gefeollun gif gestondað wið me ferdwic ne ondredeð heorte min gif ariseð in me gefeht in ðis ic gehyhtu an ic bed from dryhtne ðas ic soecu ðæt ic ineardie in huse dryhten allum dægum lifes mines ðæt ic gese willan dryhten & ic siem gescilded from tempe ðæm halga for ðon ahydeð me in getelde his in dege ðæra yfla gescilde me in degulnisse geteldes his in stane upahof mec nu soðlice upahof heafud min ofer fiond mine ic ymbgaa & ageldu in getelde his onsegdnisse wynsumnisse ic singu & salm ic cweoð geher dryhten stefne mine mid ðere ic cleopede to de mildsa min & geher mec to ðe dryhten ic cleopiu god min ne swiga ðu from me & ic biom gelic astigendum in seað geher stefne boene minre ðonne ic gebiddu to ðe & ðonne ic uphebbu honda mine to temple halgum ðinum ne somud sele mec mid ðæm synfullum & mid wircendum unrehtwisnisse ne forspild ðu me mid ðissum ða ðe spreocað sibbe mid ðone nestan his yfel soðlice sind in hortum heara sele him efter wercum heara & efter niðum teolunge heara geedleana him agef edlean heara him for ðon hie ne ongetun in werc dryhten & in werc honda his ne sceawiað toweorp hie ne ðu timbres his gebledsad dryhten for ðon geherde stefne boene minre dryhten fultum min & gescildend min & in hine gehyhteð heorte min & gefultumad ic eam & bleow flesc min & of willan minum ic ondetto him tobringað to dryhtne bearn godes tobringað to dryhten bearn romma tobringað to dryhten wuldur & are tobringað to dryhten wuldur noman his wearðiað dryhten in halle ðere halgan his stefn dryhten ofer weter god megendrymmes hleoðrað dreyhten ofer weter micel stefn dryhten in megne stefn dryhten in micelnisse stefn dryhten gebreocendes cederbeamas & gebriceð dryhten cederbeamas ðes muntes & gescæneð hie swe swe caelf & se leofa swe swe sunu anhyrnra stefn dryhten betwihgongendes legfyr stefn dryhten tosaecendes bihygdignisse & onstyreð dryhten woesten stefn dryhten gearwiendes heoretas & biwrah ða ðiccan & in temple his alle cweoðað wuldur dryhten cwildeflod ineardað & siteð dryhten cyning in ecnisse dryhten megen folce his seleð & bledsað folc his in sibbe ic uphebbu ðec dryhten for ðon ðu onfenge me d ne ðu gelustfullades feond mine ofer mec dryhten god min ic cleopade to ðe & ðu gehaeldes mec dryhten ðu atuge from helwearum sawle mine ðu gehaeldes mec from dunestigendum in seað singað dryhten halge his & ondettað gemydde halignisse his for ðon eorre in ebylgðu his & lif in willan his æt efenne wunað wop & to margentide blis ic soðlice ic ceð in minre genyhtsumnisse ne biom onstyred in ecnisse dryhten in godum willan ðinum ðu gearwades wlite minum megen ðu forcerdes onsiene ðine from me & geworden ic eam gedroefed to ðe dryhten ic cleopiu & to gode minum ic biddu hwelc nyttnis in blode mine ðonne ic astigo in gebrosnunge ah ondetteð ðe dust oððe seged soðfestnisse ðine in ðe dryhten ic gehyhte ne biom ic gescended in ecnisse in ðire rehtwisnisse gefrea me & genere me onhaeld to me eare ðin hreaða ðæt ðu generge mec bia ðu me in god gescildend & in stowe geberges ðæt halne mec ðu gedoe for ðon trymenis min & geberg min ðu earð & fore noman ðinum ladtow me ðu bist & foedes me & utaledes mec of gerene ðisse ða gedegladon mec for ðon ðu earð gescildend min dryhten in honda ðine ic bibiodu gast minne ðu alesdes mec dryhten god soðfestnisse ðu fiodes haldend idelnisse idellice ic soðlice in dryhten ic gehyhtu ic gefie & blisie in ðinre mildheortnisse for ðon gelocades eaðmodnisse mine hale ðu dydes of nedðearfnissum sawle mine ne biluce me in honda feondes ðu gesettes in stowe rumre foet mine mildsa me dryhten for ðon ic biom geswenced eadge ðeara forletne sind unrehtwisnisse & ðeara biwrigen sind synne eadig wer ðæm ne geteleð dryhten synne ne is in muðe his facen for ðon ic swigade aldadon all ban min mid ðy ic cleapade alne deg for ðon deges & naehtes gehefegad is ofer me hond ðin gecerred ic eam in ermðu ðonne bið gebrocen ðorn scyld min cuðe ðe ic dyde & unrehtwisnisse mine ic ne oferwrah ic cweð ic forðsegcgo wið me unrehtwisnisse mine from dryhten & ðu geedleanedes arleasnisse heortan minre fore ðissum gebideð to ðe all halig in tid geliplice hweðre soðlice in cwildeflode wetra micelra to him to ne geneolaecað ðu me earð geberg from ferðrycednisse sie ymbseled salde me wynsumnis min ales mec from ymbsellendum me ondget ic sellu ðe & getimbru ðe in wege ðissum ðæm ðu ingæst ic getrymmu ofer ðe egan min gefioð rehtwise in dryhten rehtwise gedeofenað efenherenis ondettað dryhten in citra in hearpan ten strenga singað him singað him song neowne wel singað in wynsumnisse for ðon reht is word dryhten & all werc his in geleafan lufað mildheortnisse & dom mildheortnisse dryhten ful is eorðe worde dryhten heofenas getrymede sind & gaste muðes his all megen heara gesomnende swe swe in cylle weter sæs settende in goldhordum neolnisse ondrede dryhten all eorðe from him soðlice bioð onstyred alle & alle ða eardiað ymbhwyrst for ðon he cweð & werun geworden hie et & gecwicad werun dryhten tostenceð geðæht ðieda wiðceoseð soðlice geðohtas folca & wiðceoseð geðaeht aldermonna ic bledsiu dryhten in alle tid aa lof his in muðe minum in dryhtne bið hered sawul min geheren ða monðueran & blissien micliað dryhten mid me & uphebbað we noman his betwinum ic sohte dryhten & he geherde me & of allum geswencednissum minum generede me togenehlaecað to him & bioð inlihte & ondwleotan eowre ne scomien ðes ðearfa cleopede & dryhten geherde hine & of allum geswencednissum his gefriode hine insende engel dryhten in ymbhwyrfte ondredendra hine & genereð hie bergað & gesiað ðætte wynsum is dryhten eadig wer se gehyhteð in hine ondredað dryhten alle halge his for ðon nowiht wonu bið ðæm ondredendum hine doem dryhten ða sceððendan me oferfeht ða onfehtendan mec gegrip wepen & sceld & aris in fultum me ageot sweord & biluc wið him ða ðe me oehtað cweð to sawle minre hælu ðin ic eam sien gescilde & onscunien feond mine ða soecað sawle mine sien forcerred on bec & scomien ða ðencað me yfel sien swe swe dus biforan onsiene windes & engel dryhten swencende hie sien wegas heara ðeostre & glidd & ængel dryhten oehtende his for ðon bi ungewyrhtum ahyddon me forwyrd girene heara idellice edwittun sawle mine cyme him giren ða hie neoton & geheftednis ða gedegladon gegripeð hie in girene ingefallen hie in ðæt ilce cweð se unrehtwisa ðætte in him seolfum nis ege godes biforan egum his for ðon faccenlice dyde in gesihðe his ðæt gemoette unrehtwisnisse his & laeðu word muðes his unrehtwisse & facen nalde ongeotan ðæt wel dyde unrehtwisnisse smegende is in bedcleofan his ætstod allum wege noht gode hete soðlice ne fiede dryhten in heofene mildheortnis ðin & soðfestnis ðin oð wolcen rehtwisnis ðin swe swe muntas godes domas ðine niolnis micelu men & neat hale ðu does dryhten to ðæm gemete gemonigfaldade mildheortnisse ðine god bearn soðlice monna in gescildnisse fiðra ðinra gehyhtað bioð geindrencte from breostum huses ðines & burnan willan ðines drences hie for ðon mid ðe is waelle lifes & in lehte ðinum we gesiað leht nyl ðu elnian betwih awergde ne elnende ðu sie donde unrehtwisnisse for ðon swe swe heg hreðlice adrugiað & swe swe leaf wyrta hreðe fallað gehyht in dryhten & doa godnisse & inearda eorðan & ðu bist foeded in weolum hire gelustfulla in dryhten & seleð ðe boene heortan ðinre onwrih dryhtne wig ðinne & gehyht in hine & he doeð & utaledeð swe swe leht rehtwisnisse ðine & dom ðinne swe on midne deg underðioded bio ðu dryhten & halsa hine ne elnende ðu sie hine se bið gesundfullad in wege his in men dondum unrehtwisnisse blin from eorre & forlet hatheortnisse ne elna ðu þætte nohtlice ðu doe for ðon ða nohtlice doð biað abreotte ða soðlice abidað dryhten he erfewordnisse gesittað eorðan dryhten nales in eorre ðinum ðrea me n in hatheortnisse ðinre geðrea mec for ðon strele ðine gefestnade sind me & getrymedes ofer mec hond ðine ne is haelu in flesce minum fro ondwleatan eorres ðines nis sib banum minum from onsiene synna minra for ðon unrehtwisnisse mine ofergesetton heafud min swe swe byrðen hefig gehefegade sind ofer mec fuladun & wyrsadon wundsweðe mine from onsiene unwisdomes mines ermðum geswenced ic eam & gedroefed ic eam oð in ende alne deg geunrotsad ic ineode for ðon sawul min gefylled is bismernissum & ne wes haelu in flaesce minum gebeged ic eam & gehened ic eam a hu lenge swiðu ic grymetede from geamrunge heortan minre & biforan ðe is all lust min & gemrung min from ðe nis ahyded heorte min gedroefed is in me & forleort mec strengu min & leht egena minra nis mid me ic cweð ic haldu wegas mine ðet ic ne agylte in tungan minre ic sette muðe minum gehaeld ðonne gestondeð se synfulla wið me ic adumbade & geeaðmodad ic eam & ic swigade from godum & sar min geedneowad is hatade heorte min binnan me & in smeange minre born fyr spreocende ic eam in tungan minre cuð me doa dryhten ende minne & rim dæga minra hwelc is ðæt ic wite hwet wone sie me sehðe alde ðu settes degas mine & spoede mine swe swe nowiht biforan ðe bið ah hweðre al idelnis ylc mon lifgende ðaeh ðe in onlicnisse godes gonge mon hweðre idellice bið gedroefed goldhordað & nat hwæm gesomnað ða & nu hwet is bad min ah ne dryhten & sie spoed min biforan ðe is from allum unrehtwisnissum minum genere mec edwit ðæm unwisan ðu saldes mec bidende ic abad dryhten & gelocade mec & geherde boene mine & utalaedde mec of seaðe ermða & of lame derstan & sette ofer stan foet mine & gerec hte gongas mine & insende in muð minne song niowne ymen gode urum gesioð monge & ondredað & gehyhtað in dryhten eadig wer ðes is noma dryhten hyht his & ne gelocað in idelnisse & in woedenheortnisse lease feolu ðu dydes ðu dryhten god min wundur ðin & geðohtum ðinum nis hwelc gelic ðe ic segde & spreocende ic eam gemonigfaldade sind ofer rim onsegdnisse & onsegdnisse naldes ðu lichoman soðlice ðu gefremedes me onsegdnisse ec swelce fore scylde ðu ne bede ða ic cweð sehðe ic cumu in heafde boec awriten is bi me ðæt ic doe willan ðinne god min ic walde & ae ðine in midle heortan minre wel ic segde rehtwisnisse ðine in cirican micelre sehðe weolure mine ic ne biwergu eadig se ongiteð ofer weðlan & ðearfan in dege yflum gefreað hine dryhten feond mine cwedon yfel me hwonne swilteð & forweorðeð noma his & inneodan ðæt hie gesegen ða idlan spreocende wes heorte heara gesomnadon unreht him & uteodon ut & werun spreocende somud in anisse hyspton alle feond mine wið me me ðohton yfel me word unreht onbudun wið me ah se hneapað to ne geeceð þæt arise & soðlice mon sibbe minre in ðæm ic gehyhte se ðe et hlafas mine gemonigfaldade wið me gescrencednisse swe swe heorut gewillað to waellum wetra swe gewillað sawul min to ðe god ðyrsteð sawul min to gode ðæm lifgendan hwonne ic cyme & oteawe biforan onsien godes werun me tearas mine hlafas deges & naehtes ðonne bið cweden to me deghwæmlice hwer is god ðin ðas gemyndig ic eam & ageat in me sawle mine for ðon ic inga in stowe geteldes wundurlic oð godes hus godes in stefne wynsumnisse & ondetnisse swoeg symbliendes for hwon unrot earðu sawul min & for hon gedroefdes ðu me gehyht in gode for ðon ic ondetto him haelu ondwlitan minis & god min from me seolfum sawul min gedroefed is for ðon gemyndig ic biom ðin ðryhten of eorðan & from munte ðæm lytlan niolnis niolnisse geceð in stefne ðeotena ðinra all ða hean ðin & yðe ðine ofer mec leordun in dege onbead dryhten mildheortnisse his & on naeht gebirhte mid mec gebe gode mines lifes ic cweoðu gode ondfenga min ðu earð doem mec god & toscad intingan minne of ðeode noht haligre from men unrehtum & facnum genere me for ðon ðu earð god min & strengu min for hwon me on weg adrife ðu & for hwon unrot ic inga ðonne swenceð mec se feond onsend leht ðin & soðfestnisse ðine hie mec gelaedon & togelaeddon in munte ðæm halgan ðinum & in getelde ðinum ic ingaa to wibede godes to gode se geblissað iuguðe mine ic ondetto ðe in citran god god min for hwon unrot earðu sawul min & for hwon gedroefes me gehyht in god for ðon ic ondettu him haelu ondwleotan mines & god min god mid earum urum we geherdun & fedras ure segdun us werc ðæt wircende ðu earð in dægum heara & in dægum ðæm alldum honda ðine ðeode tostenceð & ðu geplantades hie ðu swentes folc & on weg adrife hie nales soðlice in sweorde his gesittad eorðan & earm heara ne gehæleð hie ah sie swiðre ðin & earm ðin & inlihtnis ondwleotan ðines for ðon gelicade ðe in him ðu earð se ilca cyning min & god min ðu onbude haelu in ðe fiond ure we windwiað & in noman ðinum we forhycgað arisende in us nales soðlice in bogan minum ic gehyhto & sweord min ne gehaeleð me ðu gefreades soðlice usic of ðæm swencendum usic & ða ða usic fiedon ðu gesteaðelaðes roccetteð heorte min word god ic cweoðu ic werc min cyninge tunge min hreod writ hreðlice writendes wlitig on hiowe fore bearnum mona togoten is geofu in weolerum ðinum for ðon bledsade ðe god in ecnisse begyrd sweord ðin ym lendan ða maehtgestan heow ðin & fegernisse ðine behald gesundfullice forðgaa & ricsa fore soðfestnisse & monðwernisse & rechtwisnisse & gelaedeð ðec wundurlice sie swiðre ðin strele ðine scearpe ða maehtgestan folc under ðe fallað in heortan fionda cyninges seld ðin god in weoruld weorulde gerd reht is ger rices ðines ðu lufedes rehtwisnisse & feodes unrehtwisnisse for ðon smirede ðec god god ðin mid ele blisse fore gefoerraedennum ðinum god ur geberg & megen fultum in geswencednissum ða gemoetun usic swiðe for ðon we ne ondredað ðonne bið gedroed eorðe & bioð forcerred muntas in heortan sæs hleoðradan & gedroefde werun weter his gedroefde werun muntas in fyrhtu his flodes onraes geblissað cestre godes gehalgað geteld his se hesta god in midle his ne bið onstyred gefultumeð hie god mid ondwleatan his gedroefde sin ðeade & onhaelde sind rice salde stefne his se hesta & onstyred is eorðe dryhten megna mid us ondfenga ur god cumað & gesiað werc dryhten ða sette tacen ofer earðan afirrende gefeht oð oð endas eorðan bogan forþreste & gebriceð wepen & sceldas forberneð fyr aemetgiað & gesiað for ðon ic eam dryhten ic biom upahefen in ðiodum alle ðiode plagiað mid hondum wynsumiað gode in stefne wynsumnisse for ðon god heh egesful cyning micel ofer alle godas underðeodde folc us & ðiode under fotum urum geceas usic in erfe him hiow ðæt he luade astag god in wynsumnisse & dryhten in stefne beman singað gode urum singað singað cyninge urum singað for ðon cyning alre eorðan god singað snotterlice ricsað dryhten ofer alle ðeode god siteð ofer seld halig his aldermen folces gesomnadon mid gode abrahames for ðon godas stronge eordan swiðe upahefen werun micel dryhten & hergedlic swiðe in cestre godes ures in munte ðæm hagan him gebradende wynsumnisse alre eorðan se munt sion on sidan noðdaeles cestre cyninges ðes miclan god in gradum hire bið oncnawen ðonne onfoeht hie for ðon sehðe cyningas eorðan gesomnade sind & gesomnadum in annisse hie gesiende ða wundriende sindun gedroefde sindun & onstyrede sind cwaecung bifeng hie ðer sar swe cennende in gaste strongum forðrestende sceopu ðes londes swe we geherdun swe & gesegun in cestre dryhten megna in cestre godes ures god gesteaðelade ða in ecnisse we onfengun god mildheortnisse ðine in midle temples ðines efter noman ðinum god swe & lof ðin in endas eorðan rehtwisnisse ful is sie swiðre ðin geherað ðas alle ðeode mid earum onfoð ða ðe eardiað ymbhwyrf gehwelce eorðcende & bearn monna somud in annesse weolig & ðearfa muð min spriceð snytru & smeang heortan minre gleawnisse ic onhaeldu to gelicnisse eare min ic ontynu in hearpan foresetenisse mine to hwon ondredu ic in dege ðæm yflan unrehtwisnis helspuran minre ymbseleþ me ða ðe getreowað in megne heara & ða in genyhtsumnisse weolena heara bioð gewuldrade broður ne aleseð aleseð mon ne seleð gode geðinge his ne weorð alesnisse sawle his & won in ecnisse & leofað in ende for ðon ne gesið forwyrd ðonne he gesið snotre sweltende somud se unwisa & se ðysga forweorðað & forletað fremðum weolan heara & byrgenne heara hus heara in ecnisse god goda dryhten spreocende wes & cede eorðan from sunnan upcyme oð setgong of sione hiow wlites his god sweotullice cymeð god ur & ne swigað fyr in gesihðe his beorneð & in ymbhwyrfte his d storm strong togeceð heofen up & eorðan ðæt he toscade folc his gesomniað ðider halge his ða geendebyrdun cyðnisse his ofer onsegdnisse & secgað heofenas rehtwisnisse his for ðon god doema is geher folc min & sprecu to israhela folce & ic cyðu ðe ðætte god god ðin ic eam nales ofer onsegdnisse ðine ic dregu ðe onsegdnisse soð ðine in gesihðe minre sind aa mildsa min god efter ðere miclan mildheortnisse ðinre & efter mengu mildsa ðinra adilga unrehtwisnisse mine mae aðuaeh mec from unrehtwisnisse minre & from scylde minre geclasna mec for ðon unrehtwisnisse mine ic oncnawu & scyld min biforan me is aa ðe anum ic synngade & yfel biforan ðe dyde ðæt ðu sie gerehtwisad in worðum ðinum & ðu wrices ðonne ðu ðoemes sehðe soð in unrehtwisnissum geecnad ic eam & in scyldum cende mec modur min sehðe soð soðfestnisse ðu lufades ða uncuðan & ða deglan syntru ðinre ðu gesweotulades me ðu onstrigdes mec mid ysopan & ic biom geclasnad ðu ðwes mec & ofer snaw ic biom gehwitad gehernisse minre ðu seles gefian & blisse & gefiað ban ða geeðmodedan hwet wuldras ðu in hete ðu maehtig earð in unrehtwisnisse alne deg unrehtwisnisse ðohte tunge ðin swe swe scersaex scearp ðu dydes facen ðu lufedes hete ofer freamsumnisse unrehtwisnisse mae ðon spreocan rehtwisnisse ðu lufades all word fortrugadnisse in tungan faecenre for ðon toweorpeð ðe god in ende utaluceð ðe & utaleoreð ðe of getelde ðinum & wyrtruman ðinne of eorðan lifgendra gesiað rehtwise & ondredað & ofer hine hlæhað & cweoðað sehðe mon se ne sette god fultum him ah gehyte in mengu weolena heara & strongað in idelnisse his ic soðlice swe eletreow westembere in huse dryhten ic gehyhte in mildheortnisse godes mines in ecnisse & in weoruld weorulde ic ondettu ðe dryhten in weoruld ðone ðu dydes & ic bidu noman ðinne for ðon god is biforan gesihðe haligra ðinra cweð se unwisa in heortan his nis god gewemde sind & onscuniendlice gewordne sind in lustum hea nis se ðe doe god nis oð enne dryhten of heofene forðlocade ofer bearn monna ðæt he gese hweðer sie ongeotende oððe soecende god alle onhaeldun somud un gewordne werun nis se doe god nis oð enne ah ne oncnawað alle ða wircað unrehtwisnisse ða forswelgað folc meam swe swe mete hlafes god ne gecedun ðer forhtadun ege ðer ne wes ege for ðon god tostenceð ban monna him liciendra gedroefde sind for ðon god forhogde hie hwelc seleð of sione haelu ðonne he forcerred dryhten heftned folces his gefið iacob & bið geblissad is god in noman ðinum halne mec doa & in megne ðinum gefrea mec god geher gebed min mid earum onfoh word muðes mines for ðon ða fremðan areosun in mec & ða strongan sohtun sawle mine & no foresettun god biforan gesihðe heara sehðe soðlice god gefultumeð mec & dryhten ondfenga is sawle minre acer yfel feondum minum & in soðfestnisse ðinre tostregd hie wilsumlice ic onsecg ðe & ondetto noman ðinum dryhten for ðon god he is for ðon of alre geswencednisse ðu generedes mec & ofer feond mine gelocade ege ðin geher god gebed min & ne forseh ðu boene mine bihald in mec & geher mec geunrotsad ic eam in bigonge minum & gedroefed ic eam from stefne feondes & from geswencednisse ðes synfvllan for ðon onhældon in mec unrehtwisnisse & in eorre hefie werun me heorte min gedroefed is in me & fyrhtu deaðes gefeol ofer mec ege & cwaecung cwomun ofer mec & biðehton mec ðeostro & cweð hwelc seleð me fiðru swe swe culfran & ic fligu & gerestu sehðe ic afeorrade fleonde & ic wunade in woestenne ic bad hine se mec halne dyde from lytelmodum & storme forbregd dryhten & todael tungan heara for ðon ic gesæh unrehtwisnisse & wiðcwedenisse in cestre deges & nehtes ymbseleð hie ofer wallas his unrehtwisnis & gewin in midle his & unrehtwisnis mildsa me dryhten for ðon fortred me mon alne deg fehtende swencton mec fortredon mec feond mine alne dig from heanisse deges for ðon monge ða oferfehtað mec ondredað ic soð in ðec gehyhto dryhten in gode ic hergu word min alne dæg in gode ic gehyhto ne ondredu ic hwet doe me mon alne deg word min onscunedon wið me all geðaeht heara in yfel ineardiað & ahydað hie helspuran mine haldað swe bad sawulf min fore nowihte hale ðu gedoest hie in eorre folc ðu gebrices god lif min ic segde ðe ic sette tearas mine in gesihðe ðinre swe in gehate ðinum sien gecerde feond mine on bec on swe hwelcum dege ic geceigo ðec sehðe ic oncneow for ðon god min ðu earð in gode ic hergu wordum & in dryhten ic hergu word in gode ic gehyhtu ne ondredo ic hwet doe me monn mildsa min god mildsa min for ðon in ðe getreoweð sawul min & in scuan fiðra ðinra ic gehyhto oð ðet leoreð unrehtwisnis ic cleopiu to dryhten ðæm hestan & to dryhtne se wel dyde me sende of heofene & gefreode mec salde in edwit fortreodendes mec sende god mildheortnisse his & soðfestnisse his generede sawle mine of midle hwelpa leona ic hneappade gedroefed bearn monna toðas heara wepen & strelas & tunge heara mece scearp hefe up ofer heofenas god & ofer alle eorðan wuldur ðin girene gearwadon fotum minum & gebegdon sawle mine dulfun biforan onsiene minre seað & hie gefeollun in ðone gearu heorte min god gearu heorte min ic singu & salm icweoðu dryhten gif soðlice gewislice rehtwisnisse spreocað ða rehtan doemað bearnum monna & soðlice in heortan unrehtwisnisse wircað in eorðan unrehtwisnisse honda eowre hleoðriað afremðae sind ða synfullan from innoðe dwoledon from wombe spreocende sind ða leasan eorre him efter gelicnisse nedran swe nedran deafe & forduttænde earan hire sie ne gehered stefne galendra & galdurcreftas ða bioð agalæne from ðæm snottran god forþresteð toð heara in mude heara wongtoeð leona gebriceð dryhten to nowihte bicumad swe swe weter eornende bihaldeð bogan his oð ðet sien geuntrumad swe sw wæx gemælted bioð afirde ofer hie gefeol fyr & hie ne gesegun sunnan ær ðon forðgelaeden ðornas eowre twigu swe swe lifgende swe in eorre forswilgeð hie bið geblissad se rehtwisa ðonne he gesið wrece ðeara arleasra honda his ðweð in blode synfulra genere mec of feondum minum god min & from ðæm arisendum in mec gefrea mec genere of ðæm wircendum unrehtwisnisse & of weorum bloda hæl mec for ðon sehðe ofersetun sawle mine onræsdun in mec stronge nurehtwisnis min ne syn min ðryhten butan unrehtwisnisse ic orn & wes gereht aris on gegnyrn me & geseh & ðu dryhten god megna god israhel bihald to niosenne alle deode ðu ne mildsas allum ða wircað unrehtwisnisse sien forcerrede to efenne & hungur ðrowien swe swe hundas & ymbgad cestre sehðe hie spreocað in muðe his & sweord is in weolerum heara for ðon hwelc geherde & ðu dryhten bismeras hie fore nowiht ðu hafast alle ðeode strengo mine to ðe ic halde for ðon ðu god ondfenga min earð god min mildheortnis his forecymeð mec god ðu on weg adrife usic & towurpe usic eorre earð & mildsende earð us ðu onstyredes eorðan & gedrofdes hie gehael forðrastnisse his for ðon onstyred is ðu oteawdes folce ðinum ðe heardan ðu drentes usic mid wine onbryrdnisse ðu saldes ðæm ondredendum ðec getacnunge ðæt hie flugen from onsiene bogan & sien gefriad ða gecorenan ðine halne mec doo mid ðinre dere swiðran & geher mec god spreocende is in ðæm halgan his ic biom geblissað & todelu & gemære getelda ic meotu min is & min is is & strengu heafdes mines cyning min hwer hyhtes mines ic aðennu gescoe min me sindun underðeoded hwelc gelaedeð mec in cestre getrymede oððe hwelc gelaeded mec oð idumeam ah ne ðu god ðu on weg adrife usic & ðu ut ne gæst god in megnum urum geher god boene mine bihald to gebede minum from gemærum eorðan to ðe ic cleopede ðonne bið generwed heorte min in stane ðu uphofe mec ðu gelaedes mec for ðon geworden ðu earð hyht min tor strengu from onsiene feondes ic ineardiu in getelde ðinum in weoruld ic sion gescilded in wrigelse fiðra ðinra for ðon ðu god geherdes gebed min ðu saldes erfewordnisse ðæm ondredendum noman ðinne deg ofer degas cyninges ðu togeeces ger his oð in deg weorulde & weoruld ðorhwunað in ecnisse in gesihðe godes mildheortnisse & soðfestnisse hwelc soeceð heara swe ic singu noman ðinum god in weoruld weorulde ðaet ic agefe gehat min of dege in deg ah ne gode underdeoded sawul min from him soðlice haelu minre & soðlice he is god min & se halwynda min fultum min ne biom ic onstyred mae hu longe onraesað ge on men ofsleað alle swe swe walle onhaeldum & stanwalle oncnysede ah hweðre are mine ðohtun on weg adrifan ic orn in ðurst his mudes bledsadon & heortan heara wergcweodon ah hweðre gode underðioded bid sawul min for ðon from him is gedyld min & soðlice he is god min & se halwynda min fultum min ic ne leoru in gode ðæm halwyndan minum & wuldur min god fultumes mines hyht min in gode is gehyhtað in hine all gemoeting folces ageotað biforan him heortan eowre for ðon god fultum ur is ah hweðre bearnum monna lease bearn monna in wegum ðæt hie biswicen hie of idelnesse in ðæt ilce god god min to ðe of lehte ic waecio ðyrsteð in ðe sawul min swiðe monigfaldlice & flesc min in woestenne & in ðæm ungefoernan & in wetrigre stowe swe in ðæm halgan ic oteawde ðe þæt ic gesege megen ðin & wuldur ðin for ðon betra is mildheortnis ðin ofer lif weolere mine hergað ðec swe ic bledsie ðec in life minum & in noman ðinum ic uphebbu honda mine swe swe mid smeorwe & faetnisse sie gefylled sawul min & weolure wynsumnisse hergað noman ðinne gif gemyndig ic wes ðin ofer strene mine in margentid ic smegu in ðe for ðon geworden ðu earð fultum min & in wrigelse fiðra ðinra ic gefie ætfalh sawul min efter ðe mec onfeng sie swiðre ðin hie soðlice in idelnisse sohtun sawle mine ingað in ða nioðerran eorðan sien sald in hond sweordes daelas foxa bioð geher god gebed min ðonne geswenced from ege feondes genere sawle mine ðu gescildes mec from gesomnunge awergedra from mengu wircendra unreht for ðon ascerptun swe swe sweord tungan heara aðenedun bogan wisan bitre ðæt hie scoteden in degelnisse ðone unwemman feringa scotedun hine & ne ondreordun trymedun him word yfel fleotun ðæt hie ahydden girene cwedun hwelc gesiþ hie smegende werun unrehtwisnisse asprungun smegende mid smeaunge togeneolaeced mon to heortan heran & bið upahefen god strelas cilda gewordne sind witu heara & fore nowihte hefdun wið him tungan heara gedroefde sind alle ða ðe gesegun hie & ondreord oghwelc mon & segdun werc godes & dede his ongetun bið geblissad se rehtwisa in dryhtne & gehyhteð in hine & bioð herede alle ða rehtwisan on heortan ðe gedeafenað ymen god & ðe bið agefen gehat geher gebed min to ðe oeghwelc flæsc cymeð word unrehtwisra strongadun ofer us & arleasnissum urum ðu gemilsas eadig ðone ðu gecure & genome he ineardað in geteldum ðinnum we bioð gefylde in godum hyses ðines halig is tempel din wundurlic in rehtwisnisse geher usic god se halwynda ur hyht alra gemæra eorðan & in sae feor gearwiende muntas in mægne ðinum bigyrded mid maehte ðu gedroefes grund sæs swoeg yða his hwelc arefneð bioð gedroefde ðiode & ondredað alle ða ðe eardiað endas eorðan from tacnum ðinum utgong margentide & on efenne ðu bist gelustfullad ðu niosades eorðan & ðu indrenctes hie ðu gemonigfalddes geweolgian hie wynsumiað gode all eorðe salm cweoðað noman his sellað wuldur lofe his cweoðad gode hu egesfulle sind werc ðin in mengu megnes ðines legað ðe feond ðine all eorðe weorðað ðec & singeð ðe salm cwið noman ðinum ðu hesta cymað & gesiað werc dryhten hu egesful in geðæhtum ofer bearn monna se gecerreð sae in dryge & flodas ðorhleoreð mid foet ðer we bioð geblissade in ðæt ilce se waldeð in megne his in ecnisse egan his ofer ðiode gelociað ða in eorre gegremedon ne sien upahefen in him seolfum bledsiað ðiode god urne & hersumiað stefne lofes his se sette sawle mine to life & ne salde onstyrgan foet mine for ðon ðu acunnades usic god mid fyre usic amearedes swe mid fyre bið amearad seolfur god gemildsie us & bledsie usic inlihte ondwliotan his ofer usic & gemilsie us ðæt we oncnawen in eorðan weg ðinne in allum ðiodum haelu ðin ondettigen ðe folc god ondettien ðe folc all blissien & gefen ðiode for ðon ðu doemest folc in rehtwisnisse & ðiode in eorðan ðu gereces ondettie ðe folc god ondettie ðe folc all eorðe salde westem his bledsie usic god god ur & bledsie usic god & ondreden hine alle endas eorðan arise god & sien tostrogdne feond his & flen from onsiene his ða fiodun hine swe asprong rec hie aspringen swe floweð wex from onsiene fyres swe forweorðen ða synfullan from onsiene godes & ða rehtwisan symbliað gefen in gesihðe goðes sien gelustfullade in blisse singað gode salm cweodað noman his siðfet dood him se astag ofer setgong dryhten noma is him gefiað in gesihðe his bioð gedroefde from onsiene his fedras stepcilda & doeman widwena god in stowe ðere halgan his god se eardian doeð anmodde in huse se utaledeð gebundne in strengu gelice & ða ða in eorre gegremmað ða eardiað in byrgennum god mit te ðu utgæst biforan folce ðinum ðonne ðu ofergæst ðorh woesten eorðe onstyred is & soðlice heofenas dreapedun from onsiene godes munt from onsiene godes halne mec doa god for ðon ineodun weter oð sawle mine gefestnad ic eam in lam grundes & nis spoed cym in heanisse saes & storm bisencte mec ic won cleopiende hase gewordne werun goman mine asprungun egan mine ðonne ic gehyhtu in god minne gemonigfaldade sindun ofer loccas heafdes mines ða fiodun mec bi ungewyrhtum gestrongade sind ofer mec ða mec oehtað feond mine unrehtwislice ða ic ne reafade ða ic onlesde god ðu wast unwisdom minne & scylde mine from ðe ne sind ahydde ne scomiað in mec ða ðe ðec bidað dryhten god megna ne onscunien ofer mec ða ðe soecað ðe god for ðon fore ðe ic aber edwit oferwrah mid scome onsiene mine fremðe geworden ic eam broðrum minum & cuma bearnum moeder minre for ðon hatheortnisse huses ðines iteð mec & edwit edwitendra ðe gefeollun ofer mec god in fultu minne bihald dryhten to gefultumiende me oefesta sien gescende & onscunien fiond mine ða ðe soecað sawle mine sien forcerde on bec & scomien ða ðe me yfel sien forcerred sona & scomiende ða ðe cweoðað me weolga weolga gefen & blissien ða ðe soecað ðæc dryhten & cweðen aa sie gemiclad dryhten ða ðe lufiað haelu ðine ic soðlice weðla & ðearfa ic eam god gefultume me fultum min & alesend min ðu earð dryhten ne leata ðu god in ðe ic gehyhte dryhten ic ne sie gescendad in ecnisse in ðinre rehtwisnisse gefrea mec & genere mec onhaeld to me eare ðin & gefrea mec bio ðu me in god gescildend & in stowe getrymede ðætte halne mec gedoe for ðon trymenis min & geberg min ðu earð god min genere mec of honda ðes synfullan & of honda wið ee dondes & unrehtlice for ðon ðu earð geðyld min dryhten hyht min from guguðe minre in ðec getrymed ic eam of innoðe of wombe modur minre ðu earð min gescildend in ðec song min aa swe swe forebecen geworden ic eam mongum & ðu fultum strong sie gefylled min muð lof ðin ðæt ic mege singan wuldur ðin alne deg micelnisse ðine ne aweorp ðu mec in tid aeldu ðonne aspringeð megen min ne forlet ðu mec for ðon cwedun feond mine yfel me & ða ðe heoldun sawle mine geðeht dydun in annisse god dom ðinne cyninge sele & rehtwisnisse ðine suna cyninges doem folc ðin in ðinre rehtwisnisse & ðearfan ðine in dome onfoen muntas sibbe folce ðinum & hyllas rehtwisnisse in his rehtwisnis doemeð ðearfan ðisses folces & hale gedoeð bern ðearfena & geeaðmodað hearmcweoðendra & ðorhwunað mid sunnan & ær monan in weoruld weorulde & astag swe swe regn in fleos & swe swe dreapung dropetende ofer eorðan upeorneð in dægum his rehtwisnis & genyhtsumnis sibbe oð ðæt were upahefen mona & waldeð from sae oð sae & from flode oð gemæru ymbhwyrftes eorðan biforan him forðgað sigelhearwan & feond his eorðan liciað swiðe god god israela ðissum ða ðe rehtre sind heortan min soðlice fulneh onstyrede sind foet fulneh agotene sind gongas mine for ðon ic elnade in ðæm synfullum sibbe synfulra gesiende for ðon nis onheldednis deaðe heara ne trymenis in wite heara in gewinnum monna ne sind & mid monnum ne bið swungne for ðon nom hie oferhygd heara oferwrigene sind mid unrehtwisnisse & arleas his forðyppeð swe swe of smeorwe unrehtwisnis heara leordun in geflite heortan ðohtun & spreocende werun niðas unrehtwisnisse in heanisse spreocende werun settun in heofene mud heara & tunge heara leorde ofer eorðan for ðon cerreð hider folc min & degas fulle bioð gemoeted in him & cwedun hu wat god & gif is wisdom in heanisse to hwon on weg adrife ðu us god in ende eorre is hatheortnis ðin ofer scep eowde ðinre gemyne gesomnunge ðinre ða ðu gescope from fruman ðu gefreades gerd erfes ðines munt sion in ðæm eardas in ðon ilcan ahefe hond ðine in oferhygde heara in ende hu feolu wergende wes se feond in halgum ðinum & gewuldrade sind ða ðe fiedon in midle ceafurtunes ðines settun tacen heara tacen & ne oncneowun swe swe in wege ofer ða hean swe swe in wuda trea mid ecesum curfun dura his in ðæt ilce twibille & eadesan awurpun ða forberndun mid fyre halig portic ðin in eorðan bismeoton geteld noman ðines cwedun in heortan heara cneoris heara betwih hie cumað forðryccen we alle daegas symbellice dryhten from earðan tacen ur we ne gesegun soðlice nis witga & usic ne oncnaweð me we ondettað ðe god we ondettað ðe & gecegað noman ðinne ic secgo all wundur ðin ðonne ic onfo tid ic rehtwisnisse ic doemu gemaelted is eorðe & alle ineardiende in ðere ic getrymede syle his ic cweð to ðæm unrehtwisum nyllað unrehtlice don & ðæm agyltendum nyllað uphebban horn & nyllað spreocan wið gode unrehtwisnisse for ðon ne from eastdele ne from westdæle ne from woestum muntum for ðon god doema is ðeosne geheneð & ðeosne uphefeð for ðon calic in honda dryhten scires wines ful is gemenged & onhaeldeð of ðissum in ðis ah hweðre derstan drosne his nis amællad drincað of ðæm alle synfulle eorðan ic soðlice in weorulde gefio singu gode iacobes cuð in iudea god in israela folce micel noma his & geworden is in sibbe stow his & eardung his ðer gebrec hornas bogan sceld sweord & gefeht inlihtes ðu wundurlice from muntum ecum gedrefde sind alle unwise on heortan hneapedun slep heara & nowiht gemoettun alle weoras weolena in hondum heara from dreange ðinre god iacobes hneapedon ða asteogun hors ðu egesful earð & hwelc wiðstondeð ðe nu seoþan from eorre ðinum of heofene dom scotad is eorðe cwecede & gestilde ða ðe aras in dome god ðætte hale gedyde alle stille eorðan for ðon geðoht monnes ondetteð ðe & lafe geþohta symbeldeg ðoð ðe gehatað & ageofað dryhten gode eowrum alle ða ðe in ymbhwyrfte his sind ofriað gefe ðæm egesfullan & ðæm se afirreð gast aldermonna ðæm egesfullan mid cyningum eorðan mid stefne minre to dryhten ic cleopede stefn min to dryhten & behaldeð me in dege geswencednisse minre god ic sohte hondum minum on naeht biforan him & ic neam biswicen ic wiðsoc frofran sawle mine gemyndig ic wes godes & gelustfullad ic eam bigongen ic eam & asprong hwon gast min forefengun waecene egan min gedroefed ic eam & ne a & smegende ic eam on naeht mid heortan minre ic bieode & windwade in me gast minne & ic cweð ah in ecnisse aweorpeð god oððe no toseteð ðæt wel gelicad sie nu get oððe in ende mildheortnisse his acearf from weorulde & cneorisse ah ofergeotelað mildsian god oððe bihafað in eorre mildheortnisse his & ic cweð nu ic ongon ðeos onwendednis swiðran ðes hean gemyndig ic wes werca dryhten for ðon gemyndig ic biom from fruman wundra ðinra bihaldað folc min ae mine onhaeldað eare eower in word muðes mines ic ontynu in bispellum muð minne ic spreocu foresetenisse from fruman weorulde hu fiolu we geherdun & oncneowun ða & fedras ure segdun us ne sind gedeglad from bearnum in cneorisse oðerre secgende lofu dryhten & megen his & wundur his ða he dyde & awehte cyðnisse in iacob & aee sette ða onbead fedrum urum ðætte cuðe dyde ða bearnum heara ðæt oncnawe cneoris oderu bearn ða bioð acende & arisað & secgað ða bearnum heara ðæt hie setten in gode hyht his & no ofergeoteliað werca godes his & bibodu his soecað god cwomun ðeode in
