godas þeoda woddreamas vel demonia drihten soðlice heofenas dyde vel worhte andetnes & fægernes on gesihðe his halignes & micclungga on halignesse his bringað drihten eþelas þeoda bringað drihtne wuldor & arwurþunga bringað drihten wuldor naman his adoð upene dura & ingað on cafertunas his gebiddað drihten on cafertune halige his sy astyred fram ansyne his eall drihten ricsode gefægnige eorðan blissiað on igland mænigeo genipu & þicnes on ymbhwyrfte his rihtwisnes & dom gerecednes setles his fyr beforan him forgæd & onæleð on ymbhwyrfte fynd his onlyhton ligræscas his ymbhwyrfte eorðan & gedrefed is eorðe muntas swaswa weax fleowon of ansyne drihten of ansyne drihten ealle eorðan bodedon heofenas rihtwisnesse his & hy gesawon ealle folc wuldor his asceamigen ealle þe gebiddað deofolgild wuldriað on deofolgyldum heora gebiddað him ealle englas his he gehyrde & geblissod is vel geblissigende wæs & fægnedon vel gefeogon dohtra vel dohtor iudan for domum þinum drihten forþam þe þu drihten se hyhsta ofer ealle eorðan swyðe upahafen þu eart ofer ealle godas singað drihten cantic niwne forðon þe wundra he dyde vel worhte hælde þe seo swyðre his & earm halig his cuðe dyde drihten hælo his on gesihðe þeoda onwreah rihtwisnesse/ gemyndig he is mildheortnesse his & soðfæstnesse his huses gesawon ealle gemearu eorðan hælo god ure drymað drihten ealle eorðan singað blissiað & singað singað drihten on hearpan on hearpan & stefne sealmes on bymum gelædendlicum & stefne byman hyrnenre drymað on gesihðe cyninges drihtnes sy astyred sæ & gefyllednes his ymbhwyrft eorðena & þa þe eardiað on hyre flodas plegeað vel gefeoð hand samod vel ætgædere muntas hi blissiað beforan ansyne drihten forþam þe he com deman eorðan he demð ymbhwyrft eorðena on rihtwisnesse & folc on efennesse drihten he ricsode yrsian folc þu þe sittest ofer beoð astyred eorðan drihten micel & heah ofer eall folc andettan on naman þinum micclum forþam þe egeslicum & haligum is & wurðmynt cyning dom he lufað þu gearwodest rihtinga dom & rihtwisnes iacobes þu dydest upahebbað drihten god ure & gebiddað scamul fota his forþon þe halig is on preosttum vel on biscopum his betweox hym þe gecigaþ naman his hy cigdon drihten & he gehyrde hy on swere genipes he spræc to him hy geheoldon cyðnessa his & bebod se þe sealde him drihten god ure þu gehyrdest hy god þu gemiltsod þu þære him & wreccende on eallum afundennessum vel afundennes heora upeheobað drihten god ure & tobiddað on munte halgan his forþam þe halig is drihten god ure drymað drihtne ealle eorðan drihtne on blisse ingað on gesihðe his on bliðnesse witað forþam þe drihten he is god he worhte us & na we sylfe us folc his & sceap fostornoðes his ingað gatu his on anddetnesse cafertunas his on ymenum anddettað him heriað naman his forþam þe wynsum drihten on ecnesse mildheortnesse his on cynrene & cynrene soðfæstnes his eadig wer se þe na eode on geþeahte arleasra on wege synfulra na stod & on heahsetle cwyldes vel wawan sæt ac on e willa his & on æ his smeað vel foreþæncð dæges & nihtes bið swa swa treow þæt plantud is wið ryne wætra wæstm his selð on tide his leaf his na ealle swa hwelce swa beoð gesundfullude swa arlease swa swa swa dust þæt awyrpð wind of ansyne eorðan forðon na arisað arlease on dome & ne synfulle on geþeahte ryhtwisra forðon wiste weg siþfæt forwyrð hwy grymetedon þeoda folc smeadon unnyttu vel idelu ætstodon cyningas eorðan ealdormenn becomon tosomne ongean crist we tosliten bendas hyra utun awyrpan fram us geoc heora se þe eardaþ on heofonum hyseþ hy hyspeð þonne he spycð to him on his eorre on hatheortnisse his gedrefð soþlice gesetet eom fram him ofer munt haligne bodiende bebod cwæð sunu eart ðu ic to dæg cende gyrn fram me & ic selle þeoda erfeweardnisse þine þine gemæro eorðan ðu gereccest hy on gyrde isernre & swa swa fet tigelwyrhtan ðu brecest hy nu cyningas ongytað beoð gelærede ge þe demað eorðan þeowiað on ege geblissiað him mid fyrhto gegripað lare þylæs hwonne yrsige vel eorsige ge forwyrðen of wege ryhtum þonne byrneð anunga vel in sceortnisse eorre his eadige ealle þe getreowað on hine to hwy gemænigfylde synd þa ðe swencað mænige onarisað angean cweþað vel secgað saule minre hælo hire on gode his vel hire anfoend wuldur uphebbende heafod stefne minre ic cleopode he gehyrde me of his þam halgan munte slep ic aras forðon anfeng ic ne ondræde þusendu folces ymbsellende vel ymbtrymmende aris halne me do forðon ofsloge ealle wiþergende intingan teþ synfulra þu forbryttest dryhtnes is hælo & ofer folc bledsung þin þonne ic gecigde þu gehyrdest ryhtwisnesse mire on geswince þu tobreddest gemiltsa me gehyr gebed bearn manna hu lange hefige of heortan to hwon lufiað ge idelnesse & secað leasunge witað þætte gemiclade haligne his gehyrde þonne ic clypige to him eorsiað nellen ge syngian þa ðe ge cweþað on heortum eowrum on incleofum onbryrdaþ onsecgaþ onsægdnesse ryhtwisnesse gehyhten ge on dryhtne monige cweðaþ hwylc oðeowð us god tacnod leoht ondwlitan ðines þu sealdes blisse on heortan mine of tide hwætes wines eles his hy synd gemænigfyld on sybbe on þæt selfe ic slape reste synderlice on hyhte þu gesettest mec word mina earum onfoh ongyt clypunge mine begym stefne gebedes mines cyning min & godd forðon to þe ic gebidde on mergen & ðu gehyrst stefne mine on morgen ic ætstande þe & ic geseo þætte na willende unryhtwisnesse eardiað wið þe awyrged ongean eagan þine ðu hatest vel ðu feodest ealle þe wyrcað unryhtwisnesse þu forspillest þa þe sprecað leasunge wer bloda facenfullne onscuniað ic soþlice on menego mildheortnes þinre ic inga on hus þin ic gebidde to temple halgum þinum on ege þinum gelæd me þire ryhtwisnesse fore feondum minum gerece on gesihðe þinre weg minne forðon nis on muþe heora soþfæstnis heorte idel is byrigen opengende hrace heora tungum heora facenfullice dydon dem hy hy ahreosen fram geþohtum heora efter menego arleasnessa heora adref hy hy gremedun & geblissigen hyhtað on ecnesse hy ahebbað ðu oneardast on him & hy wuldriað on ðe ealle lufiað naman bletsast rihtwisne swa of scylde godes willan þines ðu gehelmudest us na on yrre þinum þu ðreage & na on hatheortnisse þinre þu ðrea vel cide miltsa me untrum ic eom hæle dryhten gedrefede syndon ealle ban mine & saul min gedrefed swiþe & þu hu lange beo gecyrred nere saule mine halne me do for miltse þinre on deaþe gemyndig sie þin on helle hwelc geandettað þe ic swanc on geomrunga minre ic swylige vel þwea þurh syndriga nihta bedd min of tearum stræle mine ic lecce vel wæte gedrefed is for eorre eage min ic ealdode betweox ealle mine fynd gewitað fram me ealle þe wyrcað unryhtwisnesse forðon gehyrde stefn wopes mines gehyrde bene mine gebed onfeng ablysigen vel scamien & syn drefed ealle fynd mine syn gecerred on hinder & aswarnien swiþe hredlice vel anunga on ðe ic gehyhte alys me allum ehtendum & genere þylæs hwonne gegripe vel reafie swa swa leo saule mine þonne nis alyse & na þe halne do gif ic dyde ðis gif is unryhtwisnes on handum minum gif ic ageald gyldendum me yfelu ic ahreose be gewyrhtum fram feondum minum idel ehte feond saule mine & gegripe hy & fortredeþ on eorðan lif wuldor min on dust gelede he aris on eorre þinum upahefe in endum feonda þinra on bebode þe ðu bebude gesomnung folca ymbselleð þe fore þas on heannesse gehwyrf dem folc dem me æfter ryhtwisnesse unscyldignisse handa minra sie geendud nið synfulra gerece rihtwisne scrudniende heortan & edran ryht fultum min se hale deþ ryhtwise on heorte deme ryhtwis strang langmod cwisthu eorsað þurh syndrige dagas nymðe ge gecyrren sweord his ascecþ bogan his he aþenede gyrede hine on him fatu deaþes flana his byrnendum gefremede on gesihðe he geeacnað unryhtwisnesse he onfeng sar & he cende unryhtwisnesse seað openude & adealf hine hreas on seað þone he worhte bið gecyrred sar his on heafde his on hnol unryhtwisnes astah ic ondette dryhtne ryhtwisnesse his & ic synge noman ðæs hyhstan ure hu wundorlic noma on ealre eorðan unahafen gemiclung vel mærð þin heofonas of muðe cildra & sucendra þu fulfremedest lof fore feondum þinum þæt ðu toweorpe feond & gescyldend ic geseo heofonas weorc fingra þinra monan & steorran þa gestaþelodest hwæt is mon þæt gemyndig eart his oþðe sunu mannes þæt ðu neosast hine þu wanodest hine lytle læs fram englum of wuldre arweorðunga ðu gehelmudest hine & gesettest ofer weorc handa þinra eal þing ðu underþeoddest under fotum sceap oxan ealle & ufonon þæt neat feldes fugelas heofones fixas sæs þa ðurhgað stiga sæs ic ondette þe on ealre heortan minre ic cyþe ealle wundru þine ic blissige & ic gefægnie singe noman þinum eala ðu hehsta on gecyrringe feond minne on hinder hy geuntrumiað & forweorðaþ fram gesihðe ðu worhtes dom minne intingan þu stist þrymsetl ðu þe demst efennisse þu ðreadest þeoda & forwearð se arleasa noman heora ðu dilgodest on ecnesse & on woruld worulde fynd geteorodon of sweorde on ende ceastra heora þu tobræce forwearð gemynd heora mid hlynne & drihten on ecnisse þurhwunað he gearwade on dome setl his & he demeþ ymbhwyrft eorðan on efennisse he demeð folc mid ryhtwisnesse geworden rotsung vel frofr þearfana gefylsta on gerecum on geswince & hyhten ealle cuþon vel wiston þu na forlætst secende singað ðe eardaþ on besceadwodnisse bodiað betweox þeoda wundru secende blod heora he gemunde & he na ofergeat gebedu þearfena gemiltsa me geseoh eaþmodnesse mine feondum minum þu ðe ahefst me of gatum deofles þæt ic bodige ealle lofu þina on gatum dohtur ic blissige on hælo þinre gefæstnode synt þeoda on forwyrde þe hy worhton on gryne þissum þe hy digledon gegripen is fot heora bið oncnawen domas fremmende on weorcum handa his gegripen is se synfulla syn gecyrred ða synfullan on helle ealle þeoda þe ofergytað on ende ofergittolnis þearfana geþyld ðearfana na forweorðaþ on ende aris framige mon syn demed þeoda on gesyhðe þinre gesete æs lædend hy þæt witen þeoda þæt men synt to hwy gewit ðu feor ðu forsyhst on gerecum on geswince þonne ofermodgað þe arleasa bið onæled þearfa hy beoð gegripene on geþohtum heora þam ðe hy þohton bið hered se synfulla on gewilnungum saul his se þe unryhtu deþ he bið gebletsod hyspeð se synfulla æfter mænigfaldnisse his yrres ne secð nis on gesyhðe his beoð besmitene wegas on ælcere tide beoð afyrred domas þine of ansyne ealra feonda his he wylt he cwæð soþlice on heortan ic ne beom astired of cneorisse on cneorisse butan yfele þæs of wyrgnisse biternisse full of facne under tungan his geswinc sar he siteð on searwum mid welegum on digelnissum þæt he ofslea unscyldigne eagan on þearfan beseoþ he syrwð on dygelnisse swa swa leo on incleofe he syrwð þæt he gripe ðearfan gegripan þearfan þonne he hine framatyhð hine on his grine genyþrað hine he onhyldeð hine & gehreoseþ þonne he wealdeþ þam ðearfan he cwæð on heortan oferget he acyrde ansyne þylæs he geseo oþ on ende sy upahefen hand ne ofergyt þu þearfana on ende fore hwæt bysmrade se arleasa cwyþ soþlice on heortan his secð vel myngað ðu gesyhst þæt ðu geswinc & sar besceawast þæt ðu selle hy on hondum þinum þe læfed þearfa steopcilde þu bist gefylsta þu forbrytest earm synfulles awyrgedes bið soht scyld his ne he met bið ryhsað on ecnesse forweorðaþ ge þeoda of eorðan his gyrninge þearfana gehyrde gyrnenga heortan heora gehyrde eare þin deman steopcilde & eaðmodum þætte na geteohige vel togesette ofer þæt gemiclian hine ofer eorðan on dryhtne ic getrywe humeta secgað saule minre aleor on munt spearwa forðon on gesihðe synfulle aðenedon bogan hy gyredon flana heora on cocore þæt hy scotigen on ðystrum ryhtwise on heortan ða þe ðu dydest hy tobrecon se ryhtwisa hwæt dyde he on temple halgum his setl his eagan on þearfan beseoð brewas ahsiað bearn manna ahsað ryhtwisne arleasne ðe soþlice lufað unryhtwisnesse he hatað sawle his he rinð ofer synfulle gryn fyres sweflðrosm gast ysta dæl celos heora ryhtwis ryhtwisnesse he lufode efennessa gesihð ondwlita his halne teorode halig forðon gewanode synt soþfæstnissa from bearnum manna idelu hy spræcon anra gehwylc to nehstan welere on heortan & of heortan hy spræcon yfelu forspille ealle welras fæcne tungan ða fela speculan þa cwædon tungan ure we gemicliað weleras ure of us synd hwylc ure is fore yrmðe unspedigra geomrunge ðearfana nu ic arise cwyþ ic asette ofer help vel halwendnesse mine getreowfullice ic dem on ðæm spreca spreca syfra seolfor of fyre amered eorðan aclensod sefonfealdlice ðu gehealdst us & beweardast us fram cnerisse ðisre on ecnisse on trundulnisse arlease gangað æfter heahnesse ðinre ðu gemonigfyldest bearn manna hu longe ofergytst ðu on ende oþ hwæt acyrrest ðu onsyne þine fram me hu longe sette ic geþeaht on sawle minre sar on heortan mine þurh dæg bið upahafen feond beseoh & gehyr onlyht eagan þyles æfre ic slape on deaþe ðules hwonne cweðe feond ic magude ongean hine þa ðe swencað me hy blissiað ges ic gedrefed beo ic on ðine mildheortnesse hyhte blissað heorte min hælo þinre ic synge dryhtne þe god sealde me & ic singe noman dryhtnes ðæs heahstan cwæð se unwisa on heortan his hy gewemmede synt & onsceongenlice hy gewordene synt on willum heora nis þe do oð on anne of heofone gelocode ofer bearn manna þæt he geseo gif is ongytende oþðe secende ealle framahyldon ætsomne unnytte gewordene synt ðe do byrgen opengende hrace heora tungan heora facenfullice hy dydon atur nedrana under welerum heora ðara of awyrgednisse & of biternisse ful is hrade fet heora to ageotenne blod forbrytednis & ungesælignis on wegum weg sybbe hy na oncneowon nis ege godes beforan eagan heora hune oncnawað ealle þa ðe wyrcað unryht þa ðe forswelgað folc min mete hlafes gecygdon ðær hy forhtodon ege þær na wæs ege forðon on cneorisse ryhtwisre geþeaht wedlan ðu gedrefdest forðon hyht his hwelc selð hælo ða getreowfullan acyrreð hæftned folces his blissie & gefeoge hwelc eardaþ on eardungstowe þinre oþðe hwelc geresteð on ðinum ðam haligan munte ðe ingæð butan wemme & wyrcð ryhtwisnesse sprycð soþfæstnisse on heortan his & ne dyde facn on tungan nene dyde nehstan yfel hosp ne anfeng ongean neahstan his to ealles nahte gelæd bið vel geteald bið on gesyhðe se awyrgeda ða ondrædendan dryhten he gemiclað swereð vel ryhtgehet nehstan his ne beswicð feoh his ne sealde to gytsunge medsceattas þone unscyldigan na onfeng deþ ðas bið gedrefed vel astyred on ecnisse geheald forðan on ðe ic hyhte ic segde drihtne min forðon goda minra þu na beðearft halgum ðe on eorðan synt he wundrude willan mine betweox hy gemenigfylde syndon untrumnessa heora siþðan hy efston ic somnige gemetinga heora of blodum ne ic gemyndig beo namana heora ðurh weleras mine dæl erfeweardnesse cælicis mines ðu eart ðe gesettest vel ageafe me yrfeweardnesse rapas gefeollon me on beorhtum yrfeweardnis beorhtu ic bletsige salde andgyt ofer þæt oðð on nyht þreadon edran mine ic foresceawode on gesyhðe minre symle to ðæm swiðran he is me ne ic astyred beo vel drefed for ðisum gelustfullude heorte min & gefiehde tunge flesc resteð on hyhte gehyr ryhtwisnesse begym bene minre mid earum onfoh gebed na on welerum facenfullum of andwlitan þinum dom min yppe eagan mine geseon efennisse ðu afandudest heortan mine ðu neosodest on nyht fyre ðu ameredest & nys gemet on me unryhtwisnes þæt ne sprece muð weorc manna fore wordum welera þinra ic geheold wegas hearde fulfreme stæpas minum on stigum þinum þæt ne syn astyred swaðu mina cleopode ðu gehyrdest onhyld eare me mine gewundurlec mildheortnessa ðina ðe hale dest hyhtende on ðe fram wiðerstandendum ðinre swiðran geheald swa seon eages under sceadwe fiðera þinra gescyld of ansyne arleasa swencton fynd mine sawle mine ymbsealdon ic lufie ðe mægen trumnes min tohyht & alysend min gefylstend ic hyhte on hine gescyldend & horn hæle minre gefylstend heregende ic gecige fram feondum minum hal ic beo ymbsealdon geomrunga deaþes burnan unryhtwisnesse gedrefdon sar helle forecomon grynu on geswince minum ic gecigde & to gode minum ic cleopode gehyrde of temple his ðam haligan stefne mine & cleopung on gesyhðe ineode on earan & astyred forhtude eorðe & grundweallas munta gedrefede synd astyrede synd eorre him astagh rec on eorre fyr of ansyne his onbyrnð colu onælede fram him heofonas bodiað vel vyþað wuldur godes & weorc handa his bodiaþ staðol vel trumnisse dæg dæge belcet word nyht nyhte bycneþ ingehygd ne synd spræca ne word þara ne syn gehyred stefna heora on ealle eorðan uteode son vel hlisa heora & on endas ymbhwyrftes eorðan word heora on sunnan he gesette eardunge his he swa swa brydguma forðgewitende of gyftbure his he blissode swa swa gigant to yrnenne weg fram hean heofone utgang his & edryne vel gencyris oþ to heahnesse nis se þe hine behyde fram hætan his ee dryhtnes untallic gecyrrende saula cyþnes getreowful wisdom gearuwigende lytlingum ryhtwisnessa dryhtnes ryhta geblisgende heortan bebod beorht onlyhtende eagan gehyre on dæge geswinces gescylde noma godes iacobes he asende fultum of halgum of heahnesse he behealde he gemyndig sie ealre ofrung vela ðinre ofrung onsægdnis þin fætt sie selle þe æfter heortan þinre eal geþeaht þin he getrymme we blissiað on hælo þinre on naman ures we beoð gemiclode gefylle dryhten gyrnenga þina nu ic ancneow forðon halne gedeþ cyning his gehyrð hine of heofone ðam halgum his on anwealdum hælo þære swiþran his ða vel hy on wænum vel on crætum & hy on horsum we on naman dryhtnes ures beoð gemiclode hy gewriðene synd hy feollon we soþlice we arison arehte we synt on mægene þinum blissað & ofer hælo þine he blissade ðearle gyrninge saule his þu sealdest him & from willan wellera his ðu ne bescyredest hine forðon ðu forecome hine on bletsunge swetnisse ðu settest on heafde his hroðgirelan of stane deorwyrðum lif he bæd fram þe ðu sealdest langnisse daga aworuld micel wuldur on hælo þinre wuldur micelne wlite ðu asetst ofer hine þu selst hine on bletsunge ðu geblissast on gefean mid andwlitan þinum gehyhte on dryhtne on mildheortnesse ðæs hehstan he ne bið astyred sie gemet hand þin eallum feondum þeo swiþre þin gemete ealle þe ðe hatedon beseoh on me hwy ðu forlete feor fram hælo minrae word scylda minra ic clypige ðurh dæg ne ðu gehyrest & on niht na to unwisdome on halgan eardast lof ðæs haligan folces hyhton fæderas ure hy gehyhton & ðu alysdest hy hy cleopodon & hale hy gewordene sindon hy gehyhton na synd gescynde ic soþlice ic eom wyrm na mann hosp manna & aworpenis folces ealle þe gesawon hy anscunedan me hy spræcon welleron hrysedon heafod he gehyhte on dryhtne he alyseþ hine halne he gedeþ he wile gerecht naht wana bið on stowe fostornoðes þær me he gestaþelode ofer wæter gereordunge he fedde saule mine he gecyrde he lædde siþfæt vel stige ryhtwisnesse fore naman his weotodlice & gif ic gange vel fare on middele sceaduwe deaþes na ic ondræde yfelu forðon mid me gyrd þin & stæf þin hy me frefredon ðu gearwodest on gesihðe minre beod ongean ða þe swencton þu mæstest on ele heafod min drincefæt þin druncengende hu beorht vel mære mildheortnis fylgeð eallum dagum lifes mines þæt ic eardige on langnisse daga drihtnes is eorðe & gefyllednis hire ymbhwyrft eorðana & ealle þa ðe eardiað on hyre he ofer sæs gegrundweallude & ofer flodas he gegearwode hy hwelc astigþ on munt oþðe hwylc standeþ on stowe þære halgan his underigende handum clænre heortan se þe na onfeng on idel saule his nene swor on facne his nehstan ðes onfehð bletsunga mildheortnisse hælo his þis is cneores secendra drihten secendra onsyne getreowfulra adoþ gatu aldormen eowre & upahebbað gatu ecelece ingangeþ cyning wuldres hwylc is þes cyning wuldres strang & rice rice on gefeohte aldras gatu ecu cyning to ðe ic ahof saule mine ic getreowe ic na scamie & na bysmrien fynd soþlice ealle þa ðe geanbidigað na hy beoð gescende syn gescende vel forscamode ða unryhtwisan donde idelu wegas cuþe siþfatu þine lære gerece on soþfæstnisse þinre lær forðon þu eart hælo min & ðe ic geþyldgode ælce dæge gemyne miltsunga vel ofearmunga þinra mildheortnesse þinre þe of worulde scyldas iuguðhades & nytennisse minre ne gemun ðu micelre mildheortnesse þinre gemyndig beo ðu min fore godnisse þinre swete ryhtwis fore þam æ he sette ðam agyltendum on wege he gerecþ biliwite on dome he lærð ða manswæsan wegas his dem forðon on unscyldignisse minre ic ingange hyhtende na ic untrumige afanda costa bærn edran mine & heortan mine mildheortnis ðin beforan eagan mine & ic gelicode on soþfæstnisse ðinre ic ne sæt on geþeahte idelnisse & mid unryhte dondum na ic ineode ic hatude gesomninga awyrgedra mid arleasum na ic gesitte ic ðwea betweox unscyldige handa mine & ic ymbgange altre þinre þæt ic gehyre stefne lofes þines þæt ic cyþe ealle wundru ic lufude wlite huses þines & stowe wulderes þines ne forspil ðu mid arleasum saule werum bloda lif onlyhtnis min hælo min þone ic andræde gescyldend lifes mines fram hwam ic forhtige þonne genealæcað ofer me sceþðende þæt he ieten flæsc mine þa ðe swencað me fynd hy untrymede synt & hy feollon gif standað ongean weredu na ondrædeþ heorte min gif arise on me gefeoht on þæt ic hyhte an ic bæd þæt ic gegyrnde þæt ic oneardige on huse dryhtnes eallum dagum lifes mines þæt ic geseo willan & ic sy gescyld fram temple ðam haligan his he behydde on eardunge vel getelde his on dæge yfelra he scylde on dygelnisse eardunge his on stane he upahof nu he upahefð heafod min ofer fynd mine ic ymbga & ic ofrige on eardunstowe his onsægdnisse lofes ic synge salm ic secge dryhtne gehyr stefne on þære ic cleopode gemiltsa min & gehyr þe sægde heorte min ic sohte andwlitan þinne ic sece ne acyrre ðu ansyne þine ne hyld þu on eorre fram þeowe þinum gefylstend min beo ðu ne forlæte þu & ne forseoh me hælo min ic cleopode godd min na swiga ðu & ic beo gelic þam stigendum on seað bene minre þonne ic gebidde to ðe & þonne ic uphebbe handa mina to temple haligum þinum na somod þu selle mid synfullum & mid wyrcendum unryhtwisnesse ne forswil ðu me mid þam þe sprecað sibbe mid nehstan heora yfelu soþlice on heortum heora sele him weorcu heora & æfter nearoðancum gecneorþnissa heora agyld him agyld edlean heora him na hy angeaton on weorc handa his na hy besceawodon tobrec hy ne ðu getimbre hy gebletsod dryhten he gehyrde stefne bene minre gefylsta gescyldend on him gehyhte gefultumod ic eom bleow flæsc min & of willan minum ic andette him strengo folces his gescyldend haligra cyninges his he is hal do folc þin bletsa yrfeweardnisse & gerece hy & ahefe & ahefe hy oþ on ecnisse bringað dryhtne bearn bearn ramma wuldur arwyrðunge naman his gebiddaþ on healle haligre stefn ofer wæteru mægenþrymmes swegde ofer wæteru manegu stefn on mægene on gemiclunga forbrecendis lange stefnas & forbrihð cederas forgnideþ hy swa swa cealf & leofne sunu anhyrnedra tosceadendis leg fyres hrysiendis westen astyreð westen gearwigendes heortas & awriht þyccettu on temple ealle cweð wuldur ic ahebbe þu afenge ne ðu na tobreddest fynd ofer me ic cleopode & ðu hældest þu atuge fram helwarum sawle mine ðu hældest fram stigendum on seað syngað halige & geandettað ðam gemynde halignisse his eorre on æbylgnisse his & lif on willan his on æfen wunað wop & on degred blis on minre genihsumnisse na ic beom astyred on ecnisse on godum willan þinum ðu gearwodest wlite minum mægen ðu acyrdest onsyne geworden gedrefed ic clypige & to gode minum ic bidde on ðe ic hyhte na ic gescend beo on ecnisse on ðinre ryhtwisnesse alys me nere ahyld to me eare efst þæt ðu nere me beo ðu gescyldend on stowe rotnisse halne þu do trumnis min frofr min fore naman þinum latþeow þu fedest & ðu lædest of gryne þysum þy hy dygledon me þu gescyldend min on handa ic bebeode gast minne þu alysdest soþfæstnisse ðu hatudest beweardgende idelnesse ofer unnytlice ic soþlice hyhte ic fægnie & blissige on þinre mildheortnisse forðon þu gesawe eaðmodnisse mine hale ðu dydest of nedum saule ne ðu na beluce me on handa feondes ðu gesettest on stowe rumre vel widgilre fet eadige þara þe forgifene synt unryhtwisnessa & ðara þe bewrigene synt synna eadig wer þam ðe nane ætwiteþ synne & nis on muðe his facn ic swigode ealdodon ealle ban mine þonne ic clypode ælce dæge forðon dæges & nyhtes gehefegod is ofer hand þin gehwyrfed ic eom on angnisse þonne bið tobrocen hrycg scyld minne cuþne ic dyde & unryhtwisnessa mine na ic oferwreah ic cwæþ ic bodige ongean unryhtwisnissa minre & ðu forgefe arleasnesse heortan minre for ðysse gebed ælc halig on tide gehyþelicre ðeah hweþre on flode wætra manigra to him na togenealæcað frofr fram ofðriccednysse ymbsealde me blis min alyse fram ymbsellendum andgyt ic selle & ic lære þe on wege þy þe ðu in ongangest ic getrymme ofer þe eagan mine nellen ge beon swa hors & mul on ðam nis andgyt on bitole & walde ceocan heora gewrið vel gebind þa na togenealecað to ðe gefeogað ryhtwise on dryhtne ryhtwise gerist somodhering andettað on hearpan on hearpan tyn strenga singað him singað him cantic niwne wel singað him on wyndreame vel on lofe forðon ryhtwis is sprec vel word & ealle weorc his on geleafan he lufað mildheortnisse dom of mildheortnisse full is eorðe of worde heofenes getrymede synd gast muðes his eall mægen heora gesomnigende swa swa on bytt wæteru sæs settende on goldhordum grundas ondræde eall fram him beon astyrede ealle & ealle þe geondeardiaþ ymbhwyrt he cwæð & gewordene synd bebead & gescapen hy synt ic bletsige on ælcre tide symle lof his on muðe minum on dryhtne bið hered sawl min gehyren þa bilewitan & blissien gemicliað mid me & we upahebben naman his eow betweonan ic sohte he gehyrde & of eallum geswincum minum he nerede genealæcað to him & ge beoð alyhte & andwlitan eowre ne asceamiað þes þearfa cleopode gehyrde hine of eallum geswincum his he alysd asende engel on ymbhwyrfte ondrædendra & he genereð onbyrgað geseoð wynsum eadig wer þe gehyht on hine dem deriende oferwin onwinnende gegrip wæpn & scyld & aris on fultum me ageot ut flane beluc ongean hy þe me ehtað sege sawle minre hælo þin ic eom gescamigen & wandien fynd mine þa ðe secað sawle sin gecyrrede underbecling & hy ablysygen þa ðe þencað yfelu hy syn swa swa dust beforan ansyne windes engel swencende hy syn wegas heora þystro slidornis engel ehtende gifum hy hyddon forwyrd grines heora on idel hy hyspton sawle cume him gryn þæt hy ne gecnawað gegripennis þane hy dygledon gegripe hy on gryne hy ongehreosen on þæt selfe sawl min blissode on drihtne & bið gelustfullod ofer hælo his cwæð se unrihtwisa þæt he agylte on selfum him nis ege beforan eagan his forðon facenfullice he dyde on gesyhþe his þætte he gemette unryhtwisnesse hatunge word muþes his unryhtwisnes & facn he nolde ongitan þæt he wel dyde unryhtwisnesse he smeade on incleofe his he ætstod ælcum wege na godum yfelnisse na he hatode on heofone mildheortnis þin & soþfæstnis oþ to genipum ryhtwisnes þin swa swa muntas domas þine deopnis felafeald menn & nytenu hale þu dest swa swa þu gemenigfyldest mildheortnissa þina god bearn manna on gescyldnisse fiþera þinra hyhtað beoð druncnude of genihtsumnisse huses þines & of burnan willan þines þu drencst hy nelle ðu onhyrigan betweox þa awyrgendan ne onhyred þu beo ða dondan unrihtwisnesse swa swa heg hrædlice hy adrugiað swa swa bleda wyrta raðe hreosað gehyht do godnisse earda eorðan þu bist fed on welum hire gelustfulla on drihtne he selð gyrninge heortan þines awreoh drihtne weg þinne hyht on hine & he deþ he gelædeþ swa swa leoht ryhtwisnesse dom þinne swa swa middæg underþeod beo ðu drihtne halsa hine na onhyre ðu hine þe bið gesundfullod on wege his on menn dondum unryhtwisnesse ablin fram yrre forlæt hatheortnisse ne anhyre ðu þæt nearolice þu do þe nearolice doþ beoð geteorode þa ðe soþlice geanbidiað hy yrfeweardnisse agun ne on eorre þinum þu ðreage & na on hatheortnesse þinre þu nyrewe flana þina ongefæstnode synd me þu getrymedest ofer hand na is hælo on flæsce minum of andwlitan eorres þines nis sybb banum minum of ansyne synna minra unryhtwisnessa mina ofersetton heafod min swa swa byrþen hefig gehefegode hy synd ofer mec rotodon wyrsodon dolhswaðo mine of ansyne unwisdomes mines of yrmðum geswenced ic eom & gedrefed oð on ende ælce dæge geunrotsod ic ineode sawl gefylled is bysmrungum na is hælo on flæsce minum gebiged geeaðmed agehwær ic grymetede of geomrunga heortan minre ic cwæð ic gehealde wegas mine þæt ic ne agylte on tungan minre ic asette muðe minum geheordunga þonne standeþ se synfulla ongean ic adumbude geeaðmed ic eom & ic swigode fram godum sar min geedniwod hatude heorte min on me smeaunge minre byrnð fyr ic sprec on tungan minre cuþne me do ende minne getæl vel gerim daga minra hwelc is þæt ic wite hwæt wana sie me on gesihðe ealde þu settest dagas mine sped min swa swa naht beforan ðe þeah hwæþre eall idelnis ælc mann lifiende þeahðe on anlicnesse gange mann hwæþre on idel he bið gedrefed he goldhordaþ & nat hwam he somnað þa nu hwelc anbidung min hunenu sped min swa swa naht beforan ðe is fram eallum unryhtwisnessum minum nere hosp unwisum þu sealdest me geanbidigende ic anbad dryhten he beheold me he gehyrde bene mine he gelædde of seaðe yrmðe of fenne drosna he gesette ofer stan fet mine he gerehte stæpas mine he onsende on muð minne cantic niwne ymen gode urum geseoð monige ondrædað gehyhtað eadig wer þæs ðe is nama hyht his & na beseah on idelnissa swæce heow lease fela þu dydest wundru geþohtum þinum na is hwelc gelic þe ic cyþde & ic sprec gemenigfylde synd ofer gerim onsægdnisse ofrunge vel ofletan þu noldest lichoman soþlice þu fulfremedest me ansægdnissa eac swelc for scylde na þu bæde þonne ic sægde on gesihðe ic cume on heafde boces awriten is be me þæt ic do willan þinne ic wolde & ee þine on middele heortan minre eadig se þe angyteð ofer elþeodigne & þearfan on dæge yfelum alyseþ hine gehealdeð hine & geliffæstað hine & eadnigne he gedeþ & he aclensað on eorðan sawle his & na he selð hine on handa feondes his spede bringeð him ofer bedd sares his ealle stræle his þu acyrdest on untrumnesse his ic cweð dryhten gemiltsa min hæl sawle mine forðon ic syngode þe fynd mine cwædon vel sægdon yfelu hwonne swelteð & forweorþeð noma his & hy eodon in þæt hy gesawon idelu gesprec heorte heora hy gederedon unryhtwisnesse him & hy eodon ut hy spræcon somod on an hy bysmredon ealle fynd mine ongean þohton yfelu me word unryhtwis hy bebudon ongean me cwystþu se þe slæpð ne geycþ he vel teohað þæt he arise swa swa heort wilnað to wyllum wætra swa wilnað sawl min ðyrste sawl min to gode lifgende hwonne ic cume & oþeowe befon ansyne wæron me tearas mine hlafas on dæg & on niht þonne bið cweden me dæghwamlice hwær is godd þin þas ic gemunde & ic ageat on me sawle mine forðon ic ingange on stow geteldes wundurlices oþ on hus godes on stefne blisse & andetnisse sweg gewistfulgend for hwy unrot eart sawl min & for hwy drefst me hyht on god forðon ic andette him hælo andwlitan mines & god min fram me selfum sawl min gedrefed is forðon gemyndig ic beo þin of eorðan fram munte medmiclum deopnes deopnesse cigð on stefne wæterædrana þinra ealla hea þina & yþa þine ofer me foron on dæg bebead drihten mildheortnisse his & on niht he gesweotolode mid me gebed gode lifes mines dem god toscead intingan minne of ðeode unhaligre fram men unryhtwisum & facenfullum nere me forðon þu god min & freamiht min for hwy þu anyddest & for hwy unrot ic inga þonne swencð me feond asend leoht þin & soþfæstnisse þine hy me læddon & togelæddon on munt haligne þinne & on eardunge þine ic inga to weobede godes to gode þe geblissað geogoðe mine ic andette þe on hearpan god god min for hwy unrot ðu eart sawl min & for hwy þu drefst me hyht on god forðon ic andette him hælo andwlitan min & god min earum urum we gehyrdon fæderas ure bodedon us weorc þæt þu worhtest on dagum heora & on dagum ealdum hand þin þeoda forspilde & ðu plantodest hy þu swenctest folc & ðu utanyddest hy na soþlice on sweorde his hy agon eorðan & earm heora na hæleþ hy ac swiþre ðin & earm þin & onlyhting andwlitan þines gelicode þe on him þu eart self cyning min þu ðe bebeodest hælo on ðe fynd ure we awindfiað we forhycgað onarisende on us on bogan minum ic gehyhte & sweord min hælð þu alysdest us fram swencendum þa þe us feodan þu gescyndest we beoþ herede ælce dæge we andettað on worulda belcette heorte min word god secge ic weorc mine cyninge tunge min writingfeþer boceres hrædlice writendes wlitig heow fore bearnum manna togoten gifu on welerum þinum forðon bletsode þe on ecnesse ymbgyrdan sweorde þinum ymbe þeoh riclicost wlite þinum & fægernisse þinre beloca vel beheald gesuntfullice forðgewit rixa fore soþfæstnesse geþwærnisse ryhtwisnes & gelædeþ þe wundurlice seo swiðre þin flana þine scearpe þa ricustan folc under feallað on heortan feonda cyninges setl þin on woruld woruld gyrd ryht is gyrd rices þines þu lufudest ryhtwisnesse & ðu hatudes unryhtwisnesse forðon smyrede of ele blisse for gehlyttum of hræglum þinum of stæpum aelpenbænenum of ðam gelustfulludon ure frofr & mægen gefylsta on geswincum þa gemetton us swiþe forðon na we adrædaþ þonne bið drefed beoð borene muntas on heortan sæs swegdon gedrefede synt wæteru gedrefede muntas on strangnisse his flodes onræs geblissað ceaster godes he halgude geteld his ðu hehsta on middele hire bið astyred gefultumað hie andwlitan his gedrefede þeoda ahylde ricu sealde stefne his se heahsta astyred megena mid us anfond ure cumað & geseoð weorc þa he sette foretacnu ofer eorðan ealle þeoda blissiað handum gefeogiað gode on stefne blisse heah bregendlic & cyning micel ofer ealle godas he underþeodde folc us þeoda under fotum urum he geceas us on yrfeweardnisse him heow þe he lufude astah on wynndreame on stefne byman syngan ge vel singað ge singað cyninge cyning ealre eorðan wislice ricsað ealle þeoda sitt ofer setle halgam his micel heriendlic swiðe on ceastre on munte haligum his tobrædende upahefednissa ealre munt side norðdæles ceaster cyninges micles on stæpum his bið tocnawen þonne he anfehð hie on gesihðe cyningas gesomnude togædere becomun on an hy geseonde þa wundrudun gedrefde astyre fyrhto vel bifong gegrap hy þær saru swa swa eacniendis on gaste swiþlieu forbrytende scypu we gehyrdun swa & we gesawon on ceastre mægena ure gestaðale/ hy on ecnisse gehyrað þas ealle þeoda earum onfoð þe bugiað ymbhwyrft & ge eorþware bearn manna ætgædere on an welig & þearfa min spricð wisdom gemynd heortan minre gleawnisse ic ahylde to gelicnisse eare min ic atyne saltere race mine to hwon andræde ic on dege yfelum cwistþu unryhtwisness spuran mines ymbsealde þa ðe getrywað on mægene heora & ða on genihsumunga welena heora hy beoð gewuldrude broður na alysede he alysde mann ne selð gode gecwemnisse his ne weorð alysednisse sawle his he swang on ecnisse goda spræc cleopude of sunnan upspringe oþ setlgang hyw wlites eawunga cymeþ & he na swigað fyr on gesyhþe his byrnð & on ymbhwyrfte his hreoh strang to he gecygde heofon uppe eorðan þæt he toscede folc his gesomniað him þa endebyrden cyþnisse his ofrunga cyþað heofonas ryhtwisnesse dema gehyr folc min ic sprece & ic cyþe forðon ic eom na ofer ofrunga þina ic þreage onsegdnissa þina on gesyhðe minre synt symle ic afo of huse þinum cealfru & na of efodum þinum buccan gemiltsa me god æfter micelre mildheortnisse þinre & æfter mænigo miltsunga þinra adilga unryhtiwsnesse mine ma þweah me of unrihtwisnesse minre of scylde minum clænsa ic ancnawe scyld min beforan me is symle þe anum ic syngode & yfel beforan ðe ic dyde þæt þu beo geryhtwisad on spræcum þinum & ðu oferswiðe þonne þu demed eart on gesihðe soþlice on unryhtwisnesse geeacnod ic eom on scyldum cende modor min soþfæstnisse þu lufudest ungewissu dihlu wisdomes þines þu swutoludest me þu stredest ic beom clænsod þu aþwihst ofer snaw ic beo ablicen hwæt wuldrast ðu on yfelnisse þe rice on unryhtwisnesse ælce dæge unryhtwisnesse þohte tunge þin swa swa scyrseax scearp þu dydest facen þu lufodest yfelnisse medomnisse unryht ma þonne sprecan efennisse þu ealle word hryres on tungan facenfulre forðon towerpð æfre utaluceð & afæwð of eardunge þinre & wyrttruman of eorðan lifigendra geseoð ryhtwise & adrædaþ & ofer hine hlichað & cweþað efnenu mann þe na sette god gefylstend him ac he hyhte on mænigfaldnisse welena his & þah on idelnisse his cwæþ se unwisa on heortan his nis god gewemmede hy synd & onscuniendlice gewordene synt on willum heora nis þe do god nis oþ on anne drihten of heofone gelocode suna manna þæt he geseo gif is ongitende oþðe secende ealle ahyldun somod unnytte gewordene hunenu oncnawað þa ðe wyrcað unryhtwisnesse þa ðe swelgað folc min swa swa mete hlafes gecigdon þær hy forhtodon of ege þær na wæs ege tostencð ban manna him cwemendra gescynde hy synd forhygede hy hwylc selð hælo þonne acyrð hæftnied folces his freaþancað se gecorena & blissigað god on naman þinum halne do & on mægene þinum alyse gehyr gebed min mid earum onfoh word muþes mines fremde onarison on me & strange sohton sawle mine & na foresetton god beforan gesihðe his soðlice gefylsteð me andfeng is sawle minre acyr yfelu of feondum minum & on soþfæstnisse þine forspil hy wilsumlice ic ofrige þe ic andette naman þinum forðon god he is of eallum geswince þu generedest mec & ofer fynd mine gelocode eage þin gehyr gebed min & na forseoh bene beheald & gehyr geunrotsod on geswince minum & gedrefed ic eom of stefne feondes & of geswencednisse synfulles hy ahyldon unryhtwisnessa on eorre hefigmode hy wæron heorte min gedrefed is on me & fyrhto deaþes hreas ofer ege & fryhto vel bifong ofer bewrugon þystro ic cwæð hwylc selð feþera swa culfran & ic fleo & ic reste efnenu ic afeorrode fleonde & ic wunode on westene ic anbidede hine þe halne dyde fram medmiclum mode & hreohnisse gemiltsa forðon fortræd ælce dæge feohtende swencte mec fortrædon fynd mine fram heanisse dæge manega þe oferwinnað hy andrædaþ ic hyhte ic herige spræca mine ælce dæge on gode ic hyhte na ic ondræde hwæt do me monn ælce dæge word hy onscunedon ongean ealle geþeaht heora on yfel hy eardiaþ & behydaþ hy hoh minne begymað swa swa anbidode sawl min for nahte hale þu dest hy on eore folc þu forbricst lif min ic cyþde þe ic asette tearas mine on gesihðe þine swa swa on behate þinum gemiltsa min gemiltsa on þe getrywð sawl min & on sceade fiþra þinra ic hyhte oþ aleore vel forðgewite unryhtwisnes ic clypige to gode þam hehstan & to drihtne þe wel dyde me he sende of heofone & alysde he sealde on hosp þa fortredendan mec sende god mildheortnesse his & soþfæstnisse sawle mine he generede of middele hwelpa leona ic slep gedrefed suna manna teð heora wæpn & stræla & tunge heora scyrseax scearp upahefe ofer heofonas ealle eorðan wuldur þin grinu hy gearwodon fotun minum & hy gebigdon sawle hy dulfon beforon ansyne seaþ & hy feollon on ðone gearo heorte min ic singe & salm ic secge aris wuldor sealmleoð & hearpsweg ic arise on dægred gif soþlice uuitodlice ryhtwisnesse ge sprecað rihte demaþ suna manna & soþlice on heortan unryhtwisnessa wyrcað ge unryhtwisnesse handa eowra syrwað fremedlætede synfulle of innoþe hy dweledon of innoðe vel wambe hy spræcon leasunga yrre him gelicnesse nædran swa nædran & forclyccende earan heora þa na gehyrað stefne ongalendra & ætrene þa beoð begalene fram wisum forbryteð teþ heora on muðe heora geahlas leona tobricþ to nahte hie becumað swa swa wæter yrnende behylt bogan his oþ hit bið geuntrymed swa swa weax gemolten beoð afyrrede ofer hy hreas fyr & na hy gesawon sunnan nere of feondum minum & fram onarisendum on me alyse me fram wyrcendum unryhtwisnesse & fram werum bloda hæle forðon on gesihðe hy ofþrycton sawle onhruron on me þreafulle & ne unryhtwisnes min & na synn butan unrythwisnesse ic arn & ic gereht wæs aris on geanryne & geseoh þu mægena beheald to geneosienne eall þeoda na þu mildsast eallum þe wyrcað unryht syn gecyrred to æfene & hungor hy þolien hundas & ymbyrnað ceastre hy on ge sprecað on muðe heora & sweord on welerum heora hwylc gehyrde & hyspest hy for naht ðu hæfst ealle þeoda þu anyddest & ðu tobræce us eorre & gemiltsod us þu astyredes & ðu drefdes hy hæl gedrefednissa hire forðon heo astyred þu oðeowdes folce þinum heardu þu drænctest of wine onbryrdednesse þu sealdest ondrædendum þe tacnunga hy fleon of ansyne bogan þæt syn alysed gecorene þine halne do of swiþran þinre & gehyr sprec on halgum his ic blissige & ic todæle byrþen & hole dene eardung min is wæstmbærnis strangnes heafdes mines cyning gehyr halsunga mine beheald gebede minum fram gemærum eorðan ic sleopode þaða angud wearð heorte min on stane þu upahefdest þu gelæddest forðon geworden hyht min stypel strangnisse of ansyne feondes on ic eardige on eardunge þinre on worulda ic beom scyldend on eardunge fiðra þinra þu þu gehyrdest gebed min ðu sealdest yrfeweardnisse ondrædendum naman þinne dagas ofer cyninges þu geic gear his oð on dæg worulde & worulda þurhwunað on ecnesse on gesihðe mildheortnisse & soþfæstnisse hwelc seceþ heora swa ic singe naman þinum on worulde þæt ic agylde gehat min of dæge on dæg hununu underþeod bið sawl min fram him soþlice hælo min he min hælo gefylstend ic beom astyred ma hu lange heos ge on men ge ofsleað ealle swa swa wage onhyldum stangæderunga gecnysedre hwæþre þeah weorþunga hy þohton anydan ic arn on þurst of muðe heora hy bletsodon & heortan heora hy wyrgde hwæþre fram him geþyld min & he ic na afeorrie on gode hælo min & wuldur fylstes mines hyht hyhtað on hine ælc gemeting folces ageotað beforan him heortan eowra forðon of leohte ic wacie þyrste sawl hu mænigfealdlice flæsc min on westenne & on ungefarenum onwæterigum swa on haligum ic oþeowde þe þæt ic gesawe mægen þin & wuldur þin forðon betere is mildheortnis þin ofer lif weleras mine heriað þe ic bletsige þe on life minum & on naman þinum ic upahebbe handa mina swa swa of fætnisse swa gemyndig ic wæs þin ofer bedd min on dægredum ic gemyndigge geworden gefylstned on oferbrædelse fiðra þinra ic blissige togeþeodde sawl æfter anfeng swiþre gebed min þonne ic swenced eom fram ege feondes nere sawle mine þu bewruge fram gemetinge wyrgendra of menigum wyrcendra unryhtwisnesse hy hwetton swa sweord tungan heora hy beheoldon bogan ðing biter þæt hy strælien on digelnissum unwemme sona hy stræliað hine & na hy adrædaþ hy getrymedon him word mæte hy geteohodon þæt hy hyddon grinu hy cwædon hwylc gesihð hy hy scrudnodon unrtyhwisnesse hy geteorodon scrudniende scurdnunge togenealehte mann to heortan heahre & bið upahafen stræla lytlynga geworden synd witu heora & for naht hæfde wæron ongean hy tungan heora gedrefede synd þa ðe gesawon hy geriseð lofsang on heanisse þe bið agolden gelast gehyr gebed min to ðe ælc flæsc cymeð word unryhtwisra rihsodon ofer us & arleasnessum ussum gemiltsast eadig þone ðu gecure & afenge oneardaþ on eardungum we beoð gefylled on godum huses þines halig templ wundurlic on efennisse gehyr us hælo ure hyht ealra enda eorðan & on sæ feor gyrigende muntas on mægene begyrd of anwalde þu drefst grund sæs son yþa hire hwa acymð beoð gedrefede þeoda & ondrædaþ ealle þa ðe eardiaþ endas eorþan fram tacnum þinum utgang dægredes on æfene ðu geblissað herigað gode eal eorðe salm secgað naman his sellað wuldur lofe his secgað hu egeslicu synd weorc on mænigfealdnisse mægenis þines leogað þe fynd þine gebiddeþ ðe & singe þe salm he secge naman þinum þu hehsta cumað & geseoð weorc hu egeslic on geþeahtum ofer suna manna se gecyrde sæ on drige land flodas he oferfor mid fet þær we blissiað on þæt selfe se wyldeþ on mægene his on ecnesse eagan his ofer þeoda gelociað þa on eorre forðgecigað na hy beoð upahafen on him selfum bletsiað þeoda urne & gehlystað stemne lofes his þe gesette sawle to life & na he sealde beon astyred fet mine miltsige us & bletsie us onlyhte he andwlitan his þæt we ancnawen on eorðan weg on eallum þeodum hælo þine geandetten folc ealle blissien & gefægnien þeoda forðon þu demst folc on efnisse gerecest sealde wæstm hire & andræden hine ealle endas eorðan arise god & syn todræfed fynd his & fleon fram ansyne þa ðe hatedon hine swa swa teorade smic hy geteorien flewð weax of ansyne fyres swa he forwyrðen synfulle fram ansyne ryhtwise gewistfullien hy blissien on gesyhðe godes & gegladien on blisse singað gode salm cweþað naman his siþfæt doþ him þe astah ofer westdæl noma is him gefeogiað on gesihðe his beoð gedrefed of ansyne his fæderes steopcilda & deman wudewana on stowe haligre his þe eardian deþ anmode on huse se alædeþ gebundene on strangnesse gelice & þa þe on eorre forðgecigað þa eardiaþ on byrgennum þonne þu utgæst beforon folce þinum þonne þu færst þurh westen eorðe astyred & soþlice heofonas drupon of ansyne munt halne do ineodon wæteru oð to sawle mine afæstnod on lime grundes & nis sped ic com on deopnesse sæs & hreohnis besencte ic swanc clypiende hase geworden synd goman mine geteorodon eagan mine þonne ic hyhte on god minne gemænigfylde ofer loccas heafdes mines þa hatedon me butan gewyrhtum gestrangode synd ofer þe me ehtað fynd mine unryhtlice þa na ic reafode þa ic tolysde vel ageald wast unwisdom minne & scyldas ne synt behydd ascamigen þe anbidigað mægena na hy forwandien þa ðe secað fore ic forbær hosp oferwreah forwandung ansyne mine fremde geworden broþrum minum cuma bearnum modor on fultum minne beheald & to fylstanne efst gescamigen & forwandien fynd þa ðe secað sawle mine syn acyrred underbecling & areodigen þa ðe þencað me yfelu sona & aryderende þa ðe secgað eglaeg upahebben & blissien þa ðe secað & cweþen symle sy gemiclod þa ðe lufiað hælo þine soþlice wædla & þearfa fylste gefylsta alysend min na þu lata ic hyhte na ic gescamige on ecnesse on ðinre ryhtwisnesse alys nere onhyld eare þin beo gescyldend on stowe getrymede þæt halne þu do trymnes min & frofr vel gener eart ðu of handa synfulles ongean æ dondes & unryhtwises forðon geþyld min hyht min of iuguðe minre getrymed of innoðe of wambe modor minre min gescyldend ongalnis vel sang min symle swa swa foretacen geworden manegum gefylstend strang sy gefylled min of lofe þinum þæt ic mæge singan wuldur þin ælce dæg gemiclunga þine ne awyrp ðu on tide ylde þonne teorað mægen min na þu forlæte dom þinne cyninge sele rihtwisnesse þine suna cyninges deman folc þine rihtwisnesse & þearfan þine on dome onfon muntas sybbe folces þines beorgas ryhtwisnesse on his ryhtwisnesse he demþ þearfan þyses folces & hale he deþ suna þearfana & he geeaðmed hyspend & he wunað a mid sunnan & beforon monan on worold worulde & he adunestah swa swa ren on flys & dropunga dreopenda aspringð on dagum his riht & genihðsum sybbe oð bið upahafen mona & he wylt fram sæ oð sæ & fram flode oð gemæru ymbhwyrftes beforon on him feallað sigelhearwan & fynd eorðan licciað hu god israhela þam þe ryhtwise synt mine nean astyred fet nean agoten stæpas mine forðon ic æfstgode on synfullum sybbe synfulra geseonde forðon nis ahyldnes deaþe heora ne trumnis on wite on geswincum manna na synd & mid mannum na beoð swungen forðon namm hy ofermodnis oferwrigen of unrihtnesse & of arleasnisse his forþræsde swa swa of fetnisse unrihtwisnes heora hy ferdon on tosetetnisse heortan hy þohton & hy spræcon niþ unrihtwisnesse þearle hie spræcon hy setton on heofon muþ heora & tunge for ofer eorþan to hwon þu anyddest us on ende eorre is hatheortnis þin ofer sceap heorde þinre gemun gesomnunge þinre þa þu gescope of frymðe ðu alysdest gyrd yrefeweardnisse þinre munt on ðam þu eardast on þæt selfe ahefe hand þine on ofermodnisse heora hu fela awyrgde feond on haligum þinum & gewuldrude synd þa ðe þe hatedon on middum cafertune hy asetton tacnu hiora & na hy oncneowon swa swa on wege ofer heahne swa on wuda treowa æhsum hy aheowon dura his on þæt selfe of mattuce & adesan hy utawurpon hy hy anældon of fyre haligern þin on eorðan hy besmiton eardungstowe naman þines hy cwædon on heortan cyþð heora betweox hy cumað uton ofþriccan ealle dagas syml drihtnes fram eorþan tacn uru na we gesawon nu io witga & us na ancnawð ma we andettað þe & we cigað naman þinne ic cyþe ealle wundru þine þonne ic afo tid ic ryhtwisnesse deme gemolten is eorðe & ealle oneardgende on hire ic trymede swyras hire ic sægde unrihtwisum nellen ge unrihte don & agyltendum nellen ge upahebban horn on yplen eowerne & sprecan angean unryhtwisnesse forðon & na fram eastdæle fram westdæle & na fram westum muntum dema þisne geeaþmedeþ & þisne he ahefþ forðon cælic on handa wines clænis full is gemengedon & ahyld of þys on þys hwæðre þeah dræst his nis aidelude drincað of him ealle synfulle eorðan cuð on iudum on micel nama & geworden on sybbe stow his & eardung þær he forbricð hornas bogana scyld sweord gefeoht onlihtende wundurlice fram muntum ecum gedrefede ealle unwise heortan hie slepun swefnum his & nauht gemetton ealle weras welena on handum his fram þreange þinre hy hnappodon þa astigon hors þu egeslic & hwylc wiðstandeþ forð ðonne of eorre þinum of heofonum dom astrælod eorðe bifode & resteð of stefne minre ic cleopode stefn min & he behealdeþ me on dæg geswinces mines god ic sohte handum minum of nihte beforan him & na ic eom beswicen ic wiþsoc beon afrefred sawle mine gemyndig ic wæs & gelustfullud eom ic worhte & geteorode lythwon gast min toforon setton wæccan eagan mine gedrefed & na gesprecen ic þohte dagas alde & gear ece on mode ic hæfde & ic gemunde of nihte mid heortan minre ic swanc & ic windwode on me gast minne & ic cwæð cwistðu on ecnesse awyrpð oþðe na togeteohie þæt wel gecwemed si nu gyt on ende mildheortnesse his asliteð of worulde & cneorisse begymað folc min æ mine onhyldaþ eare eower on word muþes mines ic antyne on bigspellum muð minne ic sprece foresetednessa of frymðe worulde hu manega we gehyrdon & we gecneowon þa & fæderas ure hy cyþdon na synd bediglede fram sunum heora on cneorisse oþerre cyþende lofo & megenu his & wundru his þe he dyde & he awehte cyþnisse æ he sette þa bebead he fæderum urum þæt cuðe he dyden hy sunum heora & he ancnawe cneoris oþer suna þe beoð acenned hy arisað & cyþað þa sunum heora þæt hy setten on gode hyht hyra & na ofergyten weorca godes heora & bebodu his hy secen ne syn hy swa swa fæderas heora cynn þweor & þurhbiter þæt ne gerehte heortan his & nis gelyfed mid gode gast his suna begimende bogan & sendende stræla heora hy gecyrred synt on dæge gefeohtes he sende on hy eorre æbylgnisse his æbylgnesse && geswinc onsanda þurh ærendracan yfele comon þeoda on yrfeweardnisse þine hy besmiton templ halig þin hy setton swa swa apla hordern lic vel þa deadlican þeowa þinra mettas fugelum heofones flæsc haligra þinra wilddeorum eorðan hy aguton blod heora swa swa wæter on ymbhwyrfte & næs bebyrgde geworden we syndon on hosp neahgeburum urum of hleahtre & oferhygde þam þe on ymbhwyrfte syndon hu longe þu yrsast on ende bið anæled swa swa fyr eorre þin ageot yrre þin on ðeoda þa ðe na cuðon & on ricu þa cigdon naman þinne forðon æton & stow his hic forleton ne gemun ðu unrihtu ure alle raðe us foresette mildheortnes þin forðon þearfan geworden we synd swiðe gefylst us god hælend ure & fore arweorþunge naman þines alys us & gemiltsod beo þu synnum urum naman þinne þu ðe recest beheald þu þe lædst swa swa sceap þu ðe sitst ofer oðiew beforan awece anwald þin & cum þæt hale þu do us mægena gecyr us & oðeiw ansyne þine & hale we beoð hu lange eorsast þu on gebed þeowes þines þu metsast us of hlafe teara & drinc þu selst us on tearum on gemete þu settest us on wiþercwedulnisse neahgeburum urum & fynd ure hyspton us gecyrr us wingeard þu feredest þu awurpe þeoda & þu plantodest hine blissiað gefylstan urum singað nimad psalm & sellað gligbeam psaltere wynsumne mid hearpan singað of frymðe monðes of byman on dæg mærum symelnesse eowerre forðon bebod is & dom gode cyþnisse he sette hine þa he eode of lande tungan þe na he wiste he gehyrde & he acyrde fram byrþennum hric his handa his on wylegan þeowodon on geswince þu cigdest me & ic alysde ic gehyrde on bedihlinge hrehnisse ic afandode þe æt wæterum wiþercwedolnisse gehyr folc min & ic sprece & ic cyþe þe gif me þu gehyrst stod on gesomnunga goda on middele tocnaweð hu lange demaþ ge unrihtwisnesse & onsyne syngendra ge nimað demað steopcilde & wædlan eaðmodne & þearfan gerihtwisiað neriað þearfan & wædlan of handa synfulra alysað hy nyston & na hy angeton on þystrum hy gangað beoð astyred ealle grundweallas eorðan ic cwæð godas ge syndon & bearn þæs mæran ealle ge soþlice swa swa men ge sweltað & swa swa an of ealdrum ge hreosaþ aris god dom eorðan þu yrfeweardast on eallum þeodum hwylc gelic bið þe ne swiga ðu & ne þu ne forhafa forðon fynd þine swegdon & þa ðe þe hatedon hy ahofon heafod on folc þin gleawlice hy þohton geðeaht & hy þohton angean halige þine hy cwædon cumað uton forspillan hy of þeode & ne bið gemunen nama ma hy þohton geþoht on an ongean ðe cyþnisse todihtnodon geteld þara eorþlicra synnehyrendra & ða ælfremedan mid eardgendum & soþlice somod com mid him gewordene synd on andfeng bearnum loþes hu lufiendlicra eardunga þina mægena gewilnode & geteorode sawle min on cæfertunas drihtnes heorte min & flæsc min blissodon on god lifiendne & soþlice spearwa gemette him hus & turtle nest þær heo sette briddas hire altras þine mægena cyning min eadige þa ðe eardiað on huse þinum on woruld worulde heriað þe eadig wer þæs ðe is fultum fram ðe & upstige on heortan his tosette on dene teara on stowe þa þu tosettest him & soþlice bletsunga he selð þe æ sealde gangað of mægene on mægen bið gesewen god goda mægena gehyr bene mine earum anfoh godd þu bletsodest eorðan þine þu acyrdest hæfned þu forgefe unrihtwisnesse folces þines þu oferwruge ealle synna heora ðu geliðgodest eal eorre þin þu acyrdest fram eorre æbylgnisse þinre gecyr us god hælo ure & framacyrr eorre þin fram us þæt na on ecnesse þu eorsige us & na þu aðene eorre þin fram forecynrene on forecynren gecyrrende þu geliffæstast us & folc þin blissað on ðe oðeow us mildheortnesse þine & hælo þine sele us ic gehyre hwæt spricð on me he spricð sybbe on folc his & ofer halige his & on hy þe beoð gecyrred to him anhyld eare þin to me & gehyr wædla & þearfa ic eom geheald sawle mine halne do þeowne þinne hyhtendne on ðe gemiltsa forðon to ðe ic cleopode ælce dæg geblissa sawle þeowes þines forðon ic ahof mine wynsum & bilwite þu eart & spedig on mildheortnesse eallum gecigendum mid earum anfoh gebed min & begim stefne bene minre on dæg geswinces mines ic cleopode þu gehyrdest nis gelic ðe on godum & nis æfter weorcum þinum ealle þeoda swa hwelce swa þu worhtest hy cumað & gebiddaþ beforon & arweorðiað naman þinne grundweallas his on muntum haligum lufað gatu ofer ealle eardunga wuldurfulle gecweden synd be ðe ceaster godes gemyndig ic beo þam witendum þe on gesihðe ælfremede & folc sigelhearwana þa beoð on hyre modor cwyþ mann & geworden is on hyre & he gestaþelode hy se hyhsta cyþde on gewritum folca his & aldra heora þe wæron on hyre swa swa blissiendra ealra ure eardung is on ðe hælo minre on dæg ic cleopode & nyhte beforon ðe inga gebed min on gesihðe þine ahyld eare þin to bene minre forðon gefylled is yfelum sawl min & lif min on helle nealehte gewened eom ic mid adunestigendum on seað geworden eom ic swa swa mann butan fultome betweox deade freoh gewundode slæpende aworpen on gemyndstowum ðara na ðu gemundest ma & witodlice hy of handa þinre anydde synt hy asetton on seaðe þam neoðeran on þystrum & on scade deaþes on me getrymed is eorre þin & ealle upahefednessa þina ofer þu ingelæddest feor þu dydest cuðe mine fram me hy setton on anscununga him sealde & na ic uteode mildheortnissa þina on ecnesse ic singe on cynrene & forecynrene ic bodige soþfæstnisse þine on muðe minum þu cwæde on ecnesse mildheortnis bið getimbred on heofonum bið gegearwod soþfæstnis þin ic tosette cyþnisse mine gecorenum minum ic swor þeowe minum oð on ecnesse ic gearwie sæd þin & ic timbre on woruld worulde setl þin geandettað heofonas wundru þine & soþfæstnesse þine on gesomnunga haligra forðon hwylc on genipum bið geefenlæced oþðe hwylc gelic bið gode betweox bearn godes þe bið gewuldrud on geþeahte haligra micel & to andrædanne ofer ealle þe on ymbhwyrfte his mægena hwylc gelic þe rice þu eart & soþfæstnis þin on ymbhwyrfte þinum frofr geworden is us fram cneorisse & forcynrene ærþamðe wæren muntas oððe getrymed wære ymbhwyrft eorþan fram worulde & oþ on woruld þu eart ne acyr ðu mann on geniðerunga & þu cwæde gecyrrað suna manna þusend geara beforon eagan þine swa swa dæg gerstra þe forðsceoc & heordnis on nihte seo for naht is synd hæfde gear heora on mergen swa wyrt gewiteð bloweð & fareð on æfen afylð astiþað & adruwað we geteorodon on eorre þinum & on hatheortnesse þinre gedrefede we synd þu asettest unrihtwisnessa ura on gesihðe þine worulde ure alyhtnisse andwlitan þines ealle dagas ure geteorodon & we on eorre þinum geteorodon gear ure renge smeadon se eardaþ on fultume þæs hehstan on gescyldnisse heofones he wunað he cwyð andfeng min & frofr min ic hyhte on hine he alysde of grine huntgendra & fram worde wiþerweardum eahslum his he sceadewode & under feþerum his þu hyhst of scylde ymbselð soþfæstnes his na ðu ondrædst fram ege mihtlicum fram flane fleondre þurh dæg fram gestreone gangendum on ðystrum fram hryre & deofle suþernum hy feallað fram sidan þinre þusend & tyn þusenda fram swiþrum þinum þe na genealechþ hwæþre ðeah eagum þinum þu besceawast & edlean synna þu gesihst þu hyht min hehstne þu settest frofr þinne god is andettan & singan naman þinum þu hehsta to bodianne on mergenne mildheortnisse þine & soþfæstnesse þine þurh niht on tynstrengedum saltere mid cantice & hearpan forðon þu gebliðgodest on ongeweorce þinum weorcum handa þinra ic blissie hu gemiclode synd weorcu þine swiðe deope gewordene geþohtas þine wer unwis ne ancnawð & dysig na ongyt þa þonne upaspringað synfulle swa swa hyg & oðeowden ealle þa ðe wyrcað unryht þæt hy forweorþen on woruld worulde ðu soþlice ðe hehsta on ecnesse ricsode wlite he scrydde strangnesse & he begyrde hine of mægene & soþlice he getrymede ymbhwyrft eorðan þe na bið astyred gearo setl þin god syþðan fram worulde þu eart upahofon flodas upahofon stefna heora fram stefnum wætera manigra wundurlica ahafennissa sæs wundurlic on heahnessum cyþnessa þina geleaflica geworden syndon swiþe huse þinum gerisað halige on langnesse daga wraca drihten wrace freolice dyde ahefe ðe þu ðe demst eorðan gyld edlean ofermodum hu lange synfulle wuldriað bodiaþ & sprecað unrihtwisnesse sprecað ealle þa ðe wyrcað unrihtwisnesse folc þin hy niþeredon & yrfeweardnesse þine hy drehton wydowan & wræccan hy ofslogon & steopcild hy cwealdon & hy cwædon na gesihð na angyt ongytað nu þe unwise syndon on folce & dysige æt sumum cyrre angytað þe plantode eare na he gehyrð oþðe se þe hiwude eage na he besceawað cumað uton blissian drihtne uton dryman gode hælende urum we ofðriccen ansiene his on andetnesse & on sealmum we drymen him micel & cyning mære ofer ealle godas forðon na anydeþ folc his forðon on handa his synt ealle endas eorðan & heahnessa munta he gesihð his sæ & he worhte hy & eorðan gestaþelodon handa his cumað uton gebiddan & uton aþenian beforon god we wepen beforon drihtne þe worhte forðon he is drihten god ure we soþlice folc & sceap fostornoþes his to dæg gid stefne his ge gehyrað nellen ge wiðheardian heortan eowra swa swa on gremminge æfter dæge costunge on westene þær costodon vel fandodon mec fæderas eowre hy fandodon & gesawon weorc mine singað cantic niwne eall eorðe singað & bletsiað naman his wel bodiað of dæge on dæg hælo his bodiaþ betweox þeoda wuldur his on eallum folcum wundru his micel & herigendlic swiðe æþreclic ofer ealle godas godas þeoda woddreamas soþlice heofonas andetnes & fægernes on gesihðe his halignes & gemiclung on halignesse his bringað drihtne eþelas þeoda wuldur & arweorþunga naman his adoþ dura & gað in on cæfertunas gebiddaþ drihten on healle haligre his sy astyred of ansyne his eall eorðe rihsode gefægnie eorðe blissiað igland manegu genipu & þycnis on ymbhwyrfte his rihtwisnes & dom gerecednis setles his fyr beforon hine foregæð & onælð on ymbhwyrfte fynd his anlihton ligræscas his ymbhwyrfte geseah & gedrefed is eorðe muntas swa swa weax fleowon of ansyne drihtne forhtode eall eorðe bodedon heofonas ryht his & gesawon ealle folcu wuldur his ascamien þe gebiddaþ deofolgild & þa ðe wuldriað on deofolgildum heora gebiddaþ hine ealle englas gehyrde & geblissod is & fægnodon dohtra fore domum þinum se heahsta ofer ealle eorðan swiðe upahafen ofer ealle godas singað drihtne cantic niwne forðon wundru dyde hælde him seo swyþre his & earm halig his cuðe dyde hælo his beforon gesihðe þeoda he awreah rihtwisnesse his gemyndig he wæs mildheortnesse his & soþfæstnisse his huse gesawon ealle endas eorðan hælo drymað gode eall eorðe singað & blissiað & sealmiað urum on hearpan & stefne sealmes on bymum gelædendlicum & of stefne byman hyrnenre drymað on gesihðe cyninges sy astyred sæ & gefyllednes his ymbhwyrft eorþana & ealle þe eardiaþ on hyre flodas hafettað handum on þæt selfe muntas blissodon beforon ansyne he com deman eorðan he demþ ymbhwyrft eorþan on rihtwisnesse folc on efnnisse ricsode yrsien folcu þu ðe sitest ofer bið astyred eorðe micel & heah ofer ealle folcu andetten naman þinum miclum & egeslicum forðon halig he is & wyrðmynt cyninges dom lufað ðu gearwodest efnnesse dom & rihtwisnesse þu dydest upahebbað gefægniað urne & gebiddaþ scamel fota his forðon halig he is on sacerdum his betweox hy ða gecigað naman his hy cigdon & he gehyrde hy on swyre genipes he spræc to him hy heoldon cyþnessa his & bebodu his þa he sealde him þu gehyrdest hy gemiltsod þu wære him & wrecende on ealle gecneorþnessa heora upahebbað drihten urne & gebiddaþ on munte halgum his forðon halig is drihten god ure drymað gode eall eorðe þeowiað on blisse ingað on gesihðe his on bliþnesse vel wynsummunga witað þæt drihten he is god he worhte us & na selfe we we soþlice folc his & sceap fostornoðes his ingað on gatu his on andetnesse on cæfertunas on ymnum andetnessa heriað naman wynsum is on ecnesse mildheortnes his & oþ aworuld soþfæstnes his wæs mid iudeum on geardagum ealra cyninga gehwelc cristus nemnedattorcoppaofruncghis folgerum oððe his gegadumhosp uel edwitonsandato gytsunge uel to hyreoferhu ehteðgodesdeafese ðe ne ferde on geþeahte arleasra yrsige eala ðu drihten to hwy gemænigfylde synd þa ðe drefað me manige onarisaþ togeanes me manige cweðaþ sawle minre nys hælo hyre on gode his ðu soþlice drihten underfang min ðu eart wulder min & uphebbende heafod min stefne mine to drihtne ic clypude & he gehyrde me of munte halgan hys ic hnæppode & ic swodrode & ic aras forþon þe drihten onfeng me ne ic ondræde ðusenda folces ymbsyllende me aris drihten gehæl me god min forþon þu ofsloge ealle ða wiðriende me buton intingan teþ synfulra ðu tobryttest drihtne is hæl & ofer folce ðine bletsung ðin rihtwisnysse minre on gedrefednysse ðu tobreddest me gemiltsa min & gehyr gebed min sunu manna hu lange hefige heortan to hwon lufiað ge idelnysse & secað leasunga & witað þæt ðe gemycelade drihten his þone halgan drihten gehyrde me þonne ic clypode to him eorsiað & nylle ge singian þa ðe ge cweðað on heortum eowrum & on inclyfum eowrum obryrdað onsecgað onsægednysse rihtwisnysse & hopiað on drihtne manige cweðað hwylc æteowað us godu getacnod is ofer us leoht andwlitan ðines drihten ðu sealdest blisse on heortan minre fram wæstme hwætes & wines & eles his hi gemænigfilde synd on sibbe on ðæt sylfe ic hnæppie & ic reste forðan þu drihten synderlice on hyhte ðu gesettest me word min mid earum underfoh drihten ongyte ðu clypunge mine begim stemne gebede mines cyning min & god min forþan ðe to ðe ic gebidde drihten on ærnemergen & þu gehyrst stemne mine on ærnemergen ic ætstande þe & ic geseo forðan ðe na god wyllende onrihtwisnysse þu eart ne ne eardaþ wið ðe awyrged ne ne ðurhwuniað unrihtwise ætforan eagan ðine ðu hatudest ealle ða ðe wircað unrihtwisnysse ðu forspillest ealle ða þe sprecað leasunga wer blod & facnfulne onscuniað drihten ic soþlice on mycelnysse mildheortnysse ðine ic infare on huse ðinum ic gebidde to temple halgum ðinum on ege ðinum eala ðu drihten gelæd me on rihtwisnysse ðine forðam feondum minum gerece on gesihðe ðine weg minne forðan nis on muþe heora soðfæstnys heorte heora idel is byrgen opnigende is brace heora mid tungan heora facenfullice dydon dem ðu heom god gefellaþ fram geþohtum heora æfter mænigo arleasnyssa heora ut adræf hy forþan hy gremedon ðe drihten & geblissian ealle ða þe hopiaþ on ðe on ecnysse hy ahebbað & þu onwunast on heom & hy wuldriað on ðe ealle þa þe lufiaþ naman ðinne forðan þu bletsast rihtwisne drihten swa of scilde godes willan þu gehelmodest us eala þu drihten na on hætheortnysse þine ne þrea ðu me ne ne on graman ðinum ne ðrea þu me gemltsa min drihten forðan untrum ic eom gehæl me drihten forðan gedrefde synd ban mine & sawl min gedrefed is ðearle & ðu drihten hu lange gecyr drihten & genera sawle mine gehæl me forþan mildheortnysse þinre forþan þe nis on deaðe se ðe gemyndig ðin on helle soðlice hwylc geandetteþ ðe ic swanc on geomerunga minre ic ðwea ðurh ænlipie nihta bedd min of tearum minum stræle minum ic lecce vel wæte gedrefed is fram hatheortnysse eagan min ic ealdode betweox eallum feondum minum gewitað fram me ealle þa þe wyrcaþ unrihtwisnysse forðan ðe gehyrde drihten stemne wopes mines gehyrde drihten bene mine drihten gebed min he underfeng scamian & aðracian ðearle ealle fynd mine syn gecyrred & sceamian heom swyðe hrædlice drihten god min on þe ic hopie gehæl me of eallum ehtendum me & alis me ðilæs ahwænne gegripe swa swa leo sawle mine ðonne nis se þe alyseþ ne ne se ðe gehalne gedo drihten god min gyf ic dide þys gyf is unrihtwisnys on handum minum gyf ic ageald gyldendum me yfelu ic areose be gewyrhtum fram feondum minum on idel ehteð feond sawle mine & gegripeþ & fortredeð on eorðan lif min & wuldor min on dust gelædeþ aris drihten on graman þinum upahefe on endum feonda minra & aris drihten god min on bebode þe þu bebude & gesomnunga folca ymbtrymdon ðe & for ðisum on heannyssum gehwyrfdum drihten dem ðu folce dem me drihten æfter rihtwisnysse minre & æfter unscyldignysse minre ofer me sy fornumen man vel nið synfulra & gerece þu rihtwisne & smeagende heortan & lændenu god rihtwisne fultum minne fram drihtne se þe gehæle gedeð rihte heortan god dema rihtwis & strang & geþyldig cwys tu la yrsað geond ænlipie dagas buton ge gecyrrede beoð sweord his ascæcð bogan his he aþenede & gegyrede hine & on him gearcode fæt deaþes flana his byrnendum gefremede efne he geeacnað unrihtwisnysse & he onfeng sar & he cende unrihtwisnysse seað he openode & adealf hine & he hreas on seað vel on pit þone he worhte bið gecyrred sar his on heafod his & on hnol his unrihtwisnysse his astah ic andette drhtne æfter rihtwisnysse his & ic singe naman drihtne þam hehstan drihten drihten ure eala ðu swyðe wuldorlic is naman ðin on ealre eorðan forðan upahafen is gemærsod ðin ofer heofonas of muþe cildra & sucendra ðu fulfremodest laf for feondum ðinum þæt þu towurpe feond & gescyldend forðan ic geseo heofonas ðine weorc fingra ðinra mona & steorran ða þu gestaþelodest hwæt is se mann þæt gemindig sy his oððe sunu mannes forðan þe þu geneosast hine ðu wanodest hine lytle læs fram englum of wuldre & weorðmynt þu gewuldorbeagodest hine & þu gesettest hine ofer weorc handa ðinra ealle þing þu underþeodest under fotum his sceap & oxan ealle on ufon & nytenu ðæs feldes fugelas heofonan & fixas sæ ða ðe þurhgað paðas sæs drihten drihten ure eala þu swyðe wundorlic is naman ðin on ealre eorþan ic andette ðe drihten on ealre heortan minre ic recce ealle wundra ðine ic blissie & ic upahebbe on ðe ic singe naman ðinum þam hehstan ic gecyrre feod minne under bæc hi geuntrumiaþ & losiað fram ansyne ðinre forðan þe þu worhtest dom minne & intingan minne ðu sitst ofer ðrymsetl ðu ðe demst rihtwisnysse ðu þreadest ðeoda & forweorðað se arleasa nama heora ðu dylegodest on ecnysse & on weorulde weorulde fynd geteorodon of sweorde on ende & ceaster heora ðu tobræce vel towurpe losað gemynd heora mid swege & drihten on ecnysse ðurhwunað he gegearwode on dome ðyrmsetl his & he demð ymbhwyrft eorðan on emnysse he demd folce on rihtwisnysse & geworden is drihten gener ðearfena to fultume on on gedrefednysse & opiað on ðe ða ðe cuðon vel wiston naman ðinne forðan ðe þu ne forlætst ða secendan ðe drihten syngað drihtne se þe eardað on sion vel on besceawodnysse bodiað betweox ðeodum bigenga his forðan ðe secende blod heora gemindig is he ne forgeat clypunge ðearfena gemiltsa min drihten geseoh eadmodnysse mine of feondum minum ðu þe ahefst me of gatum deaðes þæt ic bodige ealle herunga ðine on gatum dohtra siones ic blissie on halo ðinre gefæstnode synd ðeoda on forwyrde ða ðe hi worhton on grine ðyssum ða ðe hi bediglodon vel behiddon gegripen is fot heora bið oncnawen drihten domas wyrcende on weorcum handa heora gegripen is synfulra syn gecirred ða synfullan on helle ealle ðeoda þa ðe ofergitað god forðan ðe na on ende ofergitol ne bið ðearfena geðyld ðearfa na forweorðað on ende aris drihten ne bið gestrangod man syn gedemed ðeoda on gesyhðe ðinre gesete drihten ælædende ofer hig þæt witan ðeoda forþan ðe menn synd to hwy drihten gewit þu feor ðu forsihst on on gedrefednysse ðonne ofermodgað se arleasa bið onæled ðearfa hi beoð gegripene on geþeahtum ða þe ðohton forðan ðe bið geherod se synfulla on gewylnungum sawle his & se unrihtwisa he bið gebletsod geabylgode drihten se synfulla æfter mænifyldnysse graman his ne secð nis god on gesihðe his besmitene synd wegas his on ealre tide beoð ofyrsede dom ðin fram ansine his ealra feonda heora anweald sæde soðlice on heorte his ic ne beo astyrod fram cynrine on cynrine buton yfelum ðæs of wirignysse muð full is & biternysse & facn under tungan his geswincg & sar he sittet on searwum mid weligum on digelnyssum þæt he ofslea unscyldigne eagan his on ðearfan beseoh he syrwð on digelnysse swa swa leo on scræfe hyre he syrwð þæt he gripe þearfan gegripan ðeafan ðonne he framatihð hine on gryne his genyþerað hine he onhyldeð hine & gereoseð þonne he wealdeð ða ðearfan sæde soðlice on heortan his ofergitol is god he acyrde ansyne his þelæs he geseo on ende aris drihten god sy upahafen hand ðin ne ofergit ðu þearfan forðan bysmarade se arleasa god sæde soðlice on heortan hys ne secaþ gesyhst forþon þe þu geswinc & sar beceawast þæt þu sylle hy on handum ðinum ðe læfed is þearfa steopcilde þu bitst fultum þu forbryt earm synfulles & awirgedan byþ gesoht synne hys & na gemet biþ drihten ryhsað on ecnysse & on worulde aworuld ge forweroðaþ þeoda of eorþan his gyrninge ðearfana gehyrde drihten gearcunge heortan heora gehyrde eare ðin his weleras facenfulle on heortan & of heortan hi spræcon tostencð drihten ealle weleras facnfulle tungan ða felaspecolan þa ðe cwædon tungan ure ðe gemiclað weleras ure fram us synd hwylc ure drihten is for yrmðe unspedig & geomrunge þearfena nu ða ic arise cweð drihten ic sette hælo getreowfullice ic on ðam spræca drihtnes spræca clæne seolfor of fyre amered afandod eorðan aclænsod seofonfealdlice þu drihten gehealdst us & beweardast us fram cynryne oð on ecnysse on ymbhwyrfte arlease gangað æfter heahnysse þinre ðu gemænigfyldest sunu manna hu lange drihten ofergyts ðu me on ende hu lange awens ðu ansyne ðin fram me hu lange ic sette geþeaht on sawle minre sar on heortan þurh dæg hu lange byþ upahafen feond min ofer me beseoh & gehyr me drihten god min onlyht eagan mine þylæs æfre ic slape on deaþe þylæs hwænne cweðe feond min ic togeanes hine ða þe drefað me hi blissiaþ gyf ic beo ic soþlice on mildheortnysse þinre ic hopude blissað heorte min on hælo þinre ic synge drihtne se ðe gode þynge sealde me & ic singe naman drihtnes ðæs hyhstan sæde se unwisa on heortan his nis god hi gewemmede synd & onscuniendlice gewordene synd on biggenon heora nis se ðe do god nis oð anum drihten of heofonum beheold ofer sunu manna þæt he geseo gyf is ongitende oððe secende god ealle hi ahyldon samod onnitte gewordene synt nis se ðe do god nis oð anum byrgen opniende is heora tangan heora facnfullice hy dydon attor nædrena under welerum heora ðara muþ awyrgednysse & byternysse full is hrade fot heora to ageotenne blod forbrytednys & on ungesælignys on wegum heora & weg sibbe he ne oncneowon nis ege godes ætforan eagan heora hi ne oncnawað ealle þa þe wyrcað unrihtwisnysse þa ðe forswelgað folc min swa swa mete hlafes drihten hi na gecygdon ðær hi forhtudon ege ðær na wæs ege forþon drihten on cynryne rihtwisre is geðeaht wædlan ðu forðon drihten hyht his is hwylc sylð of sion hælo israhele ðonne awænt drihten hæftnunge folces his blissað iaco & fægnað israhela drihten hwylc eardað on getelde ðinum oððe hwylc geresteð on munte halgum þinum se ðe infærð buton wæmme & wyrcð rihtwisnysse se ðe sprycð soþfæstnysse on heortan his se þe ne dyde facn on tungan his ne ne dyde nextan his yfel & hosp ne onfeng togeanes nehstan his to nahte geteald biþ vel læd is on gesihðe his se awyrgeda þa ondrædendan soðlice drihten he gemiclað se ðe swerað nehstan his & na swicð se ðe feoh his ne sealde to gytsunge & metsceattas ofer þone unscildigan he ne onfengc se þe deþ þas ne biþ gedræfed on ecnysse geheald me drihten forðon ic hopude on ðe ic sæde drihtne god min eart ðu forðon ðe goda minra þu ne beðearft halgan ðe synd on lande his he wundrade ealle willan mine on heom gemænigfylde synd on untrumnyssa heora siðþan hy efston ne ic ne gæderige gemetinga heora of blodum ne ic gemyndig beo naman heora ðurh weleras mine drihten dæl yrfwerdnysse minre & calices mines ðu eart þe gesettest yrfwerdnysse mine me rapas gefellon me on beorhtum witedlice yrfwerdnys min beorht is me ic bletsie drihten se ðe sealde me andgyt ofer þæt & oððe to nyhte me ædran mine ic forsceawode drihten on gesihðe minre symble forðon to swyðran is me ne ic astyred beo for ðysum gelustfullod is heorte min & upahefþ tunga mine & on ufon þæt & flæsc min resteð on hyhte gehyr drihten rihtwisnysse mine begym bene mine mid earum onfoh gebed min na on welerum facnfullum of andwlitan þinum dom minne yppe eagan ðine geseon emnyssa ðu afandodest heorte mine & ðu neosodest niht fyre me þu ameredest & nis gemet on me unrihtwisnysse þæt ne sprece muð min weorc manna for wordum welera ðinra ic gehealde wegas hearde fulfrema stæpas mine on paðum þinum þæt ne syn astyrod fotswaþu mine ic cleopude forþon þu gehyrdest me god onhyld eare ðin me & gehyr word min gewundorlæc mildheortnyssa ðine ðu þe hale dest ða hopiendan on ðe fram þa hwyderstandendum swyþran ðinre geheald me swa seon eagan under scaduwe fiðera ðinra gescyld me fram ansine arleasra ða ðe me swencton fynd mine sawle mine ymbsealdon ic lufige ðe drihten strengeþ min drihten trumnes min & frofor min & alysend min god min gefylsta min & ic hopude on hine gescyldend min & horn hæle minre & underfang min heriende ic gecege drihten & fram feondum minum ymbtrymdon me sar deaþes burnan unrihtwisnysse gedrefdon me sar on helle ymbtrymdon me forcomon vel abysgodon me grinu deaþes on gedrefednysse minre ic cege drihten & to gode mine ic clypude & he gehyrde of temple þam halgan his stefne mine & clypung min on gesihþe his infærð on earum his astyrod is & forhtode eorþe & grundweallas munta gedrefde synd & astyrude synd forðon ðe yrre is him astah smic on graman his & fyr fram ansyne his forbærnde gleda vel cola onælde synd fram him heofonas bodiaþ vel cyþaþ wuldor godes & weorc handa his bodað vel cyþ trumnysse vel staðol dæg ðam dæge bealceþ word & niht nihte bycneþ ingehyd vel gesæd wisdom ne synd spræca ne word vel spræca ðara ne synd gehyred stæfna heora on ealre eorþan utfor sweg heora & on ende ymbhyftes eorþan word heora on sunnan he gesette getelda his & he swa swa brydguma forþgewitende of brydbure his he blissode swa swa ent to yrnenne weg fram hean heofone utgang his & geancyr his oð to heahnesse his ne is se þe hine behydde fram hæton his æ drihtnes antalic gecyrende sawle gecyþnys drihten getreowfull wisdom vel snytro gearwiende lytlingum rihtwisnyssa drihtnes rihte geblissigendra heortan bebod drihtnes beorht onlihtende eagan gehyre ðe drihten on dæge gedrefednysse gescylde þe naman godes iacobes he asende ðe fultum of halgum & of heahnysse he gescylde ðe he gemindig sy eallre ofrunge ðinre & onsægednyssa ðin fætt sy vel geweorðe selle ðe æfter heortan ðinre & ealle geþeaht ðin he getrymð we blissiaþ on hælo þinre & on naman godes ures we beoþ gemiclode gefylle drihten ealle bena vel gyrnynga ðine nu þa ic oncneow forþon ðe halne gedeþ drihten cyning crist his he gehyrð hine of heofonum halgum his on andwealdum hæl ðære swyþran his ða hi on wænum vel crætum & hi on horsum we soþlice on naman drihtnes godes ures we gecegað vel cleopiaþ hig ofergytende wæron & hi feollon we soþlice arison & arehte we synd eala ðu drihten on mihte ðin blissiað cyningc & ofer hælo ðine he blissade ðearle gyrnynge heortan his ðu sealdest him & fram willan welera his þu ne bescyredest hine forðon þu forecome hine on bletsunge swetnysse ðu gesettest on heafde his gewuldorbeagod of stane deorwyrðum lif he bæd fram ðe & ðu sealdest him langsumnysse daga on weorulde & on weorulda woruld micel wuldor his on hælo ðinre wuldor & mycelne wlite ðu asetst ofer hine forþon þu selst hine on bletsunge on weorulde worul ðu geblissast hine on gefean mid andwlitan þinum forðon cyningc hopað on drihtne & on mildheortnysse þæs hehstan na he ne bið astyrod sy gemet hand ðin eallum feondum ðinum ðeo swyþre ðin gemett ealle ðe þe hatudon god god min beseoh me forhwy me ðu forlete feor fram hælo minre word gylta minra god min ic clypige þurh dæg & ðu ne gehyrest & niht & nalæs to unwisdome me ðu soþlice on halgum wunast lof israhele on ðe ic hopude fæderas ure hig hopudon & þu alysdest hig to ðe ic clypude & hale hi gewordene synd on ðe hi gehihton & ne synd gescynde ic soðlice ic eom wyrm & na man hosp manna & aworpennys folces ealle ða þe gesawon tældon vel bysmrodon me hig spræcon mid welerum & hrysedon heora heafod hig hopudon on drihtne he generað hine halne he gedeþ hine forðon he wile hine drihten gerehte me & naht me wana bið on stowe læswe ðær me he gestaðelode ofer wæteru gereordunga he fedde me sawle mine he gecyrde he gelædde me ofer paðas rihtwisnysse for naman his soðes & gyf ic gange on midlunge sceaduwe forðam he ofer sæs & ofer flod he gegearwode hine hwylc astihð on munte drihtnes oððe hwylc standeþ on stowe halgan his underigende handum & clænre heortan se ðe na onfeng on ydel sawle his ne ne swor on facne ðam nextan his ðæs onfehþ bletsunga fram drihtne & mildheortnysse fram gode hælo his ðis is cynrin secendra hine secendra ansine godes iacobes undo gatu ealdras eowre & upahebbað gatu eccelice & ingangeð cyningc wuldres hwylc is ðes cyningc wuldres drihten strang & mihtig drihten mihtig on gefeohte undo gatu ealdras eowre & upahebbað gatu ecelice & ingangeð cyningc wuldres to ðe drihten ic ahof sawle mine god min on ðe ic getreowe ne scamie ne ne bysmrian me fynd mine & witendlice ealle ða ðe geðyldigað ðe na hi ne beoð gescende syn gescende ealle unrihtlice ofer ydelnysse wegas ðine drihten ðu me & siðfatu ðine tæc me gerece me on soþfæstnysse ðine & tæc me forþan þu eart god hælend min & ðe ic geþyldgode ealne dæg gemune miltsunga ðinra drihten & mildheortnyssa ðinra þe of worulde synd gylta iuguðhades minre & nytennyssa mine ne gemun ðu æfter mildheortnyssa ðine gemun ðu min ðu for godnysse þine drihten swete & rihtwis drihten for þam æ sylð ðam agiltendum on wege he gerecð manþwære on dome he tæcð þa bylehwitan wegas his dem me drihten forþam ðe ic on unscyldignyssa minre ic ingange & on drihtne hopiende na ic untrumge afanda me drihten & costna me bærn æddran mine & heorte mine forðam ðe mildheortnyssa ðin ætforan eagan mine is & ic gelicode on soðfæstnysse ðine ic ne sæt mid geþeahte ydelnyssa & mid unrihte dondum na ic infare vel inga ic hatude cyrcean awyrgedra & mid arleasum na ic ne sitte ic ðwea betwux unscyldige handa mine & ic ymbsylle weofod ðinre drihten þæt ic gehyre stefne lofes & ic cyðe ealle wundra ðine drihten ic lufode wlite huses ðines & stowe eardunge wuldres ðines ne forspil ðu ðone arleasan sawle mine & mid werum bloda lif min drihten onlyhtnes min & hælo min þonne ic ondræde drihten gescyldend lifes
