mines fram hwam ic forhtige ðonne genealæcað ofer me scæðende þæt hig etan flæsc min þa ðe drefaþ me fynd mine hig geuntrumode synd & hig feollon gyf standað togeanes me weredu na ondrædeþ heorte min gyf aryse ongean me gefeoht on ðysum ic hopige an ic beo fram drihtne þæt ic gegyrnde þæt ic onwunige on huse drihtnes eallum dagum lifes mines þæt ic geseo willan drihtnes & ic geneosige forðam ðe behydde me on getelde his on dæge yfelra he scylde me on digelnysse geteldes his on stane he upahof me & nu þa he upahefþ heafod min ofer fynd mine ic ymbga & ic offrige on getelde his onsægednyssa mid cleopunge ic singe & sealm cweðe drihtne gehyr drihten stefne mine on ðære ic clypude gemiltsa min & gehyr me ðe sæde heorte min ic sohte ðe ansyn min ansyne ðin drihten ic sece ne awend ðu ansine ðin fram me ne ahyld ðu on graman fram þeowe ðinum gefultuma min beo ðu ne forlæt ðu me ne ne forseoh me god hælo min to ðe drihten ic clypige god min ne swyga ðu fram me þelæs ðu suwige fram me & ic beo gelice ðam stigendum on seað gehyr drihten stefne bene mine þonne ic gebidde to ðe ðonne ic upahebbe hand mine to temple halgum ðinum ne samod ðu sylle me mid synfullum & mid wyrcendum unrihtwisnysse ne forspil ðu me ða þe sprecað sybbe mid nehstan his yfelu soðlice on heortum heora syle heom æfter weorcu heora & æfter nearuþancum wiðmetednyssa heora æfter handa heora agild heom agyld edlean heora him forðam na hi ongeaton weorc drihtnes & on weorcum handa his tobræc hi & na þu getimbrast hi gebletsod is drihten forðam ðe gehyrde stefne bene mine drihten gefylsta min & gescyldend min on him hopude heorte min & gefultumod ic eom & bleow flæsc min & of willan minum ic andette him drihten strengðe folces his & bewerigend haligra cyningces his is gehæl folc ðin drihten & bletsa yrfweardnyssa þine & gerece þu hig & ahefe hi oð on ecnysse bryngað drihtne bearn godes bryngað drihtne sunu ramma bryngað drihtne wuldor & weorðmynt bryngað drihtne wuldor naman his gebiddað drihtne on cafertune halgum his stefn drihtnes ofer wæteru god mægnþrymmes swegde drihten ofer wæteru manega stefn drihtnes on mihte stefne drihtnes on mærsungum stefn drihtnes forbrecendes cederbeamm & forbricð drihten cederbea ðæs holtes & forcnydeþ hi swa swa cealfas ðæs holtes & gecorena on ðam gemete bearn anhyrnendra stefn drihtnes tosceadendis leg fyres stefn drihtnes tosceacende westen & astyrod bið drihten on westen feallað stefn drihtnes gearwiendes heorttan & awrihð þiccettu & on temple his ealle cweðað wuldor ic ahebbe ðe drihten forðam þu afenge me ne ðu na tobræddest fynd mine ofer me drihten god min ic clypode to ðe & ðu gehældest me drihten þu atuge fram helwarum sawle mine gehæl me fram astigendum on seaðe syngað drihtne halige his & ic andette gemynd halignysse his forþam graman on æbylignysse his & lif on willan his on æfen wunaþ wop & on dægred blis ic soðlice sæde on genihtsumnysse minre na ic beon astyrod on ecnysse drihten on willan ðinum þu gearwodest wlite minum mægn þu awændest ansyne ðine fram me & geworden ic eom gedrefed to ðe drihten ic clypode & to gode minum ic bidde on ðe drihten ic hopude na ic ne beo gescend on ecnysse on rihtwisnysse ðine alys me ahyld to me eare ðin efst vel nealæce þæt þu generige me beo þu me on gode gescyldend & on huse rotnysse þæt þu halne me do forðam ðe strengð min & frofor min eart ðu & for naman ðinum þu lætst me & ðu fedest me ðu lædest me of grine ðam ðe hi behyddon me forðam ðe ðu eart bewerigend min on handa ðine ic bebeode gast minne ðu alysdest me drihten god soþfæstnys þu hatudest beweardgende ydelnysse ofer unnyt ic soðlice on drihtne ic hihte ic fægnige & ic blissige on mildheortnyssa ðine forðam þu beheolde eadmodnyssa mine gehæle of nedum sawle mine ne þu na beclysdest me on handum feondes ðu gesettest on stowe widgylre fet mine eadige ðara þe forgyfene synd unrihtwisnysse & þara þe bewrigene synd synd eadig wer þam þe na ætwiteþ drihten synna & nys on gaste his facen forðam ðe ic swygode on ealdodon ban mine ðonne ic clypode ealne dæg forðam ðe dæges & nihtes gehefegod is ofer me hand ðin gecyrred ic eom on agnysse min ðonne bið tobrocen hrycg scyld minne cuðne ðe ic dyde & rihtwisnysse mine na ic ne behydde ic sæde ic andette ongean me rihtwisnysse mine drihtne & ðu forgeafe arleasnysse synne minre for ðyssere gebæd to ðe ealle halig on tide gehyþelicre ðeahhwæþere on flode wætera manigra to him na togenealæcað ðu eart gener min fram gedrefednysse se ðe ymbtrymdon vel sealdon me blis min genera me fram ymbsyllendum me ongyt ðe syle & ic lære ðe on wege his ðu onstæpst ic getrymme ofer ðe eagan mine nylle ge beon swa swa hors & mul ðam nis andgyt on gewealde & bitole ceacan heora gewrið vel gebind ða þe na togenealæcað to þe blissiað rihtwise on drihtne rihtwise gerist herung andettað drihtne on hearpan on saltere tynstrenga syngað him syngað him canticc niwne well syngað him on stemne hludre forðam þe riht is word drihtnes & ealle weorc his on geleafan lufað mildheortnysse & dom mildheortnysse drihtnes full is eorðe word drihtnes heofones getrymde synd & gast muðes his ealle mihta heora gesomnigende swa swa on bytte wæteru sæs settende on goldhordum neowelnysse ondræde drihten eall eorðe fram him soðlice beon astyrode ealle oneardigende ymbhwyrft forðon þe he sæde & gewordene synd he bebead & sceapene synd ic bletsie drihten on eallre tide symble lof his on muðe minum on drihtne bið geherod sawla min gehyran ða bylewitan & blissian mærsiað drihtne mid me & upahebbað naman his us betweonan ic sohte drihten & he gehyrde me & of ealre gedrefednyssum minun he nerode me genealæcað to him & ge beoð onlihte & ansyne eowre ne beoð gescende ðes þearfa clypode & drihten gehyrde hine & of eallum gedrefednyssum his he gehæleþ hine asend ængel drihtnes on ymbhwyrfte ondrædendum hine & he generaþ hig onbyrgað & geseoð forðam ðe winsum is drihten eadig wer se ðe hopað on hine dem drihten derigende me oferwin onwinnende me gegrip wæpn & scyld & aris to fultume me ageot & beluc togeanes hig þa þe ehtað min cweðe sawle min hælo ðin ic eom gesceamian vel gescende & aðracian vel & syn geunarode ða secendan sawle mine syn gecyrrede under bæcc & gesceamian þam þencendan me yfelu geweorðe swa swa dust ætforan ansyne windes & englas drihtnes hig syn wegas heora ðystra & slipore & ænglas drihtnes ehtende hig forðam þe buton hi behyddon me on forwyrde grines his ofer ydel hy hyspton sawle mine cume him grin þæt hi ne gecnawon & hæftnunga þone þe he behydde togegripe hine & on grine feallan on þæt sylfe sawla soðlice min blissode on drihtne bið gelusfullod ofer hælo his cwæþ se unrihtwisa þæt he agylte on him sylfum nis ege godes ætforan eagan his ege forþam ðe facenfullice he dyde on gesihðe his þæt he gemette unrihtwisnysse his to hatunge word muðes his unrihtwisnys & facen he nolde ongitan þæt he wel dide unrihtwisnysse he smeade on incleofum his he ætstod ælcum wege na godum yfelnysse soðlice na he hatude drihten on heofonum mildheortnyssa þin & soðfæstnys ðin oð to genipum rihtwisnys ðin swa duna godes domas ðine neowelnys micellu vel fela feald mann & nitenu ðu gehælst drihten on þam gemetum ðu gemænigfyldest mildheortnysse ðine god sunu soðlice manna on wæfelse fyðera ðinra hihtað beoð druncene of genihtsumnysse huses ðines & of burnan willan ðines þu drenctest hi nylle þu onbyrgan on yfelwyllendum ne ne andian þam dondum unrihtwisnysse forðam ðe swa swa heg hrædlice adrugað & on ðam gemete bleda wyrta hrædlice feallað hopa on drihtne & do godnysse onearda eorðan & þu bist feded on welum his gelustfulla on drihtne & he sylþ ðe gyrningce heortan ðines unwreoh drihtne weg ðinne & hopa on hine & he deð & he gelædeþ swa swa leoht rihtwisnysse ðine & dom ðinne swa swa middæg underðeod beo þu drihtne & bide hine nylle ðu byrgan on hine ðe bið gesundfullod on wege his on menn dondum unrihtwisnysse ablin ðu fram yrre & forlæt hatheortnysse nylle þu onbyrgan þæt þu wyrge forðam þa ðe wyrgað beoþ geteorode þa geþyldigan soðlice drihten hi yrfweardnysse eorðan eala ðu drihten ne hatheortnysse ðin ne ðrea ðu me ne ne on yrre þynum ne nyrwa ðu me forðam ðe flana ðine ongefæstnode synt me & þu getrymdest ofer me hand ðine nys hælo on flæsce mine fram ansyne yrre ðine nys sib banum minum fram ansyne synna minra forðon unrihtwisnysse minre ofer stæpas synd heofod min swa swa byrðen hefig gehefegode synd ofer me rotudon & gebrosnode synd dolhswaðo mine fram ansyne unwisdomes mines earm geworden ic eom & ic eom oð ende ealne dæg geunrotsod ic ineode forðam min gefyllede synd on bysmrungum & nis hælo on flæsce mine gewæht ic eom & geeadmet ic eom ðearle ic grymetede fram geomrunga heortan minre ic sæde ic gehealde wegas mine þæt ic ne agylte on tungan mine ic sette muðe minum ic gehealde ðonne standeð se synfulla togeanes me ic adumbede & eadmedde ic eom & ic swigode fram godum & sar min geedniwod is gehatude heorte min on in me & on smeaungum mine byrnð fyr sprecende ic eom on tungan mire cuðne do me drihten ende minne & getel vel gerim dagena minra la hwy is þæt ic wite hwæt wana sy me efne gemetegode ðu settest dagas mine & sped minne swa swa naht beforan ðe ðeahhwæþere eall ydelnys ælc man lifigende þeahhwæþere on anlicnysse þurhfærð man ac on ydel bið gedrefed goldhordað & nat hwam hit gæderað vel somnað þa & nu ða hwylc is anbidung min hunu drihten & sped min fram ðe is fram eallum unrihtwisnysse min genera me hosp unwinsum ðu sealdest me geanbida ic anbad drihten & he begymde me & he gehyrde bene mine & he gelædde me of seaðe yrmðe & of fenne drosna & he gesette ofer stan fet mine & he gerehte stæpas mine & he onsende on muþe minum cantice nywne leoð gode urum we geseoð manige & ondrædaþ & on drihtne eadig wer þæs þe is nama drihtnes hiht his & na beheold on ydelnysse & on spæce heow lease fela þu dydest ðu drihten god min wundra ðine & geþohtum ðinum nys hwylc is gelic ðe ic cyþe & ic spræc gemænigfylde synd ofer getela vel gerim onsægednyssa & ofrunga þu nol earan soþlice þu fulfremedest me onsægednyssa & for synne na ðu ne bæde þonne ic sæde efne ic cume on heafde boc gewriten is be me þæt ic do willan þinne god minne ic wolde & æ ðine on middele heortan mine eadig bið se ðe ongyteð ofer ælþeodigum & ðearfan on dæge yfelu alysþ hine drihten gehealdeð hine & geliffæstað hine & eadigne he deþ hine on eorðan & na he seleþ hine on sawle feonda his spede bryngað him ofer bedd sar his ealle his ðu acyrdest on untrumnysse ic cwæþ drihten gemiltsa min halo sawle mine forðam ic singode ðe fynd min sædon yfelu me hwænne sweltaþ & losað nama his & gyf hi inneodon þæt hi gesawon ydel gespræc heorte his gegaderode unrihtwisnysse him hi eodon ut & spræcon on þæt sylfe togeanes me ealle fynd mine ongean me hi ðohton yfelu me word unrihtwis hi gesetton togeanes me cwyþst þu la se þe hnæppað ne geteohað he þæt he arise on þam gemete wilnað heort to wyllan wætera swa wilnað sawle min to ðe god ðyrste sawle minre to gode lifigende hwænne ic cume & oðywe ætforan ansyne wæron me tearas mine hlafas dæges & nihtes ðonne bið cweden me dæghwamlice hwær is god ðin þyssa gemyndig ic eom & ic ageat on me sawle mine forðan ðe ic fare on stowe getelda to wunderlices oð on hus godes on stemne blisse & anddetnysse sweg wistfulgend forhwy unrot eart sawle min & forhwon drefst me hopa on gode forðon nugit ic andete him hælo andwlitan minne & god min fram me sylfum saul min gedrefed is forþon gemyndig ic beo þin of eorðan ðære ea & anathema fram dune medmiclum deopnys neowelnysse ceg on stemne wæterædrena ðinra ealle heannyssa þine & yða ðine ofer me on dæge he bebead drihten mildheortnysse his & nihte cantic his mid me gebed gode lif mines dem me god & toscead intingan minne of ðeode unhaligre fram mannum unrihtwisum & facenfulle genera me forþon þu eart god strang min forhwy þu anydest & forhwy unrot ic ðonne swencð me feond asend leoht þin & soðfæstnysse ðine þa me læddon & togelæddon on munte halig þinum & on getelde ðinum & ic infare to weofode godes to gode þe geblissað on iuguðe mine ic andette ðe on hearpan god min forhwy unrot is saul min & forhwy drefst me hopa on gode forðam ðe nugyt ic andette him hælo andwlitan mines & god min god mid earum urum we gehyrdon fæderas ure hy bodudon vel cyddon us weorc þæt þu worhtest on dægum heora on dagum eallum hand þin ðeoda forspylde & þu plantudost hig þu swenctest folc & þu utanyddest hi ne soðlice on sweorde his hi ahnodon eorðan & earm heora ne hælþ hig ac seo swyþre ðin & earm ðin lyhtinge andwlitan þines þu gelicodest on him ðu eart sylf cyningc min & god min ðu ðe bebeodest hælo iacobe on ðe fynd ure we awyndwiað hornu & on naman ðinum we forhycgað onarisendum on us na soþlice mid bogum minum ic hihte & sweord min ne hælð me þu gehældest soþlice us fram swencendum us & hatigende us þu gescendest on dæge we beoð geherode ælce dæge & on naman ðinum we andettað on worulde bealcetteð heorte min word god cweðe ic weorc min ðæs cyninges tunge min hrædlice wrytendes wlytig for bearnum manna agoten is gyfe on welerum þinum forða bletsode þe god on ecnysse ymbgyrdan sweorde þyðum ofer ðeoh ðinum mihtiglice wlite þinum & fægernysse ðin begym gesundfullice forðgewit & for soþfæstnysse & geþwærnysse & rihtwisnys & gelædeþ ðe wundorlice seo swyðre þin flana ðine scearpe folces under þe feallað on heortan feonda ðæs cyningces setl ðin god on worulde woruld gyrd rihtingce gyrd rices ðines ðu lufodest rihtwisnysse & þu hatudest unrihtwisnysse forðon smerede þe god ðin mid ele blisse for gehlytum ðinum & swete wyrt of reafum ðinum to eallum elpenbanum of ðam gelustfullodon ðe god ure gener & miht gefylsta on gedrefednysse þa gemetton us swyþe forðon na we adrædað ðonne biþ gedrefed eorðe & beoð borne muntas on heortan sæs swegdon & gedrefede synd wætera heora gedrefede synd duna on strencgþe his flodes onræs geblissað ceastre godes he halgode geteld his þas hyhstan god on middele his ne bið astyrod gefultumað hig god on ærnemergen gedrefede synd þeoda & onhylde synd ricu sealde stemne his astyrod is eorðe drihten mihtig mid us underfang ure god iacobes cumaþ & geseoð weorc drihtnes þe he sette foretacna ofer eorðan ealle ðeoda blissiað mid handum drymað gode on stemne blissiað forðam ðe drihten se hehsta egeslic cyngc mycel ofer ealre eorðan he underþeodde folc us & ðeode under fotum urum he geceas us yrfweardnysse his wlite iacobes se þe he lufude astah god on wyndreame & drihten on stefne byman syngað gode urum syngað syngað cyningce syngað forþon cyningc eallre eorðan god syngað wyslice rixað god ofer ðeoda god sitt ofer setle halgan his mycel drihten & herigendlic swyðe on ceastre godes ures on munte halgum his timbrigend ealle eorðan muntas siones side norðdæl ceaster cyningas þæs miclan god on stæpum his bið tocnawen mid he afehð hi forðon ðe efne cyningas gegaderode synd hy comon on an he geseonde swa wundrigende synd gedrefde synd astyrode synd bifung gegrap hig ðær sar eacniend on gaste swyþlicu forbrytende scypu tarso swa swa we gehyrdon swa we gesawon on ceastre drihtnes mihta on ceastre godes ures god gestaðela hi on ecnysse gehyrað þas ealle ðeoda mid earum underfoh ealle þa þe eardiað ybhwyrfte eorþware & sunu manna an anum weli & ðearfa muþ min sprecþ wisdom & gemynd heortan minre gleawnysse ic ahylde on bigspelle eare min ic atyne on saltere forgesettenysse mine tohwon adræde on dæge yfelu unrihtwisnys hos mine ymbsylþ me þa ðe getrywaþ on mihte his & on mænifealdnysse welena heora hi beoð gewuldrode broðor ne alyseþ alyseþ man ne sylþ gode gecwemnysse his & weorð alysednysse sawle his & swanc on ecnysse god ealra goda drihten sprecende wæs & gecegde eorðan of sunan upsprince oð setellung of sion wlitan his god eawunga cymeþ god ure & he na swigeð fyr on gesyhðe his byrnð & on ymbhwyrfte his hreohnys strang to he gecegde heofon uppe & eorðan þæt he tosceade folc his gegaderiað him halige his þa endebyrdent gecyþnysse his ofer ofrunga & cyðaþ heofonas rihtwisnysse hys forðan ðe god dema is gehyr folc min & ic sprece to israhele & ic cyðe ðe god ðin ic eom na onsægednyssa ðinum ic þreage þe onsægednyssa soðlice ðina on gesihðe minre synd simble ne onfo of huse ðinum calfas ne ne of eowdum ðinum buccan gemiltsa min god æfter mycelre mildheortnysse þinre & æfter manigfealdre miltsunga ðinra adilga unrihtwisnysse mine ma aþweah me fram unrihtwisnysse mine & of synnum minum clansa me forðan unrihtwisnysse minre ic oncnawe & synne mine ongean me is symble ðe anum ic syngode & yfel beforan ðe ic dyde þæt þu beo gerihtwisod on spræcum ðinum & þu oferswyþe þone þu dend eart efne soþlice on unrihtwisnysse geeacnod ic eom & on synnum me modor min efne soþlice soþfæstnysse þu lufudest ongewissu & diglu wisdomes ðines þu swutelodest me ðu stredest me mid hysopon & ic beo geclænsod ðu aþweahst me & ofer snaw ic beo ablicen hwæt wuldrast ðu on yfelwyllendnysse þu þe mihtig eart on unrihtwisnysse ealne dæg unrihtwisnysse þohte tunga þin swa swa scearp nægelseax þu dydest facen þu lufudest yfelnysse ofer unrihtwisnysse ma þonne tosprecene emnysse ealle word wyþercweðunga tunga facenfulre forðon god forwerað þe on ende & upaluceþ ðe &/ afærð ðe of getealde þinum & wyrttruman þinne of lande lyfigendra we geseoþ rihtwise & ondrædað & ofer hine hlogon & cweðaþ efne mann se þe ne sette god to fultume his ac he hopað on mænigfealdnysse welena heora & he sweogode on ydelnyssa heora sæde se unwisa on heortan his nis god gewemmede synd & onscuniendlice gewordene synd on rihtwisnyssum nys se ðe do god god of heofonum beheold ofer bearn mannum þæt he geseo gyf is ongitende oððe secende god ealle hy ahildon samod unnytte gewordene synd nis se þe do god nys oð anum hu ne witon ealle þa ðe weorcað unrihtwisnysse se ðe swelgað folc min swa swa mete hlafes god na gecygdon ðær hi forhtodon of ege ðær ne wæs ege forðan ðe god tostencð ban heora ða ðe mannum openiendra gescende hi synd forðan ðe god forhygede hig hwylc sylð of sion halwendan israhele þonne gecyrþ god hæftnunge folces his se gecorena & blissað ishel god on naman ðinum gehæl me do & on mihte ðinre dem me gehyr gebed min mid earum underfoh word muðes mines forðan þe ælfremedon onarison togeanes me & strange hi sohton sawle mine & na foresetton god ætforan gesihðe his efne soðlice god gefylsteþ me drihten andfeng is sawle minre awend yfelu on feondum minum on soþfæstnysse þine tostengð hi wynsumlice ic ofrige ðe & ic andette naman ðinum drihten forðon ðe god is forðam þe of eallum geswince þu generodest me & ofer fynd mine beheold eagen min gehyr god gebed min & na forseoh bene mine begym me & gehyr me geunrotsod ic eom on minum & gedrefed ic eom fram stefne fynd & of geswencednysse synfulles forðon hi ahildon on me unrihtwisnysse & on yrre unyþe hi wæron me heorte min gedrefed is on me & fyrhto deaþes feoll ofer me egsa & bifung vel fyrhtu com ofer me & bewreogon me þysþru & ic cwæþ hwylc silþ me fyðera swa swa culfran & ic fleo & ic reste efne ic feor gewite fleogende & ic wunude on westene ic anbidude hine se þe halne me dyde fram medmicelnysse gastes & hreohnysse gemiltsa min god forðon fortræd me mann ealne dæg onwynnende geswencte me fortrædon me fynd myne ealne dæg manega feohtende togeanes me fram heannysse dæge ic ondræde ic soþlice on þe ic hihte on dæge ic herige spræca mine on dæge ic hopie na ic ne ondræde hwæt do me flæsc ealne dæg word min hi onscunedon ongean me ealle geþohtas heora on yfelum hi onwuniað & bedihliað l hidað hi hos mine begymað swa swa hi forþyldegodon sawle mine for nahte hale þu dest hy on graman folc þu tobrittest god lif min ic cyðe þe þu settest tearas mine on gesyhþe ðinum swa swa & on behate ðynum gemiltsa me god gemiltsa min forðon ðe on ðe getruwað sawle min & on scadu fyðera ðinra ic hopie oð þæt forðgewiteþ on unriht ic cleowie to gode þam hehstum gode se þe wel dyde me he asende of heofonum & he aliseð me he sealde on hosp þa fortredenan me he sende god mildheortnysse his & soðfæstnysse his & he generode sawle mine of middele hwelpa leona ic sleap gedrefed sunu manna teð heora wæpnu & flana & tungan heora sweord scearp upahefe ofer heofonas god & on ealre eorðan wuldor ðin grinu hi gearwodon fotum minum & hy gebygdon sawle mine hi dulfon ætforan ansyne mine seað & hi feollon on ðone gearo heorte min god gearo heorte min ic singe & sealm ic cweðe drihtne aris wuldor min aris saltere & hearpa ic arise on dægred gyf soþlice unrotlice rihtwisnysse sprecað rihtlice demaþ bearn manna & witedlice on heortan unrihtwisnysse weorcað on lande on unrihtwisnysse hand eowre ælfremde wæron þa synfullan fram gecyndline hi dweledon fram innoðe hi spræcon leasunga hatheortnysse him æfter gelicnysse næddran swa swa nædran deafe & earan heora þa na gehyrað stefne ongalendra & ætrene beoþ gegalene fram wisum forbriteþ teð heora on muðe heora tuxlas vel geahlas leona tobrycð drihten to nahte hi becumað swa swa wæteru yrnende begymþ bogan his oð ðæt hit bið geuntrumod swa swa weax þæt þe flewþ beoð afyrrede oferfeoll fyr & na gesawon sunne genera me of feondum minum god min & fram onarisendum on me alys me genera me fram wyrcendum unrihtwisnysse & of werum blodum gehæl me forðan ðe efne hi ongunnon sawle mine onruron on me strange ne ne unrihtwisnys min ne ne synnum minum buton unrihtwisnysse ic arn & ic gereht wæs aris on geanryne minne & geseoh & ðu mihtiga god israhela begym to geneosianne ealle ðeoda na þu miltsast eallum ða þe wyrcað unrihtwisnysse syn gecyrred to æfenne & ungor hðolian vel þrowiaþ swa hundes & ymbyrnað ceaster efne sprecað on muðe his & sweord on welerum heora forðon hwylc gehyrde & þu drihten bysmrast hi to nahte gelædest ealle ðeoda god þu anydest us & tobræce us þu yrsadest & gemildsod þu eart us þu astyrodest eorðan & þu drefdest hi gehæl gedrefednyssa his forþon heo astyrod is ðu folc ðin heardu þa drenctest us mid wine onbryrdnysse ðu sealdest me ondrædendum ðe tacnunga þæt hi fleon fram ansyne bogan þæt syn alysed gecorenan ðine halne do seo swyþre þin & gehyr me god sprecende wæs on halgum his ic blissie & ic todæle byrðen vel burh & hole dene getelda min is galaað & min is manasses & effraim strangnysse heafdes mines iudeis cyningc min gehyr god bene mine begym gebede mine fram gemerum eorðan to ðe ic clypode þonne genearwad bið heorte min on stane þu upahefdest me þu gelæddest me forþam geworden eart hiht min stypel strangnysse fram ansyne feondes on ic wunige on getelde ðinum on worulde ic eom scyldend on fyþera þinra forþon þu god min gehyrdest gebed min þu sealdest yrfweardnysse ondrædendum naman ðinne dæges ofer dæges cyninges togeyc gear his oð on dæge cynrynes & to cynryne þurhwunað on ecnysse on gesyhðe godes mildheortnysse & soþfæstnysse his hwylc seceþ swa sealm ic cweþe naman þinum on worulde woruld þæt ic agylde gewylnunga mine of dæge to dæge hunu god underþeod biþ sawle min fram him soþlice hælo mine soþes & he god min & hælo min anfeng min na ic beo astyrod ma hu lange on mannum ge ofsleaþ ealle eow swa swa wages onhyldum gecnysedra þeahhwæðere sceat min hi þohton anydon ic arn on þurste of muþe his hi bletsodon & heortan heora hig wyrigdon ðeahhwæþere god underþeod beo ðu sawle min forþon ðe fram him geþyld min forþon he god min & hælend min fultum min ic na afeorsie on dæge hælo mine & wuldor min god fultum minne & hiht min on dæge is hopiað on hine ealle gegaderunga folces ageotað beforan him heortan eowre god fultum ure on ecnysse god god min to þe of leohte ic wacie þyrste on ðe sawle minre þu mænigfealdlice þe flæsc min on lande on westene & on wege & on wæterigum swa on halgum ic oþeowde ðe þæt ic gesawe mægen þyn & wuldor þin forþon betere is mildheortnysse þin ofer lif welerum minum heriað þe swa ic bletsige þe on life minum & on naman þinum ic upahebbe handa mine swa swa of fætnysse & gefylled biþ sawle min & welerum upahafennysse herað muþ min swa gemyndig ic wæs þin ofer bedd min on dægred ic gemuna þe forþon þu wære gefylsta min & on oferbrædelse fyþera þinra ic blissie togeþeodde sawle min æfter þe me onfengc seo swyþre ðin gehyr god gebed min þonne ic bidde fram ege feondes genera sawle myne þu bewruge me fram gemetinge awyrgedra of manigum wyrcendra unrihtwisnysse forþon hi hwetton swa swa sweord tungan heora hi boga þingc biter þæt hi scotodon on digelnyssum þone unwæmman sona hi stræliað hine & na ondrædað hi getrymdon him spræca manfulle hi rehton þæt hi hyddon grynu hi cwædon hwylc gesyhþ hi smeagende synd unrihtwisnysse hi ateorodon smeageande togenealæhte man & heorte & he bið upahafen god strælas litlinga gewordene synd witu heora & on geuntrumode synd ongean hi tungan heora gedrefde synd ealle þa ðe gesawon hi þe geriseð lofsang god on sion & þe agolden behat on gehyr gebeda mine to ðe ælc flæsc cymð word unrihtwisra ofer us & arleasnyssum urum þu gemiltsast eadig þone þu gecure & tofenge oneardað on cafertunum þinum we beoð gefylled on godum huses þines halig is tempel þin wundorlic on emnysse gehyr us god hælo ure hiht ealra enda eorðan & on sæ feorr gyrigende duna on mihte þinum begyrd on anwealda þu gedrefst grund sæs sweg yþa his beoð gedrefde þeoda & ondrædað þa ðe wunaþ gemæro fram tacnum þinum utgang dægredes & on æfene ðu fægniað gode eall eorðe sealm secgað naman his sellaþ wuldor lofe his secgað gode hu egeslice synd weorc þine drihten on mænigfealdnysse mihta þine leogaþ þe fynd þine ealle eorþan gebiddeþ þe & synge þe sealm he secge naman þinum cumaþ & geseoð weorc godes egeslic on geþeahtum ofer sunu manna se þe gecyrde sæ on drige land on flode he oferfor mid fet þær we blissiaþ on þæt sylfe se þe wyldeþ on mihte þine on ecnysse eagan his ofer þeoda gelociað þa þe æbylgaþ ne hy beoþ upahafen on him sylfum bletsiað þeoda god urne & gehyrede doþ stefne lofes his þe gesette sawle mine to life & na ne sealde on styrunge fet mine god miltsige ure & bletsie us onlyhteþ andwlitan his ofer us & miltsige ure þæt we oncnawan on eorþan weg ðinne on eallum ðeodum hælo ðine geandettan þe folc god geandettan þe folc eall blissian & gefægnian ðeoda forþon ðe þu demst folce on emnysse & þeoda on eorþan gerecest geandettan þe folc god geandettan þe folc eall eorþan sealde wæstm his bletsiað us god urne & ondrædaþ hine ealle endas eorþan arise god & syn todræfed fynd his & fleon þa þe hatudon hine fram ansine his swa swa geteorode smic hy geteorian swa swa flewð weax fram ansyne fyres swa hi forweorðan synfulle fram ansyne godes rihtwise blissiað hi blissian on gesyhðe godes & gegladian on blisse singað gode sealm cweþað naman his siþfæt doþ him se þe astah ofer westdæl drihten naman him & blissian on gesyhþe his beoð gedrefed fram ansyne his fæderas steopcilda & deman weodewena on stowe haligre his god oneardian deþ anmode þeawes on huse se alædeþ gebundene on strengþe gelic þa þe æbiliaþ þa eardiað on byrgenne god mid þu utgæst on gesihþe folces þines mid þi þe þu þurhfærst on westene eorþe astirod is witendlice heofonas drupodon fram ansyne godes halne me do god forðon ineodon wæteru oð to sawle minre afæstnod ic eom on lime grundes & nys ænig sped ic com on deopnysse sæs & hreohnys besencte me ic swanc cleopiende hase gewordene synd goman mine geteorodon eagan mine þonne ic hihte on god minne gemænifylde synd ofer loccas heafdes mines þa ðe hatudon me buton gestrangode synd þa ðe ehtað me fynd mine unrihtlice þa þe ic na reafode þa ic tolysde vel ageald god þu wast unwisdom minne & gyltas mine fram þe ne synd behydd na ascamien on me þe andbidiað þe drihten drihten mihtig na hi ofer me þa ðe secað þe forðon þe for ðe ic forðyldegode hosp oferwreah sceamu ansyne mine ytemest geworden ic eom broþor minum & ælðeodig bearn modor minre god on fultum min begym drihten to gefylstane me efste gescamian & anðracian þe þe secað sawle mine syn gecyrred sona under bæc & gescamian þe ðe wyllað me yfelu syn gecyrred scamiende þa ðe cweðaþ me eala eala & blissian on ðe ealle þa ðe secað þe & cweðan symble sy gemiclod ða ðe lufiað hælo þine ic soðlice wædla & ðearfa ic eom god gefultuma me fultum min & alys min beo ðu drihten ne lata ðu vel yld þu on ðe drihten ic hopie na beo ic gescend on ecnysse on rihtwisnysse þine alys me & genera me ahyld to me eare þin & gehæl me beo ðu me on gode bewerigend & on stowum gefryþsumre þæt þu halne me do forðon ðe trumnys min & gener min beo ðu god min genera me of handa synfulra & of handa ongean æ & unrihtwise forðam ðe þu eart geþyld min drihten hiht min fram iugoðe minre on ðe getrymmed ic eom of innoðe of wambe modor minre þu eart bewewigen min on ðe sang min symble swa swa foretacnu geworden ic eom manegum & ðu fultum strang sy gefylled muð min of lofe þæt ic synge wuldor þin ealne dæg mærsunga þine ne aweorp þu me on tide ylde ðonne ateorað miht min ne forlæt þu me god dom þinne cyningc sele & rihtwisnysse þine sunu þæs cyngces dem folce þinum unrihtwisnysse & ðearfena þine on dome onfon muntas sybbe folces & beorgas rihtwisnysse he demþ þearfan folces & hale he deð sunu þearfana & he geeadmet hearmcweðende & þurhwunað mid sunnan & beforan monan on cynrynes cynrynum he adune astah swa swa ren on flys & swa swa dropan dropende ofer eorðan aspryngð on dagum his rihtwisnysse & genyhtsum sibbe oð þæt onhafen biþ se mona & he wealdeð fram sæ oð to sæ & fram flode oð gemæru ymbhwyrftes eorðena beforan him feallað sylhearwena & fynd his eorðan licciað hu god god þam þe rihtwise synd heortan mine soþlice astyrod synd fet agotene synd stæpas mine forðon ic andede ofer þa unrihtwisan sybbe synfulra geseonde forðon þe nis ofersewen deaðe heora & trumnys on witu heora on geswincum manna ne synd & mid mannum ne beoð swyngla forþon hæfde hig ofermodignys ofer of unrihtwisnysse & of arleasnysse hys forgæð swa swa of fæstnysse unrihtwisnys heora hy ferdon on gewilnunge heortan hi þohton & hi spræcon man unrihtwisnysse on heahnysse sprecende wæron hi setton on heofonum muþ heora & tungan heora on eorþan tohwon god þu anyddest on ende yrre is hatheortnys þin ofer sceap læswe þinre gemindig beo þu gesamnunga þinre þa ðe þu geahnodest of frymðe þu alysdest gyrde yrfweardnysse þinre munt þære dune on þam þu eardest on him ahefe hand þine on ofermodnysse heora on ende hu fela awyrged is feond on halgum & gewuldrode synd þa ðe hatudon þe on middele freolsunga ðine hi asetton tacna heora tacna & na oncnawon swa swa on utgange ofer heahne swa swa on wuda treowa axum hi curfon dura his on þæt selfe on æxe & aderan hi utawurpon hi hi onhældon fyr halig þin on eorðan hi besmiton geteld naman þines hi cwædon on heortan heora mægþ heora samod restan we doþ ealle dagas symle god fram eorðan tacna ure na we gesawon nu nys witega & we na oncnawaþ ma we andettað þe god we andettaþ & we cegað naman þinne we cyþað wundra ðine ðonne ic onfo tid ic rihtwisnysse deme gemolten is eorðe & ealle ða ðe wunað in hi ic trymede swyras hyre sæde unrihtwisum nylle ge unriht don & agyltendum nylle ge upahebban horn ylle ge ahebban on heannysse horn eowerge nylle ge sprecan togeanes gode unrihtwisnysse forðon ne fram eastdæle ne fram westdæle & ne fram westum muntum forðon ðe god dema is þisne geeadmeddeþ & þysne he ahefþ forðon calic on handa drihtnes win clænis full is gemengced & onhylde of ðysum on þys þeahhwæðere þrast is nys aidlude dryncþ ealle synfulle eorðe cuð on iudeum god on israhela mucel nama his & geworden is on sybbe stowe is & eardung his on sion ðær forbrycð mihta bogan scyld & sweordum & gefeoht onlyhtende þu wundorlice fram muntum ecum gedrefede synd ealle unwise heortan hi slepon stæfnum his & naht gemetton ealle weras welena on handum his fram in grawunge þin god iacobes hi hnæppodon þa þe astigon hors þu egeslic eart & hwylc wiðstandeð þe forþon þe of yrre þinum of heofonum gehyred þu dydest dom eorðan & resteþ of stefne mynre to drihtne ic cleopige stesne minre to gode & he begymð me on dæge gedrefednysse mynre god ic sohte handum minum nihte ongean hine & na ic eom beswicen forwyrnde beon afrefrod sawle min gemyndig ic wæs godes & gelustfullod ic eom & ic heom & ateorode gast min toforon setton wæccan eagan mine gedrefed ic eom & na ic eom sprecende ic þohte dæges ealde & gear ece on mode ic hæfde & ic eom nihte mid heortan minre & ic & ic sweop gast minne cwyþs tu la on ecnysse awyrp god & na þæt gecwemre sy nugyt oððe on ende mildheortnysse his aslyteþ of cneornysse on cynrine vel mægþe begymað folc min æ mine ahyldaþ eare eowre on wordum muþes mines ic antyne on bigspellum muð minne ic sprece forsettednyssa of frymðe hu manega we gehyrdon & we oncneowon þa & fæderas ure hi rehton us ne synd bedyglode fram sunu heora o mægðe oðre we cyðdon lof drihtne & mihta his & wundra his þe he dyde & he awehte gecyþnyssa on iacobe & æ he sette on israhela hu fela bebead fæderum urum cuðe he dyde hi sunum heora þæt hi oncnawe mægþe oþre sunu þa þe beoð acenned & hi arisað & cyþað sunum heora þæt hi setton on gode hiht his & na ofergiten weorc godes & bebodu his hi secan ne syn hi swa swa fæderas heora mægþe þweor & teonful cynrin þa þe ne rehte heorte his & nys gelyfed mid gode gaste his bearn begymende & sendende bogan hi gecyrred synd on dæge gefeohtes comon ðeoda on yrfweardnysse þin hi besmiton tempel halige þin hi setton on epla hordern hi setton deadlican ðeowa þinra mettas fugulum heofonas flæsc haligra þinra wildeorum eorðan hi aguton blod heora swa swa wæter on ymbhwyrfte & næs se ðe bebirigde gewordene synd hosp neahgeburum urum & on bysmre þe on ymbhwyrfte ure synd hu lange drihten þu yrsast on ende bið onæled swa swa fyr anda þin ageot graman þin on ðeodum þa ðe ne oncneowon & on ricu þa naman þinne na cygdon forðon hi æton iacob & stowe his he forleton ne gemun þu unrihtu ure eall raðe foresette us mildheortnysse þin forðon þearfan gewordene we synd þearle gefylst us god hælo ure fore wuldor naman þin alys us & gemildsod beo ðu synnum urum for naman þinum þu þe recest beforan effrem & beniamine & manase awece mihta þine & cum þæt hale do þu us god gecyr us & oðyw ansyne þine & hale we beoð drihten god mihtig hu lange yrsast ðu ofer gebeda ðeowan þinum þu metsast us hlafe teara & drengc þu sylst us on tearum on gemete þu settest us on wiðercwedulnysse neahgeburum urum & fynd ure us god mihtig gecyr us & oðywe ansyne þine & we beoþ gehæled wingeard of egytalande þu ferodest þu aweorpe ðeoda & þu plantodest hig blissiað gode gefylsta ure dremað gode iacobes nimiað sealm & syllað gligbeam saltere wynsume mid hearpan blowað of byman on mærum dæge symelnysse eowre forðon bebod israhela is & dom godes iacobes gecyðnysse on iosepe he sette hine mid he heode of eorðan tungan þa ða he ne wyste gehyrde & he cyrde fram byrðenum hrygc his handa his on wylegan þeowodon on geswingce þu cygdest me & alysde þe ic gehyrde þe on bediglingce hreohnys ic afandode þe æfter wæteru wiðercwydelnysse gehyr folc min & ic geseðe þe gyf þu gehyrft me god stod on gesomnunga goda on middele soðlice godas he fordemð hu lange demað ge unrihtwisnysse & ansyne synfulra genimað demað wædlan & steopcildum eaðmodne & þearfan gerihtwisað neriað ðearfan & wædlan of handa synfulra alysað hi nyston ne hi ne ongeaton on ðystrum hi gangað beoþ astyred ealle grundweallas eorðan ic cwæð godas ge syndon sunu þæs maran ealle ge soðlice swa swa men ge sweltað & swa swa an of ealdrum ge hreosað aris god dem eorðan forðon ðe þu yrfweardast on eallum ðeodum hwylc gelic bið ðe ne swyga ðu & ne forhafa god forðan efne fynd þine swegdon & þa ðe hatudon þe hi afon heafod ofer folc þin hi wyrigdon geþeaht & þohton togeanes halige ðine hi cwædon cumaþ & utan forspillan hig of þeode & ne bið gemunen naman ofer þæt forðon hi ðohton anhrædlice samod ongean ðe gecyþnysse todyhnodon geteld ðara eorþlicra & synnahyrendra maab & agar bal & ammon & amalehc ða ælfremedon mid eardigendum on tyro witendlice assur com mid him gewordene synd on fultume bearnum loðes hu luflice geteld þin drihten mihta gewilnode & geteorode sawla min on cafertunum drihtnes heorte min & flæsc min blissodon on god lifiende witendlice spearwa gemette him hus & turtlan nestan him þær he sette briddas heora weofod þin drihten mihtig cyngc min & god min eadige þa ðe eardiaþ on huse ðinum on worulda woruld hi heriað ðe eadig wer þæs þe is fultum fram þe upastige on heortan his tosette on dene teara on stowe þa ðu tosettest witendlice bletsunga he selð æsyllende farað of mihte to mihte bið gesewen god goda on sion drihten god mihtig gehyr gebed min mid earum onfoh god iacobe þu bletsodest drihten eorðam þine þu awendest hæftnunga iacobes þu unrihtwisnysse folces þine ðu oferwruge ealle synna heora ealle graman þine ðu acyrdest fram yrre æbilignysse þinre gecyr us god hælo ure & framacyr yrre þinum fram us cwyþst þu on ecnysse yrsast þu us oððe þu aðenest yrre þin fram cynryne on cynryne god þu gecyrrende þu ðe gelyffæstes us & folc þin blissiað on ðe oðeow us drihten mildheortnysse & hælo þinum syle us ic gehyre hwæt spricð on me drihten god forðon ðe he sprecð sybbe on folce his & ofer halige his & on hi þa beoð gecyrrende heortan ahyld drihten eare þin & gehyr me forðon ðe wanhafa & þearfa ic eom geheald sawle mine forðon ðe halig ic eom halne gedo þeowan þinne god min hopiende on ðe gemiltsa min drihten forðon ðe to ðe ic cleopige ealne dæg geblissa sawle ðeowan þin to ðe drihten sawle min ic ahof þu drihten wynsum & bilewite & manige eallum gecygendum ðe mid earum onfoh drihten gebed min & begym stefne bene mine on dæge gedrefednysse minre ic cleowie to ðe forðon ðu gehyrdest me nys gelic þin on godum drihten & nis æfter weorcum þinum ealle ðeoda swa hwylc swa ðu worhtest hi cumað & gebiddað beforan þe drihten & hi wudorfulliað naman þinne grundweallas his on muntum haligum lufað drihten gatu siones ofer ealle getelda iacobes wundorfulla gecweden synd be ðe ceastra godes gemyndig ic beo meretryx þam witendum me efne ælfremede & tyrus & folc sylhearpena þa beoþ þær cwyþst þu syon cwyþ man & mann acened is on hyre & he gestaðolode hy se hyhsta drihten cyþ on gewritum folca & ealdormanna heora þe wæron on hyne swa blissiendra ealra wunung on ðe drihten god hælo mine on dæge ic cleopode & nihte beforan ðe inga on gesihðe þinre gebed min ahyld eare þin to bene minre forðon gefylled is yfelu sawle min & lyf min on helle nealæhte gewened ic eom mid adunestigendum on seaðe geworden ic eom swa swa man buton fultume betwux deade freoh swa swa gewundode slæpende on byrgenne & he of handa þinre anydde synd hi asetton me on seaðe þam neoðeran on ðystrum & on scadu deaðes ofer me getrymed is hatheortnys þin & ealle yða þine þu ingelæddest ofer me feor þu dydest cuðe mine fram me hi setton me fram onascununga him sealde & na ic uteode mildheortnysse on ecnysse ic singe on cynrine & forcynrine ic cyðe soðfæstnysse on muþe minum forþon ðu cwæde on ecnysse mildheortnysse bið getimbrod on heofonum bið gegearwod soþfæstnys þin on him ic tosette gecyþnysse gecorenum minum ic swor dauide þeowan minum oð ecnysse ic gearwie sæd þin & ic timbrode on mægðe & cynryne setl þin geandettað heofonan wundra þine drihten witendlice soðfæstnys ðin on gelaðunga haligra forðon ðe hwylc on genipum bið geefenlæced drihtne gelic bið drihtne on bearnum godes god se ðe bið wuldrað on geþeahte haligra micel & angrislic ofer ealle ðe on ymbhwyrfte hys synd drihten god mihtig hwylc gelic þe mihti eart drihten & soþfæstnys þin on ymbhwyrfte þinum drihten gener geworden eart us on cynryne & mægðe ærðam þe wæron duna gewordene & eorðe & ybhwyrfte fram worulde & oð on worulde ðu eart god ne awend ðu menn on genyðerunga & ðu cwæde gecyrrað sunu manna forðon ðe þusend gear beforan eagan þinum swa swa dagas se forðgæþ & heordnys on nihte seo for naht synd hæfde heora gear beoð on mergen swa wyrt gewiteð on mergen bloweð & fareð on æfen afylð astiðaþ & drugað forðon we geteorodon on yrre þinum & on hatheortnysse gedrefed we synd þu settest unrihtwisnysse ure on gesihðe þine worulde ure on alyhtnysse andwlitan þinne forþon ealle dagas ure ateorodon & on yrre þinum geteorodon gear ure swa smeadon se ðe eardað on fultume þæs hehstan on gescyldnysse godes heofonas he he cweð drihtne andfeng min eart ðu & genear min god min ic hopie on hine forðon he alyseð me of grine huntigendra & fram worde wiðerweardum on sculdrum his he scadewode ðe & under fiðerum his ðu hopudest on scylde ymbsylð þe soðfæstnys his na þu ondrædst fram ege nihtlicum fram flane fleogendre on dæge fram gestreone þurhgangende on ðystrum fram anrine & deofle suðernum hi feallað fram sidon þinum þusend & tyn þusend fram swyðrum þinum to ðe soðlice ne genealæceð ðeahhwæðere eagan ðinum þu besceawost & edlean synfulra ðu gesihst forðon ðu eart drihten hiht min þe hyhsta ðu settest gener þin god is andettan & singan naman þinum þam hyhstan to bodianne on mergenne ðine & soðfæstnysse þine þurh nihte on tynstrengum saltere mid cantice on hearpan þu geliþegodest on geweorce þinum & on weorcum handa þinra ic blissige hu gemiclode synd weorc þine drihten swiðe deope gewordene synd geþohtas þine wer unwis na ongyt & dysig na ongyt þas þing þonne upaspringeð beoð synfulle swa swa hig & oðeowdon ealle ða ðe wyrcað unrihtwisnysse þæt hi forweorðan on worulda woruld þu soðlice þe hyhsta on ecnysse drihten rihcsode mid wlite gescyrd is gescyrd is drihten strangnysse & he begyrde hine witendlice he getrymde ybhwyrft eorðan þe ne bið onstyred geara setl þin syðan fram worulde þu eart upahofon flod drihten upahofon flodas stefne his upahofon flod yðe his fram stefnum wætera manigra wundorlice ahafennyssa sæ wundorlic on heahnyssum drihten gecyþnessa þine geleaflica gewordene synd swyðe huse ðinum geriseð halige on langnysse dagena god wraca drihten god wraca freolice dyde hahefe þu ðe demst eorðam agyld edlean ofermodum hu lange synfulle drihten hu lange synfulle wuldriað hi geseþað & sprecað unrihtwisnysse sprecað ealle þa ðe wyrcað unrihtwisnysse folc þin drihten hi & yrfweardnysse þine hi drehton wydewan & wreccan hi ofslogon & steopcild hi cwealdon & hi cwædon na gesihð drihten ne ongyt god iacobes ongytað unwise on folce & dysige æt sumum cyrre ongytað þe plantude eare he ne gehyrð oððe se þe eage ne he besceawað cumað uton blissian drihtne uton dreman gode hælende ure we ansyne his on andetnysse & on sealmum we dryman him forðon god mycel drihten & cyning micel ofer ealle godas on handa his endas eorðan & heahnysse munta his synd forðon his is sæ & he dyde hi hand his gestaðelode cumað uton gebiddan & uton aðenian & we wepan beforan drihtne se ðe worhte us forðon þe he is drihten god ure & we ðone folc læswe his & sceap handa his todæg gyf stefne his ge gehyrað nylle ge wiðheardian heortan eowre swa swa on æbylignysse æfter dæge costunge on westene ðær fandodon min fæderas eowre hi fandodon me & gesawon weorc min singað drihtne lofsang niwne singað drihtne eall eorðe singað drihtne & bletsiað naman his bodiað of dæge on dæge hælo his bodiað betwux þeodum wuldor his on eallum folce wundra his forðon micel & herigendlic swyðe egeslic is ofer ealle godas forðon ealle godas þeoda deofla drihten soðlice heofonas geworhte andetnys & fægernys on gesihðe hys halignys & mycelnys on halignysse hys bryngað drihtne fædere ðeoda bryngað drihtne wuldor & wyrðmynt bryngað drihtne wuldor naman his undoþ dura & ingað on cafertune his gebiddað drihten on cafertune halige his sy astyrod fram ansine his eall eorðe rihcsode fægnige eorðe blissiað igland manige genipu & þicnys on ymbhwyrfte his rihtwisnysse & dom gerecednys setl his fyr ætforan him forðstæpð & onælð on ymbhwyrfte fynd his onlihton ligræsas ymbhwyrfte eorðan geseah & gedrefed is eorðe muntas swa swa wex sleowon fram ansyne drihtnes fram ansyne drihtnes eall eorðe bodedon heofonas rihtwisnysse his & gesawon eall folc wuldor his gescende beoð ealle þe gebiddaþ deofolgyld ða ðe wuldriað on deofolgyldum heora gebiddað hine ealle ænglas his gehyrde & geblissod is & fægnodon dohtra for domum þinum drihten forðon ðu drihten se hihsta ofer ealle eorðan swyðe upahafen eart ofer ealle godas singað drihtne lofsang niwne forðan ðe wundra he dyde gehælde him seo swyðre his & earm haligne his cuðe he dyde drihten hælo his on gesihðe ðeoda he awreah rihtwisnysse hys gemyndig he wæs mildheortnysse hys & soðfæstnys hys huses israhele gesawon ealle gemæra eorðan hælo godes ure drymað gode eall eorða syngað & & syngað singað drihtne on hearpan & stefne sealm on byman & stemne byman hyrnendre drymað on gesihðe cyninges drihtnes sy astyrod sæ & gefyllednys hire ybhwyrft eorðena & þa eardiað on hine flodas hafettað handum samod muntas blissodon on gesihðe drihtnes forðan þe com deman eorðan he demð ymbhwyrfte eorðena on rihtwisnysse & folc on emnysse drihten rixode yrsian folc se þe sitteð ofer cherubim bið astyrod eorðe drihten on sion micel & heah ofer eall folc andettan naman þinum miclum forðon ðe egeslic & halig is & wyrðmynt cyninges dom he lufað ðu gearwodest gerecednyssa dom & rihtwisnysse on iacobe ðu dydest upahebbað drihten god urne & gebiddað gefeoht fota his forðon halig is on sacerdum his & samuel betweox hi þa ðe cigað naman his hig cigdon drihten & he gehyrde hi on swere genipu he spræc to him hi heoldon gecynyssa his & bebodu þæt he sealde him drihten god ure ðu gehyrdest hi god þu gemildsodest þu wære him & wrecende on eallum wiðmetednyssa heora upahebbað drihten god urne & to gebiddað on munte haligum his forðan ðe halig drihten god ure drymað drihtne eall eorðe ðeowiað drihtne on blisse infarað on gesyhðe hys on bliðnysse witað ge forðon ðe drihten he is god he dyde us & na selfe we folc his & sceap læswe hys infarað gatu his on andetnysse on cafertunas his on ymnum andettað him heriað naman his forðan ðe winsum is drihten on ecnysse mildheortnyssa his & oð on cynrine & cynrine soðfæstnys his ac on æ drihtnes his willa on his æ he smeaþ vel foreþenceþ dæges & nihtes & he bið swaswa treow þe geplantod is vel þæt ðe geset is wið rynas wætera þæt þe westm his selð vel forgifð on his tide & leaf his ne tofleuwð & ealle þingc swa hwæt swa he deð beoð gespedde vel beoð gesundfullode ne swa þa arleasan na swa ac swaswa dust wind fram ansyne eorþa forþi ne arisaþ þa arleasan on dome ne þa synfullan on geþeahte rihtwisra forþan þe wat drihten weg rihtwisra & siðfæt arleasra forwyrð vel losaþ forhwi grymetedon þeoda & folc smeadon idelnessa ætstodon kyningas eorðan ealdras & samod comon on an togeanes drihtne & togeanes his criste l his gecorenum uton tobrecan heora bendas & uton aweg awerpan fram us heora ioc se ðe eardaþ on heofenum gebismeraþ vel hyseð hig & drihten tælð hi þonne he sprecð to heom on his graman & on his hatheortnesse he gedrefð hig ic soðlice geset eom kyning fram him ofer sceawere his halga dune bodigende his bebod vel lare sæde to me sunu min þu eart ic to dæg gestrynde þe bide æt me ic sylle þe ðeoda yrfwerdnysse þine & æhte þine gemæru eorðan þu gewissast hig on gyrde isenre & swaswa fæt crocwirhtan l tygelwirhtan þu tobrytst hig & nu þa kyningas ongitaþ beoð gelærede ge ðe demaþ eorðan vel rica ðeowiaþ vel hyrsumiaþ drihtne on ege & blissiað vel gefeagaþ him mid ogan vel mid fyrhtu underfoð vel gegripað steore vel lare þelæs ahwanne yrsige vel þæt ne yrsige drihten & ge forwurðaþ of rihtum wege þonne bið onæled hrædlice yrra his eadige ealle þa þe truwiaþ vel þa þe gelyfað vel gehihtaþ on him to hwi gemænigfylde synt þa þe swencaþ vel gedrefaþ manege onarisað vel wiðstandaþ ongean secgað sawle minre nis na hælo him on gode hire þu soðlice anfengc vel underfond min eart wuldor min & upahebbende heafod min mid minre stefne to drihtne ic clypode & he gehyrde of his halgan dune ic slep & ic eom geswefod & ic uparas forþan drihten þe underfengc ic ne ondræde þusenda folces ymbtrymmendes aris gehæl me god min forðan þe þu ofsloge ealle þa wiðrigendan me butan intingan teþ synfulra þu forgnide vel þu tobryttest drihtnes is hæl & ofor folc þin þin bletsung þaþa ic clypode vel þaþa ic gecigde geherde god rihtwisnesse minre on gedrefednesse vel on gedeorfe þu tobræddest vel þu gerymdest me gemiltsa min & gehyr min gebed eala bearn manna la hu lange þwere vel sware on heortan to hwi lufige ge idelnessa & ge secaþ leasunga & wite ge þæt gemærsode drihten his halgan gehyrð þonne ic clypige to him yrsiað & nelle ge syngian þa þing þe ge secgaþ on eowrum heortum on diglum l on incofan l on eowrum clyfum bemænaþ l behreowsiaþ offriaþ onsægdnesse rihtwisnesse & hopiað on drihtne manege secgaþ la hwilc ætywð us godu getacnod vel gemearcod is ofor us leoht andwlitan þines þu sealdest blisse on minre heortan fram wæstme hwætes wines & eles his gemænigfylde hi synt on sibbe on him sylfum ic slæpe & ic gereste forðan þe þu eala þu drihten synderlice on hihte gesettest me mine word mid earum onfoh eala þu drihten ongyt mine clypunge begym to stefne mines gebedes min kyning & min god forþan þe to þe ic gebidde on ærnemergen þu gehyrst mine stefne ic ætstande þe & ic geseo forðan þe na god willende unrihtwisnesse þu eart ne ne eardaþ vel wunað wið þe se awergeda ne ne þurhwuniaþ þa unrihtwisan ætforan þinum eagum þu hatodest ealle þa þe wyrcaþ unrihtwisnesse þu forspilst vel þu amyrst ealle þa þe sprecað leasunga þæne wer þe is blodgita vel geotende vel wer bloda & facenfulne gehiscð vel onscunaþ ic soðlice on mycelnysse þinre mildheortnesse ic ingange on þinum huswiste vel into þinum huse ic gebidde to þinum halgum temple on þinum ege gelæd me on rihtwisnesse þinre for feondum minum gewissa on gesihðe minre þinne weg forþan þe nis on muþe heora soðfæstnes heorte heora idel is byrgen open is hrace vel þrotu heora on heora tungum fakenfullice hi dydun dem hi god feallan hi vel gehreosan hi fram geþohtum heora æfter mænigfyldnysse arleasnessa heora afyrsa vel utadræf hi forþan hi gegremedon þe & geblissian ealle þa þe hihtaþ on þe on ecnysse hi gefeagaþ & þu geeardast on heom & gewuldriaþ on þe ealle þa þe lufiaþ þinne naman forþan þu gebletsast þane rihtwisan þu gewuldorbeagodest us swa mid scelde mid þinum godan willan ne on hatheortnes þinre þrea ðu & na on þinum yrre styr þu me gemiltsa min forðan untrum ic eom gehæl me drihten forðan gedrefede þe synt mine ban & sawle min gedrefed is swiðe & þu drihten hu lange gecyr & genera mine sawle gehæl me for mildheortnesse þinre forþan þe nis on deaþe vel on deaðscufan þe gemyndig sy þin on helle soðlice la hwa geandetteþ þe ic swanc on minre geomrunge ic ðwea vel ic swilige þurh syndrige nihta min bed mid minum tearum strecednysse mine vel mine beddinge ic beþwea vel ic gelecce gedrefed is fram hatheortnesse min eage ic forealdode betwux eallum feondum minum gewitaþ fram me ealle ge þe wyrcað unrihtwisnesse forþan þe gehyrde drihten stefne wopes mines gehyrde drihten mine bene gebed min underfeng ablysian hi vel scamian & syn hi geunrotsode vel gedrefede swiðlice vel swiðe ealle fynd mine syn gecyrrede & aswarnian hi vel gesceamige heom þearle hreðlice vel swiftlice eala drihten min god on þe ic gehihte vel ic hopode gehæl me of eallum æhtendum & alys þæt he ne ahwanne gelecce vel þe læs þe he gripe swaswa leo mine sawle þonne nis se þe generie ne se þe gehæle min god gif ic dyde þis gif is unrihtwisnes on handum minum gif ic forgeald forgyldendum me yfelu fealla ic be geearnunge fram feondum minum on idlum sy ehtende vel ehte feond mine sawle & gehæftnige hi vel gegripe hi & he fortrede on eorðan min lif & min wuldor on duste gelæde aris on þinum graman & si ðu upahafen on gemærum minra sceaþana vel feonda & uparis on beboda þæt þe þu bebude & gesamnunga folca ymbtrymð vel ymbhwyrfeþ þe & for þissere intingan on heahnesse gehwyrf drihten demð folctruman dem æfter minre rihtwisnesse & æfter minre unscildignesse vel unscæððinesse ofor si fornumen vel si geendod man vel niðscipe synfulra & gewissa þane rihtwisan smeagende heortan & syna vel ædran vel lændenu god rihtwis fultum min fram drihtne se þe gehælð þa rihtgeþancodon dema rihtwis & strang & geþyldig cweðsþu la yrsað he iand ænlipie dagas nymðe gecyrrede ge wesan vel butan ge gecyrran his swurd he acwecð vel asceacð his bogan he aþenede & he gearcode hine  & on him he gegyrede fatu þeades strælas his byrnen he gefremode efnenu geeacnode unrihtwisnesse gecende sarnessa & gehrifede vel acende unrihtwisnesse seað he geopnode & he underdealf þæne & he onbefeol on þam seaþe þe he geworhte sy gecyrred his sar on his heafde & on his hnolle his unrihtwisnes becume ic andette drihtne æfter rihtwisnesse his & ic singe naman drihtnes þæs heahstan eala drihten ure drihten la hu egesful vel hu wundorlic is þin nama ofor ealle eorðan forþan þe upahafen is þin mycelnys ofor heofonas of muþe cildra & sucendra þu fulfremedest lof for þinum feondum þæt ðu toweorpe feond & wrecend vel & scildend forþan þe ic geseo heofonas þine weorc þinra fingrena monan & steorran þe þu gestaðelodest la hwæt is se man þæt gemyndig þu eart his oððe mannes bearn forþan þe þu geneosast hine þu gewanodest vel þu gelitludest hine lythwon vel hwæne læs fram englum mid wuldre & wyrðmynte þu gewuldorbeagodest hine & þu gesettest hine ofor geweorc þinra handa ealle þing þu underðeoddest under his fotum sceap & oxan ealle þær to eacan & nytena feldes fugelas heofonan & fixas sæ þa þe iandfarað paðas sæ eala drihten ure drihten la hu egesful is vel hu wundorlic is þin nama on ealre eorþan for diglum bearne sealm ic andette þe drihten on ealre minre heortan ic recce vel ic gecyþe ealle þine wundra ic geblissige & ic gefægnige on þe ic singe þinum naman eala þu se hexta on gecyrrincge feond minne on bæcling syn hi geuntrumode & forwurðon fram þinre ansyne forþon þu didest minne dom & minne intingan þu sæt/ ofer ðrymsetl þu þe demst rihtwisnesse þu ðreadest þeoda & forwearð se arleasa naman heora þu adilgodest on ecnysse & on worlde word fynd vel sceaþan ateordun fram sweordtige on ende ceastra & þu tobræce forwearð gemynd heora mid swege drihten on ecnesse þurhwunað he gegearwode on dome his ðrymsetl & he demð ymbhwyrft eorðan on efnesse he demþ folctruman on rihtwisnesse & geworden is ner vel rotnes þam þearfan fultumiend on gedafenlicnessum on gedrefednysse & honiaþ on þe þa þe cuþon þinne naman forþan þe þu ne forlete þa secenden þe singaþ drihtne se ðe wunaþ on þæm munte cyþað l bodiað betwux þeodum his gecneordnyssa vel his ymbhoga forþan þe secende blod heora gemynde he is he nis forgytol clypunge þearfena gemiltsa min eala þu drihten geseoh eadmodnesse mine be minum feondum þu þe upahefst me of geatum þeaþes þæt ic bodige vel þæt ic kyþe ealle herunga vel lofunga þine on geatum dehter vel dohtra þæs muntes ic blissige on halwendum þine onafæstnode synd þeoda on forwyrde þæt þe hi geworhtun on grine þissum þe hig bedygledon vel behyddun gehæft vel gelæht heora fot biþ oncnawon vel ongiton domas wyrcende on weorcum his handa is gehæft se synfulla syn gecyrrede þa synfullan to helle ealle þeoda þa þe forgitaþ god forþan þe ne on ende forgitelnes byð þes þeafan geðyld þearfena ne forwyrð on ende ne sy gestrangod man syn gedemede þeoda on þinre gesihðe gesete æsellend ofor hig þæt witan þeoda þæt hi menn synt to hwi gewite þu feor þu forsixst on gedafenlicnessum vel on neadþearfnessum on geswince þonne ofermodigaþ se arleasa byþ onæled se þearfa hig beoð gegripene vel gelæhte on geþeahtum forðan þe bið geherod se synfulla on gewilnungum sawle his & se unrihtdæda & bið gebletsod gehypste vel gremede se synfulla æfter mycelnes his yrscipes he ne secð nis god on his gesihðe besmitene synt wegas his on ælcre tide syn afyrsude domas þine fram ansyne his ealra feonda his he gewylt he sæde soðlice on heortan his ic ne beo astyrod vel awænd fram mægðe on mægðe butan yfle þæs mid awyrgednesse muþ full is & biternysse & facne under tungan his geswinc & sarnes he sit mid searwungum mid weligum vel ricum on diglum þæt he ofslea þane unscildigne eagan his on ðearfan beseoð vel behealdaþ he syrwaþ on dygelnesse swylce leo on his scræfe he syrwað þæt he gelæcce þane þearfan vel wreccan to gegrip þearfan þænne he wiðtihð hine on grine his he geeadmet hine he ahyldeð hine & he fylð þænne wyldende he bið þane ðearfan he sæde soðlice on heortan his forgiten is god he acyrð his ansyne þæt he ne geseo on ende aris sy upahafen hand vel miht þin ne forgit ðu þearfena forhwan gremede se arleasa god he cwæð soðlice on his heortan he ne gesecð þu gesihst vel geseoh þu forðan geswinc & sarnessa þu besceawast þæt þu belæwst hi on handan þinum þe gelæfed vel forlæten is se þearfa steopcilde þu byst fultum vel gefylsta forbrec vel tobryt earm vel anweald þæs synfullan & þæs awrigedan byð gesoht syn his & he ne byð gemet rixað on ecnysse & on worlde worlde ge forwurðaþ ðeoda of eorðan his gewilnunga þearfena gehyrde gearcunga vel gegearwungnessa heortan heora gehyrde eare þin gedem steopcilde & eaðmedum þæt ne gedyrstlæce ofor ðæt vel heononforð gemiclian vel mærsian hine mann ofor eorðan on ende sealm dauides on drihtne ic getreowige la humeta segge ge to sawle minre gewit vel far on munte swaswa spearwa forðan þe efne þa synfullan aþenedun vel bændon bogan hi gærcodon flana heora on kokere þæt hi sceotigen on digolnysse vel on forsworcennesse on rihte heortan vel ða rihtgeþancedon forþon þe þa þingc þe þu fulfremedyst hi towurpon se rihtwisa soðlice hwæt dyde on temple halgan his drihten on heofonum setl his eagan his on þone þearfan beseoþ vel behealdað bræwas his axiaþ vel befrinaþ manna drihten axsað vel befrinð rihtwisne & þone arleasne se soðlice þe lufaþ unrihtwisnysse hatað sawle his rineþ ofor ða synfullan grinu fyr & swefel & gast ysta vel storma dæl drencfætes heora vel heora calices forðan se rihtwisa drihten rihtwisnyssa þe lufode emnesse geseah anwlita his gehæl me forðan þe ateorode se halga forðan ðe gelytlode synt soðfæstnyssa fram bearnum manna unnyttu vel idelnyssa spræcon anra gehwilc to heora nyxtan weleras fakenfulle on heortan & heortan hi spræcon tostregd vel tostæncð drihten ealle weleras ða fakenfulle & tunga micelsprecende vel & ða swyðsprecelan tunga þa þe cwædun tungan ure uton gemiclian vel we mærsiað vel we gemicliaþ weleras ure fram us syndon la hwa ure drihten is for yrmþe wædlena vel hæfenleasra & geomrunge þearfena nu ða ic arise cweð vel sæde drihten ic sette on hælo vel on ðam halwendum getrywlice vel baldlice ic do on him spræcu drihtnes spræcu clæne seolfor mid fyre amerod gefandod eorðan afeormod seofonfealdlice þu eala drihten gehealtst us & gescildst us fram cneorisse vel mægðe þysre symle oððe æfre vel on ecnesse on embhwyrfte vel eall abutan þa arleasan gað oððe faraþ æfter heahnysse vel heannysse þinre þu gemænigfyldest bearn vel suna manna hu lange eala drihten forgitst ðu me of ende hu lange awendst þu ansyne þine fram me hu lange gesette ic geþeahtunga vel geþeaht on sawle minre sar on heortan minre þurh dæg vel iand dæg hu lange byð upahafen feond min ofor me beseoh & geher me drihten god min onliht eagan mine þæt ic æfre ne slape on deaðe ahwanne þæt ne secge vel cweðe feond min ic oforswiðrode vel swað agen vel ongen hine þa þe gedrefaþ me gladiað vel blissiað gif astirod ic beo ic soðlice on mildheortnysse þinre ic gehihte vel hopode blissað heorte min on hælo þinre vel on ðinu halwendan ic singe drihtne þam þe goda sealde me & ic singe naman drihtnes þæs heahstan sæde vel cwæð se unsnotera vel se unwita on heortan his nys god gewemmede hi syndon asceonigendlic vel gehyspendlic gewordene & hi synt on ymbhigdinyssum sinum nys na se þe do vel gefremme god nys na oð to anum of heofonum beseah ofor bearn manna þæt he geseo gif sy vel is ænig andgitel vel undergytende oþþe secende god ealle hi ahyldon vel framgewendon samod unnytte gewurdene hi syndon nys na se þe do god nys na oð to anum byrgen open is raca vel þrotu vel heora on tungum heora facenfullice hi dedun atter deafra næddran vel nædryna under welerum heora þara muþ mid awyrgednysse & bitternysse full is swifte vel hræde fet heora to ageotanne blod tobrytednys vel forgnidennys & ungesælignys on wegum heora weg sibbe & hi ne angetun vel ne oncneowon nis ege godes beforan eagum heora la hu ne angeatun vel oncnawað ealle þa þe wyrcaþ unrihtwisnysse þa þe forswelgaþ folc min swaswa mete hlafes drihten hi ne cigdon vel hi na ne cleopedon þær hi forhtedun mid ege þær þær næs ege vel egsa forðon þe drihten on cnosle l mægðe on rihtwisre is geþeaht ðæs hæfenleasan vel wædlan ne forsawon vel ge gescendon forðan þe drihten hiht his is la hwa forgyfð of heofenum þone halwendan vel hælo þone awent drihten hæftnede folces his geblissaþ & fægnaþ geseonde god eala þu drihten hwilc sceal geeardian vel hwa wunað on eardungstowe vel getelde þinum oððe hwilc gerest on munte halgum þinum se þe infærþ butan womme & wyrcð vel & byþ wyrcende rihtwisnysse se þe sprecð soðfæstnysse on heortan his se ðe ne worhte vel se ðe ne dyde faken on his tungan ne ne dyde þæm nixtan his yfel bysmerunga vel hosp & ne underfengc togeanes þa nyxtan his to nahte gelæd is on gesihðe his se awyrgeda vel yfelcunda þa ondrædendan soðlice drihten he gewuldraþ se þe sweraþ þæm nextan his & na bepæcð vel & hine na beswiceþ se feoh his þe ne sealde to gafole lac vel sceattas ofer þa unscyldigne vel ofer ða unscæððigan & ne onfengc se þe deþ þas þingc ne byð astyrod vel ne bið awend on ecnesse geheald me drihten forðan þe ic gehihte on ðe ic cwæþ drihtne god min þu eart forðan þe goda minra ðu ne beþearfst halgum þe syndon on eorðan his vel on his lande he gemærsode ealle willan mine on þam gemænigfylde syndon untrumnyssa heora æfter þan vel syððan hi genealæhton vel efstun na ic gegadrige gesamnunga heora of blodum vel of blodwitum ne ic ne gemyndig beo namana heora þurh weleras mine drihten dæl yrfeweardnysse minre & drencfætes mines þu eart ðu þe geedlæsast vel þu ðe geedstaþolo yrfeweardnysse mine ne rapas feollun me on þurhbe witodlice yrfweardnes min þurhscinendlic vel þurhbeorht is me ic bletsige se þe sealde me andgit onufan þæt vel þær to eacan oð nihte & ðreaddon me æddran vel lenednu mine ic foresceawige drihten on gesihðe minre symle forðan þe on swiðran is me þæt ic ne beo astyrod vel þæt ic ne beo awend for þyssum þingum geblissod is heorte min & gefeade vel blissade tunge min to eacan flæsc min & geresteþ on hihte geher eala drihten rihtwisnysse mine beseoh vel begem bene vel halsunge to mine mid earum onfoh gebed min na on welerum facenfullum of ansyne þynre dom min forðsteppe eagan þine geseon vel bewlatiun efnysse vel rihtwisnesse þu afandodest heortan mine & þu geneosadest on nyhte mid fyre þu amerodest & nys gemet on me unrihtwisnesse þæt ne sprece muþ min weorc vel dæda manna for wordum welera þinra ic geheold wegas stiðe vel hearde fulfrema stepas vel paþas vel fereldu mine on siðfætum þinum þæt ne syn astyrode vel awende siðstapla vel wegas mine vel fotswaðu ic clepode forðan þe þu gehyrdest me eala ðu god onhyld eare þin me & gehyr word mine gemærsa mildheortnyssa þine þu þe hale dest vel ðu þe gehælst hihtende on þe fram wiðercwiðendum vel agenstandendum swiþran þinre geheald swaswa seo eagan under sceade fyðerena þinra gescyld me fram ansyne arleasra þa þe me geswenctun vel wiðsettun fynd mine sawle mine ymþrungon vel ymbtrymdon ic lufige þe strengðe min is drihten staðolfæstnys vel trumnys min & gener vel frofer min & alysend min god min fultum vel fylstend min & ic gehihte on hine gescyldend min & horn vel strengð hæle minre & andfengcend vel underfond min herigende ic gecige drihten & fram feondum minum hal vel gehealden ic beo ymbðrungon me sarnyssa deaþes & burnan vel flownyssa unrihtwisnyssa gedrefdun me helle ymbtremedun forestopun vel ofðriccetan me grynu deaþes on gedrefednesse minre ic clepode & to gode minum ic cigde & he geherde of temple halgan his stefne mine & clepung min on ansyne vel on gesihðe his ineode to his earum wæs astyrod & heo bifode eorðe staþolas vel grundweallas vel grundas munta gedrefde wæron astah smoca on yrre his & fyr fram ansyne his & abarn gledan onælde synt fram him heofonas gecyðaþ wuldor godes & weorc handa his bodað vel cyð staðolfæstnysse vel roder dæg dæges bealceþ wurd & niht nihte gecyð vel gebeacnaþ wisdom vel ingehyd na gyta nærun wordlacu ne spræcu þara þe ne wæron geherde stefna heora on ealre eorðan asprang vel ferde sweg heora & on endum vel gemærum ymbhwyrftes eorðan wurd heora on sunnan he asette eardungstowe his & he is swaswa brydguma forðstæppende of brydbure his he geblissode swaswa se mæsta vel swaswa ent to geyrnanne weg fram heannysse vel fram þære healican heofonan forðgang vel utfær his & is genryne his oð hire heannysse ne nis se þe hine behyde fram hæten his æ drihtnes unawemmed gecyrrende sawla gecyðnysse drihtnys getrywe snoternysse vel wisdom lænende vel tyðiende lytlingum vel eadmodum rihtwisnyssa drihtnes rihte geblissiende heortan is bebod beorht vel scinendlic vel leoht onlihtende eagan gehere ðe drihten on dæge geswencednysse gescylde þe nama godes iacobes asende he þe fultum of halgum vel of halignesse & of heanysse he gescylde þe gemyndig sy he ealre onsægdnysse þinre & offrunga þine fæt vel onfengce sy agylde he þe æfter heortan þinre & eall geþeaht þin getrymme he we blissian on hælo þinre & on naman godes ures we beoð gemiclade vel gemærsode gefylle drihten ealle bena þine nu þa ic oncneow forðan halne dyde l þæt gehælde his gecorenan l crist l kyningc gehere hine of heofonum halgan his on anwealdnyssum vel on mihtigum hælo swiðran his þas on crætum & þas on horsum we soðlice on naman drihtnes godes ures geciað hi geþylmede vel gewriþene synt & hi hruron vel hi feollon we soðlice uparyson arærede & we syndon eala drihten on mægne þinum blissaþ kyningc & ofer hælo þinre vel þinum halwendan he blissað vel gefægnaþ þearle vel swiðlice gewilnunga heortan his þu sealdest him fram willan vel gewilnyssa welera his þu na bescyredyst & ðu ne bepæhtest hine forþan þu forestope hine on blætsungum swetnysse þu gesettyst on hæfde his wuldorbeag of stane deorwyrþum lif he bæd æt þe & þu sealdest him langsumnyssa dagena on worlde & on worlda world micel wuldor his on hæle þinre vel on ðinum halwendan wuldor & micelne wlite þu onasetst ofor hine forðan þe þu sylst hine on bletsungum on worlde world þu geblissast hine on blisse mid þinum andwlytan forðan þe kyningc gehihtað vel hopað on drihtne & on mildheortnysse þæs heaxstan ne byð he na astyrod vel & he ne bið awend sy gemet hand þin eallum feondum þinum swiðra þin gemete ealle þa þe ðe hatedun eala þu god god min beseoh on me forhwi me forlete þu feor fram hæle minre word gylta minra god min ic clepige iand dæg & þu ne geherst & on nihte & na to nanre unsnotornysse me þu soðlice on halgum geeardast lof israelitica bearna on þe gehihton vel hopedon fæderas ure hi gehihtun & þu alesdest hi to ðe hy clepodon & hale gewordene synt & hi synt gehælde on þe hi gehihton & hi ne synt gescynde ic soðlice eom wyrm & na mann bysmerung vel hosp manna & forwyrpnes vel aworpennys folces ealle geseonde me hlehtredon l tældun l hlogon on bysmor hi spræcon l sprecende wæron mid welerum & hi cwehtun heora heafod he gehihte on drihtne he genereð vel he generie hine he gehæle hine forðan þe he wile hine gewissaþ me & naht me ne byþ wana on stowe læswen ðær me he gelogade ofer wæter gereordnysse he geedwistode me sawle mine he gecyrde he gelædde me ofor paðas rihtwisnysse for naman his witodlice & ðeh þe ic gange oððe fare on midle sceadue deaþes ic ne ondræde yflu forþan þe þu mid me eart gerd þin stæf & þin sylfe me gefrefredun þu gearcodest beforan minre gesihðe beod vel beodwyste vel mysan agen hi vel agenes hig þa ðe geswencaþ vel ða þe gedrefaþ me þu amæstest vel þu gefætnodest on ele heafod min drencfæt vel calic min drincende vel on druncninge & la hu scinende vel hu beorht is & mildheortnys þin æfterfylge me on eallum dagum lifes mines & þæt ic wunige on huse drihtnys on langsumnysse daga drihtnes is eorðe & fulnysse vel gefyllednes hyre ymbhwyrft eorðana & ealle þa þe wuniað on hyre forðan þe he sylf ofer sæs gestaðolode hine & ofor flodas he gegearkode hine la hwilc astihð on munte oþþe hwilc stent on stowe haligre vel halgan his unscyldig l se unscæððiga on handum & se clænheorta se þe ne nam l anfengc on ydel sawle his ne ne swor on facne þæm nihstan his þes onfehð bletsunge æt drihtne & mildheortnysse fram his halwendan gode þeos is cneoris vel mægþ secendra hine secendra ansyne godes iacobes ahebbað vel tohlynnað gatu eala ge ealdras eowre & beo upahafene vel & up arærað gatu & infærð vel & ingangeð kyningc wuldres la hwilc is þes cyningc wuldres drihten se stranga & se mihtiga drihten mihtig on gefeohte ahlinnað vel ahebbað gatu eala ge ealdras eowre & upahrærað gatu ecelican & insteppeð cyningc wuldres to ðe drihten ic ahof sawle mine god eala þu min on þe ic gelyfe vel ic truwie ic ne sy aswæmed vel þæt me ne sceamige ne ne tælun vel hlakerian vel gebysmerian mine fynd soðlice ealle þa ðe ðoliað vel anbidiaþ þe ne beon gescynde syn gescynde ealle unrihte ðing wyrcende vel donde ofor æmtignysse vel on idel wegas þine geswutela me paðas þine lær vel tæc me gewissa vel gerece vel gelæd me on soðfæstnysse þinre & tæc vel lær forþan þe þu eart god hælend min þe & ic forðyldegode vel ic geþolade eallan dæge vel ealne dæg gemun gemildsunga þinra drihten & mildheortnyssa þinra þe fram worlde syndun giltas giugoðhades vel iugoðe minre gymelæsta vel nytennyssa & mine ne gemun ðu æfter mildheortnysse þinre gemun þu min for godnysse ðinre drihten swete vel werod & riht drihten forþan vel forðy æ he sylð agylttendum on wege he gewissað vel he gerehð modþwære vel þa manðwæran on dome he lærð vel he tæcð þam liþum wegas his dem me drihten forðan þe ic on minre unscæððinysse infærde & on drihtne hihtiende & ic ne beo geuntrumad gefanda me & gecostna me onæl l forswa l swæl l bærn lendenu l ædran mine & heortan mine forþon þe mildheortnesse þin toforan eagan mine is & ic gelicode on þinre soðfæstnesse ic ne sæt mid geþeahte ydelnysse & mid unrihte þingc wyrcendum ic ne instæppe vel inga vel & ic ne fara ic hatode gesamnunge yfelcundra vel awyrgendra & mid þam arleasum ic ne sitte ic ðwea betwux unscyldigum handa mine & ic ymbehwyrfe vel & ic ymbtrymme weofod þin eala þu þæt ic gehere stefne lofes ðines & ic cyðe ealle wundru þine ic lufode wurðunge vel wlite huses ðines & stowe eardunge vel wununge wuldres ðines ne amyr þu mid þam arleasum sawle mine mid werum blodigum lif & min drihten onlihtnes vel onlihtingc min & hælo min hwane ondræde ic gescyldend lifes mines fram hwam forhtige ic þænne genealecað ofor me ða deriendan þæt hi etun flæscas mine vel min flæsc þa þe geswencað me fynd mine & hi sylfe geuntrumede syndon hruron vel feollon þeah ðe samod standan agen vel togeanes me fyrdunga vel fyrdwicu ne ondræt heorte min þeah ðe arise tog togeanes me gefeoht on þæt ic gehihte an ðing ic bæd æt drihtne þæt an ic sece þæt ic geeardige vel þæt ic onwunie on huse drihtnys eallum dagum lifes mines þæt ic geseo willan drihtnes & ic geneosige tempel his forðan þe he behydde me on his bure vel on his eardungstowe vel on his getelde on dæge yfelra he gescylde on digelnysse his eardungstowe vel his geteldes on stane he upahof me & nu ða he upahof heafod min ofor fynd mine ic ymbeode & ic offrode on eardungstowe vel on his getelde his onsægdnesse vel hreames vel stefnelofes ic singe & lofsang ic cweðe drihtne gehyr stefne mine mid þære ic clipode gemiltsa min & gehyr me ðe sæde vel cwæð heorte min sohte ansyne min ansyne þine eala þu drihten ic sece ne acyr ðu ansyne þine fram me ne ahyld þu on yrre fram ðeowum þinum fultum vel gefilsta min sy ðu vel beo þu ne forlæt þu me ne forseoh ðu na vel ne ðu ne forseoh me god eala þu min halwenda god to þe ic cleopige min god ne swiga þu æt me ahwanne ne suga þu fram me & ic beo geanlicod niðerstigendum on seaðe gehyr stefne halsunge vel bene minre þænne ic gebidde to þe þænne ic upahebbe handa mine to temple halgan þinum ne samod sele þu vel betæc þu me mid synfullum & mid wyrcendum unrihtwysnysse ne forspil ðu me ðu ðe sprecað sibbe mid þam nixtan heora yflu soðlice on heortan heora syle heom æfter weorcum heora & æfter nearoðancnysse vel mane gegaderungum vel gemetednessa vel heora afundennysse weorcum handa heora agyld vel forgyf heom ageld edleanunga heora heom forðan þe hi ne ageatun worc drihtnes & on worcum handa his ðu tostencst hi & ðu na gestaðolast hi sy gebletsod forðan þe he gehyrde stefne halsunge vel mines gebedes vel minre bene is gefylsta min & gescildend & min & on hine gehihte heorte min & gefultumad ic eom & bleow flæsc min & of willan minum ic andette him strengð folcys his & gescyldend alesednessa vel hælu cristes his is gehæl vel folc ðin & gebletsa yrfeweardnysse ðine & gerece vel gewissa hi & upahefe hig oð ecnysse bringað drihtne bearn vel eala ge suna godes bearn vel suna ramma wuldor & wyrðmynt drihtne wuldor naman his gebiddaþ to drihtne on cafertune halgan his stefn drihtnys ofer wætru mægðrymnysse onaswegde ofer wætru manega on mægene is stemn on micelnysse vel on gemiclunga vel on mærsunge tobrysiende vel tobrytendes ceodorbeamas & tobrecð vel tobryt drihten cederbeam þæs holtes & he tocwiesð vel gelytlað hig swaswa cealf þæs holtes & is se leofesta vel se gelufoda swaswa sunu anhyrnedra vel forceorfendes lig fyres is stemn tosceacyndes westen & astyrað vel towent westen feldes vel ðæs landes gearciendes heortas & he unwrihð þiccetu vel ðicnyssa & on temple his ælc cweð wuldor ic upahebbe ðe forðan þe ðu anfenge me ne þu ne gelustfulladest vel tobræddest fynd mine ofer god min ic cleopede to þe & ðu gehældest me þu utgelæddest fram helle sawle mine þu gehældest fram niðerastigendum on seaðe singaþ drihtne halgan his & andettaþ gemynde halignysse his forðan þe yrre on his æbylgnysse & lif on willan his to æfenne ðurhwunað wop & on dægred blisse ic sæde vel cwæð on genihtsumnysse minre ic ne beo astyrod on ecnysse on willan ðinum ðu lændest vel ðu getyþodest wlite minum mægen ðu awendest ansyne þine fram me & geworden ic eom gedrefod to þe ic clepige & to gode minum ic gebidde on þe ic gehihte na ne beo ic gescynded vel þæt ic ne beo gescænd on ecnesse on rihtwisnysse þinre alys onhyld to me eare þin geefst vel hrada þæt ðu alyse sy þu me on gode scyldendum vel on beweriendum & on huse generes þæt þu gehæle me forðan þe strengð min & gener vel frofre min þu eart for naman þinum & þu gelædst me & ðu gefedst me þu gelædst me of grine þysum þæt ðe hi behyddon me forðan þe þu eart gescyldend min on handum þinum ic befæste vel betæce vel bebeode gast minne þu alysdest me god soðfæstnysse ðu hatodest þa begymendan idelnessa on idel vel unnytlicu ic on drihtne gehihte ic blissige & ic gladige on mildheortnysse þinre forþan þe þu beheolde vel þu besawe eaðmodnysse mine þu gehældest of neadðearfnyssum sawle mine ne þu ne beclysdest me on handum vel on anwealde feondes þu gesettyst on felde vel on stowe bradum vel on bradre stowe fet mine eadige ðæra forlætene þe synt unrihtwisnyssa & ðæra þe synt bewregone vel oferwrigene synna eadig se wer þam þe ne tealde vel þe ne talode drihten synne ne nis on gaste his faken forðan þe ic swigode forealdodon ealle ban mine þaþa ic clypode singallice vel ealne dæg forþan þe dæges & nihtes gehefegod is ofor me hand þin gecerrod vel gewend ic eom on gehrorenesse vel yrmðum minum þanne tobrocen bið hrygcban gylt minne cuðne þe ic dyde & unrihtwisnysse mine ic ne behydde ic cweð ic andette agen me unrihtwisnysse mine drihtne & þu forgeafe arleasnysse synne mine for þisre gebit to þe ælc halga on timan geþæslicum vel on gedafenlicre tide þeah hwæðre on flode wætra manegra to him hi ne genealæcað þu eart gener min fram gedrefednysse seo þe ymsette vel ymbsealde me upahæfdnes min alys me fram ymsittendum vel ymbsellendum me andgyt þe ic selle & ic lære þe on wege ðæm þe þu gæst ic getrymme ofer þe eagan mine nelle ge beon swaswa hors & mul þam þe nis andgyt on hælftre vel on wealdleðre & bridle vel & midle ceacan heora gewrið þa þe ne genealæcaþ to þe fægniað ge rihtwisan on drihtne rihtwisum vel þam rihtum gedafenað vel gerist samodherunga andettaþ drihtne on hearpan on saltere tynstrengum singað him singað him lofsang niwne well singað him mid hludre stefne vel on gehreord gleawnesse vel on hreame forðan þe riht is word drihtnes & ealle worc his on geleafan he lufað mildheortnesse & dom mid mildheortnesse drihtnes full is eorðe mid worde heofonas getrymede syndon & mid gaste muðes his eall mægen vel miht heora gesamniende swaswa on bytte wætru sæ gesettende on goldhordum diopnyssa vel nywelnyssa ondræda drihten eall eorðe fram him witodlice beoð astyrode ealle onwuniende ymbhwyrft forðan þe he sylf cwæð & geworhta vel gewurdone synt he bebead gesceapene hig synt ic bletsige on ælcre tide symle lof his on muðe minum on drihtne vel bið gehered sawl min geheran þa manðwæran & fægniun vel & blissian hig gemicliað vel mærsiaþ mid me & uton ahebban naman his on þæt sylfe ic sohte & he gehyrde & of eallum gedrefednyssum minum he alysde me genealæcaþ to him & ge beoð onlihte ansena eowere & ne beoð gescænde ðes þearfa clepode & drihten gehyrde hine & of eallum geswincfulnyssum his he gehælde hine gesent engel drihtnes on ymbhwyrfte ondrædendra hine & he generað hig onbyriaþ & geseoð þæt wynsum is drihten eadig wer se ðe hihtaþ on him dem drihten þa deriendan me gewin vel oferwin þa onawinnendan vel onwinnende me gegrip vel gelæc wæpna & scyld & aris on fultume me tobræd swurd vel wrace & beluc vel beclys agen vel togeanes hig þa þe ehtiað me sege to sawle minre hælo þin ic eom beon gescynde vel scamigan hi & anðracian þa secendan sawle vel licaman mine syn gehwyrfed vel gecyrran under bæc & beon gescynde þa þencendan me yflu beon hig vel gewurðun hig swaswa dust beforan ansene windes engel gewriðende vel geswencendæ vel genyrwiende hig gewurðe weg heora þystru & slipor vel asceonigendlic engel drihtnes ehtiende hig forþy þe hi buton gewyrhtum vel butan geearnung behyddon me forwyrd heora grines on idel hi asceonodon vel hi hyspton sawle mine becume heom gryn þe hi nyton & feng vel deað þe hi behyddun & gegripe & on grine hi hreosun on þæt sylfe sawl min geblissað on drihtne & heo gelustfullað ofor halwendan hire sæde vel cwæð se unrihtwisa þæt he agylte on him sylfum nis ege godes beforan eagan his forþan ðe facenfullice he dyde on his gesyhþe þæt he gemette vel þæt si gemet unrihtwisnysse his to hatunga wurd muðes his unrihtwisnys & facen he nolde ongitan þæt well he dede unrihtwisnysse he smeadde on his incofan vel on his clyfan he ætstod ælcum wege na godum vel ælcum yfelum wege yfelnesse witodlice he ne hatode on heofonum mildheortnys þin & soðfæstnes ðin oþ wolcnum vel oð þa genipu rihtwisnes þin swaswa muntes godes domas þine deopnessa micel menn & nytenu þu gehælst la hu swiðe þu gemiclodest mildheortnesse ðine bearn soðlice manna under wæfelse vel on gescyldnesse þinra fiþera hopiaþ hig beoð gefyllede vel hig beoþ gedrencte for genihtsumnisse huses þines & of burnan þinre wynsumnysse & þu scæncst hig nelle þu geeuenlæcan mid þam awyrgendum ne geeuenlæc þu wyrcende unrihtwisnesse forðon þe swaswa hig hrædlice hi adruwiað vel forseariaþ swaswa wyrta felda vel blæda wyrtena hwætlice hi feallaþ vel hreosað gehiht on drihtne & do godnysse onwuna on gelaðunge & ðu bist gefed on his welum þæt is on godes rice gelustfulla on drihtne & he sylð ðe gewilnunga vel gyrningce vel bena heortan þinre awreoh drihtne weg þinne & gehiht on him & he sylf deð þæt her æfter is gesett & he gelæt swilce leoht rihtwisnysse þine & dom þinne swaswa middæg underðeod beo ðu drihtne & gebide hine nelle þu geeuenlæcan on þæm þe byð gesundfullod on wege his on men wyrcende unrihtwisnyssa ablin fram yrre & forlæt hatheortnysse nelle þu geeuenlæcan þæt þu beo awerged forðan þa þe beoð awerged hi beoð ut asceofan anbidiende vel þoliende þa geyrfweardiaþ vel gehniað land vel ece lif begymeþ vel besihð se synfulla þæne rihtwisan && he gristbitaþ ofer hine mid his toðum eala þu drihten ne on hatheortnys þinre ðrea þu me ne on yrre þinum styr ðu me forþan þe flana þine onafæstnode synt me & þu getrymedest ofer me handa þine nis na hælo on flæsce minum fram ansyne yrres þines nys syb banum minum fram ansyne synna minra forþan þe unrihtwisnessa mine oferferdon heafod min vel ofer min andgit swaswa byrþen hefige nehefogode hi synt ofor me forrotodon gewemmede & hig synt dolcswaþu mine fram ansene unsnoternesse minre vel mines unwisdomes wrecca geworden ic eam & gebiged ic eom oð ænde æfre
