vel symle geunrotsod ic geode vel ic inferde forþan þe lendenu mine gefyllede synt mid hospe vel bismrungum & nys hælo on flæsce minum geswenced ic eam & geeaðmeded ic eom swiðe ic weop vel ic gyrmde for geomrunge heortan minre ic sæde ic gehealde wegas mine þæt ic ne agylte on tungan minre ic gesette muþe minum hyrdnesse þaþa samod stod se synfulla agen me ic adumede & geeæðmet ic eom & ic swigode fram godum & sar min geedniwod is wearmode vel gehæt wæs vel ahatode heorte min wiðinnan me & on smeaunge minre & abyrnð fyr ic spræc on tungan minre cuþne do me ende minne & getell dagana minra hwilc hit is þæt ic wite hwæt wana sy me efne gemetelice vel getælfæste vel ametendlice þu asettest dagas mine & is sped vel edwist min swaswa nan þing beforan þe eall ydelnys vel awendendnys ælc mann libbende vel þeahhwæþre on hiwe vel on anlicnesse gindfærð mann & on ydel ac he is gedrefed he goldhordaþ & he nat hwæm he gesomnað þa þing & nu þa hwæt vel hwilc is anbidung min ne wenstu la drihten & sped vel edwist min beforan þe is fram eallum unrihtwisnyssum minum genere hosp þam unwitan vel unwisum þu sealdest anbidende ic anbidode drihten & he beseh vel he begemde to me & he geherde bena mine & he gelædde me of seaþe yrmðe & of fenne drosnan & he gesette ofor stane fet mine & he gerehte vel & he gerihtlæhte stæpas vel færeldu mine & he onasende on muðe minum lofsang niwne leoð gode urum geseoð manege & hig ondrædaþ & hihtað vel & hig hopiað on drihten eadig wer þæs þe is nama drihtnes hiht his & he ne beseah on idelnyssum & on wodnessum leasum vel gewitlystum feala dydest þu drihten min god wundra þine & geðohtum on þinum & nis hwilc gelic sy þe vel se þe si gelic þe ic forekydde & sprecende ic eom vel ic spræc gemænigfylde hi synt ofer getele ofrunge & onsægdnysse þu noldyst licaman vel earan þu sealdest vel ðu fulfremedest me ofrunge for synne þu ne bæde ðonne vel þa ic cwæþ efne ic cume on forewerd þære boc vel on heafde bæc awriten is be me ic geworhte willan þinne eala þu min god ic wolde & æ þine on middan heortan minre eadig se þe undergyt ofer þæm wædlan & þearfan on dæge yflum alysð hyne gehealt hine & he geliffæst hine & eadigne he gedeþ hine on lande & he na sylþ hine on anwealde feonda his fultum bring him ofer bed saris vel sarnesse his eall strecednes vel reste his þu awendest on his untrymnysse ic cwæð gemiltsa min gehæl sawle mine forðan be ic agylte þe fynd mine cwædun yfelu me hwænne swelt he & forwyrð nama his & gyf he ineode þæt he geseawe ydelnyssa he spræc heorte his gesamnode unrihtwisnysse him he forðstop vel he ferde ut & he spræc samod vel on þæt sylfe agen me hwastredun vel wiðercwyddedon ealle fynd mine agen me hi þohton yfelu me word unrihtwis hi gesettan agen vel togeanes me wenst þu la vel cwæþst þu la se þe slæpð ne geycþ he na þæt eftarise swaswa gewilnaþ heort to wyllsprengum wætra swa gewilnað sawl min to þe eala þu god þyrste sawle min to gode wylle libbendum hwænne cume ic & ic æteowie beforan ansyne godes wærun me tearas mine hlafas dæges & nihtes þænne is gesæd me dæghwamlice hwær is god þin þas þing ic gemunde & ic ageat on me sawle mine forþan þe ic gewite on stowe bures vel eardungstowes vel geteldes wundorlices oð to huse godes on stefne blisse & andetnysse sweg mærsiendes vel wistfulliendes forhwi unrot eart þu eala þu min sawl & hwi gedrefest þu me hopa vel gehyht on gode forðan þe nu gyt ic andette him se halwenda anwlitan mines min god to me sylfum sawle min gedrefed is forþan gemyndig ic beo þin of lande þære ea & fram dune gehwædre nywelnes vel deopnys deopnisse gecigð on stefne wæterþeotena þinra vel þinra wæteredrana ealle heanyssa þine & yþa þine ofer me gewiton vel urnun vel ferdon on dæge bebead his mildheortnysse & on nihte lofsang his mid me gebed gode lifes mines dem me o þu god & totwæm vel toscead intingan minne of unhaligre þeode fram menn unrihtwisum & fakenfullum genera me forþan þe þu eart strencð min hwi forwurpe þu me vel forhwi utaðygdest þu me & forhwi unrot ga ic þænne geswencð me fynd asend leoht þin & soðfæstnysse þine hig sylfe me gelæddun & hig gebrohton on munte halgum þinum & in to þinum bure vel geteldum & ic inga to weofode godes to gode se þe geblissað mine ylde oþþe mine niwnysse vel iuguþe ic andette þe on hearpan o min god forhwi unrot eart þu þv min sawle & forhwi gedrefst þu me hopa vel gehiht on gode forþan þe nu gyt ic andette him se halwenda mines andwlitan & min god god earum mid urum we gehyrdon ure fæderas gecyddun us weorc þæt þe þu wercende wære vel weorhtest on dagum heora on dagum ealdum hand þin þeoda forspilde vel tostæncte & þu geplantodest hig ðu geswenctest folctruman & þu utaneddest hig ne soðlice on sweorde heora hi geanwealdedan eorðan & earmas heora ne gehelde hig ac seo swiðre þin & earm þin & onlihtingc vel leohtnes andwlitan þines forðon þe þu gelicodest on heom þu eart sylf cyning min & god min þu þe bebeodest hælo iacobes on þe feond ure we onblawaþ vel we windwiaþ mid horne & on naman þinum we forhycgað vel we forseoð þa onarisendan on us na soðlice on bogan minum ic gehihte vel ic ne hopie & sweord min na ne gehelpeð vel ne gehælð me þu gehældest soðlice us fram geswencendum us & þa hatigendan us þu gescendest on gode we beoð geherode æfre vel ealne dæg & on naman þinum we andettaþ a butan ende vel on weorlde bealcatte heorte min word god ic sæcge weorc min kyninge tunge min hreod boceras hrædlice writendes wynsum vel æþele vel ænlic vel wlitig on hiwe toforan bearnum manna gindgoten is gife on welerum þinum forðan gebletsode þe god on ecnysse sy ðu ymbgyrd min þinum swurde ofer þeoh þin riclice vel stranglice vel riclicost mid þinum hiwe vel wlite & fægernysse þinre begem gesundfullice vel gespediglice forðstæpe & rixa for soðfæstnesse & manþwærnesse & rihtwisnesse & gelæt þe wundorlice swiðre þin flana þine scearpe folc under þe hreosaþ on heortan feonda kyninges setl þin on worlda world gyrd steore vel lare vel rihtinge gyrde rices þines þu lufodest rihtwisnesse & þu hatodest unrihtwisnesse forþan smyrode þe god god þin mid ele blisse toforan þinum efenhlyttum wyrtgemange & dropa & þysma fram reafum þinum fram husum elpenbænenum of þam gelustfulludon þe god ure gener vel frofre & mægen vel & miht fultum on gedeorfnyssum vel on gedrefednyssum þa þe onbecomon us swiðe forðan we us ne ondrædaþ þænne byð astyrod seo eorðe & þonne beoð geferede muntes vel duna on heortan sæs swegdon & gedrefode hig synt wætru heora astyrode synt duna on strengðe his flodes ryne gegladaþ burg godes gehalgode bur vel geteld his se heahsta god on middan hire heo ne byð awend vel ne bið heo na astyrod gefultumaþ hyg god on ærnemorgen vel on dægered gedrefede syndon þeoda ahylde & syndon ricu he sealde stefne his astyrod is eorðe drihten mægena mid us andfengc ure god iacobes cumaþ & geseoð dæda vel worc þa þa he gesette foretacna vel beacna ofer eorðan eala ge ealle ðeoda hafetiað mid handum fægniaþ vel freadremaþ gode on stefne wynsumnesse vel blisse forði þe drihten se hehsta egeful cyningc mære ofer ealre eorðan he underðeodde folctruman us & þeoda under fotum urum he geceas us yrfeweardnesse his hyw vel wlite iacobes þæne þe he lufede astah god on swiðlicre blisse vel on fægnunge drihten on gehreorde vel on stefne beman singað gode urum singað dremaþ vel singaþ cyningce urum singað cyning ealre eorþan god singaþ wislice vel snotorlice rixað god ofer þeoda god sit ofer setle halgan his mære vel micel drihten & herigendlic swiðlice on ceastre godes ures on munte halgan his staðeliend blisse ealre eorðan muntes siones sidan norðdæles ceastre cyningces micelan vel þæs mæran cyninges god on husum his bið oncnawen þonne he onfehð hio forðon þe efne cyningas gesamnode syndon hi togædere becomon on annesse hig geseonde swa wundredan gedrefede hig syndon astyrede hig syndon fyrhto bifung begrap hig þær sarnessa swaswa eacnigendes wifes on gaste swiðlicum þu forbretest scipu on tarsen swaswa we geherdon swa we gesawon on ceastre drihtnes mægna vel mihta on ceastre godes ures god gestaðolede higo on ecnesse geherað þas þingc ge ealle þeoda mid earum onfoð ealle ge þe oneardiað ymbhwyrfte gehwylce eorðbogiendan & bearn manna on annesse se welega & se ðearfa muð min bið sprecende vel sprecð snotornesse vel wisdom smeaung heortan minre gleawnesse ic ahylde on bigspellum earan mine ic ontyne on sealmlofe ingehygdnessa vel foresetnysse mine la hwy ondræde ic dæge on yfelum unrihtwisnes hos mines ymbhwyrfð vel embtrymð me þa þe getreowiað on mægne vel mihte heora on mænigfealdnesse welena heora & hig wuldriaþ broðor ne alesde alesð man he ne selð gode gecwemnesse vel gladunge his & weorð alesednesse sawle his & he swinceð on ecnesse god goda drihten sprecende wæs vel spræc & he gecygde eorðan fram sunnan upspringe oþþe setlgange hiw his wlites swutelice cymþ god ure & ne swugaþ fyr on gesyhðe his byrnð & bið on his ymbhwyrfte reohnys swyðlic he gecygð heofonan of ufan & eorðan toscadan folc his gegaderiaþ vel gesomnigað to him halgan his þa þe endebyrdiaþ gecyðnesse his ofer onsægdnessa & cyðaþ heofonas rihtwisnessa his forðon þe god dema is gehyr min folc & ic sprece & ic gesweotelige vel ic geseðe þe god god þin ic eam onsægdnessum on þinum ic ne þreage þe offrunga soðlice þine on gesihðe minre syndon symle ic ne underfo of huse þinum cealfru ne of eowedum þinum buccan gemiltsa min god æfter micelan mildheortnesse þinre & æfter manifealdnesse vel mildsunga þinra adylga unrihtwisnesse mine swyþor vel swiðlice aðweah me fram unrihtwisnesse minre & fram gylte minum geclænsa vel afeorma me forþon þe unrihtwisnesse mine ic oncnawe & scyld vel synn min beforan me is symble þe anum ic gesyngode & yfel toforan þe ic dyde þæt þu sy gerihtwisod on spæcum þinum & þu oferswyðe þonne þu demende bist efne soðlice on unrihtwisnessum geeacnod ic eam & on synnum geeacnode me modor min efne soðlice soðfæstnesse þu lufodest on ungewisse þingc & dygelnyssa wisdomes þines þu gesweotolodest þu besprengc vel geandbædst me hlenorteare & ic beo geclænsod vel & ic beo afeormod þu ðwehst me & ofer snawe & ic beo gehwited la hwæt wuldrast þu on yfelnysse þu þe mihtig eart on unrihtwisnysse ealne dæg unrihtwisnysse þohte tunge þin swaswa næglseax scearp þu dydest facn þu lufodest yfelnysse ofer welwillendnysse unrihtwisnysse swyðor þonne sprecan emnysse ealle word scyfes vel hryrednesse on facnfulre tungan forþi god towyrpð þe on ende he awyrtwalað þe & he fysð þe of getelde & wyrttruman þinne of lande libbendra geseoþ þa rihtwisan & hig ondrædaþ & ofer hine hig hlihchað hig secgaþ eofne her is man se þe ne gesette god fultum him ac he hopode on mycelnysse his welena & he swyðrode vel & he þurhswiðde on idelnysse his sæde se dysega vel se unwisa on his heortan nis gewæmmede hig synt & onscuniendlice gewordene hig synt on unrihtwisnyssum heora nis se ðe do god of heofonum beheold ofer suna manna þæt he geseo gyf is undergytende oþþe secende god ealle hig ahyldon samod unnytwyrþe vel unnytte gewordene hig synt nis na þe do god nis na oþþe to anum la hu nytan ealle þa þe wyrcað unrihtwisnysse þa þe fornimaþ vel swelgaþ folc min swaswa mete hlafes hig ne cigdon þær hig forhtodon mid ege þær þær næs ege forðan þe tostæncte heora ban þa þe mannum liciaþ gescynde hig synt forðan þe god forseah hig la hwa forgifþ vel la hwilc sylð of seon hælo vel þane halwendan þonne awent vel acyrreþ gehæftnysse vel hæftnoð folces his fægnaþ & blissaþ eala þu god on naman þinum gehæl me & on mihte þinre dem me geher min gebed mid earum underfoh word muþes mines forþan þe ælfremede onarison togænes me & þa strangan sohton sawle mine & hig ne forsetton god toforan ansyne heora gefultumaþ underfond is sawle minre awend vel acer yfelu on feondum minum & on þinre soðfæstnæsse tostænc hi sylfwilles ic onsæge vel ic offrige þe ic andette naman þinum eala þu drihten forþan þe he is god forðan of ælcere gedrefednysse þu generodest & ofer mine fynd forseah min eage gehyr god gebed min & ne forseoh þu bene mine begem on me & gehyr gedrefed vel geunrotsod ic eom on minre gærcuncge & gedrefed ic eom fram stemne fyndes & fram gedrefednesse þæs synfullan forþan þe hig ahyldon on me unrihtwisnesse & on graman hefigtyme hig wæron me min heorte gedrefed is & fyrhtu deaþes feol ofer ege & bifung comon & oferwreogan me þystru & ic sæde la hwa forgyfð me feþera swaswa culfran & ic fleo & ic gereste efne ic afyrsode fleonde & ic wunode on westene ic anbidode hine se þe me gehælde fram swarcmodnysse gastes & reohnysse gemildsa min forðan þe fortræd man ealne dæg onawinnende he gedrefde me fortrædon mine fynd forþan manege feohtende togænes fram heannysse dæges ic ondræde ic soðlice on þe hopige on gode ic herige spræce mine ic hopode ne ondræde ic me hwæt do me flæsc eallan dæge word mine hi onscunedon togænes ealle geþohtas heora on yfele hi onwuniaþ & hi behydaþ hig minne ho l hohfot cepaþ l begemaþ swaswa hi forþyldigodon sawle mine for nahte þu gehælst hig on groman folc þu tobrycst min lif min ic gecyðde þe þu gesettest mine tearas on þinre gesyhþe swaswa on þinum behate eala þu god forþan on þe truwaþ sawl min & on scadue fiðera þinra ic hopie oð þæt gewite unrihtwisnys ic clypie to gode to þam hyhstan to gode se þe dyde wel me he asende of heofonum & he alysde he forgæf to hospe þa fortredendan asende his mildheortnesse & his soðfæstnesse & he generode mine sawle of midlunge hwelpa þara leona ic slep gedrefed suna manna teþ wæpna & heoruflan & heora tunge scearp swurd si þu upahafen ofer heofonas & on ealre eorþan þin wulder grin hi gearcodon minum fotum & hig gebigdon mine sawle hig adulfon ætforan minum ansyne pyt & hi onbefeollon on þane gearu min heorte ic singe & sealm ic segce aris eala þu minum wuldre eala þu psaltere & hearpe ic arise on ærnemærgen gyf soðlice witedlice rihtwisnysse ge sprecaþ rihtlice demaþ eala ge suna manna witedlice on heortan unrihtwisnessa ge wyrcaþ on eorþan unrihtwisnessa eowre hande gereoniaþ geælfremede synt þa synfullan fram gecyndlime hig dwaledon fram gecyndlime vel of innoðe hig spræcon leasunga hatheortnys him æfter gelicnysse neddran swaswa næddran deafre & fordyttendre hire earan seo ne geherð stemne galendra & atterwyrhtan galendes wislice tobryt teþ heora on heora muþe tuxan þara leona tobryt drihten to nahte hig becumaþ swaswa ayrnende wæter he bænt vel aþenaþ his bogan oþ þæt hi beon geuntrumode swaswa weax þæt þe fleuwð vel melteþ hig beoþ ætbrodene oferfeoll fyr & hig ne gesawon sunnan genera me of feondum minum eala þu min god & fram onarisendum on me alys ales fram wyrcendum unrihtwisnysse & fram werum blodum geheald me vel gehæl forþan þe efne hig ongunnon vel hig begripon mine sawle onahruron on me þa strangan ne hit nis min unrihtwisnys ne synn min butan unrihtwisnysse ic orn & ic gerihtlæhte aris on minum gænryne & geseoh & þu eala drihten god mihta eala þu israhela god begym to geneosienne ealle þeode þu ne gemildsast eallum þa þe wyrcaþ unrihtwisnesse hig gecyrraþ on æfenne & hunger hi þoliaþ swaswa hundas & hig ymbfarað cæstre efne hi sprecan on heora muþe & is sweord on heora welerum forþan þe hwa gehyrde & þu gebysmerast hi to nahte þu gebrincst ealle ðeoda þu utaðydest us & þu towurpe us þu yrsadest & þu gemildsodest us þu astyrodest eorðan & þu gedrefdest hig gehæl hyre tobrytednyssa forþan þe astyrod heo is þu æteowodest þinum folce heardnyssa þu gescænctest mid wine onbryrdnysse þu forgæfe ondrædendum þe getacnunge þæt hig fleon fram ansyne bogan þæt beon alysde þine leofan gehæl mid þinre swyðran & gehyr me spræc on his halgan ic blissie & ic todæle landcofan & dæneland getelda ic amete min is se landmearca & min is mannaseisca landsplot & wæstmbærnes stræncð mines heafdes iuda kyningc min geher bene mine begym minum gebede fram gemærum eorðan to þe ic clypode þaþa wæs geancsumod min heorte on stane þu upahofe þu gelæddest forþan þe geworden þu eart hiht min beo þu stepel stræncðe fram ansyne fyndes ic onwunige on þinum getelde on weoruldum ic beo gescyld on wæfelse þinre fiþera forþan þe þu þu gehyrdest gebed min þu forgæfe erfwyrdnysse ondrædendum þinne naman dagas ofer dagas þu gewissast þu togeycst his gær oþ on dæg mægþe vel cneorisse & cynrene he þurhwunaþ on ecnysse on gesyhþe godes his mildheortnysse & his soðfæstnysse la hwa sæcþ swa salmsang ic secge þinum naman on weorulda weoruld þæt ic agylde behat mine of dæge on dæg la hu ne gode underþeod biþ sawl min fram him soðlice min halwænde vel hælo soþes & he is & halwendlica min underfond min ic ne beo astyrod heononforþ vel na leng la hu lange onahreose ge on mannan ge ofsleaþ ealle ge swaswa wage vel wagþeorles ahyldum & stænenum hæge utaþydum þeah hwæþere min weorð hig þohton aweorpan ic orn on þurste mid heora muþe hig bletsodon & mid heora heortan hig wergdon gode underþeod beo þu eala þu min sawl forþan þe is fram him geþyld min forþan þe he is & hælend min fultumiend min ic ne beo adræfed on gode min halwenda & min wulder god mines fultumes & hiht min on gode is hopiaþ on hine eala eall gesamnung folces ageotaþ ætforan him eowre heortan god fylstend ure on ecnesse to þe of leohte ic wacie þyrste on þe min sawl la hu manigfealdlice þe min flæsc on awestum lande & on unwæterium swa on halgum ic æteowode þe þæt ic gesawe þine mihte & wulder þin forþan betere is mildheortnys þin ofer lif mine weleras heriaþ þe swa ic bletsige þe on minum life & on þinum naman ic upahebbe mine handa swaswa mid rysele & fætnysse si gefyld min sawl & weleras blisse heraþ min muþ gemyndig ic wæs þines uppan minre beddincge on morgentidum ic smeade on þe forþan þe þu wære min fultumiend & on wæfelse þinra fyþera ic fægnie geþeodde min sawl æfter þe me underfeng þin swiðre gebed min þonne ic bidde fram ege fyndes genera sawle mine þu gescyldest fram gegaderunge yfelwillendra fram mycelnysse wyrcendra unrihtwisnesse forþi þe hig scerptan swaswa sweord tungan heora & hi bændon bogan biter þincg þæt hi scotedon on dygelnyssum þone ungewemdon ferlice hi scotiaþ hine & ne ondrædaþ hi gefæstnodon heom manfulle spræce hig rehton þæt hi behyddon grinu hi sædon hwa gesihð hig hi smeadon unrihtwisnessa hig ateoredon smeagende mid smeaunge genealæcþ man heorte to healic & biþ upahafen flana lytlinga gewordene synt wita heora & geuntrumade togenes heom heora tungan sint gedrefede ealle þa þe gesawon hig þu gedafnaþ lofsang on syone þe & bið agolden behat geher min gebed to þe eall vel ælc flæsc kymþ word unrihtwisra swyðradon ofer us urum arleasnessum & þu gemiltsadest eadig þone þe þu gecure & þu upgename he oneardað on þinum cafertunum we beoþ gefyllede on godum þines huses halig is þin templ on wunderlicre emnysse us ure halwendlica hiht ealra gemeara eorþan & on sæ feor gegearciende duna on þinre mihte vel on mægne þinum begyrd mid mihte þu þe gedrefst his eagan ofer þeoda behealdaþ þa þe tyrwiaþ ne beoþ upahafene on heom sylfum bletsiaþ eala ge ðeoda urne drihten gehyrde & doþ stemne his lofes se þe gesette mine sawle to life & he ne sealde to astyrunge mine fet gemiltsige ure & gebletsige us he onlihte his andwlitan ofer & gemildsige ure þæt we ongytan on eorðan þinne weg on eallum þeodum þinne halwendan andettan þe folc folctruma ealle blissian & fægnian hig þeoda forþi þe þu demst folctruman on emnysse þeoda on eorðan & þu þe wissast vel gerecest eorðe sealde hire westm gebletsige us ure us & ondrædan hine ealle eorðan gemæru arise god & syn todræfedde feond his & fleon þa þe hatedon hine fram ansene his swaswa ateoraþ smec swa ateorian hi swaswa flywð weax fram ansene fyres swa forwyrðan synfullan fram ansene godes & þa rihtwisan beoð gewistfullode blissiað on gesihðe godes & beoð gelustfullode on blisse singaþ gode sealmsang secgaþ his naman siðfæt wyrcaþ him se þe astah ofer nyðersie drihten naman him fægniaþ on his gesihðe beoþ gedrefde fram his ansene fæderas steopcilda & deman wuduwena on stowe his halgan oneardian dæþ anes þeawes on huse se þe utlæt þa gebundenan on stræncgþe swa gelice hig þa þe tyrwiaþ þa þe wuniaþ on byrgenum þa þu utfore on gesyhðe þines folces & þa þu þurhfore on westene eorðe wæs astyrod witodlice heofonas droppetodon fram ansyne godes þæs hehstan fram ansene godes israeliscan gehæl me forþi þe inaforon vel ineodon wæteru oþ mine sawle onafæstnod ic eom on lime deopnesse & nis sped vel edwist ic com on deopnysse sæ reohnys & besencte ic swanc hrymende hase gewordene synt mine goman ateoradon mine eagan þonne ic hopie on minne god gemænigfylde synt ofer loccas mines heafdes þa þe hatedun butan geearnungum gestrangode synt þa þe æhton mine fynd unrihtlice þa þingc þe ic ne nam þa ic ageald ne scamian on me þa þe anbidiaþ þe mihta ne beon gescænde þa þe sæcaþ þe for þe forþi þe ic forbær hosp oferwreah gescyndnes mine ansyne ælðeodig gewordem ic eom minum gebroðrum & wrecca bearnum minre moder to minum fultume begem to gefultumianne efest beon gedrefde & scamian þa þe secaþ mine sawle gecyrran on bæcling & scamian þa þe willaþ me yfelu syn afyrsade þærrihte scamiende þa þe secgaþ me eala eala fægnian & blissian on þe ealle þa þe sæcaþ þe & secgan hin symle si gemærsad drihten þa þe lufiað þinne halwendan ic soðlice wædla & þearfa eom gefultuma fultumiend min & alysend þu eart ne lata þu na ic hopode ne beo ic gescænd on ecnesse on þinre rihtwisnesse alys & genera ahyld to me þin eare & gehæl beo þu me gode on to gescyldendum & on stowe ymbtrymmedre þæt þu gehæl me forþi þe min trymmingc vel staþolfæstnesse & frofor min þu eart genera of hande þæs synfullan & of hande togenes æ dreogendes vel dondes þæs unrihtwisan forþi þe þu eart min geþyld min hiht fram minre gugoþe on þe getrymmed ic eom of innoðe of innoþe minre moder min gescyldend on þe min sang symle swylce forebeacn geworden ic eom for wel manegum & þu eart strang fultumiend si gefylled min muþ mid lofe þæt ic singe þin wulder ealne dæg þin mærsunge vel gemiclunga ne aweorp þu on tide minre ylde þonne ateoraþ min mægen ne forlæt þu na me þinne dom kincge syle & þine rihtwisnesse suna þæs kyncges to demanne þin folc on rihtwisnesse & þine þearfan on dome underfon duna sibbe folce & hylla rihtwisnesse he demð þearfan folces & he gehælð bearn þearfena & he geeadmet þane teonere & he þurhwunaþ mid sunnan & ær monan on kynrynum kynrena he nyþerastihþ swaswa ren on flys & swaswa niþerastihþ droppetung droppende ofer eorþan upspryt on dagum his rihtwisnys & genihtsumnys sibbe oþ þæt biþ ætbroden mona & he gewylt fram sæ oþ sæ & fram flode oþ gemearu ymbhwyrtes eorþana ætforan him niþerfeallaþ silharwan his fynd eorðan & licciaþ eala la hu god is israhela god þam þa þe synt on rihtre heortan mine soþlice fornean astyrode synt fet fornean agotene synt mine stapas forþi þe ic andode ofer þa unrihtwisan sibbe synfulra geseonde forþi þe nis scawung heora deaþes trymnys on heora wite on geswince manna hig ne synt mid mannum & hig ne beoþ beswungene forþi þe heold vel genam hig modignys oferwrigene hig synt mid unrihtwisnesse & heora arleasnysse forðstop swylce of rysele heora unrihtwisnes & hig foran on gewilnunge heortan hig þohton & spræcon man unrihtwisnesse on þane healican hi spræcon hig gesetton to heofonum heora muþ heora tunge & for on eorðan to hwi utadræfdest þu vel utaneddest þu on ænde yrsade þin hatheortnes ofer scæp þinre læswe gemyndig beo þu þinre gesamnunge þa þu geahnodest fram frymþe þu alysdest gerde þinre yrfeweardnysse dun on þam þu wunodest on hire upahef þine handa modignysse on heora on ænde hu fela yfelwilnode fynd on halgum & wuldrodan þa þe hatedon þe on middeweardum þines freolsas hig gesettan heora tacna tacna & hig ne oncneowan swaswa on utfære ofer heahne on wuda treowa swylce mid æcsum hig aheowan his gatu on þæt sylfe on æcse & adesan hig awurpan hig hig onældon mid fyre þinne haligdom on eorðan hig besmiton geteld þines naman sædon on heora heortan heora mægþ samod geswican utan don ealle dagas freolses godes of eorþan ure tacnu we ne sawon eallunga nis witiga us & he ne oncnæwð læng we andettaþ & we cegaþ þinne naman we reccaþ þine wundra þonne ic genime timan ic rihtwisnessa deme formealt vel hnesce geworden is eorþe & ealle þa þe eardiaþ on hire ic getrymede hire sweras ic sæde unrihtwisum unrihtlice don agyltendum nylle ge upahebban horn ahebban on heanyssum eowerne horn spræcon togænes gode unrihtwisnesse forþi þe naþor ne fram eastdæle ne fram westdæle ne awestum dunum forþi þe is god dema þysne he geeadmet & upahefþ forþi þe calic on handa wines scires full gemængednysse he ahylde of þysum on þis his drosna nis aidlad drincaþ ealle synfulle eorþan cuþ on iudea lande god is on israhela þeodæ mycla nama his & is geworden on sibbe his stow & his wunung on sion þær he tobræc mihta bogana scyld & swyrd & gefeoht onlihtende wunderlice fram dunum ecum gedrefede synt ealle þa unwisan on eortan hig slepan heoræ slæp naht gemettan & ealle weras welena on heora handum fram þinre ðreaunge iacobes hnæppodan þa þe astigon hors þu eart egesful & hwa wiþstænt þe is þonanforþ vel siððan þin grama of heofonan gehyrdne vel hlyst þu worhtest dom eorðe ondred vel byfode & heo geswac vel heo wæs stille mid minre stemne to drihtne ic clypode to gode & he begymde me on dæge minre gedrefednysse god ic sohte mid minum handum on nihte togænes him & ic ne eom bepæht wiþsoc beon gefrefrad min sawl gemyndig ic wæs godes & ic gelustfullode & ic eom gegearcod & ateorode min gast forhradodan weccan mine eagan gedrefed ic eom & ic ne spræc ic þohte dagas ealde ece gear on mode & ic hæfde & ic smeade on nihte mid minre heortan & ic wæs gegearcod vel & ic geswanc & ic sweop vel & gehrudrede minne gast cweþst þu la on ecnysse awyrpþ & he to ne geycð þæt he lycwyrðre sy gyt on ende mildheortnesse his oþþe framadeþ fram cynryne on cynryn begymaþ la min folc mine æ ahyldaþ eowre earen on wordum mines muþes ic geopnige on bispellum minne muþ ic sprece foresetnyssa fram frymþe swa fela swa we gehyrdon & we oncneowan þa ure fæderas & rehtan us hig ne synt bedyhlade fram heora bearnum on oþre mægþe reccende drihtnes lofa his mægnu & his wundra þe he worhte & he arærde gekyþnysse on æ & he gesette on þære þeode swa fela swa he bebead urum fæderum cuþe wyrcan þa heora bearnum þæt oncnawe oþer mægþ bearn þa þe beoþ akende & uparisaþ & reccaþ heora bearnum þæt hig gesettan on gode heora hiht & hig ne forgytan godes weorca his beboda & hig secan þæt hig ne beon swaswa heora fæderas þweor mægþ & tyrwiende vel þurhbitter kynryn seo þe ne gewissaþ hire heorte nis gelyfed mid gode hire gast bearn bændende l behealdende & sændende bogan hig gecyrdan on dæge gefeohtes coman þeoda on þine yrfweardnysse hig besmiton templ þine halige hig gesetton þa burh on æpplena hyrdnesse vel æppla to hyrdredenne hræwas vel þa deaðlican þinra þeowana mettas fugelum heofonan flæsc þinra halgana wildedeorum eorðan hig aguton blod heora swylce wæter on ymbhwyrfte þære ceastre & næs se þe bedulfe gewordene we syndon on hospe urum neahgeburum tal vel golfetung & gebismerung þam þa þe synt on urum ymbhwyrfte hu lange yrsast þu on ænde si onæled swylce fyr þin anda ageot þinne graman on ðeoða þe þe ne oncneowon & on ricu þe þinne naman ne cigdon forþi þe hig æton iacobes cnosel his stede vel stowe & hig aweston ne gemun þu unrihtwisnessa ura ealdra hrædlice forhradian vel foresteppan us þine mildheortnessa forþi þe þearfan gewordene we syndon þearle gefultuma us ure halwendlica for wuldre þines naman alys us milde & beo þu urum synnum for þinum naman eala þu þe gewissast israela folc begem & þu þe lædst swylce sceap þu þe sitst ofer si þu geswutelad ætforan þysum þrym cynrenum awræc þine mihte & cum þæt þu gehæl us gehwerf us & æteowa þin ansyne & gehealdene wo beoð mihta la hu lange yrsast þu gebed þines þeowan þu afedst us mid hlafe teara & drync þu selst us on tearum on gemete þu gesettest us on wiðercwydenysse urum neahgeburum & ure fynd gehyscton vel scendon us mihta gecyr us & æteowa þine ansyne & we beoþ gehealdene wingeard of ægiptalande þu feredest þu utadrefdest þeoda & þu aplantodest hine blissiaþ gode urum fultumiende fægniaþ gode underfoþ salm & syllaþ timpanan vel gligbeam saltere wynsumne mid hearpan bymiaþ vel hlyriaþ on niwum monþe mid byman on mærum dæge vel on wlitescenan dæge eowres freolses forþi þe is bebod on & is dom gode gekyþnysse on he gesette þa þaþa he for of lande þeostrum gereord þæt þe he ne oncneow he gehyrde he awænde fram byrþenum his hrycg handa his on meocswilian þeowadon on gedrefednysse þu cegdest & ic alysde þe ic gehyrde on digelnysse reohnysse ic afandode þe mid wætere wiþercwydenysse geher la min folc & ic seþe vel ic gelæstfullige þe gif þu gehyrst stod on gesamnunge goda on midlunge toscæt vel todemeþ hu lange deme ge unrihtwisnesse ansyne synfulra & underfo ge demaþ þam wædlan & steopcilde þone forhyndan & þearfan gerihtlæcaþ generiaþ þone þearfan & þane wædlan of hande þæs synfullan & alysaþ hig nystan ne hig undergætan on þystrum hig gaþ beoð astyrode ealle grundweallas eorðan ic sæde godas ge syndon bearn þæs healican & ealle ge swaswa men sweltaþ swa an of ealdrum & gefeallaþ aris dem eorþan forþi þe þu yrfwyrdast on eallum þeodum hwa gelic biþ þe ne swuga þu ne þu ne beo gestild forþi þe eofne þine fynd swegdon þa þe hatedun þe & upahofan heafod ofer þin folc hig yfelwilnadon geþeaht & hig þohton togænes þinum halgum hig sædon cumaþ & tostænce we hig of þeode & ne bið gemund nama heononforþ forþi þe hig þohtan anmodlice samod togænes þe gekyþnesse gestihton geteldu vel eardungstowa idumitiscra þas naman tacniaþ heafodgyltas gehwylce & ealle elfremede mid buendum þe is gereht nearunesse witodlice com mid heom gewordene hig synt to fultume bearnum loþes la hu gelufode synt þine geteld mihta gewilnaþ & heo ateoraþ min sawl on cafertune min heorte & min flæsc blissadon on libbendne god witodlice spearwa gemett him hus turtla nest him hwær he lecge his briddas synt þine weofoda mihta min king eadige þa þe eardiaþ on þinum huse on weorulda weoruld hig heriaþ þe is eadig wer þæs þe is fultum fram þe stapas vel upastigenesse on his heorten he stihte on dene teara on stowe þe he gesette witodlice bletsunga sylþ æsyllend hig faraþ of mihte to mihte biþ gesawon god goda mihta gehyr min gebed mid earum underfoh þu gebletsodest þine eorþan þu awendest hæfnunge iacobes þu forgæfe unrihtwisnesse þines folces þu oferwrige ealle synna heora þu geliþegodest ealne þinne graman þu fram yrre þinre æbilignesse gecyrr us ure halwenda & awænd þinne graman fram us la hu on ecnysse yrsast þu us oþþe astrehst þu þinne graman of mægþe on mægþe þu gecyrrende geliffæst us & þin þeod blissað on þe æteowa us þine mildheortnesse þinne halwendan & syle us ic gehyre hwæt sprecþ on me forþi þe he sprecþ sibbe on his þeode & ofer his halgan & on heom þa þe gecyrraþ to heorte ahyld þin eare & gehyr forþi þe wædla & þearfa ic eom geheald mine sawle forþi þe halig ic eom gehæl þinne þeowan hopiendne gemildsa min forþi þe to þe ic cleopode ealne dæg geblissa sawle þines þeowan forþi þe to þe mine sawle ic upahof wynsum & liþe & synt mycele mildheortnyssa eallum cigendum þe mid earum underfoh min gebed & begym to stemne minre bene on dæge minre gedrefednysse ic cleopode to þe forþi þe þu geherdest nis þin gelice on godum & nis æfter þinum weorcum ealle þeoda þe þu geworhtest cumaþ & hig gebiddaþ ætforan þe & hig wuldriaþ þinne naman grundweallas hire muntum on halgum lufaþ gatu ofer ealle geteld vel eardungstowe wuldorfulle þing gecwedene synt be þe cester godes ic gemune cunnendum eofne elþeodige & folc silharwana þas wæron þær cweþst þu cweþ man & is man acenned on hire & se sylfa gestaðelode hig hyhsta recð on gewritum folca & þisra ealdra þa þe wæron on hire swaswa blissiendra ealra wunung is on þe hæle minre on dæge & on nihte ætforan þe infare on þinre gesihðe min gebed ahyld þin eare to minre bene forþi þe gefylled is mid yfelum min sawl min lif to helle & genealæhte gewened ic eom mid nyþerastigendum to seaðe geworden ic eom swaswa man butan fultume betwyx deadum fry swaswa gewundede men slapende on byrgenum þara þu neart gemyndig læng & hi of þinre handa utadræfde syndon hig geledon me seaþe on þan niþeran on þystrum & on scaduwe deaþes ofer me getrymed is þin hatheortnys ealle þina yþa & þu onbelæddest ofer me feor þu dydest cuþan mine fram me hig gesetton forsewennysse vel anscununga heom betæht vel belæwed ic eom & ic ut na ne eode mildheortnyssa drihtnes on ecnesse ic singe on mægþe vel on cynrene & cneorisse ic kyþe þine soþfæstnysse on minum muþe forþi þe þu cwæde mildheortnys bið getimbrad on heofonum biþ gegearcod þin soþfæstnys on heom ic stihte vel ic gemynte gekyþnysse minum gecorenum ic swor dauide minum þeowan oþ ecnysse ic gearcige þin sæd vel ofspryngc & ic getimbrige on kynryne & cneorisse þin setl andettaþ heofonas þine wundru witodlice þine soþfæstnysse on gelaþunge haligra forþi hwa on geninum bið wiþmeten drihtne gelic biþ on godes bearnum se þe wuldraþ on geþæhte haligra he is mære & egesful ofer ealle þe synt on ymbhwyrfte his mihta la hwa is gelic þe mihtig þu eart & is þin soðfæstnys on þinum ymbhwyrfte gener geworden us fram cynrene on cneorisse ærþon þe duna wæron oþþe wære gescapen eorþe & ymbhwyrft fram weorulde & oþ weorulde þu eart god ne awend þu vel ne acyr þu mannan to geniþerunge & þu sædest gecyrraþ eala ne manna bearn forþi þe synt þusend gæra ætforan þinum eagum swylce gysternlic dæg þe forþgewat swylce hyrdrædenu on nihte þa þe for nahte beoþ gehæfde heora gær & beoþ on ærnemorgen swaswa gærs gewiteþ morgen blewð & gewiteþ æfen niþerfylð he forheardaþ & fordrugaþ forþi þe we ateorodon on þinum graman on þinre hatheortnesse gedrefde & we syndon þu gesettest ure unrihtwisnessa on þinre gesyhþe ure weorulde on onlihtincge þines andwlitan forþi þe ealle ure dagas ateorodon on þinum yrre & we ateorodon ure gær swaswa lobbe vel rynge beoþ asmeade se þe wunaþ vel se þe eardaþ on fultume þæs hyhstan on gescyldnysse godes heofonan he eardaþ he sægþ drihtne underfond min þu eart & is min gener ic gehopige on hine forþi þe he alysð of grine huntiendra & fram teartum worde vel & fram wyþerweardum worde his sculdrum he scaduaþ þe under his fyþerum & þu gruwast vel þu gehihtest mid scylde ymbtrymþ þe his soþfæstnes þu ne ondrætst fram nihtlicum ege fram flana fleogendre on dæge fram mangunge geondfarendre on þystrum fram onræse & fram middendæglicum deofle feallaþ fram þinre sidan þusenda & tyn þusenda fram þinum swyþrum to þe soðlice he ne genealæcþ þeah hwæðre mid þinum eagum þu behealst edlean synfulra vel synna & þu gesyhst forþi þe þu eart min hiht hyhst þu gesyttest þin gener god is andettan drihtne & singan þinum naman eala þu hyhsta to kyþanne on ærnemorgen þine mildheortnesse þine soðfæstnesse & geond niht on tynstrængedum saltere mid lofsange on hearpan forþi þe þu gelustfullodest on þinum weorce on weorcum þinra handa & ic blissige la hu gemærsode vel gemiclode synt þine weorc þearle deope gewordene synt þine geþohtas wer unsnotor ne oncnæwð se stunta & ne understænt þas þing þonne beoþ upasprytte synfulle swaswa gærs swa æteowiaþ ealle þa þe wyrcaþ unrihwisnesse þæt hig losian on weoruld weoruld þu eart se hehsta ricsode mid wlite ymbscryd is gegerlad is mid stræncþe & he begyrde hine witodlice he gefæstnode ymbhwyrt eorþan se þe ne bið astyrod is gearu þin setl heononforþ fram weorulde þu eart upahofen flod upahofan flodas heora stemne heora yþa fram stemnum manigra wætera synt wunderlice ahafenyssa sæ wunderlice is on heannyssum drihten þine gekyðnyssa geleaflice gewordene synt swiþe þinum huse gedafnaþ halignys on langsumnysse dagana wræca freolice dyde si þu upahafen þu þe demst eorðan agyld edlean modigum hu lange þa synfullan wuldriaþ hig spelliaþ vel hi togænaþ & spræcaþ unrihtwisnesse ealle þa þe wyrcaþ unrihtnesse þin folc hig geeadmettan þine yrfweardnesse & hig geswæncton wuduwan & ælþeodige vel wreccan hig slogon steopcild & hig ofslogon vel hi acwealdon & hig sædon ne gesyhþ hit ne ne understent understandaþ ge unwisan on folce ge dysian on sumne sæl & hyggaþ se þe aplantode eare ne gehyrð se þe gehiwode eage oþþe ne behylt cumaþ utan blissian drihtne utan fægnian gode urum halwendan utan forhradian his ansyne on andetnesse & on sealmsangum utan fægnian him forði ðe is god mære drihten & kingc mære ofer ealle godas forþi þe sunt on his handa ændas eorþan heahnessa duna his & synt forþi þe is his sæ & he geworhte hig drygnessa his handa & gescopan utan gebiddan & utan niþerfeallen & uton wepan ætforan se þe geweorhte us forþi þe he is ure god & we syndon folc læswe his & sceap hande his to dæg his stemne gyf ge hlystaþ nelle ge ahyrdan eowre heortan swaswa on græmunge æfter dæge fandunge on wæstene þær þær costnodon eowre fæderas hig cunnodon & hig gesawen mine weorc singaþ drihtne niwne lofsang eala eall eorðe & bletsiaþ his naman cyþaþ of dæge to dæge his halwendan cyþað betwyx þeodum his wuldor on eallum folcum his wundra forþi þe mære heriendlic & swiþe egeslic he is ofer ealle godas forþi þe syndon ealle godas þeoda deofla heofonas geworhte andetnys & fægernys on his gesihþe halignys & mærsung on his hal bringaþ drihtne eala ge æþelas þeoda wulder & wyrþmynt his naman genimaþ onsægdnyssa & infaraþ to his cafertunum gebiddaþ drihten on his halgan cafertune si astyrod fram his ansyne eall eorðe rixode blissige eorðe fægnian manige igland wolcnu & dimnys on his ymbhwyrfte rihtwisnys & dom rihtingc his setles fyr ætforan him forestæpþ & hit onælþ on ymbhwyrfte his fynd onlihton his beorhnyssa ymbhwyrfte eorþan gesæh & astyrod & heo is eorðe duna swaswa weax fleowan fram ansyne drihtnes & eall eorþe kyðdon heofonas rihtwisnessa his & gesagon eall folc his wuldor beon gescænde ealle þa þe gebiddaþ græftas þa þe wuldriaþ on heora anlicnys gebiddaþ hine ealle his englas gehyrde & heo blissade & blissiaþ dohtru gesamnunge for þinum domum forþi þe þu hyhst ofer ealle eorþan þearle upahafen þu eart ofer ealle godas singaþ drihtne lofsang niwne forþi þe wundru he weorhte he gehælde him his swyþran & earm halgan his cuþne dyde his halwendan vel hælo on gesyhþe þeoda he unwreah his rihtwisnesse he gemunde his mildheortnesse & his soþfestnesse huse gesawon ealle gemæru eorðan halwendan vel hælo ures godes freadremað eala þu eall eorðe singað & fægniaþ & sealmlof cweðaþ dremað drihtne on hearpan & on hearpslege & on stefne sealmcwides on byman gelædendlicum vel onaslagenum & on stefne beman hyrnenre dremaþ vel fægniaþ on gesihðe cyninges drihtnes sy astyred sæ & hire gefyllednys ymbhwyrft eorðana & þa þe eardiað on hire flodas feagað vel hafetiað samod muntas blissiað fram gesihðe drihtnes forðy he cymð vel com to demanne eorðan he demeð ymbhwyrft eorðana on rihtwisnesse & folctruman on emnysse ricsode folctruman ofer sy astyred eorðe mycel vel mære & healic ofer ealle folctruman andettan hig naman þinum mæran forþi þe he & egesful halig is & wyrðment dom lufað ðu gearwodest gerecednesse vel rihtinga dom & rihtwisnesse þu dydest ahebbað drihten god urne & geeadmedað vel & gebiddaþ fotsceamol his fota forði þe he is halig his sacerdum betwyx heom þa ðe cygaþ his naman hi gecygdon drihten & he geherde hyg on swere genipes he wæs sprecende vel he spræc to heom hy heoldon gekyðnessa his & bebod he sealde heom þu geherdest hy þu milde wære heom & wrecende on eallum gemetednesse vel afundennyssum heora upahebbaþ drihten urne god & gebiddað on munte his halgan forðon þe is halig drihten ure god freadremað drihtne eala eorð þeowiað drihtne on blisse insteppað vel ingað on gesihðe his on blisse witað vel wite ge forþan þe drihten se sylfa is god he geworhte us & na we selfe eala his folc & sceap læsuwe his ingað gatu his on andetnesse cafertunas his on lofsangum andettaþ him heriað his naman forþan þe is wynsum on ecnysse mildheortnyss his oþ on mægþe vel on cynrene & cneorisse his soðfæstnys se eardað in heofonum bismrað hie & dryhten hyspeð hie þonne spriceð to him in eorre his & in hatheortnesse his gedrefeð hie ic soðlice geseted ic eom cyning from him ofer sion munt þone halgan his bodiende bebod dryhtnes dryhten cwæð to me sunu min þu eart ic to dæge ic cende ðe bide fram me & ic selle ðe þeode erfeweardn & on æhte þine gemæru eorðan þu recest hie in girde iserne & swaswa fæt lames þu gebricest hie & nu cyningas ongeotað beoð gelærde ealle þa ðe demað eorðan þeowiað dryhtne in ege & wynsumiað him mid gegripað þeodscipe þy læs hwonne dryhten & ge forweorðen of wege ðæm ryhtan þonne beorneð in scortnisse eorre his eadge ealle þa ðe getreowað in hine hwæt gemonigfealdade sindon ða ðe swenceað me monige arisað wiþ me monige cweoðað sawle minre nis hælo hire in gode hire þu soðlice dryhten ondfenge min eart wuldor min & uphebbende heafod min mid stefne minre to dryhtne ic cleopode & gehierde me of munte ðæm halgan his ic hnappade & slapan ongon & ic eft aras forþon dryhten onfeng mec ne ondrædo ic þusend folces ymbsellendes me aris dryhten halne me do god min forðon þu sloge ealle wiþerbrecan me butan intingan toeð synfulra þu forþræstes dryhtnes is hælu & ofer folc þin bledsung ðin ic gecegde ðe þu geherdes me god ryhtwisnesse minre in geswencednesse þu gebræddes me miltsa me dryhten & geher gebed min bearn monna hu lange hefige on heortan to hwon lufiað ge idelnesse & soeceað leasunge witað þætte gemiclað dryhten þone halgan his dryhten gehiereð me þonne ic cleopige to him eorsiað & nyllað syngian þa þe cweðað in heortum eowrum & on bedcleofum eowrum beoð geinbryrde onsecgeað onsægdnesse ryhtwisnesse & gehyhtað in dryhtne monige cweoðað hwelc æteaweð us god getacnod is ofer us leoht ondwlitan þines dryhten ðu sealdes blisse in heortan minre from tide hwætes wines & oeles his gemonigfealdode sindan in sibbe in þa ilcan ic hnappige & gereste forðon ðu dryhten synderlice in hyhte gesettes me min mid earum onfoh dryhten ongit cleopunge mine beheald stefne gespreces mines cyning min & god min forþon to ðe ic gebidde dryhten on marne & þu gehieres stefne mine on marne ic ætstande ðe & ic geseo forþon ne willende god unryhtwisnesse ðu eart ne eardað neh ðe awerged ne þurhwuniað ða unryhtwisan beforan eagum minum þu feodes dryhten ealle þa þe wyrceað unryhtwisnessa þu forspildes hie þa ðe sprecað leasunge wer bloda & þone fæcnan onscunað dryhten ic soþlice in menigeo mildheortnesse þinre ic inga dryhten in hus þin ic gebidde to temple þam halgan þinum in ege ðinum gelæd me dryhten in þine ryhtwisnesse fore feondum minum gerece in gesihðe þinre weg minne forðon nis in muðe hira soðfæstnes heorte hira idel is byrgen open is hrace hira tungum hira facenlice dydon doem hie god gefeallen fram geþohtum hira æfter mengo arleasnessa hira on weg adrif hie forðon onscunedon ðe dryhten & blissigen ealle þa gehyhtað in ðe in ecnesse gefeoð & þu ineardast in him & wuldriað in þe ealle þa þe lufigeað noman þinne forþon þu dryhten þu bletsas þone ryhtwisan dryhten swa swa mid scilde godes willan þines þu gebeagades us nales in eorre þinum þu þreast me ne in hatheortnesse þinre þu þreast me gemiltsa me dryhten forðon untrum ic eom hæl me dryhten forðon gedrefde sindon ealle ban min & sawl min gedrefedu is swiþe & ðu dryhten hu longe gecer & genera sawle mine halne me do fore mildheortnesse þinre forþon nis in deaðe se gemyndig sie þin in helle soðlice hwelc ondetteð þe ic wan in geomrunge minre io þwea þurh syndrige nihta bedd min mid tearum strene mine ic wæte gedrefed is fore eorre eage min ic ealdade betweoh ealle fiend mine gewitað from me ealle þe wyrceað unryhtwisnesse forþon gehirde dryhten stefne wopes mines gehirde dryhten boene mine dryhten gebed min genom scamigen & sin gedrefde ealle feond mine sien forcirrede on bæc & scamigen swiðe hrædlice god min in ðe ic gehyhte nefreo me from eallum ehtendum me & genere me þy læs æfre gereafige swaswa leo sawle mine þonne nis se ðe aliese ne se þe hie hale gedo dryhten god min gif ic dyde þis gif is unryhtwisnes in handum minum gif ic ageald þæm geldendum me yfel ic gefalle be gewyrhtum from feondum minum idelhende oehteð se feond sawle mine & gegripeð hie & fortrideð in eorðan lif min & wuldor min in dust gelædeð aris dryhten in eorre ðinum & hefe up in endum feonda þinra aris dryhten god min in bebode þæt þu bebude & gesomnung folca ymbseleð & fore þissum in heanesse ga eft dryhten doem folc doem me dryhten æfter ryhtwisnesse minre & æfter unsceðfulnesse handa minra ofer me sie fornumen nið þara synfulra & gerece ðone ryhtwisan smeagende heortan & ædre god ryhtwisne fultum minne from dryhtne se hale gedoeð ða rehtan on heortan god doema ryhtwis strong & langmod ah eorsað þurh syndrige dagas nemne ge sien gecerde sweord his cweceð bogan his þeneð & gearwað þone & in him gearwað fatu deaðes strælas his birnendum gefremede sehðe cenneð unryhtwisnesse geeacnað sar & cenneð unryhtwisnesse seað ontynde & dealf hine & gefeoll in seað þone þe he dyde sie gecirred sar his in heafde his & in hnolle his unryhtwisnes his astigeð ic ondetto dryhtne æfter ryhtwisnesse his & ic singe noman dryhtnes þæm heahstan dryhten ure hu wundorlic is noma þin in ealre eorðan forþon upahæfen is micelnes þin ofer heofonas of muðe cilda & meolc teondra þu gefremedes lof fore feondum þinum þæt þu toweorpe feond & gescildend forþon ic geseo heofonas weorc fingra þinra monan & steorran þa ðu gestaðolades hwæt is mon þæt gemyndig ðu sie his oþþe sunu monnes forðon þu neosas hine þu gewonodes hine hwene læssan from englum mid wuldre & mid are þu gebeagades hine & gesettes hine ofer weorc handa þinra ealle þu underþeddes under fotum his scep & oxan eall eacðon & netenu feldes fuglas heofones & fiscas sæs þa geondgað stiga sæs dryhten dryhten ure hu wundorlic is noma þin in ealre eorðan ic ondette þe dryhten in ealre heortan minre ic secge ealle wundru þine ic blissige & ic gefeo in ðe & ic singe noman þinum þu hehsta in forcirringe feond minne on bæc beod geuntrumade & forweorðað from onsine þinre forðon þu dydes dom minne & intingan minne þu sites ofer þrymseld þu doemes efnesse ðu þreades þeoda & forweorðeð se arleasa noman hira ðu adiligades on ecnesse & in weorold weorolde fiend asprungon mid sweorde in ende & ceastru hira þu towurpe forwearð gemynd hira mid swege & dryhten on ecnesse þurhwunað gearwade in dome seld his & he demeð ymbhwyrft eorþan in efnesse demeð folc mid ryhtwisnesse & geworden is dryhten gebeorg þearfena fultum in gelimplicnessum in geswencednesse & gehyhtað on ðe ealle þa cunnun noman þinne forðon þu ne forlætes ða soecendan ðe dryhten singað dryhtne se eardað in sion secgeað betweoh þeoda wundru his forþon soecende blod hira gemynd is & nis ofergeotol gebed þearfena mildsa me dryhten & geseoh eaðmodnesse mine of feondum minum þu uphefest me of geatum deaðes þæt ic secge ealle lofu þin in geatum dohtor sione ic gefeo in hælo þinre gefæstnade sindon ðeoda in forwyrd þa dydon dydon in grine þissum þa gedegledon gegripen is fot hira oncnaweð dryhten domas donde in weorcum honda hira befongen bið se synfulla beoð gecerde þa synfullan in helle ealle þeoda þa ðe ofergeteliað dryhten forðon nales in ende ofergetelnes bið þearfena geðyld þearfena ne forweorðeð on ende aris dryhten ne mæg mon sien doemde þeoda on gesihðe ðinre gesete dryhten ælatteow ofer hie þæt witen þeoda þætte men sindon to hwon dryhten gewite ðu feor þu forsihst in gemalicnessum in geswencednesse þonne oferhygdgað se arleasa bið onæled þearfa beoð bifongne in geðohtum hira ða hie ðencað forðon bið hered se synfulla in lustum sawle his & se ða unryhtan deð bið bletsad bismrað dryhten se synfulla æfter mengu eorres his he ne soeceð nis god in gesihðe his beoð besmitene wegas his in ealre tide bið afirde domas þine from onsiene his ealra feonda hira waldeð cwæð soðlice in heortan his ne beom ic onstyred of cneorisse in cneorisse butan yfle þæs muð awergednesse & biternesse full is & facne under tungan his gewin & sar siteð in searwum mid þæm welgum in deagelnessum þætte he ofslea þone unscyldgan eagan his in þearfan gelociað sætað in deagolnesse swa swa leo in bedcleofan his sætað þætte he gereafige ðearfan gereafian þearfan þonne he atihð hine in gryne his geeaðmodað hine inheldeð hine & falleð þonne he waldeð þearfan cwæð soðlice in heortan his ofergitul is god forcirreð onsine his þæt he ne geseo oð ende aris dryhten god min & sie upahæfen hond þin ne ofergeotola ðu þearfena in ende forðon bismrað se arleasa dryhten cwæð soðlice in heortan his ne soeceð god þu gesihst þætte ðu gewin & sar þu sceawas þæt þu selle hie in honda þine ðe soðlice forlæten is þearfa fæderleasum þu bist fultum forþræst earm þæs synfullan & þæs awergdan bið soht scyld his ne bið gemeted ricsað dryhten in ecnisse & in weorold weorolde forweorðað þeoda of eorðan his lust þearfena gehirde dryhten lustas heortan hira geherde eare þin doem steopbearne & ðæm eaðmodan þætte no tosette maa gemiclian hine mon ofer eorðan in dryhtne ic getreowe hu cweðað ge to sawle minre foer in munt swa swa spearwa forðon sehðe þa synfullan þenedon bogan gearwodon strælas hira in cocore þæt hie scotoden in deagolnesse þa ryhtan heortan forðon þa þu gefremedes hie towurpon se rehtwisa soðlice hwæt dyde he dryhten in temple þam halgan his dryhten in heofone seld his eagan his in þearfan gelociað bræwas his frignað bearn monna dryhten frigneð þone ryhtwisan & þone arleasan se soðlice lufað unryhtwisnesse feoð sawle his rineð ofer þa synfullan grin fyres swefles rec & gast ysta dæl calices hira forðon ryhtwis dryhten & ryhtwisnesse lufað efnesse gesihð ondwlita his halne me gedo dryhten forðon asprong se halga forðon gewonode sint soðfæstnessa from bearnum monna þa idlan sprecende sint anra gehwelc to þæm nehstan his weolure fæcne in heortan & heortan sprecende sindon þa yflan forspildeð dryhten ealle weoloras facenfulle & tungan yfelsprecende þa cwædon tungan ure we micliað weoloras ure from us sint hwelc ure is dryhten fore ermðe wædlena & geomrunge þearfena nu ic arise cwið dryhten ic setto ofer hælo mine getreowlice ic do in hine gesprec dryhtnes gesprec clæne seolfor fyre amered eorðan þu dryhten healdes us & gehealdes us from cneorisse þisse on ecnesse in ymbhwyrfte þa arleasan gongað æfter heanisse þinre þu gemonigfaldades bearn monna hu longe dryhten ofergeotulas ðu me in ende hu longe acerrest ðu onsiene þine from me hu longe sette ic geðeaht in sawle mine sar in heortan minre þurh dæg hu longe bið upahæfen se feond min ofer me geloca & geher me dryhten god min inleht eagan mine þylæs æfre ic slape in deaðe þylæs æfre cweðe feond min ic strongode wið him þa swencað me gefeoð gif onstyred ic beom ic soðlice in þinre mildheortnesse gehyhte gefihð heorte min in hælo þinre ic singe dryhtne se god selð me & ic singe noman þinum þu hehsta se unwisa in heortan his nis god gewemde sindon & onscuniendlice gewordene sint in lustum hira nis se ðe do god nis oð ænne dryhten of heofonum forðlocað ofer bearn monna þæt he gesie hwæðer sie ongietende oððe soecende god ealle onheldon somod unnytte gewordene wæron nis se ðe ðo god nis oð ænne byrgen open is hrace heora tungum hira facenlice dydon ater nædrena under weolerum hira þara muð awergednesse & biternesse full bið hræde foet hira to ageotanne blod forðræstednes & ungesælignes in wegum hira & weg sibbe ne oncneowon nis ege godes beforan eagan hira ah ne oncnawað ealle þa þe wyrceað unryhtwisnesse þa forswelgað folc min swa mete hlafes god ne gecegdun þær forhtodun mid ege þær ne wæs ege forðon god in cneorisse þære ryhtan is geðeaht wædlan þu gescendes forðon god hyht his is hwelc seleð ofer sion hælo þonne forcirreð dryhten hæftned folces his blissað & gefihð hwelc eardað in selegescote þinum oððe hwelc geresteð in munte þæm halgan his se ingæð butan womme & wyrceð ryhtwisnesse se spriceð soðfæstnesse in heortan his & ne dyde facen in tungan his ne he dyde þæm nihstan his yfel & edwit ne onfeng wið þæm nihstan his to nowihte gelæded bið in gesihðe his se awergda ondrædende soðlice dryhten gemiclað se swereð þæm nihstan his & ne beswac hine se feoh his ne salde to wæstmscette & gefe ofer þone unsceðfullan ne onfeng se doeð þas ne bið he onstyred in ecnesse gehald me dryhten forðon ic gehyhte on ðe ic cwæð to dryhtne god min þu eart forðon goda minra þu ne beþearft halgum þa on eorðan sindon his gewundrade ealle willan mine betwih hie gemonigfaldade sindon soðlice mettrymnessa hira æfter þon hradedon ne gesomnige ic gesomnunge hira of blodum ne gemyndig ic beom nomena hira þurh weolore mine dryhten dæl yrfeweardnesse minre & calices mines þu eart þu gesettes me yrfeweardnesse mine rapas gefeollon me in beorhtnesse & soðlice yrfweardnes min berht is me ic bletsige dryhten se me seleð andgit ecðon & oð niht þreadon mec ædran mine ic foreseah dryhten in gesihðe minre simle forðon to ðære swiðran is me ne beo ic onstyred fore þissum gelustfullad is heorte min & gefihð tunge min eacðon flæsc min resteð in hyhte geher dryhten ryhtwisnesse mine bihald boene mine mid earum onfoh gebed mine nales in weolorum fæcnum of ondwlitan þinum dom minne forðyppeð eagan mine geseoð efnesse þu accunnades heortan mine & neosades on niht mid fyre me ðu ameredes & nis gemet in me unryhtwisnes þætte ne sprece muð min werc monna fore wordum welera þinra ic heold wegas ða heardan gefreme gongas mine in stigum þinum þæt ne sien onwende swaþu mine ic cleopode forðon þu geherdes me god onheld eare þin to me & geher word mine gewundra mildheortnessa þina þu hale gedest gehytende in ðe from þæm wiðstondendum swiðran þinre geheald me dryhten swa swa seon eagan under scuan fiðra þinra gescild me from onsine arleasra þa me swencton fiend mine sawle mine ymbsealdon dryhten mægen min dryhten trymenis min & gebeorg min & onlesend min god min fultum min ic gehyhte in hine gescildend min & horn hælo minre fultum min hergende ic gecige dryhten & from feondum minum hal ic beo utan ymbsealdon me geomrunge deaðes sar helle ymbsealdon me forecomon me gryne deaðes & in geswince minum ic gecigde dryhten & to gode minum ic cleopode & he geherge of temple þæm halgan his stefne mine & cleopung min in gesihðe his ineode in earan his & onstyred is & cwacode eorðe & staðolas munta gedrefde sint & onstyrede sint forðon eorre is him god astag smec in irre his & fyr from onsiene his born colu onælde sint from him & asecgað wuldor godes & weorc handa his sægð trymenesse dæg dæge roccetteð word & niht nihte getacnað wisdom ne sint spræca ne word þara ne beoð gehierde stefna hira on ealle eorðan uteode swoeg hira & on endas ymbhwyrftes eorðan word hira on sunnan he sette geteld his & he swaswa brydguma fordgongende of brydbure his gefeh swa swa gigant to irnanne on weg fram ðæm hean heofone utgang his & eftryne his oð heanesse his ne is se ðe hine ahyde from hæto his æ dryhtnes untælwyrðe gecerrende sawla cyðnes dryhtnes getreowu snyttro gearwende lytlingum ryhtwisnessa dryhtnes leht onlihtende eagan gehiere ðe dryhten on dæge geswinces gescilde ðe noma godes iacobes onsende ðe fultum of halgum & of sione gescilde ðe gemyndig sie dryhten ealre onsægdnesse þinre & onsægdnesse þine gefættige selle ðe dryhten æfter heortan ðinre & eall geðeaht þin getrymme we beoð blissiende on hælo ðinre & on noman dryhtnes godes ures we beoð gemiclode gefylle dryhten ealle boena ðina nu ic oncneow þætte halne doeð dryhten crist his & gehirð hine of heofone ðæm halgan his on mehtum hælo swiðran his ðas on cratum & ðas on horsum we soðlice on noman dryhtnes godes ures we beoð gemiclode hie gebundne sindon & gefeollon we soðlice arisan & uparehte we sint on mægene þinum blissað cyning & ofer hælo ðine gefihð swiðlice lust sawle his ðu sealdest his & willan welera his þu ne besceredes hine forðon þu forecome hine on bletsunge swetnisse þu settest on heafde his beag of stane deorwyrðum lif bæd & ðu sealdes him lengo daga on weorold weorolde micel is wuldor his on hælo þinre wuldor & micelne wlite þu setst ofer hine forðon ðu selest hine on bletsunge on weorolde weorolde þu geblissast hine on gefean mid andwlitan þinum forðon cyning gehyhte on dryhtne & on mildheortnesse ðæs hehstan ne bið onstyred bið gemeted hand þin eallum feondum ðinum hand ðin gemet ealle ða ðe ðe feodon god min loca on me forhwon me þu forlete feor from hælo minre word scylda minra god min ic clipige þurh dæg ne ðu gehierest & on niht & nales to unwisdome me ðu soðlice on halgum eardast lof israhela on ðe gehyhton fædras ure gehyhton & ðu alesdes hie to ðe clipodon & hale gewordne sint on ðe gehyhton & hie næron gescende ic soðlice eom wyrm & nales mon edwet monna & aweorpnes folces ealle ða ðe gesawon me herwdon me sprecende hie wæron mid welrum & hrisedon heafod gehyhteð on dryhtne genereð hine halne deð hine forðon he wile hine receð me & naht me wona bið on stowe læswe ðær me gestaðolode ofer wæter gereordnesse alædde me sawle mine gecerde gelædde me ofer stige ryhtwisnesse fore noman his witodlice & þehþe ic gonge on midle scuan deaðes ne ondræde ic yfel forðon þu mid me eart gird ðin & cryc þin hie me afrefrende sint þu gearwades on gesihðe minre beod ongen ða þa ðe swencað me þu fættodes on ele heafod min & drync þinne ondrencende swiðe fræbeohrt is & mildheortnes þin æfterfylgeð me eallum dagum lifes mines þæt ic ineardige on huse dryhtnes on lengo daga is eorðe & fylnes his ymbhwyrft eorðena & ealle þa ðe eardiað on him he ofer seas he gestaðolode hie & ofer flodas gegearwode þa hwelc astigð on munt dryhtnes oððe hwelc stondeð on stowe þære halgan his unsceððende on hondum & clænre heortan se ne onfeng on idelnesse sawle his ne he ne swor on facne þæm nihstan his ðes onfehð bletsunge from dryhtne & mildheortnesse from gode þæm halwendan his þis is cneoris secendra dryhten soecendra onsien godes iacobes onhebbað geatu ealdras eowre & beoð upahæfene geatu ecelice & ingæð cyning wuldres hwelc is þes cyning wuldres dryhten strong & mehtig dryhten mehtig on gefeohte onhebbað geatu aldras eowre & beoð upahæfene geato ecelice & ingæð cyning wuldres to ðe dryhten ic uphof sawle mine god min on ðe ic getreowo ne scomige ic ne bismriað me fiend mine & soðlice ealle ða ðe ðe bidað ne sien gescende sien gescende ða unryhtwisan doende ða idlan wegas ðine dryhten cuðe do me & stiga ðine lær me gerece me on soðfæstnesse ðinre & lær me forðon ðu eart god hælend min & ðe ic arefnde ealne dæg gemyne miltsa ðinra dryhten & mildheortnes ðin ða from weorolde sint scyld geogoðe & unondcyðignesse minre no þu gemyne æfter miclan mildheortnesse þinre gemyndig beo ðu min god fore godnesse þine dryhten swete & reht dryhten fore ðissum æ gesette agyltendum on wege gereceð ða mildan on dome læreð þa monþwæran wegas ðine doem me dryhten forðon ic on unsceðfulnesse minre ingongende ic eom & on dryhtne gehyhtende ne beo ic geuntrumad acunne me dryhten & costa me bærn ædran mine & heortan mine forðon mildheortnes ðin beforan eagum minum is & ic gelicode on soðfæstnesse þinre ic ne sæt on geðeahte idelnesse & mid unryht dondum ic no ingonge ic feode gesomnunge awirgdra & mid arleasum ic no sitte ic ðwea betwuh þa unsceððendan handa mina & ic ymbga wibed ðin dryhten þæt ic gehiere stefne lofes þines & ic asecge ealle wundru ðine dryhten ic lufode wlite huses ðines & stowe geteldes wuldres ðines ne forspild ðu mid arleasum sawle mine & mid werum bloda lif min onlihtnes min & hælo min þone ic ondræde dryhten sceldend lifes mines from ðæm ic forhtige þonne genealecað ofer me sceððende þæt hie eten flæsc mine ða ðe swencton me fiend mine hie geuntrumode sint & gefeollon gif gestondað wið me fierdwic ne ondrædeð heorte min gif ariseð on me gefeoht on ðis ic gehyhtu an ic bæd from dryhtne þas ic soece þæt ic eardige on huse dryhtnes eallum dagum lifes mines þæt ic geseo willan dryhtnes & ic sie gescilded from temple þam halgan his forðon ahydeð me on getelde his on dæge yfla gescilde me on deagelnesse geteldes his on stane upahof me nu soðlice upahof heafod min ofer fiend mine ic ymbga & agelde on getelde his onsægdnesse wynsumnesse ic singe & sealm ic cweðe dryhtne gehier dryhten stefne mine mid ðære ic cleopode to ðe gemiltsa min & gehier me to ðe ic cwæð heorte min ic sohte ondwlitan ðinne ondwlitan þinne dryhten ic soece ne acir ðu onsiene þine from me & ne aheld ðu on eorre from þeowe ðinum fultum min þu eart god ne forlæt ðu me ne forseoh ðu me god hælend min to ðe dryhten ic clipige god min ne swiga ðu from me & ic beo gelic astigendum on seað gehier stefne boene minre þonne ic gebidde to ðe & þonne ic uphebbe honda mine to temple ðæm halgan ðinum no somod sele ðu me mid ðæm synfullum & mid wyrcendum unryhtwisnesse ne forspild ðu me mid ðissum þa ðe sprecað sibbe mid ðone nihstan his yfel soðlice sint on heortum hira sele him æfter weorce hira & æfter niðum tilunga hira geedleana him agif edlean hira him forðon hie ne ongeton on weorc dryhtnes & on weorc honda his ne sceawiað toweorp hie ne ðu timbrest hie gebletsod dryhten forðon gehirde stefne boene mine dryhten fultum min & scildend min & on hine gehyhteð heorte min & gefultumod ic eom & bleow flæsc min & of willan min ic ondette him dryhten strengo folces his & scildend þara halwendra cristes his is hal do folc þin dryhten & bletsa erfweardnesse ðine & rece hie & uphefe hie oð on weorolde dryhtne bearn godes tobringað dryhtne bearn romma bringað dryhtne wuldor & are wuldor noman his on healle ðære halgan his stefn dryhtne ofer god mægenðrymmes hleoðrað dryhten ofer wæter micle stefn dryhtnes on mægene stefn dryhtnes on micelnesse stefn dryhtnes gebrecendes cederbeamas & gebricð dryhten ðæs muntes & gescæneð hie swa swa cealf & se leofa swa swa sunu anhyrnra stefn dryhtnes betwihgongendes leg fyr stefn dryhtnes toscend bihygdignesse & onstyrede dryhten westen stefn dryhtnes gegearwigendes heortas & biwrah þa ðiccan & on temple his ealle cweoðað wuldor ic uphebbe ðe dryhten forðon ðu onfenge ne ðu gelustfullodes fiend mine ofer dryhten god min ic cleopode to ðe & ðu gehældes me dryhten þu atuge from helwarum sawle mine þu gehældes me from ofdune astigendum on seað singað dryhtne halige his & ondettað gemynde halignesse his forðon eorre on æbylgðe his & lif on willan his æt æfenne wunað wop & to morgentide blis ic soðlice cwæð on minre genyhtsumnesse ne beom ic onstyred on ecnesse dryhten on godum willan þinum þu gearwodes wlite minum mægen þu forcerdes onsiene þine from me & geworden ic eom gedrefed to ðe dryhten ic clipige & to gode minum ic biddo on ðe dryhten ic gehyhte ne beo ic gescended on ecnesse on þinre ryhtwisnesse alies me & genere me onheld to me eare þin hrada þætte þu generige beo ðu me on god gescildend & on stowe gebeorges þætte halne me þu gedo forðon trymnes min & gebeorg min ðu eart & fore noman þinum latteow me þu bist & foedest me & utalædest of gyrne ðissum þæt bedegledon me forðon ðu eart scildend min dryhten on honda þina ic bebeode gast minne þu aliesdes me dryhten god soðfæstnesse þu feodes healdende idelnesse idellice ic soð on dryhtne ic gehyhte ic gefeo & blissige on ðinre mildheortnesse forðon þu gelocades eaðmodnesse mine hale þu dydes of neddearfnessum sawle mine ne beluce ðu me on honda feondes þu gesettes on stowe rumre foet mine eadge þara forlætne sint unryhtwisnessa & þara bewrigene sint synna eadig wer þæm ne geteleð dryhten synne ne is on muðe his facen forðon ic swigode ealdodon ealle ban mine þonne ic clipode ealne dæg forðon dæges & nihtes gehefgod is ofer me hand ðin gecerred ic eom on ermðu þonne bið gebrocen hrycg scylde mine cuðe ðe ic dyde & unryhtwisnessa mine ic ne oferwrah ic cwæð ic forðsecgo wið me unryhtwisnessa mine dryhtne & þu forlete arleasnesse heortan minre fore þissum gebideð to ðe æghwylc halig on tide gelimplicre hwæðre soðlice on cwildflode wætra monigra to him to ne genealæhton þu eart me gebeorg from oferðryccednesse seo ymbsalde me wynsumnes min alies me from ymbsellendum me ondgit ic selle ðe & ic getimbre ðe on wege ðissum on ðæm ðu ingæst ic getrymme ofer ðe eagan mine nyllað ge beon swa swa hors & mul on ðæm ne is ondgit on bridelse & hælftre ceacan hira geteoh ða to ne genealæcað to ðe gefeoð ryhtwise on dryhtne ryhtwise geda efnherenes ondettað dryhtne on cytran on hearpan tien strenga singað him singað him song neowne wel singað him on wynsumnesse forðon ryht is word dryhtnes & ealle weorc his on geleafan lufað mildheortnesse & dom mildheortnesse dryhtnes ful is eorðe worde dryhtnes heofonas getrymede sint & gaste muðes his eall mægen hira gesomniende swa swa on cylle wæter sæs settende on goldhordum neolnyssa ondræde dryhten eall eorðe from him soðlice beoð onstyrede ealle ða ðe eardiað ymbhwyrft forðon he cwæð & gewordene wæran he bebead & gecwicade wæron ic bletsige dryhten on ealle tid simle lof his on muðe minum on dryhtne bið hered sawl min gehieren ða monþwæran & blissigen micliað dryhten mid me & uphebbað we noman his betweonum ic sohte dryhten & he gehirde me & of eallum geswencednessum minum he generede me genealæceað to him & beoð onlihte & ondwlitan eowre ne scomigen þes ðearfa cleopode & dryhten gehirde hine & of eallum geswencednessum his aliesde hine onsende engel dryhten on ymbhwyrfte ondrædendra hine birgeað & geseoð þætte wynsum is dryhten eadig wer se ðe gehyhteð on hine doem dryhten þa sceððendan me oferfeht þa onfehtendan me gegrip wæpn & sceld & aris on fultum me ageot sweord & beluc wið hie þa ðe me oehtað cweð to sawle minre hælo ðin ic eom sien gescende & onscunigen fiend mine þa ðe sohton sawle mine sien forcirde on bæc & scomigen ða ðe þencað me yfel sien swa swa dust biforan onsiene windes & engel dryhtnes swencende hie sien wegas hira ðeostre & glidd & engel dryhtnes oehtende hie forðon bi ungewyrhtum ahyddon me forwyrd girne hira idellice edwitan sawle mine cyme him gryn ða hie nyton & gehæftednes ða gedeglodon gegripeð hie on girene ingefallen on ðæt ilce sawl soðlice min gefihð on dryhtne & bið gelustfullad ofer hælo his cwæð se unryhtwisa þætte agylte on him selfum nis ege godes beforan eagum his forðon facenlice dyde on gesihðe his ðæt he gemette unrehtwisnesse his & læððe word muðes his unryhtwisnes & facen nolde ongitan ðæt he wel dyde unryhtwisnesse smeagende is on bedcleofan his ætstod eallum wege noht gode hete soðlice ne feode dryhten on heofone mildheortnes ðin & soðfæstnes ðin oð wolcn ryhtwisnes þin swa swa muntas godes domas ðine neolnes micelu men & neat hale þu dest dryhten to ðæm gemete ðu gemonigfaldodes mildheortnessa ðina god bearn soðlice monna on gescildnesse fiðra ðinra gehyhtað beoð ondrencte from genyhtsumnesse huses ðines & burnan willan ðines þu drencst hie nyl ðu elnian betwih awergde ne elnende ðu sie donde unryhtwisnesse forðon swa swa heg hrædlice adrugiað & swa swa leaf wyrta hreðe fallað gehyht on dryhtne & do godnesse & inearda eorðan & ðu bist foeded on welum his gelustfulla on dryhtne & he seleð ðe boene heortan þinre onwreoh dryhtne weg ðinne & gehyht on hine & he doeð & utalædeð swa swa leoht ryhtwisnesse ðine & dom ðinne swa on midne dæg underðeoded beo ðu dryhtne & halsa hine ðu sie hine se bið gesundfullad on wege his on men dondum unryhtwisnesse blin from eorre & forlæt hatheortnesse ne elna ðu ðætte nohtlice ðu do forðon ða nohtlice doð beoð abreotte ða soðlice abidað dryhten hie yrfweardnesse gesittað eorðan dryhten nales on eorre ðinum ðrea me ne on hatheortnesse ðinre geðrea mec forðon stræla ðine gefæstnode sint me & ðu getrymedes ofer me hand ðine ne is hælo on flæsce minum from andwlitan eorres ðines ne is sib banum minum from onsine synna minra forðon unryhtwisnessa mina ofergesetton heafod min swa swa byrðen hefig gehefegade sint ofer me fuladon & wyrsodon wundswaðu mine from onsiene unwisdomes mines ermðum geswenced ic eom & gedrefed ic eom oð ende ealne ðæg geunrotsod ic ineode forðon sawl min gefyllod is bismernessum & ne is hælo on flæsce minum gebeged ic eom & gehened ic eom a hu lenge swiðor ic grymetode from geomrunge heortan minre ic cwæð ic healde wegas mine þæt ic ne agylte on tungan mine ic sette muðe minum geheld þonne gestondeð se synfulla wið me ic adumbode & geeaðmodod ic eom & ic swigode from godum & sar min geedneowad is hatade heorte min binnan me & on smeaunge minre barn fyr sprecende ic eom on tungan minre cuðne me do dryhten ende minne & rim daga minra hwelc is þæt ic wite hwæt wona sie me sehðe ealde þu settes dagas mine & spoed min swa swa naht beforan ðe bið ah hwæðre eall idelnes æghwelc mon libbende þehðe on onlicnesse godes gonge hwæðre idellice bið gedrefed goldhordað & nat hwæm gesomnað & nx hwæt is bad min ah ne dryhten & spoed min swa swa noht beforan ðe is from eallum unryhtwisnessum minum genere me edwit þæm unwisan ðu sealdes me bidende ic abad dryhten & gelocode me hirde boene mine alædde me of seaðe ermðe & of lame dærstan & sette ofer stan foet mine & gerehte gongas mine & onsende on muð minne song niwne ymen gode urum geseoð monge & ondrædað & gehyhtað on dryhtne eadig wer ðæs is noma dryhtnes hyht his & ne gelocað on idelnesse & on wedenheortnessa lease fela þu dydes ðu dryhten god min wundur & geðohtum ðinum ne is hwelc gelic ðe ic segde & sprecende ic eom gemonigfaldode sint ofer rim onsægdnesse & ofrunge þu noldes lichoman soðlice þu gefremedes me onsægdnessa eac swelce fore scylde þu ne bæde þa ic cwæð sehðe ic cume on heafde boec awriten is bi me þæt ic do willan þinne god min ic wolde & æ ðine on midle heortan minre eadig bið se ðe ongiteð ofer wædlan & ðearfan on dæge yflum gefreoð hine dryhten dryhten gehaldeð hine & geliffæstað hine & eadigne gedoeð hine & geclæsnað on eorðan sawle his & ne seleð hine on hond feondes his dryhten welan bireð him ofer bed sares his ealle streone his þu gecirdes on untrymnesse his ic cwæð dryhten miltsa min gehæl sawle mine forðon ic gesyngode ðe fiend mine cwædon yfel me hwonne swilteð & forweorðeð noma his & ineodon þæt hie gesawen þa idlan sprecende heorte hira gesomnodon unryhtwisnesse him & uteodon ut & wæron sprecende somod on annesse hyspton ealle fiend mine wið me ðohton yfel me word unryht onbudon wið me ah se ðe hnappað to ne geiceð þæt he arise swa swa heorot gewilnað to wiellum wætra swa gewilnað sawl min to ðe god ðyrsteð sawl min to gode ðæm lifgendan hwonne ic cume & æteawe beforan onsiene godes wæron me tearas mine hlafas dæges & nihtes þonne bið cweden to me dæghwæm hwær is god þin þas gemyndig ic eom & ageat on me sawle mine forðon ic inga on stowe geteldes wundurlic oð hus godes on stefne wynsumnesse & ondetnesse swoeg symbliendes forhwon unrot eart ðu sawl min & forhwon gedroefes ðu me gehyht on god forðon ic ondetto him hælo ondwlitan mines & god min fram me selfum sawl min gedrefedu is forðon gemyndig ic beo ðin dryhten of eorðan fram munte þæm lytlan neolnes neolnesse gecegð on stefne þeotena þinra ealle þa hean þine & yða ðina ofer me leordon on dæge bebead dryhten mildheortnesse his & on niht gebyrhte mid me gebed gode lifes mines doem me god & toscad intingan minne of ðeode noht haligre from men unryhtwisum & facenfullum genere me forðon ðu eart god min & strengo min forhwon me þu awegadrife & forhwon unrot ic inga þonne swenceð me feond onsend leoht þin & soðfæstnesse þine hiie me gelæddon & to gelæddon on munte ðam halgan ðinum & on getelde ðinum ic inga to wibede godes to gode se geblissað giogoðe mine ic ondetto ðe on citran god god min forhwon unrot eart ðu sawl min & forhwon ðu gedrefest me gehyht on god forðon ic ondetto him hælo ondwlitan mines & god min mid earum urum we gehirdon fædras ure sægdon us weorc þæt wyrcende ðu eart on dagum hira & on dagum ealdum hond ðin ðeoða tostenceð & þu plantodes hie & þu swenctes folc & onweg adrife hie nales soðlice on sweorde his gesittað eorðan & earm hira ne gehæleð hie ah seo swiðre ðin & earm ðin & onlihtnes ondwlitan ðines forðon gelicode ðe on him ðu eart se ilca cyning min & god min ðu onbude hælo on ðe fiend ure we windwiað & on noman þinum we forhycgað arisende on us nales soðlice on bogan minum ic gehyhte & sweord min ne gehæleð me ðu gefreodes soðlice us of þæm swencendum us & ða ða ðe us feodon þu gescendes on gode we beoð herede ealne dæg & on noman ðinum we ondettað on weorolde roccetted heorte min word god ic cweðe werc min cyninge tunge min hreod writ hrædlice writendes wlitig on hiwe fore bearnum monna togoten is gefu on welerum ðinum forðon bletsode ðe god on ecnesse begyrd sweord ðin ymb lendna þa mihtgestan hiw ðin & fægernesse ðine behald gesundfullice forðga & ricsa fore soðfæstnesse & monðwærnesse & ryhtwisnesse & gelædeð ðe wundorlice seo swiðre ðin stræla ðina scearpe þa mihtgestan folc under ðe feallað on heortan feonda cyninges seld ðin god on weorold weorolde gird ryht is gird rices ðines ðu lufodes ryhtwisnesse & feodes unryhtwisnesse forðon smirede god god ðin mid ele blisse fore geferrædennum ðinum myrre & dropa & smiring from hræglum ðinum from stæpum elpanbænnum of ðæm ðe gelustfullodon geher dohtor & geseh & onhield eare ðin && forgit folc ðin hus fæder ðines ure gebeorg & mægen fultum on geswencednessum ða gemetton us swiðe for ðæm we ne ondrædað þonne bið gedroefed eorðe & beoð forcirrede muntas on heortan sæs hleoðrodon & gedrefde sint wæter his gedrefde sint muntas on strengo his flodes onræs geblissað ceastre godes gehalgað geteld his se hehsta god on midle his ne bið onstyred gefultmað hie god mid andwlitan his gedrofde sint ðeoda & onhelde sint ricu salde stefne his se hehsta & onstyred wæs eorðe dryhten mægna mid us ondfenga ure god cumað & geseoð werc dryhtnes ða sette foretacen ofer eorðan ealle ðeoda plegiað ge mid hondum wynsumiað ge gode on stefne wynsumnesse forðon god heah egesful & cyning micel ofer ealle godas underðeodde folc us & þeoda under fotum urum astag god on wynsumnesse & dryhten on stefne beman singað ge gode urum singað singað cyninge urum singað ge forðon cyning ealre eorðan god singað ge snotorlice ricsað dryhten ofer ealle ðeoda god siteð ofer seld ðæt halge his micel dryhten & hergendlic swiðe on ceastre godes ures on munte ðam halgan his abrædende wynsumnesse ealre eorðan se munt sion on sidan norðdæles ceaster cyninges ðæs miclan god hire bið oncnawen þonne he onfehð hie forðon sehðe cyningas eorðan gesomnode sint & tosomne becomon on annesse hie geseonde ða wundriende wæron gedrefde wæron & onstyrede wæron cwacung befeng hie ðær sar swa swa cennende on gaste strongum forðræstende scipu ðæs londes swa we gehirdon swa & we gesegon on ceastre dryhtnes mægena on ceastre godes ures god gestaðolode hie on ecnesse gehirað ðas ealle ðeode mid earum onfoð ge ge ðe eardiað ymbhwyrft gehwelce eorðcende & bearn monna somod on annesse welig & ðearfa muð min spriceð snytro & smeaung heortan minre gleawnisse ic onhældo to gelicnesse eare min ic ontyne on hearpan foresetenesse mine to hwon ic ondræde ic on dæge ðam yflan unryhtwisnes helspuran minne ymbseleð me ða ðe getreowað on mægene hira & ða on genyhtsumnesse welena hira beoð gewuldrade broðor ne alieseð alieseð mon ne seleð gode geðinge his ne weorð aliesnesse sawle his & won on ecnesse goda dryhten sprecende is & cegde eorðan from sunnan upgonge oð setlgong of sione hiw wlites his god sweotollice cymð god ure fyr on gesihðe his byrnð & on ymbhwyrfte his storm strong to gecegð heofon up & eorðan þæt he toscade folc his gesomniað ðær halge his ða geendebyrddon cyðnesse his ofer onsægdnessa & secgeað heofonas ryhtwisnesse his forðon god doema is geher folc min & ic sprece to israhela folce & ic cyðe ðe þætte god god ðin ic eom nales ofer onsægdnessa ðine ic ðreage ðe onsægdnessa soðlice ðine on gesihðe minre sint aa ic ne onfo of huse ðinum cealf ne of eowdum ðinum buccan miltsa min god æfter þære miclan mildheortnesse ðinre & æfter mengo miltsa ðinra adilga unryhtwisnesse mine ma aðweh me from unryhtwisnesse minre & from scylde minre geclænsa me forðon unryhtwisnesse mine ic oncnawe & scyld min beforan me is simle ðe anum ic gesyngode & yfel beforan ðe ic dyde þæt ðu sie geryhtwisod on wordum dinum & þu wricest þonne ðu doemest sehðe soðlice on unryhtwisnessum geeacnad ic eom & on leahtrum cende me modor min sehðe soðlice soðfæstnesse ðu lufodes ða uncuðan & ða dieglan snyttro ðinre þu gesweotolodes me þu onstregdes me mid ysopan & ic beo geclæsnod þu þwehst me & ofer snaw ic beo ablæcæd wuldras ðu on wean þu ðe mihtig eart on unryhtwisnesse ealne dæg unryhtwisnesse þohte tunge ðin swa swa scirseax scearp þu dydes facn ðu lufodes hete ofer fremsumnesse unryhtwisnesse ma þonne sprecan efnesse ðu lufodes ealle word forstrogdnisse on tungan fæcenre forðon toweorpeð ðe god on ende utaluceð ðe & utaluceð ðe of getelde ðinum & wyrttruman þinne of eorðan lifgendra geseoð ryhtwise & ondrædað & ofer hine hlehhað & cweðað sehðe mon se ne sette god fultumend him ac gehyhte on mengeo welena hira & strangað on idelnesse his on heortan his nis god gewemde sint & onscuniendlice gewordne sindon on willum hira nis se ðe do god nis oð ænne dryhten of heofone forðlocode ofer bearn monna ðæt he geseo gif sie ongitende oððe secende god ealle onheldon somod unnytte gewordne wæron nis se ðe do god nis oð ænne ahla oncnawað ealle ða ðe wyrcað unryhtwisnesse ða forswelgað folc min swa swa mete hlafes god ne gecedon ðær forhtodon for ege ðær ne wæs ege forðon god tostenceð ban monna him licigendra gedrefde sint forðon god forhogde hie hwelc seleð of hælo þonne forcerreð dryhten hæftned folces his gefihð & blissað on noman ðinum halne me do & on mægene ðinum alies me god geher gebed min mid earum onfoh word muðes mines forðon fremde arison on me & stronge sohton sawle mine & ne foresetton god beforan gesihðe hira sehðe soðlice god gefultumað me & dryhten andfenga is sawle minre acer yfel feondum minum & on soðfæstnesse ðinre forspild hie wilsumlice ic onsecge ðe & ic ondette noman ðinum dryhten forðon god he is forðon of eallum geswince ðu generedes me & ofer fiend mine gelocode eage ðin geher god gebed min & ne forseh ðu boene mine beheald on me & gehier me geunrotsad ic eom on bigonge minum & gedroefed ic eom from stefne feondes & fram geswince ðæs synfullan forðon onheldon on me unryhtwisnessa & on eorre hefige wæron me heorte min gedrefed is on me & fyrhto deaðes feoll ofer me ege & cwacung cwomon ofer me & beðehton me ðeostro & ic cwæð hwelc seleð me fiðru swa swa culfran & ic fleoge & ic gereste sehðe ic afeorrode fleonde & ic wunode on westenne ic bad hine se me halne dyde fram lytelmodum & storme miltsa me dryhten forðon fortræd me mon ealne dæg feohtende swencte me fortrædon me fiend mine ealne dæg fram heanisse dæges forðon manige ða oferfeohtað me ondrædað ic soðlice on ðe gehyhto dryhten on gode ic herge word mine ealne dæg on gode ic gehyhte ne ondrædo ic hwæt do me mon ealne dæg word min onscunodon wið me ealle geðeaht hira on yfel oneardiað & ahydað hie helspuran minne healdað swa bad sawl min fore nohte hale ðu dest hie on eorre folc ðu gebrices god lif min ic secge ðe ic sette tearas mine on gesihðe ðinre swa on gehate ðinum miltsa min god miltsa min forðon on ðe getriewð sawl min & on scuan fiðra ðinra ic gehyhto oð ðæt leoreð unryhtwisnes ic clipige to gode ðæm hehstan & to dryhtne se wel dyde me sende of heofone & aliesde me sealde on edwit fortredende me sende god mildheortnesse his & soðfæstnesse his sawle mine generede of midle hwelpa leona ic slep gedrefed bearn monna toeð hira wæpn & strælas & tunge hira mece scearp uphefe ofer heofonas god & ofer ealle eorðan wuldor ðin girene gearwodon fotum minum & gebegdon sawle mine dulfon beforan onsiene minre seað & hie gefeollon on ðone gearu heorte min god gearu heorte min ic singe & sealmsong ic cweðe dryhtne aris wuldor min aris hearpe & ic arise on dægred gif soðlice gewislice ryhtwisnesse ge sprecað ða ryhtan doemað ge bearn monna & soðlice on heortan unryhtwisnessa wyrceað on eorðan unryhtwisnesse handa eowra hleoðriað afremdode sint þa synfullan from innoðe dwoledon from wombe sprecende sint lease ðing eorre him æfter gelicnesse nædran swa nædran deaðe & fordyttende earan hire seo ne gehiereð stefne galendra & galdorcræftas ða beoð agalene from ðæm snottran god forðræsteð toeð hira on muðe hira wongteð leona gebriceð dryhten to nohte becumað swa swa wæter eornende aðeneð bogan his oð ðæt sien geuntrumode swa swa weax gemelted beoð afirde ofer hie gefeol fyr & hie negesawon sunnan genere me of feondum minum god min & fram onarisendum on me alies me genere me of ðæm wyrcendum unryhtwisnesse & of werum bloda gehæl me forðon sehðe abisgodon sawle mine onræsdon on me strange ne unryhtwisnes min ne syn
