min dryhten butan unryhtwisnesse ic orn & wæs gereht aris on gegnryne me & geseoh & ðu dryhten god mægna god beheald to neosianne ealle ðeoða ne miltsas ðu eallum ða wyrceað unryhtwisnesse sien forcirrede to æfenne & hungur ðrowien swa swa hundas & ymbgað ceastre sehðe hie sprecað on muðe hira & sweord is on welerum hira fordon hwelc gehirde & ðu dryhten bismrast hie fore nohte ðu hafast ealle ðeoda ðu onweg adrife us & towurpe us eorre ðu eart & miltsiende eart us þu onstyredes eorðan & ðu gedrefdes hie gehæl forðræstnesse hire forðon onstyred is ðu æteawdes folce ðinum ða heardan þu drenctes us mid wine onbryrdnesse ðu sealdes þæm ondrædendum ðe getacnunge ðæt hie flugen from onsiene bogan ðætte sien aliesde ða gecorenan ðine halne me do mid ðinre swiðran & gehier me god sprecende is on ðæm halgan his ic beo geblissad & ic todælo & gemære getelda min is & min is strengo heafdes mines cyning min gehier god boene mine beheald to gebede minum fram gemærum eorðan to ðe ic cleopode þonne bið generwed heorte min on stane þu upahofe me ðu gelæddes me forðon geworden ðu eart hyht mea tor strenge from onsine feondes ic eardige on getelde ðinum on weorolde ic sie gescilded on wrigelnesse fiðra ðinra forðon ðu god gehirdes gebed min ðu sealtes yrfweardnesse ondrædendum noman ðinne ðæg ofer dagas cyninges þu to geecest gear his oð on dæg weorolde & weorold ðurhwunað on ecnesse on gesihðe godes mildheortnesse & soðfestnesse hwelc soecð hira swa ic singe noman ðinum god on weorold weorolde þæt ic agife gehat min of dæge on dæg ah ne gode underðeoded bið sawl min from him soðlice hælo min & soðlice he is god min & se halwenda min fultum min ne beo ic onstyred ma hu longe onhreosað ge on men ofsleað ealle swa swa wage onhældum & stanwealle gecnysedum ah hwæðre are mine ðohton aweg adrifan ic arn on ðurst mid muðe hira hie bletsodon & mid heortan hira hie wergdon ah hwæðre gode underðeoded bið sawl min forðon fram him is geðyld min & soðlice he is god min & se halwenda min fultum min ne leore ic on gode þæm halwendan minum & wuldor min god fultumes mines hyht mea on gode is gehyhtað on hine eall gemeting folces ageotað beforan him heortan eowra forðon god fultum ure is god min to ðe of leohte ic wacie þyrsteð on ðe sawl min swiðe monigfaldlice & flæsc min on westenne & on ungeferum & on wætregum swa on ðæm halgan ic æteawde ðe þæt ic gesege mægen ðin & wuldor ðin forðon betre is mildheortnes ðin ofer lif weleras mine hergeað swa ic bletsige ðe on life minum & on noman ðinum ic hebbe honda mine swa swa mid smeorwe & fætnesse sie gefylled sawl min & welere wynsumnesse hergeað noman ðinne gif gemyndig ic wæs ðin ofer strene mine on morgentid ic smeage on ðe forðon geworden ðu eart fultum min & on wrigelse fiðra ðinra ic gefeo ætfalh sawl min æfter ðe me onfeng seo swiðre ðin gehier god gebed min ðonne ic beo geswenced from ege feondes genere sawle mine ðu gescildes me from gesomnunge awergedra from mengo wyrcendra unryhtwisnesse forðon ascerpton swa swa sweord tungan hira aðenedon bogan wisan bitre þæt hie scotoden on degolnessum þone unwemman færinga scotodon hine & ne ondredon trymedon him word yfel fliton ðæt hie ahydden girene cwædon hwelc gesihð hie smeagende wæron unryhtwisnesse asprungon smeagende mid smeaunge genealæceð mon to heortan heran & bið upahæfen god strælas cilda gewordne sint witu hira & fore noht hæfdon wið hie tungan hira gedrefde sint ealle þa ðe gesawon hie gedafenað ymensong god & ðe bið agifen gehat geher gebed min to ðe æghwelc flæsc cymeð word unryhtwisra gestrongodon ofer us & arleasnessum urum ðu miltsast eadig ðone ðu gecure & genome he ineardað on geteldum ðinum we beoð gefylde on godum huses ðines halig is tempel ðin wundurlic on efnisse geher us god se halwenda ure hyht ealra gemæra eorðan & on sæ feor gearwiende on mægene ðinum begyrded mid mehte ðu gedrefest grund sæs sweg yða his hwelc aræfneð beoð gedrefde ðeoda & ondredon ealle þa ðe eardiað endas eorðan from tacnum ðinum utgong uhttide & æfenne þu bist gelustfullod wynsumiað gode eall eorðe sealmsong cweðað noman his sellað wuldor lofe his cweðað to gode hu egesfulle sint werc ðin on menge mægnes ðines leogað ðe fiend ðine eal eorðe weorðað ðe & singð ðe sealmsong cwið noman ðinum þu hehsta cumað & geseoð weorc dryhtnes hu egesful on geðeahtum ofer bearn monna se gecerreð sæ on dryge & flodas þurhleorað mid fet ðær we beoð geblissode on ðæt ilce se waldeð on mægene his on ecnesse eagan his ofer ðeoda gelociað ða on eorre gegremedon ne sien upahæfene on him selfum bletsiað ðeoda god urne & hersumiað stefne lofes his se sette sawle mine to life & ne sealde onstyrgean fet mine gemiltsige us & bletsige us onlihte ondwlitan his ofer us & gemiltsige us ðæt we oncnawen on eorðan weg ðinne on eallum ðeodum hælo ðine ondetten ðe folc ealle blissigen & gefeon ðeoda forðon ðu demest folc on efnnesse & ðeoda on eorðan ðu gereces ondetten ðe folc god ondetten ðe folc ealle eorðe sealde wæstm hire bletsige us god god ure & bletsige us god & ondræden hine ealle endas eorðan arise god & sien tostrogdne fiend his & fleon from onsiene his ða ðe feodon hine swa asprong roec hie aspringen swa floweð wex from onsiene fyres swa forweorðen þa synfullan from onsiene & ða ryhtwisan symbliað gefeon on gesihðe godes sien gelustfullode on blissige singað gode salm cweðað noman his siðfæt doð him se astag ofer setlgong dryhten noma is him gefeoð on gesihðe his beoð gedrefde from onsiene his fædras steopcilda & doeman widwena god on stowe ðære halgan his god se eardian doeð anmode on huse se utalædeð gebundne on strengu gelice & ða ða ðe on eorre gegremmað ða eardiað on byrgennum god mitty ðu utgæst beforan folce ðinum ðonne ðu ofergæst ðurh westen eorðe onstyred is & soðlice heofonas dropudon from onsiene godes munt from onsine godes ofer me þa ðe secað ðe god forðon fore ðe ic abær edwit ic oferwrah mid scome onsiene mine fremðe geworden ic eom broðrum minum & cuma bearnum meder minre dryhten god on fultum minre bihald dryhten to gefultumienne me efest sien gescende & onscunigen fiend mine ða ðe soeceað sawle mine sien forcirde on bæc & scamigen ða ðe ðencað me yfel sien forcerde sona scamiende ða ðe cwæð to me welga welga gefeon & blissigen ða ðe soeceað ðe dryhten & cweðen simle sie gemiclod dryhten ða ðe lufiað hælo ðinre ic soðlice wædla & þearfa dryhten gefultuma me fultmend min & onliesend min beo ðu dryhten ne lata ðu on ðe ic gehyhte dryhten ic ne sie gescended on ecnesse on ðinre ryhtwisnesse gefreo me & genere me onheld to me eare þin & alies me beo ðu me on god gescildend & on stowe getrymede þætte halne me ðu gedo forðon trymnes min & gebeorg min ðu eart god min genere me of honda ðæs synfullan & of honda wið æ dondes & unryhtlice forðon ðu eart geðyld min dryhten hyht min fram gigoðhade minum on ðe getrymed ic eom of innoðe of wombe modor minre ðu eart min gescildend on ðe song min aa swa swa forebeacen geworden ic eom mongum & þu fultumend strong sie gefylled muð min mid lofe ðinum þæt ic mæge singan wuldor ðin ealne dæg micelnesse þine ne aweorp þu me on tide elde þonne aspringð mægen min ne forlæt ðu me dom þinne cyninge sele & ryhtwisnesse þine suna cyninges doem folc þin on þinre ryhtwisnesse & þearfan þine on dome onfon muntas sibbe folce ðinum & hylla ryhtwisnesse on his ryhtwisnesse doemð ðearfan þisses folces & hale gedoeð bearn þearfena & geeaðmodað hearmcweðendne & þurhwunað mid sunnan & ær monan on weorold weorolde & astag swa swa regn on fleos & swa swa ðrowung ðrowiende ofer eorðan up cymeð on dagum his ryhtwisnes & genyhtsumnes sibbe oð ðæt sie upahæfen mona & waldeð from sæ oð sæ & from flode oð gemæru ymbhwyrftes eorðan beforan him forðgað sigelhearwan & fiend his eorðan licciað swiðe god god þissum ða ðe rehtre sint heortan min soðlice fulneh onstyrede sint foet fulneh agotene sint gongas mine forðon ic elnade on ðæm synfullum sibbe synfulra geseonde forðon ne is onhældednes deaðe hira ne trymenes on wite hira on gewinnum monna ne sint & mid monnum ne beoð swungne forðon nom hie oferhygd hira oferwrigene sint mid unryhtwisnesse & arleasnesse hira forðyppeð swa swa of smerwe unryhtwisnes hira leordon on geflite heortan þohton & sprecende wæron niðas unrehtwisnesse on heanesse sprecende sint setton on heofon muð hira & tunge hira leorde ofer eorðan to hwon awegadrife ðu us god on ende eorre is hatheortnes ðin ofer scep eowdes þines gemyne gesomnunge þinre þa þu gesceope fram fruman ðu gefreodes gird erfes ðines munt on ðæm ðu eardast on ðon ilcan ahefe hand ðine on oferhygde hira on ende hu fela wergende is feond on halgum ðinum & gewuldrode sint þa ðe feodon on midle cafortunes þines setton tacen hira tacen & ne oncneowon swa swa on wege ofer þa hean swa swa on wuda treowa mid æxum curfon dura his on ðæt ilce twibille & adesan awurpon hie forbærndon mid fyre haligportic ðin on eorðan bismiton geteld noman þines cwædon on heortan hira cneoris hira betwih hie cumað forðryccen we ealle dagas symbellice dryhtnes fram eorðan tacenu ure we ne gesawon soðlice nis witga & us ne oncnaweð ma we ondettað ðe god we ondettað ðe & we gecegeað naman ðinne ic secge ealle wundru þine þonne ic onfo tid ic ryhtwisnesse doeme gemelted is eorðe & ealle oneardgende on hire ic getrymede syla hire ic cwæð to ðam unryhtwisum nyllað ge unryhtlice don & dæm agyltendum nylle ge uphebban horn nyllað ge unhebban on heanesse horn eowerne & nyllað ge sprecan wið god unryhtwisnesse forðon ne from eastdæle ne from westdæle ne fram westum muntum forðon god dema is ðysne gehienð & þysne upahefð forðon calic on honda dryhtnes wines scires full is gemengedes & onheldeð of ðissum on ðis ah hwæðre drosne his ne is ameallad drincað of ðæm ealle synfulle eorðan cuð god on israhela folce micel nama his & geworden is on sibbe stow his & eardung his ðær gebræc hornas bogan sceld sweord & gefeht þu onlihtes wundorlice from muntum ecum gedrefde sint ealle þa unwisan on heortan slepon slæp hira & naht gemetton ealle weras weolena on hondum hira fram þreaunge þinre god iacobes hnappodon þa astigon hors ðu of heofone dom scotad is eorðe cwacode & gestilde mid stefne minre to dryhtne ic cleopode stefn min to gode & behaldeð me on dæge geswinces mines god ic sohte mid hondum minum on niht beforan him & ne eom ic beswicen ic wiðsoc frefran sawle min gemyndig ic wæs god & gelustfullod ic eom bigongen ic eom & asprong hwon gast min forefengon wacona eagan mine gedrefed ic eom & ne eom ic sprecende ic þohte dagas ealde & ger ecu on mode ic hæfde & smeagende ic eom on niht mid heortan minre ic beeode & windwode on me gast minne & ic cwæð ah on ecnesse aweorpeð god oððe no toseteð þætte wel gelicod sie nu get oððe on ende mildheortnesse his acearf fram weorolde & cneorisse beheoldað folc min æ mine onheldað eare eower on word muðes mines on bispellum muð minne foresetenessa fram fruman weorolde gehirdon & oncneowon ða ure sægdon us bedeglede from bearnum hira oðerre secgende lofu dryhtnes & mægenu his & wundru is ða ðe he worhte & he awehte cyðnesse & æ sette ða he bebead fædrum urum ðætte cuðe gedyde bearnum hira þætte oncnawe cneoris oðeru bearn ða ðe beoð acende & arisað & secgað ða bearnum hira þæt hie setten on gode hyht hira & no ofergiteliað werca godes hira & bebeodu his soeceað ne sien swa swa fædras hira cyn & biter cyn ðæt ne gerehte his & nis befæst mid gode gast bearn behaldende bogan & sendende strælas hira gecerde sint on dæge gefeohtes comon ðeoda on erfeweardnesse ðine besmiton tempel halig ðin setton swa swa æppla setton ða deadlican þeowa þinra mettas fuglum heofones flæsc haligra þinra wilddeorum eorðan aguton blod heora swa swa wæter on ymbhwyrfte & ne wæs se ðe bebyrgde gewordne we sind on edwit nehgehusum urum on bismrunge & forhogunge ðissum on ymbhwyrfte urum sint hu longe dryhten eorsast ðu on ende bið onæled swa swa fyr hatheortnes ðin ageot eorre ðin on ðeoda þa ðe ne cuðon & on ricu þa ðe ne gecegdon noman ðinne forðon æton & stowe his aweston ne gemyn ðu unryhtwisnessa ura þa ealdan hræðe us forefo mildheortnes ðin forðon ðearfan gewordne we sint swiðe gefultma us god se halwenda ure & fore are noman ðines dryhten ales us & milde beo ðu synnum urum fore noman ðinum ðu reces beheald ðu ðe gelædes swa swa scep ðu sites ofer æteaw beforan awece mehte ðine & cum ðætte hale ðu do us dryhten god mægena gecer us & æteaw onsine ðine & hale we beoð dryhten god mægena hu longe eorsas ðu on gebed ðeowes ðines þu foedest us mid hlafe teara & drync ðu selest us on tearum on gemete ðu gesettes us on wiðcwedenesse nehgehusum urum & fiend ure bismredon us dryhten god mægna gecer us & æteaw onseone ðine & hale we beoð wingeard of ægyptum þu afirdes ðu awurpe ðeoda & plantades hie urum wynsumiað gode iacobes & sellað tympanan wynsumne mid citeran singað on fruman monðes mid horne on dæge mærum symbelnesse eowerre forðon bebod is & dom gode cyðnes sette hine þonne uteode of ægypta londe tungan ða he ne cuðe he gehierde acerde from byrnennum bæc his honda his on binne ðeowodon on geswince ðu gecedes me & ic alesde ðe & ic gehirde ðe on degolnesse stormes ic acunnode ðe to wætre wiðcwedenesse geher folc min & ic spreco & ic cyðe ðe gif ðu me gehirest stod on gesomnunge goda on midle soðlice god tosceadeð hu longe doemað ge unryhtwisnesse & onsiene syngiendra ge neomað doemað steopbearn & wædlan heanne & dearfan ge geryhtwisiað genergeað dearfan & wædlan of honda synfulra gefreogeað nyston ne ongeton on ðeostrum gongað beoð onstyrede ealle staðolas eorðan ic cwæð godas ge sindon & bearn ðæs hean ealle ge soðlice swa swa men sweltað & swa swa an of ealdormonnum ge feallað aris god doem eorðan forðon ðu erfeweardas on eallum ðeodum hwelc gelic bið ðe ne swiga ðu ne bewere god forðon sehðe fiend ðine hleoðrodon & ða ðe ðe feodon upahofon heafod on folc ðin geswiworlice þohton geðeaht & þohton wið ða halgan ðine cwædon cumað tostregden we hie of ðeode & ne bið gemyndgad noma ma forðon þohton geðafunge on annesse wið ðe cyðnesse gestihtodon geteld idumea & fremðes cynnes mid eardiendum & soðlice somod com mid him gewordne sint on ondfengnesse bearnum lothes swiðe lufigendlice sint geteld ðine dryhten mægena gewilnade & asprong sawl min on cafortune dryhtnes heorte min & flæsc min gehyhton on god ðone lifgendan & soðlice speara gemoeteð him hus nest hwær he geseteð briddas his wibed ðin dryhten mægena cyning min & god min eadge þa ðe eardiað on huse ðinum dryhten on weorold weorolde heriað ðe eadig bið se wer ðæs bið fultum fram ðe dryhten upstige on heortan his gestihtode on dene teara on stowe ða ðu gestihtodes him & soðlice bletsunge seleð se ðe æ salde gongað of mægene on mægen bið gesewen god goda dryhten god mægena geher bene min mid earum onfeoh god þu bletsodes dryhten eorðan þine þu acerdes hæftnede þu forgefe unryhtwisnesse folces ðines ðu oferwruge ealle synna hira ðu gestildes eall eorre ðin þu acerdes from eorre æbylgðe ðinre gecer us god se halwenda ure & acer eorre ðin from us ðætte no on ecnesse þu eorsige us ne aðene ðu eorre ðin from cynne on cyn god þu forcerrende geliffæstas us & folc þin bið geblissod on ðe oteaw us dryhten mildheortnesse ðine & hælo ðine sele us ic gehiere hwæt sprece on me dryhten god forðon spriceð sibbe on folc his & ofer halge his & on hie ða ðe beoð gecerrede to him onheld dryhten eare ðin to me & geher me forðon wædla & ðearfa eam ic heald sawle mine forðon halig ic eom halne do ðeow ðinne god min gehyhtendne on ðe gemiltsa me dryhten forðon to ðe ic cleopode ealne dæg geblissa sawle ðeowes ðines forðon to ðe ic hof sawle mine forðon ðu dryhten wynsum & milde eart & genyhtsum on mildheortnesse eallum gecegendum ðe mid earum onfoh dryhten gebed min & beheald stefne boene minre on dæge geswinces mines ic clipode to ðe forðon ðu gehirdes me nis gelic ðe on godum dryhten & nis æfter weorce ðinum ealle ðeoda swa hwelce swa ðu geworhtes cumað & gebiddað beforam ðe dryhten & arweorðiað noman ðinne staðolas his on muntum halgum lufað dryhten geatu ofer ealle geteld wuldorfæste cwedene sint bi ðe cester godes gemyndig ic beo witendum ðe sehðe fremðes cynnes & folc sigelhearwena ðas wæron on hire modor cwið mon & mon geworden wæs on hire & he gestaðolode hie se hehsta dryhten sægð on gewritum folca his & ealdormonna hira þa wæron on hire swa blissiendra ealra ure eardung is on ðe god hælo minre on dæge ic clipode & on niht beforan ðe ingæð gebed min on gesihðe ðinre onheld eare ðin to bene minre dryhten forðon gefylled is mid yflum sawl min & lif min on helle tonealæceð geteald ic eom mid ðæm ofdune astigendum on seað geworden ic eom swa swa mon butan fultume betwuh deade freoh swa swa gewundode slæpende aworpne on byrgennum þara þu ne gemundes ma & cuðlice hie of handa ðinre adrifene sint setton me on seaðe ðæm niðerran on þeostrum & on sceade deaðes on me getrymed is eorre ðin & ealle upahæfenessa ðina ofer me ðu ingelæddes feor þu dydes cuðe mine fram me setton me on onscununge him seald ic eom & ic no uteode mildheortnessa þina dryhten on ecnesse ic singe on cneorisse & cynryne ic forðsecge soðfæstnesse þine on muðe minum forðon þu cwæde on ecnesse mildheortnes bið timbred on heofenum bið gegearwod soðfæstnes þin ic gestihtode cyðnesse gecorenum minum ic swor dauide ðeowe minum oð on ecnesse ic gegearwige sæd þin & ic getimbre on weorold weorolde setl ðin ondettað heofonas wundru þine dryhten & soðfæstnesse ðine on circean haligra forðon hwelc on wolcnum bið geefnlicod dryhtne oððe hwelc gelic bið gode betwuh bearn godes god se bið wuldrad on geðehte haligra micel & to ondrædenne ofer ealle ða ðe on ymbhwyrfte his sint dryhten god mægena hwelc gelic ðe mihtig ðu eart dryhten & soðfæstnes þin on ymbhwyrfte þinum gebeorg geworden ðu eart us from cneorisse & cynne ærðon wæren muntas oððe wære getrgmed ymbhwyrft eorðan from weorolde & oð weorold ðu eart god ne acer ðu mon on eaðmodnesse & ðu cwæde beoð ge gecerde bearn monna forðon ðusend geara beforan eagum ðinum swa swa dæg gestran se bileorde & swa swa geheld on neht ða fore nohte beoð hæfde ger hira on morgen swa swa wyrt leoreð on marne bloweð & ðurhleoreð on æfenne gefealleð forheardað & adrugað forðon we asprungon on irre ðinum & on hatheortnesse ðinre gedroefde we sint ðu settes unryhtwisnessa ðine on gesihðe ðinre weorold ure on onlihtnesse ondwlitan ðines forðon ealle dagas ure asprungon & we on eorre ðinum ateorodon ger ure swa swa grytte wæron smeagende se eardað on fultume ðæs hehstan on gescildnesse godes heofones wunað cwið to dryhtne andfenga min ðu eart & gebeorg min god min ic gehyhte on hine forðon he gefreoð me of gryne huntiendra mid gescyldrum his ofersceadwað ðe & under fiðrum his ðu gehyhtes mid scilde ymbseleð ðe soðfæstnes his ne ondrædes ðu ðe fram ege nihtlecum fram stræle fleogendum ðurh dæg from scire geondgongendum on ðeostrum from hryre & deofle middæglecum feallað from sidan ðinre ðusend & tien ðusend to ðære swiðran ðinre ðe soðlice to ne genealæceð ah hwæðre mid eagum ðinum þu sceawas & edlean synfulra ðu gesihst forðon ðu eart dryhten hyht min hehst ðu settes gebeorg ðin god is ondettan dryhtne & singan noman ðinum ðu hehsta to secgenne on morgen mildheortnesse ðine & soðfæstnesse þine þurh niht on tien strengedre hearnan mid songe & citran forðon þu gelustfullodes me dryhten on gewerce þinum & on weorcum handa ðinra ic gehyhte hu micellice sint weorc ðin dryhten swiðe deope gewordne sint geðohtas dine wer se unwisa ne oncnaweð & se dysiga ne ongiteð þa mid ðy upeornað þa synfullan swa swa heg & æteawdon ealle þa ðe wæron wyrcende unryhtwisnesse þætte hie forweorðen on weorold weorolde ðu soðlice se hehsta on ecnesse dryhten ricsað wlite gegereð gegereð dryhten strengu & begyrde hine mid mægene & soðlice getrymeð ymbhwyrft eorðan se ne bið onstyred gearu setl ðin god nu heonan from weorolde ðu eart upahofon flodas dryhten uphofon flodas stefna his fram stefnum wætra micelra wundorlice upahæfenessa sæs wundorlic on heanessum dryhten cyðnessa þine dryhten geleafsume gewordne sint swiðe huse ðinum gedafeniað ða halgan dryhten on lenge daga wraca dryhten god wraca freolice dyde unhefe þu doemest eorðan ageld edlean oferhygdgum hu lange synfulle dryhten hu lange synfulle beoð gewuldrode secgað & sprecað unryhtwisnesse sprecað ealle þa ðe wyrcað unryhtwisnesse folc þin dryhten geaðmododon & erfweardnesse þine geswencton widwan & wræccean ofslogon & fæderlease acwealdon & cwædon ne gesihð dryhten ne ongiteð god iacobes ongeotað ge nu þa ðe unwise sindon on folce & dysige hwilum hogiað se plantode eare ne gehiereð oððe se ðe hiwode eage ne sceawað cumað gefeon we dryhtne wynsumien we gode ðæm halwendan urum abisigien we onsiene his on ondetnesse & on sealmsongum wynsumien we him forðon goð micel dryhten & cyning micel ofer ealle godas forðon onweg ne adrifeð dryhten folc his forðon on onwalde his sint ealle endas eorðan & heanessa munta he gelocað forðon his is sæ & he dyde ðæt & ða drygan honda his gestaðoloðon cumað gebidden we & forðluten we beforan god wepen we beforan dryhtne se geworhte us forðon he is dryhten god ure we soðlice folc his & scep læswe his to dæge gif stefne his ge gehierað nyllað ge aheardian heortan eowre swa on onscununge æfter singað dryhtne song niwne singað ge dryhtne eal eorðe singað dryhtne & bletsigeað noman his wel secgeað of dæge in dæg hælo his secgeað betwuh ðeoda wuldor his on eallum folcum wundru his forðon micel dryhten & hergendlic swiðe egesful ðu eart ofer ealle godas forðon ealle godas ðeoda deoful dryhten soðlice heofonas dyde ondetnes & fægernes on gesihðe his halignes & micelnes on gehalgunge his tobringað dryhtne oeðlas ðeoda tobringað dryhtne wuldor & are tobringað wuldor noman his uphebbað onsægdnessa & ingað on cafortunas his weorðiað dryhten on healle ðære halgan his sie onstyred fram onsiene his eal eorðe ricsað gefehð eorðe blissien ealond monge wolcn & dimnes on ymbhwyrfte his ryhtwisnes & dom gerecenes setles his fyr beforan hine foregæð & onæleð on ymbhwyrfte fiend his onlehton legeto his ymbhwyrfte eorðan geseah & onstyred wæs eorðe muntas swa swa weax fleowon fram onsiene dryhtnes fram onsiene dryhtnes cwacode eall eorðe sægdon heofonas ryhtwisnesse his & gesawon ealle folc wuldor his sien gescende ealle þa ðe weorðiað græftas þa wuldriað in heargum hira woerðiað hine ealle englas his geherde & blissiende wæs & gefegon dohtor iudan fore domum ðinum dryhten forðon ðu eart dryhten se hehsta ofer ealle eorðan swiðe upahæfen ðu eart ofer ealle godas song niwne forðon wundra worhte dryhten gehælde hine mid ða swiðran his & earm haligne his cuðe dyde dryhten hælu his beforan gesihðe ðeoda onwreah ryhtwisnesse his gemyndig wæs mildheortnesse his & soðfæstnesse his gehusscipe gesawon ealles endas eorðan hælo godes ures wynsumiað gode eal eorðe singað & gefeoð & singað singað gode urum on citran & stefne salmes on hornum gelengdum & stefne beman gehyrnedræ wynsumiað on gesihðe cyninges dryhtnes sie onstyred sæ & fylnes his ymbhwyrft eorðena & ealle þa ðe eardiað on hire flodas plegiað mid hondum on ðæt ilce muntas gefegon beforan onsiene dryhtnes forðon com forþon com doeman eorðan doemð ymbhwyrft eorðan on ryhtwisnesse & folc efnesse his ricsað eorsien folc ðu sites ofer sie astyred eorðe dryhten micel & heah ofer ealle folc ondettað noman ðinum miclum & egesfullum forðon halig he is & ar cyninges dom lufað ðu gegearwodes efnesse dom & ryhtwisnesse ðu dydest uphebbað dryhten on biscopum his betwih hie ða ðe gecegað noman his gecegdon dryhten & he geherde hie on sweore wolcnes spræc to him heoldon cyðnessa his & bebodu his ða sealde him dryhten god ure ðu geherdes hie god ðu milde wære him & wrecende on ealle teolunga hira uphebbað dryhten god urne & weorðiað on munte ðæm halgan his forðon halig is dryhten god ure wynsumiað ge gode eall eorðe ðeowiað dryhtne on blisse ingað on gesihðe his on wynsumnesse weotað ðæt dryhten he is god he geworhte us & nales we us we soðlice folc his & scep læswe his ingað geatu his on ondetnesse cafortunes his on ymenum ondetnessa hergað noman his forðon wynsum is dryhten on ecnesse mildheortnes his & oð weorold weorolde soðfæstnes his we tosliton bendas heora & utawurpan fram us geoc heora þa eardað on heofenan hyspð hi & drihten hyspeð hi þonne he spycð to heom on yrre his & & on hatheortnesse his gedrefde his ic witodlice geset eom cining of heo ofer munt haline his bodigende beboda his cwæþ to me sunu min eart þu ic todæg cende þe bide et me & ic gife þe þeoda erfwerdnesse þine & æhta þine gemæro eorþan þu gereccest hi on gyrde issene swa fæt tigolwyrhtan þu brytst hi & nu ciningas ongytaþ beoð gelærede þa demað eorþan þeowiað drihten on ege & geblissiaþ him mid fyrhto gegripaþ lare þalæs hwon yrsige drihten & ge forwyrþan of wege rihtum þone byrneþ on scortnesse yrre his edige ealle þa ðe truwiaþ on him to hwi gemanifealde synd þa swencað me manige arisað ongean me manige cweþaþ sawle minre na is hæl him on gode his þu witodlice anfeng min eart wuldor min & uphebbend hæfod min stefn min to drihtene ic clypude & he gehyrde me of munte halian his ic slep & swefnode & ic aras forþam drihten anfeng me na ic adræde þusenda folces ymbesyllende me aris halne me do god min forþan þu ofsloge ealle wiþerwyrde me butan intinga teð synfulra þu forbrytest drihten is hæl & ofer fol þin bletsung þin þonne ic clypige þu gehyrdest me god rihtwisnesse minre on geswince ðu tobrædest me mildsa me & gehyr gebed min bearn manna hu lange hefige heortan to hwi lufast þu idelnese & secest læsunga & witaþ forþam gemyclude drihten his dominus gehyrde me þone ic clypige to him yrsiað & nelle ne na synnian þa þe cweþað on heortan eowre on incleofan eowre onbrydaþ ofriaþ ofrunga rihtwisnes & hihtaþ on drihten manige cweþaþ hwylc ætywð us god tacnod is ofer us leoht ansyne þine ðu geafe blisse on heortan minre of wæsman hwætes & wines & eles his gemyclude synde on sibbe on þæt sylfe ic slape & reste þu synderlice on hihte þu gesettest me word mine earan opena drihten ongit clypunga mine begym stefne gebedes mines cining min & god min to þe ic gebidde hlaford on morgen þu gehyrdest stefne mine on morgen þe & ic geseo forðam na god wyllende unrihtwisnesse & na eardaþ neah þe awyrged & na þuhwunað unrihtwise beforan egan þinnan ðu hatodest ealle þa wyrcað unrihwisnesse forsplst ealle þa ðe specað leassungan wera blod & facnfulle onscuniaþ drihten ic witodlice on manifealde mildheornese þinre ic inga on hus þin ic gebidde to temple halian þinan on ege þinre læd me on rihtwisnesse þinre for feonda minra gerece on gesyhðe weg minne na is on muþe heora soþfæstnes heorte heora idel is byrigen opigende is hrace heora tunge heora facn dydan dem hy god ahresan fram geðohtum heora neah mænego arleasnessa heora adræf hi forðam hi gremodan þe & blissian eale þa hihtað on þe on ecnesse & þu eardast on him & wyldriað on þe eale þa lufiað naman þinne þu bletsast rihtwise swa scyld god willan þu gehelmedest us na on yrre þire þrea me & na wræþe þinre cid me mildsa me untrum ic eom hæl me gedrefede synd ban mine & sawel min gedrefed is swyðe & þu hu lange beo gecyrred drihten nera sawle mine hal me do for mildheortnesse þinre forðan na is on deaðe þa gemyndi beo þin on helle witolice hwylc andet þe ic swanc on geomerunge minre ic swylige þurh syndriga nihta bed min tæran minan ic wæte gedrefed is fram yrre egan mine ic ealdode betwyx eallan feondan minan gewitaþ fram me ealle þa wyrcaþ unrihtwisnesse forðam gehyrde drihten stefne wopa minre gehyrde drihten gebed min bene mine anfeng sceamian & syn gedrefede swyþe ealle fynd mine sin gecyrred & aswarnian swyþe hrædlice god min on þe ic hihte hal me do of eallan ehtende me & þalæs gegripe swa leo sawle mine þonne na is þa alyse & na þa hal do hlaford god min gif ic dyde þis gif is unrihtwisnes on handan minan gif ic agvlde gyldendum me yfel be gewyrhtan fram feondon minan on idel ehte feond sawle mine & gegripe & fortredde on eorðan lif min & wuldor min on duste lædeð aris hlaford on yrre þinre upahefe on ende feonda minra aris god min on bebode þa þu bebude & somnung folca ymbesealde þe & for þas on heahnesse gehwyrf drihten dem folc dem me neah rihtwisnesse minre & æfter unscyldinesse minre ofer me si geendod niþ synfulra & gerece rihtwise scrudnigende heortan & ædran god riht fultum min fram þa hale dæþ rihte heortan god dema rihtwis strang & geþyldi cwyðst þu yrsaþ þurh syndrige dagas butan gecyrande beon swurd his ascæhð bogan his he þenan & he gearcaþ hine & on him gerwaþ fata deaþes flana his byrnende gefremde efne he geeacnaþ unrihtwisnesse & he feng sar & cende unrihtwisnesse seaþ he openode & he dealf hine & he feol on pytt þa ne macode biþ gecyrred sar his on heafod his & on hnol his unrihtwisnes his astah ic andette drihten æfter rihtwisnesse his & ic singe naman þæs hyhstan wundorlic is nama þin on ealra eorþan ahafen is mærþ þin ofer heofenas of muþe cildra & sucendra fulfremedest lof for feondan þinan þæt þu towerpe fynd ic geseo heofe weorc fingra þinra monan þa þu gestaþolodest hwæt is man þæt gemyndi eart his oþðe bearn manna þa þu geneosodest hine þu wanodest hine lytle læs fram englan of wuldre & wyrðmynt þu gehelmodest hine & gesettest hine ofer weorc handa þinra ealle þing underþeoddest under fotan his scæp & oxsan ealle & on ufan & nytena fellda fugelas heofena & fixsa sæ þa þurhgaþ weg stiga sæs ic andette þe on ealre heortan minre ic cyþe ealle wundra þine ic blissige & fægnige on þe singe naman þinne ðone hyhstan on gecyrringe feonda minan on bæc hi geuntrumian & forwyrðan of ansyne þinre þu worhttest dom mine & intinge ðu sitst ofer þrymsetl þe demes rihtwisnesse þu þrædest þeoda & forwurdan arlease naman heora adylegudest on ecnesse & on worolde worold fynd ateorodan of swyrde on ende & ceastra heora þu tobræce forwearþ gemynd heora mid hlyde & drihten on ecnesse ðurhwunað gearwode on dome setl his & he demde ymbehwyrf eorþan on unrihtwisnesse demeð folc on rihtwisnesse & gedon is drihten frofer þærfan fylstend on geswince & hihtan on þe þa wistan naman þinne forðam na þu forlete secende þe singaþ drihtene þa eardað on & bodiaþ betwynan þeodan his secende blod heora he munde na is forgyten clypunga þearfan mildsa me geseoh eadmodnesse mine feondum minum þu þe ahefst me of gatan deaðes þæt ic bodege ealle lofa þine on gatan dohtra ic blissige on hæle þinre gefæstnode synd þeoda on forwyrd þa hi worhton on grine þyssan þa hi dilogodon gegripen is fot heora bið oncnawen drihten domas donde on weorcum handa his gripen is synful sin gecyrred synfulle on helle ealle þeoda þa forgytað drihten na on ende forgiten bið þearfan geþyld þearfan na forwyrð on ende aris man sind demed þeoda on gesyhþe þinre gesete ælædende ofer hi witen þeda men synd synd to hwi gewite þu feor þu forsyxst on weorccum on geswince þonne ofermodgað arleasse biþ onæled þærfa hi beoþ gegripen on geþeahte bið herod synfulla on gewilnunga sawle his & unrihttu he bið gebletson hyspeð drihten se synfulla æfter manifealdnesse yrre his na seceð na is god on ansyne his wegas his on eallan tidan beoð afyrred domas þine fram ansyne his eallan feondan heora he rixsað cwæþ witodlice on heortan his ic na beo astyrud on cynrene bvtan yfele þæs of wyrgednesse muþ ful is & biternes & facnful under tungan his geswinc & sar sitteþ on searwum mid welegum on digole þæt ofslea unscyldige gan his on þearfan beseoð he syrwð on digolnesse ealswa leo on scræfe his he syrwð þæt he reafige þearfan gripe þearfan þonne he atyhð hine on grine his eadmedde hine he onhyldeð hine & fealleð þonne he wealdeð þam þearfan he cwæþ witodlice on heortan his forgyten is god he acyrde ansyne his na geseo on ende aris drihten god si ahafen hand þin na forgyt þearfan for hwæt bysmrede ðe arleasa drihte cwyþ witodlice on heortan his na secð þu gesyxt forðan þu geswinc & sar bescæwast þæt þu sylle hi on handa þinan þe læfed is þeafan steopcild þu byst gefylst þu forbrytest earm synfulles & awyrgedes bið soht synfulles his & na bið funden rixsaþ on ecnesse & on worolde forwyrþað þeoda of eorþan his girninge þearfan gehyrð drihten gearwunga heortan heora gehyrde earan þine deman steopcildan & eadmodan & na togeset ofer þæt gemyclian hine man ofer eorþan on drihten ic getrywe humeta segaþ sawle mine gewit on munt swa spearwe efne synfulle aþenedon bogan hi gyredon flana heora on cere þæt hi scotigent on þystrum rihtwise heortan forþam þa þu dydest hi tobræce rihwis witodlice hwæt dyde drihten on temple haligan drihten on heofenan setl his egan his on þearfan beseoþ bræwas his axsiað bearn manna axsað rihtwise & arlease þe soþlice lufað unrihtwisnes hat sawle his rinð ofer synfulle grin fyres & swefel & gast dæl heora rihtwis drihten rihtwisnesse lufað efnesse geseah ansyne his halne me do forðan ateorod hali forðan gewanode synd soðfestnessa fram bearna manna idele specaþ æghwylc to nyxtan his weleras facnfulra on heorttan specende synd forspille drihten eale weleras fancfulle & tungan fælaspecelan þa cwædan tungan ure we gemycliað weleras ure of us synd hwylc ure drihten is for yrmðe on wædlan & gemerunga ðearfan nu ic rise cwæð drihten ic sette on hæle geleaflice spæce drihtenes spæc syfre seolfer of fyre amerod fandad eorþe aclænsod seofenfealde þu hlaford gehealdest us & beweardast us fram cneornesse þysse on ecnesse on ymbehwyrfte arlease gangað efter heahnesse þine gemænifylde bearn manna hu lange forgitst þu on ende cyrst ansyne þine fram me hv longe sette ic geþeaht on sawle minre sar on heortan minre ðuh dæg hu longe beoð ahafen fynd mine ofer me beseoh & gehyr me hlafor god min onlyht egan mine þæt næfre ic slape on deaþe þalæs hwonne cweþe feond min ic magode togeanes him þa swencton me blissiað gif ic gedrefed beo ic witodlice on mildheortnes þinre ic hihte blissiað heorte min on hæle þinre ic singe drihtene þa god sealde me & ic singe naman þæs hyhstan cwæð unwisse on heortan heora na is god gewemmede synd & onscunigendlic gedone synd on heora na is þa do god na oþ on anne drihten of heofena besceawaþ ofer bear manna þæt geseo gif is ynderstandende oþðe secende drihten ealle framahyldan ætgædere unnyt gedone synd na is þa do god na is oþ on anum byrigen opengende is celo heora tunge heora facnfule hi dydan nædran under lippan heora þara muþ of awyrgednes & bite ful is hraþe fet to geotende blod forbrytnes & ungesælines on wege heora & wegg sibbe na gecneowan na is ege godes beforan egan heora na ne cnawað ealle þa wyrcað unrihtwisnesse þa forswelgað folc min swa mettas breades drihten na hi clypedon þar hi forhtodan ege þær na wæs ege forðam on cneorisse rihtwis is geþeaht on wædlan þu gedrefdest forðam hiht his is hwylc sylð hæle þone acyrreþ drihte hæftlingas folcces his & blissige n & fægnigen geleaffule hwylc eardað on earddunga þinre oþðe hwylc resteð on munte halian þinan butan womme & wyrcð rihtwisnesse soþfæstnes on heortan his deþ facn on tungan his his nyxtan yfel & hosp na feng togeanes nyxtan his to nahte gelæd is on ansyne his se awyrgeda adrædende witodlice drihten bið gewuldrud þe swerað nyxtan his & na beswicð se þe feoh his na geaf to gafole & lac of ynscyldigan ne anfeng se deþ þas na beoð astyrurd on ecnesse geheald me hlaford forþam ic hihte on þe ic sæde drihten god min ear þu forðam goda minra na þu na beþearf þa synd on eorþan his wundrude ealle willan mines on him gemyclude synd untrumnesse heora syþan efston na ic gaderige gemetinge heora of blode na ic gemyndi namana heora þurh welera mine drihten dæl erfwerdnes minre & mine þu eart þe ageafe erfweard mine me rapas feollan me on beorhtnese & witodlice erfwerdnes min beorht is ic bletsige þa sealde me andgyt ofer & oðð to niht þrædon me ædran mine ic forescæwode on gesyhðe minre æfre to þam swyþran is me na ic astyrud beo forþam gelustfullud is heort min & fægnaþ tunge min & flæcs min rest on hihte gehyr hlaford rihtwisnesse mine begym gebed min earan opena bene minre na on weleran facnfulle of ansyne þinre dom min yppe egan þine geseoþ efnesse þu afandodest heortan mine & þu neosodest on niht fyre me þu amerodest & na is funden on me unrihtwisnes þæt na spece muð min weorc manna fore worda welera þinra ic gehealde wegas hearde fulfrema stæppas mine on stigum þinum þæt na beo astyrud swaþu mine ic clypode forðan þu gehyrdest me god ahyld earan þine me & gehyr word mine wunderlica mildheortnes þin þa hale dest hihtende on þe fram wiþerstandendum swyðra þinre geheald me þæt swa seo egan under sceade fiðera þinra gescyld me fram ansyne arleasra þa me swencton fynd mine saule mine ymbesealdan ic lufige þe strenð min trymnes min frofer min & alysend min gefylstend min & ic hihte on hin gescyld min & horn hæle minre & anfeng min herigende ic clypige drihten & fram feonda mina hal ic beo ymbesealdon me gemerunga deaþes & burnan unrihtwisnesse gedrefdan me sar helle ymbesealdan me forcoman me grinu deaþes on geswince minan ic clypige drihten & to gode minan ic clypige & he gehyrde of temple haligan his stefne mine & clypung min on ansyne his ineode on earan his astyrud is & forhtodan eorþe & grundweal munta gedrefede synt & astyrud synd forþan yrre him astah smic on yrre his & fyr of ansyne his byrð cola onælede synd fram him heofenas bodiaþ wuldor godes & weorc handa his bodiaþ trymnesse dæges dæg belcet word & nihta niht bycneþ ingehyd na synd swæca & na word þara na synd stefne heora on ealra eorþan uteode hlisa heora & on ende embehwyfte eorþan word heora on sunna he sette eardunge his & he ealswa brydguma forðsteppende of brydbrvre his he blissode swa n to yrnnende weg fram heahnesse heofenes utgan his & edryne his oþ to heahnesse his na is þa þe behyt fra hætan his getrywful wisdom gearuwigende lytlingas rihwisnes drihtenes rihte blissiende heortan bebod beorct onlyhtende egan gehyre þe on dæg geswinces gescylde þe nam he sende þe fultum & of heahnese he behealde he gemyndi beo eallan ofrunga þin onsægdnesse þin fæt sie sylle þe æfter heortan þinre & ealle geþeaht þine he getrymme we geblissiað on hæle þinre & on naman godes ure we gemycliaþ gefylle drihten ealle girninge þine nu ic geccneow forðam hal dyde drihten crist his gehyrþ hine of heofenan his on anwealde hæl swyþre his þa on cretum & þa on horssum we witodlice on naman drihtenes ures we clypiað hy gewriðene synd & feollan witodlice we arisan & arisene beoþ on mæine þinan blissað cining & ofer hæle þine he blissode swyþe gyrnuunge heortan his þu sealdest & willan welera his na bescyrodest hine þu forcome hine on bletsunge swetnesse þu setest on heafod his cynehelm of stanan dyrwyrþra lif he bæd æt þe þu sealdest him langnesse dagan mycel wuldor his on hæle þinre wuldor & mycel wlite þu asets ofer hine þu sylst hine on bletsunge on woroldda ðu geblissas hine on blisse cininc hopaþ & on milheortnesse þæs hyhstan na beo astyrud si gemet hand þin eallan feondan þinan swyþre þin gemette ealle þa þe hatodon god min besceawa me hwi þu me forlete feor fram hæle minre word scylda minra god min ic clypie þurh dæg & na gehyrest & on niht & na to unwisdome me þu witodlice on halinese eardast lof on þe hihtan fæderas ure hihtan & þu lysdest hi to þe clypodon & hale gedone synd on þe hihtan & na synd gescynd ic witodlice eom wyrm & na man hosp mannan & aworpennes ealle geseonde me specende synd weleras & hrysodon hæfod he hihte on drihten he alysde hine hal deþ hine forðan wyle hine gerecþ me & naht me wana bið on stowe fosternoþes ðar me he gestaþolaþ ofer wæter gereordunge he fedde me sawle mine gecyrde he lædde me ofer wegas rihtwisnesse for naman his witodlice gif ic gange on middan scæde deaþes na dræde yfel forðan þu mid me eart gyrd þin & stæf þin hi me frefrodan þu gearwodest on gesyhþe minre beod ongean þa þa drefað me þu mæstest on ele hæfod min & drencfæt drunccende & mildheortnesse þin fylgeð me eallan is eorþe & gefyllednes his ymbehwyrft eorþan & eale þa eardiað on hyre forþan he ofer sæ grundweallode & ofer flod gearwode hi hwylc astihð on muntas oþðe hwylc stynt on stowe halian his unscyldige handa & clænan heortan þa na afeng on idel sawle his na swor on facn nyhtan his þes afehþ bletsunga of drihtene & mildheortnesse fram gode hæle his þis is cneornes secende hine secende ansyne godes n undoþ gatu ealdras eoure & ahebbað gata ecelice & ingæþ cining wuldres hwæt ic þes cining wuldres strang & mihti mihti on gefeohte undoþ gata ealdras eowre & to þe ic ahebbe saule mine god min on þe ic hihte na beo ic & na bysmren me fund mine & witodlice ealle þa þa uphealdað þe na beon gescynd forsceanode ealle unrihtwisen donde ofer idele wegas þine ætyw me & siþfatu þine lær me gerece me on soþfæstnesse þinre & lær me forðam þu ert god hælen min & þe ic geþylgode ælle dæ gemildsunga mildsunga þinra & mildheortnesse þinre þa on worolde synd scylda iuguþe minre & nytenyste mine na gemun þu neh þinre mildheortnesse gemyn min þu for godnesse þinre swete & rihtwis forþan æ gef þam angyltendum on wege he gerecð bilewitte on dome he læreð geðwære wegas his dem me drihten forþan ic on ynscyldinese minre ic inga & on drihten hihtende na ic untrymige fanda me hlaford & costa me bærn ædran mine & heortan mine forþam mildheornesse þin beforan egan minan is & ic gelicode on soþfæstnese þinre ic na sæt mid geþæhte idelnesse & mid unrihte donde na ic inga ic hatode somnunge awyriede & mid arlæsan na sæt ic þwæ betwyx unscyldigum handa mine & ymbseylle weofed þin þæt ic gehyre stefne lofes & bodige hlaford ic lufede wlite huses þines & stowe eardunge wuldres þines na forleos mid arleasan sawle mine & mid weran blode lif min onlyhtnes min & hæl min þone ic dræde gescyld lifes fram hwam ic forhtige þone neahlæcaþ ofer me derigende þæt etaþ flæsc mine þa swencað me fynd mine hy geuntrumod synd & feollan gif standaþ togenes me werod na adræt heorte min gif arist togenes me gefeoht on þam ic hihte an ic bæd fram þæt ic gyrde þæt ic eardige on huse drihten ealle dagas lifes mines þæt ic geseo willan drihtenes tempel his forþan behydde me on eardungstowe his on dæ yfelra he scylde me on digolnesse earddunga his on stane upahof me & nu ahof hæfod min ofer fynd mine ic embega & ic ofrige on earddunga his lac stefne ic singe & sealmas ic cweþe drihtene gehyr hlaford stefne mine þa ic clypige milsa me & gehyr me þe sæde heorte min ic sohte þe ansyn min ansyn þin ic sece na acyr ansyne þine fram me na ahyld on yrre fram ðeowan þinan fylstend min beo þu drihten na forlæt minan & na forseh me god hælo min to þe ic clypige god min na swiga þu fram me astigende on seaþ gehyr stefne bene minre þonne ic bidde to þe þonne ic hebbe handa mine to temple halian þinan na samod þu syle me mid synfullan & mid wyrcendum unrihtwisnesse na forspil þu me þa specaþ sibbe mid nyxstan his yfel soþlice on heortan heora syle him weorc arleasa nearaþancum æfter weorca handa heora gild heom edlean heora him na hi ongeatan weorc drihttenes & on weorca handa his tobrec hi & na getimbra hi gebletsod god forþam he gehyrde stefne bene mire drihten fylst min & frofer min on him hiht heorte min & gefultumod ic eom & bleow flæcs min & of willan minan ic andette him stranga folces his & frofer hal do folc þin & bletsa erfwerdnes þin & gerece hi & ahefe hi oþ on ecnesse bringaþ drihtene sunu godes bringað bearn ramma bringaþ wuldor & wyrðmynt bringaþ drihtene wuldor naman his gebiddaþ on healle halire his stefne ofer wætera god mæþrymmes swegde drihten ofer wæteras managa stefne on strenþe on gemyclunga forbrecende cedertreow & forbrit drihten & forgnidæt hi swa cealf & leofne ealswa sunu anhyrne toscædende is leg fyres hrysigende westen & astyraþ drihten westen gearwigende heortas & awrihð & on temple his ealle cweþað wuldor ic ahæbbe drihten forþan þu afenge me na þu na tobræddest fynd mine ofer me hlaford god min ic clypode to þe & þu hældest me þu alæddest fram helle saule mine þu hældest me fram nyþerstigendum on seaþ singaþ drihtene is & andetaþ gemynd halinesse his forþam on æbylinesse his & lif on willan his on æfen wunaþ wop & on morgen blis ic witolice cweþe on genihtsumnesse minr na beo ic astyrud on ecnesse on willan þinan þu gearwodest of wlite minre strenðe þu acyrdest ansyne þine fram me & gedon eom gedrefed to þe hlaford i clypige & to drihtene minan ic gebidde on þe ic hihte na ic gescynd beo on ecnesse on rihtwisnesse þinre alys me ahyld to me earan þine efest þæt þu nera me beo me gescyld & on huse rotnesse þæt hal me do strengþ min & frofer min eart þu & for naman þinan lædest me & þu feddest me þu læddest me of grine þa hi digelodan me forðam þu eart scyld min on handa þinra ic betæce gast minne þu alysdest me god soþfæstnese þu hatoddest healdende idelnesse ofer unnyt ic witolite on drihten hihte ic fægnige & blissige on mildheortnesse þinre forþan þu gesege eadmodnesse mine hældest of nede saule minre na þu na beluce on handa feonda þu gesettest on stowe rumre fet mine eadi þæra þa forgifene synd unrihtwinesa & þæra bewrogene synna eadi wer þa na ætwit synna na is on gaste his fac forþam ic swigode on ealdinge ban mine þonne ic clypude ealle dæg forþam dæg & nihte gehefegod is ofer me han þin gehwyfed ic eom on angnesse minre þonne biþ tobrocen hrig scylde mine cuþne þe dyde & rihtwisnes min na bewreah ic cwæþ ic andette togenes me on unrihtwisnesse minre & þu forgeafe arlæsnesse for þys gebæd to þe ealle on tide geþyllicre þehhwæðere on flode wætera manigra to him na nealæcaþ þu eart frofer min a gedrefednesse þa ymbesealde me blis min alys me fram ymbesyllendum me andgyt þe do & ic lære þe on wege þam þa ðu ingæst ic getrymme ofer þe egan mine nelle þu gewyrþan swa hors & mulas þam na is andgyt on geahle & bridle ceacan heora gebint þa ne to genealæcaþ þe fægniaþ rihtwise on drihten rihtwisan gerisæð herung andetaþ drihtene on hearpan on saltere tynstrengan singað him singaþ him sang niwne wel singað him on stefne wyndreama forþam riht is wor gode & ealle weorc his on geleafan he lufaþ mildheortnesse & dom mildheortnes drihtenes ful is eorþe word godes heofenes getrymede synd & gast muþe his ealle mæg heora gesomnigen swa on bytte wætera sæ settende on golhord grundas ondræde eal eorþe fram him witodlice beon astyrude ealle oneardende ymbehwyftes he cwæð & gedone synd he bebead & gesceapene synd ic bletsige drihten on eallan tidan æfre lof his on muþe minan on drihten bið herod sawel min gehyran þa geþwæran & blissian gemycliað drihten mid me & upahebbað naman his on þæt sylfe ic sohte drihten & he gehyrde me & of eallan geswican minum he nerede me neahlæcað to him & ge beoð alyhte & ansyne eowre na forwyrð þes þærfa clypede & gehyrde hine & of eallan geswincan his alysde asende engel drihtenes on embehwyrfte adrædendra hine & he alyseþ hi abyriaþ & geseoð wynsum is drihten eadi wer þa hihtæþ on him dem derigende me oferwin onwinnende me grip wæpn & scyld & aras on fultum me ageot flana & beluc togeanes hi þa ehtað me cweþ sawel minre hæle þin ic eom gescæmigen & wandien þa secað sawle mine sin gecyrred on bæc & forwyrðan þencende me yfel gewyrðan swa dust beforan ansyne windes & engel gewyrðe weg heora þystre & slidernes & engel drihtenes ehtende heora gife hyddon me on forwyrd grines heora ofer idelnes hi hyspton saule mine cume him grin þæt hi na gecnawan & gegrip þane hi hydan gegripe hi & on grin fælle sawel min blissode & lustfullude ofer hæle his cwæ þe unrihtwisa þæt he agulde on sylfum him na is ege godes beforan egan his dyde on gesyhðe his þæt he gemette unrihtwisnese his & hatunga word muþes his unrihtwisnes & facn nolde understandan þæt he wel dyde unrihtwisnesse smægende is on incleofan his ætstod eallum wege na godum yfelnesse witodlice na hatode hlaford on heofenen mildheortnes þin & soþfæstnes þin oþ to genippan rihtwisnes þin swa munt godes dom þin deop swyþe men & nytena þu hælest hlaford swa swa ðu mænifyldst mildheortnesse þine god sunu witodlice manna on helunge fiðera þinra hihtað beoð druncnigende of genihtsumnesse huses þines & of burnnan willan þinre þu dreintes hi nele þu onhyrian on ða awyrigede donde unrihtwisnes forðan swa hig snellice adrugað & ealswa blæda wyrtta sona feallað hiht on drihten & do godnesse & earda on eorþan & þu gefed byst on estan his gelustfulla on drihten & he gifð þe wilnunga heortan þinre awreoh drihtene weg þinne & hiht on hine & he deð & he lædet ealswa leoht rihwisnesse þine & dom þinne swa middæg underþeod beo þu drihtene & halsa hine nelle þu hyrian on him þa beoð gesundfullud on wege his on men donde unrihtwisnesse ablin fram yrre & forlæt hatheortnes nelle þu anhyrigan þæt ðu beo acursod forþan þa ðe wyrgeað beoð geterode uphealden witodlice drihten hi eorfwerddiaþ eorþan na on yrre þinan þræa me & na yrre þinan nyrwest me flana þine gefæstnode synd me & þu getrymdest ofer me hand ðine na is hæl on flæsce minan of andwlitan yrre þinre na is sib bannan minan of ansyne synna minan unrihwisnesse mine ofer heafod min swa byrþen hefig gehefegode synd ofer me rotodon wyrsodon dolhswaþo mine fram ansyne unwisnesse mire of yrmðan gedon & gedrefed eom oþ ende eal dæg unrotsod ic ineode forþan lendena mine gefyllede synd & na is hæl on flæce mina gebiged & geeadmed ic eom swyþe ic grymettede of geomerunge heortan minre ic gehealde wegas mine þæt ic na gylde on tungan minre ic sette muþe minan geheord þonne stande ic advmbude & geeadmed & ic swigode fram godum & sar min geniwod is ic hatode heorte min on me & on swmegung min byrnð swa fyr ic spæc on tungan minre cuð do me hlaford ende minne & gerim daga minra hwa is þæt wite hwæt wana si me efne gemet þu settest dagas mine & genihsumnes min ealswa naht bef swa þeah ungerim idelnes ælc man libbende swa þeah on anlicnesse forþgæð man sit he goldhordað & nat he hwam he gæderað þa & nuc hwa is andbid min hu nu & sped min beforan þe is fram eallan unrihtwisnesse minre nera me hosp unwisum þu sealdest me anbidigende ic anbad drihten & beheold me & he gehyrde bene mine & he lædde me of seþe yrmðe & of fenne drosna & he sæt ofer stan fet mine & gerehte stæppas mine & onsende on muð minum sang niwne lofsang gode ure gesegan maniga & ondredan & hihttan on drihten eadi wer þæs is naman drihtenes hiht his & na beseah on idelnese & on hwispræce lease maniga dydest þu god min wunder þin & geþancas þine na is hyl gelic bið þe ic bodode & specende eom gemænifælde synd ofer gerim onsægednesse & ofrung þu noldest earan witodlice fulfremedest me onsægednesse & for synnan na bæde þænne ic cwæþ efne ic cume on heafod bocan gewriten is of me þæt don willan þinne god min ic wolde & æ þine on middan heorta minre eadi þa angytað ofer ælþeodian & þearfan on dæg yuela alyseð hine drihten gehealt hine & liffest hine & eadi deð hine on eorðan & na sylþ hine on handa feoda his drihten speda bringeþ him ofer bed sarinesse ealle strælum his gecyrdest on seohnesse his ic cweþe drihten mildsa me hæl sawle mine forðan ic syngode þe fynd mine cwædan yfel me þænne swelteþ & forwyrð nama his & gif hi ingaþ þæt hi gesigan idelu gesprec heorte his hi gegæderada unrihtwisnesse him hi eodan ut ut & spæcan togeanes me bysmrodan ealle fynd mine togeanes me þohtan yfel me word unrihtwis ongen me cwyst þu þe slæpð na teohað þæt he arise ealswa wilnaþ heort to wylle wætera swa wilnað sawel min to þe god þyrststeð sawle minre to drihten wyl lifigende hwænne ic cume beforan ansyne godes wæran me tearas mine hlafas dæges & nihtes þon bið cweden me dæghwamlice hwar is god þin þas ic gemunde & ic ageat on me sawle mine forðam ic ga on stowe geteldes wundyrlices oð to huses godes on stefne blise & andetnesse sweg wistfullend forhwi unrot eart þu sawel min forhwi drefst þu me hiht on god forðan ic andette him hæle anwlitan mine & god min fram me sylfan sawel min gedrefed is forþan gemyndi ic beo þin of eorþan n n fram monte medmycel deopnes of deopnesse oncigaþ on stefne wæterædran þinra ealle heage þine & flod þin ofor me ferdan on dæge bebead drihten mildheortnesse his & niht sang his mid me gebed god lifes mines dem me god & toscæd intinge mine of ðeode na halire fram men unrihtwisum & facfullan nera me forþan þu eart god strenð min forhwi me anyddest & forhwi unrot ic ga ðonne swenð me feond asend leoht þin & soðfæstnesse þine hi me lædon & togelædon on munt haligne þinne & on earddunge þinre & ic inga to weofæde godes to drihtene þa geblissað ieogoðe mine ic andette þe on hearppan god god min hwi unrosast sawel min & forhwi drefst me hiht on god forðam gyt ic andette him hæle ansyne mine & god min hand þin ðeoda forspilde & þu plantodes hi þu swenctes folc & utanyddest na soþlice on sweorde his settan eorðan & earm heora na hælde hi ac swyðre þin & earm þin & onlyhtinge andwlitan þines forðam gelicode on heo þu eart þe sylfa cining min & god min þa bebeodest hæle n on þe fynd ure we awindwiað hor & on naman þinan we forhicgaþ onrisende on us na witodlice on bogan minan hihte & swyrd min na hælð me þu hældest witodlice us fram swencedum us & hatigende us þu gescyndest on god we beoþ herode ealle dæg & on naman þinan we andettaþ on worolde belcette heorte min word god ic cweþe weorc mine cininge tunge min writincfeþer boceras hrædlice writende wliti hiw for bearna manna togoton is gyfu on weleran þinum forþan bletsode þe god on ecnesse ymbegyrdan swyrde þinan ofer þeoh þinan riclicost wlite þin & fægernes ðin behead gesyndfullice forðgewit & rixsa for soþfætnesse & geþwærnesse & rihtwisnes & gelædeþ þe wunderlice swyþre þin flana þine scearpe folc under þe fællaþ on heortan feonda cininga setl þin god on worolde gyrd riht gyrd rices þines þu lufedest rihtwisnes & hatodest unrihtwisnesse forþan smyrude þe god þin ele blisse for gehlytan þinan n n n of hrægele þinan of stæppum elpendbana of þam gelustfullodan ure frofer & mægn fultum on drefednesse þa gemetan us swyþe forþan na ondrædað we donne bið dreued eorþe & beoð borene muntas on heortan sæs swegdon & gedrefede synd wæter heora gedrefede synd muntas on strenðe his flod onræs geblissað ceaster godes halgað eardunga his þu hyhsta god on middan his na bið astyrud gefultumaþ hie morhgen dæired gedrefede synd þeoda & ahylde synd rica sealde stefne his astyrud is eorþe mægen mid us anfeng n cumaþ & geseoþ weorc þa he sette þæt foretacn ofer eorþan ealle þeoda blissiaþ handum dremað god on stefne blisse drihten hehsta bregendlic cinin mycel ofer ealle eorþam underþyd folc us & þeoda under fota ure geceas us erfwerdnesse his hiw n þa he lufede astah god on wyndream drihten on stefne byman singað gode uran singaþ singað cininge uran singað forðam cining ealre eorþan god singað wærlice rixsað god ofer þeoda sit ofer setlt hali his mycel drihten & herigendlic swyþe on ceastre on munte upahafennesse ealra eorðan mutes n sidan norþdæles ceastre cininges mycellæs god on stæppum his biþ gecnawen þonne he afehð hig efne ciningas gegæderode synd & somne coman on an hi geseonde sic wundrudan gedrefede synd astryrude synd fyrhto gegrap hi þar sar swa eacniende on gast swiþlicu forbrytte scyp n swa we gehyrdan swa gesegan on ceastre drihtenes mægna on ceastra god gestaþolode hi on ecnesse gehyraþ þas ealle þeoda earan onfoþ ealle þa bogiaþ ymbe & ge eorðware & sunu manna on an rice & ðearfan min spycð wisdom & smægyng heortan minre snoternesse ic ahylde on bigspel earan mine ic openige on saltere race mine forhwi ondræde ic on dæg unrihtwisnes spuran mine ymbesealdan me þa þe truwiaþ on mæg heora & on mycelnesse welan heora wuldriað broþer nalyseð alyseð man na gif gode gecwemnesse his & wyrð alysednesse sawle his & he swanc on ecnesse spæc & clypede eorþan of sunnan upspinge oþ setlgange hiw wlites god openlice cymð god ure na swigað fyr on ansyne byrnð & on embehwyrfte his hreohnes swyðe toclypude heouenas of ufan & eorþan he tosceod folc his gesomniað him halie his þa endebyrdon cyþnesse his ofer ofrunga & cyþað heofenas rihwisnesse his forðan god dema is gehyr folc min & ic spece & ic cyþe þe þin ic eom na on ofrunga þina ic þreage þe lac witodlice þin on ansyne minre na ic afo of huse þinan cealfas & na of heorde þinre buccan sealm þes fif andgyt mildsa me me god neh þinre myclan mildheortnesse & æfter mængo mildsynga þinre adylega unrihtwisnesse mine ma aþweh me fram unrihtwisnes minre & of synnan minan clænsa me unrihwisnesse mine ic gecnawe & synne mine beforan me is æfre þe anan ic syngode & yfel beforan þe ic dyde þæt du beo gerihtwisod on spæce þinre & þu oferswiðe þonne ðu dæmed eart efne soþlice on unrihtwisnesse geeacnod ic eom & on synnan afeng me moder min efne soþlice soþfæstnes þu lufedest ungewise & digole wisdomes þines þu swutolodest me þu stred me issopum & ic beo geclænsod ðu wæxst me & ofer snaw ic beo ablicen on naman þinan halne me do & on mihte þinre dem me gehyr gebed min earan onfoh word muþes mines forþam fremde onrisan togean me & strange sohtan sawle mine & na forsetton god beforan ansyne his efne witodlice gefylstæþ me drihten andfenc sawle minre acyr yuel of feondan minan on soþfæstnesse þinre forspil hi willodlice ic ofrige þe ic andette naman þinne hlaford forðan god is of eallum geswince þu generedest me & ofer fynd mine gelocude egan mine gehyr god gebed min & na forseoh bed min beheald me & gehyr me geunrotsud ic eom on geswince minan & gedrefed eom of stefne feondes & of geswencednesse synfulles forþam hi ahyldan on me unrihtwisnesse & on yrre hefimode hi wæran me heorte min gedrefed is on me & fyrhto deaþes feol ofer me ege & fyrhto com ofer me & bewrugan me þystra & ic cweþe hwylc gyfð me feþera swa culfre & ic fleo & ic reste efne ic afeorrude fleonde & ic wunude on westtene ic anbidode hine þe halne me dyde fram medmiclum gast & hreohnesse mildsa me god forþam fortredde me man ealne dæi on feohttende drefde me fortreddon me fynd mine ealne dæi forþam mycle feohtende togeanes me fram heahnes ic adræde ic witodlece on þe hihte on god ic herige spræce mine on god ic hihte na ic adræde hwæt doþ me flæs ælle dæg word mine hi onscunodon ongean me ealle geþancas heora on yuel onearddiaþ & behydaþ hi hoh minne begymað swa anbidode sawel min for nahte hale þu dest hi on yrre folc þu forbrihst god lif min ic cyþe þe þu settest tæras mine on ansyne þinre swa & on behæse þinre milsa me god min forðam on þe hihteð sawel min & on scæde fiðera þinra ic hihte oþþæt forðfare unrihtwisnes ic clypie to gode þam hyxtan god þa wel dyde me he sende of heofenan & alysde me geaf on hosp þa fortreddan me sende god mildheortnesse his & soþfæstnesse his & alysde sawle mine uphefe ofer heofenas god & on eallan eorþan wvldor þin grina hi gearwodon fotan minan & hi gebigdon saule mine dulfa beforan ansyne minre pyt & hi infeollan on þa gearo heorte min god gearo ic singe & sealm ic cweðe aris wuldor min sealmleof & hearpanswei ic uparise on dæire gif soþlice witodlice rihtwisnes ge specan rihte demað sunan mannan & witodlice on heortan unrihtwisnes ge weorcaþ on eorþan unrihtwisnes handa eowra syrwað fremede synd synfulle of innoðe hi dwelodan of innoþe hi spæcan facn yrre his æfter gelicnesse nædran swa nædran dumbe & forclicced earan hera þa na gehyrað stefne ongalendra & ættrene ongalendra for wisum god forbryteð teþ heora on muðe heora geahlas leona tobricþ to nahte becumað swa wæter yrnnende gebyið bogan his oþþæt oþ hit bið geuntrumed swa wex þa mylt beoþ aferrode oferhreas fyr & na gesegan nera me of feondan minnan & fram arisende on me alys me nera me of wyrcende unrihtwisnesse & of weran blode hæl me forþam efne hi þrihtan sawle mine onhryran on me strange & na unrihtwisnes min & na syn min butan unrihwisnesse ic arn & gereh wæs aris fæder on geanryne minan & geseoh & þu god mæina god geleaffulra beheald to geneosende ealle þeoda na þu mildsast eallan þa wyrcað unriht sin gecyrrede to æfene & hunger hy þolian swa hundas & ybbeyrnað ceastra efne specað on muþe hyra & swurd heora hwylc gehyrde & þu drihten hyspest hi to nahte ealle þeoda god þu anyddest us & tobræce us yrre is & gemilsiend is us þu astyrudest eorþan & gedrefdest hi hæl gedrefædnessa his forþam astyrud is þu ætywdest folce þinan hearde drenctest us wine onbrydnesse þu sealdest dredendum þe tacuga þæt syn þæt syn alysed þa acorne þine halne do swyþre þin & gehyr me god specende is on halgan his ic blissige & todæle byrþene & hole dene eardyng min is wæstmbærnes strannes heafdes mines christus cining min gehyr god gebed min beseoh to gebede mines fram gemæran eorþan to þe ic clypige þa geangsummed wæs heorte min on stan upahofe me þu lædest me forþam gedon is hiht me stypel strangnesse of ansyne feonda ic onearddige on earddunge þinre on worolde ic beo sceylddent on wreohgelsse fiþera þinra þu min þu gehyrddest gebed min þu sealdest erfwerdnesse drædende naman þinne dagas ofer dagas cinincges geic gear his oþ on dæg þurhwunað on ecnesse on gesyhðe godes mildheortnesse & soþfæstnesse his hwylc seceþ swa sealmas ic cweðe naman þinum þæt ic agylde behæse of dæge on dæi hunu underþeod byþ sawel min of him soþlice hæle mine & he god min & hælo mine gefylstend min na beo astyrud ma hu lange yrsige on men ge ofsleaþ ungerim eow swa wage onhyldum stangæderunge gecyssed þehhwæðere wyrð min hi þohtan anydan ic arn on þurst muðe heora þehhwæþere gode underþeod beo þu sawel min of him geþyld min forþam he god min & hælend min fulttum min na afeorrige on gode hæle min & wuldor min god fylst min & hiht min on gode is hihtað on him ealle gesomnung folcces ageotað beforan him heortan eowre god min to þe of leohte ic wacie þyrst on þe sawle minre manfealdlice þe flæs min on eorþan westtene & on weige & on wæterirum swa on halgan ætywde þe þæt ic gesawe mæin þin & wuldor þin forðam betere is milheortnes þin ofer lif weleras mine heriað þe swa ic bletsige þe on liue minan & on naman þinan ic uphebe handa mine swa fæt gefyled saule mine & weleras upahafenesse heriaþ muð min swa gemundi ic wæs þin ofer bed min on dæred ic smæge on þe forþam þu wære fultum min & on wreogelse fiðera þinra ic blissige togeþeodde sawle min æfter þe me anfeng swyðre þin gehyr god gebed min þæn ic spece of ege feondan alys sawle mine þu bewrige me fram gemetinge wyrgendra of mænigum wyrcendra unrihtwisnesse forþam hi hwettan þæt swyrd tungan heora hi beheoldan bogan biter þæt hi scotian on digolnesse unwemme sona scotiaþ hine & na ondrædað hi getrymdon him word hi geteohodan þæt hi hyddon grina hi cwædon hwylc sihð hi hi scrudnodon unrihtwisnesse hi geterodan scrudniende scrdnunge genehlæhte man & heorte heahre & bið upahauen god stræla lytlinga gedone synd wita heora & geuntrumed synd ongean hi tuncge heora gedrefede synd synd ealle þa gesegan hi þe geriseþ lof god on heahnese & þe biþ agolden behæs on gelæfullan gehyr gebed min to þe ealle flæsc cummað word unrihwisra ricsodan ofer us & arleasnæse ure þu mildsodest eaddi þone þu gecure & fenge oneardad on eardunga þinre we beoþ gefyllede on godum hus þin hali is tempel þin wunddorlic on efnesse gehyr us god hælu ure hiht ealra enda eorþan & on sæ feor gærowende muntas on mæine þinra begyrd anweald þu drefst deopnesse sæ son yþa his beoþ gedrefede þeoda & adrædaþ heriað god ealle eorþan sælm cweþað naman his gifað wuldor lofe his cweþað gode hu egeslicu synd weorc þine on manifealdnesse mænes þines leogað þe fynd þine ealle eorþan wyrþiað þe & singað þe sealm ic singe naman þine cumaþ & geseohð weorc godes egeslic on on geþeahtunge ofer sunu manna þe gecyrde sæ on drignise on flode he oferfor fotan þar we blissiaþ on þæt sylue se wyldeð on mæine his on ecnesse egan his ofer þeodan gelociaþ se on yrre forðgæð na beoð onhafen on heom sylfan bbetsiaþ ðeda drihten urnne & hlystað doþ stefne lofes his þa geset saule mine to liue & na sealde on styrunge fotan minan mildsige us & gebletsi us onlyhteþ ansyne his ofer us & þæt we gecnawan on eorþan wei þinne on eallan deoda hælo þine geandettun þe folc folc ealle blissian & fæinien demst folc unrihwise & þeode sealde wæsmas his bletsige us god ure bletsige us god & andrædan hine ealle endas eorþan arise god & syn todræued fynd his & fleon þa ðe hatodan hine of ansyne his swa geteorode smic hi geteorian ealswa flewð wex of ansyne fyres swa forwyrþen synfylle of ansyne godes & rihwise wistfullian & blissiað on ansyne & gladiað on blisse singaþ gode sealmas cweþaþ naman his siþfæt him þa astah ofer westdæl drihten nama blissiað on ansyne his beoþ gedrefede of ansyne his fæder steopcilda & dema wydewan god on stowe halire his god erddian deþ anes mddes on huse se alædeð gebunddene on strengðe gelice þa þe forðgeciað þa earddiaþ on byrgene þonne þu utgæst on ansyne folcces þines þone þu færst on westtene eorþe astyrud is is & soþlice heofene dropan of ansyne halne me do god forþam oneodan wætera oþ to sawle minre afæstnod ic eom on lime deopan & na is sped ic com of deopnesse on sæs & hreohnis besencte me ic swanc clypiende hase gewordene synd goman mine geteorudan egan mine þonne ic hihte on god mine gemanifulde synd ofer loccas heafdes mines þa hatodon me swyþe gestrangodde synd þa ehtað me sawle mine on unrihlice þa ic na reafode þa ic tolysde god þu wast unwisdom minne & leastras mine þe na synd behydde na sceamian on me þanbidiað hlafvrd mæina na forwyrþan ofer me þa secaþ þe god geleaffulra forþam forðe þe ic forbær hosp bewreh forwanddunge ansyne mine fremde don ic eom broþran minan & ælþeodi sunu moder minre fultum minne beheald hlafurd to fylstende me efst gescæmian & forwandian þa secaþ sawle mine sin gecyrred underbæc & areoddian þa wyllaþ me yfel sin gecyrred sona reodiende þa cweþað me egele beon upahafene & blissian on þe ealle þa secað þe & cweþan æfre si gemyclod þa luuiað hæle þine ic soþlicce wædla & þærfa god fylst me gefylsta min & alysend min beo þu hlafurd na lata þu on ðe god ic hihte na ic forwyrðe on ecnesse on rihtwisnesse þinre alys me & nera me anhyld to me earan þine & hæl me beo me on gode gescylden & on stowe getrummed þæt halne me don trymnes min & frofer min eart þu god min nera me of handa synfulran of handa ongean æ donde unrihtwisnes forþan þu eart geþyld min hiht min of geohgeþe minre on þe getrymmed ic eom of wambe moder minre þu eart frofer min on þe sang min æfre swaswa foretacn gedon ic eom manegum & þu fylstend strang si gefylled muð min of loue þæt ic singe wuldor þe ælle dæi mycelnesse þine na wyrp þu me on tide ylde þonne ateorað mæin min na forlæt me god dom þin cinige gif & rihtwisnes þin sunu cininges demað folce þinan on rihwisnesse & þearfan þine on dome onfon muntas sibbe folc & beoregas rihtwisnes demaþ þearfan folces & hale he deð bernna þearfan & geadmed hyspende & þurhwunude mid sole & ær leohte dun astah swa ren on flys & swa dryppende ofer eorþan asprinð on dagum his riht & genihtsumnes sibbe oþ wan hauen mone & wealt of sæ oð to sæ & fram flode oþ gemæra ymbehwyrftes eorþan beforan him fælleð silhærwan & fynd his eorðan licciaþ hu god geleaffulra god þam þa rihwise synd mine witodlice nean astyrude synd fet nean agotene synd stæppas mine forþam æfæstgode ofer unriht sibbe synfulre geseonde forþam na is deade hera & trymnes on wunda heora on geswince manna na synd & mid mannan na beoð geswungene forðam nam hi ofermodnes oferwrigene synd forþresde ealswa of fætnesse unrihtwisnes heora hi ferdon on tosettednesse heortan hi ðohton & specende synd nið on unrihtwisnesse on heahnesse specende synd hi setton on heofenan muð heora & tungan heora for on eorþan to hwan god þu anyddest us on ende yrre is hathortnes þin ofer scap heorde þinre gemun heordde þinre ða þu gescoppe of frymðe þu alysdest gyrd eorfwerdnesse þinre munt n on þam ðu earddudest ahefe han þine on ofermodinesse heora on ende hu fæla awyride is fynd & gewuldrude synd þa hatodon þe on middæle hi setton tacna heora & na gecneowan swa on wege ofer heahne swa on wydu treowa æxsa forheowan dyra his on þæt sylfe on mattucce & adesan hi vtawvrppan hi hi onealddedan fyre halira þinan on eorþan hi besmitan earddungastowa naman þines hi cwædan on heortan heora cyððe heora betwyx ealle dagas syml godes of eorþan tacn ure na gesegon nu io na is witega & we na ancnawaþ ma we andettaþ þe god & we clypiaþ naman þinne ic cyþe wyndra þine ðonne ic fo tid ic rihtwisnesse deme gemolten is eorþe & ealle þa eardiað on hyre ic gefæstnode sweras his ic cwæþ unrihtwisan nelle ge unriht don & agylttendum nelle ge upheban hor nelle ge heorn eowerne specan togenes drihtene unrihwisnesse na fram eastdæle & na fram westdæle na fram westene munta forðam god dema is þysne geeadmed & þysne ahefð forðan calic on handa drihtenes win clænes ful gemenged & onhylda of þys on þys witolice dræstan his na is onidlude drincað ealle synfulle eorþan cuþ on iudum god n mycel nama his gedon is on sibbe stow his wunung his on n þar forbryt mihtige bogan scyld swyrd & gefeoht onlyhtende þu wvnderlice fram munta ece gedrefede synd ealle unwisa heortan hi slepan swefnum his & naþinc coman eale weras welena on handa heora fram þreaunge þinre god n hi hnapudan foþan astigan hors þu egeslic eart & hwylc wiðstandeð þe on yrre þinan of heofenan gehyran þu dydest dom eorþe adred & reste stefne minre to drihtene ic clypude stefne min gode & he behealded me in dæi geswinces mines god ic sohte manibus minan nihtes beforan him & na beo bepæht wiþsoc beon gefrefrod sawel min gemyndi ic wæs godes & gelustfullude & ic worhtte & ateorode gast min toforan setton wæcan egan minan gedrefed ic eom & na eom specende ic þohte dagas ealde & gearas ece on mode ic hæfde & ic gemyndi eom nihtes mid heortan minre & ic swanc & windwodwe gast minne cwyst ðu on ecnesse awyrpþ na geteohie þæt gecweme si nugyt oþ on ende mildheornes þin astliteþ of cneornesse on cneornesse on onginne þeosas sealmas specð god æfterþon mid recondlicum dælungan todælð begymaþ folc min æ mine onhyldað earan eowre on word muþes mines ic openige on bigspellan muð minne spece forsetnesse of frymþe hu managa we gehyrdon & gecneowan þa fæderas ure us na synd dihle fram bearna heora on cynrene oþra cyþende lof drihtenes & mægn his & wundra his þa he dyde & he awehte cyþnesnes on n & æ sette on gelæffullan þa he bebead fæderan uran cuþe don hi suna his þæt gecnawe cynren oðra sunu þa cennað & hi arisað cyðað sunu his þæt hi setten on god hiht heora & na forgitan weorc godes & beboda his hi secen na gewyrðe swa fædera heora cynren þeor & þurh cyn þæt na gerehte heortan heora & na is gelyfæd mid gode gast his sunu begymende & sendende bogan hi gecyrrede sund on dæge gefeohtes coman þeoda on erfwerdnesse þinre hi besmitan tempel hali þin hi setton n on æpla gehorddene hi setton deadlican þewean þinra metas fugelum heofena flæs halira heora wilddeorum eorþan hi agutan blod heora swa swa wæter on embehwyrfte n & na wæs þa bebyride done we synd on hosp nehheburan uran þam þe on embehwyrfte ure synd hu lange drihten yrsast on ende bið anæled swa fyr yrre þin ageot yrre þin on þeoda þe þe na cuþan & on rica þa naman þinne na clypedon forþam ætan n & stowe his hi forleton na gemun unrihtwisnes ure ældra hraðe forsette us mildheortnes þinre forðan þearfan done we synd swyþe gefylst us god hælend ure fore wuldre naman þines alys us & gemildsod beo þu synnan ure for naman þinan on þyssan sælme n gebæd drihtenes tocyme þu þe reccest behæld þu þe lædest swa scæp n þa sittest ofer n mynegast beforan n n n awece anweald þinne & cumað hale don us god gecyr us & ætyw ansyne þine & we hale beoð drihten god mægen hu lange yrsast ofer gebeda ðeowan þinra þu m metsast us hlafe tearan & drenc gyfst us on tæran on mete þu settest us on wiðercwyþelnesse neheburan & fynd ure hyspton us god mægene gecyr us & ætyw ansyne þine & we beoð hale wingeardas of n þu lædest & awvrppe þeoda & plantudest þa blissiað god ad fultum ure singað god n nimað sealm & syllað hearpan saltere wynsum mid hearpan bymiað on him monðes byman on tacn dæges symbelnesse ure forðam bebod geleaffulra is & dom godes n cyþnes n sette þæt þa he eode of eorðan n tungan þa hi na gecneowan gehyrde he acyrde fram byrðena hriges his handa his on welegan þeowodan on geswince þu clypedest me & ic alysde þe ic gehyrde þe on digolnesse hreohnesse ic afandode beforan wæteran gehyr folc min & ic cyþe þe gif ðu gehyrst me stod on gesomnunge goda on middan god tocnawað hu lange demað ge unrihtwisnesse & onsyne syngendra genimað demað ealþeodium & wædlan eadmodne & þearfan rihwisiaþ neriaþ ðearfan & wædlan of handan synfulra alys me hi nyston & na understodan on þrystran hi gangað beoð astyrad ealle deopnesse eorðan ic cweþe godas ge beoð & bearn ðæs mæran ealle ge soþlice swa men ge sweltað & swa an of ealdran feallaþ aris god dem eorðam forðam ðu yrfwærdast on eallan þeodan god hwylc gelic bið þe ne swiga & na forhafa god forðam efne fynd þine swegdon & þa þe hatedon þe hi ahofan hæfod ofer folc þin yfelmyndan geþæht & þohtan togeanes halige þine hi cwædan cumað & ute tospillan hi & na byð gemunen nama ma hi þohton ongen þe cyþnesse todihtnedon geteld þara eorðlicra & synnehyrendra n n n n n ælþeodian mid eardigendum angsumnesse & soþlice n com mid him gedone synd on fylste bearnum n hu lufgendlic eardung þin mægna gewilnude & geteorude sawel min on cafertune drihtenes heorte min & flæsc min blissode on god lifigende & witodlice spærwe gemette him hus & turtle nest hyre ðer heo set briddas hyre weofed þin drihten mægna cining min & god min edige þa ða eardiað on huse þinan on worolde heriaþ þe eadig wer þæs þe is fultum fram þe upstige on heortan his tosette on dene tæra on stowe þa ðu settest & soðlice bletsunga he selð æ of mægne on mæin byþ gesawen god goda n hlaford god mægna gehyr bene earan opena god n þu bletsodest eorþan þine þu acyrdest gehæfte n þu forgeafe unrihtwisnesse folcce þinan þu oferwruge ealle synna heora þu geliðgodest ealle yrre þin ðu acyrdest fram yrre æbylinesse þinre gecyr us god helend ure & acyr yrre þin fram us on ecnesse þu yrsige us þu aðene yrre þin fram cynrene god þu gecyrrende geliffæst us & folc þin blissiað on þe etyw us hlaford mildheortnesse þine & hælo þine gif us ic gehyrde hwæt he spicð on me drihten god forþam he spicþ sibbe on folcce his & ofer halige his & on hi þa beoþ gecyrred to heortan anhyld earan þine & gehyr me forðam wædla & þearfa ic eom geheald sawle mine forðam halne do þeowan þinne god min hihtende on þe mildsa me drihten forðam to þe ic clypige ælne dæg blissa sawle ðeowan þines to þe saule mine ic ahof forþam wynsum & geþwære & swyðe mildheort eallan clypiende þe earan opena gebed min & begym stefne bene minre on dæg geswinces mines ic clypude to þe forþam ðu gehyrdest me na is gelic þe on godum & na is æfter weorce þinan ealle þeoda þa þu geworhtest cumað & gebiddað beforan þe & arwyrðiaþ naman þinne grundweallas his on muntan haligum lufað drihten geata ofer ealle earddunga iacobes wulderful gecwedene synd of þe ceaster godes gemyndi ic beo n n witende me efne ælðeodige & n & folc & silhearwan þa wæran on hyre cwæð man & man geboren is on hyre & he gestaþelode hi se hyhsta cyþde on gewrita folca & ealdra heora þa wæran on hyre swa blissigendra ealra eardigendra on ðe god hælo minre on dæg ic clypede & nihtes beforan þe ingæð on ansyne þinre gebed min onhyld earan þine to bene minre forþam gefullæd is yuel sawel min & lif min on helle neahlæhte gewened ic eom mid nyþerstigendum on seaþ gedon ic eom swa man butan fultume betweonan deadan freoh swa gewundvd slæpende on byrigene þæra na is gemynd ma & hi of handa þinre anydde synd hi asetton me on seaþe þam neoðeran on þystrum & on scæde deaþes ofer me gefæstnod is yrre þin & ealle þine þu læddest ofer me feor þu dydest cuþe mine fram me hi setton me onsceonuge him geseald ic eom & na uteodde mildheortnes on ecnesse ic singe on cynrene & forrecynrene ic bodige soþfæstnesse þine on muþe minan forþam þu cwæde on ecnesse mildheortnes bið getimbrod/ on heouenan bið gegearwod soþfæstnes þin on heom ic tosette cyþnesse gecorenan minan ic swor n þeowan minan oð on ecnesse ic gærwige sæd þin & ic timbrige on cynrene setl þin geandettað heofenan wundra þine & soþlice soþfæstnes þine on somnugga halira forþam hylc on genipum geefenlæceð gelic biþ on bearn godes god þa bið gewuldrud on geþehtte halira mycel & ondrædende ofer ealle þa on embehyrfte his synd hlaford mægna hwylc gelic þe mihti is & soþfæstnes þin on embehwyrfte frofer gedon is us on cneornesse ærþam muntas wæran oðe getrymmede wæran eorþan & embehwyrf a worolde & oþ on worolde þu eart god na acyr man on genyðerunge & þu cwæde gecyrrað sunu manna forþan þusend geara beforan egan þinan swa deg gyrstan þa forgewat & heordnys on niht þa for nahte synd gehæfde geara heora morgen swa wyrta gewitað mergen blewaþ & gewitaþ on æfen hreosað astifaþ & adrugað þi we geteoriað on yrre þinan & on hatheortnesse þinre gedrefede we synd þu asettest unrihtwisnesse ure on gesyhðe þinre worold ure onlyhting ansyne þinre forðam ealle dagas ure ateoriaþ & on yrre þinre we geteorodan gearas ure swa smædon se eardaþ on fultume þæs hyhstan on gescyldnesse godes heofenan wunað cwæþ anfeng min eart þu & frofer min god min ic hihte on hine forþam of grine huntendra & of wordde wiþerwyrddra on exlum his sceadewode þe & under fiðeran his þu hihtst scyld ymbesylþ þe soðfæstnes his na ondrætst of ege nihtlicra fram flana fleohgende on dæg fram gestreone þurhganggende on ðystran fram hryrre & deofle suþerne hi feallað fram sidan þinre þusend & tyn þusend fram swyþran þinre to þe witodlice na nealæcað hwæþere þeah egan þine þu besceawast & edlean synfulra þu gesyhtst forþan þu eart hiht min heahtsta þu settest frofer þin god is andetan & singan naman þinne þu hehsta to bodiende merien mildheortnesse þine & soþfæstnesse ðine þurh nihte on tynstrengum saltere mid cantice on hearpan forþam þu bliðgodest me on geweorce þinan & on wercum handum þinra ic blissige hu gemyclode synd weorc þine swyðe deope gedone synd geþohtas þine wer unwis na gecnæweð & dysi na ongyt þæt þon upasprincð synfulle swa heg & ætywdon ealle þa wyrceaþ unrihtwisnesse þæt hi forwyrþan on worolde þu witotlicce þe hyhtsta on ecnesse rixsode wliti gescryd is gescryd is strangnesse he begyrde hine & soðlice he getrymde enbehwyrð eorþan þa na bið astyrud geara setl þin þænne fram worolde ðu eart upahofan flodas stefne þinre upahofan flod fram stefne wætera manegra wunderlica ahafenesse sæs wunderlic on heahnese drihten cyþnesse þinre geleaflica gedone synd swyðe hus þin geriseð halines on langnes daga dyde ahefe þu ða demst eorðan edlean ofermodian hu lange synfulle hu lange synfulle wildriað bodiaþ & specaþ unrihtwisnesse spcaþ ealle þa wyrcaþ folc þin hi niðerodan & erfwerdnes þin hi drehton wydewan & wreccan hi ofslogon & stepcild hi cwæaldan & hi cwædan na gesyhð drihten na angyt god n ongitað unwise on folce & dysian oþerhwile angytað þa plantode earan na gehyrde oþþe se ðe hiwodan egan na besceawað cumað ute blissian drihtene drymaþ godæ hælende uran ute ofþriccan ansyne his on andetnesse & on sealman we forþam god mycel drihten & mycel ofer ealle godes forþam on handa his endas eorþan & heahnes munta his his is sæ & he worhte hi & drignesse handa his gelogude cumað uton gebiddan & aþenian & wepan beforan þa worhte us forþan he is god ure & we folc heorde his & sceap handa his todæg gif stefne his gehyrað nelle ge wiðheardian heortan eoura swa on gremminge æfter dæge costnunge on westene þar fandodan min fæderas eowre fandodan me & gesegan weorc mine singaþ cantic niwne eal eorþe singaþ & bletsiaþ his bodiað of dæge on dæg hælo his bodiað betwynan þeoda wuldor his on eallan folc wundra his forþam mycel & heriendlic swyðe þreclic is ofer ealle godas ealle godas ðeoda woddreamas drihten witodlice heofenas worhte andetnes & fægernes on ansyne his halines & myclung on halinesse his bringað drihtene eþelas þeodan wulddor & wyrþmynt wuldor naman his undoð duru & ingað on flet his gebiddaþ drihtene on flore haligan his sin astyrud fram ansyne his eall eorþe rixsað blissað eorþe gladiað iland manige genipa & hatnes on embehwyrfte his rihwisnes & dom gerecednes setles his fyr beforan him forðgæþ & onælð on embehwyrfte feonda his onlyhtan ligræscas his eorþan geseah & astyrud is eorðe muntas swa wex fleowan fram ansyne drihtenes eall eorþe bododon heofenan rihwisnes his & gesegan ealle folc wuldor his forwyrþað eall þa wyrþiað deofelgild þa ðe wuldriað on deofelgild heora gebiddaþ hine ealle englas his gehyrde & geblissod is n & fægnodan dohtra for dome þinan hlaford þu drihten þe hyhsta ofer ealle eorþan swyþe ahafen eart
