ofer ealle godas singaþ sang niwne forðan wvndra he dyde hælde him swyðre his & earm hali his cuþ dyde drihten hæle his on gesyhþe þeoda he awreh rihtwisnes his gemyndi he wæs mildheortnesse his & soðfæstnesse his huse n gesegan ealle gemæra eorþan hæle godes ure drymaþ drihtene ealle eorðan singað & blissiað & singað singað drihtene on hearpan & stefne sealma on byman lædendlice & stefne byman hyrnene drymað on gesyhðe cininges si astyrud sæ & fulnes his embehwyrf eorþan & þa erddiað on hyre flodas hafetað handa togædere montas blissodan wisansyne drihtenes com deman eorþan he demde ymbehwyrf eorþan on rihtwisnes & folc on efnesse rixsode yrsien folc þu þe sitest ofer bið astyrod eorþan on micel & mære ofer eal folc andeten naman þinne myclum & hali is & wyrðmynt cining dom lufaþ þu gearwodest efnesse dom & rihtwisse þu dydest uphebbað fæiniað god urne & gebide scæmel fota his forðam hali is on sacerdhade his & betweonan him þa gecigað naman hi hi cigdan drihten & he gehyrde hi on swyre genipes he spæc to him hi heoldan cyþnesse his & beboda þa he seald him hlafurd god ure þu gehyrdest hi god gemildsod þu wære him & wrecende on eallan heora upahebbað drihten god urne & gebiddað monte haliges his forþam drymað gode ealle eorþan þeowiað drihtene on blisse ingaþ/ on gesyhðe his on bliþnesse witaþ forþam drihten he is god he dyde us & na hine we folc his & sceap heorde his ingað onginneð godspelles cynnreccenisseboc cneurise haelendes cristes dauides sunu abrahames sunucende l gestrionde uutotlice cende soðlice cende & broðra hisec soð cende & of ðær byrig wutetlice cende soðlice cendewutotlice cende ec soð cende uutetlice cendesoðlice cende of ðæm wife uutetlice cende of ðæm wif ec soð cendecende ðone cining uutetlice cinig cende of ðære ðe ðy wæs uuries wifsoðlice cende ec soð cende uutetlice cendesoðlice cende uutetlice cende soðlice cendeec soðlice cende uutetlice cende soðlice cendeuutetlice cende soðlice cende soðlice cendeuutetlice cende & broðra his in ofercerr vel in ymbcerr vel in geliornisse babilones& æfter ymbcerr vel gefaellnisse babilones cende ec soð cendeuutetlice cende soðlice cende ec soð cendesoðlice cende uutetlice cende soðlice cendeec soð cende ec soð cende soðlice cendeuutetlice cende wer maries of ðaem gecenned l geboren is haelend ðe is genemned l geceyged cristalle forðon l cuðlice cneuresa from wið to cneuresua feowerteno & from wið to forworpnise l ymbcerr l oferfaer babilones cneuresua feowerteno & from ymbcerr l from oferfaer babilones wið to crist cneuresua feowertenoonginneð godspell æfter matheuscristes soðlice cynnreccenise vel cneuresuu suæ vel ðus wæs miððy wæs biwoedded vel beboden vel befeastnad vel betaht moder his aer ðon hia gegeadradon vel gecuomun bigetten vel infunden wæs vel is in hrif hæfde of halig gaastioseph cuðlice uer hire miððy wæss soðfæst & nalde hea gebrenge l gelæda ah he walde deiglice forleitta hea l ða ilcaðas soðlice ðe he ðencende l ðohte ða cuom heno engel drihtnes in suoefnum l in slepe ætdeaude him cueð l sægde ðus ðu ioseph sunu dauides nelle ðu ðe ondrede l forht bian to onfoanne maria gebede l geoc ðin þæt forðon in ðær l in ðæm acenned is of gast halig isgecennes wotetlice sunu & geceig ðu l genemne ðu noma is haelend ðe ilca ec l forðon hal doeð l/ he gewyrcas folc his from synna hioraðis soðlice all geworden is vel gewearð þætte sie gefylled þæt ðætte gecueden is from drihtne ðerh ðone witgo cuoeðendeheonu hehstald in hrif sceal habba l hæfis & gecennes sunu & hia geceiges noma his ðæt is getrahtet mið us godaras weotetlice iosep of slepe gedyde suæ geheht him engel drihtnes & onfeng gebed his& ne cuðe l ne cunnade hea l ða ilco wið l ða huile gecende sunu hire frumcende & ceigde noma his hælendmiððy ecsoð gecenned were haelend in ðær byrig in dagum herodes cyninges henu vel honu/ ða tungulcraeftga of east dael cwomun to hierusalemhia cwoedon vel cuoeðende huer is ðe accenned is cynig iudeana gesegon we forðon sterra vel tungul his in eastdæl & we cuomon to worðianne hinegeherde wiototlice herodes ðe cynig gedroefed wes & alle ða hierusolimisca vel ða burgwæras mið him& gesomnade alle ða aldormenn biscopa vel mesapreasta & uðuutta ðæs folces georne gefraignade vel geascade vel gefrasade from him huer crist accenned weresoðlice hia vel ða saegdon him suæ forðon awritten is ðerh ðone witgo& ðu bethlem eorðu unðærfe ðing lyttel arð in aldormonnum iudæs from ðe forðon ofcymes aldormon vel latua ðe ricses folc minða heroðes deglice geceigde tungulcræftiga georne vel innweardlice gelearnade from him tid stearres ðy ætdeawude him& sende ða ilca in bethleem cweð gaes & gefraignes innueardlice of ðæm cnæht & miððy ge infindes eft sæcgas me þæt & ic cymo to worðianne hineða ðe miððy geherdon ðone cyning geeadon & heno stearra ðy gesegon in eastdæl foregeeade hea wið þæt miððy cuom gestod ofer ðer vel hwer wæs ðe cnæhtgesegon wiotetlice stearra gefagen weron glædnisse miclo suiðe& inneadon hus gefundun ðone cnæht mið maria moder his & niðer gefeallon geworðadun hine & untyndon striona hiora gebrohton him ðinga l geafa gold cursumbor & recels& ondsuere onfeing in suefnum þæt hia eft ne cerdon vel ne cerrde to herode ah ðerh oðer woeg eft gecerrdon in oeðel vel lond hioraða ðe miððy eftgewoendon heonu engel drihtnes aetdeaude in soefne ioseph cuoeð aris & onfoh vel genim ðone cnaeht & moder his & fleh in ægypt & wæs ðu ðer wið ðon miððy ic ðe cuoeðo vel sægo ðe geworden wæs vel woen is forðon þæt heroðes soecas ðone cnæht to fordoanne vel to forlosanne hineðe aras onfeng ðone cnæht & moder his in næht & eftgewoende in ægypt& wæs ðer wið to geliornisse herodes þæt were gefylled þæt gecueden wæs from drihtne ðerh ðone witgo cuoeðende from ægipt ic ceigde suona minða herodes gesægh forðon bisuicen vel bilyrtet wæs from dryum vel tungulcræftgum urað wæs suiðe & sende ofslog alle cnaeht ða ðe weron in ðær byrig & in allum gemæro hire of nioðmesta & bituih æfter tid þæt gesohte vel gefragade from dryumða gefylled wæs þæt gecuoeden wæs ðerh hieremias ðone witge cuoeðendestefn in tuigga vel geheræd wæs woepende & hremende suiðe þæt wif woeap suna hire & nalde froefra forðon ne sintdeadade vel dead wæs soðlice herodes heonu ædeawade engel drihtnes in soefnum iosephe in ægyptcuoeð arris & onfoh ðone cnæht & moder his & faer vel gae in eorðo israheles deade arun forðon ða ðe sohton sawel cnaehtesðe arras onfeng ðone cnæht & moder his & cuom in earðo israhelesgeherde soðlice forðon ðe cynig heroðes sunu rixade in iudea fore herodes fæder his ondreard ðider fara vel to færenne & gelæred wæs in soefnum gewoende ðona in dalum geliornesse& cuom gebyde ðer in ceastra ðy is genemned þæt sie gefylled ðæt gecuoeden wæs ðerh witga forðon ðe nazaresca geceiged biðin dagum wuototlice ðæm cuom bæstere vel fuluihtere bodade in woestern iudeæ& cueð hreonisse doas vel wyrcas togenealacede forðon ric heofnaðes is forðon ðe ðe gecuoeden wæs ðerh esaias ðone witgo cuoeðende stefn cliopende in woestern gearuas woeg drihtnes rehta doeð vel wyrcas stiga hisðe ilca soðlice iohannes hæfde gewede of herum ðæra camella & gyrdils fillenu ymb sido his met vel fostrað his wæs & hunig uduða gefoerde to him ða burguaras & alle iudeas & all lond vel oeðel ymb iordanen& weron gefulwad in iordanen from him geondeton synna hioragesæh soðlice monigæ cuomun to his fulwiht cuoeð him cynn ætterna hua ædeuað iuh geflea from toweard wuraðodoeð gie huoeðre wæstm wyrðe to hreonisse& nællas ge cuoeða bituih iuih fader we habbas abraham ic saego forðon iuh forðon mæg god of stanum ðissum awæcca suna abrahamessoðlice vel gee forðon acas to wyrtrumma treuna gesetet wæs vel is all vel eghwelc forðon treu ðy ne wyrcas wæstm god ofcorfen sie & in fyr bið gesended vel sie gesendedic wuotetlice vel ec soð ic fulwa iuih in wætre in hreonisse ðe ðe soðlice æfter mec to cymende vel toword is strongra ðon mec is vel ðon ic his vel ðæs nam ic wyrðe gesceoe beara he iuih gefulwas in halig gast & fyreshis vel ðæs in hond his & ðerhclænsade beretun his & sommas huæte his in berern ða halmas wuotetlice forbernes fyres in undrysnendeða cuom haelend from in to þæt he were gefulwad from himsoðlice foresoc vel forbead hine cueð ic from ðe rehtra is gefulwia & ðu cuom vel cymes to megeonduarde soðlice haelend cuoeð him buta tua suæ forðon gedæfnad is us þæt we gefylle alle soðfæstnisse/ ða forleort hinemiððy wæs gefulwad ueototlice hraðe vel sona astag vel aras of wætre & heonu untyned weron him heofnas & gesæh gast godes ofdune stigende suelce culfre cymmende ofer him& heonu stefn of heofnum cuoeð ðis is sunu min leof in ðæm me woel gelicadeða hælend gelæded wæs in woestern from gaste þætte he woere gecostad l gecunned from diable& miððy gefæste feuortig daga & feowertig næhta æfter ðon gewyngerde vel gehyncgerde& geneolacede ðe costere l ðe cunnere cuoeð him gif sunu godes ðu arð cuoeð þæt stanas ðas hlafa l to hlafum sie gewordenoðe geonduarde cuoeð awritten is ne in hlaf ane lifes monn ah in alle l in eghwelc word þæt soðlic cuom of muðe godesða gefeng vel genom hine diobul in halig ceastra & gesette hine ofer vel on hornsceaðe temples& cuoeð him gif sunu godes arð ðu send ðeh ufa hidune awritten in forðon forðon englum his bebead of ðe & in hondum genimmes ðec ðy leæs vel eaðe mæg ðu wiðspurne to vel wið stane fot ðinnecuoeð him hælend eft so awritten is ne costa ðu drihten god ðinneeft genom hine diobul in mor heh suiðe & geeaude him alle ricas middangeardes & wuldur hiora & cuoeð him ðas ðe aalle ic sello gif ðu fallas vel slæhtas to worðenne vel to worðianne mecða cuoeð him hælen gae vel geong ðu wiðerworde awritten is drihten god ðinne geworða ðu & him anum gehere ðu vel geembehte ðuða forleort hine diowl & heonu englas togeneolocedon & geembehtadon himmiððy soðlice geherde þæt iohannes gesald were ðona gewoende in galileam& forleort vel miððy forleort ceastra natzareðes cuom & gewunade vel gebyde þæt is sæburug in gemærum zabulones &þæt woere gefylled þæt gecuoeden is ðerh esaias ðone witgeeorðu zabulones & woeg sæs ofer iordanen geliornis cynna vel ðeadafolc ðe sett in ðiostrum leht gesæh mihil & ðæm sittendum in lond & scuia deaðes leht ædeaued wæs himof ðon vel ðona ongann hælend bodage & cuoeða hreownisse doas vel wyrcas togeneolacede forðon ric heofnageeade vel gefoerde soðlice ætt sæ geliornisse gesæh tuoege broðera ðone simon ðe is geceiged vel genemned & broðer his gesendon hnett in sæ woeron forðon fisceras& cuoeð him cumas æfter mec & ic gedo iuih sie vel wosa fisceras monnasoð ða ilco sona forleorton netta gefylgdon him& gefoerde ðona gesæh oðer tuoege broðer iacob zebeðes sunu & broðer his in scip mið zebeðeos fader hiora geboeton vel gestricedon netta hiora & geceigde hea vel ða ilcahea vel ða ilca soðlice hraðe forleorton netta & fader gefylgdon hine& ymbeade hælend alle galilea laerde in somnungum hiora & bodade godspell rices & hælde all unhælo & all untrymnise in folce& geeade l gesprang mersung his in alle syria & gebrohtun him alle ða yfle hæfdon mið monigfald unhælo & mið fiondgeldum l mið costungum begetna l fornumena & ða diobles hæfdon & bræcsec & eorðcryplas & geboeta hea& gefylgdon hine ðreate moniga of galilea & of ðær byrig & & of iudea & of bihionda iordanengeseh wutotlice ðreatas gestag in mor & miððy gesætt geneolecedon to him ðeignas his& untynde muð his gelærde hea cuoeðeadge biðon ða ðorfendo of vel from gaste forðon hiora is ric heofnaeadge biðon ða milde forðon ða agnegað eorðoeadge biðon ða ðe gemænas nu forðon ða gefroefred biðoneadge biðon ða ðe hyncgrað & ðyrstas soðfæstnisse forðon ða ilco gefylled biðon vel geriordedeadge biðon miltheorte forðon hiora vel ða miltheortnise him gefylgeseadge biðon claene of vel from hearte forðon ða god geseaseadge biðon sibsume vel friðgeorne forðon ða suna godes geceigd biðon vel genemnedeadge biðon ða ðe oehtnisse hea geðolas fore soðfæstnisse forðon hiora is ric heofnaeadge aron gie miððy yfle hia gecuoeðas iuh & mið ðy oehtas iuih & cuoeðas eghwelc yfel wið iuih gesuicas vel wæges fore mecgefeað & wynnsumiað forðon mearda iuere monigfalde is vel sint in heofnum suæ vel suelce ec forðon geoehton ða witgo ða ðe weron ær iuihgee sint salt eorðes þæt gif salt forwordes in ðon gesælted bið to nowihte vel to nænihte mæge ofer þæt buta þæt gesended bið vel geworpen ut & getreden bið from monnumgie aron vel sint leht middangeardes ne mæg burug vel ceastra gehyda vel gedeigla ofer mor gesetedne ec bernas ðæccille vel lehtfæt & settas ða vel hia unðer mitte vel under sestre ah ofer lehtisern & lihteð allum ða ðe in hus biðon vel sintsuæ lehteð leht iuer fore monnum þæt hea geseað vel gesege iurra goda werca & wuldriað fader iurrne ðe is in heofnumnællas gie woenæ forðon ic cuom to slitenne vel to undoenne ae oððæ witgæ ne cuom ic to slitenne ah to fyllennesoð is l soðlice forðon ic cueðo to iuh wið ða hwile liores heofon & eorðo foruord l pricle an l enne l enne pricle l stæfes heafod ne foreade l ne forgæs from ae wið ða huile alle sieseðe of ðon vel forðon untynes vel toslittes enne of bobodum ðissum leasestum vel lytlum & laereð suæ menn lytel vel leasest he bið genemned in ric heafna seðe uutedlice doeð & læreð ðes micil bið geceigd in ric heafnaic cueðo forðon iuh ðy vel forðon buta monigfalliee vel monigfaldge worðe soðfæstnesse iuer forðor vel suiðor wuðuttana & ne ingaes ge in ric heafnageherde ge forðon acueden is to ðæm haaldum ne ofslah ðu seðe soðlice vel wutedlice ofslaeð deadsynig bið to dome vel from domeic soðlice cueðo to iuh forðon eghuelc seðe uraeðes broðere his deadsynig bið of dome seðe uutedlice cueðas broðre his ðu unuis vel idle scyldig bið to boetanne seðe sodlice cueðas ðu idle vel unwis scyldig bið totinterge fyresgif ec gebrenges ðing ðin to wigbed & ðer eftðencende ðu bist vel beðences eft forðon broðer ðin hæfeð hwothwoego wið ðeceftforlet ðer ðing ðin to wigbed & gae vel geong ærest eft to boetanne broðre ðinum & ðonne cym ðu gebreng ðing ðinuæs ðu geðafsum wiðerbrace ðinum hraðe miððy bist in uoeg mið him ðy læs geselle ðec ðe wiðerbraca vel ðe fiond to dome & ðe doema gesellæs ðeh ðegne & in carcern ðu bist gesendedsoðlice ic cueðo ðe ne ofgæstu ðona wið ðu forgelde ðy lætmeste feorðunggeherde ge forðon acueden is to ðæm aldum ne gesynnge ðu vel ne serð ðu oðres mones wific uutedlice cueðo to iuh forðon eghuelc seðe gesis vel gesæh þæt wif to wilnanne vel to nytanne soðlice gesynngade ða in hearta hisþæt gif ðah sie ego ðin suiðre ondspyrnas ðe gener l genim hine & worp from ðe behoflic is forðon ðe þætte dead sie enne liomana ðinra ðon all lichoma ðin gesendad bið in tintergo l in cursung& gif suiðra hond ðin ondspurnas ðeh cearf hea & worp from ðe behofes forðon ðe þætte deadege enne liomana ðinra ðon all lichoma ðin gæð l færeð in tintergoacueden is uutetlice sua hua forletas wif his selle hir boc freodomesic soðlice cueðo to iuh forðon eghuelc seðe forletes wif his buta unclænes lustas inting gedoeð vel wircas ða ilca gesyngege & seðe forleteno lædæs he synngieðeft sona herde ge forðon acueden is ðæm aldum ne ðerhsuere ðu to suiðe ðu forgeldes soðlice drihtne gihata aðas ðineic uutetlice cueðo iuh to ne suerige æfre ne ðerh heofon forðon hehseðil godes isne ðerh earðo forðon fotscoemel is fota his ne ðerh hierusalem forðon burug is micles cyningesne ðerh heafod ðin suere ðu forðon ne mæhtu enne her huit geuirce vel blaecsie uutedlice l cuðlice word iuer ise ise nese nese þæt soðlice from daem wordum monigfallocru is l bið from yfle isgeherde gie forðon acueden is ego fore ego & toð fore toðeic soðlice cueðo to iuh ne wiðstonde mið yfle vel to yfle ah gif hua ðec slaes in suiðra ceica ðin sel vel gef him & ðy oðera& ðæm seðe wil ðec mið to dome geflitta & cyrtel vel hrægl ðin to niomanne forlet & hrægl vel hæcla vel bratt& seðe vel suachua ðec genedes vel geðreatas mile straedena geong mið him oðra tuegeseðe giueð from ðe sel him & ðæm nedende vel ðæm ðreatende huerfa ðec ne acerregeherde ge forðon acueden is lufa ðone neste ðinne & mið læðo vel from læðo hæfe ðu fiond ðinneic soðlice cueðo to iuh lufas ge fiondas iurre uel doeð vel doas ðæm ða ðe læðas vel laeðedon iuih & biddas fore oehtendum & teancuedendum iuihþæt gie sæ suna fadres iures seðe in heafnas his forðon sunna his arise doeð ofer godo & yfle & sniueð vel hregnað ofer soðfæsta & unsoðfæstegif forðon ge lufias ða ilco ða ðe iuih lufiað huelc mearde gie sciolun habba ah ne & bærsuinnigo ðis doas& gif gie haelo beadas vel wilcyma broðero iurre ane huæt forðor gie doas vel wyrcas ah ne esuice ðis doaswosas ge ðonne iuh wisfæste suæ & fader iuer heofonlic wisfæst isbehaldas þæt soðfæstnise iuerre gie doas before monnum þæt gie se geseno from him eaðe mæg mearde nabbas ge mið fader iurre seðe in heafnas ismiððy ðonne ðu doas ælmessa nelle ðu bema vel stocc singa before ðec suæ legeras gewyrcas in somnungum & in londum vel in gemærum þæt hia se gearðad from monnum soðlice vel soð is ic cueðo iuh to hie gefengon mearde hioraðu vel ðeh uutedlice wyrcende ða ællmissa nyta winstra ðin huæt wyrcas vel doas suiðra ðinþæt sie ællmessa ðin in degelnisse & fader/ ðin seðe gesiið in degelnisse forgeldeð ðe& miððy gie gebiddas ne wosas ge suæ legeras ða ðe lufas in somnungum & huommum ðara plæcena vel worðum stondes vel stondende gebiddas vel to gebiddanne þæt hia gesene sie from monnum soðlic ic cueð iuih to onfengon mearde hearaðu uutedlice miððy gie gebiddes vel ingeong vel inga in cotte ðinum & gesparrado dure ðin gebidd fæder ðinne in degolnis & fader ðin seðe gesiið vel locas in degelnisse forgeldes ðehea gebiddes uutetlice vel ðonne gie gebiddas nallas ge feolo vel monigfald gespreca suæ esuico doas hia woenas forðon ða ðe in monigfald sprec his biðon geherednallas ge ðonne wosa gelic him wat forðon fader iurre of ðæm ðearf sie vel is iuh aer ðon gie bidde hinesuæ ðonne iuih gie bidde fader urer ðu arð vel ðu bist in heofnum vel in heofnas sie gehalgad noma ðintocymeð ric ðin sie willo ðin suæ is in heofne & in eorðohlaf userne ofer wistlic sel us todæg& forgef us scylda usra suæ uoe forgefon scyldgum usum& ne inlæd usih in costunge ah gefrig usich from yflegif forðon gie forgeafas monnum synna hiara forgefes & ec iuh fader iuer heofonlic synna iuerragif soðlice gie nalles forgeafa monnum ne fader iuerre forgefes synna iuerremiððy uutetlice gie gefæstas nællæs ge wosa sua legeras vel godes esuicæ unrotæ misbegaas forðon onsione hiora þæt hia se gesene monnum fæstende soð ic cueðo iuh to forðon onfengon mearde hioraðu uutedlice miððy ðu fæstas ðuah heafud ðin & onsione ðin ðuahforðon þæt ðu ne se gesene monnum fæstende ah federe ðinum seðe is in degolnisse & fader ðin seðe gesiið in degolnise forgeldeð ðenællas gie gestrionaige iuh gestriono in eorðo ðer vel huer rust & mohða gefreten bið vel gespilled bið ðer ðeafas ofdelfes vel hrypes & forstealasstrionas gie soðlice iuh striona in heofnum ðer ne hrust ne ec mohðe gespilles & ðer ðeafas ne ofdelfes ne forstelaððer vel huer forðon is strion ðin ðer is & hearta ðinlæhtfæt lichomæs is ego gife bið ego ðin bliðe leht bið all lichoma ðingif uutedlice ego ðin unbliðe vel yfelwyrcende se vel byð all lichoma ðin ðiostrig bið gif ðonne leht þæt in ðec is ðiostro sint ða ðiostro sua miclo biðonænig monn ne mæg tuæm hlaferdum hera vel forðon an vel enne mid læððo he hæfeð vel he scile habba & oðerne lufað vel enne hræfneð & oðerne geteleð vel forogas ne maga gie gode gehera & diobleforðon ic cueðo to iuh ne gemende gie sie saules iurres huæt ge gebrucca scile ne lichoma iuer huæt ge gearuiga iuih ah ne sauel forðor is ðon mett & lichoma forðor is ðon wedebehaldas vel locas ða flegendo fuglas heofnes forðon ne settas vel sauues ne rioppas & ne somnigas in berern & fader iuer heofonlic foedæs ða ilco vel hia ahne iuih suiðor vel mare monege aro ge bi him vel from himhuælc uutetlice iurre geðences mæge æt vel toece to licnesse vel to lengo his elne an vel enne& of gewedo huæt gemende aroge sceauiges vel locas vel behaues ðæt wyrt londes huu wæxas ne wynnes & ne nestasic cueðo soðlice iuh forðon ne salamon in all wuldre his efnebeðeht vel gegearued wæs sua enne vel an of ðisumgif uutedlice gers vel heg londes þæt todæg is & tomorgen in heofone bið gesended god suæ geuedes vel gegearuas sua forðor vel sua mara iuih lytles geleafesnælleð gie ðonne gemende gesie gecueðas huæt walla ue eatta vel huæt we gedrince vel of huon we biðon wrigenðas forðon alle cynna vel hædno insoecas vel befraignes wat forðon fader iuer forðon of ðæm allum ge behofes vel iuh behofessoecas vel biddas ge uutedlice ærist ric godes & soðfæstnisse his & ðas alle togeeced biðon iuhnælleð ge ðonne sie gemendo in merne morgen forðon dæg gemende bið him seolfum wel mæg vel wel licas ðæm dæg werignise hisnellað ge doeme þæt ge ne se gedoemedin ðæm forðon dome gie doemes ge biðon gedoemed & in sua huelc woegas hripes ge biðon gewegen bið iuhhuæt ðonne gesiistu stre vel mot in ego broðres ðines & ðone beam in ego ðin ne gesiistuvel hu cueðestu broeðer ðinum buta ic worpe mot vel stre of ego ðin & heonu beam is in ego ðinðu esuica worp ærest ðone beam of ego ðin & ðonne ðu gesiist geworpe ðone mot of ego broðres ðinesnellas ge sealla halig hundum ne sendas ge meregrotta iurre before berg ðy læs hia getrede ða ilco mið fotum hiora & gewoendo vel gecerdo toslitas iuhgiwias l gebiddas ge & gesald bið iuh soecað ge & ge infindes l ge begeattas cnysað l cnyllas ge & untyned bið iuheghuelc forðon seðe giuæð l biddes onfoeð & seðe soecas infindes & ðæm cnysende l cnyllende untuned biðvel hua is from iuh monn ðene gif he giuias sunu his hlaf cuiðestu ðone stan raeceð vel seles himvel gif ðone fisc wilniað vel giuias cuiðestu ða nedrie ræces himgif ðonne iuh miððy ge aron yflo wutas ge godo gesealla sunum iurum mara woen is fader iuer seðe in heofnum is geselleð godo biddendum vel giuiendum hinealle ðonne vel forðon sua huæt gie welle þæt hea gedoe iuh ða menn & gee doeð vel wyrcas him ðius is forðon æ & witgas vel witgoinngeonges ðerh nearuo port vel dure vel gæt forðon ðiu wide geat & rumwelle weg ðiu lædas to lose vel losing & monigo sint ða ðe inngeongas ðerh ða ilcosuiðe naruu port vel gaet & bogehte woeg ðiu lædes to life & huon aron ða ðe onfindes ða ilcobehaldas ge from leasum witgum ða ðe cymes to iuh in wedum scipa innaueard uutedlice sint uulfes ferendefrom wæstmum hiora ongeatas ge vel oncnaues hia vel ðailco cuiðestu vel hueðer somnigas of hryum vel of ðornum scearpum vel of hagaðornum ficbeamassuæ eghwelc treeo god wæstmas goda doæð vel gewyrces ðe yfle uutedlice treo wæstmas yfle doasne mæg treuo god wæstmas yfle gewyrca ne tre yfle wæstma godo gewyrceeghuelc tre ðy l ðiu ne doeð wæstm god gecorfen bið l gecearfas & in fyr bið gesended l gesendesðonne from wæstmum hiora ongeatas ge vel oncnaues ða vel hiane eghuelc seðe cueðæs to me drihten drihten inngaas in ric heofna ah seðe doeð willo faderes mines seðe in heofnum is ðe ingeonges in ric heofnamonig wælle gecueada to me in ðæm dæg drihten drihten ah ne in noma ðinne vel ðinum we gewitgedon & in noma ðinne vel ðinum diobles we fordrifon vel forworpon & in noma ðinum mæhto monigo we dydon& ða vel ðonne ic ondeto him vel ðæm forðon næfra ic cuðe vel oncneawu iuih afirres from me ða ðe ge worhton unrehtuisnisseeghuelc ðonne se ðe geheres uorda mina ðas & does ða ilco geefned bið vel geliced bið vel geteled bið wer snotre seðe getimbres hus his ofer vel on carr vel stan& ofdune astag vel gefeall regn & cuomon ea vel streamas & geblewun windas & inræsdon in hus ðæm & ne gefeall gewrynded vel geseted forðon wæs ofer stane& eghuelc seðe geheres worda mina ðas & ne doeð ða ilco gelic bið were dysge se ðe getimberde hus his ofer vel on sonde& ofdune astag regn & cuomon streamas & gebleuun windas & inresdon in huse ða ilco & gefeall & wæs fæll his micel& geworden is vel uæs miððy geendade ðe hælend worda ðas geuundrade weron ða ðreatas ofer lar hiswæs forðon lærde hia sue mæht hæfde ne suæ vel nalles suæ vel suelce uðuta hiora &miððy uutedlice of gestag of mor fylgende weron vel sint vel gefylgdon hine ðreata menigo& heonu licðrouer cuom he worðade hine cueð drihten gif ðu wilt ðu mæht mec geclænsige& aðenede l gespræde hond gehran him hælend ðus cueð ic uillo geclænsia & sona geclænsad wæs hriofol his& cueð him hælend loca l geseh þæt ðu ænigum menn ðu gecuoeða l gesæcga ah gaa ædeau ðec ðæm meassepreost & breng l gef ðing þæt bebead l geheht moyses in cyðnisse l witnesa himmiððy uutetlice inneade vel innfoerde ða burug geneolecade vel tocuom to him ðe centur þæt is hundraðes monna hlaferd gebæd hine& cuoeð ðus drihten cnaeht min liges in hus eorðcryppel & mið yfle is gecunned l gecostedcueð to him se hælend ic cymo & gemo hine& geonduearde ðæm aldormenn cueð drihter nam ic wyrðe þæt ðu inngae under rof min ah an cuoeð mið word & gehaeled bið cnæht minforðon & vel ec ic monn amm under mæht hæfis vel hæfo under mec ðeignas vel innheardmenn & ic cueðo ðissum vel ðæm gaæ & gaes vel geongas vel faeres & to oðrum cymm & cumeð vel cymeð & ðeua minum do ðis & doesmiððy geherde soðlice ðe haelend gewundrad wæs vel geuundrade & ðæm fylgendum vel fylgdon hine cuoeð soð is ic cueðo iuh ne fand ic suæ miclo leafa vel lufa in israhelic cueðo soðlice iuh to þætte monige from eastdael l easta & woesta cymas & gehrestas mið abraham & isaac & iacob in ric heofnasuna uutedlice rices biðon gedrifen in ðyostrum wytmesto ðer bið wop & gristbiottung toeða& cuoeð ðe hælend ðæm haldormenn gaa & suæ ðu gelefdest sie ðe & gehæled wæs cnæht in ðit ðæm& miððy gecuom ðe hælend in hus petres gesaeh suer his l his wifes moder liccende & cuacende l bifigende& gehran hond his & forleort ða vel hia of feberadlum & arras & embehtade vel geherde himmiððy eferntid vel in eferntid uutedlice geworden wæs gebrohton him menigo diobles hæfdon & forwearp vel fordraf gaastas mið word & alle yfle hæfdon vel mishæbbende vel unhaleþæt were gefylled vel geendad þæt gecueden wæs ðerh esaiam ðone witgo ðus cuoeðende ðe ilca untrymmnise vel unhælo usra onfoeng vel genom vel underhof & untrymnise vel hefignise gebærða gesæh uutedlice ðe hælend threatta vel hergas menigo uta ymb hine geheht fara vel gaa ofer luh vel stream& to cuom vel genealacde an uðuutta coeð to him ðu larua ic fylgo ðe vel ic ðeh sohte sua huider ðu færes vel gaes& cuoeð to him hælend foxas holas habbas & flegende heofnes nestas vel nesto sunu soðlice monnes ne hæfis huer heafud gehlutes vel gebegesoðer vel sum oðer uutedlice from ðegnum his cueð to him drihten ðerhsend vel forlet vel forgef vel lef meh ærest fara vel gæ & bebyrge faeder minhælend soðlice cuoeð to him soec meh vel fylge meh & forlet ða deado to bebyrgenne ða deado hiora& ofstigende hine l ða he ofstag in lytlum scipe l in cuople gefylgdon hine l him ðegnas his& heonu styrnise vel hroernis michelo geworden wæs in sae suæ þæt scipp oferwrigen wæs mið yðum he soðlice geslepde vel slepende wæs& to geneolecdon vel tocuomon & awehton hine ðus cuedon drihten hæl usic we deade biðon vel we aron vel biðon gelosad& cueð to him huæt frohtende aron gie lytle vel lytlo geleafa ða aras geðreadade to wind & to sae & geworden wæs smyltnisse miclosoðlice vel uutedlice menn gewundrade weron ðus cueðende vel cuedon huulig is ðes forðon & uindas & saes geheras vel eðmodas him& miððy gecuom ofer luh in lond ðara ðeade geuurnon him tuoege haebbende vel hæfdon diobles of byrgennum ut vel of geeadon hroeðo suiðe suæ vel ðus ænig monn mæhte oferfara vel gae vel geonge ðerh woeg ða ilco& heonu geceigdon ðus cueðende huætd betuih us vel us & ðe sunu godes ðu cuome hider ær tid to pinenne usihwæs uutedlice nehuarne long from him vel ðæm suner berga monigra gefoedediowles uutedlice gebedon hine cueðende gif ðu worpes usig send usig in suner berga& cueð to him gaeð vel faereð soð ða vel hia eadon vel gefoerdon geeadon in bergum & heonu mið hræs geeade all suner vel edo ðerh hrædlice vel oefestlice in sæ & deade weron vel deadedon in wætrumða hiorda uutedlice geflugun & cuomon in byrig gesaegdon alle & of ðæm ða ðe ða diobles hæfdon& heonu all ceastra geeade togægnas hælende & gesene hine vel þa hine gesegon gebedon þæt ofereade vel ofergefoerde from gemærum hiora& gestag in scipp oferfoerde & cuom in byrig his& heonu gebrohtun him eorðcrypel liccende in bere & gesaeh ðe hælend geleafa hiora vel ðara cueð ðaem eorðcrypple getriowue vel gelef la sunu forgefen biðon vel sie forgefen ðe synno ðina& heonu sum oðer from uðuutum cuedon betuih him ðes ebalsas& miððy gesaeh ðe hælend smeawunga heora cueð to huon ðengcas ge yflo in heortum iurumhuæt is eaður cuoeða forgefen biðon ðe synna vel cueða aris & geong vel gaaþæt gie gewitte soðlice forðon sunu monnes hæfes mæht on eorðo forgefnisse vel to forgefanne synna ða cueð ðaem eorðcrypple aris genim bero ðinne & geong in hus ðin& aras & eade in hus hisgesegon uutedlice ða menigo ondreardon & geuuldradon god seðe gesalde mæht suælc monnum& miððy ofereade vel gefoerde ðona ðe hælend gesæh monno sittende mið noma vel wæs genemned vel benemned & cueð to him soec vel fylg mec & aras fylgende wæs hine vel him& geworden wæs ræstende hine in hus heonu monigo bærsuinniho & synfullo cuomun geræstun mið ðone hælend & ðegnum his& gesegon cuedon to ðeignum his for huon mið yfelwyrcendum & synfullum ettes laruu iursoð hælend þæt geherde cueð ne is ðarf vel gemnise ðæm halum to lece vel from ah ðæm yflehæbbendumgeongas uutedlice leornas huæt is mildheortnisse ic willo & nis geafo ne forðon cuom ic geceige soðfeaste ah synfulloða geneolecdon vel cuomon to him ðegnas iohannes cueðendo vel hia cuedon forhuon woe vel usih & we fæstas oft vel symle ðegnas uutedlice ðinne ne fæstas& cueð to him ðe hælend hueðer magon sunu brydgumes mænæ ða huile mið him is vel bið brydguma cymes uutedlice dagas miððy genummen bið from him brydguma & ða vel ðonne fæstas vel gefæsdonænig monn soðlice insendes ald clað fihles vel fotclað reades in wede ald vel foruered genimes forðon fyllnisse his from wede & wyrs toslittenne sendas win niwe in byttum aldum aða oðer toslitten biðon biðon & þæt win agotten bið & ða bytto losas ah þæt win niue in byttum niue sendeð & ædgædre biðon gehaldenðas hine sprecende to him vel ðæm heonu aldormonn an geneolecde & gewordade hine cueðende dohter min nu vel oðerhuile gedead is vel geliored is ah cym onsett hond ofer hia & lifeð vel þæt hiu lifige& aras ðe hælend gefylgde hine & ðegnas his& heonu wif ðy vel/ ðiu blodes flouing vel iorning geðolade vel gedrog tuelf uinter vel tuelf ger geneolecde beienda & gehran fas vel wloh wedes hishio cueð forðon bituih hir deiglice gif ic hrino sua huon wede his ic hal beomsoð ðe hælend gecerde & gesæh ða vel hia cueð getriu vel gelef dohter gleafo ðin ðec hal dyde & hal geworden wæs wif of ðæm vel ðær tið& miððy gecuom ðe hælen in hus aldormonnes & gesæh beameres mænendehe gecueð cerras vel eft gewoendas ne is forðon dead ðy maiden vel þæt maiden ah slepes & gehlogun vel smerdon hine& miððy fordrifen wæs ðy ðreat vel ðy menigo inneade & geheald vel genom hond hire & arras þæt maiden& geeade vel spranc mersung ðas vel ðys vel ðius in alle eorðo ða ilco& geongende vel ða geeode ðona ðe hælend gefylgdon hine vel him tuoege bisene vel blinde clioppende & cueðende milsa us vel usig sunu dauiðesmiððy uutedlice gecuome to hus geneolecdon to him bisena vel blinde & cueð him se hælend gelefes ge forðon ic mæg ðis gedoa vel gewyrca iuh cuedon him buta tua drihtenða gehran ego hiora cueð vel cueðende æfter geleafa iurre sie iuh& untynde weron ego hiora vel ðara & bebead vel beboden wæs him vel ðæm ðe hælend cueð geseað þætte nan nyteða ilco uutedlice geeadon gemersadon hine in all eorðo ðy vel ðiuða hia weron færend uutedlice ða ilco heonu gebrohtun him monno dumbne diwlas hæbbend& miððy fordraf diul vel ðone diwl sprecend wæs ðe dumba & gewundrad weron ða menigo cueðende næfre ædeawde ðuslic in israheluutedlice hia cuedon in aldormenn diowbla fordrifes diowlas& ymbeade ðe hælend ceastræ vel burgas alle & werc vel cester gelærde vel lærende in somnungum hiora & bodade godspell rices & gemde all unhælo vel untrym & all untrymmig vel unhaelogesæh soðlice ða menigo gemilsade him vel ðæm vel milsande wæs forðon weron geberede & legon suæ scip næfdon hiordeða cueð ðegnum his hripes soðlice monigo wercmenn vel wyrcende menn uutedlice huonbiddas forðon hlaferd hrippes þæt he foruorpa vel fordrife ða wercmenn vel ða wyrcende in ohthripp his& weron geceigd tuelf ðegnas his salde ðæm vel him mæht gaasta unclænra þæt hia fordrife ða ilco & hea gegeme all unhælo & all untrymmigotuelfe uutedlice ðara apostolorum noma sint ðas ærist seðe acueden is & broðer his zebeðies suna & broðer his& & & && seðe & gesalde hineðas tuelfe sende ðe hælend bebead him & cueð in uoeg hædna vel cynna ne gaas ge & in burgum ðæra samaritanesca vel ðara lioda ne ingeonges geah is rehtra gaes to scipum ða losodun hus israhelgeonges ge uutedlice forebodages ðus cueðende forðon togeneolecde vel gehnehuade ric heofnauntrymige gemes ða deada aueccas licðroures clænsas diules fordrifes unboht vel unceaped gie onfengon unboht sellas& sua hua dringe selles vel sealla welle anum of lytlum ðassum cælc vel scenc wætres caldes suæ michil in noma ðegnes soð ic cueðo iuh ne loseð meard his& geworden is vel wæs miððy geendade vel gefylde ðe hælend bebead vel bebeadende tuoelfe ðegnum his gefoerde ðona þætte he lærde & bodade in byrgum vel burgum vel ceastrum hiorauutedlice miððy geherde in bendum werca cristes gesende tuoege of ðegnum hiscueð to him ðu arð vel arð ðu seðe to cymende wæs vel is oððæ oðer we bidas& geonduarde ðe hælend cuoeð to ðæm færas vel geonges eft sæcgas ge ða worda geherdon & gesegonbiseno geseað halto geonges licðrouras geclaensad aron vel biðon deafo geheras deado arisas vel aweccas ðorfendo godspell boddages& eadig is seðe ne bið ondspyrnisse vel ondspyrnende in mecðæm uutedlice fromgeongendum ongann ðe hælend gecuoeða to ðæm menigom from iohannæ huæt vel forhuon eadage in uoestern gesea gerd vel puulsper from uinde styrende vel sceæcendeah huæt eadege gesea ðone monno mið hnescnisum geweded vel gegearuad heonu ða ðe mið hnescum gerelum gescirped biðon vel sind in husum vel in husa cyninga bioðongeocc forðon min suet vel eðe is & byrðen min leht isin ðæm tid geeade hælend in sunnadæg ðerh ðone weg ðegnas uutedlice his hia hyncerdon ongunnun genioma ða ehera & geettauutedlice gesegon cuedon him heonu ðegnas ðine doas þæt nis gelefed him to doanne vel to wyrcanne in sunnadagumsoð he cuoeð him ne leornade ge huæt dyde ðonne hine gehyngerde & ða ðe mið him weronhuu inneade in hus godes & hlafas getemeseda vel foresetne gebrec ða neron gelefed him to gebrucanne ne ðæm ða ðe mið him weron buta anum mesapreostumvel ne leornade ge in æ forðon sunnadagum measapreostas in tempel sunnadæg hia widlas & buta hehsynne sintic cuoeðo uutedlice iuh forðon from tempel mara is ðes vel ðisgif uutedlice ge wiston huæt is miltheortnisse ic willo & nis husul næfre geteldon ge ða unsuinnigodrihten is forðon sunu monnes gee vel soðlic to sunnadæ vel to seternes dægsuæ hua forðon does vel wyrcas willo faderes mines seðe in heofnus vel heofnum vel heofnum is ðe min & broðer & suoester & moder isin ðæm dæge geeade ðe hælend of hus he gesætt vel wæs sittende æt vel neh sæ& gesomnad weron vel sint to him menigo vel ðreatas monigo suæ þæt in scipp vel lyttel scipp astag vel wæs stigende gesætt & all ðreat gestod on wearðe& spreccende wæs him feolo vel monigo in bissenum cuoeð vel cuoeðende heonu geeade seðe sawes sede vel gesawe vel sedege& miððy vel ða huile saues ðorlease vel sum oðer gefeollon neh vel æt stræt vel woeg & cuomun ða flegendo & gebrecon vel eton vel freton ða ilcooðra uutedlice gefeallon in stæner ðer ne hæfde vel næbbend wæs eorðo micil vel monig vel foele & miððy sona arisen weron forðon ne hæfdon vel næbbende weron heanisse eorðessunna uutedlice miððy arras weron forberned vel besenced & forðon ne hæfdon vel næbbend wyrtrumme gescriungon vel weron gescrencdeoðro uutedlice gefeollon in ðornum vel in hrygum & woxon ða ðornas vel hrygas & underdulfon ðaoðero ec vel soðlice gefeollon in eorðo god & saldon vel gesald weron wæstm oðer hundrað vel hunduelle oðer sexdeih oðer ðrittig& ne dyde ðer mæhto vel mægno monigo fore ungeleaffulnisse vel ungelefenise hiora vel ðærain ðæm tid geherde mersung hælendes& cueð cnaehtum his ðis is he vel ðe arras from deadum & forðon mægno vel mæhto geworht aron in himforðon geheald & geband hine & sette in carcern fore wif broðres hishe cueð forðon him ne is gelefed ðe to habbanne ða vel hia& walde hine ofslae ondreard þæt folc forðon suæ witge hine hæfdondæg uutedlice cennisse geplaegde dohter herodiaðes in middum & gelicade ðæm cyningeðona vel forðon mið að gehatend wæs hir þæt sealla walde suæ huæt wælde gewiga vel giuiade from himsoð hiu vel ðiu foregelæred vel aergelered from moder hire sel me cueð ðis in disc heafud iohannes ðæs fulwihtere& gebedon hine þæt vel fas vel wloh wedes his gehrine moston & sua huælc vel hiora hia gehrinadon vel gehrinad hæfdeða genealecdon to him from hierusalem uuðwuta & ældormenn cuedon vel cueðendoforhuon ðegnas ðinne hia ofergaes vel oferhogas selenise vel setnesa ðara aeldra ne forðon ðwas hond hiora miððy hlaf eattasðe vel he wutetlice ondworde cueð him forhuon & gie ofergaað vel forhogas bebod godes fore selenise vel setnise hireforðon god cueð wuorðig faeder ðin & moder & seðe yflecuoeðæs vel werges ðæm feder vel ðær moeder of deaðe sie acwelledge uutetlice cueðas & suachuelc vel sua hua cueðas ðæm feder vel ðær moeder hond & sua huet is of meh ðe is behoflic& ne worðiges fader his vel moder & bismer vel telend ge dydon bebod godes fore selenise iureðu legere vel gie legeras wel gewitgede vel gewitgade of iuih cueð vel cuoeðendefolc ðis of vel mið muðum meh worðas hearta uutetlice hiora long is from me& forlerte ðæt folc astag in scip & cwom in gemærum& togeneolecdon to him ða aldo & cunnendo & bedon hine þæt becon of heofnum ædeawde himsoð he onduearde cueð him gewarð efern cueðas smolt bið read is forðon heofon& to merne vel aar to dæg stearm fagas forðon unrotlic heofon onsione forðon heofnes ofdoeme uutas ge becena vel tungcla soðlice ðæra tid ne maga gecneureso yfla & becon soecas & becon ne bið sald him buta becon iones & forleorte vel & forletne weron ða ilco fromeade& miððy gecwomun ðegnas his ofer luh l nearo sæ ofergeotole weron þæt hia hlafas onfengonseðe cueð him sceawgias ge & behaldas from dærstum vel from ðærfe ældra &soð hia gesmeawdun bituih him cuedon forðon hlafas ne onfenge wegewiste uutetlice ðe hælend cueð huæt smeas ge betuih iuih lytles geleafa forðon hlafas nabbassoðlice cueðo ic iuh sint sume oðera of her stondendum ða ðe ne suppas deað wið hia gesea sunu monnes cymmende in ric his& æfter dagum sex togenom ðe hælend & & broðer his & lædde hia in mor heh suindrige& oferhiuad wæs vel megwlitgad wæs befora hia & eftgescean onsione his suæ sunna wedo soðlice his geworden weron huita sua sna& heonu ædeaude him & mið him gesprecon vel sprecendegeonduearde soðlice cueð to hælend drihten god is us her to wossanne gif ðu wilt ic gedo her ðrea huso ðe an vel enne & an & aanða gett vel geana hine sprecende vel forðor he wæs sprecende heonu wolcen leht oferscyade hia & heono stefn of wolcen cueðende ðis is sunu min leaf vel diora in ðæm me wel gelicade ðene vel hine geheras& geherdon ða ðegnas gefeallon in onsione hiora & ondreardon suiðe& geneolecde ðe hælend & gehran him & cueð him arisas & nallas ge ondredeahofon uutetlice ego hiora nænig monn gesegon buta anum ðæm hælendþæt uutetlice ne ondspyrne we hea gae to sæ & sende ongul vel hoc & hine ðene fisc seðe ærist gestige nim & untynde vel untyned wæs muð his ðu onfindes vel begettes þæt wæs feor trymes vel trymum þæt ilca onfeng sel him fore meh & ðecin ðæm tid geneolecdon ða ðegnas to ðæm hælend hia cueðende huelc wenes ðu maast is in ric heofna& toceigde ðe hælend ðone lytle gesette hine in middum hiora& cueð soðlice ic sægo iuh buta gecerred sie & gie geworðe suæ lytlo ne inngaas gie in ric heofnaswæ huælc forðon eðmodiges vel beges hine suæ lytel cnæht ðes ðis is maast in ric heofna& seðe onfoas anum lytlum cnæhtum ðuslic in noma minum mec onfoasseðe soðlice geondspurnas enne of lytlum ðisum l ðasum/ seðe in mec gelefas behofas l behoflic him þæt he gehongiga coernstan asalda l asales byrðenstan in suire his & ofgedrenced sie in grund sæeswæ middangeard from ðæm ondspyrnisum ned vel ðarflic is forðon þæt hia cyme ondspyrniso buta þæt ane wæ ðæm menn ðerh ðone ondspyrnis cymesgif uutetlice hond ðin vel fot ðin ondspyrnað ðec cearf hine & worp from ðec god vel betra ðe is to life ingae unhal vel halt ðon tua honda vel tuoege foet hæbbende vel hæbbe sende in fyr ecesua & faeder min heofonlic gedoæs iuh gif ne gie ne forgefas an eghuelc broðer his of heartum iurum& geworden wæs miððy geendade ðe hælend word ðas gefoerde from galilea & cuom in gemæro ofer iordan& fylgende weron vel gefylgdon hine ðreatas menigo & gemde vel hælde hia ðer& geneolecdon to him cunnende hine & cueðende gif is rehtlih ðæm menn forleta wif his & sua huelc vel buta eghuelc inðingseðe onduearde cueð him & ge ne leornadon forðon seðe worohte from fruma woepenmonn & wifmonn geworhte hia& cuoeð fore ðis forlettes monn ðone fæder & moder & genehuas wife his & biðon tuoege in lichoma anreforðon gee vel uutedlice næ sint tuoe ah an lichoma þæt forðon god gegeadrade monn ne toslite vel tosceaðe vel suindriacuoedon him huæt forðon bebead sella boc freodomas & forletacueð him forðon to stiðnise heartes iures forgeaf iuh forleta wifa iura from fruma soðlice ne suæ wæsmonige soðlice biðon forðmesto hlætmæsto & ða hlætmesto forðmestogelic is forðon ric heofna ðæm menn fador hiorodes seðe foerde ærist vel ar in merne efnegelæda ða woercmenn in wingeard hisgesomnung uutedlice gewearð mið ðæm wyrcendum vel woercmonnum of penning dæghuæmlice sende hia in wingeard& gefoerde ymb tid ðy ðirdda gesæh oðero standende in sprec vel in ðingstow idlo& ðæm cueð gaað & gie in wingeard & þætte reht bið ic selo iuh ða uutedlice geeodoneftsona soðlice geeode ymb ða seista & non tid & dyde gelicymb ða ellefta ec geeade & gemoette oðero stondende & cuoeð him hwæt her stondes ge allen dæge idlocuoedun him forðon ænig menn usig efnegelæde cuoeð him gaað & gie in wingeardmiððy efern vel ic sædi uutedlice geworden were cuoeð hlafard ðære wingearde giroefæ his ceig ða wercmenn & geld him meard ongann from ðæm laetmestum wið ðæm forðmestummilsande wæs uutedlice hiora ðe hælend gehran ego hiora & sona gesegon & fylgende weron hine& miððy geneolecdon & cuomun ðæm styde to mor oliuetes ða ðe hælend sende tuoege ðegnascueð him geongas in cæsctra þæt wið iuh is & sona l recone ge infindes asal gebunden & fola mið hia unbindas & tolædas me& gif hua iuh huothuoego vel sum ðing cuoeða wælla cuoeðas gie forðon hlaferd ðisra nytt hæfeð & recone vel hraðe he forletes hia vel ða ilcoðis soðlice geworden wæs þætte were gefylled þæt acueden wæs ðerh ðone witgo cueðendocueðas doehter siones heonu cynig ðin cuom ðe bliðe vel biluit & sittende ofer asal & ðone fola suna undergeocasgeeadon uutedlice ða ðegnas dydon suæ heht him ðe hælend& tolæddon ða asal & ðone folo & gesetton ofer him wedo hiora & hine oferufa sitta dydonða monigo uutedlice ðreatas gebrædon wedo hiora oðero uutedlice hia geðurscon vel hia gesuingdon tuiggo of treum & gebredon vel legdon on weg& sohton hine to haldanne ondreardon ða menigo forðon suæ vel suelce witge hine hia hæfdon& gewondworde ðe hælend cueð eftsona in bispellum him cueðgelic geworden wæs ric heofna cynemenn seðe dyde ða færmo vel brydlopa sune his& sende ðegnas his togeceiga hia sie gehlaðad to ðæm færmum & naldon gecumaeftsona sende oðero ðegnas cuoeð cueðas ge hlaðas ge heonu symbel vel swoese min ic gearuade farras min & ofslageno & alle gegerwad cymes to ðæm færmumða ilco uutedlice forhogdon & gie eadon oðer in lond his oðer uutedlice to cepinc hisða oðero uutedlice gehealdon vel gefengon ðegnas his & mið fræceðo geyfled vel geteled ofslogunðe cynig uutedlice miððy geherde wurað wæs & weron gesendeno hergas his fordyde vel losade morðorslago ða ilco & byrug vel burug hiora gebarnða cueð ðeignum his færmo sum vel ec gegearwuad sindon ah ðaðe togehlaðad weron neron wyrðo& nænig monn mæge vel mæhte geonduearde him word ne ðe ðon gidyrstig wæs ænig of ðæm dæge hine forðor gefregnaða ðo hælend sprecend wæs to ðæm ðreatum & to ðegnum hiscueð ofer stol vel seatul geseton wuðuto &alle forðon ðaðe vel suæ huelce cuoeðas iuh behaldas & doas æfter werc hueðre hiora nallas ge gedoa coeðas forðon & ne doashia gebindas uutedlice byrðenna hefiga vel pisa & unberende vel unstyrendelico & settas in scyldrum vel bæccum monna mið finger uutedlice hiora nallas ða ymbcerræalle forðon werca hiora doað þætte hia sie gesene from monnum hia gebrædas forðon ðuuencgu hiora & miclas ða her vel wloehlufað forðon ða formo resto vel ðæ foresedlo in farmum & ða forma seatlas in somnungum& groetengo in sprec & hia ceiga l hia genemna from monnum laruasgie uutedlice nalleð ge þæt ge se geceigd laruas an forðon is laruu iuer alle forðon ge broðro ge aronwæ iuh uuðutum && ge legeras ðaðe getimbras vel hrinas byrgenno witgena & gehrinas byrgenna soðfæstra ic cueðo forðon iuh ne mec geseað gie nu hena wið gie cuoeða se gebledsad seðe cwom in noma drihtnes& gefoerde ðe hælend of tempele geeode & togeneolecdon ðegnas his þætte ædeadon him getimbro templeshe soðlice onduorde cueð him gie seas ðas alle soðlice ic cueðo iuh ne bið forleten her stan ofer stan seðe ne bið tostrogdenwæs sittende uutedlice he vel hine ofer mor oleuetes geneolecdon to him ðegnas deglihe cueðende cueð us hoenne ðas biðon & þæt vel huæt becon tocyme ðines & endung woruldes& onduearde ðe hælend cueð him geseas þæt nænig monn iuih gesuicamonig forðon cymmeð in noma minum cueðende ic am crist & monigo hia suicasmiððy geherend vel miððy gie geheras forðon ge biðon gefehto & woeno ðara gefehtana geseas gie ne se gie gestyred rehtlic is forðon ðas wosa vel sie ah nis ða geon is endeefne arisas forðon cynn in cynn & ric in ric & biðon monncwalmo vel uncuð adle & hungre vel/ hungro & eorðhroerniso ðerh stowaðas uutedlice alle frumma sint wærco vel adla& dæles hine & dal his settes mið legerum ðer bið wop & gristbiotung toðaðonne gelic bið ric heofna tewum hehstaldum ða onfengon lehtfato hiora geeodun ongeaen ðæm brydguma & ðær brydefifo uutedlice of ðæm weron idlo & fifo hogofæsteah fifo idlo gefengon vel genomun lehtfato ne genomun oele mið himhogofæste uutedlice onfengon oele in fetelsum hiora mið lehtfatumsuigo uutedlice dyde ðe brydgum geslepedon alle & geslepdonmiddum uutedlice næht lydeng geworden wæs heonu brydguma cwom gaes ongæn himða arioson alle hehstalde ða ilco & gehrindon lehtfato hioraidlo uutedlice ðæm snotrum cuoedon seles vel seallas us of ole iuerre forðon lehtfato usre gedrysned biðon& gaes ðas in tintergo ece soðfæste uutedlice in lif ece& geworden wæs vel gewarð miððy geendade vel ða geendade ðe hælend word ðas alle cweð ðegnum hiswutas gie forðon æfter tuæm dogrum vel dagum eastro biað & sunu monnes gesald bið þætte he se gehoen vel ahongenða gesomnad weron aldorsacerdas & ða ældra ðæs folces in cefertun ðæs aldorsacerdas seðe wæs gecueden vel haten caiphas& geðæhtungæ dedon þæt hia ðone hælend mið inwite genome vel hia gehealdon & ofslogecuoedon ðonne nalles in dæge symbel ðy læs ungerecc geworðe in ðæm folceðende ðonne wæs ðe hælend in bethania in huse symonis ðæs reafacuom to him wif hæbbende stænna fulle smirinisse diorwyrðe & ageaett on vel ofer heafud his vel ðæs lingendes æt geriordumgesegon vel þæt ða geseende uutedlice discipulas vel ðegnas abloncgne vel wraðe weron cwoeðende to hwon is forwyrd ðios& gemyste vel eftgemyndig wæs to word hælendes þæt he cueð ær ðon ðe hona creawa ðriga mec onsæcest & eode ut weop bitterlicemorgen ða hit gewærð geðæhtunge ineodun alle aldorsacerda & ældro ðæs folces wið ðone hælend þæt hine to deaðe saldon& gebundene gelaedon hine & saldon vel agefon ðæm undercynige vel geroefaða gesaeh se ðe hine salde forðon ðe he geniðrad wæs to hreownise gelædde gebrohte ðrittih scillinga aldor sacerda & ældrocuoeð ic synngade vel ic firinade sellende vel ic salde blod ðone soðfæst soð hia cuoedon huæt to us ðu gelocas vel gesiist/& worpende ða scillingas in tempel gewat & ðona eode vel ðona geongende mið sade hine awurigdeða aldor ðonne sacerda geniomende ða scillingas cuedon nemot monn senda hia in temple forðon feh vel worð blodes hit isto ðæhtunge ðonne geeodon gebohton of ðæm vel mið ðæm lond lamwrihta vel smiðes in bibyrignisa ellðiodigraforðon vel for ðis geceyged wæs lond ðe lond blodes wið ðone longa dæge vel wið ðiosne onduorda dægbituih ðæm wæs magdalenesca && & moder suna ða ilco uutedlice from eodon gefæstnadon þæt byrgenn mercande vel gemercadon ðone stan mið haldendumefern uutedlice ðiu vel ða gelihteð in forma doeg cuom ðiu magdalenesca & oðero to geseanne þæt byrgenn& heonu eorð hroernisse geworden wæs micil engel forðon drihtnes astag of heofnum & geneolecde eftawælte ðone stan & gesætt ofer hiawæs forðon megwlit his suæ leht & wede his sua snafore ego vel fyrihto uutedlice his alegd weron ða haldendo & aworden weron suelce fordeadoondswarede uutedlice ðe engel cuoeð ðæm wifum nallas gie ondrede iuh ic wat forðon þætte ðe hælend se ðe ahongen wæs gie soecasne is her aras forðon suæ cueð cymmas geseað þæt styd vel ðiu stou ðer asetted wæs drihten& hraeðe eode cuoðas ðegnum his þætte he aras & heonu foreliorað iwih in galilea ðer hine ge geseað vel gesea magon heonu fore ic cueð vel ær ic sægde iuh& eodun hreconlice from byrgenne mið ege & mið micle glædnise iornende beada vel sægca ðegnum hisgodspell æfter matheus sægde vel asæged isonginneð godspell æfter marcumfruma godspelles hælendes crist sunu godessuæ awritten is in esaia ðone witgo heonu engel min befora onsione ðin seðe foregearuas wege ðinstefn cliopendes in woestern gearuas woeg drihtnes rehta doeð vel wyrcas stigo vel geongas hiswæs iohannes in woestern gefulwade & bodade fulwiht hreownisses on forgefnisse synna& foerende wæs vel foerde to him all iudea lond & ða hierusolomisco waras alle & weoron gefulwad from him in iordanenes stream ondetende synno hiora& wæs iohannes gegerelad mið herum camelles & gyrdils fellera ymb sido his & lopestro & wudu hunig þæt wæxes on wudu binde brucende wæs vel gebrec& bodade cuoeðende cymes vel cwom strongre mec æfter mec his vel ðæs nam ic wyrðe forehlutende undoa ðuongas scoe hisic fulwade iwih mið wætre he uutedlice gefulwas iwih mið gaast halig& aworden wæs in dagum ðæm cuom se hælend from nazareth ðær byrig & gefulwad wæs in iordanen from iohanne& sona astag of wætre gesæh untyndo heofnas & gaast swelce culfre ofstigende & wunigende in ðæm vel on him& stefn geworden wæs of heofnum ðu arð sunu min leaf on ðec ic wel licade& sona ðe gast draf hine on woestern& wæs in woestern feoertig daga & feortig næhta & wæs acunnad from ðæm wiðero vel wiðerwearde & wæs mið wilde deorum & englas geherdon himæfter ðon ðonne vel ða gesald wæs iohannes cuom se hælend in galilea bodade godspell rices godes& cuoeðende forðon gefylled is tid & togeneolecde ric godes hreowigas & gelefes to godspell& færende æt sæ galiles gesæh ðone simon & andreas broðer his hia sendende hnetta in sæ weron forðon fisceras& cuoeð him se hælend cymað æfter mec & ic gedo iuih vel þæt ge sie fisceras monna& hreconlice miððy forleorton vel forletnum nettum fylgendo weron him& foerde ðona lytel huon gesæh iacob zebeðies sunu & ðone iohannem ðone broðer his & ða ilco vel hia in scip gesetton ða netto& sona geceigde hia & miððy forleort faeder his zebedeus in scip mið ðam celmertmonnum fylgedon l fylgende weron hine l him& infoerden capharnaum ða burug & sona ineode vel foerde to somnung lærde hia& swigdon vel styldon ofer lar his wæs forðon lerende hia swælce he mæht hæbbende vel hæfde & ne suæ uðuta& wæs in somnung hiora monn in gast unclæne & ofcliopadecuoeðende huæt us & ðe ðu hælend ðe nazare cwome ðu losige vel to losane usig ic wat hwæt ðu arð haligwer godes& bebead him se hælend cwoeðende suiga ðu & gaa of ðæm menn& bidtende vel bat hine se gast unclænæ & ofclioppende stefne micla vel mið micle stefne ofeode from him& wundrande weron alle ðus þætte hia gefregndon bituih him cuoeðende huæt ðæt is ðis huælc lar ðius vel ðas niua forðon vel þætte in mæht & gastum unclænum hatas & eðmodigað him& foerde vel gesprang mersung vel merðu his hraðe in all lond galileæ& recone foerdon of somnunge cuomon in hus symones & andreæ mið iacob &gelegen wæs ða swer symones febrende wæs & sona cuoeðað vel cuedon him of ðær vel of ðæm& cwom vel geneolecde ahof ða ilca & miððy gegrippen wæs hond his & reconlice forleort hia hal from februm & geembehtade himefern ðonne vel uutedlice vel ða gewarð miððy to sett eade sunna geferedon vel gebrohton to him alle yfle hæbbende & diowbla hæbbende& wæs all ceastre l alle burgwaras gesomnad to duru l to gæt& lecnade vel gemde monigo ðaðe geswoenced woere vel weron gesuoencde missenlicum adlum & dioblas menigo he fordraf ut vel afirde & nalde leta spreca hia vel ne lefde hia to spreccanne forðon wiston hine& on æring suiðe aras foerde vel færend ðona eode on woestigum stouo vel styd & ðer gebæd& fylgend wæs him simon & ðaðe mið hine woeron& miððy onfundon hine cuedon him forðon vel þætte alle soecað ðec& cuoeð to him gæ we vel wutum geonga in ða neesto lond & ða ceastre þæt ec ðer ic bodiga & to ðis forðon ic cwom& wæs bodande in somnungum hiora & alle galileæ & diobles fordraf vel worpend& cwom to him licðrower bæd hine l giornede hine & mið cnewbeging cuoeð gif ðu wilt ðu mæht meh geclænsigase hæ vel ða wæs milsande his gerahte hond his & gehran vel hrinande him cueð to him ic willo geclænsiga& miððy gecueð sona foerde from him ðiu riofol & geclænsad wæs& bebead him sona draf hine& cuoeð him to gesih ðu þæt nenigum menn ðu coeðe ah gaa ædeaw ðec ðæm aldor sacerda & gef fore clænsunge ðin ða ðe heht moises in cyðnisse himsoð he foerde ongann bodiga & mersiga þæt word ðus þætte uutedlice ne mæhte ewunga in ða ceastra ingeonga vel incuma ah uta in woestigum stowm wæs vel were & gesomnadon vel efnegecwomon to him eghuona vel from halfe gehuelc& eftersona infoerde capharnaum ða burg æfter dagum & gehered wæs þætte in hus were& efne cuomon monigo ðus þætte ne mæhte foa vel nioma ne to duru & sprecend wæs him vel spræc him word& cuomon feredon vel brengende to him ðone eorðcrypel se ðe from feworum& hine ne mæhtun gebrenga hine him fore menigo genacedon vel unðehton þæt hus ðer wæs & geopnadon adunesendon þæt ber on ðæm se eorðcryppel laeg vel licgende wæsmiððy gesæh ðonne se hæ vel geleafo hiora vel ðara cuoeð ðæm eorðcrypple suna forgefen biðon ðe synna vel synno/weron uutedlice ðer sume of uðuutum sittende & ðencendo vel smeande in heartum hiorahwæt ðes swæ vel ðus spreces ebolsas hua maeg forgeafa vel forleta synna nymðe an godofðon sona ongætt vel miððy þæt oncneow se hælend gast his þætte suæ smeadon vel ðohton bituih him cueð to him huæt ðas gie smeað in hearto hiurumhwæt is eaður to coeðanne ðæm eorðcryple forgefen biðon ðe synno vel cuoeða aris & nim vel ber bere ðin & gaaþætte wutedlice wutað gie ðætte he mæht hæfeð sunu monnes on eorðo forgefnise synno cwoeð ðæm eorðcryppleðe ic cueðo aris nim ber ðin & gaa in hus ðin& sona he aras underleat þæt ber eode before allum suæ þætte ofwundredon alle & hia worðedun god cuoeðende þætte næfra ðus vel sua we gesegon& færende wæs eftersona & sæ vel ec to sæ & all ðreat cymende wæs to him & lærde hia& miððy ðona foerde gesæh sittende to & cuoeð to him soec mec vel fylg me & aras fylgende wæs hine& geworden wæs miððy gelionede in hus ðæs monigo bærsunigo & synnfullo ætgeadre geræston vel linigiendo weron mið ðone hæ vel & ðegnum his weron forðon menigo ðaðe & fylgdon vel fylgendo weron him vel hine& wuðuto & ða ældo gesegon forðon vel þætte he æt vel ett mið synnfullum & bærsynnigum hia cuedon ðegnum his forhuon mið bærsynnigum & synnfullum ettes & drincað laruu iuermiððy geherde ðis se hælend cueð to him ne nedðarf habbað halo to lece ah ða ðe yfle habbað ne forðon cwom ic to ceigenne soðfæsto ah synfullo& weron ðegnas iohannis & fæstendo & cwomon & cwedon him forhwon ðegnas iohannis & hia fæstað ðine uutedlice ðegnas ne fæstað& cuoeð to him se hælend ahne magon suno ða huile ðe brydgwuma mið him is fæsta sua longe tid vel huile habbað mið brydgum ne magon fæstacymeð ðonne dagas miððy genumen bið from him ðe brydguma & ða hia fæstas in ðæm doegenenig niwes flyhtes siuieð gegerelo aldum oðer ðing from nimmeð fyllnise niwe of alde & mara toslitnessa bið& nænig monn sendeð win niwe in byttum aldum mara woen toslitteð þæt win ða bytto & þæt win bið agotten & ða bytto losað ah þæt win niwe in byttum niwum senda is rehtlic& gewearð & geworden wæs eftsona miððy sunnedagum eode ðerh & ðegnas his ongunnun forðgeonga &ðonne cuoedon him heonu huæt doað gie þæt nis alefed& cueð to him ne leornade ge huæt dyde ða ned hæfde & hyngerde he & ðaðe mið hinie weronhuu inneode hus godes under aldor sacerda & hlafo foregegearwad vel temised gebrec ða nere lefed to eattanna nymðe sacerdum & salde ðæm ðaðe mið hine weron& cuæð to him restdæg fore menn geworden wæs & næs monn fore ræstdægeforðon hlafurd is sunu monnes ec to ræstdaege& ineode eftsona on ða somnung & wæs ðer monn hæfde hond drygi& behealdon hine gif vel hueðer on haligdagum gegemde þætte hia geteldon vel niðria hine& cueð ðæm menn hæbbende hond drygi aris in middum& cueð to him is alefed hræstdagum wel wyrce vel yfle ða sawele hal gedoa vel losiga soð hia suigdon& ymbsceawde hia mið wræððo unrotsade ofer ungleownise heartæs hiora cueð to ðæm menn aðen hond ðin & aðenede & eft geboetad wæs hond himða eodon ðonne sona mið heroðes ðegnum ðæhtung hia dedon wið him huu hine losiga maehton& ðe hælend mið ðegnum his foerde to sæ & menigo ðread of & fylgende wæs hinefrom hierusalem & from & ofer & ða ðe ymb tyre & sidone menigo miclo herdon vel herend weron ða ðe he wyrcende wæs cwomon to him& cueð ðegnum his þætte scip him gebrohton vel geherdon fore ðæm menigo þætte hia ne fortredon hinemonigo forðon he gehælde ðus þætte hia raesdon on him þætte him hie gehrindon vel hrina mæhtæs sua feolo vel sua oft ðonne hia hæfdon uncuð aðlo& gasto unclæno miððy hine gesegon vel gesea mæhton gefeollon vel hluton him & hia weron clioppende vel cliopadon cweðendo ðu arð sunu godes& swiðe bebead him þætte hia ne æwades vel mersades hine& astag on mor ceigde to him ðailco walde he & cwomun to him& dyde þætte hia were twelfo mið him & vel ec þætte sende hia bodiga godspell& salde him mæht gemnisses to untrymnissum & towyrpnise diowla& gesette to symone noma petre& iacob yebeðies sunu & iohannem broðer iacobes & gesette him þæt is suno ðunres& andreas & philippum & & & & iacob ðe hwita & & simon ðe channanesca& seðe ec salde hine & cumað vel cwomon to huse& efne cwom eftersona ðiu menigo ðus þætte ne mæhton ne hlaf bruca& miððy geherdon his eodon to haldanne hine cuoedon forðon þætte on wræðo gecerred wæs& wuðuuto ðaðe from hierusalem ofstigon vel ðona cuomon hia cuoedon þætte vel forðon hæfeð & forðon on aldor diowla drifeð diowlas& efne geceigdo ða ilco vel miððy geceigd weron ða ilco in bispellum cuoeð he ðo ðæm vel to him huu mæge ðe wiðerword ðone wiðerwearda fordrifa vel huu mæg ðe diowl ðone diowl fordrifa& gif þæt ric in him todæled bið vel sie ne mæge stonde ric ðæs& gif hus ofer hia seolfa sie tostrogden ne mæg hus ða ilca stonde& gif vel ðeah se wiðerwearda efne arisa on hine sulfne toworpen wæs vel bið & ne mæg gestonde ah ende hæfeðnænig monn mæg fato stronges ingaað vel ingeonga in hus to niommanne vel genioma vel gereofa ge nymðe ærist ðone stronga gebinde & ðonne hus his reafaðsoð ic cueðo iowh þætte alle forgefen biðo vel forleten biðon sunum monno synno & ebolsungas of ðæm hia ebolsadonseðe ðonne vel uutedlice ebolsas on haligne gast ne hæfeð eft forgefnisse in ecnisse ah synnig vel scyldig bið ðæs ece scyldforðon hia cuoedon ðone gast unclæne hæfes& cuomon moder his & broðero & uta stondes sendon to him ceigendo vel ceigdon hine& gesætt ymb hine ðreat & cuoedon him heonu moder ðin & broðro ðin uta soecað ðec& onsuarade him cwoeð huæt ðiu is vel huæt ða sint moder min & brodro min& ymblocade vel sceaude hia vel ða ðaðe utan ymb his hia setton cueð heonu moder min & broðero minseðe forðon doeð willo godes ðis broðer min & swoester min & moder is& eftersona ongann læra to sæ & gesomnad wæs to him ðreat menigo sua þætte in scipp astag gesætt on sæ & all ðreat ymb sæ ofer eorðo wæs& lærde hia in bispellum menigo & cuoeð to him on lar hisherað heono eode ðe sawende vel sedere to sawenne& miððy geseaw oðer vel sum feoll ymb ða stret & cwomon flegendo & fretton vel eton ðætsum ec feoll ofer stænes ðer ne hæfde eorðu michel vel menig & hræðe uppiornende wæs vel arisæn wæs forðon næfde heanisse eorðes& ða arisen wæs vel ða uppeode wæs sunna gedrugade vel forbernde forðon næfde wyrtruma gedrugade& sum feoll is ðornum & astigon vel uppeodun ðornas & underdulfon þæt & wæstm ne salde& oðer feoll on eorðu godum & salde wæstm stigende & wæxende & tobrohte enne vel an ðrittig & an sexdig & an hundrað& he cuoeð se ðe hæfeð earo to heranne geherað& miððy wæs syndrigon gefrægndon hine ða ðaðe mið him weoron mið tuelf bispell& cueð to him iouh gesald is þæt ge wita hernise rices godes ðæm uutedlice ðaðe uta sint in bispellum alle biðonþætte gesegon geseað & ne geseað & ða herend geherað & ne oncnaweð ðylæs biðon gehwerfed vel gecerred & bið forgefen him synna& cueð to him ne cunnige bispell ðas & huu alle bispello gie gecunnas vel gie cunna gie magonseðe saueð word saueððas uutedlice aron seðe ymb woeg ðer bið gesauen word & miððy geherdon sona cuom vel cymeð ðe wiðerworda & geniomað word þætte gesawen wæs in hearta hiora& ðas sint gelic ðaðe ofer stænero saues vel sauað ðaðe miððy geherdon vel geherað word sona mið glædnise onfoeð þæt& nabbað wyrtryma soða vel æfterðon miððy aras costung & oehtnisse fore word sona vel hræðe geondspurnad bið& oðero sint ðaðe on ðornum hia saueð vel sauas ðas sint ðaðe word geherað& telnisse woruldes & loswist walana vel weala & ymb æfterra vel oðero vel hlaf lustgiornisses ineoden underdelfad word & buta wæstm bið gemoetat& ða sint ðaðe ofer eorðo god gesauen sint ða ðe herað word & onfoað & wæstmiað an ðrittig & an sextig & an hundraðnis forðon ænig ðing gedegled þætte ne bið ædeauad ne aworden wæs degle ah þætte in eauung cymeðgif hua hæfeð earo hernisses geherað& cuoeð he to him geseað huæt gie heras on sua huælc gewege gewoegen gie biðon eft gewoegen bið iowh & gesald bið vel geeced bið iowhseðe forðon hæfed gesald bið him & seðe næfeð uutedlice þætte hæfeð genumen bið from him& he cuoeð ðus is ric godes huu suæ gif monn worpað ðone sawende vel sedere on eorðo& slepiað vel slepeð & arisað on næht & on daeg & sed wæxað vel wyrtrumiað & inwæxað ða huile ne wat ðelustum forðon eorðo wæstmiað ærist gers æfterðon ðone ðorn soðða full hwæte in eher& miððy hine forðbrohte wæstm sona sende ripisern forðon cwom ripes tid& cuoeð to hwæm we gelicleta welle ric godes vel to huæm ða bispello miððy we gegearuagað ðætsuæ corn sinapis þæt miððy gesawen wæs on earðu læsest is allum seðum ðaðe aron on eorðu& miððy gesauen wæs astag & bið mara allum wyrtum vel græsum & doæð vel wyrcað telgo vel twiggo miclo ðus vel suæ þætte hia magon under scua his fuglas heofnæs bya vel wunia& mið ðullucum monigum bispellum he gespræc to him word suæ suiðe hia mæhton geherabuta biseno vel bispello uutedlice ne wæs spræccend vel ne spræcc to him syndrige uutedlice ðegnum his tosceadade vel trahtade vel he sægde alle& cwæð to him on ðæm dæge miððy efern vel smoltnis vel smyltnis were awordæn fære wæ ofer togægnas& forleorton ðone here vel forletende ðreat togenomon hine suæ þætte hia weron in scip & oðero scipo weron mið him& geworden wæs windræs vel yrte michelo windes & yð sende vel wæs færende in þæt scipp sua þætte gefylled wæs ðæt scip& wæs ðe vel he in scipp on vel oferufa bolstare slepende & awehton hine & cuoedon to him laruu ne to ðe byreð forðon vel þæt we sie dead vel ne reces ðu þæt we deado sie& aras stiorend wæs to winde & cueð to ðæm sae swiga wes dum & blann vel hræste þæt wind & geworden wæs smyltnisse miclo vel michelo& cueð to him hwætd frohto vel forhto arogie vel gebiðon vel gesint ne get habbað ge ðone geleafa& ondreardon mið micelo fyrhto & hia cuedon him bitwien hua woenes ðu is ðes forðon vel þætte ec wind & sæ herað vel edmodað him vel hersumiað& cuomon ofer swira vel ofer luh ðæsæs on lond gerasenorum& miððy eade him of scip recone togægnes arn him of byrgennum vel of bendum mon in gast unclæneseðe hus vel lytelo by hæfde in byrgennum & ne hraccentegum huil vel uutedlice ænig monn hine mæhte gebindaforðon oftust vel symle mið feotrum & mið hracentegum gebunden wæs toslat ða hracengo & ða fattro forbræc vel tosceænde & nænig monn mæhte hine temma vel halda& symle næht & dege in byrgennum vel in fæstnungum & morum wæs & cliopende & falletande vel ðærscende hine to stanumgesæh ða ðone hælend fearre to gearn & worðade hine& clioppende stefne miclo cuoeð hwæt me & ðe ðu hælend sunu godes ðæs heista ic halsigo ðec ðerh god ne mec þæt ðu mec ne wuuræccecuoeð forðon to him gaa ðu gaast unclæne from ðæm menn& gefregn hine huætd ðe to noma is & cuoeð to him here to noma me is forðon monig we sindon& biddende wæs vel bæd hine suiðe long þætte hine ne fordrife buta ðæt londwæs uutedlice ðer ymb ðone mor wuorn berga vel swina michil foedende& bedon hine ða gaastas cwoeðendo send usic in ðæm bergum þætte in him vel in ðæm we ingeonga vel gæ& gelefde him vel ðæm recone se hælend & miððy færende weron ða gastas unclæno ineodon in ðæm bergum & mið miclo hræs vel ongeong worn todrifen wæs in sæ to twæm ðusendum & underdrencdo wæron in sæseðe vel ðaðe uutedlice foeddon hia geflugon & sægdon in ða ceastre & in londum & færende woeron to geseanne huæt were ðæs wercæs& cwomon to ðæm hælend & gesegon hine l ðene seðe from diowle gebered wæs sittende gecladed l gegerelad & hales ðohtes & ondreardon& sægdon ðæm ðaðe gesegon hulic geworden were him seðe diowl hæfde & of bergum& bidda hine ongunnun þætte afirrade from gemærum hiora& miððy astigon ðæt scip ongann hine gebidda seðe from diowle auæled vel gebered wæs þætte were mið him& ne forleort hine ah cueð to him gaa in hus ðin to ðinum & tosæg him huu micla ðe drihten dyde & milsande sie ðines& eode & ongann bodiga in ðær byrig huu micla him dyde se hælend & alle gewundradon& miððy oferstag se hælend in scip eft ofer ðæt luh efnecwom ðread menigo to him & wæs ymb sæ& cuom sum monn of hehsomnungum genemned wæs iarus & gesæh hine feoll vel hleat to fotum his& bæd hine longa cuoeðende forðon vel þætte dohter min in utmestum is cym onsett hond ofer hia þætte hia hal sie & hia hlifige& eode mið him & fylgede hine ðreato menigo & geðringdon hine vel ðene& vel ec þæt wif ðy wæs in utiorninsc blodes wintrum twoelfum& wæs menigo vel feolo ðrowungo vel ðrouenda vel geðolad from swiðe monigum lecum & miððy gesald wæs alle hire ðingo ne æniht gehalp ah swiðor wyrse hæfdemiððy geherde from hælend cwom in ðreat bihianda & gehran woede hisgecuoeð forðon forðon gif vel gegerelo his ic hrino ic hal beom vel gehæled ic biom& hrecone vel sona gedrugad wæs esprynge blodes hire & gefoelde mið lichoma þætte gehæled were from adle& sona ðe hælend ongeat on hine seoflen þæt mæht seðe eode from him efnegecerde to ðæm folce he gecwoeð hwa gehran gewedo mino& cwoedon to him ðegnas his ðu gesiist ðæt ðreat ðringende ðec & ðu cuoeðes hua me gehran& ymbsceawade to geseanne hia vel ðailco ðyu ðis dydeþæt wif uutedlice ondreard & forohtade wiste þætte geworden were on hir cuom & gefeall befora hine & cuoeð to him all þæt soðesthe uutedlice vel ðonne cwoeð to hir la dohter gelæafa ðin ðec hal dyde gaa in sibb & wæs hal from adle ðineða geone hine vel he sprecende cuomon from ðæm folces aldormenn cuoðende forðon dohter ðin dead is huætd lengc vel forðor styres ðu ðone laruuse hælend uutedlice word þætte gecuoeden wæs geherde cuoeð to ðæm aldormenn nelle ðu ondrede ah ðæt ana nu gehlef& ne leort ænigne monno to fylgenne hine buta petre & iacob & iohannem broðer iacobes& cuomon in hus ðæs aldormonnes gesaeh þæt wanung & woepende & mæniende suiðe& ineode cuoeð to him huætd vel forhuon arogie gestyred & gie hremas þæt mæden ne is dead ah sleped& inhlogan hine he hueðre miððy fordrifenum allum vel miððy alle ute fordraf genom ðone fader & moder ðæra maedne & ðaðe mið him weron & infoerde ðer wæs ðæt mæden licende& geheald hond dære mægdne cuoeð to hir talitha ðis is ebrisc word þæt is getrahtad in latin la dohter vel la mægden ðe ic sægo aris& sona aras þæt mægden & geeode vel geongende wæs wæs uutedlice wintra tuoelfo & forestyldton feersuigo mið ðær maaste& bebead ðæm suiðe þæt nænig monn þæt wiste & cuoeð sealla hir eatta& foerde ðona eode in oeðel his & fylgedon hine ðegnas his& gewarð haligdoeg vel sunnadoeg ongann in somnung vel in sprec lære & monigo geherdon gewundrade woeron in lar his cuoeðende hwona ðisum ðas alle & hwælc is snytru ðiu gesald is him & mæhto ðullico ðaðe ðerh honda his biðon gedoenahne ðis is smið vel wyrihte sunu maries broðer iacobes & iosephes & & ahne & suoestro his her mið usic sint vel biðon & geondspurned vel geondspyrned weron in him& cuoeð to him se hælend forðon ne is witge buta worðung l worðnis buta l ah on oeðel his & in cyððo his & in hus his& ne mæhte ðer mæht ænige gewyrce buta hwon untrymigo mið onsetnum hondum gegemde vel gehælde& gewundrad wæs fore ungehleaffulnise hiora & ymbeode ða portas utanymb gelærde& efnegeceigde tuoelfo & ongann hia sende tuoge & gesalde him vel ðæm mæht gasta unclænra& bebead him vel ðæm ne æniht hia gelædde vel genomo on woeg buta gerd an ne poha vel posa ne hlaf ne on gyrdils mæslenah gescoed mið ðuongum & ne gegearuad were mið tuæm tunucum vel tuæm cyrtlum& gecuoeð to him sua hwider vel suahuælc gie gaas in hus ðer wunað wið vel oðð ðæt gie geonge ðona& suahuelc seðe ne onfoeð iuh ne gehereð iuh miððy gie gaas ðona sceacas vel drygas þæt asca of fotum iurum in cyðnisse himmiððy geeado forebodadon vel foresægdon þæt hreawnise dedon& diowlas menigo fordrifon & smiredon mið ole menigo untrymigo & gehældon& geherde herodes cynig eawunge forðon geworden wæs noma his & cuoeð forðon iohannes ðe fullwihtere eft aras from deadum & forðon unwoen sint mæht in him vel in ðæmoðero uutedlice cuoedon forðon helias is oðero ec cuoedon witgo is swelce an from witgommiððy þæt geherde herodes cuoeð ðone ic gecearf iohannen ðis from deadum eft arasse forðon herodes sende & geheald iohannen & geband hine in carcern fore herodiades hlaf philipes broðer his forðon lædde hinecuoeð forðon iohannes herode ne is gelefed ðe to habbanne hlaf broðres ðinesherodia uutedlice gesetnade him & walde ofslaa hine ne mæhteherodes forðon ondreard iohannen wiste hine wer soðfæst & halig & geheald hine & miððy geherde hine menigo he gedede vel gedyde/ & lustlice hine geherde& miððy dæg maccalic gecuom l geneolecde herodes cennise his farma l symbel dyde l worhte ðæm aldormonnum & holdum & forwostum galileæs& miððy ineode dohter ðære herodiades & plægede & gelicade vel & miððy gelicade herode ec mið vel & ædgeadre ðæm hlingendum cynig cuoeð ðæm mægdne giuig vel wilnig from me þætte ðu willt vel wælle & ic sello ðe& suwor hir forðon vel þætte suæ hwæt ðu gegiuas ic sello ðe ðah se a half rices minesðiu miððy from eode cuoeð moeder hire huæt ic giuge wælle & hiu cuoeð heafud iohannis fulwihteresmiððy inneode sona mið oefeste to cynige wilnade cuoeð ic willo þætte reconlice ðu selle me in disc heofud iohannis fulwihteres& unrodsade se cyning fore að gesuoerenum & fore ec mið restende walde hia unrotsigeah sende sceware geheht to gebrenga heafud his in disc & gecearf hine in carchern& tobrohte heafud his in disc & salde þæt ðær mægdne & þæt mægden cuoeð moder hismiððy geherdon ðegnas his cuomon & lædon lichoma his & gesetton þæt in byrgenne& efnecwomon ða apostolas to ðæm hælende eftgesægdon him alle ðaðe dydon & lærdon& cuoeð to him cymes sundrig in woestig styd & restas huon woeron forðon ðaðe cuomun & eftcuomon vel menigo ne etes first hæfdon& astigedon in scip foerdon in woestig styd sundur& gesegon hia geongende & ongeton monigo & foeðemenn & of allum ceastrum efnegeuurnun ðider & before gecuomon hia& eode gesaeh micelo ðreat se hælend & milsanðe wæs ofer hia forðon weron suelce scip ne hæfdon hiorde & ongann læra hia feolo vel monigo& miððy soðlice stando vel monigo wæs geneolecdon ðegnas his cuoeðende unbyed is styd ðis ec soð tid is foregeead vel tid eadeforlet hia vel ða þætte hia geonga in ða nesta gemæro & londo bycges vel ceapas him metto ða ette& geonduaearde cueð to ðæm selles him eatta & cuoedon him miððy geeadon bycge we mið penningum tuæm hundum hlafo & selle we him to ettanne vel to brucanne& cuoeð to him hu monig hlafo habbað gie gaað & geseað & miððy oncneawn vel ongeton cuoedon fif & tuoege fiscas& heht him þætte gesniða gedydon alle æfter ofer groene gers& todældon in dalum ðerh hundrað & ðerh fiftigum& miððy weron onfence fif hlafo & tuæm vel tuem fiscas locade in heofne gebloedsade & gebrægc ða hlafo & salde ðegnum his þætte hia gesetta before hia & tuoege fisces dælde allum& eton alle & gefylled vel gefylde weron& genomon ða hlafo ðara screadunga tuoelf ceaulas fulle & of fiscumwoeron uutedlice ða ðe brecon vel eton fif ðusendo wæro vel wærana& sona geðreate ðegnas his astige ðæt scip þætte hia foreeode hine ofer luh to ðær byrig ða hwile he forleorte ðæt folc& miððy forleorte hia geeode on mor gebidda& miððy efern vel smolt woere wæs scip in middum sæes & he ana on eorðu& gesæh hia wynnennde in rowincg wæs forðon wind wiðerword him & ymb ða fearða wacan næhtes cuom to him geongende ofer sæe & walde bicerre hiasoð hia þæt gesegon hine geongende ofer sae hia woendon yfel wiht were & ceigdon vel clioppadonalle forðon hine gesegon & unrodsad vel gestyred weron & sona gesprecend wæs mið him & cwoeð to him gelefes ic am nallað gie ondrede& astag to him in scip & geblann þæt wind & forðor suiðe bituih him stylton vel suigdonne forðon oncneaun of hlafum wæs forðon hearta hiora foregeblind vel foregeðistrat& miððy oferfoerdon ðerh cuomon on earðo ðæs folces genatzeareth && miððy færende wæron of scip sona ongeton hine& ðerh wurnon all lond ða ilca ongunnun in berum hia ða ðe yfle hæfdon ymb beara ðer geherdon hine æd he were& swa huider infoerde in londum l in mærum l in ceastrum in plæcum geseton ða untrymigo & gebedon hine þætte l fasne gewoede his gehrinon & sua oftor gehrinon hine hale gewurdon& cwomon toi him & sume oðer of uðuutum cymende from hierusolim& miððy gesegon sume oðero from ðegnum his gemænelicum mið hondum þæt is unðuegenum eata hlafo forcuoedonfordon & alle iudei buta oftor geðuogon hondo ne etton gehealdon setnesse vel selenisse aeldra& from ðingstow sie gefulwuad ne etto hia & oðero menigo sint ða ðe gesald aron ðæm vel him to haldanne fuulwihta calica vel disca & & && gefrugnun hine & uðuuto forhuon ðegnas ðine ne geongas æfter gesettnisse vel geselenise ældra ah unclænum hondum eatas hlafsoð he onduearde cuoeað to him wel gewitgade of iuih legerum suæ awritten is folc ðis mið muðum mec worðias hearta uutetlice hiora long is from mein idilnisse uutedlice mec worðiað gelærende laruo boda monnaeft forleorton forðon beboda godes gie haldas setnesse monna fulwihta ombora & calica & oðero gelico ðisum wundrum monigo& cuoeð to him woel bismerlice gie doeð bebod godes þæt selenise iuer gie haldasmoses forðon cuoeð worðig fæder ðin & moder ðin & seðe miscuoeðas feder vel moder mið deaðe gedeðed segie uutedlice cuoeðas gif he cuoeðas monn feder vel moeder geafa þæt is geafa þæt sua huæt from me ðe gewæxe& lustume ne forgefes gie hine ænig gewyrca vel gedoa feder his vel moedereft gie toslitas word godes ðerh setnesa iuera ðone gie saldon & biseno ðuslico monigo gie doas vel wyrcas& togeceigde eft þæt folc cuoeð to him heres gie mec alle & oncnauas gienoht is buta monna inngaas in hine þæt mæhge hine gewidlige ah ða ðe of menn forecymeð ða sint ðaðe gewidlas ðonegif hua haefes earo to heranne gehera& miððy ingeeode in hus from ðreate gefrugnun hine ðegnas his bissen& cuoeð to him sua ec gie unhogo arogie ne oncneawesgie forðon alle uta inneode vel inngaas in ðone monno ne mæge hine gewidligeforðon ne inngaað in hearta his ah in womb & in utgeong l in feltun utgaas clænsas alle metocuoeð uutedlice forðon ða ðe of menn utgaað ða gewidlegas ðone monnofrom innueeard forðon of heorta monno smeaungas yfle ofcymeð unrehtwisnise esuicnis unsceomfulnise derne legero unrehthaemedo morðorslagoðiofunto gitsungas ego yfel efolsong oferhygd unwisdomall ðas yfelo of innweard forecymeð & wiðlað vel ðone monno& ðona aras foerde in gemærum tyres & sidonis & ineode hus nænig monn walde wutta & ne maehte gehælaþæt wif forðon sona þætte geherde from him hire vel ðære hæfde dohter gaast unclæne infoerde & forefeoll to fotum hiswæs uutedlice þæt wif hæðen ðæs cynnes is nemned syrophoenisa & bedon hine þætte ðone diowl he forwurpe vel fordrife of vel from dohter hirehe cuoeð to ðæm let vel blinn ærist þæt ðu gefoeda ða suno ne is forðon god to onfoanne hlaf ðara suno & senda hundumsoð hiu onduearde & cuoeð him uutedlice la drihten forðon ec hwoelpes under bead hia eattas of screadungum ðæra cnæhta& cueð to hir fore ðis word gaa eode ðe diowl of dohter ðinra& miððy gefoerde vel geeode to hus hire gemitte vel infand þæt maegden liccende ofer vel on bedd & þæt diowl ofeade& eftersona ðona foerde of gemærum tyres cuom ðerh sidon to sae galilæs bituih medo gemæro of decapolis& tolaeddon him deaf & dumb & gebedon hine þætte onsette him hond& togegrap vel gelahte hine of ðæm folce sundurlice sende fingeras his in earliprico & gebleuu gehran tunga his& onfeng in heofonum & cuoeð him þæt is to untyn& sona untyndo woeron earo his & unbunden wæs gebend tungæs his & spreccend wæs rehtlice& bebead ðæm ilcom þætte ne ænigum men hia gecuoede vel ne gesægde sua suiðe uutedlice him forebead swa swa suiðor mara forðor hi bodadon& hine vel of ðon forðor togewundradun hia ðus cuoeðende wel alle dyde & deofo dyde þætte hia geheras & dumbo þætte hia gesprecasin ðæm dagum eftersona miððy ðreat monigo wæs ne hæfdon þætte hia eton vel mæhton eata efnegeceigendum ðegnum cuoeð to himic milsa ofer ðreat forðon heno gee vel soðlice ðrio dogor ge vel abidas mec ne habbas hia þætte hia geette& gif ic forleto hia fæstende in hus hiora hia gelosað on woeg summe menn forðon of ðæm fearre cuomon& geondueardon him ðegnas his huona ðas mæge hua vel hwelc her gefylle mið hlafum on woestern& gefraign vel geascade hia huu feolo lafo habbað gie ðaðe cuoedon seofo& bebead ðæm folce todæla onufa vel ofer eorðo & onfeng ða seofo hlafas ðoncungo dyde gebræcc & he gesalde ðegnum his þætte hia togesette & togeseton hia ðæm ðreate& hia hæfdon lyttelra fisca huon tueg & ða ilco gebloedsade & heht tosette& eton & gefylde woeron & genomon þætte ofergehlæfed wæs of ðæm screadungum seofa cewlas vel mondowoeron soðlice ðaðe eton suelce feower ðusendo & forleort hia& hreconne astag þæt scip mið ðegnum his cuom on dalum vel on londum ðære megða& foerdon ða aelaruas & ongunnun efnegesoeca mið hine þæt hia sohton vel soecende from him becon of heofne costendo hine& seofade vel gemænde mið gaste cuoeð huæt cneoureso das vel huætd ðius ðeod soecað becon soðlice ic sægo iuh ne bið sald cneoreso ðisum becon& forleort hia astag eftersona gefoerde ofer þæt luh& forgetne woeron onfengo vel to onfoane hlafas & buta anum hlafe ne hæfdon mið in scip& bebead ðæm vel him cuoeðende geseað behaldas from daersto ðæra ælaruas & from dærsto heroðis& hia geðohton him bituen ðus cuoeðende þætte vel forðon hlafas vel hlafos ne habbas weofðon ongaet se hælend cuoeð ðæm vel him huætd smeas gie forðon hlafo nabbas gie ne get oncnauas gie & ne gie cunnon ðageon vel get ðiostrig vel blind is gie habbað hearta iuerego habbað gie vel hæbbende ne geseað gie & earo gie habbað ne geherað gie ne eft ðohto gie vel ðences giehuonne
