vel huu fif hlafas ic bræcc on fif ðusendo & huu monig mondo ðara screadunga fulle gie genomon vel geberon cuoedon him tuoelfohuoenne l ða & seofo hlafas on feuer ðusendo huu monig ceolas ðæra screadunga gie nomon & cuoedon to him seofana& he gecuoeð to him huu ne ðageon vel get gie oncnauas& cuomon to bethsaiða ðær byrig & tolæddon him blindne monno & gebedon hine þætte hine vel ðone gehrinde& togelahte hond ðæs blindæs ofgelæde ðene vel hine buta ðæm londe & speaft on ego his onsetnum hondum his gefrægn hine vel ðene gif vel huoeðer huoelc huoego gesege& upplocade vel ymbsceuade cuoeð ic geseom menn suoelce treuo geongendeæfterðon eftersona onsette hondo ofer ego ðæs vel his & ongann gesea & eftniuad wæs sua vel ðus þætte gesege gleoulice alle& sende ðene vel hine in hus his ðus cuoeðende gaa in hus ðin & gif on lond ðu gegaas vel geongas nænigum menn ðu gecuoeðe ðis vel gesæge& gofoerde l færende wæs se hælend & ðegnas his in ceastra philipes & on woeg gefrægn ðegnas his cuoeð to him huoelc mec cuoeðas þæt ic sie ðas mennða ðe ondueardon him cuoeðende iohannes se fuluihtere oðero heliam oðero ec suoelce enne of witgumða cuoeð to him gie æc huoelc mec gie cuoeðas þæt ic sie geonduearde petrus cuoeð him ðu arð crist& forbead vel stiorde vel stiorend wæs him ne ænigum gecuedon hia of him& ongann læra hia forðon is rehtlic sunu monnes feolo geðoliga & forcuma from ældum & from hehsacerdum & from uuðuutum & ofslaa & æfter ðriim dagu eft arisa& eaunga word he wæs spræcend vel he gespræcc & gelahte hine petrus ongann geðreadtaige hineseðe gecerde ymb & gesæh ðegnas his stiorde vel forbeadend wæs petre cuoeðende geong on bæcc vel mec behianda ðu wiðerworda forðon ne oncnauas ðu ðaðe vel ða ðing godes sint ah ða ðe sint monno& geceiged l gecliopad wæs þæt folc mið ðegnum his cuoeð to him gif hua wællæ æfter mech fylga onsæcce hine seoflen l him seolfum & lædæ ðrounc his & fylge l soece mehseðe forðon wælle saul his hal gedoe losiað hia her on life seðe uutedlice losas saul his fore mec & godspell hal hia gedoehuæt forðon forestondes menn gif vel ðaeh gestriona middangeard allne & losuist gedoe saules hisvel huæt seleð monn huoerf vel huoelc fore sauel hisseðe forðon mec ondetenta bið & mino word in cneoreso ðas ðerneleger & arg & sunu monnes ondeteð hine miððy cymeð on wuldre fadores his mið englum halgum& he cuoeð to him soðlice ic cuoeðo iuh forðon sint sume of her ðæm stondendum ða ðe ne gebirgeð ðone deað oððæt geseað ric goddes cymende in mæghte vel on mægne& æfter dagum sex to genom se hælend petrum & iacob & iohannem & lædde hia on mor heh suindrige him ane & oferhiued wæs fore ðæm vel him& woedo his awordne sint scinendo huit vel lixendo suiðe suelce snaua sua ofer eorðo ne mæge huito gedoe& ædeauade ðæm mið moise & woeron sprecende mið ðæm hælende& onduearde petrus cuoeð to ðæm hælen la larua god is her us to wossanne & wyrca we ðrea husa ðe an & mosi an & heliæ anne forðon wiste huæt he gecuoeð woeron forðon mið fyrhto gefyrhtad& aworden wæs wolcen vel ofer forebræde hia & cuom stefn of ðæm wolcne cuoeðende ðis is sunu min leaf vel leofuste geherað hine vel ðene& sona ymblocadon nænig monn leng vel forðor gesegon buta ðæm hælende ana miðða sihðo gesægdon buta miððy sunu monnes from deadum eft arisa& þæt word gehealdon mið him efnegefrugnon huæd hit were miððy from deadum eft arise& gefrugnon hine ðus cuoeðende huæd forðon cuoeðað ælaruas & uuðuuto forðon risnelic were vel geras þætte he gecuome æristseðe onduearde cuoeð to him miððy cymes ærest eftgeboetað alle & huu auritten is on sunu monnes þætte feolo geðolas vel scile ðoliga & gehened vel geniðrad vel geteledah ic sægo iuh forðon vel þætte æc helias cymeð & dydon him suæ huæt waldon sua auritten is of him& cuom to ðegnum his gesæh ðreat micelo ymb hia & ða uuðuuto gefrugnon l gesohton mið him& sona eghuelc vel all folc gesæh hine gestylte ondreardon & geuurnon groeton hine& gefraign hia huæt bituih iuh gefraignas vel frasias& onduearde an of ðæm ðreate la laruua to gebrohte sunu min to ðe hæbbende gaast dumbseðe suahuer hine gegripes gebites vel toslites hine & fæmeð & gristbitteð mið toðum & scrinceð & cuoeð ðegnun ðinum þætte hia fordrifen hine & ne mæhtonseðe onduearde him cuoeð la cnewreso ungeleaffull ða huile mið iuh ic beom ða huile iuih ic ðola brencgas hine to me& gebrohton hine & miððy gesæh hine recone vel sona gaast gestyrede vel gedroefde hine & miððy wæs gebered on eorðo he gefealde hine fæmende& gefrægn fæder his huu miceles l longes tides l huu longes firstes is of ðon ðis him gelamp soð he cuoeð from cildhad& symble hine & in fyr & on wætro sende þætte hine losade vel fordyde ah gif huæd ðu mæge gehelp usic wæs milsende user vel usrase hælend uutedlice cuoeð him gif ðu mæge gelefe alle mæhtiga ðæm gelefes& sona gecliopade faeder ðæs cnæhtes mið teherum he gecueð ic gelefo help ungeleaffulnise minne& miððy gesæh se hælend þone iornende ðreat gestiorande wæs ðæm gaaste unclæne cuoeðende ðæm ðu la deafe & ðu la dumbe gaast ic ðe bebeade geong from him & forðor þætte ðu ne inngae in hine& cliopade suiðe getearende hine geeode of him & aworden is vel wæs suelce were dead suæ þætte monige cuoedon þætte dead were vel wæsse hælend uutedlice geheald hond his ahof hine & aras& miððy ineode in hus ðegnas his deglice gefrugnon hine forhuon uoe ne mæhte woe fordrifa hine& cuoeð to him ðis cynn on nænig mæhtig ofgeonga buta on gebeadum & fæstern vel & mið fæstern& ðona foerdon bieodon galileam ne walde aenig gewutahe gelærde uutedlice ðegnas his & cuæð to him þætte sunu monnes gesald bið on hond monna & ofslaeð hine & miððy ofslægen bið ðe ðirda daeg eft arisaðsoð hia ne cuðon þæt word & ondreardon hine þæt hia gefrugno& cuomon to ðær byrig ðaðe miððy æt huse woeron gefrugnon hia huætd on woeg gie getrahtadesoð hia suigdon gif hua bituih him on woeg geteledon vel geflioton vel hua vel huelc woere hiora mara vel maast& eft saet geceigde tuolfo vel tuelfo & cuoæð ðæm gif hua wælle forðmest wosa bið vel sie allra hlætmæst & allra embehtmonn& onfeng þone cnæht gesette hine in middum hiora ðone þætte clioppende l friende wæs cuoeð to himsua huælc an of ðuslicum cnæhtum onfoað on noma minum mec onfoað & sua hua mec onfoað ne mec onfoað ah ðene seðe mec sendegeonduearde him iohannes cuoeðende la larua we gesegon sum oðer on noma ðinum forworpen mið dioblum seðe ne fylges us & forbudun himse hælend uutedlice cuoeð nallas gie forbeada hine nænig monn is forðon seðe wyrcas mæht on noma minum & mæge recone yfle spreca of mecseðe forðon ne is wið iuih fore iuih issua hua forðon drinca geseleð iuh calic l copp wætres on noma minum forðon cristes arogie soðlice ic sægo iuh ne losað mearde his& sua hua geondspurnas an of ðisum læsestum gelefendum on mec god l betra is him suiðor gif l ðæh sie ymbunden l ymbsald coern asales byrðen to suiro his & on sæ gesended woere& ðæh vel gif ondspurnas ðeh hond ðin ofcearf ða ilca betra vel god is ðe unhal ingaa in lif ðon tuoege hondo hæbbe gegeonge in tintergo fyres unadrysendlicðer wyrm hiora ne bið dead & þæt fyr ne bið gedrysned& gif fot ðin ðec ondspurnað cearf hine l ðene god is ðe halt ingeonga in lif æce ðon tuoege foet hæbbe sende in tintergo fyres unadrysnendlicðer wyrm hiora ne bið dead & þæt fyr ne bið adrysnedðaeh gif ego ðin geondspurnað ðec geworp hine god is ðe anege ingeonga in ric godes ðon tuoege ego hæbbe gesende on tintergo fyresðer wyrm hiora ne bið dead & fyr ne bið gedrysnedeghuelc forðon mið fyre sie gecostad l gesæltad & eghuelc cuic almus gecostad siegod is þæt salt ðah se salt gif unful sie on ðon þæt gie gehaldas habbað in iuh salt & sibb habas bituih iuh& ðona aras cuom on gemærum iudæes bigienda iordanen & gesomnadon efter sona menigo to him & suæ þætte he gewuna wæs eftersona laerde hia& togeneolecdon ða aelaruuas gefrugnun hine gif l is gelefed were þæt wif forleta cunnedon l gecostadon hinesoð he onduearde cuoeð to him huæt iuh bebead mosesðaðe cuoedon moses forgeæf boc þætte were awritten & forletenðæm onduearde se hælend cuoæð to heardnisse heartes iueres aurat iuh bebod ðiosnefrom fruma uutedlice scæftes woepenmon vel hee & hiuu vel wifmon worhte hia godfore ðis forleteð monn fæder his & moder & geneoleces to wife his& biðon tuoege in lichoma ana vel anum forðon uutedlice ne sint tuoege ah an lichomse hælend uutedlice cuoeð him gaa geleafo ðin ðec hal dyde & sona gesæh & fylgde hine in woeg& miððy togeneolecdon to hierusalem & to mor oelebeama sende tuoege of ðegnum his& cuoeð ðæm gaað in burig þæt is fora ongeaegn iuh & sona ineodon vel ingeongas þæt in gie onfindes þæt fola gebunden ofer vel on ðene neænig get monna gesæt unbindes ðene & tolædes& gif hua iuh cuoeðas huæd doað gie cuoeðas þætte drihtne behoflic vel nedðarf is & sona hine forletes hider& foerdon onfundon fola gebunden ær vel befora ðon dor uta æt woegena geletum & unbinde hia hine& sume of ðer stondendum cuoedon him huæd doað gie unbindas ðone folaða ðe cuoeden him suæ gehaten hæfde him se hælend & forleorton him& læddon þæt fola to ðæm hælende & onsetton him gegerelo his & sætt ofer vel on hine vel ðenemenigo uutedlice woedo his legdon vel brædon on uoeg oðero uutedlice ða twiggo vel ða telgo gebugun vel rendon of ðæm trewum & tredon on ðæm woeg& ondueardon cuoeðon ðæm hælende neutu woe geonduearde se hælend cuoeð to him ne æc ic cuoeðo iuh on suahuelce mæht ðas ic doam& ongann ðæm vel him on bispellum sprecca wingeard gesette monn & ymbsalde haga & dalf seað & getimberde torr & agæf vel gefæste ða ðæm londbigencgum & fearr gefoerde vel færende wæs& sende to londbuendum on tid esne þætte from ðæm londbuendum onfenge of wæstm ðære wingeardeðaðe togelahton ðene geðurscon & forleorton geonga idelne& eftersona sende to him oðerne ðrael & ðene on heafud gewundadon & mið sceofmum miclum gehornadon& eftersona oðerne sende æc ðene ofslogon & monigo oðero sume ðurscun oðero æc ofslogonðaget forðon vel æc enne vel an hæfde sunu leofust & ðene sende to hia vel him æt ende vel hlætmest cuoeðende forðon vel þætte hia gefræppegedon sunu minneða buendo uutedlice cuoedon betuih ðis is erfewærd cymes wutum we ofslae hine & usra bið ðiu erfeweardnise& gelahton hine ofslogon & gewurpon buta ðæm wingeardalle forðon of ðon þætte gemonigfaldade vel gewoxe him sendon ðios uutedlice of henðu vel unspoed hire alle ðaðe hæfde sende all gebrengnise hire& miððy gefoerde vel færende of temple cuoeð him an of ðegnum his la laruu sceawig vel gesih hulco stanas & huulig timber& ondsuorade se hælend cuoeð him vel ðæm gesih ðas alle miclo gehrino vel glencas ne bið forleten stan ofer stane seðe ne se tostrogden vel ne bið toworpen& miððy gesætt on more vel on dune oelebeama ongeaegn temple geascadon vel frugnon hine suundorlice petrus & iacobus & iohannes & andreassaege us huoenne ðas biðon & huelc becon bið huoenne vel ðonne ðas alle onginnað to endanne vel þætte hia se geendado& onduearde se hælend ongann cuoeða him geseas gie þætte ne ænig iuih gesuicamonigo forðon cymæs on noma minum hia cuoeðas þætte ic am & menigo hia gesuicasmiððy gie gehera uutedlice gefehto & woeno vel mersungo ðara gefehto ne ondredas gie is reht vel hit sceal forðon wosa ah ne ðaget ende biðarisað uutedlice vel ðonne cynn wið cynn & ric ofer ric & biðon eorðhroernis ðerh stoua & hungro or vel fruma wærcco ðas vel ðas ilco tacenoþæt soðlice iuh ic cuoeðo allum ic cuoeðo wæccaswæs uutedlice eastro æfter twæm dogrum & sohton ða hehsacerdas & ða uðuuto huu hine mið facne gehealdon vel mæhton hia gehalda & ofslogon vel hia mæhton ofslaacuoedon forðon ne on dæge haligum vel bærlice ne þæt woenunge vel eaðe maege styrenise geworðe ðæm folce& miððy wæs æt bethanie on vel/ in huse symones hreafes & gehlionade cuom sum wif haefde stænne fæt full ðæs smirinises ðæs stences diorwyrðes & miððy gebrecen vel gebrocen wæs þæt stanfæt todælde vel agaett ofer heafud hiswoeron uutedlice sume hia bulgon vel unwyrðe saegdon vel bituih him seolfum & cuoedon to huon losuist ðios smirinisse aworden wæs vel ismæhte forðon smirinis ðios begeatta forðor mara ðriim hundraðum scillingum & sealla ðorfendum & bifgedon vel on hease hælend cuoeð forletas hia huæd hir hefigo gie sint god woerc wyrcenda wæs on mecsymble forðon ðorfendo gie habbað mið iuih & miððy gie wellæ gie magon him woel doe meh uutedlice ne symle gie habbaðþætte hæfde ðios dyde forecuom to smiriane lichoma min on bebyrgennise& sona efter se hona gesang & eftgemyndig wæs petrus wordes þætte cuoeðend wæs him se hælend aer ðon se hona gesinga twiga ðria mec ðu bist onsæc & ongann woepa& sona on merne vel on morgen ðæhtung worhton hehsacerdas mið aeldum & wuðuutum & mið all somnung gebundon ðone hælend gelæddon & saldon ðæm aldormen& gefregnade vel geascade hine pylatus ðu arð cynig iudeana soð he onduearde cuoeð to him ðu cuoeðes þætðingum vel woerdumse geroefa ðonne eftersona gefraegn hine cuoeð ne ondueardest ðu æniht gesæh in sua miclum vel hu miclum ðeh ahenasse hælend ðonne forðor vel leng æniht vel noht geondsuarede suæ þætte þæt he woere awundrad se groefaðerh ðone dæge ðonne symbel forgeafa gewuna wæs him enne vel an of ðæm gebundenum ðone suæhuælcne hia gegiuudonwæs ðonne seðe gecuoeðen wæs vel genemned barabbas seðe mið scearcerum vel mið setnerum wæs gebunden seðe on setnong geworhte monncualmniss vel morðorslæga& miððy astage þæt folc ongann gebidda sua symle gedyde himðonne ðio magðalenesca & behealdon huer woere gesettet& miððy geeode þæt sunnedaeg ðio magdalene & & bohton æðela wyrta þætte miððy gecuomo vel cymmende gesmiredon hine& suiðe arlice an ðara sunneðagana cuomon to byrgenne was arisen gee sunna& cuoedon him bituih hua eft vel awæltes us ðone stan from duro ðæs byrgennes& eftlocadon gesegon efetawaelted ðone stan wæs forðon micel suiðe& inneodon in byrgen gesegon ging esne sittende on swiðrum ufa gearuad vel ymbgearuad stol huit & forestyltonseðe cuoeð ðæm ne wællas gefrohtiga ðone hælend gie soeces nazarenasca ahoen vel ahongene aras ne is hir heono stoue ðer gesetton hinesittas cuoeðað ðegnum his & petro þætte togeaegnes færes iuh on geleornise ðer hine gie geseas sua cuoeð iuhsoð ða ilco ðona foerdo flugon of ðæm byrgen forcuom forðon hia ondo vel & fyrhto vel & ne ænigum menn gecuoedon ondreardon forðonasægd is boc marcusonginneð godspell æfter lucasforðon aec soð monigo cunnendo woeron þætte hia geendebrednadon ðæt gesaga ðaðe in usic gefylled aron ðinganasuæ gesaldon us ðaðe from frumma ða gesegon & embehtmenn woeron wordesgesegen wæs æc me offylgde from fruma alle georne mið endebrednise ðe auritta ðu gecorene theofileþætte ðu ongette hiora worda of ðæm gelæred arð on soðfæstnisewæs in dagum heroðes cyninges iudeæ sacerd sum mið noma of lond abia & wif ðæm l him of dohterum aaron & noma his elizabethwoeron uutedlice soðfæsto boego fore gode færendo in allum bodum & soðfæstnissum drihtnes buta grornunge& ne wæs him vel ðæm sunu forðon wæs elizabeth unberend & boege gefeollon on dagum hioraaworden wæs uutedlice miððy sæcerdhad gebrece in endebrednise londes his fore godeæfter gewuna sacerdhades of hlodti eode þætte roecels gesette innfoerde on tempel drihtnes& alli ðio menigo wæs ðæs folces biddende uta æd tid lehtesædeauade uutedlice ðæm engel drihtnes stode to suiðrum wigbeddes beorning& gestyred wæs miððy gesæh & ondo gefeoll ofer hinecuoeð uutedlice to ðæm vel to him se engel ne ondred ðu forðon gehered wæs vel is gebeodo ðina & uif ðin elizabeth bereð ðe sunu & ðu geceige noma his iohannes& bið gefea ðe & glædnise & monigo in accennisse his biðon glædebið forðon micel befora drihtno & win & bear ne drinceð & gaaste halge gefylled bið ða gett wæs in inna moderes his& monigo suno israæle gecerreð to drihtne gode hiora vel ðara& he foregæð fore ðæm in gaast & of vel mið mæht heliæs þætte gecerre hearta uuntuna vel ældra in sunum & ða ungeleafullo to hogascipe soðfæstra gegearuiga drihtne folc wisfæst& cuoeð zacharias to ðæm engel huona ðis ic witto ic forðon am ald & uif min gefeall in dagum his& geonduarde se engel cuoeð him ic am gabrihel seðe ic tostondo fore gode & sendet am þæt ic sprece to ðe & ðas ðe gebodage& heono ðu bist suigendæ & ne mæge ðu gesprece oðð on doege of ðæm ðas geworðes fore ðon þætte ne gelefdest ðu wordum minum ða ðe gefylled biðon on tid hiora& wæs þæt folc bidende & awundradon þætte hlattade he in templeeode uutedlice ne mæhte spreca to him & ongeton þæt þætte gesihðo gesege in temple & he wæs becnende ðæm vel him & ðerhwunade dumb& aworden wæs þætte gefylde weron dagas embihtes his eode in hus hisæfter ðas uutedlice dagas acende vel/ gebær wif his & gedegelde hia moneðum fifo cuoeðforðon sua dyde me drihten on dagum ðæm eftbeheald to nummanne telnise min bituih monnumon monaðe uutedlice ða seista gæsended wæs se angel from gode in galilie ceastra to ðær nomato hehstalde gewoedded vel fæstnad hehstald ðære noma wæs of hus dauið & noma ðære hehstaldes& infoerde se angel to hia vel hire cuoeð hal mið gefea full drihten ðec mið gebloedsad ðu in wifumða vel ðiu miððy geherde gedroefad wæs in word his & geðohte hulig vel huu wæs vel were ðios groeteng& cuoeð se angel him ne onðred ðu maria gemoetest ðu forðon gefea mið godeheono geecnande in inna & ðu acennes sunu & geceige ðu noma his hælendðes bið micel & sunu ðæs heiste geceiged bið & seleð him se drihten sedle dauiðes fadores his& he ricsað in hus iacobes in ecnisse & rices his ne bið endecuoeð uutedlice to ðæm engel huu worðes ðis forðon wer ne conn ic& geonduearde se angel cuoeð him gaast halig ofercymeð on ðeh & mæht ðæs heisto oferwrigað ðe & forðon & þætte accenned bið halig bið geceid sunu godes& heono foereld ðin & ða acende sunu on hældo hire & ðis moneð is ðe seista ðær ðiu geceiged is unberendþætte vel forðon ne bið unmæhticlic mið god all vel eghueolc wordcuoeð ðonne heono ðiwa drihtnes sie me æfter word ðinum & fearrade from hia se angelaras uutedlice on dagum ðæm foerde on morum mið oefeste on ceastre& infoerde in hus zachariæ & gegroette& aworden wæs þætte he geherde groeting mariæs gefeade se cild in inna hire & gefylled wæs halge gaste& geceigede stefne mið micla & cuoeð gebloedsad ðu bituih wifum & gebloedsad wæstm innaðes ðines& huona ðis me þætte cyme moder drihtnes mines to meheono forðon aworden wæs stefn groetenges ðines in earum minum gefeade in glædnise se cild vel in innað minum& eadigo ða ðio gelefde forðon ðerhgeendad biðon ða ðaðe gecuoeden sint him from drihtne& cueð wundriað vel miclað sauel min ðone drihtne& gefeade vel gaast min in gode halwoende mineforðon eftlocade eðmodnise ðiuæs his heono forðon of ðisum eadigo mec cuoeðað alle cneoresoforðon dyde me miclo seðe mæhtig is & halig noma his& miltheortnise his in soð cneoreso & cneoreso ondredendum hinedyde mæht on arme his tostraegd ða oferhygdego mið ðoht heortes histosceaf ða mæhtigo of sedle & ahof ða eðmodoða hyngerendo gefylde mið godum & ða weligo forleort ða idloondfeng israel cnæht his þætte were gemyndgad miltheortnise hissuæ gesprecen wæs to fadores usra & sede his in woruldegewunade uutedlice mið hia suælce monaðum ðriim & eftcerde vel awoended wæs in hus hisðonne gefylled wæs ðio tid acennise & acende sunu& geherdon ða neheburas & ða cuðamen hire forðon suiðe gemiclade se drihten miltheortnisse/ his mið hia vel ðær & efnegeðoncadon hir& aworden wæs on dæge ða æhtaðe cuomon to ymbcearfanne þone cnæht & geceigde hine noma fadores his& geondnearde moder his cuoeð ænigom ðing ah geceiged bið iohannes& cuoedon to ðær ilca þætte ne ænig is in cyððo ðin seðe geceiged ðisum nomagebecnadon ðonne feder his huoelcne wælde geceiga hine& gegiuade wæxbred arat cuoeð iohannes is noma his & gewundradon alleuntyned wæs ðonne sona muð his & tunga his & spræcend wæs gebloedsade god& aworden wæs ondo ofer alle neheburas hiora & ofer alle morlonda iudæes weron gemersad alle worda ðas& geseton alle ðaðe geherdon in heorta hiora cuoeðendo huæd woenes ðu cnæht ðes bið & bið hond drihtnes wæs fora hine& fader his gefylled wæs halge gaaste & gewitgade cuoeðende vel cuoeðse gebloedsad drihten god israela forðon gesohte & dyde lesnise vel lesing folces his& ahof horn l hælo us in hus dauiðes cnæhtes hissuæ sprecend wæs ðerh muðe haligwara ðaðe from worulde woeron vel sint witgena hishælo from fiondum usum & from hond allra ðaðe laeðdon usicto doenne miltheortnise mið fadorum & gemyndga cyðnise his halgesað þæt gesuoren þætte gesuor to abraham feder usum walde gesealla hine husþætte buta ondo of hond fionda usra gefreouad we se here we himon halignise & soðfæstnise before hine allum dagum usum& ðu cnæht witga ðæs heista geceiged bist ðu before færes forðon fore onsione drihtnes gearuiga wegas histo selenne wisdom hæles folce his in forgefnise synna hioraðerh ðoht miltheortnise godes uses in ðæm gesohte us ariseð of heh vel of heofnuminlihte ðæm ðaðe in ðiostrum & in scua deaðes sittas to rehtanne foet usra in we sibbse cnæht ðonne gewox & gestrenced wæs gaste & wæs in woestern oðð on dæg ædeaunise his to israelaworden wæs ðonne on dagum ðæm foerde bod from cessares augustus þæt gemercad were all ymbhyrftðios gemercong forma aworden wæs from undercynige syries& gaað alle þæt foreondetande weron ða syndrigo vel ælsyndrio in his ceastraastag ðonne æc iohannes of galilea from ceastre nazareth in iudea ceastre ðauiðes ðio is genemned forðon were from hus & higo dauidesþætte foreondete were mið befæstad him wif berendeaworden wæs ðonne miððy weron ðer gefylled weron ða dagas þætte acende vel accenned were& cende sunu his frumcende & mið cildclaðum bewand & eftgebeg hine in binnæ forðon ne wæs him stoue in gesthus& ða hiorde woeron on lond þæt ilca wæccende & haldendo wacana næhtes ofer edo his& heono engel drihtnes stod æt vel neh ðæm & berhtnise godes ymbscean hia & ondreardon mið ondo miclo& cuoeð ðæm se engel nallað ge ondrede heono forðon ic bodigo iuh gefea mið miclum þæt bið allum folceforðon accenned is us to dæg hælend seðe is crist drihten in ceastre dauiðes& ðis iuh tacon l becon gie gemoetes inn þæt cild mið cildclaðum innbewunden & gesetted in binne& sona aworden wæs mið engle menigo hiorodes heofonlic hergendra god & cuoeðendrawuldor in heannisum gode & in eordo sib monnum godes willoaworden is þætte fearradon from him ða englas in heofne ða hiorde vel hiorda gesprecon bituih oferfære we oðð in bethleem & gesea woe ðis word þætte aworden wæs ðætte dyde se drihten & ædeaude us& cuomon oefistande & gemoeton && þæt cild gesetted in binnagesegon ðonne ongeton from word þætte cuoedon wæs ðæm from cnæht ðisum& alle ðaðe geherdon awundrade woeron & from ðæm ða ðe acuoeden weron from hiordum to ðæm ilcumðon geheald alle worda ðas lædon in hearta his& eftcerdon vel cerde weron ða hiorde wuldrigendo & hergendo god in allum ðaðe geherdon & gesegon sua cuoeden wæs to him& æfter ðon geendad weron dagas æhto þætte ymbcorfen were geceigd wæs noma his se hælend þætte geceiged wæs from engel aer ðon inna geecnad were& æfter ðon gefylled wer dagas clænsunges his æfter ae lædon hine in hierusalemsua auritten is in ae drihtnes þætte eghuelc he vel woepenmon tountynes hrif vel wom vel inna halig drihtne geceiged& þætte saldon geafa vel asægdnise æfter þætte acuoeden is in æ tuoe turturas vel tuoge birdas culfras& heono monn wæs in hierusalem ðæm noma wæs simeon & monn ðes soðfæs & ondredend wæs bidend frofor israela & gaast halig wæs in him& ondsuere onfeng from gast halig ne gesege he deað buta ær gesege gecorene drihtnes& cuom in gast in temple & miððy inlæddon ðone cnæht hælend aldro his þætte dydon æfter gewuna aes fore hine& he onfeng hine on armum his & gebloedsade god & cuoeðnu forletes vel forgefes esne ðin la drihten æfter word ðin on sibbforðon gesegon ego min hælo vel halwoende ðinþæt ðu gearuades ær vel fore onsione alra folcaleht to ædeaunise cynna & wulder folces ðines israel& wæs fader his & moder wundrando ofer ða ðaðe gecuoeden weron from him& gebloedsade him & cuoeð to moder his heono geseted is ðes on gefælnise & erist monigra & on taco vel on becon ðæm wiðcuoeden bið& ðin ðæs vel his sauel ðerh oferfæreð suord þætte ædeaud were vel woeron of monigum heortum smeaungas& wæs anna ðio witga dohter from folc aseres ðios gefealle on dagum monigum & lifde mið wer hire wintrum seofo from hehstaldhad hire& ðios widiua oðð wintro & hundhæhtatih feouer ðio ne offoerde from temple mið fæsternum & gebeadum herde næht & dæge& ðio ilca tid ofercuom geonditteð drihtne & sprecend wæs of him allum ðaðe gebiodon vel bidendo woeron lesing vel lesnis hierusalem& þætte ðerhdedon vel geendadon alle æfter ae drihtnes gecerdon vel awoende woeron on galilea in ceastre his nazarethse cnæht ðonne awox & gestrencged wæs full mið snyttro & geafa godes wæs in ðæm& foerdon aldro his ðerh alle wintro in hierusalem on dæge symbeles eastres& miððy aworden were wintra tuoelf stigendum ðæm on hiersualem æfter gewuna dæges halges vel symbles& miððy geendade weron dagas miððy eftcerdon eftwunade se cnæht hælend in hierusalem & ne cuðon aldro hiswoendon uutedlice hine þætte were hia mið fylgende cuomon geong dæges & eft sohton hine betuih freondo & cuðo& ne gemoeton gecerdon vel gecerde woeron in hierusalem eftsohton hine& aworden wæs æfter ðriim dogrum gemoeton hine on temple sittende on middum ðara laraua herende hine & fraegnendeastylton ðon alle ðaðe hine geherdon ofer snytro vel hogoscip & ondsuearum his& gesegon awundrade weron & cueð ðio moder to hine la sunu huætd dydest ðu us heono fæder ðin & ic mænende we sohton ðec& cuoeð to him huæd is þætte mec gie sohton ne cuðu gie þætte in ðæm ðaðe fadores mines sint gerisenlic me to wosanne& ða ne oncneaun word þætte sprecend wæs to him& ofstag mið him & cuom to nazareth & wæs underðioded him & moder his geheælde vel gehaelde alle worda ðas in hearta his& se hælend gewox mið snytro & ældo & wuldur mið god & monnumger ðonne ðio fifteiðe hæses wæs sciremonn iudeas ðonne broðere his & londesunder aldormonnum sacerdum & aworden wæs word drihten ofer iohannen sunu on western& cuom on alle lond bodade þæt fulwiht hreaunise in forgefnise synnasua aritten is in boc worda ðæs witges stefn cliopende on woestern gearuað woeg drihtnes rehto wyrcas geonges hiseghuelc pæð vel dene gefylled bið & eghuelc mor & hyll gebeged bið & biðon unræhto vel woh in geongom & roeðo on woegum smoeðum& geseað eghuelc lichoma haluende godescuoeð forðon to ðread ðaðe foerdon þæt hia wero gefuluad from him cynna æterna hua eauað iuh geflea from tocymenda wraðewyrcað forðon wæstm wyrðe to hreaunise & ne beginnes cuoeða fader we habbað ic cueðo forðon iuh þætte mæge god from stanum ðisum awecce sunusoðlice forðon acasa to wyrtruma treuana geseted is eghuelc forðon treeo ne doeð wæstm ofcorfen bið & on fyr gesended& gefrugnon hine ðæt folc vel ða ðreatas cuoeðendo huæd forðon we doaðonduarde ða cuoeð him seðe hæfeð tuege cyrtlas seleð ne vel ðæm næbbende & seðe hæfeð metto gelic doaðcuomon ða & bærsynnigo þætte weron gefuluad & cuoedon to him la laruu huæð we gedoaðsoð he cueð to him noht forðor ðonne vel þæt gesetted is iuh gie doaðfrugnon ðonne hine & cempo cuedon huæd doað we æc us & cuoeð him ne ænig monn gedroefað gie & ne telnise vel sceoma gedoað & ðæm wosað nestum iurommiððy woende ðonne þæt folc & smeandum allum in heortum hiora from iohanne eaða mage he were cristonduarde iohannes cuoeð allum ic æc soð of vel from wætre ic fulua iuh cymeð ðonne strongra mec ðæs ne am ic wyrðe to unbindanne ðuongas sceoea his he iuih gefuluað in gast halig & mið fyrhis fonnæ vel windgefonnæ in hond his & clænseð berern vel bereflor his & somnað huæte in berern his ða halmas vel ða windungo ða geberneð to fyre unadrysnendlicmenigo æc ðon & oðero getrummade bodade þæt folcðonne miððy gerihðe from him from wife broðres his & from allum yflum ðaðe dydetogeecde & ðis ofer alle & intynde iohannem in carcernaworden wæs ðonne miððy gefuluad wæs all folc & se hælend miððy wæs gefuluad & biddende untyned wæs heofon& adune astag gast se halig mið lichomlic huiu suelce culfra on hine & stefn of heofne aworden wæs ðu arð sunu min leaf vel leofost on ðec licað me& he vel se hælend wæs onginnende suelce wintra ðrittih þætte woende sunu iosepes seðe wæs helingseðe wæs matating seðe wæs leuing seðe wæs melching seðe wæs ianning seðe wæs iosephingseðe wæs mathathing seðe wæs amoing seðe wæs nauming/ seðe wæs esling seðe wæs naggingseming wæs mathing seðe wæs mathathing seðe wæs seðe seðe wæs iosec seðe wæs iodaingseðe wæs iohannaing seðe wæs resaing seðe wæs sorobabeling seðe wæs salathieling seðe wæs neringseðe wæs melching seðe wæs adding seðe wæs cosaming seðe wæs helmadaming seðe wæs heringseðe wæs ihesuing seðe wæs eliezering seðe wæs ionming seðe wæs matthading seðe wæs leuingseðe wæs simeoning seðe wæs iuding seðe wæs iosephing/ seðe wæs ionaing seðe wæs eliachimingseðe wæs meleaing seðe wæs mennaing seðe wæs matthating seðe wæs nathaning seðe wæs dauidingseðe wæs iessing seðe wæs obeðing seðe wæs boozing/ seðe wæs salmoning seðe wæs naasoningseðe wæs aminadabing seðe wæs araning seðe wæs esroming seðe wæs pharesing seðe wæs iudingseðe wæs iacobing seðe wæs isaacing seðe wæs abrahaming seðe wæs tharaing seðe wæs nachoringseðe wæs seruching seðe wæs ragauing seðe wæs phalecing/ seðe wæs ebering seðe wæs salingseming wæs chainaning seðe wæs arfaxating seðe wæs seðe seðe wæs noing seðe wæs lamechingseðe wæs mathusaling seðe wæs enocing seðe wæs iareding seðe wæs maleleheling seðe wæs cainaningseðe wæs enosing seðe wæs sething seðe wæs adaming seðe wæsse hælend uutedlice full gast halig færend wæs from iordane & wæs doend on gast in woesterndagum feortih & wæs gecosted from diabole & noht geett in dagum ðæm & miððy geendad weron ða gehyngerdecuoeð uutedlice him se diobol gif sunu godes arð cuoeð stane ðissum þætte hlaf se& onduarde to him se hælend auritten is þætte ne in hlafe ane lifes monn ah in eghuelc word godes& lædde hine se diabol & ædeaude him alle ricu ymbhuirftes eorðes in huil tides& cueð him ðe ic sello mæht ðas vel ðios all & wuldor hiora forðon me gesald aron & ðæm ic willo ic sello ðailcaðu forðon fallande gif ðu worðias fore me biðon ðinæ alle& geonduarde se hælend cuoeð him awritten is drihten god ðin worða ðu & him anum geher ðu& lædde hine in hierusalem & sette hine ofer hornpic temples & cuoeð him gif sunu godes arð asend ðeh heona vel ðona adunaaritten is forðon þætte englum his bebead from ðec þætte efnegehereð ðe& forðon in hondum lædeð vel niomað ðec eaðæ mæge þætte ðu wiðspurna to stane fot ðinne& geonduarde se hælend cuoeð him acuoeden is ne costa ðu drihten god ðin& geendad weron alle mið costunge vel wæs gecostad se diwobol/ eftfoerd from him wið to tid& færende wæs se hælend on mæht gastes in galilea & mersung foerde ðerh all lond of him& he lærde in somnungum hiora & gemiclad wæs from allum& cuom to nazareth ðer wæs gefoeded & ineade æfter geuna his dæge sunnan in somnung & aras to redanne& gesald wæs him boc ðæs witges esaie & þætte vel miððy untynde þæt boc gemitte to stoue ðer awritten wæsgast drihtnes on mec foreðon gesmiride mec vel to sæccanne ðorfendum sende meh to bodianne ermingum vel gehæftendum forgefnise & blindum gesihðo forleta ða gebroceno on forgefnisebodia ger drihtnes ondfenge & dege eftselenise& miððy gefeald þæt boc agef ðæm embehtmenn & saett & allra on somnung ego woeron bihaldendo on hineongann uutedlice vel ða cuoaða to him þætte to dæg gefylled wæs ðios gewritt in earum iurum& alle cyðnisse him hia saldon & awundradon in wordum wuldres vel wuldro ðaðe forecuomon from muðe his vel ðæs & cuoedon ahne ðes sunu is ioseph& cuoeð ðæm uutedlice gie cuoeðað me ðios onlicnesse la lece lecne ðec seolfne in monigo geherde we awordeno in ðær byrig do aec her on oeðel ðincuoeð ða soðlice ic cuoeðo iuh þætte ne ænig witga ondfenge wæs on oeðel hisin soðfæstnise ic cuoeðo iuh monigo widua woeron on dagum helies in israel ða betyned wæs se hefon gerum ðrim & moneðum sex miððy aworden wæs hunger micel on alle eorðo& ne to ængum ðara buriga asended wæs buta in ðær byrig to ðæm wife widuawæs licðrower ðerisca& gefylled woeron ða alle in somga mið wraðo ðas geherdon& arison & awurpon hine buta ðære ceastra & læddon hine oðð to ofer mores ofer ðone vel ðio ða burg hiora wæs getimbred þætte hia geglendradon hinehe ðonne oferfoerde vel færende ðerh middum hiora geeode& dune astag in capharnaum ceastra galilies & ðer lærde hia on dagum& astyltdon on lar his forðon in mæht wæs word his vel ðæs& on somnunge wæs monn hæfde ðone dioul unclæne & gecliopade mið stefne miclecuoeðende forlet vel blinn huæd us & ðe hælend nazarenesca ðu cuome to fordoanne usig ic wat ðec ðuðe arð halig godes& geðreade him se hælend cuoeð foresuige & gaa of him & miððy awarp hine ðone dioul in middum feorde from him & noht hine vel him sceðde& aworden wæs fyrhto in allum & efnegesprecon bituih cuoedon þæt is ðis word þætte in mæhte & mægne gehateð gastum unclænum & geongas& wæs gemersad mersong of him in all stoue ðæs londesaras ða of somnung inneode in hus simones suer ðonne genummen wæs miclum feberadlum & bedon hine foræ hia& stod ofer hia geheht ðæm febere & forleort hia & recone aras embehtade himmiððy sunna uutedlice to set eade alle ðaðe hæfdon untrymigo missenlicum adlum lædon hia to him soð he anlapum vel syndrigum hond gesette lecnade hia vel ðailcofoerdon uutedlice ða diowlas from menigum clioppende & cuoeðenda þætte ðu arð sunu godes & geðreade ne gelefde ða gesprecca forðon wiston hine þætte were crista warð vel gewarð ða dæge wæs færende eade on woestigum stowe & ða menigo sohton hine & cuomon wið to him & gehealdon hine þætte ne fearrade from himðæm he cuoeð forðon & oðrum ceastrum gedæfneð mec bodia ric godes þætte forðon gesendet am& wæs bodande on somnungum galilesaworden wæs ðonne miððy ða menigo geræsdon vel giorndon on him þætte geherdon word godes & he stod æt mere genesareth& gesæh tuoege vel tuu sciopo stondendo æt ðæm mere ða fiscaras ðonne ofastigon & geðuogon þæt nettastag uutedlice in anum scip ðio wæs simones gebæd ðonne hine from eorðo eftlæda huon & sætt lærde of ðæm scipe ða menigoþætte geblann ðonne gespreaca cuoeð to simone læd on heanise & let ða netto iuero on gefeng vel stællo& geonduarde simon cuoeð him ðu haldormon ðerh alle næht we wunnon noht we fengon on worde ðonne ðinum ic forlette net& miððy ðis dydon efnegebegdon fiscana þæt menigo monigfald toslitten wæs ðonne ðæt nett hiora& becnadon ðæm foerum ðaðe weron on oðora scip þætte gecuomon & gehulpo hia & cuomon & gefyldon ða tuoege vel tuu sciopo suæ þætte gedruncnadon vel wereþæt miððy gesege feol to cneuum ðæs hælendes cuoeð geong from me forðon monn synnfull am drihtenslep forðon ymbsalde hine & alle ðaðe mið him weron on gefeng fiscana ðone vel þæt genomongelic ðonne & sunu ðaðe woeron gefoero & cuoeð to simone se hælend nælle ðu ondrede of ðis uutedlice menn bist ðu niomende& underlæded woeron to eorðo scioppo forletno allum gefyligde weron hine& aworden wæs miððy were on an ðera ceastrana & heono wer full hriofle & gesæh se hælend & feoll on onsione & bæd hine cuoeðende drihten gif ðu wilt ðu mæht meh geclænsia& aðenede hond gehran hine cuoeðende/ ic willo geclænsige & sona ðio hriofol offearrade from him& he bebead him þætte ne ænigum gecuoede ah geong ædeaua ðec ðæm sacerde & breng fore clænsunge ðine suæ bebead vel heht moses on cyðnise himðerheode vel wæs geongende ðonne suiðor word from him & efnecuomon ða menigo vel ða feolo þætte geherdon & þætte woeron gelecned from untrymnisum hiorahe ða gesætt on wæstern & gebæd& geworden wæs on an ðara dagana & he gesætt lærende & woeron ða ælaruuas vel aldouuto sittendo & æs laruas ða ðe cuomon from eghuelc ceastre galileae & iudeae & hierusalem & mægen wæs drihtnes to hælenne hia& heono wæras berende on bed vel on ber monno seðe wæs eorðcrypel & sohton hine gebrenge & gesette fora hine& ne gemoeton of huælcum dæl hine gebrohton fore ðæm folce astigon ofer vel onufa hus ðerh ða watla & duna sendon hine mið bed in middum fore hælendðæra geleafa þætte gesæh cuoeð la monn forgefen biðon ðe synna ðina& ongunnun gesmeage wuðuto & cuoeðende hua is ðes seðe spreces ebolsongas hua mæge forgeafa synna buta ðe ana godþætte ongætt ða se haelend smeaunga hiora geonduarde cuoeð to him vel ðæm huæd smeas gie in heartum iurumhuoeðer is eaðor gecuoeða forgefen biðon ðe synna vel cuoeða aris & gaaþætte ðonne gie wittæ þætte þæt sunu monnes mæht hafeð on eorðo forgeafa synna cuoeð ðæm cryple ðe ic cuoeðo aris nim beer ðin & gaa in hus ðin& sona aras fore him genom on ðæm gelæg & foerde in hus his gemiclade god& feerstyltnisse/ genom vel forgrap alle & auundradon god & gefylled woeron mið fyrhto cuoedon þætte we gesegon wundra todæge& æfter ðas foerde & gesæh ðone bærsynnig genemned wæs sittende to & cuoeð him fylg mec vel soec mec& forleorte vel miððy allum forletno aras fylgende wæs him& dyde him farma vel gebearsgip micel se leui in hus his & wæs ðreat menigo & oðera ðaðe mið him weron hlingendum vel hlingende& lyceton & hiora cuoedon to ðegnum his forhon mið & synnfullum gie ettas & gie drincas& ondsuarade se hælend cuoeð to him ne ðofeð ðaðe halo sint to lece ah ða ðe yfle habbaðne cuom ic to ceiganne soðfæsto ah ða synnfullo in hreonisesoð hia cuoedon to him forhuon ðegnas iohannes fæstað symble & gebeodo doað gelic & ðine ðonne eotað & drincaððæm he cuoeð ahne mago gie suno brydgumes ða huil mið him is vel bið se brydguma wyrca gefæstacymeð uutedlice ða dagas genumen bið from him se brydguma ða gefæstað in ðæm dagumcuoeð ðonne & onlicnise to him þætte ne aenig þæt esceapa from woedo niuue onsendeð on gewedo ald elcur nu & þæt niua toslitað & ðæm alde ne gehriseð þæt esceapa of ðæm niue& ne aenig sendeð win niua in byttum aldum elcur nu toslitteð þæt win niua ða aldo & þæt ilce agotten bið & ða byto lasaðah þæt win niua in byttum niuum to sendanne is & egðer biðon gehaldan& ne aenig gedranc þæt alde sona wilnað þæt niua cuoeð forðon se alda betra isaworden wæs ðonne on ðone æfterra daeg miððy oferfoerdon ðerh gecoecton ðegnas his ða croppas l ehras & eton gebrecon mið hondumsumo oðer ðonne cueodon him huæd gie doeð þætte ne riseð on symbeldagum& onduearde se hælend to him cuoeð ne ðis geleornadon þætte dyde dauið miððy hine gehyngerde he & ða ðe mið hine weronhuu inneade in hus goddes & hlafas foregegearuad vel getemesed ondfeng & geett & salde ðæm ðaðe mið hine weron ðas ne is gelefed to eatanne buta anum sacerdum& cuoeð him þætte drihten is sunu monnes uutedlice symbeldægesaworden wæs ðonne & on oðero symbeldæge þætte infoerde on somnung & lærde & wæs ðer monn & hond his ðiu suiðra gescriuncanbehealdon ðonne ða uðuuto & gif on symbeldæg/ he hælde þætte hia gemoete to telenne hinehe uutedlice wiste smeunga hiara vel hiora & cuoeð ðæm menn seðe hæfde hond gescrengce vel dryge aris & sona on middum & aras astodcuoeð ðonne to him se hælend ic fraegno iuih gif is alefed on symbeldæg wel doa vel oððe yfle sawel hal doa vel oððe losiga& ymbsceawandum allum cuoeð ðæm menn aðen hond ðin & aðenide & eftgeniuað wæs hond hisðailco uutedlice gefylled weron mið unsnytro & efnesprecon bituih huæd forðon dedon ðæm hælendeaworden wæs ðonne on ðæm dagum foerde on more to gebiddanne & wæs ðerhwæccende in gebed godes& miððy dæg aworden wæs geceigde ða ðegnas his & geceas tuoelf of ðæm ða æc apostolas genemdeðone simon ðone getornomade vel stan & broðer his & && ðe huita vel & seðe is geceiged& seðe wæs hlega& ofdune astag mið him astod on stou & menigo vel ðreat ðegna his & ðio monigo monigfald folces of alle iudaea && & & ða ðe cuomon þætte geherdon hine & weron gehældo from adlum hiora& ðaðe gecosted weron from gastum unclænum woeron gelecnad& all ðread sohton hine to gehrinanne forðon mæhto vel mægno of him foerdon & hælde alle& he ahebbendum egum on ðegnum his cuoeð eadgo ða ðorfendo forðon iuer is ric godeseadgo ðaðe nu gehyncres forðon gie biðon gehriorded eadgo ðaðe nu gie woepeð forðon gie hlæheðeadgo gie biðon miððy iuih læðeð menn & miððy tosceadon vel sceadas iuih & telað vel harm cueðað & auorpað noma iuer suelce yfel vel apoltre fore sunu monnesgefeað on ðæm dæge & wosað glæd heono forðon mearda iura menigo on heofne æfter ðæs forðon dydon witgum fadoras hiorasoð huoeðre wæ iuh weligum forðon gie habbað froefernise iuerwæ iuh forðon ge gefylled biðon forðon biðon gie hyngrendo wæ iuh ðaðe gie hlæhas nu forðon gie woepaðwæ miððy wel iuh cuoeðað alle menn æfter ðas dydon witgum fadoras hioraah iuh ic cuoeðo ðaðe ge geherdon lufigað fiondas iura wel doeð ðæm ðaðe iuih læðaðwel cueðas vel bloedsas ðæm woergendum iuh gebiddað fore ðæm harmcuoedum iuih& seðe ðec slaeð on cece agef æc ða oðero & from him vel of ðæm seðe genimeð ðe woedo æc þæt cyrtil nælle ðu forstonda vel forbeadaeghuelcum uutedlice giugiende ðec sel & seðe nimmeð ðaðe ðin sint ne eftbidde ðu& suæ gie wælle þætte hia doað vel gedoe iuh menn & gie doað him gelic& gif gie lufað hia ðaðe iuih lufað ða vel huelc iuh is ðonc vel wuldor forðon & synnfullo ða lufiande hia lufagiad& gif wel gie doeð ðæm ðaðe iuh wel doeð huelc iuh is ðonc ðahhueðre & synnfulle ðis doað& gif huerf gie sellas ðæm from ðæm gie hyhtað to onfoane huelc ðonc is iuh forðon & synnfullo synnfullum biðon gearwyrðed þætte onfoað efne velsoðhueðre lufiges fiondes iuera & wel doað & huoerf seallað noht on ðec hyhtendo & bið meard iura micelo & gie biðon sunu ðæs heiste forðon he rummod is ofer unðoncfullum & yflumwosað gie forðon miltheorte suæ & faeder iuer miltheart isnællað gie gedoema & ne þætte gie se gedoemed nællað gie gehniðra & þætte gie ne se gehniðrad forletas & iuh bið forletenseallas & iuh bið sald gewoege vel gemet god efne gebroht & & oferflouende hia sellað on barm iuer ðio ilca forðon gemet þætte metende gie biðon eftgemeten iuh biðcuoeð ðonne him & onlicnese hueðer mæg se blind ðone blinde gelæda ahne boege on seaðe fallaðne is vel nese discipul ofer magistre wisfæst ðonne eghuelc bið gif vel sua laruu hishuæd ðonne gesiist ðu þæt lytle mot in ego broðres ðines ðone beam uutedlice ðio in ego ðinum is ne efnesceauas ðu& hu mæht ðu cuoeða broðre ðinum broðer forlet þætte ic aworpo ðone mot of ego ðinum he in ego ðinum þæt beam ne gesiis ðu la legere aworp ærist ðone beam of ego ðinum & ðonne ðu eftlocas þætte ðu ofgebrenge ðæt mot of ego broðres ðinesne is forðon tree god ðio doeð wæstma yfla ne tree yfla wyrcas wæstm godan suæhuælc forðon tree of wæstm his gecyðed bið ne forðon of ðornum gesomnað ficbeam ne of reado hia winigað l monigfaldas þæt winbeger l þæt croppgod mon of god strion heartes his ahefeð god & yfel monn of yfele ahebbeð yfel of monigfaldnise forðon heartes muð spreceshuæd ðonne ceiges gie mec drihten drihten & ne doað gie ða ðe ic cuoeðoeghuoelc seðe cymeð to me & gehereð worda mina & doeð ða vel hia ic adeawa iuh huæm gelic siegelic is ðæm menn timbrende hus seðe delfæð on heanise & gesette ða grundas ofer carr vel stan flod vel hreh miððy uutedlice awarð tobrocen wæs se stream ðæm huse & mæhte hia gestyurige gesettet forðon wæs onufa carrseðe ðonne geherde & ne dyde gelic is ðæm menn timbrende hus his onufa stan buta grund on ðon toslitten wæs þæt stream & sona gefeall & aworden wæs faell huses ðæs micelmiððy uutedlice gefyllde alle worda his in earum folces infoerde in þæt burugðæs aldormonnes ða sum esne yfle hæbbend wæs deadlic seðe him wæs diorwyrðe& miððy geherde from ðæm hælend sende to him ældowuto baed hine þætte gecuome & haelde ðrael hissoð hia miððy gecuomon to ðæm hælend bedon hine geornlice cuoedon him þætte l forðon wyrðe is þætte ðis him ðu doelufað forðon cynn usra & somnung vel cirica he getimbrade usse hælend uutedlice foerde mið him & miððy soðlice ne fearr wæs from hus sende to him se aldorman freondas cuoeð drihten nælle ðu firrfarra vel ne forðon wyrðe am þætte under hrof minum inngaeæc foreðon & mec seolfne ne am ic wyrðe doemend am þætte ic cuome to ðe ah cuoeð mið worde & hal bið cnæht minforeðon & ic monn am under mæht efnegesettet hafo under mec heremenn & ic cuoeðo ðisum gaa & gaeð & oðre cym & cymeð & ðræle minum do ðis & doeðmiððy geherde se hælend aundrad wæs & efnegecerde vel ymbwærlde ðæm æfterfylgendum hine ðreatum cuoeð soðlice ic cuoeðo iuh ne in israel ðus micelo geleafo gemoete ic vel ne fand ic& gecerdon ðaðe gesended woeron to ham vel hus gemoeton ðone esne seðe unhal wæs hal& aworden wæs æfter ðon foerde on ceastre ðiu is genemned naim & eadon mið hine ðegnas his & folc monigomiððy ðonne geneolecte to durum ceastres & heono dead wæs ferende sunu ancende moderes his & ðios widua wæs & folco ceastres monig mið hiaþæt ilca miððy gesege se drihten mið miltheortnise gecerred ofer hia cuoeð hir to nælle ðu woepa& geneolecde & hran þæt ceiste ða uutedlice ðaðe beron stodon & cuoeð esne ðe ic cuoeðo aris& eftsætt l aras seðe wæs dead & ongann spreca & salde hine moeder hisondfeng uutedlice alle ondo & wundradon god cuoedon þætte witga micel aras in us & forðon god sohte folc his& eode vel foerde ðis word on all iudea & all ymb þæt lond& sægdon iohanne ðegnas his of allum ðæm& efnegeceigde tuoge from ðegnum his iohannes & sende to drihtne cuoeð ðu arð vel arð ðu seðe tocymende wæs vel arð vel oðer we abideðmiððy uutedlice gecuomon to him wæras cuoedon iohannes sende usih to ðe cuoeðende ðu arð seðe tocymende wæs vel arð vel oðer we abidasin ðailca ðonne tid lecnade monigo of adlum & teissum l cualmum & of gastum yflum & blindum monigum salde gesihðe& ondsuarede cuoeð to him geongas sægcas iohanne ða ðing gie gesego & gie herdon þætte blindo geseað halto geongeð hreafo geclænsad aron vel sint deafo geherað deado arisað ðorfendo hia bodageð& eadig is suahuælc seðe ne bið geondspurnad on mec& miððy fromfoerdon erendwreco iohannes ongann cuoeða of iohanne to ðæm hergum ymb huæd vel forhuon foerdon gie on woestern gesea hread vel gerd from wind gecerredah forhon foerdegie gesea monno hnescum gewoedum gegearuad heono seðe in woede diorwyrðe sint & in huso cyninga sintah ymb huæd foerdon gie gesea vel to sceawnne witgo uutedlice ic cuoeðo iuh & forðor ðon witgeðis is of ðon awritten is vel wæs heono ic sendo engel min fore onsione ðin seðe foregearwaðe weg ðin fore ðecic cuoeðo forðon iuh mara bituih sunvm wifa witge from iohanne ne ænig is ðæm ðe ðonne leasa is in ric godes mara is him vel ðæm& all folc geherde & bærsynnig gesoðfæstadon god weron gefulwad mið fulwiht iohannesða aeldo ðonne & aes wuto ðæhtung godes teldon on him seolfum ne woeron gefulwad from himhuæm forðon ongelic ic cuoeðo menn cneoreses ðisses & huæm ongelic sintongelic sint cnaehtum sittendum on sprec & sprecendum bituih & cuoeðendum wege sungun iuh mið hwistlum & ne plægade gie we hondbeafton & ne wæpde giecuom forðon iohannes ne eteð hlaf ne drincað win & gie cuoeðas diowl hæfeðcuom sunu monnes eteð & drincað & gie cuoeðað heono monn ettere & drincað þæt win freond bærsynigra & synnfullra& gesoðfæstad wæs mið snytro from allum sunum hisgebaed ða hine sum from aeldeuutum þætte geete mið hine & infoerde hus gehlionade& heono wif ðio wæs in ceastra portcuoene vel synnfule þætte ongaet þætte hlionade in hus tobrohte oelefæt full smirinise& stod bihianda æt fotum his mið teherum vel tearum ongann geðuoa vel aðoa foet his & mið herum heafdes hire gedrygde & gecyste foet his & mið smirinise aðuohðailca & hulic wif were ðio gehrineð him þætte portcuoene is& onduearde se hælend cuoeð to him l ðæm ic hafo ðe huothuoego to cuoeðanne soð he cuoeð laruu cuoeðtuoege scyldgo woeron sume ricemenn an ahte to geldanne penningas fif hundrað oðer fifteihne hæbbendum ðæm huona guldon forgaef him baem vel eghder huelc forðon hine forðor lufadegeondsuarede cuoeð ic woeno þætte of ðisum ðæm forðor vel mara forgaef soð he cuoeð him rehte ðu doemdest& ymbwerlde to ðæm wife cuoeð to simon gesiist ðu ðios wif ic infoerde in hus ðin þæt wæter fotum minum ne saldest ðu ðios uutedlice mið tearum l tehrum aðuoh foet mine & mið herum hire geclænsadecoss me ne saldest ðu ðios uutedlice of ðon vel siðða in ic foerde ne blann cossetunges vel foeta minemið smirinise heafod min ne geðuoge ðu ðios uutedlice mið smirenise aðuogh foet minforeðon ic cuoeðo ðe forgefen biðon hiræ synno menigo forðon lufade suiðe vel feolo ðæm uutedlice lyttel bið forgefen lyttel lufad vel lufadecuoð ða to ðær ilca forgefen biðon ðe synna& ongunnon ðaðe mið ætgeadre hliongende woeron gecuoeða betuih him huæt is ðes seðe fæstlice synna forgefeðcuoeð ða to ðæm wife geleafo ðin ðeh hal dyde gaa in sibbe& aworden wæs æfter ðon & he geong dyde ðerh ceastra & woerc bodade & godspellade ric godes & tuoelfo mið hine& wif chuzes && oðero menigo ða ðe embehtadon ðæm of strionum hioramiððy ðonne ðreat menigo efnecuome of ceastrum geneolecdon to him cuoeð ðerh onlicnise vel biseneeade seðe saweð to sawenne sed his & miððy saweð oðer feall neh wege & getreden wæs & flegendo heofnes gefreten þæt& oðer feall ofer stan & þæt brord vel awisnade vel fordrugade forðon ne hæbde wetnise& oðer gefeall æt ðornum & ongelic arison ðornas underðulfon vel fordydon þæt& oðer feoll on eorðo god & uphebbing dyde wæstm hunteantig siða monigfald ðas cuoeðende ceigde seðe hæfeð earo hernises geheraðgefrugnon ða hine ðegnas his huæt wære ðio bisenoðæm he cuoeð iuh gesald is to wuttanne vel þæt gie witte clæne ryne vel asægdnise rices godes oðrum uutedlice in geddungum þætte gesegon ne geseað & geherdon ne oncnaueðis ðonne ðios bisseno sed is word godesseðe uutedlice æt woeg sint ða ðe geherað æfter ðon cuom se diowl & genom þæt word of heorta hiora ne gelefas þætte hal hia geworðaforðon seðe onufa stan ða ðe miððy geherað mið gefea vel glædnise onfoað word & ðas wyrtruma ne habbað ðaðe to tid vel to huil gelefað & in tid costunges hia fearrageð vel fleaðþætte uutedlice in ðornum gefeall ðas sindon ðaðe geherdon & mið gemnissum & walum & willum lifes miððy geongas underdolfen biðon & ne eftbrengeð wæstmþætte uutedlice on god eorðo ðas sint ðaðe in herte god & gecoren geherdon word haldas & wæstm brengas in geðyldne ænig monn ðonne lehtfæt vel ðæcilla miððy gebernes awria ðailca mið fatte vel under bedd sette ah onufa lehtisrn sette þætte ingeongande/ vel infærende hia gesea þæt lehtne forðon is degle þætte ne bið ædeawad ne gehyded vel forholen þætte ne oncnauen vel ongetten bid & on eawung cymedgeseað forðon huu ge geherdon ðeðe forðon hæfeð gesald bið him & sua hua seðe ne hæfeð uutedlice þætte woeneð hine vel he hæbbe genumen bið from him vel ðæmcuomon ðonne to him l ðæm moder & broðro his & ne mæhton gecuma to him fore ðæm here& asægd wæs him moder ðin & broðro ðine stondeð uta wallas ðec geseaseðe ondsuarede cuoeð to him vel ðæm moder min & broðro mine ðas sint ðaðe word godes geherað & doaðaworden wæs ða on an ðara dagana & he astag on an scipp & ðegnas his & cuoeð to him vel to ðæm ofercearfa we vel ofer þæt luh & astigonhrowundum vel miððy gehrowun ðonne ðæm slepde & ofduna astag hræs vel windes on luh & gefylled woeron vel & woeron afryhtad velgeneolecton uutedlice awoehton hine cuoeðende vel cwoedon la haesere we losaiað soðlice he aras geðreade þæt wind & hroeðnise vel unwoeder ðæs wætres & geblann & aworden wæs ðio smyltnisecuoeð uutedlice ðæm huoer is gehleafo iuera ðaðe geeondredes awundradon vel woeron awundrad cuoedon bituih hua woenest ðu ðes is þætte & windum hatteð & sae & geherað himðona gehrewun ða to londe ðara lioda ðio is fora ongægn galilea& miððy færende woere to londe togægnes arn him wer sum seðe hæfde ðone diowl fæstlice tidum monigum & mið woedo ne gegearuad wæs ne in hus gewunade ah in byrgennumðes þætte gesæh ðone hælend gefeall befora him & ceigde vel cliopade stefne micla cuoeð huæd me & ðe is hælend sunu godes ðæs hæsta ic biddo ðec ne mec ðrouiga vel þætte ðu mec ne gegroeta vel ne piniabebeade forðon ðæm unclæne gaste þætte foerde of ðæm menn monigum forðon tidum fornom hine & gebunden wæs mið raccentegum & mið fatrum gehalden wæs & miððy geslitten weron ða bendo gedrifen wæs from diowlæ on woesternumgefraign ða hine se hælend cuoeð huæd ðe noma is soð he cuoeð here forðon ineadon diowlas monigo in him& bedon hine þætte ne gehehte him þætte in niolnise gefoerdon hiawæs ðonne ðer ede vel sunor bergana monigo foedendra vel lesuuandra on more & bedon hine þætte gelefde him in ðæm ingeonga & gelefde himfoerdon forðon ða diowblas of ðæ menn & infoerdon in bergum & mið ferræs eode þæt sunor oefistlice on luh & fordoen wæsþætte sua þæt gesegon aworden vel awarð ðaðe gelesuadon flugun & sægdon in ða burug & in londumfoerdon ðonne gesea þætte auorden wæs & cuomon to ðæm hælende & gemoeton ðone monno sittende of ðæm ða diowlas foerdon geweded & hale ðohte to fotum his & onðreardonsægdon ða ðæm & ðaðe gesegon huu hal aworden wæs from diowla here& beðon hine all ðio menigo londes ðara lioda þætte gefearrade from ðæm forðon mið fyrhto miclo woeron gehalden he ðonne astag þæt scipp eftcerde vel cerrende& gebaed hine se woer of ðæm ða diowblas foerdon þætte mið hine were forleort ða hine se hælend cuoeðeftfær to huse ðinum & sæge huu micla ðe dyde god & eode ðerh alle ða ceastra bodade hu micla him dyde se hælendaworden wæs ðonne miððy eftcuom se hælend onfeng hine ðio ðread woeron forðon alle bidende hine& heono cuom se wer ðæm noma wæs & he aldormon somnunges wæs & feall to fotum hælendes gebæd hine þætte inneode in hus hisforðon dohter ancende wæs him woeno ic wintro tuoelfo & ðios deadade & gelamp miððy eode from ðæm here wæs geðringed vel geðrungen& wif sum wæs in flowing blodes from wintrum tuoelfum ðio on lecum fromsalde all feh hire ne from ænigum mæhte gelecnæge vel wosa gelecnedgeneolecde behianda & gehran fasne wedes his & sona astod þæt flowing blodes hire& cuoeð se hælend hua wæs seðe mec gehran onsæccendum ðonne allum cuoeð petrus & ðaðe mið him woeron haesere ða menigo ðec geðringað & woerdað vel & ðu cuoeðas hua mec gehran& cuoeð se hælend gehran mec huoelc huoege forðon ic wiste mæht from mec eodegesæh ðonne þæt wif þætte ne gedegelde cuaccende cuom & gefeall fore fotum ðæs l his & fore ðæm inting gehrine hrine becnade fora allum folce & huu sona gehæled wæssoð he cuoeð him dohter geleafa ðin ðec hal dyde gaa in sippðageane hine spreccende from aldormonn somnunges cuoeð him þætte dead is dohter ðin nælle ðu gestyrege hinese hælend ða miððy geherde ðis word geondsuarede feder ðæræ mædne nælle ðu ðe ondrede gelef ana & hal hio bið& miððy gecuome to hame ne gelefde ingeonga mið ænig buta & & & fader & moder ðære mægdnegewaepon ðonne alle & mændon ðailca soð he cuoeð nallað ge woepa ne is dead ah slepeð& hlogun vel teldon hine hia wiston þætte dead werehe ða geheald hond his cliopade cuoeðende la mægden aris& eftawoende wæs gaast hire vel ðæra & aras recone & heht hir sealla eatta& wundradon vel gestyldon aldro ðæm bebead þætte ne ænigum hia gecoedon þætte aworden wæsmiððy geceiged woeron uutedlice tuoelfo ða apostolas salde ðæm mægn & mæht ofer alle diowlas & þætte ða untrymigo gelecnades& sende hia bodia vel to bodianne ric godes & hæla ða unstronga& cuoeð to ðæm noht gie nime on woege ne gerd ne pocca vel posa ne hlaf ne feh ne tuoege cyrtlas habas gie& in suahuelcum hus gie inngae ðer wunað & ðona ne færes gie& seðe suahua ne onfoeð iuh færað from ceastra ða ilca fæstlice þæt asca fota iura asceaccað on cyðnise onufa ðæm ilcomfoerdon ðonne ymbeadon ðerh ða ceastra bodande & lecnande eghuergeherde ða se cynig alle ða ðe weron aworden from him & tuiade forðon wæs acuoeden from summum þætte iohannes aras from deadumfrom summum æc forðon vel þætte helias ædeaude from oðrum ðonne þætte se witgæ an from witgum aras& cuoeð se cynig ic ofcearf huelc ðonne is ðes of ðæm gehero ic ðuslico & sohte to geseanne hine& eftcerdon ða ðegnas sægdon him ðaðe sua huæd hia dydon & miððy onfenge woeron hia foerde syndria on woestigum stou seðe is ðæt burugþætte miððy ongeton ða menigo gefylgendo woeron hine & genom hia & spræcc him of ric godes & ðailco ðaðe gemnise behofadon gehældese dæg ða ongann gefara vel gebege & geneolecdon ða tuoelfo cuoedon him forlet ða hergas þætte geeadon in ða ceastra & londo ðaðe ymb sint ofcerdon ðætte hia gemoeton metto forðon her in stowe woestig woe sindoncuoeð ða to ðæm gie seallað ðæm eatta soð hia cuoedon ne sint us mara ðon fif hlafo & tuoege fiscas buta woenunga us we gefæra & we gebygce on alle ðiosne here mettowoeron ðonne ic woeno wæras fif ðusendo cuoeð ðonne to ðegnum his doað ðæm to dælum vel ðerh gebearscipo fif hundrað vel& sua dedon & todælnisse vel dydon alleonfengo woeron uutedlice fif hlafum & tuæm fiscum eftlocade on heofne & gebloedsade him & gebræcc & todælde ðegnum his þætte hia gesete fore ðem hergum& eton alle & gefylde woeron & genumen wæs þætte gehlaefde ðæm scraedungra ceaolas tuoelfo& aworden wæs miððy ana woere gebiddenda woeron mið hine aec ða ðegnas & gefrægn ðailco cuoeðende huælcne mec cuoeðas þæt ic se ðas hergassoð hia ondsuaredon & cuoedon iohannem oðero uutedlice oðero þætte witga an of ðæm ærrum arascuoeð ða ðæm gie ðonne huelcne mec þætte ic se cuoaðas geondsuarede cuoeð gecoren godessoðlice he geðreade hia bebead þætte ne ænigum gecuoedon ðiscuoeð þætte ariseð sunu monnes feolo vel micelo geðolia vel geðrowia & forcumman from ældum vel from ðæm ældestum & aldormonnum sacerda & uðwutum & ofslaa vel þætte se ofslægen & ðe ðirddan ðæg arisacuoeð he ða to allu gif hua wile æfter mec gecyme onsæccað him seolfum & lædað ðrowung his dæge gehuæmlice & fylgeð mec vel soece mecseðe forðon wælle sauel his hal gewyrca losað ðailca forðon seðe losað sawel his fore mec hal doað ðailcahuæd forðon forstondað monn gif he strioneð allne middangeard hine ðonne seolfne losað & losuist his gewyrcaðforðon seðe mec gesceomigað & mino wordo ðiosne sunu monnes gesceomiað miððy cymeð in ðrymm his & fadores & haligra englaic cuoeðo uutedlice iuh soðlice sint sume oðera her stondað ðaðe ne gebergeð ðone deað oððdæt geseað ric godesaworden wæs ða æfter ðasum wordum ic woeno dagas æhto & genom & && astag on more þætte gebede& aworden wæs miððy gebæd megwlit onsione his oðoro & gewoedo his huit swiðe gescean& heono tuoege wæras gesprecon mið hine woeron uutedlice &woeron gesene in ðrymm & cuoedon þæt tofær vel his ðone scealde gefylled wosa vel wæs in hierusalemæc & ðaðe mið hine gehefigad woeron from slepe & awæhton gesegon ðrymm his & tuoege wæras ðaðe stodon mið him& aworden wæs miððy foerdon from him cuoeð to ðæm hælende la bodare god is us her to wosanne & wyrca we ðrea hus an ðe & an & an ne wiste huæd gecuoeðeðas ða hine sprecende aworden wæs wolcen & oferbrædde hia & ondreardon geongendum him in þæt wolcen& stefn aworden wæs of ðæm wolcne cuoeðende ðes is sunu min leofa hine vel ðene geherað& miððy wæs se stefn gemoetad wæs se hælend he ana & hia suigdon & ne ænigum gecuoedon in ðæm dagum æniht of ðæm ðaðe gesegongeworden wæs ðonne on ðæm æfterra doege ofdune astigendum ðæm of ðæm more arn togaegnes him here micel& heono woer of ðæm here gecliopade cuoeð la laruu ic biddo ðec besæh on sunu minum forðon ancende is me& heono gast gegrippde hine & ferlice clioppiað & bites & fordoað hine mið fame & ned vel hefia fearras tosliteð hine& ic baedd ðegnas ðine & awurpon hine & ne mæhtonondsuarede ðonne se hælend cuoeð la cneoreso ungeleafull & wohfull hu longe ic biom mið iuh & ic ðola iuih tolæd sunu ðinne& miððy geneolecde agroette hine se diowl & losade vel & geðreade se hælend ðone gast unclænne & gehælde ðone cnæht & agæf hine feder hisgewundradon soðlice alle on suiðe micelnisse godes allum ða ilco undrandu on allum ðaðe he dyde cuoeð to ðegnum hissettes gie in heortum iurum wordo ðas sunu forðon monnes towaerd is þætte gesald bið in hond monnasoð hia ne oncneaun word ðis & wæs awirgen fore hia þætte ne ðohton þæt & ondreardon to frægnanne hine ofer ðis wordineode uutedlice smeaung in him huælc hiora mara wereða se hælend gesaeh smeaungas heartes hiora gelahte cnæht sette hine neh him& cuoeð ðæm ilcom ðegnum seðe sua chuælc onfoeð cnæhte ðissum on noma minum mec onfoað & seðe sua hua mec onfoað onfoað ðone ilca seðe mec sende forðon seðe leasan is bituih allum iuh ðes maasta isondsuarede iohannes cuoeð la hæsere woe gesegon sumne oðer in noma ðinum aworpende ða dioblas & we forbudon him forðan ne fylges usig mið& cuoeð to him se hælend nallað gie forbeade seðe forðon ne is wið iuih fore iuih isaworden wæs ða miððy gefylled woeron dagas ondfenges vel geliornises his & he onsione his getrumade þætte foerde hierusalem& sende erendureca fore gesigðe his & miððy foerdon ineadon in ða ceastre ðara lioda þætte foregearuadon him& ne ondfengon hine forðon onsione his wæs færendes hierusalemmiððy gesegon ðegnas his & cuoedon drihten wilt ðu þætte we coeða þætte fyr ofduna astige of heofnum & fornime hia& ymbwælde geðreade ða ilco vel hia& foerdon in oðerum woercaworden wæs ðonne geongendum him on woeg cuoeð sum oðer to him ic fylgo ðec suæhuiddir ðu fære& cuoeð him se hælend foxas holas habbað & flegendo heofnes nesto habbað sunu uutedlice monnes ne hæfeð ðer vel huer heafud gebegacuoeð ða to oðrum soec vel fylg mec he ða coeð drihten forgef vel gelef me ærist geonga & þæt ic byrga fæder min& cuoeð se hælend forlet þætte ða deado bebyrgað deado hiora ðu uutedlice gaa saeg ric godes& cuoeð oðer ic fylgo ðec drihten ah ærist gelef me eftsæcga ðæm ðaðe æd ham sintcuoeð to him se hælend ne ænig sende hond his on sulh & behaldas on bæcg gecoren is to ric godesæfter ðas ðonne ofgemercade drihten & oðoro hundseofontig tuoege & sende hia tuoege fora onsione his on alle ceastra & þæt stydd ðæm wæs he tocymende& cuoeð him hrippes soðlice feolo wyrcendra uutedlice huon biddað forðon drihten ðære hrippes þætte gesende woercmenn on ohtrippe hisgaað heono ic sendo iuih sua lombro bituih ulfumnællað gie gebeara seam ne posa ne sceoe & ne ænigne monn ðerh woege gie groetaðon sua huelcne hus gie ingæeð ærist cuoeðað sibb ðissum huse& gif ðer sie sunu sibbes wunað ofer hia sibb iuera gif ðonne to iuh eftgecerreðin ðæm ilca ðonne hus wunað eattas & drincas ða mið him sint wyrðe forðon is se woercmonn mearde his nallað gie oferfara of huse in hus& in suæhuælc ceastra gie infæreð & onfoað iuh eattas ða togesetted biðon iuhsoðlice l an is nedðarf l behoflic gecoren dæl geceas ðio l ða ne bið genumen from hir& aworden wæs miððy were in stowe sumre gebiddende þætte geblann cuoeð an of ðegnum his to him drihten lær usih þæt we gebidde sua & gelærde ðegnas his& cuoeð him miððy gie gebiddað cuoeðað fader gehalgad sie noma ðin tocymæð ric ðinhlaf userne dæghuæmlice sel us eghuelc dæge& forgef us synna usra gif fæstlice æc we forgefes eghuelc scyldge us forgefes & ne usic onlæd ðu in costunge& cuoeð to him vel ðæm sua huelc iuer hæbbe vel hæfeð friond & gaeð to him æd middernæht & cuoeðes him la freond lih vel sel me ðreo hlafasforðon friond min cuom of woeg to me & ne hæfic þætte ic sette befora hine& he of inne cuoeð nælle ðu me woede vel hefig wosa forðon ðe dura beloccen is & cnæhtas mino mec mið sint in cotte ne mæge ic arisa & sealla ðeic cuoeðo iuh & gif ne selles him ariseð forðon friond his bið fore scendla vel scending vel giornise huoeðre his ariseð & seleð him þætte hæfeð nedðarfom vel behoflicesetnungum vel & sohton to niomanne huoelchuoego of muðe his þætte hea gehendon hinemenigum ðonne vel ða hergum ymbstondendum suæ þætte hia him bituih geteldon ongann cuoeða to ðegnum his behaldað gie iuih from dærste þæt is esuicnisenoht ðonne awrigen is þætte ne ædeauad bið ne gehyded vel gedegled þætte ne bið geyppedforðon ðaðe in ðiostrum gie cuoedon in leht biðon gecoeden & þætte in eare sprecend gie woeron in cottum aboden bið on hrofumic cuoeðo ða vel ðonne iuh friondum minum þætte gie ne se afyrhtad from ðæm ðaðe ofslæð þæt lichoma & æfter ðas ne habbas forðor þætte doaðic adeawu ðonne iuh ðone gie ondrede ondredas ðene seðe æfter ðon ofslaeð hæfeð mæht gesenda vel to gesendanne in tintergo suæ ic cuoeðo iuh ðionne ondredeð& an of ðæm ne is on ofergetnise vel fora godæah & æc hero heafdes iweres alle getalad aron nallað gie forðon ondrede monigum forðoro vel maro gie sint vel biðonic cuoeðo ðonne iuh eghuelc seðe suahuelc ondetende bið on mec befora monnum & sunu monnes geondetað bið on ðæm fore englum godesic cuoeðo ðe ne gaes ðu ðona oðð uutedlice ðone hlætmesto pricclu vel þætte ðu forgeldetocuomon ða sumo ðæm on tid sægdon ða vel him of galilea ðæm vel ðara ðara vel hiora blod gemengde mið asægdnisum hiora& geonduarde cuoeð ðæm woenað gie þætte ðas galilesco fore allum galilescum synfullo biðon vel woeron forðon vel þætte ðuslico ðrowendo weron vel biðonne cuoeðo iuh ah buta hreonisse gie hæbbe alle gelic gie sciolo losigasuæ ða teno & ða aehtou onufa ðæm gefeall se torr in ðær byrig & ofslog ðailco woenað gie þætte æc ðailco scyldgo woeron bi allum monnum byedon in hierusalemne coeðo ic iuh ah hueðre gif hreonise gie ne doeð alle gelic gie sciolon losigagecuoeð he uutedlice vel ða ðios vel ðus geddung vel onlicnise vel bisene tree ficbeames hæfde sum monn geplontad vel gesetet in wingearde his & cuom sohte wæstm on ðær ilco & ne fand vel ne gemoetecuoeð ða to bigencga vel to ðæm bigeonle ðæs wingeardas heono gero ðrio sint of ðon vel soðða ic cuom sohte wæstm on ficbeame ðisser & ne ic fand vel ne gemoete ic hrendas vel scearfað forðon ðailca vel hia to huon uutedlice eorðo gionetað vel gemerrassoð he onduarde cuoeð to ðæm vel him drihten forlet hia & vel æc ðios ger wið þæt miððy ic delfo ymb hia & ic sendo micxsenoheono forleten bið iuh hus iuera ic cuoeðo ða vel uutedlice iuh forðon vel þætte gie ne geseað mec oððæt cyme miððy gie cuoeðo se gebloedsad seðe cuom in noma drihtnes& aworden wæs miððy innfoerde in hus summes aldormonnes on symbeldæg to brucanne hlaf & ðailco behealdon hine& heono monn sum unhal vel wæs fore hine& ondusærede se hælend cuoeð to æs wistum & is gelefed on symbeldæge gelecniasoð hia vel ða suigdon he uutedlice gehlahte gehælde & forleort& geondsuaræde to ðæm cuoeð huelc vel huæs iueres asald vel oxa in seað falleð & ne sona ofdoeð hine doeg symbeles& ne mæhton to ðassum geonduearde himcuoeð ða & to ðæm laðendum vel þæt bisen beheald huu ða formo hræsto hia geceason cuoeð to himmiððy gehlaðed ðu bist to færmum ne hlina ðu in ða forma stoue eoðe mæge wyrðro ðec sie geneded vel gehlaðad from ðæmne on eorðo ne in feltune vel mixen ðorfæst is ah uta gesended bið seðe hæfeð earo to heranne vel hernises gehereðwoeron ða geneolecdon him bærsynnigo & synnfullo þætte geherdon hine& gehyrston vel & uðuto cuoeðendo þætte ðes ða synnfullo onfoeð & etað mið him& cuoeð to ðæm geddung ðios cuoeðhuoelc from iuh monn seðe hæfeð hundrað scip & gif forlorað vel losað enne of ðæm ahne forleteð ða nigona & hundneontig on woestern & gaað to ðær ilca ðaðe vel ðio losade oððæt gemoete ða ilca& miððy gemoetað hia onsettað on scyldrum his gefeande& cuom to hus l to ham geceigeð l geceigde friondum & neheburum cuoeð ðæm efne geðoncaiges me forðon ic gemoete scip min ðio losadeic cuoeðo iuh þætte on ða wisa gefea bið on heofnum ofer enne vel an synnfullne hreonise hæbbende ðon ofer ða nigone & hundneantig soðfæstum vel soðfæsto ða ðe ne beðorfeð to hreonisevel ðio wif hæfde vel hæbbe fif sceattas tea siðum gif losað casering enne ahne berneð ðæccilla & ymbstyreð þæt hus & soecað georne oððæt gemoeteto hriordanne uutedlice & gefeage gehrisnelic woere forðon broðer ðin ðes dead wæs & eftlifde forloren wæs & gemoetad iscuoeð ða æc to ðegnum his monn sum wæs welig seðe hæfde geroefa & ðes gemersað wæs mið hine suoelce gespilde godo his& ceigde hine & cuoeð him huætd ðis ic hero from ðe agef vel forgeld rehto groefscire ðines uutedlice forðon ne mæht ðu gescira velcuoð ða se groefa bitiuih him huætd ic doam forðon drihten min benimeð from me þæt groefscire delfa ne mæg ic to giornanne vel to færanne on ælmessum ic sceomigo minic wat huæt ic doam þætte miððy ofadrifen ic biom from ðæm groefscire eft onfoað mec in husum hioramiððy weron geceigedo forðon syndrigum scyldgum hlaferdes his cuoæð ðæm forðmesto huu micel aht ðu to geldanne hlaferde minumsoð he cuoeð hundteantih ombras vel oeles & cuoeð him onfoh hleafgewritten vel unawritten ðin & sitt recone awritt fiftih& geherede se hlaferd groefo unrehtwisnisses þætte hoglice dyde vel doend forðon suno ðisses woruldes betro hogo vel sunum lehtes on cneoreso hiora sintcuoeð ða him gif mosen & ða witgo ne geherað vel ne ðah gif huelc of deadum arises gelefeð& to ðegnum his cuoeð unmæhtiglic is þætte ne cymo ða ondspyrniso we ðonne ðæm ðerh ðone hia cymasðarflicro is him gif stan coern geseted se ymb suira his & þætte se geworpen in sæ ðon þætte geondspyrne enne of lytlum ðisbehaldas iuih gif sinngigað se broðer ðin geðrea hine & gif hreonise doeð forgef him& gif vel ðæh seofo siða gesynngiga in ðec & seofa siða on dæge gecerred bið vel gewoendet bið to ðe cuoeðende gehreues mec forgef him& cuoedon ða ðegnas drihtne togeec us geleafoheartbreer ofwyrtrumia vel & oferplontia vel gesette on sæ & hersumiað iuhhuel ðonne iuerra hafeð esne eriende vel foedende vel lesuande seðe miððy gecerde of londe cuoeðeð him sona oferfær gehlinig& ne cuoeðeð him gearua þætte ic hriordege & foregyrd vel ðec & embihta me ða huile vel ic eto & drinco & æfter ðas ðu geetes & dringes ðuonduardon vel cuoedon him huer drihten seðe cuoeð him suæ huer bið ðe lichoma ðer gesomnad biðon earnascuoeð ða æc ðæt biseno to him þætte l forðon gehriseð l behoflic is symble gebidda & ne gesuicacuoeð doema sum wæs in summe ceastra seðe god ne ondrearde & ðone monno ne sceomade velwidiua uutedlice sum wæs in ceastra ðær & gecymeð vel cuome to him cuoeð wræc ðu mec of wiðerworde minum& ne walde ðerh menigo vel miclo vel feolo tid vel æfter ðas ða cuoeð bituih him & ðah god ne ondredo ic ne monno sceomigohuoeðre forðon woedo vel hefig wæs me ðio vel ðas widiua ic wræco ðailco þætte on ende vel æt nesta cymeð geteleð vel meccuoeð ða se hlafard geherað huæd se doema unrehtwisnise cuoeðgod ne doeð þæt wræcco ðara gecorenra his clioppendra to him dæge & næht & geðuild hæfeð on ðæmic cuoeðo iuh þætte ræðe doeð wræcce ðara soð huoeðre sunu monnes miððy cymes woenis ðu þætte gemoete vel infinde geleafo on eorðo& sona gesæh & fylgde hine wundrade vel miclade god & all þæt folc þætte gesæh gesalde lof vel gode& infoerde ðerheode ða burg& heono wer ðæs noma wæs & ðes wæs aldormonn vel foruost & he wæs welig& sohte to geseanne ðone hælend huelc were & ne mæhte fore ðæm here forðon on lencgo lyttel wæs& forearn astag in tree heard þætte gesege hine forðon ðona wæs færende& miððy gecuome to ðæm stoue onfeng se hælend gesæh hine & cuoeð to him vel to ðæm zache oefesta vel oefistlice adunestig forðon to dæge in hus ðin gedæfned is me to wunianne vel gewunia& oefistade ofstag adune & onfeng hine gefeande& miððy gesegon alle huuæstredon vel yfle ymbsprecon cuoedon þætte to menn synnfullum gecerdegesto uutedlice cuoeð to ðæm hælende heono half godra minra drihten ic sello ðorfendum & gif huæd ænigne ic besuac ic forgeldo fearfald vel feorsiðum& ne gemoeton vel ne fundon þætte dydon him all forðon þæt folc hlosnende wæs geherde hine& aworden wæs on anum ðara dagana lærende hine þæt folc in temple & bodande efnecuomon ða alldormenn sacerdo & uðuto mið ðæm ældestum& sægdon cuoeðendo ðus to him cuoeð us in huælc mæht ðas ðu doest vel huelc is seðe gesalde ðe ðios mæhtondsuarede ða cuoeð to ðæm wællo fregna iuih & ic anum worde ondsuaraide vel ondsuareð mefuluiht iohannis of heofnum wæs vel from monnumsoð hia gesmeaudon bituih him cuoeðende forðon gif we cuoeðas of heofnu cuoeðeð he forhuon forðon ne gelefde gie himgif ðonne we cuoeðas from monnum þæt folc all gestænað usig untuendlic sind forðon from iohanne witga þætte woere& geondsuaredon þæt hia ne wiston huona woere& geondsuaredon þæt hia ne wiston huona woere & se hælend cuoeð ðæm ne ic cuoeðo iuh in huoelc mæht ðas ic domðaðe forsuelgas l huso ða widuena wyrcas l þæt long gebed ðas l ða onfoeð l cursung þæt mara l þæt maastoeft beheald ða vel ðonne gesæh ða ðaðe gesendon ðingo hiora weligogesæh ðonne & sum oðer vel an widua ðorfondlico sendende meslenno feorðungas tuoeg vel an feorðungc& cuoeð soð is þæt ic cuoeðo iuh þætte widuua ðios vel ðas ðarfe forðor ðon alle sendeforðon alle ðas vel ða of monigfaldnise him sendon in ðingum godes ðios uutedlice of ðon þætte wona is vel forloren is vel wæs hir all lifoðæn hire ðone vel þæt hæfde sende& ðara sum cuoeðendum of temple þætte mið godum stanum & geafum gehrined were cuoeððas ðaðe gie gesegon vel geseað cymað dagas on ðæm ne bið forleten stan ofer stane seðe ne bið tostrogdengefrugnon ðonne hine cuoeðendo hæsere vel huoenne ðas vel ða biðon & huoelc vel huæd becon vel tacon miððy geworða vel þætte sie vel to wosanne onginnaðseðe cuoeð geseað þætte gie ne se bisuicen vel menigo forðon hia cymeð on noma minum cuoeðendo þætte ic am & ðio tid geneoleceð vel geneolecde nallað gie forðon geonga æfter him vel ðæm& all þæt folc to him in temple to heranne hinegeneolecað vel ðonne dæg symbel ðara dærstana seðe gecuoeden is eostro& sohton aldormonno sacerda & ða uðuto/ huu hine acuoella mæghton ondreardon forðon þæt folcinfoerde ðonne se wiðerworda in iudas seðe geceiged is scarioth/ an of ðæm tuoelfum& foerde & spreccend wes mið aldormonnum sacerda & laruum huu hine mæhte gesealla him& gefeando woeron & ðafando vel woeron feh him to seallanne vel geseallanne& geheht & sohte þæt tidlicnisse þætte mæhte sealla hine buta ðæm hergumcuom ðonne vel dæge dærstana in ðæm vel nedðarf wæs þætte were geslægen vel eostro& sende petrum & iohannen gecuoeð geongað gearuas us eostro þætte we ettesoð hia cuoedon huæd vel ðaget forðor woe willnigas cyðnisse vel wittnessa woe seolfo forðon geherdon of muðe his& aras all ðio menigo hiara brohton vel læddon hine to pilateongunnon ða hine gehena cuoeðendo ðiosno woe gemitton undercerrende vel cynn userne & forbeadende vel woerdende gæfelo vel to seallanne vel þætte se gesald ðæm caseri & cuoeðende hine cristum cyning þætte woere vel þætte seða gefraign hine cuoeð ðu arð cyning iudeana soð he ondsuarede cuoeð ðu cuoeðescuoeð ða se geroefa to aldormonnum sacerda & to ðæm menigum noht ic gemitto inðinges in ðissum mennsoð hia vel ða ontrymmedon vel cuoeðendo gecerreð þæt folc lærd vel ðerh allne iudea & agann vel from galilea oðð hiderse geroefa ða geherde galileam gefraign huoeðer vel gif monn galilesca woere& þætte vel miððy ongætt þætte of herodes onwæld woere eftsende hine to herode seðe & seilca hierusalem wæs ðæm dagumherodes ðonne gesene vel ðone hælend glæd wæs suiðe wæs forðon willnande of menigo tid to geseanne hine foreðon geherde feolo of him & hyhtade vel becon huoelchuoene to geseanne from him þætte woere aworden& eftcerdon gegearuadon wyrta gemong vel suueti stennc & smiriniso & sunnadæg æcsoð suigadon vel æfter bebodsunnadæg suiðe arlice vel cuomon to þæm byrgenne beron vel ðaðe gegearuadon ða suueti stenco& gemoeton ðæt stan eft fromawælted of ðæm byrgenne& innfoerdon ne gemoeton þæt lichoma drihtnes hælendes& aworden wæs miððy ðohte gelegeno vel forcumeno woeron of ðisum heono tuoege wæras gestodon æt vel neh ðæm in gegerelo lixendemiððy ondreardon ða vel uutedlice & ahældon þæt onsion on eorðo cuoedon to ðæm huæd soecað gie ðone lifiende mið deadumne is her ah huedre æftaras eftðencgað vel hu sprecend wæs iuh miððy ðaget in galilea were vel wæscuoeðende vel þætte vel forðon gedæfned is sunu monnes þætte se gesald in hond monno synnfulra & to vel þætte were ahoenen & ðirddan doege arisa& eftgemyndigo weron wordana hisasægd is boc godspelles æfter lucasearn onginneð godspel æfter iohannemin fruma uæs uord & uord þæt is godes sunu uæs mið god feder god uæs uordðis uæs in fruma mið godalle ðerh hine auorden sint & buta him geuorden is noht vel næniht þæt auorden uæsin him vel in ðæm lif uæs & lif uæs leht monna& leht in ðiostrum gescineð & ðiostro hia vel ne fornomon veluæs monn gesendet from gode ðæm noma uæs iohannesðes cuom in cyðnise þætte uittnesse vel cyðnese ðerhgetrymmede of leht þætte alle gelefdon ðerh hine vel ðone ilcane uæs he vel ðe ilca leht ah þætte cyðnise getrymmede from leht veluæs leht soð ðiu inlihteð ælc vel eghuelc monno cymmende in middangeardin middangearde uæs & middangeard ðerh hine geuorden uæs & middangeard hine ne ongeatin agan cuom & his hine ne onfeingonsuæ oft vel uutedlico eft onfengon hine vel gesalde ðæm mæht suno godes wosa vel þæt hia uero ðæm ðaðe gelefað in noma hisðaðe ne of blodum l ne of uillo l of lust lichomæs ne from uillo l lust ah of gode gecened sintchristus lichoma geuorden uæs vel is & gebyde vel uunade in usih & ue gesegon uuldor vel gefea his wuldor vel suelce ancennedes/ of vel from feder full uuldres vel gefeas & soðfæstnissesiohannes cyðnisse vel getrymmes of ðæm vel of him & clioppað cuoeðende ðes uæs vel is ðone ic sægde vel iuch seðe æfter mec tocymende is before vel ær mec auorden uæs forðon befora vel mec uæs& of fyllnisse his alle ue onfengon vel uuldor vel gefea fore gefeaforðon æ ðerh moise gesald uæs gefo vel gefea & soðfæstnise ðerh ðone hælend crist geuærð vel auorden isgod ænig monn ne gesæh æfra ðe ancenda sune seðe is in bearm vel in fæðem fadores ðe ilca vel gesægde& ðis vel cyðnise iohannis ða vel ðonn gesendon iudas from hierusolimiscum ðæm burguærum sacerdas & diacones vel to him þætte hia gefrugnon hine ðu huelc vel huæd arst vel arð& gefrugnon hine huæd uuteelice vel ðonne helias arð ðu & cueð nam ic witga arð ðu & geonduærde næse vel necuoedon forðon vel him to huelc arð ðu þætte ondsuere we geselle ðæm ðaðe gesendon usig huæd cuoeðestu from ðe seolfumcueð ic stefne clioppendes in uoestern rehtas vel woeg drihtnes suæ cuæð uitga& ðaðe asendet vel uoeron hia ueron from& gefrugnon hine & cuoedon huæd ðonne vel forðon fuuluuas ðu gif ðu ne arð crist ne helias ne witgageonduearde him iohannes cuæð ic fulgugia in uættre in middum uutedlice iuerra gestod ðone gie iuh ne cunnonðe is seðe æfter mec tocymmende is vel uæs seðe befora vel ær mec geuorden uæs ðæs ic ne am wyrðe þætte ic undoe vel his ðuong scoesðas in ðær byrig geworden uoeron begeonda vel ofer iordanen ðone stream ðer uæs iohannes fulguandeoðer doeg gesæh iohannes ðone hælend cummende to him & cuæð heono lomb godes seðe nimeð vel lædeð synne middangeardesðæs is of ðæm ic cuæð æfter mec cymeð vel cuom uer seðe ær mec auorden uæs forðon ærrur vel ær me uæs& ic nyste vel ne cuðe hine ah þætte were adeaued in israel foreðon vel æfterðon cuom ic in uætre fulguande vel to fulguanne& cyðnisse getrymede iohannes cueð forðon ic gisæh ðone gast adunestigende suælce culfre of heofnum & gewunede ofer hine& ic nyste hine ah seðe sende mec fulguia vel þæt ic fulgode in uætre he me to cuæð ofer ðene vel ðonilca ðu gesiist ðone gast ofdune stigende & wunigendæ ofer hine ðes is seðe gefulguas in gast halig vel in ðæm halge gaste& ic gesæh & cyðnesse vel witnese ic getrymede vel þætte ðes is sunu godesoðer doeg eftersona gestode iohannes & of ðegnum his tuoege& eftlocade vel beheald ðone hælend geongende cuoeð heono lomb godes& geherdon hine ða tuoege ðegnas spreccende & fylgende vel fylgendo/ woeron ðone hælendefne gecerde uutedlice vel ða ðe hælend & gesæh hia vel ðailco fylgendo hine cuoeð to ðæm huæd soecað gie ðaðe cuoedon him þæt is gecuoeden þæt getrahtad sie laruu huer bues ðu vel unas ðucueð to him cymað & geseað gecuomon & gesegon huær gewunade & mið hine vel mið ðæm gewunadon of doeg ðæm tid uutedlice uæs suelce ðio teigðauæs uutedlice broðer simones an of ðæm tuæm vel ðaðe geherdon from iohanne & fylgendo uoeron hinegemoette her ærist broðer his ðone simon & cuoeð him to we gemoetton þæt is getrachtad crist& gelædde hine to ðæm hælend ymbsceaude uutedlice hine se hælend cuæð ðu arð sunu iohannes ðu bist geciged þæt is getrahtad carrgeliornise & gemoette ðone ðegn & cuæð him to fylge vel soec mecuæs uutedlice of ðær byrig l of beðsaida byrig andreas & petresgemoette philippus nathanahel ðone ðeign & cuæð to him þæt ilce vel aurat moises in ae & uitgum ue gemoetun ðone hælend sunu iosephes from ðær byrig& cuæð to him nathanahel of natzareth maege huelchuoegu godes wosa cuoeð to him philippus cym & gesehgesæh ðe hælend nathanahel cymmende to him & cuæð of ðæm vel bi him heono soðlice ðe israhelisca in ðæm facon ne iscuæð to him nathanahel huona vel mec wistes ðu vel huonne cuðes ðu mec geonduearde se hælend & cuoeð to him ær ðon ðec philippus geceigde miððy ðu uere under ðæm ficbeam
