ic gesaeh ðecgeonduearde him nathanahel & cueð la laruu ðu arð sunu godes ðu arð cynig israhelgeondsuarede se hælend & cuæð to him forðon ic cuoeð ðe ic gesæh ðec under ðæm ficbeam ðu gelefeð mara of ðaem ðu bist gesegn& cuæð him to soðlice soð ic cueðo iuh gie geseað þæt heofun untyned & angla godes upstigende & ofdunestigende oferufa sunu monnes& doeg oðero hæmdo vel færmo geuordeno ueron in ðær byrig geliorneses & uæs ðiu moder & ðe hælend ðergeceiged uæs uutedlice ðer l ðider æc se hælend & ðegnas his to ðæm farmum l hæmdum& miððy gescyrte vel gesceortade þæt uin cuoeð moder hælendes to him uin nabbað& cueð to hir se hælend huæd ðe & me is la uif ne ðaget vel cuom tid mincuæð moder his ðæm embehtmonnun vel ðæm birilum suæhuæd he gecueðas to iuh doað vel uircaðwoeron uutedlice ðer stænino fatto vel bydno sex gesettedo æfter clænsunge vel iudeana niommende vel genomon syndrige sestras tuoege vel ðreacueð to ðæm se hælend gefylleð gie ða fatto of uætre & gefyldon ða ilca uið to briorde up vel& cuæð him to se hælend birleð vel dæleð nu vel sona & brengeð ðæm aldormen & gebrohtunþætte vel miððy uutedlice ingeberigde vel ingebarg se aldormon þæt uæter to uine geuorden & ne wiste huona were ða embehtmenn vel uutedlice geuiston ðaðe birladon þæt uæter ceigeð ðone brydguma se aldormonn& cuoeð to him aelc mon ðone forma vel ærist þæt god uin setteð & miððy indrungno biðon ðonne vel þæt ðætte wuyrresta bið vel is ðu gehealde þæt god uin uið to ðises vel uið nu vel uið ðageanaðis uorhte frumma ðara uundra se hælend in ðær byrig & ædeaude uuldor vel gefea his & gelefdon on hine ðegnas hisæfter ðis ðona astag ða burug he & his moder & his broðro & his ðegnas & ðer uunadon ne menigum dagum vel unmonigum dagum& geneolecde eastro iudeana & astag ða burug se hælend& gemoete in ðæm temple bebycgendo vel exin & scipo & culufro & ða mynetro sittendo& miððy geworhte vel suælce suuopa of rapum allo ða fordraf of ðæm temple ða scipo æc toðon & ða exin & ðaera mynetra of gæt mæslen & ða discas ymbcerde& ðæm ðaðe ða culfero bebohton l cueð gebrengað ðas hiona nallað gie gewyrce hus fadores mines hus cepinceseftgemyndigo forðon ueron ðegnas his þætte auritten uæs elnung vel æfista huses ðines geet mecgeondueardon forðon iudeas & cuedon him huelc becon ðu ædeaues us forðon ðas ðu wyrcesgeondsuearade se hælend & cueð ðæm undoeð tempel ðis & on ðriim dagum ic auecco þæt velcuedon forðon iudeas feortig & sex uintro getimbred uæs ðis tempel & ðu on ðriim dagum auecceð þæthe uutedlice gecueð of temple his lichomesmiððy uutedlice ariseð vel aras from deadum eftgemyndgo ueron his ðegnas forðon ðis gecueð & gelefdon ðæm uuritte & uorde ðone vel þætte cuæð se hælendmiððy uutedlice uere vel uæs ðæm liodum in eostro in halgum dæge menigo gelefdon in his noma gesegon becno his ðaðe geuorhte velhe uutedlice se hælend ne lefde vel ne trugude hine seolfne him vel ðæm foreðon he uiste alle& forðon vel þætte ðærf him ne uæs þætte ænig monn vel huelc cyðnise ðerhtrymede of menn he forðon uiste huæt uere in mennuæs uutedlice monn of genemned vel aldormonn iudeanaðes cuom to him on næht & cuæð to him la laruu ue uuton þætte from gode ðu gecuome laruu nænig monn mæge ðas taceno geuirce ðaðe ðu doas vel uircas buta sie god mið himgeondsuærade se hælend & cuæð to him soð is soðlice ic sægo ðe buta huelc accenned sie snude vel niunge ne mæge gesea ric godescueð to him nicodimus se aldormonn huu mæge se monn þætte se accenned miððy ald bið huæðer mæge in uommbe vel moderes his eftgeboetad þætte ingae & accenned segeonduearde se haelend soð is soðlice ic cueðo ðe buta hua eftboren sie of uætre & gaste ne mæge þætte inngæ vel inngeonga in ric godesþæt accenned is vel bið of lichoma lichoma is & þætte accenned bið vel is of gaste gast isne uundra ðu forðon ic cuoeð ðe geriseð vel behofað vel gedaefneð iuc snude velse gast ðer wil oeðað & stefn his ðu geheres ah ne uast ðu vel nastu huona cymað & huidir gaað vel færað suæ is eghuelc seðe accenned is of gaastegeonduearde nicodimus se aldormonn & cuoeð him to huu magon ðas wosa vel geuorðageondsuarade se hælend & cuæð to him ðu arð laruu israhelis & ðas ðu nast vel ðas ðe sint unncuðosoð is soðlice ic cueðo ðe forðon þæt ue wuton ue gesprecas & þæt ue gesegun we getrymes vel & cyðnisse vel uitnessa usa vel userna ne onfoas giegif ða eorðlico ic cueð iuh vel & ne gelefes gee huu gif ic cueðo vel ic sego iuh ða heofunlico ge gelefeð& nænig monn astag in heofne buta ðeðe ofdune stag of heofnum sunu monnes seðe is vel uæs in heofnum& suæ moises gefeade vel forcuom ða nedre on woestern suæ gefeage vel ofersuiða gedeafnad is sunu monnesþætte eghuelc seðe gelefeð in ðæm vel ne losað ah he hæfeð lif ecesuæ forðon lufade god ðone middangeard þætte sunu his ancende gesalde þætte eghuelc seðe gelefeð on hine ne losas ah hæfeð lif ecene forðon gesende god sunu his in middangeard þætte gedoemde middangeard ah þætte gehæled uere middangeard ðerh hineseðe gelefeð on hine ne bið ðe gedoemed seðe uutedlice ne gelefes fæstlice gedoemed is forðon ne gelefde on noma ðæs ancende sunu godesðæt is uutedlice ðe dom forðon leht cuom on middangeard & gelufadun menn suiðor ðiostro ðon leht ueron forðon hiora yflo werco vel undedochristus & ne cuom l cymes to leht i christus þætte ne sie forcuodeno l uoerco hisseðe uutedlice uircað soðfæstnise cymmeð to leht þætte sie ædeaued vel his uerco forðon in gode sint geuordenoæfter ðas cuom se hælend & ðegnas his in iudea eorðu & ðer geuunade mið ðæm & gefulguade veluæs uutudlice eac iohannes fulwuande vel in ðær stoue æt vel neh salim ðær stoue æt ðæm uætrum forðon uætro menigo ueron ðer vel & togecuomun & ueron gefuluuad from him velne ðaget vel forðon gesendet uæs in carcern iohannesauorden uæs forðon vel dom from ðegnum iohannis mið iudeum from clænsunge& gecuomon to iohannem & cuoedon to him laruu seðe uæs ðec mið begienda iohdanen ðæm streame ðæm ðu cyðnisse getrymedis heono ðes fulwas & alle cymmes to himgeonduearde iohannes & cueð ne mæge monn onfoa aenig buta him sie gesald of heofnumgie iuh me cyðnisse ðerhtrymmes þæt saegdo ic ne am crist ah forðon vel þætte gesendet am ær hineseðe hæfes ða brydo brydguma is vel bið meg vel friond uutedlice ðæs brydgumes seðe stondas & geheres hine mið gefea gefeað vel gefeas/ vel bið glæd fore stefne ðæs brydgumes ðis forðon gefea vel glædnise min gefylled ishine vel him gedæfnað þætte auexe mec uutedlice þæt ic lytlegeseðe ufa cuom oferufa allum vel ofer alle is seðe is of eorðo of eorðo is & of eorðo sprecað seðe of heofnum cuom ofer alle is& þætte gesiis & gehereð þæt vel ðis getrymeð & cyðnise his ne aenig mon onfoasseðe onfoes his cyðnise gemercade vel forðon god vel þætte god is soðcued is vel soðfæst isðone forðon sende god uordo godes gespreces ne forðon to gemet vel geseles god ðone gaastse faeder lufað ðone sunu & alle gesalde in hond hisseðe gelefeð in sunu hæfeð lif ece seðe uutedlice ungelefen is ðæm sunu ne gesiið lif ah uræððo godes wuneð ofer hineþætte uutedlice ongeat se hælend forðon geherdon ða ælaruuas þætte se hælend menigo ðegnas uircað & fuluuað ðon iohannesðæch se hælend ne fuluuade vel ah ðegnas hisforleort iudeam & foerde eftersona in ðær mægðuæs gedæfenlic vel uutedlice hine vel þætte oferfoerde ðerh samaria ða burugcuom uutedlice in cæstre samariæs ðio is gecuoeden sichar neh ðær byrig þæt salde iacob ioseph sune hisuæs uutedlice ðer uælle iacobes se hælend forðon uoerig uæs vel of geong sittende uæs vel gesætt suæ ofer þæt uælle tid uæs suælce ðio sestacuom uif of ðær byrig to ladanne vel uæter cuæð to hir se hælend sel me ðrincaðegnas forðon his foerdon in ða ceastre þætte metto bochton l ceapadoncuæð forðon to him þæt ilca uif samaritanisca huu ðu iudeus miððy arð drinca from mec giues ðu ða mið uif samaritanisca ne forðon sint vel gebyrelico vel iudei to samaritaniscumgeonduearde se hælend cuæð to hir gif ðu uistes geafa godes & hua is seðe cueð to ðe sel me drinca ðu uutedlice l uoen is gif ðu gegiuuedes from ðæm & gesalde ðe l æc ualde gesealla ðe uæter cuic l lifwelle uætercuæð to him þæt uif la drihten ne in huon ðu hlada hæfis ðu & se pytt vel heh is huona vel huer hæfis ðu uætter cuicahne vel hueðer arð ðu mara vel hera from feder usum iacobe seðe gesalde us ðiosne pytt vel uælla & he of ðæm dranc æc sunu his & feoðorfota his vel netenogeondsuarede se hælend & cueð to him eghuelc seðe gedrincað of ðæm uætreþæt ic sello him ne ðyrsteð in ecnisse ah uæter þæt ic selo him bið in ðæm uælla wætres saltes vel in lif ececuæð to him þæt uif drihten sel me ðis uæter vel þætte ic ne ðyrsto & ne ic ne cymo hidder to gehladannecueð to hir se hælend gaa ceig uer ðinne & cymgeonduearde þæt uif & cueð ne hæfic uer cueð to hir se hælend uel ðu cuede þætte nafu vel ic ne hafu uerfifo forðon ueras ðu hæfdest & nuu ðone ðu hæfes ne is ðin uer ðis soðlice ðu cuede vel ðu sægdestcueð him þæt uif drihten ic geseam vel geseom þætte ðu arð uitgaaldro uso in more ðisum geworðadun vel & gie cuæðas þætte in hierusolymis is ðio stou ðer geworðage gedæfnad iscueð to hir se hælend la uif gelef me forðon cuom ðiu tid ðonne ne on more ðissum ne in hierusolymis ge geuorðadon ðone federgie geuorðias þæt gie nutton ue worðias þæt we uuton þætte vel forðon hælo from iudæum isah cuom sio tid & nu is ðonne vel soðo uorðares geuorðadun ðone fæder in gaast & soðfæstnisse forðon vel & ðe fæder ðullico soecað ðaðe geuorðias hinegaast is god & ða forðon geworðias hine in gast & soðfæstnisse is gedæfnad worðiacueð to him þæt uif ic uat þætte ðe gecorena cuom seðe is gecueden crist miððy uutedlice gecymeð he iwh gesægeð vel allecueð to hir se hælend ic am ðe ic spreco ðec mið& recune cuomon ðegnas his & geuundradon vel forðon mið ðæm uife riordade vel gespræcc nænig monn hueðre cueð huæd soecas ðu vel huæd spreces ðu mið hiaforleort forðon fetels hire þæt wif & foerde in ða ceastre & cuæð ðæm monnumcymeð & geseað ðone monno seðe cueð me to alle ðaðe l suæhuæd ic dyde hueðer l ahne he is christusut eadon of ðær byrig & gecuomon to himbituih ðæm vel bedon hine ða ðegnas cueðendo ðu laruu ett vel bruche uutedlice cueð to him ic mett hafo to bruccanne vel ðone gie vel iuh ne uuttongecuedon forðon ða ðegnas him bituih vel bituien hueðer vel huothuoegu vel huelc vel ænig mon brohte him eattacuæð him se hælend min mett is þætte ic doe uillo his seðe gesende mec ðætte ic geendigo uoerc hisahne gie cuoeðas þætte geane vel feuero moneðo sint & hripes tid cuom heono ic cuoeðo iuh ahefað ego iuerro & geseað ða lond forðon huito sint gee vel uutedlice to hrippe& seðe hrioppað mearda onfoað & gesomnas uæstem in lif ece þætte æc seðe saueð gelic vel ætgeadre gefeað & seðe hrioppaðin ðis forðon vel uutedlice is uord soð forðon vel þætte oðer is seðe saues & oðer is seðe hrioppaðic sende iuh gehrioppa vel þætte gie ne wunnon oðero awunnon & gie in wynn hiora innfoerdon velof ðær byrig uutedlice menigo gelefdon in hine ðara samaritaniscena fore word ðæs uifes cyðnise getrymmedes vel forðon cueð to me alle ðaðe vel suæhuæd ic uorhtemiððy cuomon forðon to him ða samaritanisco gebedon hine þætte ðer geuunade & wunade ðer tuoege dagas& suiðe vel menigo menigo gelefdon fore uord his& ðæm uife gecuedon þætte soðlice ne fore ðinre sprec ue gelefdon ue seolfa forðon geherdon & ue wuton þætte soðlice ðes is hælend middangeardesæfter tuæm vel uutedlice dagas vel dagum foerde ðona & ðona eode in ðær ðeade vel geliornisehe seolf forðon se hælend cyðnisse ðerhtrymede witga on his oeðle vel in earde uorðscip vel aare vel ne hæfismiððy uutedlice gecuome in ðær ðeade genomun vel underfengon him hine ða galilesco menn miððy allo gesegen ðaðe geuorhte hierusolimiscum on doege halgum & hia vel ðailca forðon gecuomon on halgum doegecuom foðon æftersona in ðær byrig vel ðer worhte þæt uæter to uine æc uæs sum vel reigluord ðæs vel his sunu unntrumade vel unntrymade vel untrymig uæs ða burugðes miððy geherde þætte ðe hælend gecuome of iudea in ðær mægð eade to him & gebæd hine þætte adunestige vel hine mið foerde & gehelde sune his ongann vel forðon deadege vel gesueltacuoeð forðon ðe hælend to ðæm buta beceno & soða uundra vel gie gesee ne gelefeð giecuoeð to him se regluord drihten astig vel ær ðon þæt sie dead sunu mincueð him se hælend gaa sunu ðin lifes gelefde ðe mon ðæm uorde þæt vel ðone cuoeð him se hælend & aueg eadegee uutedlice hine stigende vel soðlice miððy geade ðe regluuard esnes gwurnun him togægnes & sægdon cueðendo þætte sunu his lifdegefrægn vel forðon ða tid from ðæm in huelce þæt betre hæfde vel & cuedon him þætte gioster doeg ðio seofunda forleort hine þæt feberadlongeat forðon se fæder þætte ðiu ilca tid wæs in ðær cuæð to him sunu ðin lifeð & gelefde ðeilca & hus his allðis æftersona ðe æfterra becon dyde se hælend miððy gecuome from iudea in ðær megðæfter ðas vel uæs doeg halig vel symbeldoeg iudea & astag se hælend hierusalemis uutedlice hierusalem ofer þæt burg fiscpol ðio is genemned vel on ebrisc bethsaida/ ðæt is burug fif portas hæfisin ðæm gelæg vel menigo micelo micelo ðara unhalra vel adligra blindena haltra scryngcara biddendra uætres ymbcerr vel styreniseengel uutudlice drihtnes æfter tid ofdune astag in þæt uoel vel in þæt fiscpol & ymbcerde vel þæt uæter seðe forðon ærist ofdune stagade vel foerde in æfter styrenise vel uætres hal son uere vel from suæhuælc unhælo vel adle uere ahaldan veluæs uutedlice sum monn ðer ðrittih & æhto uintro vel gero hæbbende vel in his unntrymniseðionne miððy gesæh se hælend licgende & miððy ongæt vel þætte suiðe long vel uutedlice vel tid vel huil hæfde cuæð to him uiltu hal uosageonduearde him ðe unhala vel drihten monno vel helpend ne hafo ic þætte miððy gestyred uæs vel bið þæt uæter gesende mec in þæt fiscpol ða huile ic cymo forðon ic oðer ær vel before mec gestige velcuoeð to him se hælend aris nim bedbeer ðin & gaa& recone vel hal awarð vel geuorden uæs ðe monn & genom vel underhof beer his & geade vel geongende uæs uæs uutedlice iudeana sunnedaeg in ðæm dægecuoedon iudeas ðæm seðe gehæled uæs symbeldæg is ne is gelefed vel ðe þæt ðu geniomæ vel beer ðingeondsuearade ðæm vel seðe mec dyde vel hal he me cuoeð genim beer ðin & gaagefrugnon forðon hine huælc is ðeilca monn seðe cuæð ðe nim bedber ðin & gaaðe ilca uutedlice seðe hal uæs geuorht vel nyste vel ne cuðe hua were vel uæs se hælend forðon fromgebeg vel ða menigo efnegesettedo in stouæfter ðæm vel gemoette hine se hælend in ðæm temple & cueð to him heono hal auorden arð gee nælleðu syngige þætte ne wyrse vel yfles vel ðe huodhuoegu blimpe velfoerde ðe monn & isægde iudeum þætte ðe hælend seðe dyde hine halforeðæm vel geoehtadon vel iudeas ðone hælend forðon ðas geuorhte in symbeldæg velðe hælend uutedlice geonduearde him se fæder min from ðissa vel wyrcað & ic wyrcoforeðæm l uutedlice suiðo sohton hine iudeas to cwoellanne forðon ne þæt ane untynde l ðone sunnedae ah aec faeder his cuoeð l þæt god uere gelic hine wyrcende godegeondsuarade forðon se hælend & cuæð to him soðlice soð is þæt ic cueðo iuh ne mæg sunu from him wyrca ænihg buta þætte gesii þone faeder wyrcende suæhæd forðon ðe ilca vel he wyrceð ðas æc ðe sune gelic wyrcasse fæder forðon lufað ðone sunu & alle ædeude vel ædeaueð him ðaðe he wyrcað & ða maasta her vel ædeaueð him woerca þætte gie wundria velsuæ forðon se fæder auecceð ða deado & inlihteð l cuicað suæ æc ðe sunu ðaðe wil cwicað& ne forðon ðe fæder doemað ænig ah dom eghuelc gesalde ðæm sunuþætte alle worðaiges vel ðone sunu suæ worðiað ðone fæder seðe ne uorðageð ðone sunu ne uorðages ðone faeder seðe asende hinesoð is soð is þæt ic cueðo iuh þætte seðe uord min geheres & gelefes ðæm seðe asende mec hæfeð lif ece & in dom ne cymes ah oferlioræs vel from deaðe in lifesoð is soðlice þæt ic cueðo iuh þætte cymmes ðio tid & nu is ðonne ða deado geherað stefn sunu godes & ðaðe geherað vel hia lifiassuæ forðon se fæder hæfeð lif in hine seolfne suæ salde æc ðæm sune lif to habbanne in hine seolfne& mæht salde him & dom gewyrca forðon sunu monnes isnallað gie nundraige ðis forðon cuom sio tid in ðær alle ðaðe in byrgennum sint gehereð stefn his& forðcymeð vel ðaðe goda worhton in erest lifes ðaðe uutedlice yflo dydon vel in erest domesne mæg ic from mec seolfe wyrca ænight suæ ic geherde ic doemo & dom min soðfæst is forðon ne soeco ic uillo min ah uillo his seðe mec asendegif ic cyðnisse ic trymmo of mec cyðnisse min ne is soðoðer is seðe cyðnise getrymeð of mec & ic uat þætte soð is þæt cyðnise þæt getrymeð of mec velgie gesendon to iohanne & cyðnise getrymede to soðfæstniseic uutudlice ne from menn cyðnise onfoe ic ah ðas ic cueðo þætte gie halo siehe uæs þæccille vel lehtfæt bearnende & lixende vel scinende gie uutedlice waldon gefeage vel to tid in leht hisic uutedlice ic hafu cyðnise mare iohannes uoerco forðon ðaðe salde me ðe fæder þætte ic geendia ða ðailca uerca ðaðe ic wyrco cyðnise getrymeð of mec vel ymb mec forðon ðe fæder mec asende& seðe sende mec fæder he cyðnisse getrymede of mec & ne stefne his æfra geherdon & ne megulit his gesegon& uord his ne habbas gie in iuh uuniande forðon ðone sende he ðissum ne gelefes gesmeas gie ða wriotto forðon gie woenas in ðæm lif ece hæbbe & ðailco sint ðaðe cyðnise getrymes ymb mec& nallas gie gecyme vel cuma to me & lif gie habbasbrehtnise from monnum ne onfoe icah ic cuðe iuih þætte lufu godes ne habbas gie in iuihic cuom in noma fadores mines & ne onfoes gie mec gif oðer cymes vel in noma his hine vel ðene gie onfoashuu mago gie iuh gelefa gie vel wuldor bituih vel bituien onfengon & þæt wuldor ðio from ane is gode ne soecað gienalle gie woenæ þætte ic forhycgende vel sie mið ðone fæder is seðe forhycgað iuih moises in ðæm gie hyhtasgif forðon gie gelefde moisi gie gelefde woenunge vel æc me of mec forðon he auratgif uutedlice ðæs stafum gie ne gelefeð huu minum uordum gelefes gieæfter ðas foerde se hælend ofer sae galiles þæt is þæt luh& gesohte vel him fylgede hine menigo vel miclo forðon gesæh beceno ðaðe worhte ofer ðæm ðaðe weron untrymig vel untrymigdonfoerde forðon on more se hælend & ðer gesætt mið ðegnum hisuæs uutedlice neh vel eastro symbeldoege iudeanamiððy underhof vel uutedlice ego se hælend & gesege þætte ðio menigo miclo cuom to him cueð to philippum huona byges ue hlafo þætte gebrucce ðasðis huæðre cuæð þætte gecostade hine he forðon wiste huæd uere aworht vel gedoen uæsgeonduearde him pilippus tuu hund penninga to hlafum ne genyhtsumiað him þætte eghuelc an lyttel hothuoego vel onfoecuoeð to him an of ðegnum his broðer simones petresis cnæht an her seðe hæfeð fifo hlafas bero & tuoege fisces ah ðas huæd aron bituih menigo vel hia sint to monigocuoeð forðon se hælend uyrcas vel does þætte ða menn gesitta uæs uutedlice gers vel heig micil vel on ðæm styd gesetton vel uutedlice ueras of tal vel getaled suelce fifo ðusendoonfeng forðon ða hlafo se hælend & miððy ðoncunge dyde salde vel ðæm sittendum gelic of ðæm fiscum suæ feolo ualdonþætte uutedlice gefylldo ueron cueð ðeignum his somnias ðaðe hia gelefdon vel ða screadunga vel þætte losiagesomnadon forðon & gefyldon tuoelfo ceoulas ðara screadunga of fif hlafum bere vel ðaðe gelæfdon vel ueron to lafe of ðæm ðaðe geetonða uutedlice ða menn miððy gesegon þæt geuorhte becon gecuedon þætte ðes is soðlice witga seðe tocymende uæs in middangeardse hælend forðon miððy ongætt þætte tocymmende weron þætte hine genomo & þætte geworhto hine to cynige flaeh eftersona on more he him aneþætte soðða smyltnise auorden uæs ofstigon vel foerdon ðegnas his to sæ& miððy astag vel þæt scipp cuomun ofer sæ in ðær byrig & ðiostro fæstlicæ vel gee auordeno ueron & ne cuome vel to ðæm vel to him se hælendðe sæ uutedlice winde miclum forblauene ofstod vel arasmiððy hreuun forðon vel ðonne suælce spyrdo fif & tuentig vel ðrittig geseað ðone hælend geongende ofer vel on ðæm sae & neh to scipp uosa & ondreardonhe ða cueð to him ic am nællað ge ondredewualdon forðon onfoa vel hine in ðæt scipp & sona uæs þæt scipp to ðæm eorðe þæt ðe ðidder foerdeoðero doeg ðæt ðreat vel ðio gestod begeonda vel sae gesæh þætte floege vel lyttel scipp oðer ne uæs ðer buta an & þætte ne foerde vel mið ðegnum his se hælend in þæt scipp ah him ane ðegnas his foerdonoðero aec vel ofercuomon vel scioppo of ðæm londe neh ðær stoue ðer geeton vel þæt bread vel ðoncunge dedon vel drihtnemiððy uutedlice gesæh vel ðio menigo þætte se hælend ne uæs vel uere ðer æc ne ðegnas his astigon vel ða scioppo & cuomon to ðær byrig sohton vel soecendo ðone hælend& miððy gemoeton hine begeande sae cuoedon to him ðu laruu huonne hidir vel cuome ðuondsuearade him se hælend & cueð soð is soð is þæt ic cueðo iuh gie soecas mec ne forðon gie segon beceno ah forðon gie gebrecon vel of ðæm hlafum fifum & gefylled gie aron velwyrcas gie vel ne mett vel seðe losað ah seðe ðerhuunað in ece lif ðone vel sunu monnes iuh seles ðiosne vel forðon faeder gemercade godcuoedon forðon to him huæd wyrcas ue þætte ue gewyrco uerco godesgeonduearde se hælend & cueð to him ðis is uerc godes þætte ge gelefo on hine ðone ilca sende he iscuoedon forðon him to huæd vel huælc ðonne ðu wyrcæs becon þætte ue gesee & ue gelefæ ðe þæt vel hued wyrcas ðu vel þæt ðu doæsfadero vel aldro usero gebreicon vel geeton on uæstern suæ uuritten is hlaf vel fostrað of heofnum salde him eattacuoeð forðon him se hælend soð is soð is þæt ic cueðo iuh ne salde moisi iuh þæt hlaf of heofnum ah faeder min seleð iuh hlaf of heofnum soð vel rehthlaf forðon godes is seðe ofdunestag of heofnum & seleð lif middangeardecuedon forðon to him la drihten symle sel us hlaf ðiosnecueð uutedlice vel ða him se hælend ic am hlaf lifes seðe cymes to me ne hyncgreð hine & seðe gelefes on mech ne dyrstes æfræah ic cueð iuh ðaðe gie gesegon mec & ne gelefeð giealle þætte seleð me fæder to me cymeð & ðe seðe cuom to me ne worpo ic vel utforðon ic ofdune stag of heofnum ne þætte ic doe uillo min ah uillo ðæs vel his seðe sende mecðios vel is uutedlice uillo his seðe sende mec ðæs fadores þætte all þæt salde me ne ic losige vel þætte ic ne spillo of ðæm ah eftaueco ðon vel hine on ðæm hlættmesta doegðios is forðon uillo fador mines seðe sende mec þætte eghuelc seðe gesiið sunu & gelefeð in hine hæfeð ece lif & ic aueco hine in ðæm hlætmæste dæghwæstredon vel missprecon deiglice forðon ða iudeas of him vel ymb hine forðon he cueð ic am hlaf seðe of heofnum ic ofdune stag& cuedon ahne is ðis se hælend sunu iosephes ðæs vel ue wutton faeder & moder huu forðon cueðes ðes þætte of heofnum ic ofdune staggeonduarde forðon se hælend & cuæð to him nallað huæstria/ vel misspreca bituiennænig monn mæge cuma to me buta fador seðe sende mec genimmæ hine & ic aueccæ hine in ðæm hlætmæsta dægeis auritten in uitgum & biðon alle laruas godes vel gode gelæredo eghuelc seðe geherde from feder & geliornade cymeð to mene forðon ðone fæder gesæh ænig buta ðe seðe is from gode ðes gesaeh ðone fædersoðlice soð is ic cuoeðo iuh seðe gelefeð in mec hæfeð lif eceic am hlaf lifesaldro iuero gebrecon vel on uæstern þæt fostrað & deado ueron velðes is hlaf of heofnum ufa stigende vel þætte gif huælc vel hualc of ðæm gebrucceð vel ne bið dead vel ne deadageðic am hlaf cuic vel lifiende ðeðe ic of heofnum ufastag gif huælc gebrucces vel of ðiss hlafe lifeð in ecnise & hlaf ðone ic selo lichoma min is fore middangeardes lifgecidon l getugon l forðon iudeas bituih cuoeðendo huu mæge ðes lichoma his us gesealla to eattannecuoeð forðon him se hælend soðlice soð is ic cuoeðo iuh buta gie gebrucce vel lichoma sunæ monnes & gie gedrinca his blod ne habbað gie lif in iuihseðe gebruccað min lichom & drincað min blod hæfeð lif ece & ic auoecco hine on ðæm hlætmeste dægelichoma forðon min soðlice vel is mett & blod min soðlice is drincaseðe bruccað min lichoma & drincað min blod on vel in/ mec unnes & ic in ðæmsuæ gesende mec ðe lifiende faeder & ic liofo fore ðæm feder & seðe bruceð mec & he liofeð fore mecðes is hlaf seðe of heofnum ofdune astag ne suæ gebrecon aldro iuero þæt heofunlic met vel & deado sint vel seðe bruccað ðiosne vel hlaf liofað in ecnisseðas cuæð in somnunge lærde in ðær byrigðas cuæð in somnunge lærde in ðær byrig menigo foreðon geherdon of ðegnum his cuoedun stið vel is ðis uord hua mæg hine gehereuiste uutudlice se hælend mið hine seolfne foreðon vel þætte huæstredon vel missprecon of ðis ðegnas his cuæð him ðis iuih ondspyrneð velgif uutedlice gie geseað sunu monnes ofdunestigende ðer uæs æristgaas seðe liffæstas lichoma ne forstondes vel æniht wordo ðaðe sprecende vel am vel iuh gaast & lif sintah aron vel sumo from iuh ðaðe neglefað uiste forðon from fruma se hælend ðaðe uoeron gelefendo vel & hua sellende uere hine& cuæð foreðæm vel ic cuæð iuh þætte nænig monn mæge gecuma to me buta sie him gesald from feder minumof ðis menigo ðegna his fromfoerdon on bæccling uutedlice ne mið hine geeadon velcuoeð forðon se hælend to ðæm tuoelfum hueðer æc gie uallað fara vel fromgeongageonduarde forðon him petrus drihten to huæm woe gegeonge vel uordo lifes ece ðu hæfis& ue gelefdon & ue ongetton forðon ðu arð sunu godesgeonduearde him se hælend ahne ic iuih tuelfo geceas & of iuh an diul iscuæð uutedlice iudam ðæs londes ðes forðon uæs sellend vel hine miððy uæs vel an of ðæm tuelfumæfter ðas foerde vel eode vel se hælend in ðær megð ne forðon walde in iudea geonge foreðon sohton hine iudeas to acuellanne veluæs uutedlice on neh doeg symbel iudea temples mæssacuoedon uutedlice to him broðro his faer heana & gae vel geong in iudea þætte & ðegnas ðine geseað uoerco ðino ða ðu does vel wyrcaðne anig monn forðon in degle vel in deigelnise huodhuoegu wyrcas & soecað he in eaunge þætte se vel gif ðas ðu wyrcas aedeauua ðec seolfne middangearde& ne forðon broðro his gelefdon on hinecuoeð forðon him se hælend tid min ne ðaget cuom tid uutedlice iuerro symble is gearuane mæge se middangeard gefiage iuih mec uutedlice gefiað forðon ic cyðnise ðerhtrymme of him vel ðæm forðon uoerca his yflo sintgie astiges to doege symbel ðiosne vel ðissum ic ne astigo ic to doege symbel ðissum forðon min tid ne ðæget gefylled isðas miððy gecuede vel he wunade in ðær mereþætte uutedlice astigon vel broðro his ða vel & he astag to doege symbel ne vel no euunge ah suelce in degleiudeas forðon sohton hine on doege symbel & cuoedon ðer is he& huæstrung micel from ðæm vel uæs in ðreat sumo oðoro forðon cuoedon forðon god is oðoro uutedlice cuoedon næso vel næse ah besuicað ða menigonænig huæðre eauunge gespræc of him vel fore fyrhto vel iudeanagee vel uutedlice doeg ðe symbel miððy geworht wæs vel astag se hælend in temple & lærde vel& wundradon iudeas cuoedon huu ðes stafas wat miððy ne geliornadegeonduearde him se hælend & cuæð min laar ne is min ah ðæs seðe sende mecgif hua uælle willo his geuyrca ongetteð vel of laar hueðer from gode sie vel ic from me seolfum sprecoseðe from hine seolfne spreceð vel from him seolfum uuldor vel suundor vel soecað seðe uutedlice soecas uuldor vel his seðe sende hine ðes soðcuoed is & unsoðfæstnise in ðæm ne isahne vel moises salde iuh æ & nænig of iuh wyrcas ae forhuon mec gie soecas to acuoellannegeonduarde ðio menigo vel & cuoeð diul ðu hafis hua ðec soecað to acuoellanne velgeonduarde se hælend & cuæð ðæm an vel uoerc ic dyde vel ic uorhte & gie alle wundriaðforða vel forðon moises salde iuh þæt ymbhuungan vel ne þætte from mose is ah from aldrum vel & in symbel vel sunnedæge ge ymbcearfas vel ðone monnugif þæt ymbcorfnise onfoeð se monn in sunnedaege þætte ne se undoen vel ae moises me gie iorsiges vel þætte vel forðon all ðone monno hal ic worhte to sunnedægenælle gie gedoema æfter onsione vel ah soðfæst dom gedoemaðcuoedon forðon summo oðoro from hierusalem ahne ðes is ðone soecað to acuellanne& heono eauunge sprecað & noht him cuæðas vel hueðer vel soðlice ongetun ða aldormen þætte ðes is cristah ðiosne we uuton huona sie vel crist uutedlice miððy gecymes nænig monn uat huona sie vel biðclioppande uæs vel forðon lærdæ vel in temple se hælend & cuæð & mec gie uuton & huona ic am vel gie uuton & from me seolfum ne cuom ic ah is soð seðe sende mec ðone gie ne uutonic uat forðon þætte from ðæm am & he mec sendesohton vel forðon hine to grioppannæ vel & nænig monn sende on him vel hond forðon ne ðaget cuom tid hisof ðær ðreate vel menigo uutedlice menige gelefdon on him & cuoedon crist miððy cymeð hueðer vel menigo beceno vel mæ wundra beceno uyrcað ðon ðaðe ðes wyrcaðgeherdon ða aelaruas vel þæt ðreat huæstrende vel of ðæm vel ðas & sendon ða aldormenn & ælaruas vel embehtmenn vel þætte hia gegrioppo velcuæð forðon se hælend ðagæt lytle tid vel huile mið iuh am & ic geonge vel to ðæm seðe mec sendegie soecas mec & ne gemoetað gie & ðer ic am vel bium gie ne mago cumecuoedon forðon iudeas to him seolfum ðadder ðes færende uæs vel is forðon ne gemoete ue hine hueðer vel on towyrpnise vel hædna færende is vel & lærend hædnohuæd uæs vel ðis uord ðone vel cuoæð soecað gie mec & ne gemoeteð & ðer ic am ne mago gie cumain vel on ðæm hlætmesta dæg micle ðæs symbles gestod se hælend & cliopade vel cueð seðe ðyrsteð cyme to me & drincaseðe gelefað on mec suæ cuæð þæt uritt streamas of wombe his flouað uætro cuico vel lifigiendo laroðis uutedlice cueð of gaste ðone ondfengo uoeron ðaðe lefdon vel on him vel forðon næs vel se gast þætte vel forðon se hælend ne ðageane wæs geuuldrad velof ðær tid se ðreat miððy geherdon ðas uordo his cuoedon ðes is soð uitgaoðero cuoedon ðes is cynig summo oðoro fæstlice cuoedon huoeðer vel of ðær megð crist cuomahne þæt uritt cueð þætte of dauides sed & of bethlem byrig l ceastre ðer uæs dauid cuom cristtoslittnise vel unsib forðon auorden uæs in ðær menigo fore hinesumo fæstlice of ðæm ualdon vel uilnadon gegrioppa hine ah neænig monn sende ofer hine hondcuomun forðon ða embehtmen to ðæm aldormonnum & ða ælaruuas & cuoedon him ða forhuon ne gebrohton gie hinegie ondueardon ða ðegnas næfre suæ spræcende uæs monn suæ ðes monngeondsuearadun forðon him ælaruas huoeðer eæc gie besuicen aron velhuoeðer enig vel from aldormonnum gelefeð on hine vel of ælaruumah ðreat ðios vel ðaðe vel ðio ne uat vel nyste vel ae auoergato vel auoergado/ vel sintcuoeð ðe ðegn to ðæm he seðe cymeð to him on næht seðe an uæs of ðæmhueðer vel æ usra doemað ðoemað buta gehere from ðæm ær vel & ongette huæd wyrcasgeonduardon & cuoedon him huæðer æc ðu galilesca arð smeaege & gesægh forðon witga from galilea ne ariseð vel& gecearredo ueron vel gecerred uæs eghuelc in hus hiorase hælend uutedlice foerde vel on more oleuetes& ærlice vel æftersona cuom in temple & all folc cuom to him & set lærde hialæddon vel brohton uutedlice ða wuðuotto & ælaruas uif in ðernelegerscip ofnumen vel befoen & aseton ðailca vel hia on middumin æ uutedlice moises bebead us ðuslic vel gestæna ðu forðon vel huæd cuæðesðas uutedlice cuoedon vel cunnedon hine þætte hie mago vel mæhton gehæne vel hine se hælend uutedlice gebeg hine frum suunder vel mið fingre auritteð vel aurat on eorðemiððy uutedlice ðerhuunadon frugnun hine ahof hine & cuæð him seðe buta synne his iuerro aerist on ðær vel on hia stan sende& æfter hine gebeg aurat vel on eorðu miððygeherdon vel uutedlice an æfter anum fromfeordon vel ongann vel of ðæm aldrum & geuunade vel abad him ane & þæt uif on middum stod velahof uutedlice hine se hælend cueð to hir þæt uif huer sint ðaðe ðec gehenað vel nænigmonn ðec geniðrað vel gehænasðio cuoeð nænig monn drihten cuoeð uutedlice se hælend ne ic ðech geniðro vel geong vel gaea & forðor vel suiðor nælle ðu synngegaeftersona forðon spreccend uæs him se hælend cuoeð ic am leht middangeardes seðe fylgeð vel soecas mec ne gaeð vel in ðiostrum ah hæfeð leht lifescuoedon forðon him ða aldo ælaruas ðu of ðe seolfum cyðnisse getrymes vel cyðnisse ðin ne is soðgeonduarde se hælend & cuæð him ðæh ic cyðnise getrymmo of mec seolfne soð is cyðnis min forðon ic uat huona ic cuom & huidder ic geonge gie uutedlice ne uutto gie huona ic cymo vel huiddir ic gae& ðæh ic gedoemo dom min soð is forðon me an ne am ic ah ic & seðe mec sende faeder is& on æ iuer auritten is forðon tuoegara monna wittnesa vel soð isic am seðe uittnesa vel getryme vel getrymo/ of mec seolfum & cyðnise getrymes ymb mec vel seðe mec sende faeder iscuoedon forðon him huer is fæder ðin geonduearde se hælend & ne nuutto gie mec & ne vel ne æc faeder min gif gie uiston eaðe mæg æc faeder min gie uistonlærde in temple & nænig monn hine gelahte forðon ne ðaget gecuom tid hiscuoeð forðon eftersona him se hælend ic geonga & gie fylges mec vel soecas & in synno iuero deadageð vel gie biðon ðiddir ic giungo gie ne mago cumacuoedon forðon iudeas huoeðer ofslæð vel hine seolfne forðon cuoeð ðidder ic gæ gie ne magon cume& cuoeð vel him gie from neaðan vel aron vel ic from heannissum am gie of middangearde ðissum sint ic ne am of ðissum middangeardeic cueð iuh þætte gie biðon deada in iuero synno gif forðon neuallað gelefa vel þætte ic am gie biðon deado in synne iuerocuoedon vel forðon him ðu hæd vel arð cuæð him se hælend frumma seðe æc ic spreco iuhfeolo vel ic hafo of iuih spreca vel to sprecane & doema ah seðe sende mec soðcuoed is & ic ðaðe geherde from him vel ðæm ðas ic sprecco in miððangearde& ne ongeton vel þætte fader his cuæð velcuæð forðon him se hælend miððy gie ahefeð vel sunu monnes ða vel gie ongeattað þætte ic am & from me seolfum ic wyrco noht ah suæ gelærde mec ðe fæder ða ic spreco& seðe mec sende mec mið is ne forleteð vel ne forleort me ana vel forðon ic ðaðe gecuoemo vel sint him ic wyrco symbleðas hine spreccende vel miððy he uæs sprecende menigo gelefdon on himcuæð forðon se hælend to ðæm ðaðe gelefdon him ðara iudeana gif gie gewunas in uorde minum soðlice ðeignas mina gie biðon& ge ongeton soðfæstnisse & soðfæstnise gefriað iuihgeondueardun him sed abrahames ue sindon & nænigum ue geherdon vel aefre huu ðu cueðes ge biðon gefriodgeonduarde him se hælend soð is soð is þæt ic cueðo iuh þætte eghuelc seðe wyrcas synn ðræl vel is synnesesne uutudlice ne uunað in hus in ecnisse ðe sune wunet in ecnissegif uutedlice ðe sune iuih gefriað vel soðlice freo vel ge biðonic uat þætte suno abrahames gie aron l ah gie soecas mec gecearfa l to accuellanne þætte l forðon wuord min ne nimeð in iuhic þæt ic gesæh æt ðæm fæder ic spreco & gie ðaðe gie gesegon æt feder iurum gie wyrcasgeonduærdon & cuoedon him fæder user abraham is cuoeð him se hælend gif suno vel sunu/ abrahames ge sint woerco abrahames wyrcasnuu uutedlice gie soecas mec to cuellanne vel gecearfa ðone monno seðe soðfæstnise iuh spreccende am ðæs vel þæt ðe ic geherde from gode ðis abraham ne dyde velgie wyrcað werco fadores iueres cuoedon forðon him ue from forleigere ne aru we gecenned l accenned enne fæder we habbað godcuoeð forðon him se hælend gif god faeder iuer woere gie ualde lufiga uutedlice mec ic forðon from gode foerde vel & cuom & ne forðon from me seolfum ah he mec sendeforhuon sprec min ne ongeattas gie forðon ne mago gie gehere uord mingie from fader diabule gie aron & willo fadores iueres gie uallas wyrca he monnslaga uæs from frumma & in soðfæstnise ne stod forðon soðfæstnise nis in him miððy spreceð leasuung from syndrigum vel sprecað forðon leas is & fæder hisic uutedlice forðon soðfæstnise ic cuedo ne gelefeð gie mehuelc from iuh gedreað vel mec from synne gif soðfæstnise ic cuoeðo forhuon gie ne gelefeð gie meseðe is from gode uorda godes gehere foreðon vel gie ne geherdon þætte from gode sintgeondueardon ðonne vel forðon iudeas & cuoedon him ahne bloedsade ue usic vel ue sægnade usic forðon samaritanisc arð ðu & diul hæfesonduearde se hælend ic diul ne hafo ic ah ic uorðige faeder min & gie unworðade mecic uutedlice ne soeco ic wuldor vel min is seðe soecað & doemaðsoð is soð is þæt ic cuoeðo iuh gif hua uord min gehaldað deað ne geseað in ecnissecuoedon forðon iudeas nu ue ongeton þætte/ diul ðu hæfis abraham dead is & uitga & ðu cueðes gif hua uord min gehaldeð vel ne gebirgeð deað in ecnissehueðer arð ðu mare vel usum feder abrahame seðe dead is & uitga deade sint ðone vel ðec seolfne wyrcasgeondsuarede se hælend gif ic uuldria vel mec seolfne gefea vel uuldor min noht is is fader min seðe uuldrað mec ðone gie cuoeðas forðon god userne is& ne ongeto gie hine ic uutedlice conn vel wat & gif ic cuoeðo þætte ic hine nat ic beom gelic iuh leas ah ic uat hine & word his ic haldoabraham fæder iuer gefeade þætte gesege dæge minne & gesæh & gegladade vel glæd uæscuædon forðon iudeas to him fiftig uintra ne ðageane hæfis ðu & abraham ðu gesegecueð him se hælend soðlice soð is ic cueðo iuh aer ðon abraham were ic am vel uæsgenomun forðon stanas þætte auurpon on hine se hælend uutedlice ahydde hine & uuteode of ðæm temple& ðona foerde vel miððy wærlde ðona gesæh monnu blindne from accennisse his& gefrugnon hine ðegnas his laruu huælc vel synngade ðes vel his aldro þætte blind uere accennedgeonduearde se hælend & ne ðes synngade ne aldro his ah þætte ædeaued uere uoerc godes in ðæmme gedæfnað vel þæt ic geuyrco uoerca his seðe sende mec ða huile is dæge cymeð næht ðonne vel nænig monn maege gewyrcaða huile on middangeard am leht am middangeardesðas miððy gecuoeð aspeaft vel on eorðu & uorhte lam vel of ðæm spadle & ahof vel þæt lam ofer ego his& cuæð him gaa aðuah in ðær uele þæt is getractat vel asendet vel erendureca eode forðon & aðuog & cuom gesæhforðon vel neheburas & ðaðe gesegon hine aer forðon ðærfe vel næfge uæs & cuoedon ahne ðes is seðe gesæt & giornde velah gelic is his he cueð þætte ic amcuoedon forðon him huu untynde ueron vel ego ðinogeonduarde he monn seðe is acueden hælend lam worhte & smiride ego mino & cueð me gaa to ðæm pole vel & aðuah & ic eade & ic aðuog & ic gesæhcuoedon him huer is he cueð nat icbrohton vel hine to ðæm aelaruum vel se ðe blind uæsuæs uutedlice iudeana suunnadæg vel ða vel þæt lam vel dyde vel worhte se hælend & untynde ego hisefterson forðon gefrugnon vel hin ða ælaruas huu gesege vel he uutedlice cuoeð ðæm vel him þæt lam gesette me ofer ða ego & ic aðuog & ic gesæhcuoedon forðon from ælaruum vel summo ne is vel nis ðes vel ðis monn from gode forðon sunnedæg ne haldas oðro vel cuoedon huu mæge monn synnfull ðas beceno gewyrca & geflitt uæs/ vel todroefnise ues him bituien ymb þæt in himcuoedon forðon ðæm blinde æftersona ðu huæd cueðes of him vel ðæm seðe onntynde ego ðino he uutedlice cueð þætte uitgæ his vel uæsne gelefdon forðon vel iudeas from him vel þætte blind uere & gesege ða huile vel geceigdon aldro his seðe gesaeh& frugnun hia vel ða cuoedon ðis is sunu iuer ðone gie cuæðas þætte blind accenned uæs huu ðonne vel nuu gesiiðgeondueardon him vel aldro his & cuoedon we uuton þætte ðes is sunu usa vel & þætte blind accenned ishuu ðonne nuu geseað vel gesiið ne uutu ue & hua his untynde ego we ne uutton ðon ilce vel hine gefraignað aeldo vel haefeð he from him vel from ðæm gespræcðas cuedon aldro his forðon ondreardon ða iudeas fæstlice forðon getugun vel flioton iudeas þætte gif hua hine vel ðone geondetate vel crist vel ðone cynig buta ðær somnung uere vel uosa scealde butaforeða vel aldro his cuoedon forðon ældo vel uintra dael hæfis hine gefraignasceigdon forðon æftersona ðone monno seðe uæs blind & cuoedon him sel uuldor vel gode ue wutton þætte ðes monn synnfull iscueð forðon he gif synnfull is nat ic an ic uat þætte blind miððy ic uæss nu ic geseium velcuoedon forðon vel him vel ðæm huæd dyde vel ðe huu untynde ðe egoonduearde him cuoeð iuh gee vel uutedlice ecæ gie geherdon huæd eftersona uallað gie gehere hæd æc gie uallas ðegnas his uosaawoerigdon vel miscuedon him & cuoedon ðu arð þæs ðegn ue uutedlice moises ðegnas ue sindonue uutton þætte moises sprecend uæs god ðiosne uutedlice nuuton ue huona siegeonduearde ðe monn & cuæð him in ðis forðon to uundranne vel uundorlice is forðon vel þætte gie nuutton huona sie & untynde min egoue uutton uutedlice þætte ða synnfullo god ne geheres ah gif huæ vel huelc godes bydle vel uorðare & uillo his wyrcað ðionne geheraðof uorulde ne is gehered forðon ontynde hua ego ðæs blindborenes velbuta uere ðes from gode ne mæhte geuyrce ænightgeondueardon & cuoedon him in synnum acenned warð all æc ðu læres usic & fordriofon vel auurpon hine utgeherde se hælend forðon hine auorpon ut & miððy gemoetten hine cuoeð him to ðu gelefes on sunu godesgeonduearde he & cuæð huæd vel is drihten þætte ic gelefo on him vel on ðæm vel& cuæð him se hælend & ðu gesege hine & seðe spreces ðec mið he is vel ðe issoð he cuæð ic gelefo drihten & feoll vel uorðade vel hinecuæð him se hælend on dom ic cuom in ðiosne middangeard þætte ðaðe ne geseas hia geseæ vel & ðaðe geseað blindo biðon& geherdon from aelaruum ðaðe mið hine uoeron & cuoedon huoeðer æc ue blindo sindon velcuoeð him se hælend gif blindo aron næfdo gie synn nu forðon vel hueðre cuoeð forðon vel þætte ue gesego synn iuer wunaðsoðlice soðlice vel ic cuoeðo iuh seðe ne inngaas vel ðerh duru in scipa plett vel locc ah astiged ofer on oðre halfe vel ðe ðeaf is & settere vel sceacereseðe uutedlice inngaeð ðerh ða duru hiorde is scipa& gebrengeð vel lædað hia& miððy ða syndrigo vel agnum scip vel sendeð vel forletes before hia gaeð & ða scip hine soecas vel fylgað him forðon uuton stefn hisutacund vel fremðe uutedlice ne fylgeð vel ah hia fleas from him vel ðæm forðon ne cuðon vel nyston stefn ðara utacunda vel ðara fremðraðis soðcuido vel geddung vel cueð ðæm se hælend ðailco uutedlice vel huoeðre ne ongetton huæt gesprecc vel gespræcend uæs himcuæð forðon him eftersona se hælend soð is soð is þæt ic cuoeðo iuh þætte ic am duru ðara scipaalle suæ oft vel cymes vel cuomon ðeafas sint & setteras vel ah ne geherdon ðailco vel ða scip& menigo gelefdon on hineuæs uutedlice sum adligne latzarus of beðania ðær byrig of ceastra maries & martha suoester ðæs velmaria uutedlice uæs ðiu vel ðio geðuog vel smiride vel leðrede ðone drihten mið smirinise vel & gedrygde vel his foet mið herum vel fæx hire ðæs vel broðer latzarus untrymade vel untrymig uæssendon forðon ða suoestro to him cuoeðendo vel drihten heono ðone ðu lufas untrymig is velmiððy uutedlice se hælend cuoeð to him vel ðæm untrymnise ðios vel nis vel to deaðe ah fore godes uldre vel þætte geuuldred sie sunu godes ðerh hine vellufade soðlice se hælend martham & suoester hire vel mariam eac latzarumþætte uutedlice vel geherde forðon vel þætte uuntrymig uæs ða vel ðonne fæstlice geunade in ðæt ilca stoue vel styde twæm dagumsoðða vel ðona æfter ðas cuoeð to his ðegnum faere ue in iudeam eftersonacuoedon him ða ðegnas ðu laruua nu hia gesohton vel soecað ðec to gestænane iudeas & eftersona ðu faeris ðiddirsaldon vel uutedlice vel ða biscopas & aelaruas bebod þætte gif hua ongette vel hine huer sie tæcne þætte gefengo vel hinese hælend forðon ær sex dagas eostre cuom to bethania byrig ðer uæs latzar dead ðone ilca auoehte se hælenduorhtun uutedlice him færma ðer & martha embihtade latzarus eæc vel an uæs of ðæm sittendum vel mið hinemaria forðon genom vel pund vel smirinises vel ðuahles ðæs diorwyrðe wuducynn vel wyrtcynn aðuog foet hælendes & drygde mið hire herum his foet & þæt hus gefylled uæs of suot stenc ðæs smirinesecuoeð forðon an of ðegnum his iudas scariotis seðe uæs hine sellend uæsforhuon ðis smirinise ne cuome ðriim hundum penninga l scillinga & sald were ðorfendum l næfigumcuoeð ða vel ðis ne þætte vel forðon of ðorfum vel gebyreð vel to him ah þætte ðeaf uæs & seado vel mudrica vel hæfde ðailca penicas ða gesended uoeron of monig halfe gelædde velcuæð forðon se hælend forlet hia þætte ðona byrginne minum gehalda þætðorfondo forðon symble gie habbas mið iuh mec uutedlice ne symble habbas gie& ic uat þætte bebod his lif ece is ða uord forðon ic spreco sua cuæð me se fæder suæ ic spreccoaer ðæm symbeldæge uutedlice eastres uiste se hælend þætte cuom tid þætte oferleora vel of ðissum middangeard to fæder miððy gelufade his ðaðe uoeron on middangeard on ende lufade hia& farma vel symbel vel riorda geuarð mið duule/ fæstlice gesende in heorta is þætte salde hine iudas simon ðe scariothiscauiste þætte alle salde him se fæder in hondum & þætte from gode foerde vel & to gode faeres velaras from ðær farma & sette uoedo vel his & miððy onfeing vel þæt lin ymbgyrde vel hinesoðða vel sende þæt uæter in trog vel & ongann geðoa foet ðara ðegna vel & dryga mið ðæm lin of ðæm uæs gegyrdedcuom forðon to simon petrum & cuæð him petrus drihten ðu me geðoas foetgeonduearde se hælend & cuæð him to þæt ic doom vel ðu naast nuu ðu wast uutedlice vel huæðre æfter ða velcuoeð him to petrus ne ðuoas ðu vel me foet in ecnise geonduarde se hælend him gif ic ne aðoa ðe ne hæfis ðu dael mech miðgeonduearde se hælend saul ðin fore mec ðu settis soð is soð is þætte cuoeðo ðe ne gesingað vel se hona wið vel ða huile mec ðriga ðu onsæccesne se gedroefed hearta iuer gelefes gie in god & in mec gelefesin hus fador mines hamas vel meniga sint gif forðon lyttel vel ic cuoedo vel gif huidir huon ic sægde iuh forðon ic geongo gegeruiga iuh styd vel stouæ& ðæh ic færo vel & foregearuiga iuh stou eftersona ic cymmo & ic onfoe iuh to me seolfum þætte ðer ic beom vel ðer am ic & gie sie& ðidder ic geonga gie uutton & ðone uoeg gie uutoncuoeð him ðomas drihten nuutuwe vel huiddir & huu mago ue þæt ueg gewutacuæð him se hælend ic am uoeg & soðfæstnise & lif nænig monn cuom to ðæm feder buta ðerh mecgif gie ongette mec & fader min soðlice vel uutedlice gie ongette & of ðissa vel gie ongeattas hine & geseað hinecuoeð him philippus drihten ædeaua us ðone fæder & genog is vel usah þætte ongette se middangeard þætte ic lufo ðone fæder & sua þæt bebod salde me se fæder sua ic doam arisað uutun ue geonga hionaic am wintreo soð & fæder min londbuend isall þæt palmung vel in mec ne brengende uæstem nimeð hine vel ðene & all seðe brengeð þæt uæstm he clænsias ðene þætte þæt uæstem forðor brengegee vel gie clæno biðon fore þæt uord ðone vel þæt spreccend am iuhuunas on mec & ic in iuih suæ ðio palmtreo ne mege gebrenge uæstem from him seolfum buta geuuniga in wingearde suæ ne gie buta in mec gie gewunigeic am þæt wintreo gie þa tuiggo sint seðe uunas in mec & ic in ðæm vel in hine ðes brenges uæstm michil vel forðon buta mec noht magon gie wyrcegif huælc in mec ne wunas gesended bið buta suælce tuigga & drygeð vel wisneð & gesomnas hia vel ða & in fyr sendas & bernaðgif gie wunias on mec & uorda mina in iuih hia gewunias & suæhuæd gie uælle giuas gie vel biddeð & bið iuh saldin ðiss geberehtnad his fæder min þætte wæstm monigfald gie gebrenge & gie geworðas vel gie biðon mino ðegnas& gie cyðnise gie getrymies vel forðon from fruma mec mið gie aron vel uoeronðas ic spræc vel iuh þætte gie ne ondspyrniga velbuta somnungum gedoas iuih ah cymeð ðio tid þætte eghuoelc seðe accuellæs vel ofslæð iuih he lettes vel he doemeð vel he uoenas geafa vel embehtsumnise vel hernisse hine he gefe vel geselle gode& ðas hia doað vel wyrcað forðon nutton ðone fæder & ec ne mec vel ne mecah ðas spræcc vel iuh þætte miððy cymes tid hiora uosað gie eftgemyndgo vel gemynan gie ðonne þætte ic cuoeð iuh ðas uutedlice vel iuh from frumma ne cuæð ic þætte vel forðon mið iuh ic uæssoð nu ic gaæ vel to him vel to ðæm seðe mec sende & ænig monn of iuih vel from iuh ne gefregne mec huidir ðu geongasah forðon ðas ic spræc vel iuh unrotnisse vel gefylleð hearta iuerah ic soðfæstnise ic cueðo behofað vel nedðarf is vel iuh þætte ic fære vel ic giunga gif forðon ic ne fære vel ne geonga ðe rummoda ne cymes to iuh gif uutedlice ic færo ic sendo hine vel ðene to iuh& miððy gecymeð ðe geðreað vel middangeard of synne & of soðfæstnise & of domeðas ic spræc iuh þætte in mec sibb habbað in middangearde ofersuiðnise vel ofersuiðung vel vel ofercostung gie habbað vel ah getreuað vel gelefeð vel getryccað þætte ic forcuom vel ðone middangeardðas spræcend uæs vel spræcc se helend & mið underhebendum egum in heofnum cuoeð fæder cuom vel ðio tid berhtna ðu vel sune ðinne þætte sune ðin ðec geberhtnasuæ ðu gesaldes him maeht ælces vel lichomas þætte all þætte ðu saldes him silið him vel ðæm lif eceðas vel ðios is uutedlice ece lif þætte ongeattað ðec enne soð god & ðone ðu sendes hælend cristic ðec geberhtnade vel wuldrade ofer eorðo uoerc ic geendade þætte ðu sealdes me þætte ic gedoe vel& nu uuldra ðu vel mec faeder ðec mið seolfa vel mið ðeh seolfum mið ðæm vel mið ðær berhtnise þæt ic hæfde aer ðon se middangeard uere mið ðehic ædeaude noma ðinne monnum ða gesaldes me of middangearde ðino ueron vel biðo & me ða ðu gesaldes & uord ðin gehealdon velnu ongeton þætte alle ða gesaldes me from ðec sintforðon uordo ða ðu gesaldes me ic salde him vel ðæm & hia vel onfengon & ongetton vel soðlice þætte from ðec ic foerde & gelefdon þætte ðu mec gesendes& cuð ic dyde him noma ðin & cuð ic doam vel ic doe þætte lufo mið ðær vel lufu ðu lufades mec in ðæm sie ec vel & ic in ðæmuinterburna cedron is genemned ðer uæs lehtun in ðone infoerde he & ðegnas hiswiste uutedlice & iudas seðe salde vel hine þæt stoue forðon oft vel symble se hælend gecymeð vel gecuom ðidder mið ðegnum hisiudas forðon miððy onfenge þæt monnmægen vel ðegna uorud vel & from aldormonnum & aelaruum heremenn vel cuom ðidir mið spearum vel mið lehtfatum & brondum vel ðæccillum & woepnumse hælend forðon uiste alle ða ðe toweardo uoeron ofer hine feoll vel cuom vel forðeode & cuoeð him huoelcne soecas giegeonduardon him ðe hælend natzarenisca cuoeð him se hælend ic am gestod uutedlice & iudas seðe salde hine mið ðæmþætte forðon cuoeð him ic am eadun onbæcg & feollon on eorðueftersona forðon ðailco gefraign huoelcne vel soecas ða uutedlice cuoeðon hælend ðone nazarenescageonduearde se hælend ic cuæð iuh þætte ic am gif forðon mec soecas forletas ðas gegaaclioppadon eftersona alle cuoeðende no ðiosne ah baraban uæs huoeðre barabbas morsceaðeða forðon gelahte se groefa ðone hælend & gesuanng& ða ðegnas gewundun vel uuunden of ðornum ða corona vel þæt sigbeg of ðornum gesetton hæfde his & mið fellereadum uoede vel ymbsaldon hine& cuomon to him & cuoedon wæs ðu hal cynig iudeana & sealdon him hondsmællas vel dyntaseode eftersona se groefa ut & cuæð him heono ic brengo iuh to hine ut vel butæ þætte gie ongette forðon vel þætte in hine nan inting vel ic gemoeteeade forðon se hælend gebaer vel berende þæt ðyrnenne beg vel & þæt purbple hrægl vel þæt felleread woede & cuoeð him heono monnmiððy forðon vel uutedlice gesegon hine ða biscobas & ða ðegnas cliopadon vel uoeron cliopendo vel cuoeðendo vel cuoedon ec ahoh ahoh vel cuoeð him ðe groefa onfoas gie hine & ahoað vel acuoellað ic forðon ne gemoet ic in ðæm intingondsuearudon him iudeas ue ae habbas & aefter ae gedaefnað þætte dæd se forðon sunu godes hine worhtemiððy forðon geherde se groefa ðis uord suiðor ondreardðer forðon vel fore iuðeana gearuungdæg forðon neh uæs þæt byrgenn gesetton ðone hælendan uutedlice ðara dagana vel synnadagana vel sunnadagana maria ðio magðalenisca cuom armorgen miððy ðagett vel ðiostro uerun to ðæm byrgenn & gesaeh vel þæt stan genumen vel aueled of ðæm byrgenne vel from ðæmgiarn uutedlice vel forðon & cuom to simon petre & to oðrum ðegne ðone lufade se hælend & cuoeð him genomon ðone hlafærd of ðæm byrgenne & nuutu ue huer gesetton hinefoerde vel eode forðon petrus & ðe oðer ðegn & cuomon to ðæm byrgennegeuurnun vel ðonne vel tuege ædgædre vel gelic & ðe oðer ðegn forearn hraður from petre & cuom ærist vel ðe forma to ðæm byrgenne& miððy hine gebeg gesæh gesettedo ða linnin hræglo no huoeðre vel sueðæh inneodecuom forðon simon petrus fylgde him & ineode vel in þæm byrgenne & gesæh ða linnen hræglo gesattedo vel asetedo& ðone hascode þæt uæs oferufa vel ymb his heafut no mið ðæm linin hræglum asetted uæs ah syndrige vel suundur auunden vel gefalden in anum stoueða forðon ineode & ðe ðegn seðe gecuom ærest vel to ðæm byrgenne & gesæh & gelefdeðas uutedlice auritteno sint þætte gie gilefe þætte se hælend is crist cynig sunu godes ec þætte ue gelefa vel gie gilefa lif ge hæbbe on noma hisæfter ða aedeaude hine eftersona se hælend to sæ vel æt tiberiades sæ eatdeaude uutedlice ðus vel suæiacob & iohannes & oðro tuoge of his ðegnumcuoeð him simon petrus ic gæ fisciga vel cuoedon him ue cumas ec ðec mið vel ue uallas ec ðec mið & eodun & astigon vel in þæt scip & ðær næht noht gifengon velarmorgen vel arlice ða miððy þæt auarð stod se hælend on ðæm uarðe hueðre vel suæðæh ne ongetton ða ðegnas þætte se hælend uæscuoeð forðon him to se hælend cnæhtas ahne vel hueðer mett vel habbas ge giondueardon him næsicueð him sendas on ðæs scippes suiðre half þætt nett vel segna & gie gemoetas sendon forðon gee ne maehton þæt getea fore menigo ðara fiscanacuæð forðon ðe ðegn ðone lufade se hælend petre ðe hlaferd is simon petrus miððy geherde petrus þætte ðe hlaferd ueri þæt cyrtil vel ymbsalde hine uæs forðon nacod & sende hine on sæoðri uutedlice ðegnas on scip vel on rouing vel cuomon nærun forðon fearr vel from eorðu ah suelce elno tuu hund drogun vel getugun ðara fisca segniasægd is vel þæt boc æfter iohannemonginnes scearpsmeung matheisswelc in endebrednise forðmest vel ærest gesetet is godspell in iudea ærest vel forðmest awrat ðæs vel his ceigung to gode from bærsynnum wercum wæs twoegera in cynreswu vel cneuresu cristes ða forwuearda vel ða fruma foregefeng ðæs anæs ðæs vel his forma vel fruma mið ymbcyf lichome oðres ðæs æfter hearta gecorenscip wæs & of twæm in dalumsie ða feower siðo teafald tal ðrifaldlice gesetet forwuard & leafes lufu in redes tid gegemes & corenscip in oferfaer vel ofergeong wið ofsceades vel gesundras ernincg vel ymbgeong tocyme drihtnes æteawes cnearesu þæt & getalscipes & tides sie þæt were æteawued & godes in him uerc geeawde gee vel ec soð ðara cynn gesette cristes wyrcende from frumma cyðness vel gesetnessa ne onsocðara alra ðinga l sceafta tid endebrednise tal gescead oððæ reihtniss þæt lufes ðarflic l ned is god crist is ðe geworden is from wife geworden under ae geboren l gecenned of heghstald geðroued in lichoma alle in rode gefæstnade þæt he gesigfæstnade ða in him seolfum eftaras in lichoma & fadres noma in fadrum ðæm sunu & sunes noma ðæm feder eftgeniues l gesetes l gebeotes & in sunum buta fruma buta ende æteawues enne mið him faedere sie forðon an isin ðæm godspell bihoflic l ðarflic ðæm wilnendum god swelc ða fruma l ða midla l ða fulla oncnawa l ongeota þæt & cliopung l ceigunc ðæs apostoles & werc l wunder godspelles & lufu godes in lichoma gecenned ðerh alle ða geredes l ða geleornas hie oncnawes & ec of ðon forcunned l forcummen l forcyðed sint & þæt hie sie forcyðed gegiuas eftongeattasus forðon ðis setnes scearpsmeawunges wæs & lufu geworden ðing gesella vel to sellanne & wercces vel wundres godes ondget georne sie gescead ðæm soecendum nis to suigennæ gesægdeonginneð heafudweardo vel forecuido vel foremercungo aefter marcusonginneðmarcus ðe godspellere godes & petres in fulwiht sunu & in godcund word discipul sacerda in israhel doend æfter lichoma leuita gecerred to geleafa cristes godspell in italia awrat ædeawde in ðon þæt ec cynn his rehtlic were & cristeforðon frumma ðæs forueardes in stefne witgeonges ceigendes vel clioppende settendes vel gesette endebrednise ðæs leuites lar vel redes ædeaude þætte bodade foregesægd sunu zacharies in stefne engles sæcgende gesended ne þæt ane word lichoma geworden ah lichoma drihtes ðerh word godcundes stefn gesaweled frumma ðæs godspellesca bodes were ædeawed þætte seðe ðas redes witte he to huæm frumma lichomas in drihtne & hælendes tocymende vel hus reht were to oncnauanne end in him word stefnes þætte in efnum sonum losad were onfundeæfter ðon & endung vel fylnise godspelles werc inneode & mið fulwiht drihtnes bodiga god ongann vel onginnende ne wann accennise lichomæs ðon in ærrum awoendat were cweða vel cwoða ah all in ðæm forðmestum ðæt tal forletenes fæstern tales cunnung diables þæt somnung wildeora & hernise brohte engla þætte sette usih to oncnawanne siundrio in lytlum vel in sceortum gemercade ne setnessa woerces alesde & ðes geendedad werces ðone fyllnisse ne onsoce vel nalde onsaccasoðða to tellanne vel to clænsanne him after lufu vel geleafo gehatne acueðen bið þætte mið sæcerdhad forcyðed were haefd ah þæt ane efne geðohte to lufo forewurden vel forewurdon/ sette gecoreniso ne sua in woerc wordes were losad þætte ærest earnade in cynn forðon alexandriniscæ biscob wæsðæs vel his ðerh ana vel syndrigo woerc wiste vel to uutanne godspelles in him gecuoedna tosceada & ðone ðeodscip in him æs þætte oncnewa vel were oncnauen þæt godcund þætte oncnewe ðæt gecynd ða ðe in us ærist eft gesoeca æfter ðon vel soðða gesoht vel gefregna we wallað oncnawa habbas vel hæbbende meard fæstnunges vel trymnises forðon seðe plontað & seðe wyrðes an aron seðe ðonne geðungennise foregearuas god isforðon ne þæt wif æfra hæfde ne suno hundseofontig wintra geliorade in bithiniam in ðær byrig full of halig gastðeað halge instihtade vel dihtade gaste in ðær ðeade dalum ðis aurat godspell gemercade uutedlice he on forueard ær oðero woere awrittenoto ðuon vel to ðæm buta ða ðaðe endebrednise ðæs godspellica gesetnisse tosceades vel ða maastum nedðarf woerces vel ðæs wynnes wæs þætte ærest creciscum ðæm geleafulum mið æghuoelcum witgong tocymmendo in lichoma godes cristes woerca ðio menniscnise þætte ne iudaiscum sagum hia to behaldanne woere in an aes willo tohaldon þætte ne vel vel æc tosliterum sagum & unwislicum gemnisum besuicceno vel gemerredo foerdon from soðfæstnise þætte miswunneæfter ðon þætte on fruma godspelles iohannes mið accennise fore ondfengca vel to ðæm vel hwæm/ godspell awrite & on ðæm se gecorene awrite & þætte tahte gecyðde vel getrymmede & in him gefylledo were vel weron ðaðe weron from oðrum ongindoðæm forðon æfter fulwiht sunu godes from endung cneureses on crist gefylled gesoht wero from fruma accennise ðæs mennisces ðio mæht ðerhgelefed wæs þætte ðæm soecendum geeaude in ðæm ofgenom wæs sunu inngæ ðæs iornende in god cneoreso tosende vel to in godes bodade in monnes gecerre in him ðerh sunu dyde seðe ðerh dauið ðone fæder cymendum getrahtade vel tosceadade in cristðæm luce ne is uncynn gee ðæra writtra apostolica wundra mæht in ryne vel bið sald þætte gode on god full & sune selenis gedrysned vel geendad gebed apostolum gewordne mið hlod drihtnes gecorenes tal & sua paulus ðone endung mið apostolicum wundrum þætte salde ðone long wið priclom eftdrægend drihten gesease vel geceaseþætte redendum vel eftsoecendum god & gif ðerh syyndriga to areccganne from usig darflic woere wiste huoeðre þætte ðæm wyrcende londbuend gerises of wæstmum his þætte getta we forgældon vel gesaegdon vel þæt bærlic ferwuitgiornis nere suiðor wilnendum god þætte we gesegen ðononginneð insiht vel æteauunis æfter iohannemðe godspellere an of ðeignum godes seðe hehstald gecoren from gode is ðone of hæmdum vel of brydlopum þæt lust uifes gemana eftgeceigde god his vel ðæs hehstaltnisse in ðis tuufald cyðnisse in godspell gesileð & ðissum moder his miððy foerde to rode bebead god þætte ða hehstald hehstald gehealdeæfterðon æteaude vel gecyðde in godspell þæt wæs ðe ilca ungewæmmed wordes ded vel wærc ongann him ana word lichoma geworden woere ne leht þæt is god from ðiostrum vel from/ synnum benumene vel efnefornumene were is gecyðed þæt forma tacon vel becon gesette þæt in brydlopum vel geworhte god ædeaude þæt wæs ðe ilca ðæm redendum ædeaude þæt ðer drihten wæs gelaðad gelytlade ðara farmana win gedæfnade & aldum woeron gecerredo ða niua alle ðaðe from criste geinsetet aron hia ædeauaððis uutedlice godspell aurat in ðær meigð æfter ðon in pathma ealond þæt boc ðæra sighðana eac awrat þætte miððy on frumma ðæs regles unascended vel fruma vel in frumsceaft & unauerded vel unuæmmed ende ðerh þæt hehstald in ðær boec agolden bið vel is gecuedne criste ic am fruma & ende& ðes is iohannes seðe wiste þætte ofercuome ðe doeg geliornisse his miððy gehatne ueron ðeignas his in ðær byrig ðerh menigo ðæra taceno ædeaunise miððy geuitgade crist adune gestag in ðæm gedolfene byrgenne his stoue miððy warð gebed gesungen wæs gesettet to fadrum his suæ fremðe from wærc deaðes suælce from unclaennise lichomes ingemoetet wæs fremðe soðlice æfter alle godspell aurat & ðis ðær hehstalde is gedæfnadðæra huoeðre vel wriottana endebrednisse forðon ðerh suindriga from us ne bið ofsettet þætte ðæm uitend mið lust gesomnadum & soecendum uæstem ðæs winnes & godes laruu vel miððy god læres lar bið gehaldenher onginneþ godspell to cyþenne æfter matheus tosaganboec sindun þare kennisse hælendes kristes dauiðes sunu ðæs abrahames sunesoðlice kende & bloþre hisof ðamarof rachab of ruðþone cyning of þære þe urias ahte& broeþre his in babilonia fære& æfter babilonia færekende iosepe maria wær of þære akenned wæs hælend seþe is nemned kristealra cuþlice kneorissum from abrahame oþ to dauide feowertene kneorisse sint and from dauiðe oþþe to færennisse babylonie feowertene kneorisse sint & from færennisse babilonie oþþe to kriste kneorisse sint feowertenekristes soþlice kennisse þus wæs þa þe hio wæs bewedded l befest l in sceat alegd his moder maria iosefae ærþon hiae tosomne cwoman hio wæs gemoeted in hire innoþe hæbbende of þæm halgan gasteioseph soþlice hire wer swa he wæs monn soþfæst & ne walde hie wolde degullice forleten hiovel þis soþlice he þohte ðendi he þa þæt þohte henu engel drihtnes æteawde him in slepe cweþende iosep sunu dauiþes ne ondred þu þe onfoh vel onfoiæ maria wife þinum þætte soþlice in hire akenned is of þæm halgan gaste ishio kenneþ vel bereþ soþlice sunu & þu nemnest his noma hælend he selfe soþlice he gehæleþ folc his from hiora synnumþas soþlice eall geworden is vel wæs þætte gefylled wære þæt acweden is vel wæs from drihtne þurh esaiam þe witgu cweþendehenu vel her is vel sihþe fæmne in innoþe vel in hrife hæfð & bereþ vel kenneþ sunu & hie nemnaþ noma his þæt is gereht god mid usicþa arisende soþlice from slepe dyde swa him bebead se engel dryhtnes & feng wiue his& ne groette hire oþ þæt hit gebær sunu his þone frumkendu & nemde noma his hælendþa soþlice akenned wæs hælend iudeana in dagum eordes þæs kyninges henu tungulkræftgu eastan quomon to hierosolimamcweþende hwær is seþe akenned is kining iudeana we gesegon soþlice steorra his in eastdæle & cuomon to gebiddenne to himþæt þa geherde soþlice herodes king wæs gedroefed in mode & ealle hierosolima mid hine& gesomnade ealle aldursacerdos & bokeras þæs folkes ahsade from heom hwær krist wære akennedhie þa cwædon in behtlem iudeana swa soþlice awriten is þurh witgu cwæþende& þu eorðu nænig þinga læsæst eart in aldurmonnum iuda of þe soþlice gæþ latteuw seþe ræccet folc min israhælþa herodes dernunga acægde tungulkræftgum & georne geliornade æt him þa tid þæs æteawde him steorra& sendende heom to bethlem cwæþ gæþ & ahsiað georne bi ðem cnehte & þanne ge gemoeteþ hire sæcgað eft me þæt ic swilce cymende gebidde to himþa hie þa geherdon ðæs kyninges word eodun þonan & henu vel sihþe þe steorra þe hiae ær gesægon in eastdæle foreeade hie oþþætti he cumende gestod bufan ðær se cneht wæshie gesceænde soþlice steorran gefegon gefea miccle swiþe& ingangende þæt hus gemoettun þone cneht mid maria moder his & forþfallende gebedun to him & ontynden heora goldhord brohtun him lac gold recils & murra þæt is smerennis& andwyrde vel andsuari onfengon in slepe þæt hie ne cerdun to herode þurh oþer wege gewendun to heora londeþa hie weron gewitene henu engel drihtnes æteawde in swefne iosep cweþende aris & genim þone cneht & his moder & fleoh in ægypti & wæs þær oþþæt ic sæcge ðe forþon ðe toward is soþlice þætte herodes soecaþ þone cneht to ofslæanne hinehe arisende genom þone cneht & his moder on niht & gewat in ægypti& wæs þær oþ herodes dead þætte gefylled wære þætte acweden wæs from drihtne þurh witgu cweþende of ægypto ic acægde minum suneþa herodes geseah þæt he wæs awæged from þæm tungulkræftgum he wæs swiðe eorre & sendende ofslog ealle þa cnehtas þa þe werun in bethlem & in allum heora gemoerum from twæm wintrum & beniuþa æfter þære tide þe he ær asohte from þæm tungulkreftgumþa wæs gefylled þætte cweden wæs þurh hieremiam þone witgu cweþendestefu in heanisse gehered wæss wop & heaf micel rachel wepende hire bearn & ne walde beon afroefred forþon þe hie ne sendunþa herodes wæs soþlice dead henu drihtnes engel æteaude in slepe iosep in ægyptocweþende aris & genim þone cneht & his moder & fær to israheles eorþu forþon þe deaðe sindun soþlice þe þe sohtun ferh þas cnehteshe arisende soþlice iosep genom þone cneht & his moder & cuom in israheles eorþu& geherdun soþlice þætte archelaus ricsade in iudea for herodem his fæder ne durste þider gangan vel færan & gemynga in slepe gecerde in galilea dæle& cumende & eardade in þære cæstre ðe hatte nazareþ þætte gefylled wære þæt acweden wæs þurh witgu þætte he bið nazarenisc nemnedin þæm soþlice dagum cuom iohannes se bezera bodende in iudea woestenne& cweþende doeþ hreunisse forþon þe neoliceþ soþlice heofuna riceþis his soþlice seþe cweden wæs þurh esaiam witgu cweþende stemn cegende in westinne gearwigað drihtnes wæg wircaþ rihte his stigassylf þanne hæfde hrægl of olbendena herum & fellen gyrdels ymb his lendu his mete þanne wæs græshoppa & wudehunigesþa eode ut to him hierosolima & ealle iudea & eall þæt lond ymb iordanewerun depte in iordane from him ondentende heora synnehe þa gesæh þonne monige farisea & saducea cumende to his fulluihte cwæþ to him ge nedrana cynn hwa getahtæ eow þæt ge flugan from þæm towardan eorrewyrceþ soþlice wyrþe westem hreunisse& ne wellað cweþan betweon eow vel in innan eow fæder we habbaþ abraham soþ ic eow sæcge forþon þæt mæg god of þissum stanum aweccan bearn abrahameþenu is soþlice axe to wyrtruma treowes aseted his æghwilc treow þara þe ne bereþ godne woestim bið acorfen & in fyre sendedic eowic depu vel dyppe in wættre in hreunisse seþe þonne æfter me cymeð se is me strængra þæt ic næm wyrþe scoas to beranne se eowic depið vel dyppeþ in ðæm halgan gaste & fyreþæs windiuscoful in his honda & þurhclensaþ his bereflor & gesomnaþ his hwæte in berern þa ceaf þone forberneþ fyre unaduescendliceþa cuom from galilea in iordane to iohanne þætte he wære depid from himiohannes þonne werede him cweþende ic sceal from þe beon vel wesa deped vel fullwihted & ðu cymest to meþa ondswarende se hælend cwæþ to him let þus nu forðon ðe þus we sculon gefyllan æghwilce soþfestnisse þa forlet hine heþa gedeped se hælend hræþe astag of þæm wættre & henu him weron ontynde heofunas & he gesæg godes gast niþerstigendne swa culfre cumende ofer hine& henu stemn of heofune cweþende þis is min sune se leofa in ðæm me gelicadeþa wæs hælend læded in woestenne from gaste þæt he wære costad from deofle& þa he fæste feowertig daga & feowertig næhta æfter þon hine hyngrade& geneleccende to him se costere cwæþ to him gif þu godes sunu siæ gecwæþ þæt þas stanes hlafes beon vel gewærþese ondswarande cweþ awriten is nalles in hlafe anum lifgaþ menn ah in æghwelcicum worde þæm þe forþ gaeþ of godes muðeþa genom hine þæt deoful in þa halgan cæstre & sette hine on heh stowe temples& cwæþ to him gif þu sie godes sunu send þec niþer forþon gewriten is þæt he his englum bebeodeþ be þe þætte he þe gehalden in allum weogas þine & hie hondum ahebbaþ þec þyles ðu ondspurne æt stane þinum fotumcweþ iesum to him æft awriten is soþlice ne costa þu dryhtnes þines godesæft genom hine þæt deaful on þune heh swiþe & æteawde him eall us rice middangeardes & wuldor þara& cwæþ to him þas ic þe eall selle gif þu fallende to me gebiddesþa cwæþ to him hælend ga on bæclinc þu wiþerwearde forþon awriten is to dryhtne þinum gode ðu vel to gebidde & him anum ðewigeþa hine forlet þæt deoful & henu englas cwoman & ðegnadum himþa he þa geherde þæt iohannes wæs afongen gewat in galilea& forlet nazaret caestrae cwom & geeardade in cafarnaum sæ caestrae in gemaerum zabulones & nepthalesþætte gefylled wære þæt acwæden wæs þurh essaiam þone witgu cweþendezabulones eorðu & neptalimes eorþe saes weg ofer iordane þara þeoda galileafolc þætte sætt in þiostre geseah micel leoht & þæm sittendum in þeode londe & deade scade vel scua leht æteawde upp þæmseoðþan ingann læran & cweþan doaþ hrewnisse forðon þe neolicet heofuna ricehe þa gangande bi galilea sae gesæh twegen gebroþer simon þane þe is nemned petrus & andreas his broþer settende nett in sae forþon he hie werun fisceras& þa cwæþ to him cumaþ æfter me & ic gedom þæt git beoþan monna fisceres& hie hræþe foletende þæt nett heora folgedun him& he forþgangande þonan gesægh oþre twegen gebroþer iacob zebedeaes sunu & iohannem his broþer in scipe mid hiora fæder boetende heora nett & gecægde l cliopade him& hie þa sona forletun heora nett & fæder folgadun him& hælend geond eade alle galilea lærende in heora synagogum vel somnungum & bodende godspelles rice & hælde æghwilce adle & æghwilce untrymnisse in þæm folce& eode his hlisa in alle syria & him brohtun alle yfel hæbende & missenlicum adlum & tintregum gefongnae & þa þe dioful hæfdun & monsekae & loman & he gehælde þa& him fylgendun monige mængu of galilea & of decapoli & of hierosolimis & of iudea & of londe begeonda iordanehe þa geseende þa menigu astahg on dune & þa he wæs gesett him eodun to his discipuli vel his þægnas& ontynde his muþ lærde hie cweþendeeadig þa þurfende in gaste forþon heora his heofuna riceþa milde forþon þe hie gesittaþ eorðude nu forþon þe hie beoþ afroefredeþa þe hie hyngriþ & ðyrsteþ soðfæstnisse forþon þe hie fulle weorþaþ vel beonþa mildheortnisse forðon þe hie mildheortnisse begetaþþa clæne heortan þe hie god gescawað l geseoþþa sibsume vel friðsume forþon þe hie beoþ godes bearn genemdeþa þe heohtnisse þrowiaþ fore soþfæstnisse forþon þe heora is heofuna riceeadig ge beoþ þonne eowic wærgaþ mennisc & eower hehtende beoþan & cwæþan æghwilc yfel wið eow ligende for mecgefeaþ & geblissiað forþon lean vel meard eowra is genihtsumað in heofunum forþon þe hie swa hoehtende sint witgena þara þe weron ær eowge sindun eorðu salt gif þæt salt þonne awerdað in þæm þe hit bið salten to nohte mæg seoþþan nymþe þæt hit sie worpen ut & tredan from monnumge sindun leoht middangeardes ne mæg cæstra beon ahyded on dun asetedne menn blæcern in beornað & settaþ hine under mytte ah on candeltreow þæt he gelihte allum þe in husae sindunsua lihte liht eower fore monnum þætte hiae geseon eower god weorc & wuldrige fæder eowrum ðe in heofunum isne wenaþ ge forþon the ic cuome to brecanne ae vel lare eþþa witga ne cuom ic to breccane ah to gefyllennesoþ ic sæcge eow oþþæt geleoreþ heofun & eorþe an i eþþa an holstæfes ne gelioreþ from ae ærþon all þus geweorþeseþe forþon toleseþ an of þisse beboda læsest & swa læreþ menn he biþ se læsesta nemned in heofuna rice seþe þonne wyrceþ & swa læreþ se bið micel nemneþ in heofuna riceforþon ic sæcge eow nymþe eower soþfæstnisse genihtsumige mæ þonne bokere & farisea ne gaþ ge in heofuna ricegeherdun þætte cwæden wæs þæm iumonnum ne slag þu seþe þonne slæþ scyldig he biþ dome he bið doma/ scyldigic þonne sæcge eow þætte æghwilc þara eorsaþ his broþer he biþ doma scyldig seþe þanne cwaeþ his broþer idla he biþ gemote scyldig seþe þanne cwæþe dysig vel dole he biþ scyldig helle fyresforþon gif þu bringa þin lac to weofud vel wibede & ðær gemyne bist þæt þin broþer/ hæbbe hwæt hwugu wið ðeforlet þær þin lac beforan þæt weofud vel wibed & gae ærest geþinge wiþ ðinum broþer & þanne cumest þu agefes þin lacwæs gemod vel beo ðu þencende þinum þæm wiðerwearde hræþe þanne þu sie on wæge mid hine þy laes se wiðerwearde þec selle doeme & se doeme sellað ðe his dægne & þu se in carcern sendedsoþ ic sæcga þe ne gæs þu ut þonan ærþon ðu agefe þone næhstu feorþan dælge geherdun þætte cwæden wæs þæm gumonnum ne lige dernungeic þonne sæcge eow þæt æghwilc þara þe gesihþ wif to gitsanne vel forlicgan hire þæs/ gewemmed is wiþ þæt in his heortegif þanne þin ege þæt swiþre æswicað þe vel fælle þec ahloca hit & awerp from ðe forþon þe þe beþerfeð þæt to lore weorðe an þine lioma þonne all þin lichoma sie sended in helle& gif seo swiþre hond þin fælle vel æswicað ðec aceorf hiae & aweorp from þe forþon þe þe beðerfeþ þæt to lose wearþe vel lore beon an þine leoman þonne eall þin lichoma gæþ in hellegecwæden wæs þonne swa hwa swa forletae his wif selle him boec þare aweorpnisseic þonne sæcge eow vel iu þætte æghwilc þara þe forleteþ his wif butan forlegennisse þinge vel intinga he doeþ þæt hiu dernunge licge & seþe þæt forletne him lædeþ hefæþ unrihthæmeþeft ge geherdun þætte cweden wæs gumonnum ne swer þu man agef þonne drihten þine haþasic þonne cweþe to eow þæt ge ne sellaþ hað vel swerge allunga vel eower nan ne þurh heofun forþon ðe he is godes seþelne þurh eorðæ forþon þi hio is fotscamel vel tæppelbred his fota ne þurh hierusalem forþon þe hio is cæstra þæs micclan kyningesne þurh þin heafud haþ selle vel swerige forþon þe þu ne mæht ænne loc hwitne gewirce oþþe blæcnesie þonne eower word is vel hit is is vel hit is nis vel nis hit nis vel nis hit þætte þonne þæm wordum genyhtsume is from yfle isge geherdun þætte cwæden wæs ege for ege toð for toþic þonne cwæþe to eow þæt ge ne wiðstonde yflæ ah gif hwa ðec slae on ðæt swiðran wonge l ceke þin sel him ek þæt oþer& þæm þe wille wið þe dom geflitan & þinne tonica genioman forlet him vel swilce & hryft& swa hwa swa ðe nede to lædenne vel to ferganne þusend steppan þæt his an mil ga mid hine oþre twegeall vel seþe bidde þe sele him & þæm ðe wille on borg nioma æt þe ne beo ungeþwærege geherdun þætte cweden wæs lufa þine þa nexstan & hate þine fiondic þonne cwæþe to eow lufigaþ eowre fiondas & doeþ wæl þæm þe eowic hateþ vel fiege & gebiddaþ for hearmcuidele vel oihtende eowic & for ehtendum vel hoelende eowicþæt ge sie bearn eowres fæder þe in heofonum is seþe his sunne doeþ uppgangan ofer gode & yfle & regneþ ofer soþfeste & unsoþfæsteforþon gif ge lufigaþ þa þe eow lufigaþ hwylce lean habbaþ ge ah gæfelgeroefe þæt ne doeþ& gif ge halettaþ eowre broþer æfne hwæt doaþ ge marae ah hæðne þæt ne doaþforþon beoþ ge gedoefe swa swilce eower fæder se heofunlica gedoefe isbehaldeþ þæt ge eowre soþfestnisse ne doan fore monnum þæt ge sie geseane from heom from him elles vel elcur ge ne habbaþ lean vel mearde mid eower fæder þæne þe in heofunum isforþon þonne þu wirce ælmisse ne blau þu beman for þe swa liceteras doan in heora somnungum & in tunum þæt hie sie weorþade from monnum soþ ic sæcge eow hie onfengum heora leanðe þonne wircendum ælmesse nyte se winstrae hond þin hwat þin sio swiþre doaþæt þin ælmes sie in degulnisse & þin fæder se þe gesið in degulnisse geldeþ ðe& þonne ge bidde eow ne beoþ ge swa liceteras þa þe lufigaþ stalle vel stonde in gesomnungum & in hwommum worþana stondende him gebidde þæt hie sie gesæne from monnum soþ ic sæcge eow hie onfengun heora leanðu þonne þonne þu gebidde ga in þine cofan & betun þine dure bidde þin fæder & þin fæder seþe gesihð in degulnisse geldeþ ðe& þonne gebiddendae ne scule ge feola spreocan swa hæðene doan forþon þe hiae woenaþ þæt him sie in heora feola sprece geheredne scule forþon gelice beon him forþon þe eower fæder hwæs eow ðærf sie ær þon ge hine biddanþus ge þonne eow gebiddað fæder ure þu þe in heofunum earð beo gehalgad þin nomacume to þin rice weorþe þin willa swa swa on heofune swilce on eorþehlaf userne vel ure dæghwæmlicu vel instondenlice sel us to dæge& forlet us ure scylde swa swa we ec forleten þæm þe scyldigat wið us& ne gelaet us gelaede in constungae ah gelese us of yfleforþon þy gif ge forleteð monnum heora synna heow swilce forleteþ eower fæder se heofunlica eowre scyldægif ge þonne ne forleteþ monnum eora synne ne eower fæder seþe in heofunum is forleteð eow eowra synneþonne ge þonne faesten ne beoþ ge swa swa licetteras unrote forþon þe hie weorfaþ heora andwliotu þæt hie sie geseanae monnum fæstende soþ ic eow sæcge for þæt hiæ onfengun heora leanþu þonne þonne þu fæste smere þin heafod & þine andwlitu þwahþyles þu sie gesene monnum fæstende ah þinum fæder ðæm þe in degulnisse is & þin fæder seþe geseoþ in degulnisse geldeþ ðene hydeþ eow hord in eorþe þær om & mohþa gewyrfeþ vel etaþ & þær ðiofes adelfaþ & forstelaþhydeþ eow þonne hord in heofunum þær ne om ne mohþa gewyrfeð & þær þeof ne adelfaþ ne forstelaþforþon þær þin hord is þær is þin eortalichoma blæcern is þin ege gif þin ege biþ anfald all þin lichoma biþ lihtgif þin ege þonne ne bið nan eall þin lichoma beoþ ðeostru forþon gif þæt leht þætte in ðe is þeostru sint þæt þeostre hu micel biþne mæg ænig twæm godum ðeowigan forþon þe he þa oþerne fiað vel hateþ & oþerne lufað eþa oþerne hræfnað & oðerne herweþ ne magun ge gode ðeowige & dwaleforþon ic cweþe to eow þæt ge sorgige eowrum fere hwæt ge etan ne eowrum lichoma hu ge eowic gearwige ah nis mare þæt ferh þonne se mete & se lichoma þonne þæt hræglgeseoþ vel behaldeþ heofun fuglas þæt hie ne saweð ne ripath ne somniaþ in berern & eower fæder se heofunlica foedeþ þa ah ge ne sindun diorre þonne þahwilc eower mæg þonne þencende ætece to his lengo ane elne& be hrægle forhwon sorgiaþ ge sceawigaþ lilia londes hu hie waexaþ ne winnaþ ne spinnaþsoþ ic eow þonne sæcge þæt ne salomon in allum his wuldre wes beþæht swa swa an þaranunu þonne þæt londes hoeg þæt to dæge is & to mærgen vel marne bið in ofne sended god swa gearwæþ hu micele wae eowic þæs medmasta geleafe mennforþon ne sorgigaeþ ge cweþende hwæt geetaþ wæ oþþe hwæt drincaþ wæ oþþe hy beoþ we gewrigeneforþon þe þas þeode all soeceþ forþon þe eower fæder wat þæt ge þissa alra ðurfunsoecaþ þonne ærest godes rice & his soþfæstnisse & all þas bioð geeced eowne forþon sorgigaþ ge in morgen se morgen forþon dæg sorgaþ beoþ selfa him genoh weotudlice dæge wea hisne doemeþ ge þy les ge sien doemedin ðæm weotudlice dome þe ge doemeþ ge beoþ doemde & in ðæm gemete þe ge metaþ bið eow metenforhwon þonne gesihstu streu in ege broþer þine & beam in ege þinum ne gesees vel sisoþþa hu cweþestu broþer þinum broþer abid þæt ic ofdo þæt streu of ege þinum & sihþe beam in ege þinum isþu licettere geþo æræst þone beam of ege þinum & þonne gesihst þu awearpe þæt streu of þines broþer egene sellað ge halig hundum ne gewearpaþ ercnanstanas eowre beforan swinum þyles hiæ tredan ða heora fotum & gehwerfæþ to slite eowicbiddaþ & eow biþ sald soecaþ & ge gemoetaþ cnyssaþ & eow biþ ontynedæghwilc wiotudlice seþe bit he onfoeþ & seþe soeceþ he findeð & cnyssande him bið ontynedoþþa hwælc is eower monn þe hine bidde sunu his hlaf ah he stan ræceþ thæmoþþe gif he fiscæs biddeth ah he nedra ræceþ himnunu þonne ge þe ge sindun yfle cunneþ god sellan beaearnum eowrum hu miccle mae fæder ewer seþe in heofunum is selleþ god þæm þe biddaþ hineall forþon swa hwet swa ge willað þæt doa eow menn god swa & ge doaþ heom þis is wiotudlice ae & witgugaþ inn þurh naarwe geate forþon wid geatt & rum weg þe lædeþ to forwyrde vel forlore & monige sindun þa þe ingan þurh þære vel þænehu naru vel wiðerdune geate & eorfeþe is se weg þe lædeþ to life & feawe sindun þa þe gemoetaþ þane vel cymeð in þarabehaldeþ eow wið lyge vel lease witgu þa þe cumaþ to eow in gewedum scepa in innan þonne sindun wulfas risænde vel woedendefrom wæstmum eora ge ongetaþ heo ah he somnigaþ of þornum winbeger oþþe of gorstum ficos vel nyteswa ægwilc treow god godne westmas bereþ vel wyrceþ yfel þonne treow yfle westmas vel bled bereþne mæg treow þæt gode yfle westmas beoran vel wyrcende ne þæt treow yfle gode wæstmas vel bled beoranæghwilc þara treow þe ne bereþ westem godne bið acorfen & in fyre sendedforþon vel cuþlice of wæstmum eora ge ongetaþ heo vel hiene vel nallæs æghwilc þara þe cweþ to me dryhten drihten gæþ in rice heofuna ah seþe wyrceþ wille fæder mines þæs þe in heofunum is se vel he gaeþ in heofuna ricemonige cweþað to me on ðæm dæge dryhten dryhten ah ne in þinum noma witgadun we & in þinum noma deoful ut wyrpon & in þinum noman mægen monige worhton& ic þonne ondetu heom þæt ic næfræ cuþe eow gewitaþ from me ge þe wyrcaþ unrihtnisseæghwilc þara þe gehereð word min þas & fremmað hie he bið lic were þæm snottra þe getimbrade hus is on stane& astag niþer rægn & cuomun eae & blewan windas & fellun on hus þæt & hit no gefeoll gestaþulad soþlice hit wæs on stane& æghwilc þe gehereþ word min þas & ne fremmaþ þa gelic bið were dysig vel dolum þæm þe timbrade hus his on sonde& astag rægn niþer & cuomon eae & bleowen
