windas & feollun in hus þæt & hit gefeoll & wæs hryre his micel& gewarð þa hæfde geendad hælend word þas þæt wundradun þa mengu be lare hishe wæs forþon hie lærde swa swa mæht hæbbende nallas swa swa bocera heora & fariseasþa he þa wæs astigen of dune folgedun him menga monige& henu hreof sumne cumende togebedd him cweþende drihten gif þu wilt þu mæht mec geclensige& aþenende hælend honda his & æthran him cwæþende ic wille geclænsige & hræþe geclensad wæs hreoful his& cweþ to him hælend gesech þæt þu nængum sæcge ah ga & æteaw þe messepreoste & breng þæt lac þætte bebead moyses in cyþnisse heoraæfter þas þa he þa eode cafarnaum cuom to him biddende hine& cweþende drihten cneht min ligeþ in huse loma & is yfle wælid& cweþ to him se hælend ic cume & gehæle hine& ondswarande centurio cweþ to him drihten nam ic wyrðe þæt ðu ga under þacu minne ah efne gecweþ word & bið gehæled cneht minwiotudlice & ic monn eam under mæhti geseted hæbbende under me cempa & ic cweðe þissum ga & he gæþ & to oþrum cyme & he cymeþ & to esne vel ðeow minum & ic cweþe do þis & he doeþgeherende he þa hælend wundriende wæs & fylgendun him to þæm cwæþ soþ ic sæcge eow swa micel geleafa ne gemotte ic in israhelesæcge þonne eow þæt monige from eastan & westan cumaþ & hleonigaþ mid abraham & isaac & iacob in heofuna ricebearn þonne rice þeos bioþ aworpenne in þiostre þa ytmæste þær bið wop & gristbatung toþa& cwæþ ða se hælend to þæm centurione gang & swa þu gelefdest geweorðe ðe & gehæled wæs se cneht on þære hwile vel tide& þa cuom se hælend in huse petrus gesæh swægre his licgende & bifgende& æthran honda his & forlet hiae sio drif & hiu aras & ðægnade heomefen þonne hit þa wæs þa brohtun him monige deofulseoke hæbbende & ut awearp þurh his worde þa gastas unklene & alle yflehæbbende gehældeþætte gefylled were þæt gecwæden wæs þurh esaiam þe witgu cweþende he wiotudlice untrymnissum urum onfeng & metrymnisse ure he bærgeseonde þa hælend mengu monige ymb hine heht feran ofer sae vel brymstream& cumende an bokera cweþ to him laruw ic wille folgian þe hwider swa þu ganges vel gæst& cwæþ to him hælend foxes hole habbaþ & fuglas heofunas selescota þer hie restaþ bearn vel sunu þonne monnes næfð wær he heafud aheldeoþer þa of leornere his cwæþ to him drihten læt me ærest gangan & bebyrgen fæder minumhælend þanne cweþ to þem fylge me & forlet deaða bebyrgen deada heora& þa stag he on scipe folgadun him leorneras his& henu hreornis micel geworden wæs on þæm sæ wæs þonne heom wind wiðerweard swa þætte þe scip wæs urnen yðum he wiotudlice vel he soþ vel þonne slepte& eodun to him discipulas his & wehton hine cweþende dryhten hæl usic we forweorðað& cweþ to heom se hælend for hwon vel hwæt gefrohte sindun medmiccles geleafa & þa arisende bebead wind & sae & geworden wæs smyltnisse micelþa menn wundradun cwæþende hulic is þes þe wind & sae geheraþ him& þa he cuom ofer sae in lond gerasinga urnon ongægn him twegen menn deofulseoka hæbbende of byrgennum utgangende grimme swiðe swa þætte nænig mæhte faran þyrh wæge þæm& henu cegende cwæþende hwæt is us & ðe hælend sunu godes cwome hider ær tide tinterga usicwæs þa unfeor suner swina from heom monegra etendeþa deoful þonne bedun hinae cweþende gif ðu ut awearpa usic send usic in þas sunrae swin& cweþ to heom gaeð & hie utgangende eodun in swinum vel in þassum & henu ungerece vel ræsed eode all siu suner vel wræð niðerweardes in sae & deade wurdon in wættrumhiordes þonne flugon & cumende in cæstræ sægdun vel cyðdon all & be þæm þe deofulseoke werun ær vel æfdon& henu all cæstra uteode ongægn hælend & geseende hine bedun hine þæt he ferde vel liorde from gemerum eora& astigende on scipe oferlaþ þone sæe & cwom in cæstre his& henu brohtun him loma licende in bedde & geseende hælend leafa hiora cwæþ to þæm loma getreowe sunu þe sindun forletne synnae þine& henu sume þara bocera cwedun ininnan heom þes hefalsaþ& þa geseende ðohtas heora cwæþ to heom forhwon þencaþ ge yfel in heortum eowrumhweþer is eþre to cweþane sindun forletnae þe synne þe to gecweþanne aris & gaþæt ge wite þonne þætte sunu monnes hæfeþ mæhte on eorðan to forletenne synne þa cwæþ to þæm loman aris & genim bedd þin & ga in hus þin& he aras & eode in hus hisgesegon þa menigu onddreordun heom & wuldradun god þe swilce mæhte gesalde monnum& þa foerde þonan hælend gesæh monnu sittende æt gæflaes monunge matheus haten & cwæþ to him fylgæ me he aras & fylgænde wæs him& geworden wæs þær hlionede he in huse & henu monige gæfelhroefe & synnfulle cwomon & hlionadun mið hælend & leorneras his& gesegon farisei cwedun leornerum his forhwon lareuw eower mið gæfelgehrefum & synnfullum eteþ& þa gehoerde se hælend cwæþ nis þærf halum læces ah yfle vel hæbbende untrymumgæþ þonne geleornigaþ hwæt þæt sie mildheortnisse ic wille & nalles asægdnisse ne forþon ic cwom to ceganne soþfestum ah synfullumþa eodun to him leorneras iohannes cwæþende for hwon we & farisei fæstaþ gelome leorneras þonne þine ne fæstaþ& cwæþ to heom hælend ah ne magun bearn brydguma wepan þende mid heom is se brydguma cumaþ þonne dagas þæt bið afirred from heom se brydguma & þonne fæstennænig mon þonne setteþ claþ flyhti neowenne in hrægl ald he ahefeþ forþon fyllnisse his from þæm hrægle & wyrse slite werþeðne menn geotaþ win niowe in winbeligas alde elcur vel elles tobersteþ þa belgas ealde & þæt win bið agoten & þa beligas to lore weorðaþ ah win neowe in belgas neowe geotaþ vel gedoaþ & bu beoþ gehaldenþa he þis spræc to heom henu aldurmon an cwom & gebed to him cweþende drihten dohter min is nu aswolten is ah cym gesette hond þin ofer vel on heo & heo leofaþ& he aras se hælend folgade him & his leorneras& henu wif þætte blodes flownisse þrowade twelf winter geneolicte behyndan & æthran fæss hrægl hisheo cwæþ forþon in innan hire gif ic gehrine efne vel swa micel hrægl his hal ic eam vel ic beom& hælend þa gecerde vel werfde & geseah heo & cweþ getreuwe þu dohter geleafa þin þec halne dyde & warð ða hal þæt wif of þære hwile vel tide& þa cwom se hælend in hus þas aldormonnes & þa gesæh piperas & menigu ruxlendecwæþ gewitaþ heonan nis dead þæt mægden ah hio slepeþ & hie bismeradun hine& þa ut aworpen wæs siu mengu he eode in hus & genom hond hire & aras þæt mægden& eode se hlisa þis in all þæt lond& forþ foerde vel liorde þonan se hælend fylgdun him twa blinde cegende & cweþende miltsa unc þu sunu dauiðesþa he þa cwom in hus eodun to him þa tu blinde biddende & cwæþ to heom se hælend gelefaþ git þe ic mæge þæt gedoa inc cwædon to him la drihtenþa he æthran egan heora cweþende æfter geleafan incrum geweorðe inc& werun ontyned egan eora & forbead vel biatadae heom cwæþende geseaeþ þæt þis nænigmon witehiae þa utgangende gemerdon hine geond all þæt londutgangende þa hie þa weron henu brohtun him monnu dumb & deaf deofulseocne hæbbende& utwearp þæt deoful sprecende wæs se dumbe & wundradun mengu cweþende næfre swa æteawde in israhelfarisei þonne cwedun in aldre deofla he utweorpeð deoful& geond eode se hælend þa burgas alle & cæstras lærende in gesomnungum heora & bodede godspelles rices & hælende æghwilce adle & æghwilce untrymnisse in folcegeseah he þa se hælend þa mengu efnþrowade þæm þe hie weron gewælde & liccende swa scep heordeleasþa cwæþ to leorneras his rip þis is micel & wyrhtu þonne feawebiddaþ þanne dryhten þæs hripes þæt he sende wyrhte in ripae his& þa tosomne cegende twælf his leorneras salde heom mætae gastas unclenra þæt utawurpe þa & hælde æghwilce adle & æghwilce untrymnisseþara twelf apostola noma þonne sindun þas ærest simon seþe is nemned petrus & andreas his broþer iacobus zebedees sunu & iohannes his broþerphilippus & bartholomeus tomas & matheus se gæfelgeroefe & iacobus alfees sunu & taddeus& simon se cananisca & iudas scariothes seþe salde hineþas twælfe sende se hælend bebeodende heom & cweþende in wæg ðeode ne/ gæþ ge & cæstra samaringa ne iongaþah mae gaþ to þæm sciopum þe to lore wyrðon huses israhela& gangende þonne bodigað cweþende þætte neoliceþ rice heofunasuntrymnisse hæleþ deaðe wæcceþ hreofe clænsigæþ deofulsoece utweorpaþ arwunga ge onfengon arwunge gesellaþ& swa hwa swa drync seleþ anum læsest þisse cælc fulne wættres galdes efne in noman leornere soþ ic sæcge eow ne forleoseþ lean his& gelamp þa geendade se hælend word þas bebeodende twelfe his leorneras leorde ðonan þæt he lærde & bodade in cæstrum heoraiohannes þonne geherende in bendum werc kristes gesende twægen leorneras hiscwæþ to heom fereþ secgaþ arþu seþe cwome scalt þe we oþres bideþ& ondswarade cweþ to heom se hælend gæþ sæcgaþ vel cyþaþ iohannes þæt ge geherdun & þæt ge segunblinde geseeþ halte gangaþ hreofe sindun clænsade & deafe geheraþ & deade arisaþ þorfende godspell secgaþ& eadig is seþe in me ne bið geincfulladþa eoden þonan hie þa ingon se hælend cweþan to þæm menigu bi iohanne se fullwihtereforhwon eoden ge in wæstenne to geseenne read wind styred oþþe forhwon eodun to geseonne monnu næscum hræglum gegearwæd henu þa þe næscum gegearwade in husum kyninga sindunioc forþon min wynsum is & byrðen min liht isin þa tid eode se helend þurh acras on ræstedæge leorneras þa his hyngrede ongunnon hriopan æchir & etonfarissæis þa gesegon cwedun to him henu discipulas þine doaþ on restedagum þæt nis alefed heom to doannehe þa cweð to heom ah ge hreordeþ hwæt dyde dauið þa hine hyngrede & þa þe mid him weronhu he eode in hus gode & hlaf forðsetennisse et þa þe ne wæs gelæfed vel ne byrede him to etanne ne þæm þe mid him wæron nymþe anum sacerdumoþþ ne reordaþ in ae þæt on restedægum sacerdes in templ þa ræstedæge wemmaþ & butan hehsynne syndonic sæcge þonne eow þæt templ mara is herþær ge þonne wiston hwæt þæt is mildheortnisse ic wille & no asægdnisse næfre ge niðrade þa unsceþðendedrihten is forþon ge ec gerestedæges sunu monnesswa hwa swa wyrceþ willan fæder mines þe in heofunum is se min ge broþer & swuster & moder ison þæm dæge gangende se hælend of huse gesæt bi sæe& gesomnadun to him mengu swa þæt he on scipe astigende gesett & all seo mengu stod on waraþe& he sprec to heom feola in gelicnissum cweþende henu ut eode se sawend to sawenne& þa he seow sume gefeollun bi wæge & cuomun fuglas heofun & frætunþæt oþere þonne gefeollon on stanig lond þær ne hefde eorðe miccle & hræþe cuomun upp forþon þe hie næfdon heanisse eorðesunne þa upp cuom hatedun & forþon þe hie nefdun wyrtryme/ forwisnadunsume þonne gefetun in þornas & wexon þa þornas & smoradun hiæsume þonne gefetun on eorðe gode & saldun wæstem sume hundteontig sume sextig sume þritig& forþon ne worhte þær mægen monige for ungeleafa heorain þa tid gehoerde herodes tetrarcha hlisa se hælend& cweþ to ðægnum his ah þis is iohannes se baezere þe ic heht heawan he aras from deaðe & forþon mægen sindun worht in himherodes forþon genom iohannes & gebond hine & sette in carcern for herodiadi wif broþer his philippessægde him forþon iohannes nis alefed ðe to habbanne hire& wolde hine ofslean ondreord him þæt folc forþon swa swa witgu hine hæfdunon dæg þa gebyrde herode pleagade dohter þara herodiade in midle & licade herodesþa mið aþe geheht þæt hire salde swa hwæt swa hiu bede hine& hiu gemonade from moder hire cweð her sele me on disce heafod iohannes se bezere& bedun hine þæt hiæ oþþe fæss hrægles his mostun æthrinan & swa hwælc swa æthrinan hale wyrdonþa eodun to him from hierosolimis bokere & fariseas cweþendeforhwon leorneras þine ofergæþ gesettnisse þara ældra ne thuað honda heora þonne hiæ hlaf etaðhe þa ondswarade cwæþ to heom forhwon & ge ek ofergæþ bebod godes for gesettnisse eowrewiotudlice forþon god cwæþ are fæder þinum & moder þin & seþe wærge fæder oþþe moder deaða swælteþge þonne cweðaþ swa hwa swa cwið to fæder oþþe moder lac swa hwilc swa is of me þe beðearfeþ& ne ariað fæder his & moder his & ge ungænge gedydon bebod godes for settnisse eowrum& þa forletende þara mengu astag on scipe & cuom in mæru magedan& eodun to him fariseas & sadduceas costende & bedon þætte he taken of heofune eaude heom& he andswarade heom & cwæþ geworden efenne ge cweoþað smylte þis biþ forþon read is þe heofun & an mergenne read is forþon þe heofun& todæge biþ hreanis readaþ forþon unrotlice þe heofun ge liceteras ondwliotu soþlice heofun doeme cunnað vel cunnað gedoeme tacen wiotudlice & tide ne magun gecnawancneuris yfle tacen & sio forlegene soeceþ & tacen ne bið sald hie nymþe tacen iona se witga & forletende hie awegeode& þa cuomun leorneras his ofer sæ forgetun þæt he/ hlafas genomecwæþ heom to be healdeþ eow & warniaþ wið beorma farissea & sadducea& hie þohtun betwion heom cweþende forþon vel ðy we hlafas ne genomanða wiste wiotudlice se hælend geþanc heora & cwæþ hwæt þencaþ ge betwion eow medmiclæs geleafa menn forþon þæt ge hlafas ne habbaþsoþ ic sæcge eow sindun sume of þæræ her stondendra þa þe ne bergaþ deað ærþon he geseo sunu monnes cymende in rice his& geworden wæs æfter dagum sex genom hælend & & broþer his & lædde hie on dune hea sundur vel niðer& oferheowad wæs beforan heom & scan ondwliota his swa sunne hrægl þonne his wurdon hwit swa snau& henu æteawde heow & wiþ hælend sprecendeondswarade þa cwæþ to hælend dryhten god his þæt we her sie gif þu wille gewyrce we her ðreo selescotu ðe an & an & anþende he þa gespræc henu wolken liht oferscuade hie & henu stæfn of þæm wolcne cweþende þis is sunu min se leofa in ðæm me wel gelicade him ge geherað& geherende þa leorneras feollan on ondwliotu hiora & heom ondreordun swiðe& þa eode se hælend & æthran heom & cwæþ to heom arisaþ & eow ne ondredaþhebbende vel ahofan þa egan heora nænigne segun nymþe se hælend ennewe þonne þyles geincfulligæ hiæ gang to sæ & send hoc ðin & þone fisc ðe þe ærest uppastigað genim & ontyn muð his gemoetest ðær scilling genim þonne selle heom for mec & ðecon þære hwile eodun þa leorneras to hælend cweþende hwa wenest nu mare sie in heofuna rice& tocegende hælend cnæhtas sette þonne in midlæ heora& cwæþ soþ ic sæcge eow nymþe ge gewerfe beon & gefremmende swa cnehtas ne gæþ ge in rice heofunasforþon swa hwa eadmedaþ hine swa cneht þios þe is mare in rice heofunas& seþe ondfoeþ anum cnæhte swælce in noma minum me ondfoeþseþe þonne afælleþ enne lytlera þissa ðe in mec gelefaþ beþearfeþ him þæt ahongen sie cwern esules on swira his & he se besenked on grunde seæswa soþlice middangeard þios from fælnissum ned is forþon cumende æswic hweþre þonne wa þæm menn þe þurh hine æswic cymeþgif þonne honde þine oþþe foet þine æswiceþ vel fælleþ ðec asceorf hine & weorp from ðe god is ðe anhende to life oþþe healt þonne twa honda oþþe twa foet hæbbende sie sended in ecce fyrswæ & swilce fæder min se heofunlica doeþ eow gif ge ne forletaþ anra gehwylc broþer his of eortum eowrum& gelamp þa geendade se hælend word þas geleorde he from galilea & cwom in mære iudeana be londe iordane& fylgadun him mængu monige & gehælde hie þær& cwomun to him fariseas costade his & cweþende mot mon forletan wif his for ænigum intingehe ondswarede cwæþ to heom ah ge ne reordade þæt seþe worhte from fruman god wepned & wif geworhte hiæ god& cwæþ for þon ðingum forleteþ monn fæder & moder & ætclifað his wife & beoþ twægen in lice anumforþon ne sindun twægen ah an lic þætte þonne god gegadrade mon ne sceadecwædun hie ah hwæt moyses bebead þæt monn salde boec aweorpnisse & forletecweþ he to heom forþon þe moyses to heardnisse heortan eowre let eowic forletan wif eowra from fruman þonne ne wæs swæmonige þonne beoþan þa ærestu nehstu & þa næhstu ærestugelice is rice heofunas monn fæder hina ðæm ðe eode on ærnemorgen bycgæ wyrhta in wingeard his& þa geþingadun wið þæm wyrhtum be dinere deglicum sende hio in þone wingeard& uteode æt þære ðridda tid vel hwile gesæh oþre standende on protbore unnytte& cwæþ to heom gæþ ge ek in wingeard mine & þætte reht biþ ic selle eow hie þa eoduneft uteode æt þæm sextan & þæm nigoþan tide vel hwile & dyde geliceæt þære ællefta soþlice tide þa eode ut & gemette oþre standende& cwæð to þæm hwæt stondeþ ge her unnytte ealne dæg cwædun hie forþon nænig usic mið leane gebohte cwæþ to heom gaþ ge ek swilce in wingeard mineþa hit þa efen geworden wæs cwæþ he se hlaford þæs wingeardes to his geroefa cege þæm wyrhtum & gef heom heora lean ingingende from þæm næhstum oþ þe ærestumiltsende þa heom se hælend & hran egum heora & sona gesegun & folgadun him& þa hiæ nealehctun hierusalem & coman to beþfage to oelebearwes dune þa hælend sende twægen leornerascwæþende to heom gað in þas cæstre þe beforan inc is & sonæ git moeteþ eosul gesælde & folan mid hire unsæleþ & ledað to me& gif hwa eow vel inc awiht tocwæþe sæcgaþ þæt dryhten heora ðearf & sonæ forleteð heoþæt þonne eall geworden wæs þæt gefylled wære þætte gecwæden wæs þurh essaiam se witga cwæðendesæcgaþ dohter sione henu cyningc þin cymeþ ðe monnðwære & sittende on eosule & folan sunu þære teomagangende þa dydon swa bebead heom hælend& tobrohtun eosula & fola & onbreddon on heo hrægl heora & hine onufan sittende dydunsio mæste þa mængu strægdun hrægl heora on þæm wege sume þonne sneddun telgran of treowum & strægdun on þæm wege& soecende hiæ þæt hine genoman ondreordun him mængu forþon þe hiæ swa wihtga hine hæfdun& ondswarade se hælend cwæþ efter bispellum heoragelice wearð rice heofunas monn cyninge þæm þe worhte gemunge sunu his& sende esnas his cegan þæm gelaðadum to þæm gemunge & noldan cuman& æft sende oþre esnas cwæþende sæcgað þæm gelaðadum henu undernmete min geiarwad fearras mine & foedelfuglas mine ofslægene & all iara cumaþ to þæm gemungæhiæ þa ne rohtun & eodun awæg sum in his tune sum þonne to ceapunge hiselle genoman esnas his & geonrettæ ofslogunse cyning ða he þæt gehyrde eorre wæs & sende hergas his & abriodde myrðra heora & burg heora forberndeþa cwæþ to æsnum his gemunge wæs iare ah þa þe gelaþade weron ne werun wyrðe& nænig mæhte geandwyrdan him worde ne heora nænig dyrste of ðæm dæge hine mæ geasciganþa se hælend spræc to mongum & to leorneras hiscwæþende on setule moyses setun bokeras & fariseas cwæþendeall soþlice swa hwæt swa ic sægce eow doð & haldeþ æfter þonne wærcum heora ne doð ge sægcaþ þanne & hi sylfe ne doðbindaþ þonne byrþenne hæfige & unondhoife & setteþ on exlan monna fringre þonne heora nylleþ þa styrganall heora wærc þonne wyrcaþ þæt hie siæ gesæne from monnum ðe hiæ brædaþ forþon þwænga heora & micclaþ fasu hioralufigaþ þonne þæt æreste sætil æt efengereordum & forþmestu setulas on heora somnungum& hælettungæ on gemote & beon nemde from monnum lareuge þonne nyllaþ beon nemde larewas an is forþon eower lareuw alle þonne gebroþre sindunic sæcge forþon eow ne geseoþ ge mec sie þæt ærþon ge cweoþan gebloetsad seþe cwome in noman dryhtnes& utgangande hælend of temple eode & him eodun to leorneras his þæt eawden him getimbru þæs templeshe þa ondswarde & cwæþ heom to ge geseoþ þas eall soþ ic eow sæcge ne bið læfed her stan ofer stane þæt he sy toworpensæt þa he on oelebearwes dune eodun to him leorneras his degullice cweþende sæge us hwanne þas beoþ & hwylc tacun þines cymes & geendunge weorulde& þa ondswarade se hælend cwæþ heom to geseaeþ þæt nænig eow forlæreforþon þe monig cumaþ in minum noma cwæþende ic eam crist & monige forlæræþforþon þe ge bioþ geherende gefæht & hlisu gefæhta geseaeþ þæt ge sy gedræfde sculon forþon þas weorþan ah nis þonne get endeariseþ forþon þeod on ðeode & rice on rice & beoþ adle & hunger & eorþhroernisse geond stowaþas þonne eall onfruma sindun sares& hine gedælaþ & dæl his seteþ mið liceterum þær biþ heaf & gristbitung toðaða gelic biþ rice heofunas ten femnan þa genimende leohtfatu vel ðecele heora eoden ut ongægn brydguma & brydefife þonne þaræ werun dysige & fife snottreah ða fife dysige genimænde þa leohtfatu heora ne genoman oele mid hiæþa snottre þonne genoman oele in fatu heora mið þæm lehtfatumælde þa se brydguma slepade ealle & slep ofereodeæt middere niht þa cirm l cleopung geworden wæs & henu brydguma cymeþ gæþ ut ongægn himþa arisan ealle þa femnan & ingunnon fretwan leohtfatu heoraþa dysege to þæm snottrum cwedun sellaþ us of oeles eowres forþon þe lehtfætu ure adwæsced sindun& gaþ hiæ in æce tintergu þa soþfeste þonne in æce lif& geworden wæs þa geendade se hælend word þas eall cwæþ se hælend to his leornerasge wutan þæt æfter twæm dagum beoþ eastran & monnes sunu bið sald þæt he sie ahongenþa werun gesomnade alduras sacerdas & þa aeldra þæs folkes in cæfertun þæs aldorsacerdæs seþe wæs haten caifas& geþæhtunge dydon þæt hy se hælend inwit noman & ofslogenhy cwædun þonne nællæs in symbeldæge þyles ungerec vel ungeþwære in þæm folce gewyrdemid þy þonne þende se hælend wæs in bethania þæm tune in huse simonis þæs hreofanþa cwom to him an wif hæbbende stæna fulle smirenisse deorwyrþe & ageat ofer his heafud hlengendes æt gereordumþæt gesægon þa leorneras abælgede werun cwæþende to hwon is ðeos forwyrd& þa gemunde petrus word þas hælendes þe he cwæþ ærþon hona cræd þriuwa me ondsacast & gangende ut weop bitterliceþa hit þa morgen wæs in þæhtunge eodun ealle aldursacerdæs & ældre þæs folces wið þæm hælend þæt hine to deaþe salden& gebundene læddun hine & saldun pontiscan pylato þæm geroefæþa geseah iudas se þe hine salde þæt he niðrad wæs mid hreownisse lædde & brohte eft ðritig scyllinga aldursacerdum & þa eldran þæs folces& cwæþ ic gefirinade sellende blod þæt soþfæste cwædun hye hwæt is us þæt locæ þu& þa wearp he þa scillingas in templ gewat & þonan gangende awyrgde hineþa aldursacerdas þa genoman þa scillingas & cwedun ne mot heo mon sende in temples feh forþon þe þæt is weorð blodes& þa to geþæhtunge eodun gebohtun mið þæm lond tigle vel lamwyrhte to bebyrgenne elðeodigraforþon wæs næmned þæt lond acheldemach þæt is blodes lond oð þeosne dæghiæ þa awæggangende mid heordum geoldun þa byrgenne gemerkade þon stan mid heordumon efenne þa þæs restedægas þæm þe inlihte in forma dæg æfter restedæg cwom maria magdalenisca & oþer maria to sceawenne þa byrgenne& henu eorþstyrennis gewarð micelu ængel forþon dryhtnes astag of heofunum & togangende awælede þone stan & gesett on þæmwæs þa his onseone swa leget & wæda vel rægl his hwit swa snaufor his ægsa þonne afirde werun þa weardas & geworden swa deadeandswarade þa se engel cwæþ to þæm wifum ne forhtige eow ic wat forþon þæt git hælend þone þe hongen wæs gesoecaþnis he her forþon þe he aras swa he cwæþ cumaþ & geseoþ þa stowe þær aseted wæs dryhten& hiæ eodun hraþe of byrgenne mið egsa & mið gefea micel eornende secgan discipulas hislærende hiæ to healdene eall swa hwæt swa ic bebead eow & henu ic mid eow eam ealle dagas oð to ende weorulde endeþ soþlice endeþ soþ endeþon fruma godspelles hælendes cristes sunu godesswa awriten is in esaia þone witgu henu ic sende engel min beforan onseone þine seþe foregearwað weg þinrestemn cliopande in westenne gearwigað weig drihtnes rehte wyrcaþ vel doað stige vel gongas hiswæs iohannes in westenne gefulwade & bodade fullwiht hreownisse in forgefnisse synna& færende wæs vel foerde to him alle iudeas londe & ða hierosolimisca alle & gefullwade from him in iordanes streame ondetende synna heora& wæs iohannes gegerelad l gewedad mið herum cameles & gyrdels fellenne ymb lendenu his & waldstapan vel loppestra & wudu huniges þæt wæxeþ on wude bendum & þæt brucende wæs& bodade cweþende cymeþ dom strongre mec æfter me ðæs vel his nam ic wyrðe forehlutende undon vel loesan þwongas gescoas hisic fulwade eowic in wætre he wiotudlice gefulwað eowic mið gaste halgum& aworden wæs in dagum ðæm cyom þe hælend from nazareð þære byrig to galilea & gefulwad wæs in iordanen from iohanne& onstyde astag of wætre geseh ontynde heofunas & gastes halga swilce culfra of dune stigende & wuniende in him vel in ðæm& stæfn geworden wæs of heofune þu eart sunu min leof on ða ic wel licade& sona ðe gast draf hine on westen& wæs on westen feowertig daga & feowertig næhta & wæs acunnad from þæm wiðerwearda wæs mið wilde deorum & englas geþegnedon vel herdon himæfter þon wutudlice gesald wæs iohannes com se hælend in galilea bodade godspelles rice godes& cweþende forþon gefylled is tide & togenealacede rice godes hreowsiaþ & gelefaþ in godspell& færende bi sæ galilea gesæh simonem þæt is petrus & andreas broðer his hia sendende nett on sæ werun forþon fisceres& cwæþ heom to se hælend cumaþ æfter me & gedoa eowic þæt ge beoþan vel ge seon fisceres monnum& ricenlice mið þy forleten nett fylgende werun him& foerde þonan lytel hwon gesæh iacobus zebedes sunu & iohannes broðer his & þa ilca vel hia in scip gesetton þæt nett& sona vel ðariht geceigde hia & mið þy forlet fæder his zebedeus in scipe mið þæm hyremonnum fylgende wærun him& infoerdun capharnaum þære byrg & sona restedagas infoerde vel ineode to somnungum gelærde hia& swigadun vel stylton ofer lære his wæs forþon lærende hia swilce vel swa hæmæhte hæfde & no swa uðwutu& wæs in somnungum heora monn in gaste unclænum & oft cleopadecwæþende hwæt us & ðe þv hælend ðæ nazarenisca come þu to losane vel lorene usic ic wat hwæt þu þu eart halig god& bebeod vel beboden is him se hælend cwæðende swiga þu & gaa of ðæm menn gast unclæne& bitende vel bat hine gast ðe unclæne & ofcliopande stæfne micelre vel miccle & ofeode from him& wundrende wærun alle þus þætte hie frugno vel ascadun betwihc heom cweþende hwæt þæt is þis hwilc lar þios vel ðas niowa is forþon in mæhte & gastum unclænum hataþ & edmodað him& sprang vel foerde mersung vel merðo his sona vel instyde vel ræþe in eallum þem& recene foerde of somnunga comon in hus þæt is petrus & andreas mið iacob & iohannesgelegen wæs wutudlice swægre þæt is petrus fefer drifende & ræþe cwedun to him of þæm l of þære& com geneolacede ahof ða ilca & mið þy gegripen wæs hond his & ricenlice forlet hio hal from ridesohte vel gedrif & geþæignade heomæfen wutudlice þa gewarð mið þy to sete eode sunne gefoerdun vel brohtun to him alle þa yfle hæbbende & deoful hæbende& wæs alle cæstre vel burg gesomnad to dore vel geat& lecnade monige þa þe werun geswæncte missenlicum adlum & deofles monige he fordraf vel afirde & ne let him sprecan forþon he wisten hine& on æringe swiðe aras & foerde vel færende eode in westige stowe vel steyde & ðer gebed& fylgende wæs him simon & þaðe mið him wærun& miþ ðy onfundun hine cwædun to him forþon alle soecaþ ðe& cwæþ to heom se hælend ga we vel wutu gangan in þa nehsto lond & þa cæstre þætte & ec ðær ic bodige & to ðisse forþon ic com& wes bodande in somnungum heora & alle galile & deoflas fordraf vel forwarp& com to him licþrowere bed vel bidende him & mid cneu begende vel beginge cwæþ gif ðu wilt þu mæh me geclensigese hælend witudlice þa wæs miltsende him gerahte honda his & hran him cwæþ to him ic wille geclænsie& mið þy cwæþ hræþe foerde from him þe hriofal & geclensad wæs& beboden wæs him hræþe & draf hine& cwæþ to him gesih ðu nænegum menn sæcge vel cweþe ah gaa æteaw þe ðæm aldor sacerd & agef for clænsunga þine þaþe heht moyses in cyþnisse ðæmsoð he foerde ongan bodige & mærsige word þus þæt wutudlice ne mæhte eawunga in ða ceastre ingangan vel ineode ah butan in westigum stowum wære & gesomnadun vel efnecomon to him æghwonan from æghwilcum halfe& æftersona vel hræðe infoerde vel ineode capharnaum þe byrig æfter dagum & gehered wæs þætte in huse wære& efne comon monige þus þætte ne mæhte foan vel nioman ne to dore vel to geæte & sprecende wæs heom vel him word& comon toferende vel brengende to him þone eorðcrypel seðe from feowrum wæs geboren& mið þy hi ne mæhtun gebringan hine him for mengo genacadun vel unwreogon þæt hus vel þa bere þær he wæs & openedon vel opnende dydon adunesendun vel settun þa bere in ðære þe eorðcrypel læg vel licgende wæsmið þy gesæh þonne se hælend geleafa heora cwæþ to þæm eorðcrypele sunu forgefen beoþan ðe synne þineweron wutudlice þær sume of uþwutum sittende & ðencende vel smeande in heortum heortumhwæt þes ðus vel swa sprecaþ heo folsaþ hwa mæg forgeofan vel forletan synne nymþe ane godof þon sona onget se hælend gast his þætte swa þohton vel smeadon betwih heom cwæþ to heom hwæt þas ge þencaþ in heortum eowrumhwæt is eþre vel eaður to cweþanne þæm eorðcryple forgefen beoþun þe synne þine oþðe cweþan aris & nim vel ber bere þine & gaaþæt witud witaþ ge þætte he mæhte hæfeð sunu monnes on eorþa forgefnisse synne cwæþ to þæm eorðcrypleðe ic sægce aris & nim bere þine & gaa to huse þinum& instyde he aras & underleat bere eode beforan allum swa þætte ofwundradun alle & þa worþadun god cweþende þætte hia næfre þus vel swilc ne gesegun& færende wæs æftersona ec to sæ eall þa þreat cymende to him & lærde hia& mið þy þonan foerde gesæh sittende to geafolmonunge & cweþ to him folgam vel fylge me & aras fylgende wæs him& geworden wæs mið þy gehlionade in huse ðæs monige openlice synninge vel hehsunne & synnfulle ætgædre gereston vel hleonadun mið ðon hælend & ðegnum his weron forðon monigu ðaðe & fyligdun vel fylgende werun him& uðwutu & ða aldu gisegun forðon ðæt he ett vel etende wæs mið ðæm synfullum & bærsynnigum hie cwedun ðegnum his for hwon mið bærsunnigum & synfullum etest & drinces larow iowermið ðy giherde ðis ðe hælend cwæð to him ne nedðærfe habbas hælo to lece ah ðaðe yfel habbas ne forðon com ic to ceganne soðfæste ah synfylle& werun ðegnas iohannes & ða aldu fæstende & comun & cwedun him forhwon ðegnas iohannes & ða aldu fæstende ðine wutudlice ðegnas ne fæstas& cwæð to him ðe hælend ahne ne magun sunu ða hwile ðe brydguma mið him is fæstende swa longe tide habbas mið ðone brydguma ne magun fæstacumað ðonne dagas mið ðy ginumen bið from him ðe brydguma & ða hia fæstas in ðæm dagumnænig forðon niowes flyhtes siowes giwedo vel gigerelu aldu oðeru ðing fromnimeð fylnisse niowe from aldun & mara toslitnesse bið& nænig mon sendeð win niowe in byttum aldum mara woen tosliteð ðæt winn ða bytte & ðæt win agoten bið & ðio bytte losed ah ðæt win niowe in byttum niowe sendes is rehtlic && giworden wæs eftersona mið ðy sunnadæge eode ðe hælend ðerh & ðegnas his ongunnun forðgonga &ða aldu wutudlice cwedun him heono hwæt doað ge on sunnadæge ðætte nis alefed& cwæð to him næfre ne liornades vel ne liornadun hwæt dyde dauið ða hnedbihoefe haefde & hycrende he & ðaðe mið hine werunhwa ineode in hus godes under abiathar aldor sacerda & hlafas foregigeorwadæ gibrec ðe neron alefed to eotanne nymðe anum sacerdum & salde ðæm ðe mið hine werun& cwæð to him dæg for monum giworden wæs & næs mon fore ræstedægforðon hlafard is sunu monnes ec to ræstedæge& ineode eftersona in somnunga & wæs ðer mon hæfde honda dryge& biheoldun hine gif he halges dæges gigemde ðæt hie teldun vel niðradun hine& cwæð to ðæm menn hæbbende honda dryge aris in middum& cwæð to him gif is alefed on ræstedagum wel wyrca vel yfle ða sawle hale gidoa vel loesiga soð hia swigadun& ymbsceowadun hine miððy unrotsade ofer ungleownissise heorta hiora cwæð to ðæm menn aðene honda ðine & aðenede & eft gibeted wæs honda him& ða eodun ðona wutudlice sona ða pharisei mið herodes ðegnum ðæhtunge hie dedun wið him hu hine loesiga mæhtun& ðe hælend mið ðegnum his foerde to sæ & monige ðreatas of galilea & of iudeum fylgende wærun him& from hierusalem & from idumeum & ofer iordanes & ðaðe ymb tyri & sindone mengu micle herende werun vel giherdun ðaðe he wyrcende wæs comun to him& cwæð to ðegnum his ðætte scip him gibrohtun vel herdun for ðæm mengum ðæt hie ne fortredun hinemonige forðon he gihælde ðus ðætte hie ræsdun on hine ðæt hiæ him gihrionun swa feolu ðonne hæfde uncuð aiðulo& gasta unclænra mið ðy hine gisegun gifeollun vel lutun to him & cliopadun cweðende ðu arð sunu godes& swiðe bibead him ðæt hie ne eowde him& astag on mor cegde to him ða ilcu walde he & comon to him& dyde ðætte hie were twelfe mið him ec & ðætte sende hie to bodanne& salde him mæhte gemnisse to untrymnissum & toworpnisse diowla& gisette to simoni noma petres& iacobus zebedes suno & iohannes broðer iacobes & gisette him noma ðæt is suno ðunres& andreas & philippus & batholomeus & matheus & thomas & iacobus & thadeus & ðone cananisca& iudam ðone scariothisca seðe salde hine& cumað to huse & efnecomun eft sona ðio mengu ðus ðæt hie ne mæhtun ne hlaf brucca& mið ðy giherde his eodun to haldanne hine cwedun forðon ðætte on wræððo giwcerred wæs& uðwutu ðaðe from hierusalem astigun vel ðona comun hie cwedun ðætte vel forðon belzebub hæfes & forðon on aldor diowla gidrifes diowlo& efne gicegde ða ilcu in bispellum cwæð to ðæm vel him huv mæg he ðe wiðerworda diowul ðone diowul fordrifa vel afælla& gif ðæt rice in him todæled bið ne mæg stonda rice ðæt& gif hus ofer hie solfe tostrogden bið ne mæg hus ðæt ilce stonda& gif ðe wiðerworda efne arises in hine solfne toworpen wæs vel bið & ne mæg gistonda ah ende hæfeðnænig mon mæg vel mæhte fato stronge inga vel ingonga in hus to niomanne vel ginioma vel gireofiga nymðe ærist gibinde ðone strongu & ðonne hus his reofigesoð ic cweðo iow ðætte alle forgefen bioðun sunum monna vel forleten synne & hie eofolsadun of ðæm hie eofulsadunseðe ðonne eofolsas on halge gastes ne hæfes forgefnisse in ecnisse ah synnig vel scyldig bið ðære ecan scyldforðon hie cwedun ðon gast unclæne hæfeð& comun moder his & broðro & ute stondas sendun to him cegende vel cegdun to him& gisæt vel setun ymb hine ðe ðreatt & cwedun him heono moder ðin & broðro ute soecas ðec& ondsworade him cwæð hwæt is moder min & broðro mine& ymb locade vel sceowade hie vel ða ðaðe utan ymb heop his setun cwæð heono moder min & broðro mineseðe forðon doeð willu godes ðes broðer min & swester min & moder is& eftersona ongan læra & to sæ & gisomnad wæs to him mengu ðreatas swa ðætte in scip astag gisette on sæ & all ðe ðreat ymb sæ ofer eorðo wæs& lærde hie in bispellum monigum & lærde hie in lare hisgiherde heonu eode ðe sedere vel sawend to sawend& mið ðy giseow oðer vel sum gifeol ymb ða strete & comun flegende & fretun vel etun ðætoðer vel sum soðlice gifeol ofer stenere ðer ne hæfde eorðo & hræðe upiornende wæs forðon ne hæfde heonisse eorðo& ða aras vel uparnende wæs sunne & drygde vel forbernde & forðon ne hæfde wyrtruma adrugade& oðer gifeol in ðornas & astigun vel upeadun ðornas & underdulfun ðæt & wæstem ne salde& oðro gifeol on eorðo gode & salde wæstem stigende & wexende & tobrohte an vel enne ðritig & an sextig & an hundreð& he cweð seðe hæfeð earu to giheranne gihere& mið ðy wæs syndrigum gifrugnun hine ðæt ðaðe mið hine werun mið twelf bispellum& cwæð to him iow gisald is ðæt giwite rice godes ðæm ðonne ðaðe ute werun in bispellum alle bioðonðæt gisegun giscead & ne giseas & ða giherend giheras & ne oncnawað/ ðy læs gihwerfed vel gicerred bioðon & bið forgefen him synne& cwæð to him ne cunno ge bispell ðas & huu alle bispell l gicunniga magun gicunnigaseðe saweð word saweððas wutudlice arun seðe ymb woeg ðer gisawen bið word & mið ðy giherdun sona com vel cymeð ðe wiðerworda & giniomað word ðætte gisawen wæs in heorta iowrum& ða sint gilice ðaðe ofer stænere sawen vel sawende bið ðaðe mið ðy giherdun word sona mið glædnisse onfoas ðæt& ne habbað wyrtruma in him ah tide wexende werun sona mið ðy aras costung & oehtnisse fore worde sona vel hræðe giondspurnad bið& oðre sindun ðaðe in ðornum sawas ða sint ðaðe word giherað& telnisse weorlde & losewest willana & ymb æfter vel oðero lust vel giornisse ineodun underdelfas word & buta wæstme gimoetid bið& ða sint ðaðe ofer eorðo gode gisawene sindun ða sindun ðaðe giheras word & onfoað & wæstmas an ðritig & an sextig & an hundreð& he cwæð to him ahne vel hwer cymeð lehtfæt vel ðæcela ðætte under mitta vel fæte bið giseted ðætte under bedde ahne ðætte ofer lehtiserne giseted biðne forðon is ænig gidegled ðætte ne æteowed ne bið ne giworden wæs degle ah ðætte in eowunga cymeðgif hwelc hæfeð eara hernisse giheras& cwæð to him giseað hwæt ge giheras in swa hwelce giwege giwegen gi bioðon eft giwegen bið iow & gisald vel gieced bið iowseðe forðon hæfeð gisald bið him & seðe ne hæfeð wutudlice ðætte hæfeð ginumen bið from him& he cwæð ðus is rice godes huu swa gif mon worpes ðone sawende on eorðo& slepiað & arisas on næht & on dæge & sed weceð vel wyrtrymað & wexeð ða hwile ne watt ðelustum forðon eorðo wæstmas ærest gers æfter ðon ðone ðorne soðða full hwæte in ehher& mið ðy hine forðbrohte wæstem sona sende ripisern forðon com ripes tide& cwæð to hwæm we gilicletan welle rice godes vel to hwæm ða bispel mið ðy we gigeorwigas ðætswa is þætte corn senepes ðæt mið ðy gisawen wæs on eorðu lytel is allum sawendum ðaðe sind on eorðu& miððy gisawen astigeð & bið mara allum grasum & wyrceð vel doeð telgo vel twigo micle ðus þæt hie magun under scua his fuglas heofnes bya vel wunige& mið ðuslicum monigum bispellum hie spreocað to him word swa swiðe hie mæhtum giherabuta bisine wutudlice ne wæs sprecende to him syndrige wutudlice ðegnum his he sægde alle& cwæð to him on ðæm dege mið ðy efern wæs giworden fere we ofer togægnes& forleortun ðone here toginomun swa ðætte hiæ werun in scipe & oðro sciopu werun mið him& giworden wæs wind vel yst micelo windes & yð færende vel sendende in ðæt scip sende ðætte gifylled wæs ðæt scip& wæs he vel ðe in scipe on vel ofer bolstre slepende & awehtun hine & cwedun to him larow ne to ðe gibyreð forðon ðæt we deade vel ne reces ðu ðah we deade sie& arisende ðe stiorend wæs windes & cwæð to ðæm sæ swiga wes dumba & blan vel reste ðe wind & giworden wæs smyltnisse micelo& cwæð to him hwæt forhte aron ge ne gett habbas ge gileofu& ondreordun mið micelre fyrhto & cwedun bitwion him hwa woenestu is ðes forðon & wind & sæ herað vel eðmodað him& comun ofer swira vel ofer luh sæs in lond gerassenorum& mið ðy eode to him of scipe togægnes arn him of byrgennum vel of bendum monn in gaste unclænumseðe hus vel byinge lytle hæfde in byrgennum & ne racantegum hwile ænig mon hine mæhte gibindaforðon oftust mið feoturum & mið racontegum gibunden wæs toslat ða racontege & ða feoturo forbræc vel toscænde & nænig mæhte hine temna vel gihalda& symle on næht & on dæge in byrgennum & on morum wæs cliopende & falletende hine on stanumgisæh wutudlice ðone hælend feorra togiarn & to worðanne hine& cliopade stefne micelre cwæð hwæt me & ðe ðu hælend sunu godes ðæs hesta ic halsigo ðec ðerh god ne mec ne wreccecwæð forðon to him gaa gast unclæne from ðæm menn& gifrægn hine hwæt ðe noma is & cwæð to him here noma me is forðon monige we sindun& biddende wæs hine longe ðæte he hine fordrife butta ðæt londwæs wutudlice ðer ymb ðone mor worn berga vel swina micelra foedende& bedun hine gastas cweðende send usih in ða bergas ðætte we in hia ingonge vel ingæ& gilefde him sona ðe hælend & mið ðy færende werun gastas unclæne ineodun in ða bergas & micle ræse vel ongonge worn todrifen wæs on sæ to twæm ðusendum & adrencte weren on sæseðe wutudlice foedde hie giflugun & sægdun in ðær cæstre & on londum & færende werun to seanne hwæt were ðæs werches& comun to ðæm hælend & gisegun hine vel ðene seðe from diowlum gibered wæs sittende giclænsad & hales giðohtes & ondreordun& sægdun ðæm ðaðe gisegun hwelc giworden were & seðe diowol hæfde & of bergum& bidda hine ongunnan ðætte he afirde from gimærum hiora& mið ðy astigun in ðæt scip ongan hine gibidda seðe from diowle awæled wæs ðætte were mið him& ne forleorte hine ah cwæð to him gaa in hus ðin to ðinum & to sæcganne him hu micel ðe drihten dyde & milsende sie ðin& eade & ongan bodiga in ðær byrig hu micel him dyde ðe hælend & alle giwundradun& mið ðy oferstag ðe hælend in scip eft ofer ða luh efnecomun ðreatas monige to him & wæs ymb ðone sæ& com sum mon of hehsomnunge ginemned wæs iarus & gisæh hine gifeal vel leott to fotum his& bæd hine longe cweðende forðon vel ðætte dohter min in ytmestum is sete on honda ofer hie ðætte hal sie & hio lifge& eode mið him & fylgende him ðreotas monige & onðrungun hine& wif seðe wæs in uutiornende blodes wintru twelfe& wæs monigu ðrowunga from swiðe monigum lecum & mið ðy gisald wæs alle hire ðinc ne æniht gihalp ah swiðor wyrse hæfdemið ðy giherde from ðæm hælend com in ðreott mið hond & gihran wedum hisgicwæð forðon forðon gif vel giwedum his ic gihrino ic biom hal& recone vel sona gidrugad wæs esprynge blodes hire & gifoelde mið lichoma ðætte gihæled were from adle& stod ðe hælend ongett on hine solfne ða mæhte seðe eode from him efnegicerde to ðæm folche he gicwæð hwelc hran giwedum minum& cwedun him ðegnas his vel ðæs ðu gisis ðone ðreot ðringende on ðec & ðu cweðes hwa mec gihran& ymbsceowade to giseane hia vel ða ilce ðe ðis dydeðæt wif wutudlice ondreord & forhtade wiste ðætte giworden were in hir com & gifeol bifora him & cwæð him allum ðætte soðostehe wutudlice cwæð him dohter gileofa ðin ðec hale gidyde gong in sibbe & wes hal from adle ðinumða geona he sprecende comon from ðæs folches somnungum cweðende forðon dohter ðin deod is hwæt leng vel forður styrestu ðone larowðe hælend wutudlice word ðætte gicweden wæs giherde cwæð to ðæm hehaldurmenn nelle ðu ðe ondreda ah ðæt ana nu gilefes& ne geleort ænigne monno to fylganne vel fylge him buta petre & iacobe & iohanne broðer iacobes& comun to husum ðæs aldormonnes & gisæh ða wanunga & woepende & mænende swiðe& ineode cwæð to him hwæt arun ge onstyred & hremas ðæt mægden ne is deod ah slepeð& inhlogun hine he hweðre mið fordrifnum allum ginom ðone fæder & moder ðæs mægdnes & ða ðe mið him werun & infoerde ðer wæs ðæt mægden licgende& giheold honda ðæs mægdnes cwæð to hir ðis is ebrisc word ðæt is gitrahtad on læden la dohter ðe ic sæge aris& sona aras ðæt mægden & eode vel gongende wæs wæs wutudlice wintra twelfe & forstyltun swigunge micelre& bibeod ðæm swiðe ðæt nænig mon wiste & cwæð sellas hir eata& foerde ðona eade in oeðel his & fyligdun him ðegnas his& giwarð haligdæg ongan in somnunga vel in sprece læra & monige giherdun giwundrade werun in larum his cweðende hwona ðas vel ðissum alle ðas is snytru vel hwelc gisald wæs him & mæhte ða ilcu ðaðe ðerh honda his gidoen bioðonah ne ðis is smiðes sunu & maria broðer iacobes & iosepes & iudas & simonis ah ne swester her usih mið sindun & onspyrnade werun in him& cwæð to him ðe hælend forðon ne is witga buta worðunge buta on oedle his & on cyððo his & in huse his& ne mæhte ðer ænig giwyrcan buta hwon untrymige mið onsetnum honda gongende vel gihælde& giwundrad wæs fore ungileoffulnisse hiora & ymbeode ða portas utan ymb gilærde& efne gicegde twelfe & ongan hiæ senda twoege & gisalde him mæhte gasta unclænra& bibeod him ðæt næniht hie gilædde on woeg butan gerde ane ne pohha vel posa ne hlaf ne on gyrdelse mæslenah giscoed mið ðwongum & ne gigeorwad were mið twæm tunucum& gicwæð to him swa hwider swa ge gaas in hus ðer wunað wið vel ðæt ge ge ðona& swa hwelc swa ne onfoeð iow ne giheres iow mið ðy gegas ðona scæcas vel drygas ða asca vel ðæt dust of fotum iowrum in cyðnisse him& mið ðy gieodun to him forbodadun ðætte hreonisse dedun& diowlas monige fordrifen & smiredun mið oele menigo untrymige & gihælde& giherde herodes cynig eowunga forðon giworden wæs noma his & cwæð forðon iohannes ðe fulwihtere eft aras from deaðe & forðon hia unwoene sint mæhte in himoðro wutudlice oðro soðlice cwedun witga is swelce an from witgummið ðy giherde herodes cwæð ðone ic ofceorf iohannen ðes from eft arasseðe forðon herodes sende & giheold iohannen & giband hine in cercerne fore herodiades lafe philippes broðer his forðon lædde hinecwæð forðon iohannes herodiade ne is gilefed ðe to habbanne lafe broðer ðinesherodiade wutudlice gisættnade him & walde ofsla hine ne mæhteherodes wutudlice ondreord iohannes wiste hine wer soðfæst & ðæt halig & giheold hine & giherde hine menigo he gidyde & lustlice hine giherdun& mið ðy dæge macalice gicom l gineolicade herodes cennisse his fearme dyde ðæm aldurmonnum & holdum & forwestum galilesmið ðy ineode dohter ðære herodiades & plægede & gilicade herode æc mið ðæm hlionendum cynig cwæð ðæm mægdne giowa from me ðætte ðu wylt & ic selo ðe& swor hir forðon forðon ðæte swa hwæt swa ðu giowas ic selo ðe ah ðe all half rice minðio mið ðy from eade cwæð to moeder hire hwæt giowigo ih welle & hio cwæð heofud iohannes ðæs fulwihteresmið ðy ineode sona mið oefeste to ðæm cynige wilnade cwæð ic wyllo ðætte recunlice ðu selle me on disce heofud iohannes ðæs fulwihteres& unrotsade wæs ðe cynig fore aðum giswornum & for eo mið restendum nalde hia unrotsigaah sende sceawere vel sceawende wæs heht to gibrenga vel tobrohte heofud his on disce & giceorf hine in carcerne& tobrohte heofud his on disce & salde ðæt ðæm mægdne & ðæt mægden salde moeder hiremið ðy giherdun ðegnas his comon & læddun lichoma his & settun ðæt in byrgenne& efne comun ða apostolas to ðæm hælende eft sægdun him alle ða ðe dydon & lærdun& cwæð to him cumað ge syndrige in woestige stowe & ræste him werun forðon ða ðe comun & eft comun monige & ne etes firste hæfde& astægdun on scip foerdun in woestig styd vel stowe sundrige& gisegun hie gongende & ongetun vel comun monige & foeðe men of allum cæstrum efnegiurnun ðider & bifora comon hie& eode gisæh micle ðreatas ðe hælend & milsende wæs ofer hie ða ðe werun swelce scip ne hæfdun hiorde & ongan læra hie feolu vel monige& mið ðy soðlice stondas monige werun togineolicadun ðegnas his cweðend him unbyed vel westig is stow ðis ec soð tide is foregieadforlet hia vel ða ðæt hie gonge in ða nestu gimæru & lond byccas vel ceopias him mett ða ðe eotas& ondsworade cwæð to him ðe hælend sellas ðæm iow mið to eotanne & cwedun him mið ðy eadun goncge we vel ga we mið peningum twæm hundreðum hlafa & selle we him to eotanne& cwæð to him hwæt hlafa habbas ge gað & giseað & mið ðy oncneowun cwedun to him fife & twoege fiscas& bibead him ðæt hiæ gisnide alle æfter ofer groenum hegge vel grese& gidældun hiæ in hundreð & ðerh fiftigum& mið ðy werun on efenne fif hlafum & locade on heofnas gibletsade & bræc ða hlafas & salde ðegnum his ðætte hie gisette bifora hiæ & twoege fiscas dælde allum& etun & alle & gifylde werun& ginomun ða lafe ðara scradunga twelf ceowlas fulle & of fiscewerun wutudlice ða ðe etun fif ðusend weorona& sona giðreatade ðegnas his to stiganne in scip ðæt hie foreeode hine ofer luh to ðær byrig ða hwile he forleorte ðæt folc& mið ðy forleort hie eade on mor gibidda& mið ðy efern & smolt wæs scip on middum sæ & he ana on eorðe& gisæh hie winnende in rowinge wæs forðon wind wiðerword him & ymb ða fearða wacune næhtes com to him ðe hælend gongende ofer sæ & walde bicerra hiesoð hie ðæt gisegun hine gongende ofer sæ hie woendun yfel wiht were & cliopadun vel cegdunalle ðaðe hine gisegun & gidroefde vel unrotsade werun & sona he sprecende wæs mið him & cwæð to him gilefas ic hitt am nallon ge ondreda& astag to him in scip & giblan vel sette ðe wind & forðor swiðe bitwih him styltun vel swigadun & ðreadunne forðon oncneowun of hlafum wæs forðon heorta hiora forblindad& mið ðy feordun ðerh comun on eorðu ðæs folches genesares & a to plica& mið ðy færende werun of scipe sona ongetun hine& ðerh urnun all lond vel ðeade ða ilcu ongunnun on berum hie ða ðe yfel hæfdun ymb beara ðer hie giherdun hine ðæt he were& swa hwider infoerde in lond vel in gimæru vel in cæstre in plæsum settun ða untrymigu & gibedun hine ðætte vel fæse giwedum his gihrionon & swa oftor gihrionun him hale giwurdun& mið ðy comon to him ða aldu & sume oðre of uðwutum cymende from hierusalem& mið ðy gisegun sume oðre of ðegnum his gimetelicum mið honðum ðæt is unðwægnum eotas hlafas forcwedun hiæaldu & alle iudeas buta oftor giðwogun honda ne etun giheoldon settnesse vel selnesse ældra& from ðingstowe se gifulwad ne etun & oðre monigu sindun ða ðe gisald arun him to haldanne fulwiht calice & onbora hiora && gifrægn hine aldormen & uðwutu cweðende forhwon ðegnas ðine ne gongas æfter gisetnisse ældra ah unclænum hondum eotað hlafassoð he ondworde cwæð him forðon wel gewitgade esaias of iow legerum swa awriten is folche ðis mið muðe minum mec weorðas heorte wutudlice hiora long from mein idelnisse wutudlice mec worðas gilærde larwas & bibodu monnaeft forleortun hine bibodu godes gihaldas setnisse monna fulwiht onbora hiora & calicæ & oðre gilice ðissum wundrum monig& cwæð to him wel bismerlice gidoas bibod godes ðætte selenisse iower gihaldasmoyses forðon cwæð worða fæder ðinne & moder ðine & seðe miscweðes feder vel moeder mið deaðe gideðed biðge wutudlice cweoðas gif hie cweoðas mon feder his vel moeder his gefe ðætte swa hwæt is of me ðe giwexe& lustum ne forgeofas him ænig giwyrce vel gidoe feder his vel moedereft ge toslitas word godes ðerh setnisse iower ðone gisaldun & bisine ðuslicu swiðe monigu gidoas& togicegde eft ðæt folc cwæð to him giheras ge mec alle & ongeotasnoht is buta monnum ingas in hine ðæt mæge hine giwidliga ah ða ðe of menn forcumas ða sindun ða ðe giwidligas menn vel ðone mongif hwelc vel hwa hæfeð earu to giheranne gihere& mið ðy ineode in hus from ðreote gifrugunum ðegnas his bispellum& cwæð to him swa ec & ge unhogu aron ge ne mið ðy oncnawas ge forðon alle ute ineode in ðone monno ne mæge hine giwidligaforðon ne ingað in heorte his ah in womba & inunn utgongum utgaas clænsias alle metascwæð wutudlice forðon ða ðe of men utgas ða giwidligas ðo monnofrom ionnawordum forðon of heorte monna sweaunga yfel oft cumað derne giligero unrehthæmed morðurslaguðiofento gitsunge unrehtwisnisse eswicnisse unscomfulnisse ego yfle eofulsongas oferhygd unwisdomalle ðas yfel from ionawordum fore cumað & widlas ðone monno& ða aras foerde in gimæru tyris & sidonis & ineode hus nænig mon walde wuta & ne mæhte gihælaðæt wif forðon sona ðætte giherde of him hire vel ðære hæfde dohter gast unclænne infoerde & forfeol to fotum hiswæs wutudlice wif ðæt hæðen ðæs sirophinisca cynnes & gibedun hine ðætte ðone diowul forwurpe of doehter hishe cwæð to ðæm lett vel blin ærist ðæt ðu gifoede ða suno ne is forðon good to onfoanne hlaf ðara sununa & sende hundumsoð hio ondsworade & cwæð him wutudlice la drihten forðon ec & hwelpas under beadum of screadungum hie eatas ðara cnæhtacwæð to hir fore ðissum worde gaa & eode ðe diowul of doehter hire& mið ðy gifoerde vel eade to huse gimitte vel fand ðæt mægden licgende ofer bedde vel ræste & ðæt diowul of eode& eftersona foerde of gimærum tyres com ðerh sidon to sæ galiles bitwih middum gimærum of decapolem& tolæddum him deofe & dumbe & gibedun hine ðætte he onsette hine honda& togigrap hine of ðæm ðreate synderlice sende fingras his in earliprica his & gibleow gihran tunga& onfeng on heofnum & cwæð to him ðæt is to untynsona ontynde werun earu his & unbunden wæs gibend tunga his & sprecende wæs rehtlice& bibead ðæm ilca ðæt he ænigum men gisægde swa swið wutudlice him forbead swa swiðor mara forðor hie bodadun& hine of ðon forðor togiwundradun ðus cweðende wel alle dyde & deofe dyde ðætte hia giheras & dumbe sprecunin ðæm dagum eftersona miððy ðreote monigra werun ne hæfdun ðæt ðæt hie etun vel eotan mæhtun efne gicedun ða ðegnas cwæðic milsa ofer ðreott forðon heonu ge ðrio dogor gebiddas mec ne habbas hie ðætte hie ete& gif ic forleto hie fæstende in hus hiora hie giloesigas on woege sume men forðon of ðæm feorra comun& giondwordun him ðegnas his hwona ðas mæg hwelc vel hwa her gifylle mið hlafum on woesterne& gifrægn vel ascade hiæ hwæt hlafa habbas ge hie cwedun siofune& bibeod ðæm ðreote to dælanne ofer eorðo & onfeng ða siofunæ hlafas ðoncunge dyde gibræc & salde ðegnum his ðætte togisette & togisetun hiæ& hiæ hæfdun lytelra fisca hwon & ða ilco gibletsade & giheht togisitta& etun & gifylde werun & ginomun ðæt gilæfed wæs vel ðæt to lafe wæs of ðæm screadungum siofu ceowlas fullewerun soðlice ðaðe etun swelce siofu ðusend & forleort hie& recone astag ðæt scip mið ðegnum his comun in dæl vel on lond ðære megðe& foerdun ða larwas & ongunnun efnegisoecan mið him ðætte hie sohtun from him becun of heofne costende hine& seafade vel mænde mið gaste cwæð hwæt cneorisse ðios soecað becun soðlice ic sægo iow ne bið sald cneorisse ðisser becun& forleort hie astag eftersona gifoerde ofer luh& forgetne werun ðegnas his onfenge hlafe & buta anum hlafe ne hæfdun mið him in scipe& bibeod ðæm vel him cweðende giseað & bihaldas from dærstum ðara ælarwa & from dærstum herodes& hia giðohtun him bitwion ðus cweðende forðon hlafas ne habbas weof ðon ongæt ðe hælend cwæð to ðæm hwæt smeogas ge forðon hlafas ne habbas ge ne gett oncnawas ge ne cunnan ða geona vel ðiostur vel blinde habbas ge heorta iowreego habbas ge ne giseas ge earu habbas ge ne giheras ne eft ðohtun gehwenne vel hu fif hlafas ic bræc in fif ðusend & hu monig monde ðara screadunga fulle ge ginomun cwedun him twelfehwenne & siofune hlafas in feower ðusendo hu monig ceowul ðara screadunga genomun & cwedun him siofune& he cwæð to him hu monige ða geona ge oncnawas& comun to beza & togilæddun him blinde menn & bedun hine ðætte him gehrine& tolahte honda ðæs blinda lædde hine buta ðæt lond & speoft in egu his onsetnum hondum his gifrægn hine gif hwelc hwoegnu gisege& uploccade cwæð ic gisiom menn vel ðæt treo gongendeæfter ðon sette honda ofer egu his & ongan gisea & eftniowad wæs swa ðætte gisege gleowlice alle& sende hine in hus his ðus cweðende gaa in hus ðin & gif in lond ðu gegonges nanum men ðu cyðe ðis& færende wæs ðe hælend & ðegnas his in cæstre cessares philipes & on woege gifrægn ðegna his cwæð to him hwelc mec cweoðas were ic mon ðesðaðe ondsworadun him cweðende iohannem ðe fulwihtere oðer helias oðer ec swelce enne of witgumða cwæð to him ge ec soðlice hwelc me cweðes ðæt ic sie giondsworade petrus cwæð him ðu arð crist& forbeod vel stiorde him ne engum gicwede of him& ongan læra hiæ forðon is rehtlic sunu monnes feolu giðoelge & forcuma from ældum & from hehsacerdum & uðwutum & ofsla & æfter ðrim dagum eft arisan& eowunga word sprecende wæs & togilahte hine petrus ongan giðreatiga hineseðe gicerde ymb & gisæh ðegnas his stiorende vel forbeodende wæs petre cweðende gong on bæclinc vel bihionda mec ðu wiðerworda forðon ne oncnawestu ðaðe godes sindun ah ðaðe sindun monna& cegende wæs ðæt folc mið ðegnum his cwæð to him gif hwelc welle æfter me fylga onsæce hine solfne & fylge mecseðe forðon welle sawle his hale gidoa loesigað hie seðe wutudlice losas sawla his fore mec & godspell hale hia gidoeðhwæt forstondes menn ðeh gistrione allne middengeard & losewest gidoe sawle hisvel hwæt vel huu seðleð mon hwerfes fore sawle hisse ðe forðon mec ondettende bið & mine word in cneoreswum ðassum dernegiligru & arognisse & sunu monnes ondeteð hine mið ðy cymeð in wuldor fadur his mið englum halgum& he cwæð to ðæm soð ic cweðo iow forðon sindun sume of her ðæm stondendum ðaðe ne gibirgeð ðone deoð oððæt hie giseað rice godes cymende in mæhte& æfter dagum sexum to ginom ðe hælend petrum & iacobum & iohannem & lædde hia on mor hehne syndrigne him ana & oferhiowad wæs bifora ðæm vel him& giwedo his gewordne werun scinende lixende swiðe swelce snaw swa aful ofer eorðu ne mæg is hwitu gidoa& æteowde ðæm helias mið moysen & werun sprecende mið ðone hælend& ondsworade petrus cwæð to ðæm hælende la larwa god is her us to wosanne & wyrce we ðria hus ðe an & moyse an & heliæ anne forðon wiste hwæt he cwæð weron forðon mið fyrhto gifyrhted& aworden wæs wolcen oferbrædde hie & com stefn of wolcne cweðende ðis is sunu min leof vel leofusta giherað hine& sona ymbloccadun nænig mon leng vel forðor gisegun butan ðæm hælende ana mið& ofstigendum ðæm of ðæm more bibeod ðæm vel him ðætte nænig ðaðe gisegun ða gisihðe gisægdun buta mið ðy sunu monnes from deaðe eft ariseð& ðæt word giheoldun mið him efne giffrugnun hwæt hit were mið ðy from deoðe aras& gifrugnun hine cweðende hwæt forðon cweoðas ælarwas & uðwutu forðon helias risenlic to cumanne æristse ðe ondsworade cwæð to him helias mið ðy cymeð ærest eft giboeteð alle & huu vel swa awriten is in sunu monnes þætte feolu giðolas & gihened vel giniðrad biðah ic sægo iow forðon helias cymeð & dydon him swa hwæt swa hie waldun swa awriten is of him& com to ðegnum his gisæh ðreotas micle ymb hiæ & uðwutu gifrugnun mið him& sona eghwelc vel alle ðæt folc gisæh hine gistylted wæs & ondreordun & ornun groetun hine& gifrægn hie hwæt bitwih iow gifregnas& ondworde an of ðæm ðreote cwæð la larwa to gibrohte sunu min to ðe hæbbende gast unclænnese ðe swa hwer hine gegripes he bites & slites hine & fæmeð & gristbites mið toðum & screpes & cweð ðegnum ðinum ðæt hie fordrife hine & ne mæhtunseðe ondworde him cwæð la cneorisse ungileofful ða hwyle mið iow ic biom ða hwile iow ic ðolo brengas hine to me& gibrohtun hine & mið ðy gisegun hine sona ðe gast gidroefde hine & mið ðy wæs gibered on eorðu he gifeald hine fæmende& gifrægn fæder his hu longe tide is of ðon ðis him gilamp soð he cwæð from cildhada& symle hine & in fyre & on wættre sende ðæt hine losade ah gif hwæt ðu mæge gihelp user wes milsende userðe hælend wutudlice cwæð to him gif ðu mæge gilefa alle almæhtga ðæm gilefas& sona gicliopade vel cegende wæs feder ðæs cnæhtes mið teorum he gicwæð ic gilefo tohelpe ungileoffulnisse mine& mið ðy gisæh ðe hælend ðone iornende ðreott gistiorende wæs ðæm gaste unclænum cweðende ðu la deofa & dumba gast ic ðe bibeodu gaa from him & forðor ðæt ðu ne ingæ in hine& cliopade swiðe & monige teorende hine gieode from him & giworden wæs swelce deod were swa ðætte monige cwedun ðætte deod is vel wereðe hælend soðlice giheold honda his & ahof hine & aras& mið ðy ineode & in hus ðegnas his degollice gifrægn hine forhwon we ne mæhtun fordrifan hine& cwæð to him ðis cynn nænige mæhte ofgonga buta on gibeodum & on fæsterne& ðona feordun bieodun galileæ nænig walde swa swa giwutahe gilærde wutudlice ðegnas his & cwæð to him ðætte sunu monnes gisald bið in hond monna & ofslas hine & mið ðy ofslægen bið ðe ðirda dæge eft arisessoð hiæ ne cuðun hine ðæt hie gifrugnun& comun to ðær byrig ðæ ðe mið ðy æt huse werun gifrægn hie hwæt hie on woege gitrachtadesoð hie swigedun gif hwa bitwion him on woege giteldun gif hwelc were ðara mara vel mast& eft sæt giceg twelfe & cwæð to him gif hwa welle foermest bið alra lætemest & allra embihtmon& onfeng ðone cnæht gisette hine in middum hiora ðonne ðætte cliopende were cwæð to himswa hwelc an of ðuslicum cnæhtes onfoeð on noma minum mec onfoeð & swa hwa swa mec onfoeð ne mec onfoeð ah ðene seðe mec sendegiondsworade him iohannes cweðende la larwa we gisegun sume oðre on noma ðinum forworpen mið diowlum seðe ne fylges us & forbudun himðe hælend wutudlice cwæð nallas ge forbeada him nængum is forðon seðe doeð mæhte on noma minun & mæge recone yfle spreoca of meseðe forðon ne is wið iow fore iowih isswa hwa forðon drinca giseleð iow of celce vel coppe wætres on noma minum forðon cristes arun soðlice ic sægo iow forðon ne losað mearde his& swa hwa giondspyrnas anum of ðissum læsestum gilefendum in mec god is him swiðor gif ðe sie unbunden vel unsæled bið cwearne byrðenne to swira his & on sæ gisended were& gif onspyrnas ðec honda ðin aceorf ða ilcu god is ðe unhal inga in lif ðonne twa honda hæbbe gonge in tintergu fyres inunadrysendlicðer wyrmas hiora ne biað deode & ðæt fyr ne bið gidrysnad& gif foett ðine ðec onspurnað ceorf hine vel ða god is ðe halt to gonganne in lif ece ðonne twoge foet hæbbe sende in tintergu fyres unadrysendlicðer wyrmas hiora ne biað deode & ðæt fyr ne bið drysnedðætte gif egu ðin giondspyrneð ðec giworp hie god is ðe blind to gonganne in rice godes ðonne tuu egu hæbbe gisende in tintergu fyresðer wyrmas hiora na bið deade & fyr hiora ne bið adrysnadeghwelc forðon mið fyre sie giscostad & eghwelc cwicu almes gicostad biðgod is ðæt sælt ðæt sie salt gif unful bið on ðon ðæt ge gihaldas habbað bitwih iow salt & sibbe habbas bitwih iow& ðone aras com in gimæru iudea bigeonda iordanen & gisomnadun eftersona to him & swa ðætte giwuna wæs eftersona lærde hie& to gineolicadun ða larwas gifrugnun hine gif is alefed were ðæt wif forleta cunnadun vel costadun hinesoð he ondwyrde cwæð him hwæt iow biboden wæs from moyseða ðe cwedun moyses forgæf boc ðætte were awriten & forletenðæm onwyrde ðe hælend cwæð to heardnisse heorta iowre awrat iow bibeod ðisfrom fruma wutudlice giscæfte wepnedmenn & wifmenn worhte hie godfore ðisse forletað mon fæder his & moder & gineolicas to wife his& bioðon twoege in lichoma ana forðon wutudlice ne sindun twoege ah ana lichomaðe hælend wutudlice cwæð to him gaa gileafa ðin ðec halne gidoes & sona gisæh & fyligde him on woeg& mið ðy togineolicadun hierusalem & bethania to more oelebeomes sende twoege of ðegnum his& cwæð ðæm gaa in cæstre ðætte ongægn iow iow & sona ingongas ðæt ge onfindes ðone fola gibundenne ofer ðone gett nænig mon gisætt unbindas ðone & togilædas& gif hwelc iow bicweðes hwæt doað ge cweoðas ðætte drihtne bihoefe vel nedðarf is & sona hine forletas hider& foerdun onfundun fola gibundenne bifora ðæn dore ute æt woega giletum & unbundun hine& sume of ðær stondendum cwedun him hwæt doas ge unbindas ðone folaðaðe cwedun him swa gihaten hæfde hia ðe hælend & forleortun hine& læddun ðone fola to ðam hælende & onsettun hine gigerlu his & sæt ofer himðio mengu wutudlice giwedo hiora bræddun vel legdun on woeg oðre ðonne ða twigu gibegdun vel rendun ða telge of ðæm treum & stredun on ðone woeg& ondworde & cwæð ðe hælend ne wutun ge ondworde ðe hælend cwæð to him ne ec ic cweðo iow in hwa hwelcer mæhte ðas ic dom& ongan ðæm vel him in bispellum spreaca wingeord gisette monn & ymbsalde seoðe & dalf seað & gitimbrade torr & ða agæf vel afæste ða ðæm londbigengum & feor gifoerde vel færende wæs& sende to ðæm londbigengum on tide esnes ðætte from ðæm londbuendum onfenge of wæstme wingeordesðaðe to gineolicadun him giðurscun & forleortun idelne& eftersona sende to him oðerne esne & ðone on heofud giwundadun & mið scomun miclum togiworhtun& eftersona oðerne sende & ec ðene ofslogun & monige oðre sume giðurscun oðre ec ofslogunða gett forðon an hæfde sunu leofne & hine sende to him æt ende vel lætemest cweðende forðo hie vel gefræpegadun sunu minneða byende wutudlice cwedun him bitwion ðis is erfeword cymas wutum we ofsla hine & usra bið ðio erfewordnis& gilahtun hine & ofslogun & giwurpun butu ðone wingeordalle forðon of him ðætte gimonigfaldade him sendun ðas wutudlice of henðum vel unspoedum hire alle ðaðe hio hæfde sende alle gibrengnisse hire& mið ðy færende wæs of temple cwæð him an of ðegnum his la larow sceawa vel gisih hulice stanas & hulic timber& onworde ðe hælend cwæð him gisih ðas alle micle girino vel glencas ne bið forleten stan ofer stane seðe ne sie tostrogden& mið ðy gisætt on more oelebeoma ongægn temple & gifrugnun hine synderlicesæge us hwenne ðas bioðun & ðæt becun bið hwenne ðas alle onginnað to endanne vel sie endade& onworde ðe hælend ongan cweoða him giseas ge ðætte nænig iow giswicemonige forðon cumað on noma minum cweðende ðætte ic am & monige hie giswicasmið ðy wutudlice giheras gifeht & wona vel mersunga ðara gifehta ne ondredas ge is reht vel hit sceal forðon wosa ah ne ða get is endearisað forðon cynn ofer cynne & rice ofer rice & bioðon eorðu hroernisse ðerh stowe & hungur vel fruma wercsare ðasðætte soðlice iow ic cweðo allum ic cweoðo wæccaswæs wutudlice eostru æfter twæm dagum & sohtun ða hehsacerdas & uðwutu hu hiæ hine giheoldun & ofslogun vel ofsla mæhtuncwedun forðon ne on dæge halgum ne ðæt gewoene ðæt mæge styrnisse giworða in ðæm folce& mið ðy wæs in bethania in huse groefa & gihlionade com wif hæbbende stanfæt ful ðære smirnisse ðæs stenches ðiorwyrðes & mið ðy gibrocen wæs ðæt stenna fæt todælde vel ageott ofer heofud hiswerun wutudlice sume hia bulgun vel unwyrðne sægdun bitwih him solfum & cwedun to hwon losewiste ðios smirnisse aworden wæsmæhte forðon smirnisse ðios wosa mara ðonne ðrim hundreðum peninga & sella ðorfendum & bigedon on hieðe hælend soðlice cwæð forletas hie hwæt hir hefge ge sint god werc wyrcende wæs on mecsymle forðon ðarfo ge habbas iowih mið & mið ðy ge welle ge magun ðæm wel doa mec wutudlice ne symle habbasðætte habbe ðios dyde fore com to smiranne lichoma minne to bibyrgnisse& sona eftersona ðe hona gisang & myndig wæs petrus wordes ðætte cweden wæs him ðe hælend ærðon ðe hona gisunge twiga ðrige ðu me onsæces & ongan woepa& sona on merne giðæhtunge worhtun ða hehsæcerdas mið ðæm ældrum & uðwutum & mið alle gisomnunge gibundun ðone hælend gilæddun & saldun ðæm aldormenn& gifrægn hine pylatus ðu arð cynig iudea soð he ondworde him cwæð ðu cweðes& gihendun hine ða hehsacerdas in monigum ðingumðe groefa ðonne eftersona gifrægn hine cweðende ne ondwordes tu æniht gisæh in swa miclum ðec ahenasðe hælend ðonne forðor vel leng no wiht giondsworade swa ðætte ne were awundrad ðe groefaðerh ðone dæg ðonne symbles forgeorwiga giwuna wæs him enne vel an of ðæm gibundennum swa hwelcne swa hia gegiowadunwæs ðonne seðe gicweden wæs seðe mið sceacrum wæs gibunden seðe on setnuncge giworhte moncwælmnisse& mið ðy gistag ðæt folc ongan bidda swa symle gidyde himwerun wutudlice ec & ða wif fearra biheoldun bitwih ðæm wæs && ðæs læssa & moder & ðione ðio mægðalenesca & iosephes biheoldun hwer were giseted& mið ðy gieode sunnadæg ðio magðalensca & & bohtun æðele wyrte ðætte come vel cymende gismiredun hine& swiðe arlice an ðara dagona comun to ðær byrgenne wæs arisend sunne& cwedun him bitwih hwa awælte us ðone stan from dura byrgenne& eft loccadun gisegun eft awælted ðone stan wæs forðon micel swiðe& ineodun in byrgenne gisegun gingne esne sittende in swiðrum ufu stole hwitum & forstyltunseðe cwæð ðæm ne wallas ge forhtiga ðone hælend gisoecas nazarenisca ðe ahoen wæs he aras ne is hit heonu stowe ðer gisettun hinesittas & cweðes ðegnum his & ðætte togægnes færes iow in ðer ge hine giseað swa cwæð iowsoð ða ilcu ðona flugun vel foerdun from hyrgenne forcomun forðon ondo & fyrhto & egsa & ne ængum menn gicwedun ondreordun forðonforðon æc monige cymende werun ðæt giendebredadun ða gisagune ðingana ða in usih gifylled arunswa gisaldun us ðaðe from fruma ða gisegun & embihtmenn werun wordesgisegen wæs & me offyligde from fruma alra georne mið endebrednisse ðe awrito ðu gicorne theonphileðæt ðu ongete hiara worda of ðæm gilæred arð on soðfæstnissewæs in dagum cyniges iudea sacerd sum mið noma zacharias of londe abia & wif ðæm of dohtrum arones & noma him elizabethwerun wutudlice soðfæste boege fore drihten færende in allum bibodum & soðfæstnisse drihtnes buta grornunga& ne wæs ðæm sunu hie forðon wæs elizabeth unberende & boege gifeollun in dagum hioragiworden wæs wutudlice ðy sacerdhade gibrece in endebrednisse londes his fore godeæfter giwuna sacerdhades of hlote eode ðætte in recels gisete infoerde on temple drihtnes& alle ðio mengu wæs ðæs folches bidende ute æt tide lehtesæteowde wutudlice ðæm engel drihtnes stod to swiðra wibedes biorning& gistyred wæs miððy gisæh & ege gifeol ofer hinecwæð wutudlice engel to ðæm ne ondred ðu forðon gihered wæs vel is of gibeodum ðinum & wif ðin elizabeth beres ðe suno & ðu giceg noma his iohannes& bið gifea ðe & glædnisse & monige in acennisse his glæde bioðunbið forðon micel bifora drihten & winn & bear ne drinceð & gaste halge gifylled bið ðæt gett wæs in ionna moeder his& monige suno israeles gicerrað to drihtne gode hiora& he foregeð fore ðæm of mæhte helies ðætte gicerre heorta wutuna in sunum & ða ungileoffulle to hogascipe soðfæstra gigeorwiga drihtne folc wisfæst& cwæð zacharias to ðæm engle hwona ðis ic wito ic forðon am ald & wif min gifeol in dagum his& ondworde ðe engel cwæð him ic am seðe ic tostondo bifora gode & sended am ðæt ic sprece to ðe & ðas ðe gibodige& heonu ðu bist swigende & ne mæge ðu gispreaca oððe on dæge of ðæm ðes worðes forðon ðætte ne gilefestu wordum minum ðaðe gifylled bioðun in tide hiora& wæs ðæt folc biddende & wundradun ðæt he laðade he in templeeode wutudlice ne mæhte spreoca to him & ongetun ðæt gisihðe ðe gisege in temple & he wæs becnende him & ðerhwunade dumba& giworden wæs ðætte gifylled wærun dagas embihtes his eode in hus hisæfter ðas wutudlice dagas gicende wif his & degelde hie monoðas fife cwæðforðon swa dyde me drihten in dagum ðæm eft biheold to niomanne telnisse mine bitwih monnumon monoðe wutudlice ðæs sesta sended wæs engel from gode in cæstre ðære noma wæsto fæfne giweddad vel gifæstnad were ðæs noma wæs of huse dauiðes & noma ðare hehstalde maria& infoerde engel to hir cwæð hal mið gifeo full drihten ðec mið gibletsad ðu bitwih wifumða miððy giherde gidroefed wæs in worde his & giðohte hulig vel hu were ðios groeting& cwæð ðe engel him ne ondred ðu ðe ginimestu forðon gifea mið godeheono giecnade in ionnaðe & ðu cennes suno & giceg ðu noma his hælendðes bið micel & suno ðæs hesta giceged bið & seleð him drihten god seðel dauiðes fædres his& he rixað in huse iacobes in ecnisse & rices his ne bið endecwæð wutudlice to ðæm engle huu worðes ðis forðon wer ne con ic& ondsworade ðe engel cwæð him gast halig ofercymeð on ðec & mæht ðæs hesta oferwrið ðec forðon ðætte acenned bið halig giceg bið sunu godes& heonu & færeld ðin & ðio acende sunu on hælo hire & ðes monoð is ðe sesta ðer ðio giceged bið unberendðætte forðon ne bið unmæhtiglic mið gode eghwelc wordaras wutudlice on dagum ðæm eode on moras mið oefiste on cæstre iudea& infoerde in hus zacharies & gigroette& aworden wæs ðætte giherde groetinge maria gifeade ðæt cild in ionna hir & gifylled wæs gaste halgum& gicegde stefne micler & cwæð gibletsad ðu bitwih wifum & gibletsad wæstem ionnoðes ðines& hwona ðis mec ðætte cyme moder drihtnes mines to meheonu forðon ðætte aworden wæs stefn groetinge ðines in earum minum & giworðe glædnisse in ionnoðe minum ðæt cild in gifea& eadige ðaðe hia gilefde forðon ðerhgiendad bioðon ða ðaðe gicweden sint him from drihtne& cwæð wundrað vel miclað sawel min drihten& gifeade gast min in gode halwendo mineforðon eftlocade eðmodnisse ðiowe his heonu forðon of ðissum eodge mec cweoðas alle cneoreswoforðon dyde mec micelo forðon mæhtig is & halig noma his& mildheortnisse his in soðe cneoreswo & cneoreswe ondreordun hinedyde mæhte on eorme his tostrægd oferhygd mið ðohte heorte histosceof ða mæhtgu of sedle & ahof ða eðmoduða hycrende gifylde mið godum & ða welge forleort ða idloonfeng israhelum cnæhte his ðætte were gimyndgad mildheortnisse hisswa sprecende wæs to feder userne abrahame & sede his oð to weorldegiwunade wutudlice mið hia swelce monoðas ðria & æftergiwendad wæs in hus hisðonne gifylled wæs ðio tid acennisse & acende suno& giherdun ða nehgiburas & ða cuðemen hire forðon swiðe miclade drihten mildheortnisse his mið hia & efnegiðoncadun hir& giworden wæs on dæge ðy æhtoða ðætte comon & to ymbceorfanne ðone cnæht & cegdun hine noma fædres his& giondworde ðio moder his cwæð nænig ðing ah giceged bið& cwedun to ðær ilca ne ænig is in cyððo ðinre seðe giceged ðissum noma& gibecnadun ðonne fæder his hwelcne walde gicegan hine& gigiowade onfeng wexbredes & wrat cwæð iohannes is noma his & giwundrade werun alleontyned wæs ðonne sona muð his & tunga his sprecende wæs gibletsade god& giworden wæs ondu ofer alle nehgiburas hiora & ofer alle morlond iudea & werun gimersad all word ðas& setun alle ðaðe giherdun in heorte hiora cweðende hwæt woenestu cnæht ðes bið & forðon hond drihtnes mið hine& fæder his gifylled wæs gaste halgum & giwitgade cweðendesie gibletsad drihten god israhela forðon gisohte & dyde lesnisse folches his& ahof horn hælo us in huse dauiðes cnæhtes hisswa sprecende wæs ðerh muð haligra witgana hiora ðaðe from weorlde werun& alesde usih from fiondum usum & of hondum alra ðaðe usih læddunto doanne mildheortnisse mið fædrum usum & gimyndge cyðnisse his halgesað ðætte giswor vel ðætte gisworen bið to abrahame feder usum walde gisella usðætte buta ondo of honda fionda userra gifriad were here we himin halignisse & soðfæstnisse bifora him allum dagum usum& ðu cnæht witga ðæs hesta giceged bist forðon fora onsione drihtnes georwige woegas his& to sellanne wisdom hælo folche his in forgefnisse synna hioraðerh giðoht mildheortnisse godes uses in ðæm gisohte usih ariseð of heofnumin lihte ðæm ðaðe in ðiostrum & in scua deoðes sittas & to rehtanne foet usra in woege sibbeðe cnæht ðonne giwox & gistrongad wæs in gaste & wæs in woestern oððe on dæge æteownisse his & israhelumworden wæs wutudlice in dagum ðæm foerde bod from casere agustos ðætte gimercad were all ymbhwyrftðios mercung forma giwordon wæs from undercynige syrres cyrene noma wæs& gað alle ðætte foreondetende werun ða syndrige in his cæstreastag ðonne of galilea from cæstre in iudea cæstre dauiðes ðio is ginemned hio forðon were of huse & higo dauiðesðætte foreondette werun mið bifæsted him wif berendeaworden wæs ðonne miððy weron ðer gifylled werun ða dagas ðætte acenned were& cende sunu his frumcennedne & ða mið claðum hine biwand & efne gibeg hine in binne forðon ne wæs him stowwe in gesthuse& ða hiordas werun in londe ðæt ilce wæccende & haldende wacone næhtes ofer ede his& heonu engel drihtnes stod æt vel neh ðæm & berhtnisse godes ymbscean hia & ondreordun mið ondo miclum& cwæð ðæm ðe engel nallað ge ondreda heonu forðon ic bodigo iow gifeo micelne ðæt bið allum folcheforðon acenned is iow to dæge hælend ðeðe is crist drihten in cæstre dauiðes& ðis is iow tacun vel becun ge gimoetas ðæt cild mið claðum biwunden & giseted in binne& sona aworden wæs mengu heofunlic hergende god & cweðendewuldor in heonissum gode & on eorðo sibb monnum godes willa& aworden wæs ðætte feorradun from him ða englas on heofnas ða hiordas wutudlice gisprecun bitwih him fære we oððæt in bethlem & gisea we ðis word ðæt aworden wæs ðætte drihten æteowde iow& comun vel cymende werun & & ðæt cild giseted in binnegisegun ðonne ongetun from worde ðætte cweden wæs ðæm from cnehte ðissum& alle ðaðe giherdun awundrade werun & from ðæm ðaðe cweden werun from hiordum to ðæm ilcumðonne giheold alle word ðas læddun in heorte his& eft gicerdun vel cerende werun ða hiordas wuldrende & hergende god in allum ðaðe giherdun & gisegun swa acweden wæs to him& æfter ðon giendad werun dagas æhtowe ðætte ymbcorfen were ðe cnæht giceged wæs noma his hælend ðætt gicweden wæs from engle ær ðon in ionna giecnad were& æfter ðon gifylled werun dagas clænsunge his æfter æ moyses læddun hine ðætte asettun hine drihtenswa awriten is in æ drihtnes ðætte eghwelc wepenmon tountynes hrif vel wombe halig drihten gicegeð& ðætte saldun gæfel vel asægdnis æfter ðætte acweden wæs in æ drihtnes twoege turturas vel twoege birdas culfra& heonu mon wæs in ðæm noma wæs simeon & mon ðes soðfæst & ondredende biddende frofre israhelas & gast halig wæs in him& ondswore onfeng from gaste halgum ne giseh he him deað buta ær gisege gicorone drihtnes& com in gaste in temple & miððy inlæddun ældru his ðone cnæht ðe hælend ðætte dydon æfter giwuna æs fore hine& he onfeng hine on eormas his & bletsade god & cwæðnu forletes vel forgefes esne ðinne drihten æfter worde ðinum in sibbeforðon gisegun ego mine hælo ðineðætte ðu gigeorwades bifora onsione alra folcaleht to eteowednisse cynna & wuldur folches ðines israhel& wæs fæder his & moder his wundrende ofer ða ðaðe gicweden werun from him& gibletsade hie simeon & cwæð to moeder his heonu giseted is ðes on gæfelnisse & erist monigra in israhelum & on becnum ðæm wiðcweden bið& ðin ðæs vel his sawel ðerhfæreð & sword ðætte æteowed were of monigum heortum smeunges& wæs anna ðio witga dohter fanueles from folche aseres ðios gifeoll on dagum monigum & lifde mið wer hire winter siofune from hehstaldhade hire& ðios widwe oððe winter hundæhtetig ðio ne offoerde from temple mið fæstennum & gibeadum herde gode næht & dæg& ðio ilca tid ofercom giondetade drihtne & sprecende wæs of him allum ðaðe biddende werun lesinge vel lesnisse& ðætte ðerhdedun alle æfter æ drihtnes gicerdun vel woemde werun in cæstre his nazarenesðe cnæht ðonne awox & gistrongad wæs full mið snytrum & gefe godes wæs mið ðæm& foerdun ældro his ðerh alle wintru hi hierusalem on dæge symbles eastra& mið aworden were wintru twelfe stigendum ðæm on hierusalem æfter giwuna dæges halges vel symbles& miððy giendade werun dagas miððy eftcerdun eftwunade ðe cnæht hælend in & ne cuðun ældro hiswoendun wutudlice hine ðæt he were hiæ mið fylgende comun gonga dæges & eftsohtun hine bitwih freonde & cyððo& ne gimoettun gicerde werun in eftsohtun hine& aworden wæs æfter ðrim dogrum gimoetun hine in temple sittende in middum ðara larwara herende hine & fregnende hineastyltun ðonne alle ðaðe hine giherdun ofer snytro & ondsworum his& gisegun awundrade werun & cwæð ðio moder his to him la sunu hwæt dydestu us swa heonu fæder ðin & ic mænende sohtun ðec& cwæð to him hwæt is ðætte mec gisohtun ne cuðon ge ðæte in ðæm fædras mine sindun girisenlic me to wosanne& ða ne oncneowun word ðætte sprecende wæs to him& astag mið him & com to nazareth & wæs underðioded him & moder his gihælde alle word ðas in heorte his& ðe hælend giwox mið snytru & ældu & wuldur mið god & alleger ðonne ðe fiftegða he wæs tiberis ðæs caseres wæs sciremon iudea soðliche ðonne broðer his & londesunder aldormonnum sacerda & aworden wæs word drihtnes ofer iohanne & suno on woestenne& com in alle lond bodade ðæt fulwiht hreownisse in forgefnisse synnaswa awriten is on bocum worda essaies ðæs witga stefn cliopende on woestenne georwigas woeg drihtnes rehte wyrcas stige hiseghwelc pæð vel dene gifylled bið & alle moras & hyll gibeged bioðon & bioðon unrehte vel woh in gongum & roeðe on woege smeoðum& giseað eghwelc lichoma halwendo godescwæð forðon to ðæm ðreote ðaðe foerdun ðætte hie gifulwad were from him cynn æterne hwelc æteoweð iow gifleane from tocymende wraðrawyrcað forðon wæstim wyrðne to hreownisse & ne biginnes cweoða fæder we habbas ic cwæðo forðon iow ðætte mægen is godes from stanum ðissum awecca sunu abrahamessoðlice forðon acase to wyrtruma treona giseted is eghwelc forðon treo ne does wæstim godne ðe ofcorfen bið & on fyr sended& gifrugnun hine ðe ðreot cweðende hwæt forðon doað weondworde ða cwæð him seðe hæfes twoege cyrtlas seleð ðæm næbbende & seðe hæfeð mett gilic doe vel wyrcecomun ða wutudlice & bearswinige ðætte were gifulwad & cwedun to him la larwa hwæt we gidoaðsoð he cwæð to him noht forðor giseted is iow gidoaðwutudlice frugnun hine & ða cempo cwedun hwæt doað we & ec us & cwæð him ne ænigmon gidroefað ge ne tellnisse vel scomu doað & ðæm wosað nestum iowrummiððy woende ðonne ðæt folc & smeandum allum in heortum hiora from iohanne eaðe mæge he were cristondsworade iohannis cwæð allum ic ec soð of wætere gifulwo iowih cumað ðonne strongra me ðæs ne am ic wyrðe to unbindanne ðwongas giscoes his he iowih gifulwas in gaste halgum & mið fyrehis fone & windfone in honda his & clænsað bereflor his & gisomnað hwæte his in berern his ðæt halm vel winnunge ðonne giberneð to fyre unadryssenlicmonige ec ðonne & oðre gitrymede bodona ðæt folcðonne miððy gerihte from him of from wif broðer his & from allum yflum ðaðe dyde herodestogiecte & ðis ofer alle & untynde iohannem ðæt carcernaworden wæs ðonne miððy gifulwad wæs all folc & ðe hælend mið wæs gifulwad & biddende ontyned wæs heofun& adune astag gast ðe haliga mið lichomlice megwlite swelce culfra on hine & stefn of heofnum giworden wæs ðu arð sunu min leof vel leowusta on ðec licað me& se hælend wæs onginnende swelce wintra ðritig ðætte woende suno were iosephes seðe wæs elingseðe wæs seðe wæs seðe wæs seðe wæs seðe wæsseðe wæs seðe wæs seðe wæsseðe wæs godingðe hælend wutudlice full gaste halge færende wæs from iordane & wæs doende in gaste on woestennedaga feowertigum & wæs gicostad from diofle & noht gieet on dagum ðæm & miððy giendad werun ða gihyncredecwæð wutudlice him ðe diawul gif ðu sunu godes arð cweð stane ðissum ðætte hlafas segiondsworade to him ðe hælend awriten is forðon ðætte ne on hlafe anum lifeð mon ah in eghwelcum worde godes& lædde hine ðe diaful & æteowde him alle rice ymbhwyrftes eorð in hwile tide& cwæð to him ðe ic selo mæhte ðas alle & wuldor hiora forðon me gisald arun & ðæm ðe ic wyllo ðe ilcaðu forðon gif ðu worðas bifora mec & bioðun ðine alle& giondworde ðe hælend cwæð him awriten is drihten god ðinne wearða ðu & him anum giher ðu& læde hine in & sette hine ofer hornpic temples & cwæð to him gif sunu godes arð asend ðeh hiona vel ðona ofduneawriten is forðon ðætte englas his bibeod from ðe ðætte efnegiherað ðeforðon in hondum ðinum lædað vel niomað ðec eoðe mæge ðætte ðu wiðspurne to stane fott ðinne& giondworde ðe hælend cwæð him acweden is ne costa ðu drihten god ðinne& giendad werun alle mið costunge ðe diafol eftfoerde from him wið to tide&
