færende wæs ðe hælend on mæhte gastes in & mersung foerde ðerh alle lond of him& he lærde in somnungum hiora & gimiclad wæs from allum& com to nazareth ðer wæs gifoeded & ineode æfter efnegiwuna his dæge symbles in somnunge & aras to redanne& gisald wæs him boc ðæs witga essaies & ontynde boc gimitte to stowwe ðer awriten wæsgast drihtnes ofer mec forðon ðæt gismirede mec vel to soecanne ðorfendum sende mec to bodanne ermingum vel hæftedum forgefnisse & blindum gisihðe forleta ða gibrocono on forgefnissebodiga geras drihtnes onfenge & dæg efttoselenisse& miððy gifylled wæs ðio boc agæf ðæm embihtmen & sætt & alle in somnungum egu werun bihaldende on hineongan wutudlice cweoða to him ðætte to dæge gifylled wæs ðis giwritt in eorum iowrum& alle cyðnisse him hia saldun & wundradun on wordum wuldres vel wuldor ðaðe forecomun from muðe his vel ðæs & cwedun ahne ðes sunu is ioseph& cwæð ðæm wutudlice ge cweoðas me ðas ongilicnisse la lece lecna ðec solfne hu monigu giherdun we awordne in ðær byrig doa & her on oedle ðinumcwæð ðonne soðlice ic cweðo iow ðætte nænig witga onfongen wæs on oedle hisin soðfæstnisse ic cweðo iow monige widuwe werun on dagum helias in israhelum ða bityned wæs heofunn gerum ðrim & monoðas sexu miððy giworden wæs hungor micel on alre eorðo& ne to ængum ðara burga sended wæs buta in ðær byrig & to ðæm wife widwe& monige hreofe werun in israel under helise ðæm witga & nænig hiora giclensad wæs buta neman wæs licðrowere& gifylled werun ða alle in somnungum mið wræððo ðas giherdun& arioson & awurpun hine buta ða cæstre & læddun hine wið to ofer oili moras ofer ðon ðio burugðe wer of ðæm ða diowulo foerdun ðætte mið hine were forleort ða hine ðe hælend cwæðeftfær to huse ðinum & sæge hu micle ðe dyde drihten & eode ðerh alle ða cestre bodade hu micle him dyde drihtenaworden wæs wutudlice miððy eftcom ðe hælend onfeng hine ða ðreatas werun wutudlice alle biddende hine& heonu com ðe wer gongende & he of aldormenn somnunge wæs & gifeol & to fotum him gibed hine ðætte foerde in hus hisforðon dohter uncenned wæs him ic woenu wintro twelfe ðios deodade & gilamp miððy eode from ðæm berge wæs giðring vel giðrungun& wifum ðæm ðe wæs in flowing blodes from wintrum twelfum ðio in lecum forsalde all feh hire ne in ængum mæhte gihæla vel lecniga& gineolicade bihionda & gihran fæste wedum & sona astod ðio flownis blodes his& cwæð ðe hælend hwelc is seðe mec gihran ne sæccende ðonne allum cwæð & ðaðe mið hine werun hæsere ðio mengo ðec giðringað & weorðað & ðus cweoðas hwelc mec gihran& cwæð ðe hælend gihran me hwæt vel hwelchwoegu forðon & ic wiste mæhte from me eodegisæh ðonne ðæt wif ðætte ne deglde cwacende com & gifeoll bifora fotum his & for ðæm intinga gihran him gibecnade bifora allum folche & hu efne sona gihæled wæs& he cwæð him dohter gileofa ðin ðec hale dyde gaa in sibbegeona hine sprecende com from aldormonnum somnungum cwæð him ðætte deod is dohter min nelle ðu gihrina hirðe hælend ðonne giherde ðis word giondsworade feder ðæs mægdnes nelle ðu ondreda gilef ana & hal bið& miððy gicomon to hame ne gelefde ingonga hine mið ænigne buta & & fæder & moder ðæs mægdnesgiweopun ðonne alle & mændun ða ilca soð he cwæð nelle giwoepa ne is deod ah slepeð& hlogun & teldun hine wiste forðon ðæt deod werehe ða gihælde hiæ honda his & cliopade cweðende mægden aris& efteowende wæs gast his & aras recone & heht sella hir eota& stylton vel wundradun ældro hire ðæm bibeod ðæt ne ængum gicwede ðæt giworden wæsmiððy gicegdun wutudlice twelfe apostolas salde ðæm mæhte & mægen ofer alle diowlas & ðæt ðio untrymigu gilecnadun& sende hiæ to bodiganne rice godes & hæle ða unstronga& cwæð to ðæm noht ginime iow on woege ne in gerde ne in pohha ne hlafas ne feh ne twoege cyrtlas habbas ge& swa hwelcum huse ge ingæ ðer wunigað & ðona ne faras ge& swa hwelc swa ne onfoeð iow farað from cæstre ðær ilca fæstlice ða asca foeta iowra asceacað on cyðnisse ofer hiefoerdun ðonne ymbeodun ðerh ða cæstre bodende & lecnadun eghwergiherde ða cynig alle ðaðe werun aworden from him & twiade of him ðætte wæs gicwedenfrom sumum ec forðon æteowde from oðrum ðonne forðon witga an from witgum aras& cwæð ðe cynig ic ofceorf hwelc ðonne is ðes of ðæm ic ðuslico doema & sohte to seanne hine vel ðæt he gisege& eftcerdun ða ðegnas sægdun him ðaðe swa hwæt hiæ dydun & miððy ondfonge hiæ foerdun syndrige on stowwe on woestern seðe is ðio burugðætte miððy swa ongetun ða mengo fylgende werun him & ongan hiæ & spræc wæs him of rice godes & ða ilco ðaðe gemnisse bihofadun gihældeðe dæg ða ongan gifara vel gibega & gineolicadun twelfe cwedun him forlett ða hergas ðætte eodun in ða cæstre & lond ðaðe ymb sindun ofcerdun ðæt hie gimoettun metas forðon her in stowwe woestigre we sinduncwæð ða to ðæm ge sellas ðæm to eotanne soð hiæ cwedun ne sint us mara ðonne fif hlafas & twoege fiscas buta woenunga us we gifære & we gibycce in allum ðisse herge mettwerun ðone ic woeno weara fif ðusend cwæð to ðegnum histo dalum dydon alleonfenge werun wutudlice fif hlafum & twæm fiscum eftloccade on heofne & bletsade cwæð him & bræc & todælde ðegnum his ðætte hie gisette foræ ðæm hergum& etun alle & gifylde werun & ginumen wæs ðætte oferlæfed wæs him screadungum ceoflas twelfe& aworden wæs miððy ane were & bidende werun & miððy hine ðegnas his & gifrægn ða ilca cweðende hwelcne mec cweoðas eadgeða ondsworadun & cwedun ðæm fulwihtere oðer wutudlice elie oðer ðætte witga ann of ðæm ærrum arascwæð ða ðæm ge ðonne hwelc were ah cweoðas ondsworade cwæð ðæm gast godessoð he giðreode hiæ bibeod ðætte ængum ne cweduncwæð ðætte ariseð sunu monnes feolu vel monige giðolas & fromcumen from ældum & aldormonnum ða sacerda & uðwutum & ofslað & ðe ðirda dæge arisescwæð he ða to ðæm allum gif hwa wyl æfter me cuma ne sæceð him solfum & lædað ðrowunge his dæghwæmlice & fyllgeð vel soeces mecseðe forðon welle sawle his halle doa losað ða ilca & seðe losað sawle his fore mec hale gidoað ða ilcahwæt forstondeð vel forstod ðæm men gif he strioneð alne middengeord hine ðonne solfne losað & loswest wyrcaðforðon seðe mec giscomigað & mine word ðiosne sunu monnes giscomigað miððy cymeð in ðrymme his & fædras & haligra henglaic cweðo wutudlice iow soðlice sindun oðro her stondað ðaðe ne gibergað deoð oððæt hie giseað rice godesaworden wæs ða æfter ðissum worde ic woenu daga ehtowe & ginom & & astag on mor ðætte gibede& aworden wæs miððy gibæd megwlitt onsione his oðre & giwedu his hwitu swiðe giscionun& heonu twoege wearas sprecende mið hine wæs &werun gisene in ðrymme & cwedun ðætte ofer his gifylled wosa vel wæs in hiersualemec & ðaðe mið hine gihefgade werun from slepe & awæhtum gisegun ðrym his & twoege weoras ðaðe stodun mið him& aworden wæs miððy foerdun from him ðætte to ðæm hælende bodere god is us her to wosane wyrce we ðrio hus an ðe & an moyse & an heliæ ne wiste hwæt he cwedeðas ða him sprece giworden wæs wolcen & oferbrædde hiæ & ondreordun geongægdum him in ðæt wolcen& stefn giworden wæs of wolcne cweðende ðis is sunu min leof in gaste giherað& miððy wæs stefn gimoeted wæs ðe hælend ana & hie swigadun & nænigum gicwedun in ðæm dagum æniht of ðæm ðaðe gisegungiworden wæs ðonne on ðæm æfterra dæge ofdune astigende ðæm of more & arn togægnes & ðe ðreott micel& heono wer of ðæm herge gicliopade cwæð la larwa ic biddo ðec loca on mec drihten forðon ancende is me& heonu gast gigrap hine & ferlice cliopað & bites & slites hine mið swate & nede fearras toslitas hine& ic bæd his ðegnas vel ðine ðætte hie awurpun hine & ne mæhtunondsworade ðonne cwæð la cneoreswa ungileofful & wohfull hulonge ic biom mið iowih & ic ðolo iow tolæd sunu ðinne& miððy gineolicade agroette hine ðe diowul & giðreade & ðreade ðe hælend gast unclænne & gihælde ðone cnæht & agæf hine fæder hisgiwundradun soðlice alle on swiðe micelnisse godes alle ða ilco wundradun in allum ðæmðe dyde cwæð to ðegnum hissette ge inc heortum iowrum word ðas sunu min vel monnes toword is ðætte gisald bið in hond monnessoð hiæ ne oncneowun word ðas & wæs awriten is fore hiæ & ðætte ne ðohtun ðæt ne ondredanne to fregnanne hine of ðissum wordeineode wutudlice smeoung in him hwelc hioratogilahte ðone cnæht sete hine neh him& cwæð ðæm seðe swa hwelc onfoeð ðone cnæht ðissum on noma minum mec onfoeð & swa hwelc swa mec onfoeð onfoeð ðone ilcu seðe mec sende onfoeð hine forðon seðe mara is bitwih allum iow ðes mara isondsworade wutudlice iohannes la hæsere we gisegun sume oðre in noma minum aworpende ða diowla & we forbudun him forðon ne fylgeð usih mið& cwæð to him ðe hælend nallað ge forbeada seðe forðon ne is wið iowih fore iowih isaworden wæs ða miððy gifylled werun dægas to onfonges vel liornisse his & he onsione his gitrymme ðætte foerde in hierusalem& sende erendwreacu fora gisihðe his ðætte foerdun ineodun in ða cæstre ðara lioda ðætte fore geowradun him& ne onfengun hine forðon onsione his wæs færende in hierusalemmiððy gisegun wutudlice ðegnas his & cwedun drihten wiltu ðæt we cweðe ðætte fyrr ofdune astige of heofnum & fornime hiæ& ymbwærlde ðe hælend giðreade ðaillco & cwæð& foerdun in oðer wercaworden wæs ðonne gongendum him on woege cwæð sum oðer to him ic fylgo swa hwider swa ðu fære& cwæð him ðe hælend foxes holo habbas & flegende heofnes nest sunu wutudlice monnes ne hæfeð hwer he heofud his gibegecwæð ða to oðrum fylig vel folga me he ða cwæð drihten forgef vel lef me ærest gonga & ðæt ih byrge fæder minnecwæð ða him ðe hælend forlett ða deodu bibyrgað deodu hiora ðu gaa & sæge in rice godes& cwæð oðer ic fylge ðe drihten ah ðerh ærist gong eft sæcga ðæm ðaðe et huse sinduncwæð to him ðe hælend ne ænig sende honda his on suluh & bihaldes onbæc gicoren is to rice godesæfter ðas ðonne ofgimercade drihten & oðro tu & hundsifontig & sende hiæ twoege fore onsione his on alle cæstre & stowwe ðæm wæs he to cymende& cwæð ðæm ripes soðlice feolu wyrcende wutudlice hwon biddað forðon drihten ripes ðætte sende wercmen in ohtrip hisgað heono ic sendo iowih swa lombor bitwih wulfumnallað forðon gibeara seom ne posa ne giscoe & ne ænig mon ðerh woeg ge gigroetaðæres cweoðas sibb ðissum huse& gif ðer bið vel sie sunu sibbes wunigað ofer hia sibbe iower gif ðonne to iow eftgicerraðin ðæm ilca huse wunigað eotas & drincas ðaðe mið him sindun wyrðe is forðon ðe wercmonn metes his nallað ge oferfara of huse in hus& in swa hwelce cæstre ge ingongas & onfoeð iowih eotas togisete bioðun iowsoðlice an is nedðarf vel bihoefe ðonne gicoren dæl giceos ðio ne bið ginumen from hir& aworden wæs miððy were on stowwe sumre gibiddende ðætte giblann cwæð an of ðegnum his to him drihten lær mec vel usih ðæt we gibidde swa lærde ðegnas his& cwæð him miððy gibiddas cweoðas fæder user seðe is on heofnum gihalgad bið noma ðin tocymeð rice ðin sie willa ðin sie swa on heofne & on eorðohlaf userne dæghwæmlice sel us to dæge& forgef us synne use swa fæstlice & ec he vel we forgeofas eghwelce scylde user & ne usih onlæd ðu in costunge ah afria usih from yfle& cwæð to ðæm hwelc iower hæfeð freond & gæð to him æt midder næht & cweðes him la freond lih vel sel me ðria hlafasforðon freond com minn of woege to me & ne hafo ic hwæt ic sette vel lecce fora hine& he of inne ondsworade cwæð nelle ðu me moeðe vel hefig wosa forðon ðe dura bilocen is & cnæht min mec mið sint in cote ne mæg ic arisa & sella ðe& ic cweðo iow & gif ne sellas him arises forðon ðætte freond his bið scendla giornisse hweðre freondes his ariseð & seleð him ðæt ðætte hæfeð ða nedðarfe vel bihoefesetnungum him & sohtun to niomanne welchwoegnu of muðe his ðætte hie gihendun hinemonige ðonne hergum ymbstonda swa ðætte hiæ him bitwih giteldun ongunnun cweoða to ðegnum his ærist bihaldas ge iowih for dærstum ældum hiora ðæt is esswicnisnoht ðonne awrigen is ðætte ne eowed bið ne gihyded vel gidegled ðætte ne bið giyppedforðon ðaðe in ðiostrum giherdun in lehte gicweden bið & ðætte in earum giherdest & sprecende gewerun in cotum abodad bið on hrofum &ic cweðo ðonne iow friondas mine ðætte ge ne se gifyrhted from him ðaðe ofslað ðonne lichoma & æfter ðas ne habbas forðor ðætte doeðic æteowo ðonne iow ðone ge ondrede ondredas ðone seðe æfter ðon ofslað hæfeð mæhte gisende in tintergu swa ic cwæð iow ðonne ondredaðah ne stearas fife comun twoege & an of him ne is on ofergetnisse fora godeah & ec her heofdes iowres alle gitalad arun nallað ge forðon ondreda monigum forðor vel mara ge sindun vel bioðonic cweðo ðonne iow eghwelc seðe swa ondetende bið on mec fora monnum & sunu monnes giondetad bið in him fore englum godesic cweðo ðe ne gigæstu ðona oððe wutudlice ðone lætemestu pricla ðu forgeldetocomun ða sume on tide ðæm sægdun ðæm of galilea ðara vel hiora blod gimengde mið asægdnissum hiora& giondsworade cwæð ðæm woenað ge ðætte ðes galilesco fore allum galilescum synnfulle bioðon vel werun forðon ðuslico ðrowende werunne cweðo ic iow ah buta hreownisse ge hæbbe ale gillice ge sciolun losigeswa & ða teno & æhtowe onufa ðæm gifeoll ðe torr in ðær byrig & ofslog ða ilco woenað ge ðætte & ða ilco scyldge werun bifore allum monnum byedunne cweðo ic iow ah hweðre gif hreownisse ge ne doað gilice ge sciolun loesgagicwæð he wutudlice ðas geddunga onlicnesse vel bisene treona ficbeomes hæfde sumum giplontad in wingeorde his & com sohte wæstem on ðæm ilca & ne infandcwæð ða to ðæm bigengum ðæs wingeordes heono ger ðrio sindun of ðæm ic com to soecanne wæstem in ficbeome ðissum & ne fand ic vel ne moette ceorfas vel rendas forðon ða ilco ðætte hwon & wutudlice eorðo gionetaðsoð he ondworde cwæð to ðæm drihten forlet ða vel hiæ & ec ðis ger wiððæt miððy ic delfo ymb ða ilca & ic sendo mixenneheono forleten iow hus iower woestige ic cweðo ða wutudlice iow forðon ðætte ge ne giseað mec oððæt cyme miððy ge cweðe se gibletsað seðe com in noma drihtnes& aworden wæs miððy infoerde in hus sumes aldormonnes ðara uðwutuna hiora on symbeldæge to bruccanne hlaf & ða ilca biheoldun hine& heono monn sum unhal wæs bifora hine& ondswdarde ðe hælend cwæð to æs witgum & aldormonnum hiæ cwedun gif gilefed is on symbeldæge ðe gilecniga vel nosoð hie swigadun he wutudlice gilahte gihælde vel gihælde hine & forleort& giondsworade cwæð hwelc iower asald vel oxa in seað falleð & ne sona of ofdoeð hine dæge symbles& ne mæhtun to ðassum giondsworade himcwæð ða to ðæm lædendum ða bisine bihald hwa ða forma onfoe hie gifeasan cwæð to himmiððy bið laðad ðu bist to feormum ne hliona in ðær forma stowwe æðe mæg wyrðro ðec vel ðe sie gineded from himne on eorðo ne in feltune vel on mixenne ðorfæst is ah utt asended bið seðe hæfeð earo to giheranne giheraðwerun ða to gineolicadun him bearswinigo & synnfylle ðætte giherdun hine& gihyrston aldormen & uðwutu cweðende ðætte ðes ða synfulle onfoeð & eteð miððy& cwæð ðæm geddunge ðios cwæðhwelc of iowih mon seðe hæfeð hundreð scipa & gif forleaseð an of ðæm ahne forleteð ða hundniontig & nione on weosterne & gað to ðær ilca ðaðe losigað oððæt gimoette ða ilco& miððy gimoeteð hie onsettað ofer scyldrum his gifeande& com to huse gicegde friondum & nehgiburum cwæð ðæm efne giðongias me forðon ic gimoette scip min ðætte losed wæsic cweðo iow ðætte on ða wisa gifea bið on heofnum ofer enne synfulne hreownisse hæbbende ðonne ofer hundniontig & nione soðfæste seðe ne biðorfeð to hreownisel ðæt wif hæfde fif sceattas teasiðum gif losað casering enne ahne berneð ðæcela & instyreð ðæt hus & soeceð georne oððæt gimoeteðcwæð ða him gif moysen & ða witgu ne giherdun ahne gif hwelc of deoðe ariseð gilefað him& to ðegnum his cwæð unmæhtiglic is ðætte ne cyme ða ondspyrnisse wæ ðonne ðæm ðerh ðone cymeððaroflicra is him gif stan cern inseted se ymb swira his & ðætte se giworpen in sæ ðonne ðætte geondspyrne enne of ðissum lytlumbihaldas wutudlice iowih gif synnige ðe broðer ðin giðreata hine & gif hreownisse doeð forgef him& gif ðu siofo siðum on dæge gisyngað in ðec & siofo siðum on dæge gicerred bið to ðe cweðende giherað mec & forgef him& cwedun ða ðegnas drihtnes geec us gileofucwæð ða drihten gif ge hæfde gileofu swa corn senepes ge cwede ðissum tree heortbrere of wyrtrumum & of plontum gisette on sæ & hersumigað iowhwelc ðonne iower hæfeð esne eriende vel scip foedende seðe gicerde of londe cwæð him sona oferfær gihlionunga& ne cweoðað gearwa me ðætte ic giriordige & forgyrd ðec & embihta me ða hwile ic ete & ic drince & æfter ðas ðu gietes & drincesgiondwordun cwedun him hwer drihten seðe ondsworað him swa hwer ðonne bið ðe lichoma ðer gisomna bioðon earnascwæð ða ðonne & ða bisine to him ðætte forðon giriseð symle gibidda & ne giswicacwæð ðe doema bereð sum wæs in sumre cæstre seðe god ne ondreord & ðone monno ne scomodewiduwe wutudlice sum wæs in cæstre ðær & gicomun to hir cwæð wrec ðu mec of wiðerworda ðinum & ne walde ðerh monige tide æfter ðisse ða cwæð bitwih him & gif god ne ondredo ic ne monno scomigaforðon wedo hefig is vel wæs me ðios widwe ic wreco ðailco ðætte ne ende cymeð giteleð meccwæð ða drihten giherað hwæt se doema unrehtwisnisse cwæðgod ða ne doeð & ða wraco ðara gicorenra hiora cliopendra to him dæg & nocte & giðyld hæfeð in ðæmic cweðo ðonne iow ðætte hræðe doeð wraco ðara soð hweðre suno monnes cymeð miððy ðætte gimitte gileofo on eorðo& sona gisæh & fylgde him wundrade vel miclade god & all ðæt folc gisæh gesalde lof gode& foerde ðerheode in ða burg& heono wer wæs ðæs noma zacheus & ðæs wæs aldormon beorswinigra & he wæs weolig& sohte to geseana ðone hælend hwelc he were & ne mæhte for ðæm herge forðon on lengo lytel wæs& bifore arun astag on treo heord onlic ficbeome ðætte gesege hine forðon ðona wæs færende& miððy gecome to stowwe onfeng ðe hælend gesæh hine & cwæð to him zache eofesta adunestig forðon todæge in hus ðin gidæfned is me to wuniganne& eofestade ofdune astag & onfeng hine gifeaande& miððy gesegon alle hwispredon vel yfle sprecon cwedon ðætte to men synnfullum gecerdegestod ða zacheus cwæð to ðæm hælende heono hlaf godra minra drihten ic selle ðorfendum & gif hwæt ænige ic biswac ic forgeldo feoðorfald& ne gimittun vel ne fundun hwæt dydon him alle forðon ðæt folc hlosnende wæs giherde hine& giworden wæs on anum dæge ðara lærde hine ðæt folc in temple & bodende efnecomun ða aldormen sacerda & uðwuta mið ðæm ældrumcweðende to him cwæð us in hwelcer mæhte ðas ðu does & hwelc is seðe seleð ðe ðas mæhteondsworade ða cwæð to ðæm welle fregna iowih & ic worde giondsworigað mefulwiht iohannis of heofne wæs vel from monnumsoð hiæ gismeadun bitwih him cweðende forðon gif we cweoðas of heofne cweðes us forhwon forðon negilefdon ge himgif ðonne we cweoðas from monnum ðæt folc all gistæneð usih wutudlice sindun forðon from iohanne witga ðætte were& ondsworade him ne wistun hwona were& ðe hælend cwæð him ne ic cweðo iow in swa hwelce mæhte ðas ic domðaðe forswelgað hus widwa wyrcas ðæt longe gibed ðas onfoað ðæt mara vel mast cursungeeft biheold ðonne gisæh ða ðaðe gisendun ar ðing hiora in gazophilacium weoligegiseh ðonne sum oðer widwe ðorfendlico sendende mæsleno feorðungas twoege& cwæð soð is ðæt ic cweðo iow ðætte widwe ðios ðorfende forðor ðon alle sendeforðon ðæs ða alle of monigfaldnisse him sendun on ðincgum godes ðios wutudlice of ðon ðætte wona is hir all lif hire ðæt hio hæfde hio sende& ðara sum cweðendum of temple ðætte mið stanum godum & geofum girinad were cwæððios ðaðe gisegun cymeð dagas on ðæm ne bið forleten stan ofer stane seðe ne bið strogdengifrugnun ðonne hine cweðende hæsere hwenne ðas bioðon & hwelc gif becun miððy bið ðæt he onginneðseðe cwæð giseað ðætte ge ne se biswicen monige forðon cumað in noma minum cweðende forðon ic am crist & ðio tid togineolicað nallað ge forðon gonga æfter ðæm& all ðæt folc comun ar to him in tempilgineolicað wutudlice dæg symbles ðara dærstana ðæt giceged bið eostru& sohtun from aldorsacerdom & uðwutum huu hine acwelle mæhtun ondreordun forðon ðæt folcinfoerde ðonne ðe wiðerworda in iudeas seðe giceged is scariothisca an of ðæm twelfum& foerde & sprecende wæs mið aldormonnum ðara sacerda & larwum hu hine mæhte hine sella him& gifeande werun & ða gifeande werun feh him to sellanne& giheht & sohte ðætte tidlice ðætte mæhte sellan hine butan ðæm hergumcom ðonne dæg ðara dærstana in ðæm nedðarf wæs ðætte were gislægen eostru& sende & cwæð gongað georwigað us eostru ðætte we etesoð hia cwedun hwæt ðagett forðor we wilnigas cyðnisse we solfa forðon giherdun of muðe his& aras all ðio mengo hiora læddun hine to pylateongunnun gehene hine cweðenðe ðiosne we gemitton undercerrende cynn usera & forbeodende ææ & wigga & forbeodende gæfel to sellanna ðæm casera & cweðende hine crist cynig ðætte werepylatus ða gifrægn hine cwæð ðu arð cynig iudana hiora soð he ondswarade cwæð ðu cweðescwæð ða ðe groefa to aldormonnum sacerda & to ðæm mengum noht ic mitto intincga in ðissum mennsoð hia ða ontrymedun cweðende gecerrað ðæt folc læreð ðerh alla iudea & ongann from galileum oððe hiderðe groefa ða giherde galileam infrægn & gif monn galilesc were& ðætte ongæt ðætte of herode onwald were eftsende hine to herode seðe & seilca hierusolimesc wæs ðæm dagumherodes ðone gesene ðone hælend glæd wæs swiðe wæs forðon wilnende of mongum tidum to geseanne hine forðon ðætte geherde feolu & hyhtade becon hwelchweogne from him gesegen were& eftcerdun gegeorwadun wyrtgimong & smirnisse & synnadæg ecsoð swigadun æfter bibodean wutudlice swiðe comun arlice vel fegre to ðær byrgenne ðio magðalenisca & oðoro maria & oðre mið him beron ðaðe georwadon ða smirnisse& gimoettun ðone stan awæltedne from ðær byrgenne& infoerdun ne gimittun lichoma drihtnes hælendes& aworden wæs miððy forcumne vel gelegne werun of ðissum & heono twoege wearas gistodun neh ðæm gigerlan lixendemiððy ondreordun ða & ahældun ðæt onsion on eorðo cwedon to ðæm hwæt soecað ge ðone lifgende mið deadumne is her ah he aras eftgiðencað hu sprecende wæs iow miððy gett in galilea were vel wæscweðende forðon gidæfnað sunu monnes ðæt gisald were in hond monna synnfulra & ðætte were ahongen & ðy ðirda dæge ariseð& eftgemyndge werun worda his& werun symle on temple herende & bletsadun godin fruma wæs word & word wæs mið god & god wæs wordðis wæs in fruma mið godalle ðerh hine awordne sindun & buta him aworden is noht ðætte aworden isin him lif is & lif wæs leht monna& leht in ðiostrum giscinet & ðiostro hiæ ne fornomonwæs mon sended from gode ðæm noma wæs iohannesðes com in cyðnisse ðæt witnesse ðerhtrymide of lehtewæs leht soðlice ðio inlihteð eghwelcne monno cymende in ðiosne middengeardin ðiosne middangearde wæs & middengeard ðerh hine aworden wæs & middengeard hine ne ongættin agen com & his hine ne on gefengunswa oft wutudlice eft onfengun hine salde him mæhte sunu godes suno godes were ðes ðaðe gilefað on noma hisðaðe ne of blodum ne of willa luste flæsces ne of willa vel luste weres ah of gode gicenned sint& word i cristes lichoma aworden wæs & gibyede vel wunade in us & we gisegun wuldor his swelce ancendes from feder full wuldres vel gefe & soðfæstnissecyðnisse gitrymeð of ðæm & cliopigað cweðende ðes wæs ðone ic sægde seðe æfter me tocymende is bifora ne aworden wæs forðon bifora mec wæs& of fyllnisse his us alle we onfengun geofo vel wuldor fore geofoforðon æ ðerh moyse gisald wæs geofo wutudlice & soðfæstnisse ðerh ðone hælend crist giworden wæsgod ne ænig gisæh æfre buta ðe ancenda sunu seðe is on barme vel fæðme fædres ðæs ilca gisægde& ðis is cyðnisse iohannis ðone gisendun in iudeam from hierusolimiscum ðæm burugweorum & diaconas to him ðætte hie gifrugne hine ðu hwelc arð& giondetted wæs & ne onsoc forðon ne am ic crist& ðæt gifrugnum hine eftersona hwæt forðon arð ðu & cwæð ne am ic witga arð ðu & ondsworade ne am ic forðon witgacwedon forðon him hwelc arð ðu cweð us ðætte ondswore we giselle ðæm ðaðe sendun usih hwæt cweðestu fore ðec solfnecwæð ic am stefn cliopende on woestenne rehtas woeg drihtnes swa ðe witga ongann& ðaðe asended werun of broðrum him& gifrugnun & cwedun him hwæt forðon fulwastu gif ðu ne arð crist ne ne witgagiondsworade him cwæð forðon/ ic fulwo iowih in wætre middum wutudlice iowre gistod ðone ge iow ne cunnunhe wutudlice is seðe æfter me tocymende is bifora me giworden wæs ðæs ne am ic wyrðe ðætte ondoe his ðwong giscoesðas in ðær byrig giworden wæs bigeonda iordanen ðer wæs iohannes fulwendeoðre dæge gisæh iohannes ðone hælend cymende to him & cwæð heono lomb godes heono seðe nimeð synne middengeordesðis is of ðæm ic cweoðo æfter me cymeð wer seðe ær me aworden wæs seðe ær me wæs& ic nyste vel ne cuðe hine ah ðætte were æteowed folche israel forðon vel æfter ðæm ic com ic in wætre gifulwad wæs& cyðnisse gitrymeð iohannes cwæð forðon ic gisæh gast adunestigende & wuniende swelce columba of heofne & giwunade ofer hine& ic nyste hine ah seðe sende mec to fulwanne in wætre he me to cwæð ðone ofer ðu gesist ðone gast ofdune stigende & wuniende ofer hine ðis is seðe giwulwas in gaste halgum& ic com & cyðnisse vel witnisse ih gitrymede forðon ðes is sunu godes lufendeoðre dæge æftersona gistod iohannes & ðegnas his& locadun vel biheoldun ðone hælend gongende cwæð heono lomb godes& giherdun hine twoege ðegnas sprecende & fylgende werun ðæm hælendeefne gicerde wutudlice ðe hælend & gisæh hie fylgende him cwæð him hwæt soecas ge ðaðe cwedun him larow ðæt is gicweden ðæt gitrahtad sie larow hwer byes to vel wunascwæð him cymað & giseað comon & gisegun hwer he wunade & mið hine giwunadun on dæge ðæm ðio tid wutudlicebroðer symonis petre an of ðæm twem ðaðe giherdun from iohanne & fylgende werun werun hine& gimoette her ærist broðer his simonnem & cwæð him we gimoettun ðæt is gitrahtad crist& togilæddun hine to ðæm hælende ymbsceowade wutudlice hine ðe hælend cweð him ðu arð symon sunu iohannes ðu bist giceged ðæt is gitrahtad carrðæs on merne walde gifoera in & gimoette ðone ðegn & cwæð him ðe hælend fylig vel soec mecwæs wutudlice from ðær byrig vel of ðær cæstre andreas &gimoetun philippus ðone ðegn & cwæð him ðæt ilce awrat in æ & witgade we gimoetun ðone hælend suno iosepes of nazareð& cwæð him mæge hwætwoegnu god wosa cwæð him ðe ðegn cym & gisihgisæh ðe hælend nathanael cymende to him & cwæð of ðæm heono wer ðe israhelisca in ðæm facne ne iscwæð him næthanael hwona mec witestu giondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him ærðon ðec gicegde miððy ðu were under ðæm ficbeome vel fictree ic gisæh& giondsworade him nathanael & cwæð larwa ðu arð sunu godes ðu arð cynig israhelgiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him forðon ic cweoð ðe ic gesæh ðec under ðæm ficbeome ðu gilefes mara of ðæm ðu bist gisegen& cwæð him soðlice soðlice ic cweoðo iow ge giseað ðone heofun ontyned & englas godes ofdune astigende & stigende oferufa suno monnes& dæge ðirda hæmdo vel feorme awordne werun in ðær byrig & wæs ðio moder & ðe hælend ðergiceged wæs wutudlice & ðe hælend & ðegnas his to ðæm feormum& miððy giscyrte ðæt win cwæð ðio moder ðæs hælendes to him winn ne habbað& cwæð him ðe hælend hwæt me & ðe is wif ne ða gett com tide mincwæð moder his ðæm embihtmonnum swa hwæt gecweoðas to iow doað vel wyrceð ðætwerun wutudlice stenene fato sexo gisette æfter clænsunge iudeana nimende vel ginom syndrige sestras twoege vel ðriacwæð him ðe hælend gifyllað ge ða fato ðas of wætre & gifyldun d ðailco oð to to briorde upp& cwæð him ðe hælend biriligað nu & brengað ðæm aldormen & togibrohtunðæt wutudlice inberigde ðe aldormon ðæt wæter to wine giworden & ne wiste hwona were ða embihtmen wutudlice giwistun ðaðe biriladun vel wæs ðæt wæter gicegað ðone brydguma ðe aldormonn& cwæð him eghwelc mon ðe forma vel ærist ðæt gode win seted & miððy indruncne bioðon menn ðonne vel ðæt ðætte wyrest bið ðu soðlice giheolde ðæt gode winn wið to ðisse vel wið nuðis worhte fruma ðara wundra ðe hælend in ðær byrig & æteowde wuldor his & gilefdun in hine ðegnas hisæfter ðisse ðona astag ða of burug he & moder his & his broðro & ðegnas his & ðer giwunade no monigne dæg& gineolicad wæs eostrum iudeana & astag hierusalem ðe hælend& gimoette in temple bibyccende exen & scip & culfre & ða myneteras sitende& miððy giworhte swelce swiopa of rapun alle ða fordraf of ðæm temple ða scip ec to ðon & ða exen & ðara mynetera ofgeatt mæslen & ða discas ymbcerde& ðæm ðaðe ða culfra bibohtun gibrengað ðas hiona nallað ge giwyrcan hus fedres mines hus cepingeeftgimyndge forðon werun ðegnas his ðætte awriten wæs anunga huses ðines giett mecgiondwordun forðon iudei & cwedun him hwelc becun ðu æteowes us forðon wyrcas ðasgiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð ðæm unduað ðone tempel ðis & on ðrim dagum ic awecco ðætcwedun forðon iudeas feowertig & sex winter gitimbred wæs tempel ðes & ðu on ðrim dagum aweceð ðæthe wutudlice gicwæð of temple lichoma hismiððy forðon arises vel aras from deoðe eftgimyndge werun ðegnas his forðon ðis gicwæð ðe hælend & gilefdun ðæm giwrite & worde ðem ðætte cwæð ðe hælendmiððy wutudlice were vel wæs ðæm liodum in eostru on halgum dæge monige gilefdun on noma his gisegon beceno his ðaðe he worhtehe wutudlice ðe hælend ne gelefde vel ne gitrygade hine solfne him forðon ðætte he usih wiste alleðaðe werc him ne wæs ðætte ne ænig vel eghwelc cyðnisse ðerhtrymede of menn he forðon wiste hwæt were in menn he forðonwæs wutudlice sum mon of phariseum ginemned aldormon iudeanaðes com to him on næht & cwæð him larow we wutun forðon ðu come from gode larow ne ænig forðon mæge ðas tacono ðu giwyrca ðaðe ðu does buta sie drihten mið himgiondworde ðe hælend & cwæð soðlice soðlice ic cweoðo ðo buta hwelc acenned sie snude vel niowunga ne mæge gisea rice godescwæð to him nichodemus huu mæg monn ðætte sie acenned miððy ald bið hweðer vel hwæt mæge on wombe modor his ðætte ge ingæ & acenned siegiondsworade him æftersona ðe hælend & cwæð soð is soðlice ic cweðo ðe buta hwelc eftboren sie of wætre & gaste halgum ne mæg ingaa in rice godesðæt acenned is of flæsce lichoma is & ðætte acenned is of gaste gast isne wundra ðu forðon ic cweðo ðe giriseð vel bihofað iow alle snude ofniowegast ðer will oeðiga & stefn his ðu giheres ah ne wastu hwona cymeð & hwider gæð swa is eghwelc seðe acenned is of gasteondsworade & cwæð him & huu magun ðas wosagiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him ðu arð laror israhelisc & ðas ðu nastsoð soðlice ic cweðo ðe forðon ðæt ðu wast vel wuton ðæt we gispreocas & ðætte we giseað we gitrymmað & cyðnisse use vel userra ne onfoas gegif ða on eorðlico ic cweðo iow & ne gilefas ge huu gif ic cweðo iow ða heofunlico ge gilefas& ne ænig mon astag in heofnas buta seðe ofdune astag of heofne suno monnes seðe is on heofne& swa gifeade vel forcom ða nedre on ðæm westenne swa gifeage vel oferswiðe gidæfnað sunu monnesðætte eghwelc seðe gilefeð in ðone ne losað ah hæfeð lif hæfeð eceswa forðon lufade god ðiosne middengeard ðætte sunu his ancenda gisalde ðæt eghwelc seðe gilefeð in hine ne losað ah hæfeð lif eccene forðon sende god suno his on middengeard ðæt gidoemde middengeord ðætte gihæled were middengeard ðerh hineseðe gilefeð on hine ne bið ðe gidoemed seðe wutudlice ne gidoemeð ne gilefes fæstlice gidoeomed is forðon ne gilefeð on noma ðæs ancenda sunu godesðis is wutudlice ðe doema his forðon leht com on middengeord & cwedun menn swiðor ðiostru ðonne leht wæs forðon hiora yfle vel mis werceghwelc forðon seðe yfle vel mis doeð gifiað ðæt leht & ne cymeð to lehte ðætte ne sie forcwedeno werc hisseðe wutudlice doeð soðfæstnisse cymeð to lehte ðætte se æteowed werc his forðon in gode sindun giwordneæfter ðassum com ðe hælend & ðegnas his in iudea eorðo vel ðer giwuna mið hine & gifulwadewæs wutudlice ec & iohannes fulwende in ðær stowwe æt vel neh salim ðær stowe forðon wæter monige werun ðer & togicomun monige & gifulwade werunne ða gett forðon asended wæs in carcernaworden wæs forðon doom of ðegnum his iohannis mið iudeum from clænsunge& gicomon to iohannem cwedun him larow seðe wæs ðec mið bigeonda iordanen ðæm ðu cyðnisse ðerhtrymedes heono ðes fulwade & alle comon to himgiondsworade iohannes & cwæð him ne mæg mon onfoa ænig buta se him sald of heofnege iow me cyðnisse ðerhtrymes ðætte cwæð iow ic ne am ic crist ah forðon gisended am ic bifora himseðe hæfeð ða bryde brydguma is vel bið friond vel meg wutudlice ðæs brydguma seðe stondeð & giheres mið gifeo gifeað fore stefne ðæs brydguma ðis forðon gifea vel glædscip min gifylled ishim gidæfnað ðætte awexe wutudlice mec ðæt ih lytligeseðe ufa com oferufa allum is & oferufa spreceð seðe wutudlice is of eorðo of eorðo is & of eorðo spreceð seðe of heofnum com ofer is alle is& ðætte gisæh & giherde ðæt is gitrymed & cyðnisse his ne ænig mon onfoæðseðe onfoeð his cyðnisse his gimercade forðon god soðfæst isðonne forðon sende god word godes gispreces no forðon to gimoetanne seleð god gastðe fæder lufað ðone suno & alle salde in honda hisseðe gilefeð on ðone suno hæfeð lif ece seðe wutudlice ungelefend is on ðone suno ne gisið lif ah wræððo god wuneð ofer hineðæt forðon ongætt forðon giherdon ða aldewearas ðætte ðe hælend monige ðegnas wyrceð & fulwað ðonne iohannesðeh ðe vel swa he ðe hælend ne fulwade ah ðegnnas hisforleort iudeam eorðo & foerde eftersona in galileamwæs gidæfendlic wutudlice hine ðætte oferfoerde ðerh ða burugcom forðon in ða cæstre samaria ðio is gicweden sichar neh ðær byrig ðætte salde iacob iosepes suno hiswæs wutudlice ðer wælla iacobes ðe hælend forðon woerig wæs of gonge sitende wæs vel sæt swa ofer ðæm wælla tid wæs swelce ðio sextawif of ðær byrig to hladanne ðæt wæter cwæð him ðe hælend sel me drincaðegnas wutudlice foerdun in cæstre ðætte mete bohtun himcwæð forðon to him ðæt wif ðio samaritanesca hu ðu iudesc miððy arð drincende from me giowestu ðaðe miððy wif samaritanesc ne forðon gibyrelic bið iudea to samaritaniscumgiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him gif ðu wistes hus godes & hwelc were seðe cwæð ðe sel me drinca ðu wutudlice vel woenis mara gif ðu georwades from him & gisalde ðe wæter cwicwellecwæð to him ðæt wif drihten ne in hwon ða hlado hæfest ðu & ðe pytt neh is hwona vel hwer forðon hæfest ðu wæter cwicwelleahne arðu mara feder usum iacobe seðe salde us ðiosne pytt vel wælla & he of him dranc & suno his & feoðorfoto vel neteno hisgiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð eghwelc seðe drinceð of wætre ðis ðæt ic selo in ecnisseseðe wutudlice drinceð of wætre ðæt ic selo him ne ðyrstet in ecnisse ah wæter ðæt ic selo him bið in ðæm wælla wætres saltes in life ecumcwæð him ðæt wif drihten sel me ðis wæter ðæt ic ne ðyrste ne ic ne cymo hider to hladanne vel to fyllannecwæð him ðe hælend gaa ceig were ðinum & cym hiderondsworade ðæt wif & cwæð him ne hafo ic wer cwæð to hir ðe hælend gaa ceig were ðinum & cym hider ondsworade ðæt wif & cwæð him ne hafo ic wer cwæð to hir ðe hælend wel ðu cwede ðætte ic ne hafo werfife forðon weoras ðu hæfdes & nu ðonne hæfes ne is ðin wer ðis soðlice ðu cwedecwæð him ðæt wif drihten ic gisiom forðon witgu arð ðufædres uses on more ðissum giworðadun & gie cweoðas ðætte in hierusalem is ðio stow ðer giworðade ge gidæfnað iscwæð hir ðe hælend la wif gilef me forðon com ðio tid ðonne ne on more ðissum ne in hierusalem toworðadun ðone fædergie worðigas ðætte we ne wutun we worðigað ðætte we wutun we ðætte forðon hælo of iudeum isah com ðio tid & nu is ðone soðlice weorðigas geworðadun ðone fæder in gaste & mið soðfæstnisse forðon & ðe fæder hie soeceð ðuslico forðon geworðigas hine in gastegast is god & ða ða forðon worðigas hine in gaste & soðfæstnisse us gidæfnað to worðannecwæð to him ðæt wif ic wat ðætte ðe gicorna com gisægeð allecwæð hir ðe hælend ic am seðe ic spreco ðec mið& recone comun ðegnas his & giwundradun forðon mið ðæm wife riordade vel spræc nænig mon hweðre cwæð him hwæt soecestu mið hiæforleort forðon fetels hire ðæt wif & foerde in ða cæstre & cwæð ðæm monnumcumað & giseað ðone mon seðe cwæð to me alle ðaðe swa hwæt ic dyde hweðer ahne he is crist& uteodun of ðær byrig & gicomon to himbitwih ðæm bedon hine ðegnas his cweðende ðu larwa ett vel bruche wutudlice to him cwæð ic mett hafo ðone ge vel iowih ne wutunforðon cwedon ðegnas his cweðende him bitwih hweðer vel hwæthwoegu vel ænigmon brohte him eotacwæð him ðe hælend min mett is ðæt ic doe willo his fædres seðe sende mec & ðætte ic endigo werc hisah ne ge cweoðas ðætte geona feower monoðas sindun & monað ripes tid com heono ic cweðo iow ahebbað ego iowre & giseað & giseað ða lond ðaðe hwite sindun soðlice to ripe& seðe ripe meorde onfoeð & gisomnigað wæstem in life ecum ðætte & seðe saweð gilice gifeað & seðe ripein ðisse forðon is word soðe ðætte forðon oðer is seðe sawes & oðer is seðe ripeðic sendo iow girip ðætte ge ne wunnun oðre awunnun ah ge in giwinne hiora infoerdunof ðær cæstre wutudlice ðæm monige gilefað in hine ðara samaritanesca fore worde ðæs wifes cyðnisse gitrymedes forðon cwæð me alle ðaðe swa hwæt ic worhtemiððy comun forðon to ðæm ðara samaritanesca gibedun hine ðætte ðer giwunade & wunade ðer twoege dagas& swiðe monige gilefdun fore worde his& ðæm wife cwedun ðætte soðlice ne for ðinre sprece we gilefdun he forðon giherde from him & we wutun ðætte ðes is soðlice hælend middengeordesæfter wutudlice twoege dagum foerde ðona & eode in galileamhe forðon ðe hælend cyðnisse ðerhtrymede forðon witga in his oedle worðscip vel are ne hæfeðmiððy forðon gicome in galileam ginomon hine galilesce men mið alle gisegun ðaðe worhte in hierusalem on dæge ðæm he forðon comun on dæge ðæmcom forðon eftersona in ða burug ðer worhte ðæt wæter to wine & wæs sum mon regoloword ðæs vel his sunu inuntrymide vel untrymede ða burugðis miððy giherde forðon ðe hælend tocyme from iudeam in galileam eode to him & gibæd hine ðætte he adune astige & gihælde sunu his ongunnun forðon deoðigacwæð forðon ðe hælend to him buta buta & seðe wundor ge giseað ne gilefaðcwæð to him drihten astig ær ðon se dead sunu mincwæð to him ðe hælend gaa suno ðin lifeð gilefde ðe mon ðæm word ðæt cwæð him ðe hælend & awoegeodegisæh wutudlice hine stigende esnas giurnon togægnes him & sægdun him cweðende forðon sunu min lifeðgifrægn forðon ða tide from him in hwelce vel betre hæfde & cwedun him ðætte gestor dæge ðy siofunda forleort hine ðæt feferaðolongætt forðon ðe fæder ðætte ðærilca wæs ðio tid in ðær mæhte cwæð to him ðe hælend suno ðin lifeð & gilefde he & hus his allðis eftersona æftersona becon dyde ðe hælend miððy gicome from iudeum in galileamæfter ðisse wæs dæg halgum ðara iudeana & astag ðe hælend hierusalemofer ðær burge fiscfell ðio ðe ginemned is on ebrisc ðæt is byrug fif portas hæfdein ðæm gilæg mengo micele ðara unhalra vel adligra & blindra haltra giscrungenra biddendra wætres ymbcerengel wutudlice drihtnes æfter tide ðæt ymbcerde ðæt wæter swa hwælc swa forðon ærist ofdune astag vel foerde ofdune astag in ða burg æfter styrenisse wætres hale wosa from adle swa hwelc were gihaldenwæs wutudlice sum mon ðritig & æhtowe wintra on him untrymnisse hisðonne miððy gisæh licende & ongætt hine ðætte monige swiðe tide vel hwyle hæfde cwæð him wyltu hal wosagiondsworade him ðe unhala drihten monno vel helpe ne hafo ic ðætte miððy gistyred wæs vel bið ðæt wæter asende mec in ðone fiscpoll ða hwile ic cymo forðon ic oðerne bifore me astigecwæð ðe hælend aris & ginim bere ðine & gaa& recone hal giworden wæs ðe mon & underhof bere his & eode vel gongende wæs wæs wutudlice on sunna dæge on ðæm dægecwedun iudeas ðæm seðe gihæled wæs symbeldæg is & ne is gilefeð ðe ðæt ðu ginime bere ðine& ondsworade ðæm seðe mec dyde halne he me cwæð ginim bere ðine & gaagifrugnun hine hwelc is ðe mon seðe cwæð ðe nim bere ðine & gaaðe ilca wutudlice seðe hal wæs giworhte nyste vel ne cuðe hwelc were ðe hælend ðonne fromgibegde forðon ðio mengo wæs efnegiseted in stoweæfter ðon gimoette hine ðe hælend in ðæm temple & cwæð to him heono giworden wæs hall gi nelle ðu gisyngiga ðætte ne wyrsa ðe hwæthwoegnu bilimpefoerde ðe monn & sægde iudeum ðæt ðe hælend were seðe hine dyde halnefore ðæm vel ða gioehtadun iudeas ðone hælend forðon ðas giworhte on symbeldægeðe hælend wutudlice giondsworade him fæder min from ðisse we wyrcað & ic wyrcofore ðæm wutudlice swiðor sohtun hine iudeum to cwellanne forðon ne ðæt an untynde ðone sunnadæg ah ec & ðe fæder his cwæð god were gilic him wyrcende godeondsworade forðon ðe ðe hælend & cwæð him soðlice soð is ic cweðo iow ne mæg wyrcan ænig from him buta ðætte gisii ðone fæder swa hwæt swa he wyrceð ðas & gilice ðe suno wyrceððe fæder forðon lufað ðone suno & alle æteowde him ðas ðeilca wyrceð & ða masta her æteowde him werc ðæt ge wundrigeswa forðon ðe fæder aweceð ðe deade & inlihteð swa ec & ðe suno ðaðe he wyl he gicwicaðne forðon vel forðon doemeð ænig ah dom eghwelcum salde ðæm sunoðæt alle worðigas ðone fæder swa hie worðigas ðone suno seðe ne worðas ðone suno ne worðas ðone fæder seðe sende hinesoð is soðlice ic cweðo iow ðætte ðeðe gihereð word & seðe gilefeð him seðe sende mec hæfeð lif ecce & on dome ne cymeð ah oferliorað deoð to lifesoð ic cweðo iow forðon cymeð tid min & nu is ðonne ða deado giherað stefne suno godes & seðe gilerað hia lifgasswa forðon fæder lif in him solfum& mæhte salde him & dom giwyrca forðon suno monnes isnallað ge wundriga forðon com in ðær alle ðaðe in byrgennum sindum gihereð stefne his& forðcymeð ðaðe god worhtun in eriste lifes ðaðe wutudlice yfle dydon in eriste domesne mæg ic from mec solfne adoa æniht ah gihero on dome & dom min soðfæst is forðon ne soeco ic willo his vel minne ah willo his seðe sendeð mecgif ic cyðnisse ic gitrymmo fore mec cyðnisse mine ne is soðoðer is seðe cyðnisse gitrymeð of mec & ic watt forðon soð is cyðnisse ðætte gitrymeð of mege sendun to iohanne & cyðnisse gitrymide to soðfæstnisseic wutudlice ne from menn cyðnisse onfeng ah ðas ic cweðo ðætte hale siehe wutudlice ða ðæcella vel lehtfæt biornende & lixende ge wutudlice naldun gifeaga to tide in lehteic wutudlice ic hafo cyðnisse mara iohanne werc forðon ðaðe salde me ðe fæder ðætte ic giendade ða ðailco werc ðaðe ic wyrco cyðnisse gitrymeð of me forðon ðe fæder mec sende& seðe sendeð mec ðe fæder he cyðnisse gitrymede of mec ne stefne his giherdun æfre ne megwlit his ge gisegun& word his ne habbas in iow wunað forðon ðonne sende he ðissum ge ne gilefdunsmeogas ge ða giwriotu forðon ge woenas in ðæm lif ecce hæbbe & ða ilce sint ðaðe cyðnisse gitrymmas of me& ne wallas cuma to me ðætte lif ge hæbbeberhtnisse from monnum ne onfoe icah ic cuðe iowih ðætte lufo godes ne habbas ge in iowic com in noma fædres mines & ne onfoas ge mec gif wutudlice oðer cymeð in noma his hine vel ðene ge onfoashu magon vel mæhtun ge iowih gilefa seðe wuldor bitwih him ge onfengun & ðæt wuldor ðaðe from anum gode is ne soecað genallað giwoena ðætte ic forhyccende sie iowih mið ðone fæder is seðe forhogað iowih in ðone ge gihyhtasgif forðon ge gilefdun ge gilefdun woenunga & me of mec forðon he awratgif wutudlice ðes stafum ne gilefas wordum minum ne gilefas geæfter ðisse foerde ðe hælend ofer sæ ðæt is ðio luh& fyligdun vel sohtun hine menigo micle forðon gisegun becun ðaðe worhtun ofer ðæm ðaðe werun untrymigefoerde forðon on mor ðe hælend & ðer seet mið ðegnum hiswæs wutudlice neh eostrum symbeldæges iudeanamiððy underhof forðon ego ðe hælend & gisæh ðætte micelo mengu com to him cwæð to him philippum hwona byccas we hlafas ðætte we gibruche ðasðis ðonne cwæð ðæt gicostade hine he forðon wiste ðæt were awordengiondsworade him cwæð tu hund peninga to hlafum ne ginyhtsumað him ðæt an gihwelc lytel hwæthwoegno onfoecwæð an of ðegnum his broðeris cnæht an her seðe hæfeð fif hlafas of bere & tuoege fiscas ah ðas hwæt sindun bitwih monigumcwæð forðon ðe hælend wyrcas ðætte ða menn gisitte wæs wutudlice heg vel gers micel in ðær stowe gisetun forðon wearas of tale swelce fif ðusendonfeng forðon ðe hælend ða hlafas & miððy ðoncunge dyde salde ðæm sitendum gilice & of ðæm fiscum swa feolo swa hiæ waldunðæt wutudlice gifylde werun cwæð ðegnum his somnigas ðaðe hia læfdun ða screadunga ðætte ne loesigegisomnadun forðon & gifyldon twelfe ceoflas ðara screadunga of fif hlafum beres ðæs ðer ofer werun to lafe of ðæm ðaðe etunða forðon ða men miððy gisegun ðæt becun ðætte worhte gicwedun forðon ðis soðlice witga forðon tocymende is on ðiosne middengeordðe hælend miððy ongætt ðætte tocymende were ðætte ginome hine ðætte giworhte hine to cynige fleh eftersona on mor he forðon him anaðæt he soðða smyltnisse aworden wæs ofastigun vel foerdun ðegnas his to sæ& miððy astigun ðæt scip comon ofer sæ in ða burug & ðiostro swiðe giwordne werun & ne miððy comun to him ðe hælendeðe sæ wutudlice winde miclum forbleow ofstod vel arasmiððy reowun forðon swelce spyrdo fife & twoegentig vel ðritig gisegon ðone hælend gongende ofer ðone sæ & neh ðæm scipe wosa & ondreordunhie ða cwæð him ic am nallað ge ondredawaldun forðon onfoa hine in ðæt scip & sona wæs ðæt scip to ðær eorðo ðe he ðider foerdeoðre dæge ðe ðreatt ðe gistod ofer sæ gisæh forðon ða floege oðre ne wæs ðer buta hiæ ana & ðætte ne infoerde mið ðegnum his ðe hælend in scipe ah ana ðegnas his foerdunoðre soðlice ofer comon sciopu of ðæm ealonde neh ðær stowe ðer gietun ðæt bread ðoncunge dydon godemiððy gisæh forðon & ða mengu forðon ðe hælend ne wæs ðer ne ðegnas his astigun ða sciopu & comun to ðær byrig sohtun vel soecende werun ðone hælend& miððy gimoetun hine bigeonda ðæm sæ cwedun to him ðu larwa hwenne hider come ðugiondsworade him ðe hælend & cwæð soð is soðlice ic cweðo iow gisoecas mec ne forðon ge gisegun becun & foretacun ah forðon ge gietun of ðæm hlafum & gifylde werunwyrcas ge ne mett seðe loseð ah seðe wuneð in life ecun ðonne suno monnes iow seleð ðiosne forðon fæder gimercade drihtencwedun forðon to him hwæt doað we ðætte we giwyrce werc godesgiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him ðis is werc godes ðætte ge gilefe on hine ðone ilco sende hecwedun forðon to him hwæt forðon ðu does becun ðætte we gisie & we gilefe ðe hwæt wyrces ðufædrum vel ældrum usum gibrecon vel eton on ðæm woesterne swa awriten is hlaf of heofnum salde him drihten to eotannecwæð forðon him ðe hælend soðlice soð ic cweðo iow ne moyses salde iow hlaf ah fæder min salde iow hlaf of heofnum soðlicehlaf forðon godes is seðe ofdune astigeð of heofne & seleð lif middengeordecwedun forðon to him drihten sæl us symle ðiosne hlafcwæð wutudlice him ic am hlaf lifes seðe cymeð to me ne hyncre hine & seðe gilefeð on mec ne ðyrsteð æfreah ic cweðo iow ðaðe & ge gisegun mec & ne gilefdun vel gilefas gealle ðæt ic sellað me fæder to me cymeð & hine seðe com to me ne giworpo ic uttforðon ofdune astigeð ne þætte ic doe willo minne ah willo his seðe sendeð mecðis is wutudlice willo his seðe sendeð mec ðæs fædres ðætte alle ðætte salde me ne loesge ic of ðæm æniht ah eftawecce ðone vel hine in ðæm lætemesta dægeðios is willa fædres mines seðe mec sende ðætte alle ðaðe giseað suno & gilefað in hine habbað lif ece vel in ecnisse & aweco ic hine on ðæm lætemesta dægehwispradun vel sprecun forðon iudeas of him forðon ne cwæð ic am hlaf lifes seðe of heofne ofdune astag& cwedun ahne ðis is suno iosepes ðæs we wutun fæder & moder huu forðon nu cweðes ðes ðætte of heofne ofdune astaggiondsworade forðon ðe hælend & cwæð him nallað ge hwispriga vel misspreoca iow bitwionnænig mon ne mæg cuma to me buta fæder seðe sende mec ginioma hine & ic awecco hine in ðæm lætemestan dægeawriten is in witgum & bioðon alle larwas vel welgilærde godes eghwelc seðe giherde from feder & giliornade cymeð to mene forðon ðone fæder gisæh ænig buta ðe ðeðe is from gode ðes gisæh ðone fædersoð is soðlice ic cweðo iow seðe gilefeð in mec hæfeð lif ecceic am hlaf lifesfædres iowres gibrecun on ðæm woestenne ðone fostreð & deode werunðis is hlaf lifes ufastigende of heofnum ðætte gif hwelc of ðæm gibrucceð ne deadaðic am hlaf cwic seðe of heofne ufastag gif hwelc gibruches of ðissum hlafe lifeð in ecnisse & hlaf ðone ic selo lichoma min is fore middengeorde lifesgetugun l cedun forðon iudeum to bitwion iow cweðende huu mæg ðes us lichoma his sella to eotannecwæð forðon him ðe hælend soð is soðlice ic cweðo iow buta ge gibrucce lichoma his to sellanne to eotanne cwæð forðon him ðe hælend soðlice suno monnes & gidrinces his blod ne habbað in iow lifseðe gibrucceð minne lichoma & drincheð min blod hæfed lif in ecnisse & ic awecco hine in ðæm yttmesta dagumlichoma forðon min soðlice is mett & blod min soðlice is dryncseðe eteð minne lichoma & drinceð min blod in me wunað & ic in himswa sende mec ðe fæder ðe lifgende & ic lifo fore ðone fæder & seðe eteð mec & he lifeð fore mecðis is hlaf seðe of heofne ofdune astag ne swa gibrecun ældro iower ðone heofunlica mett & deode werun seðe eteð ðiosne hlaf lifeð in ecnisseðas cwæð in somnungum lærde in ðær byrigmonige forðon of ðegnum his cwedun stið is ðis word hwa mæg hine niherawiste wutudlice ðe hælend mið hine solfne forðon vel ðætte hie hwispradun of ðisse ðegnas his cwæð him ðis iowih geondspyrnaðgif forðon ge giseað suno monnes ofdune stigende hwer wæs æristgast is seðe liffæsteð lichoma nefor forstondes æniht word ðaðe ic sprecende am iow gast & lif sintah sindun sume of iow ðaðe ne gilefað wiste forðon from fruma god ðaðe werun gilefende & hwelc sellende were hine& cwæð to ðæm foreðæm ic cwæðo iow forðon nænig mon ne mæg cuma to me buta sald were him from feder minumof ðisse monige ðegnas his fromfoerdun on bæcling wutudlice ne miððy eoduncwæð forðon ðe hælend to ðæm twelfum ah hweðre & ge wallað fromgongaondsworade forðon him symon petrus drihten to hwon we gigonge word lifes eces ðu hæfes& we gilefdun & & we ongetun forðon ðu arð crist suno godesgiondsworade him ðæ hælend ah ne ic iowih twelfe giceos & of iow an diowul iscweð wutudlice iudas simeon ðe scariothisce ðis wæs forðon sellende hine wæs an of ðæm twelfumæfter ðisse ðe hælend eode in ða cæstre ne forðon walde in iudeam gonga forðon sohtun hine to acwellanne iudeaswæs wutudlice neh iudeam temples mæssacwedun wutudlice to him broðro his fær hiona & gaa in iudeam ðætte & ðegnas ðine giseað werc ðine ða ðu doesnænig mon forðon in degolnisse hwæthwoegno wyrces & soece he in eowunga were gif ðas ðu wyrce æteow ðec him solfne midengeordene forðon broðro his gilefdun in hine necwæð forðon him ðe hælend tide min ne ða gett tocom tid wutudlice iower symle is georone mæg midengeord gifioge iowih mec wutudlice fiað forðon cyðnisse ðerhtrym of ðæm forðon werc his yfle sindunge astigað to dæge symbles ðiosne forðon min tid ne ðagett gifylled isða miððy gicwedun he wunade inðætte wutudlice astigun broðro his ða & he astag to dæge symbles ne vel no eowunga ah swelce in degolnisseiudeas forðon sohtun hine on dæge symbles & cwedun hwer is he& hwisprunge micle wæs of ðæm in ðreote sume forðon cwedun forðon god is oðre wutudlice cwedun nese ah se swiceð ða mengone ænigmon hweðre eowunga gisprec from him fore fyrhto iudeage wutudlice to dæge symbles giworht wæs astag ðe hælend on tempel & lærde& wundradun iudeas cweðende huu ðes stafas watt miððy ne giliornadegiondsworade him ðe hælend & cwæð min lar ne is min ah his seðe sende mecwelle willige ongeatað of lare hweðer of gode sie vel ic from me solfa ic spreocoseðe from him sprecen bið wuldor swiðor soeceð seðe wutudlice soeceð wuldor his seðe sendes hine soðcweden is & in soðfæstnisse ðæm ne isah ne moyses salde iow æ & nænig of iow wyrceð æ hwæt mec ge soecas to acwellannegiondsworade him ðio mengo & cwæð diowul ðu hæfes hwa ðec soeceð to acwellannegiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him an werc ic dyde & alle wundriaðforeðæm salde iow ðæt ymbhycgende ne forðon of moyse were ah of aldrum & on symbeldæge ge ymbceorfas ðone monnogif ðæt ymbcerfnisse/ onfoeð monn on sunnadæge ðætte ne se undoen æ moyses mec ge iorsigas forðon alle ðone monno halne ic dyde on sunnadægenallað ge doema æfter onsione ah soðfæstne dom ge doemaðcwedun forðon sume of ðær byrig ah ne ðis is ðone gesoecað to acwellanne& heono eowunga spreocað & noht him cweoðas ah ne soðlice ongetun ða aldormen ðætte ðes is cristah ðiosne we wutun hwona sie crist wutudlice miððy gicymes nænig watt hwona siecliopende forðon lærde in temple ðe hælend & cwæð & mec ge wutun & from me solfum ne com ic ah is soð seðe sende mec ðone ge ne wutunic watt hine seðe from him solfum & he mec sendesohtun forðon hine to gigripanne & nænig mon sende in hine honda forðon ne ða gett gicom tid hisof ðæm ðreote wutudlice monige gilefdun on hine & cwedun crist miððy cymeð næfre ah hweðer monige becon worhte ðonne ða ðes doeðgiherdun ða æs larwas ðone ðreott hwisprende of ðæm ðas & sendun ða aldormenn & æs larwas embihtmenn ðætte hie gegripe hinecwæð forðon ðe hælend ða gett lytel tid iow miððy am & gaa to him ah ne sende mecge soecað mec & ne gimoetas ge & ðer am vel biom ic ne magon ge cuma gecwedon forðon iudeas to him solfum ðider ðes færende wæs forðon ne gimoettun we hine hweðer on towyrpnisse hæðna færende wæs & lærende hæðnohwæt is ðis word ðonne cwæð soecas ge mec & ne gimoetað ge mec & ðer am ic ne magon ge cumaon ðæm lætemesta dæge wutudlice dæge miclum ðæs symbles stod ðe hælend & cliopade cwæð gif hwelc ðyrste cyme to me & drinceðseðe gilefeð on mec swa cwæð ðæt giwritt streomas of wombe his flowað lifgendeðis wutudlice cwæð of gaste ðone ondfenge werun gilefden in hine ne forðon wæs gast gisald forðon ðe hælend ne ða geona wæs giwuldradof ðæm forðon ðe ðreott miððy giherde ðas word his cwedun ðis is soðlice witgaoðre cwedun ðes is crist sume wutudlice cwedun hweðer of ðær megðe crist comah ne ðæt writt cwæð ðætte of sede dauiðes of & burug ðer wæs dauið to cymende is cristtoslitnisse vel unsibbe forðon aworden wæs in ðær mengo fore himsum fæstlice of ðæm waldun to gigripanne hine ah nænig mon sende ofer hine hondacomon efter ða embihtmenn to ðæm aldormen & æs larwum & cwedun him ða forhwon ne brohtun ge hinegiondsworadun ða embihtas hweðer ec biswicen aron swa sprecende wæs ðe mon swa ðis mongiondsworadun forðon him æs larwas ah ne & ge biswicen aronah ne ænig of aldormonnum gilefde in hine vel of æs larwumah ðreott ðes ðaðe ðu ne wast vel nyste æ awerged sinduncwæð ðe ðegn to him he seðe cymeð to him on næht seðe an wæs of ðæmhweðer ge usra doemað ge ðone monno buta giherde ærist from ðæm & ongeteð hwæt wyrcað geondsworadun & cwedun hweðer ec & ðu galilesc arð smeoge & gisih forðon witga from galilea ne ariseð& gicerred werun an gihwelc cerdun in hus hisðe hælend wutudlice foerde on mor olifetes& arlice eftersona com in tempel & all ðæt folc com to him & sætt lærde hiætogilæddun wutudlice ða uðwutu & æs larwas wif in dernegilegerscipe ginumen vel gifoen & asettun ða ilco on middum& cwedun him larow ðis wif nu fornumen is in dernegiligroin æ wutudlice bibeod us ðuslic nu gistæna ðu forðon hwæt cweðestuðas forðon cwedun cunnadun hine ðætte hiæ mæge gihena hine ðe hælend wutudlice gibeg hine ofsyndrige mið fingre awritað in ecnissemiððy wutudlice ðerhwunadun frugnon hine ahof hine & cwæð him seðe buta synne is iowera ærist on ðær vel hia stan asendað& eftersona hine gibeg awrat on eorðogiherdun wutudlice ðis word an æfter anum fromfoerdun ongunnun from ðæm aldormonnum & giwunade ðe hælend ana & ðæt wif on middum stod bifora himahof wutudlice hine ðe hælend cwæð him wif ðæt hwer sindun ðaðe ðec gihenað ne ænigmon ðec giheneð vel niðraððio cwæð ne ænigmon drihten cwæð wutudlice him ðe hælend ne ic ðec giniðro gaa & forðor nelle ðu syngigaeftersona forðon sprecende wæs him ðe hælend cwæð ic am leht midengeordes ðisses seðe fylgeð mec ne gæð vel gonges in ðiostru ah hæfes leht lifes ecnissecwedun forðon him ða aldormen ðu of ðe solfun cyðnisse ðu trymedes cyðnisse ðine ne is soðgiondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him & gif ic cyðnisse gitrymmo of me solfum soð is cyðnisse min forðon ic watt hwona ic com l hwider gonge ge wutudlice ne wutun hwona ic com l hwider ic gæge æfter lichoma gedoemas ic ne doemu ænigne monnah gif ic doemu ic dom minne soð is forðon ana ne am ic ah ic & seðe mec sende ðe fæder& in æ iowrum awriten is forðon twoegra monna cyðnisse soð isic am seðe cyðnisse gitrymmo of me solfum & cyðnisse gitrymes ðe fæder ðin seðe sende meccwedun forðon him hwer is fæder ðin giondsworade ðe hælend ne mec wutas ge ne fæder minne gif mec ge wistun æðe mæg & fæder minne ge wistunðis word sprecende wæs ðe hælend in ðær byrig lærde in temple & nænig mon ne gilahte hine forðon ne ðagett comon tide hiscwæð forðon æftersona him ðe hælend ic gongo & ge fylgas vel soecas mec & in synnum iowrum ge deodigað ðider ic gongo ge ne magun cumacwedun forðon iudeas bitwih him hweðer ofslæð hine solfne forðon cwæð ðider ic gæ ge ne magun cuma& cwedun him ge for nede arun ic of heonissum am ge of middengeorde ðissum sindun ic ne am of ðissum middengeordeic cwæð forðon iow ðæt ge bioðon deadade in synnum iowrum gif wutudlice ne gilefað ge ðætte ic ne am ge bioðon deade in synnum iowrumcwedun him & ðu hwæt arð cwæð him ðe hælend fruma seðe ðas is spreco iowmonige ic hafo of iow to spreocanne & to doemanne ah seðe sende mec soðcweden is & ic ðaðe giherdun from him ðas ic spreco on middengeorde& ne ongetun ge forðon ðone fæder him cwæðcwæð forðon him ðe hælend miððy ge ahebbas suno monnes ðonne ge ongeotas ðætte ic am & from me solfum ic wyrco noht ah swa gilærde mec ðe fæder ðas is spreco& seðe mec sende mec mið is ne forleort mec ana forðon ic ðaðe gicwoeme sindun him ic doe symleðas hine sprecende monige gilefdun in hinecwedon forðon to him ðaðe gilefdun him ðara iudea gif ge ðerhwunigas on worde minum soðlice ðegnas ge bioðon& ge ongetun soðfæstnisse & soðfæstnisse gifriað iowihgiondsworadun him sed abrahames we sindun & nænigum we giherdun æfre huu ðu cweðes ge bioðon vel were gifriodegiondsworade him ðe hælend soð is soðlice ic cweoðo iow ðætte eghwelc seðe doeð synne ðræl is synnesesne wutudlice ne wuneð in huse in ecnisse sunu wutudlice wuneð in ecnissegif forðon sunu iow gefrioð soðlice frio ge bioðonic wat ðætte sunu abrahames ge arun ah soecað mec to ceorfanne l to cwellanne ðætte word min ne niomað in iowihic ðæt gisæh mið æt ðæm feder ic spreco & ge ðaðe gisegun æt feder iowrum ge wyrcesgiondsworadun & cwedun fæder user is cwæð him ðe hælend gif suno abrahames ge sint werc abrahames wyrcesnu wutudlice soecas mec to cwellanne ðone monno seðe soðfæstnisse sprecende am ðætte ic giherde fron gode ðis abraham ne dydege wutudlice wyrcað werc fæder iowres cwedun forðon him we from forlegere ne aron we acenned ancenned fæder habbas we godcwæð forðon him ðe hælend gif god fæder iower were & ge waldun lufiga mec wutudlice ic forðon of gode foerdun & com ne forðon from me solfum come ah he mec sendeforhwon sprece mine ne ongeotas ge forðon ne mægun ge gihera word minge from dæle diowles ge aron & wyllo fædras iowre ge wallas wyrcas he monslaga wæs from fruma & in soðfæstnisse ne stod forðon ne is soðfæstnis in him miððy spreceð leosunge from syndrigum spreocað forðon leosung is & fæder hisic wutudlice seðe soðfæstnisse ic cweðo ne gilefað ge mehwelc of iow giðreatað mec from synnum gif soðfæstnisse ic cweðo ne gelefes me ge forhwonforðon from gode is word godes giherde foreðon ge ne giherdun forðon from gode ne sint gegiondsworadun ðonne iudeas & cwedun him ah ne bletsadon we usih forðon samaritanesc arð ðu & of diowlum hæfesondsworade ðe hælend ic diowol ne hafo ah ic worðigo fæder minne & ge unworðadun mecic wutudlice ne soeco wuldor is seðe soeceð & doemeðsoð is soðlice ic cweðo iow gihwelc word min gehabbað deað ne gisið in ecnissecwedun forðon iudeas ne forgetun we forðon diowol deod is & witga & ðu cweðes gif hwelc word min gihaldeð ne bergeð deoð in ecnissehweðer arð ðu mara arð fædre usum seðe deod is & witga deode sindun ðone ðec solfne wyrcesondsworade ðe hælend gif ic wuldrigo mec solfne wuldor min noht is fæder min seðe wuldrað ðone ge cweoðas seðe god iower is& ne ongetun ge hine ic wutudlice watt hine & gif ic cweðo forðon ic ne wæt hine ic biom gilc iow leos ah ic watt hine & word his ic haldoabrahame feder iowrum gifeode ðætte gisege dæg minne & gisæh & gladade vel glæd wæscwæð vel cwedun forðon iudeas to him fiftig wintra ne ðageona hæfeð & abraham ðu gisegecwæð him ðe hælend soð is soðlice ic cweðo iow ær ðon abraham were ic amginomon forðon stanas ðætte worpadun ofer hine ðe hælend hydde hine & utteode of ðæm temple& ðona foerde gisæh monno blindne from acennisse& gifrægn hine ðegnas his cweðende larow hwelc syngade ðes vel ældro his ðætte blind acenned weregiondsworade him ðe hælend ne ðes syngade ne ældro his ah ðætte æteowed were werc godes in ðæmme gidæfnað to wyrcanne werc his seðe sende mec ða hwyle dæg is cymeð næht ðonne ænigmon ne mæg onwyrcanða hwile on ðissum middengeorde am leht am midengeordesðas miððy gicwæð aspeoft on eorðo & lam giworhte of ðæm spadle & ahof ðæt lam ofer egu his& cwæð him gaa & aðwah in ðæm wælla ðæt is eftgitrachtad asended eode forðon & aðwog ego his & com gisæhforðon nehgiburas & ðaðe gisegun hine ærist forðon ðarfa vel næfga wæs ah ne ðis is seðe sett & giorndeoðre cwedon ðætte ðis is oðre wutudlice cwedun nis æniht ah gilic is him he cwæð forðon ic amcwedon forðon him huu untynde werun egu ðeondsworade he ðe mon seðe cweden crist lam giworhte & smiride ego mine & cwæð me gaa to ðæm wælla & ðwah & eode & ðwog & gisæh& cwedun him hwer is he cwæð nat ictogibrohtun hine to ðæs æs larwum seðe blind wæswæs wutudlice iudea sunnadæg ne giheold ða ðæt lam worhte ðe hælend & ontynde ego hiseftersona forðon gifrægnun hine ða ælarwas cweðende huu gisege he wutudlice cwæð him lam gisette ofer ego & ðwog & heono ic gisæhcwedun forðon of æs larwum sume ne is ðes mon from gode forðon sunnadæg ne giheold oðre cwedun huu mæg mon synful ðas beceno giwyrcan & giflitt wæs in himcwedun forðon ðæm blinda eftersona ðu hwæt cweðes of him seðe ontynde egu ðine he wutudlice cwæð forðon witga isne gilefdun forðon iudeas of ðæm forðon blind were & gisege ða hwile cegdun ældro his ðaðe gisegun& gifrugnun hie cweðende ðes suno iower ðone ge cweoðas ðætte blind acenned is huu forðon nu gisæhgiondsworadun him ældro his & cwæðun we wutun ðætte ðes is suno user & forðon blind acenned wæshuu forðon nu gisið ne wuton we vel hwelc his ontynde ego ne wuton we hine vel ðone gifregnað ældo hæfeð he of him gispræcðæs cwedun ældro his forðon ondreordun iudeas fæstlice forðon gitugun vel gifliotun iudeas ðætte gif hwelc hine giondette crist buta ðær somnungum werefore ðære ældro his cwedun forðon ældo hæfeð hine gifrægnascegdun forðon æftersona ðone monno seðe wæs blind & cwedun him sel wuldor gode we wuton ðætte ðes mon synnfull iscwæð forðon he gif synfull is natt ic ænig vel enne ic wat ðætte blind miððy ic wæs huu gisæhcwedun forðon him hwæt dyde ðe huu ontynde ðe ego& giondsworade him cwæð iow ge & ge giherdun hwæt eftersona wallað gihera ahne hwæt & ge ne wallas ðegnas his wosaawerigdun vel miscwedun him & cwedun ðu ðegn ðæs arð we wutudlice moyses ðegnas we sindunwe wutun ðætte moyses sprecende wæs god ðiosne wutudlice ne wuton we hwona sieondsworade ðe mon cwæð him in ðis forðon to wundranne is forðon ge ne wuton hwona sie & ontynde min egowe wutun forðon ðætte ða synnfulle godes ne giherað ah gif seðe gode bydla is & willo his doeð nu ðone ge giheraðfrom weorlde ne is gihered forðon ontynde hwa ego ðæs blindaboronesbuta were ðes from gode ne mæhte giwyrcan ænihtondsworadun & cwedun him in synnum acenned wæs all & ðu læres usih & fordriofun hine uttgiherde ðe hælend ðætte awurpun hine utt & miððy gimoettun hine cwæð & ðu gilefes in suno godesondsworade he & cwæð hwelc is drihten ðætte ic gilefo in hine& cwæð him ðe hælend & ðu gisege hine & hwæt sprecende ðe mið he issoð he cwæð ic gilefo drihten & gifeoll to worðanne hine& cwæð him ðe hælend on dome ic on ðiosne middengeord com ðæt him ðaðe ne giseas hia gesii & ðaðe giseað blinde bioðon& giherdun of æs larwom ðaðe mið hine werun & cwedun him ah ne & ge blinde sinduncwæð him ðe hælend gif blinde aron we ne hæfdon ge synne nu soðlice cweoðas forðon we gisegun synne iowre wunetsoð is soðlice ic cweðo iow seðe ne ingæð ðerh dura hiorde is scipa ah astigeð oðre hwoena he scead vel ðæf is & sceaðoseðe ðonne ingæð ðerh dura hiorde is scipaðissum daraworde ontyneð & ða scip stefne his giheras & ða agne scip cegas syndrigum & lædeð hie& miððy ða syndrige scip sendeð vel forleteð bifora hiæ gað & ða scip hine soecað vel fylgað him forðon wuton stefne hisða utacumena wutudlice ne fylgað him ah fleas from him forðon ne cuðon vel nyston stefne ðara fremðraðas soðcwide vel gedd cwæð him ðe hælend ðailco wutudlice ne ongetun hwæt sprecende wæs himcwæð forðon him eftersona ðe hælend soðlice soð is ic cweðo iow ðætte ic am dura ðara scipaalle swa oft cymes vel comon ðeofas sindun & sceaða ah ne giherdun hie ða scip& monge gelefdun in hinewæs wutudlice sum adlig lazarus from of cæstre & swester hiswutudlice wæs ðio ðe smiride drihten mið smirnisse & gidrygde foet his mið herum hire ðæs wæs broðer untrumadesendun forðon ða swestro to him cweðende drihten heono ðonne ðu gilefes untrymnissegiherde wutudlice ðe hælend cwæð him untrymnisse ðios ne is to deoðe ah fore wuldre godes ðæt giwuldrad sie suno godes ðerh hinelufade soðlic ðe hælend martha & swester his maria & lazarumhwona forðon ðætte geherde forðon untrymig ða ðonne fæstlice giwunade in ðær ilca stowwe twæm dagumsoð ða ðona æfter ðisse cwæð to ðegnum his gonga we in iudeas eftersonacweðun him ðegnas ða larwa nu hiæ sohtun vel soecað ðec iudeas to stænenna & eftersona ðu færes ðidersaldun wutudlice ðæm biscope & æslarwum biden wæs ðætte gif hwelc ongetun hwer sie doemed ðætte gifengun hineðe hælend forðon ær sex dagas eostrum com in ða burig ðer wæs deod ðone ilca he awehte ðe hælendworhtun wutudlice him feorme ðer & ðegnade vel embihtade lazarus soðlice ana wæs of ðæm sittendum mið himforðon onfeng pund smirnisse diorwyrða wudo cynn vel wyrta cynn ðwog foett ðæs hælendes & drygde mið herum hire foett his & hus gifylled wæs wyrtstence ðære smirnissecwæð forðon an of ðegnum his iudeas ðe scariothisca seðe wæs hine sellendeforhwon ðios smirnisse ne come ðrim hundum peninga & sald were ðarfendumcwæð wutudlice ðis ne forðon of ðarfum gibyreð to him ah forðon ðeof wæs & sceoða hæfde ða ilca peningas ða ðe gisended were gilæddecwæð forðon ðe hælend forlett hia ðætte on dæge ðære byrgenne mine gihalde ðaðorfende forðon symle gihabbas mið iowih mec wutudlice ne symle gehabbas& ic wat ðætte bibod his lif ece is ðaðe forðon ic spreco swa cwæð me fæder gif ic sprecoær ðæm symbeldæge wutudlice eostro wiste ðe hælend ðætte com his tid ðætte oferliorde of ðissum middengeorde to feder miððy gilufade his ðaðe werun in middengeorde oððe on ende lufade hiæ& feorma giworden wæs mið diowlum fæstlice gisendes in heorte ðætte salde hine iudas simon ðe scariothiscawiste ðætte alle salde him ðe fæder in hond & forðon from gode foerde & to gode ges vel færesaras from ðær feorme & sette giwedo his & miððy onfeng ðæt lin ymbgyrde hinesoðða asende ðæt wæter in trog & ongan giðwa foett ðara ðegna & drygde mið ðæm line of ðæm wæs gigyrdedcom forðon to simone petre & cwæð him drihten ðu me ðwoege foettondsworade ðe hælend & cwæð him ðæt ic doe & ðu ne wast nu ðu wast wutudlice efter ðacwæð him to petrus ne ðwæs tu me foett in ecnisse ondsworade ðe hælend & gif ne ðwæ ðe ne hæfestu dæl mec miðondsworade ðe hælend sawel ðine fore mec ðu setes soð is soðlice ic cweðo ðe ne gisingeð ðe hona wið hwile ða ðu me onsæcesne se ic gidroefed in heorta iowrum gilefas ge in god & in mec gilefasin huse fædres mines hamas monige sindun gif forðon lytel ic cweðo iow forðon ic gongo gigeorwiga iow stowwe& gif ic færo & fore georwigo iow stowwe æftersona ic cymo & onfoe iowih to me solfum ðætte ðer am ic & ge giwutun& ðider ic gongo wutas ge & ðone woeg giwutuncwæð him thomas drihten ec wuton we hwider ðu gonges & huu magun we ðone woeg giwutacwæð to him ðe hælend ic am woeg soðfæstra & lif nænigmon com to feder ðæm buta ðerh mecgif ge ongetun mec & fæder minne soðlice ge ongeotas mec & of ðisse ge gongas hine & ge giseas hinecwæð him drihten æteow us ðone fæder & ginog is usah ðætte ne ongete midengeord ðætte ic lufo ðone fæder & swa bibodo salde me fæder swa ic dom arisseð wutun gonga hionaic am wintreo soð & fæder min londbyend isall ðætte palmung on mec ne brengende wæstem nimeð hine & alle seðe brenges wæstem hia clænsigað ðene ðætte ðe wæstem forðor gibrengege iow giclænsad bioðon fore worde ðæt ic sprecende am iowwunigas in me & ic in iow swa ðæt palmtreo ne mæge gibrenge ðone wæstem from me solfum buta ge giwuniga in life swa & ge buta in me seðe wunaðic am ðæt wintreo ge wutudlice ða palmtwigo seðe wunað in me & ic him ðes tobrenges wæstem micelne forðon buta me noht magun giwyrcagif hwelc in me ne wunað gisended bið utt swa palmtwigo & drugað vel wisnað & gisomnað hia & in fyr sendes & berneðgif ge wunigas in me & word min in iow ic wunigo swa hwæt ge welle ge giowiga & bið sald iowin ðisse giberhtnad is fæder min ðætte wæstem monigfaldne togibrenge & ge giworðas mine ðegnas& ge cyðnisse ge gitrymmas forðon from fruma mec mið ge aronðas sprecende ic am iow ðætte ne ondspyrnigebuta of somnungum gidoas iow ah cymið ðio tid ðætte alle seðe acweleð slæð iowih he letes vel doemes gifeo vel embihtnisse him he gefe vel selle gode& ðas hia doað forðon ne wutun ðone fæder ne mecah ðas sprecende ic am iow ðætte miððy cymeð tid hiora wosað ge gimyndge ðætte ic cwæðo iow ðas wutudlice iow from fruma ne cweðo forðon iow mið ic wæssoð nu ic gæ to him seðe mec sende & nænig mon of iow ne gifregno mec hwider gongestuah forðon ðas sprecende ic am iow unrotnisse gifylles heorte iowreah ic soðfæstnisse ic cweðo iow bihofað vel nedðarf is iow ðætte ic gaa gif forðon ne færo vel ne gongo ðe rummoda ne cymeð to iow& miððy cymeð he giðreað middengeord of synne & of soðfæstnisse & of domeðas ic sprecende am iow ðætte in mec sibbe ge habbað on middengeord oferswiðnisse ge habbað ah gitriowað ic forðon on ðone middengeordðas sprecende wæs ðe hælend & miððy ahebbendum egum on heofnas cwæð fæder com ðio tid bertnade sunu ðinne & sunu ðin berehtnað ðecswæ salde him mæhte eghwelces lichoma ðætte all ðæt ðu gisaldes him seleð him lif ecnisseðis is wutudlice lif ecnisse ðætte ongeotað ðec enne god soðne & ðone ðu sendes hælend cristic ðec bertnade ofer eorðo werc ic giendade ðætte ðu saldes me ðæt ic dom& nu wuldra ðu mec ðu fæder mið mec solfum in ðær bertnisse ic hæfde ærðon middengeord/ were mið ðecic æteowde noma ðinne monnum ðe ðu saldes me of middengeorde ðine werun & me hia ðu gisaldes & word ðine giheoldunnu ongetun ðætte alle ða ðu saldes me from ðe sintforðon word ða ðu saldes me ic salde him & hia onfengun soðlice ðætte from ðe ic foerde & ge gilefdun ðætte ðu mec sendes& cuð ic dyde him noma ðinne & cyð ic doe ðæm ðæt ic lufo ðætte ðu lufades mec in ðæm sie & ic in ðæmþa miððy cwæþ se hælend eode þa mid his þægnum his ofer þah hlynne þe mon cedron nemneþ þær wæs fæger gewyrtun in þæm he eode sylf & his þægnas hisþa wiste soþlice & iudas þe hine to deaþe sellan walde hine þa stowe forþon þider gelome se hælend cwom ðer mið his ðægnum hisiudas wiotudlice gefeng mið þreate & from þa biscopas & fariseos ealdormen cwomun þidera mid lehtfatu & brondum & wepenuhælend wutudlice wiste alle ðaðe toworde werun ofer hine gifeoll & cwæð him hwæt soecas geondsworadun him ðe hælend nazarenisca cwæð to him ðe hælend ic am gistod wutudlice & iudas seðe salde hine mið ðæmðætte forðon cwæð him ic am eodun onbæc & feollun on eorðoeftersona forðon hie gifrægn hwelcne soecas ge hia wutudlice cwedun ðone hælend nazareniscaondsworade him ic cweð iow ðætte ic am gif forðon mec soecas forletas ðas gaacliopadun eftersona alle cweðende no ðiosne ah barabban wæs wutudlice barrabbas sceaðaða forðon gilahte ðe groefa ðone hælend & geswang& ðegnas giwundun ða corona of ðornum & gisettun on heofod his & mið fellereode ymbsaldun hine& comon to him & cwedun wes ðu hal cynig iudea & saldun him hondsmællaseode eftersona ðe groefa utt & cwæð him heono ic brengo iow hine utt ðætte ge ongete forðon in him nenne intinga ic gimoeteeode forðon ðe hælend berende ðyrnenne beg & purple hrægle fellereode wede & cwæð him heono monnmiððy forðon gisæh hine ða biscopas & embihtmenn cliopadun cweðende ahoh ahoh cwæð him pylatus onfoað hine iow & ahos vel acwellas ic forðon ne infand in him intingaondsworade him iudeus we æ habbas & æfter æ gidæfnað ðæt deod sie suno godes worhte hinemiððy forðon giherde ðe groefa ðis word swiðor ondreordðer forðon fore georwungdæg iudea forðon neh wæs ðio byrgen gisettun ðone hælendan wutudlice ðara dagona ðio magðalenisca com armorgen miððy ðaget ðiostro werun to ðær byrgenne & gisæh ðone stan ginumen from ðær byrgennegiarn forðon & com to symone petre & oðrum ðegnum ðone lufade ðe hælend & cwæð him genomon ðone hlafard of byrgenne & nuton we hwer gesettun hineeodun forðon & ðe oðer ðegn & comon to ðær byrgennegiurnun ðonne twoege somen & ðe oðer ðegn forearn vel hraðor arn ðon petre & com ær to ðær byrgenne& miððy hine gibeg gisæh gisette ða lineno hrægl ne hweðre ineodecom forðon simon petrus fylgende him & ineode in ða byrgenne & gisæh ða lin gisetedo& ðone halsodu ðætte wæs onufa heofde his ne mið ðæm linena hræglum giseted ah syndrige vel sundor wunden vel gifalden in anre stowweða forðon ineode & ðe ðegn seðe com ærist to ðær byrgenne & gisæh & gilefdeðas wutudlice awritne sindun ðætte ge gilefe ðæt ðe hælend is crist suno godes & ðætte ge gilefe lif in ecnisse ge habbas on noma hisær ðon æteowde him eftersona æt sæ tiberiades sæ æteowde wutudlice ðuswerun somen simon petrus & ðe ðegn seðe wæs cweden didimus & ðe ðegn seðe wæs from tune on galilea & suno zebedes & oðre of ðegnum his twoegecwæð him simon petrus ic gæ fisciga cwedun him we cumas & we fultumað ðe & eodun & astigun in ðæt scip & ðær næht noht ongefengunarmorgen ða wutudlice awarð stod ðe hælend on ðæm worðe hweðre vel neh ne ongetun ðegnas forðon ðe hælend wæscwæð forðon him ðe hælend cnæhtas ahne hwæt mett habbas gee ondsworadun himcwæð him sendes on ða swiðra halfe ðæs scipes nett & ge gimoetas cwæðdun wutudlice ðerh alle næht noht gimoetun we in worde wutudlice ðine sendun we sendun forðon nett & swiðe ne wallað ge ðæt gitea fore menigo ðara fiscanacwæð fore ðe ðegn he ðonne lufað ðone hælend drihten is simon petrus miððy giherde ðætte hlafard is ðone cyrtel ymbsalde hine wæs forðon nacod & sende hine on sæoðre wutudlice ðegnas in scipe comon ne forðon feor wæs from eorðo ah swelce elna tu hund tugun vel trogun ðæt nett ðara fiscanasindun wutudlice & oðre monige ðaðe worhtæ ðe hælend ðaðe her se awriten leofum ne dom ic ðætte middengeord onfoe ða ðaðe awritne sindun boec endea þa se hatra innewerdu wylm breostes bærnde e þa ealle gewyldun efredun hlaford hleoþrunga de þa upplican beceoriende geferde husða ða cristendomes eoweres gesunfulnes swa eme scyppendes his bigong weox þæt lengre & ware vel brædre scine on eallum middanearde gecydde wyrdlice weorces eacnunga arecceregalican cystican gife witolysað & unbindað ðe of hyhðe & heahnesse besceawod on swa micelere mihta hyhþe uparædeforðig ealuðu wulderfulle bearn ðurh efenbiscop urne gebedon mid bliðum mode we geunnon mynstre ongesettum eadies gemyndes leorncnihthaligan hælendes naman gehalgod ðani andwerdan toforan beon is oncnawen se leofesta gelyfedlice regolice libbendra wununge gesettefrom þære apostolican ealdordomes aðurhgifende þæt ða eowre hæle bodiendras eowod him seolfa togeferleccan heora halinessa gefrætianðryrnessa fandað fram eallum his æftergengum amandsumunge ðam bende underlicgeþæt ðe of ðis mid dyrstelicre dæde fuldyde mid gecwemlicre fulre dædbote behreowsige ðissere ungedefednesse ða soðan dædbote behateon criste ðu geðrangielytel ic wes betwih broður mine & iugra in huse feadur mines ic foedde scep feadur mines honda mine dydun organan fingras mine wysctun hearpan & hwelc segde dryhten minum he dryhten he allra geherde mec he sende engel his & nom mec of scepum feadur mines & smirede mec in mildheartnisse smirenisse his broður mine gode & micle & ne wes wel gelicad in him dryhten ic uteode ongegn fremðes cynnes men & wergcweodelade mec in hergum heara ic soðlice gebrogdnum from him his agnum sweorde ic acearf heafud his & on weg afirde edwit of bearnum israela ic ondettu ðe dryhten for don eorre ðu earð me gecerred is hatheortnis ðin & frofrende earð mec sehðe god helend min getreowlice ic dom & ne ondredu for ðon strengu min & herenis min dryhten & geworden is me in haelu gehleadað weter in gefian of wellu haelendes & cweoðað in ðæm dege ondettað dryhten & gecegað noman his cyðe doð in folcum gemoetinge his gemunað for ðon heh is noma his singad dryhten for ðon micellice dyde seggað ðis in alre eorðan gefeh & here eardung sione for ðon micel in midum ðin halig israel ic cweð in midum daega minra ic fearu to gete helle ic sohte lafe gera minra ic cweð ic ne gesio dryhten god in eorðan lifgendra ne gelociu ic mon mae & eardiend gestilde cneoris min wiðlaeded is & befalden is from me swe swe geteld heorda forcorfen is swe swe from ðæm weofendan lif min mit te nu get gehefeldad acearf mec of marne oð efen geendas mec from efenne oð margen swe swe lea swe fordreste all ban min of marne ot efen geendas mec swe swe brid swalwan swe ic cleopiu ic smegu swe swe culfre geðynnade sind egan min gelocende in heanis dryhten ned ic ðrowiu ondsweora fore me hwet ic cweðe oððe hwet ondsworað me ðæt ic seofa doa ic ðencu all ger min in bitternisse sawle minre dryhten gif swe bið lifd oððe in weolerum lif gastes mines geðreas mec & geliffestes mec sehðe in sibbe bitternis min sie bittreste ðu soðlice generedes sawle mine ðet ic ne forwurde & awurpe on bec ðinne alle synne mine for ðon nales hel ondetteð ðe ne deað hereð ðec ne bidað ða ofdunesteogun in seað soðfestnisse ðine lifgende lifgende he onddetteð ðe swe & ic to dege feder bearnum cuðe doð soðfestnisse ðine dryhten hale us doa & salmas ure we singað allum degum lifes ures in huse dryhten gefaeh heorte min in dryhten & upahefen is horn min in gode mine gebraeded is muð min ofer feond mine for ðon geblissad ic eam in haelu dinre nis halig swe swe is dryhten ne soðlice is oðer butan ðe & nis strong swe swe god ur nyllað gemonigfaldian spreocan ða hean wuldrende gewiten ða aldan of muðe eowrum for ðon god wisdoma dryhten is & him earun gegearwad geðohtas boga strongra oferswiðed is & untrume bigyrde sind strengu gefylde ær fore hlafum he bihyrdun & ðiowincelu werun gefylde oð ðæt unbeorendu cende monge & sie monge hefde bearn geuntrumad wes dryhten cwælmeð geliffesteð gelaedeð to helwearum & eftalaedeð dryhten ðearfan doeð & geweolegað geeaðmodað & geheð awecende of duste weðlan & of scearne uprærende ðearfan ðæt he sitte mid aldermonnum & sundurseld wuldres nimeð dryhten soðlice sind heorras eorðan & sette ofer hie ymbhwyrft foet haligra his heold & arlease in ðeostrum geswigiað for ðon nales in strengu his bið gestrongad wer dryhten forhtiað wiðerbrocan his & ofer him in heofenum hleoðrað dryhten doemed endas eorðan & seleð cynedom cyninge his & geheð horn cristes his singen we dryhten wuldurlice soðlice gearad is hors & onstigend awearp in sae fultum & gescildend geworden is me in haelu ðes god min & ariu hine god feadur mines & ic uphebu hine dryhten forðræstende gefeht dryhten noma is him scrid pharaones & weoreda his awearp in sae gecorene upstigende ðreo foeðan besencte in ðere readan sae widsae oferwrah hie bicwomun in grund wwe swe stan swiðre ðin dryhten gewuldrad is in megne sie swiðre honda ðine dryhten gebrec feond & ðorh mengu megenðrymmes ðines ðu fordrestes wiðerbrocan ðu sendes eorre ðin & et hie swe swe halm & ðorh gast eorsunge ðinre todaeled is weter heardadun swe swe wall weter heardadon yde in midre sae cweð feon oehtende ic befoo daellu herereaf gefyllu sawle mine ic ofslea sweorde minum waldeð hond min ðu sendes gast ðinne & oferwrah hie sæ bisenctun swe swe lead in wetre ðæm strengestan hwelc gelic ðe in godum dryhten hwelc gelic ðe wuldurfest in halgum wundurlic in megenðrymmum donde forebecen ðu aðenedes ða swiðran ðine & forswalg hie eorðe steordes mid rehtwinisse dinre folc ðin ðis ðæt ðu gefreades ypped earð in gne ðinum & in gereordnisse ðere halgan ðinre geherdun ðiode & eorre werun sar befengun ineardiende filisteos ða oefestun ladtowas edomes & aldermen moab gegrap hie cwaecung aswundun alle ineardiende gefalle ofer hie ege & cwaecung micelnisse earmes ðines sien swe swe stan oð ðæt leoreð folc ðin dryhten oð ðæt
