cynn dælmælum ongeansændst wæle dælmælum þu upahefst on lyftumþa bescenctan on wæterum ofþriccende þa upawegenan to heofonum onbelædende þæt cynrene of anum forþ atogen mistlice hi gelæccon stowaforgyf eallum þeowtlingum þa geclænsað yþ blodes nytan slide leahtra ne forberan deaþes æþretnysseþæt gylt nænne ofwricce nænne upne ahebbe idel gelp þæt forscræncte mod þæt ne fealle þæt upahafene mod þæt ne hreoseo eala þu þrynnysse annys embhwerft mihtelice þu þe gewissast begem herunga lofsangas þe we hlyniende syngaþwitodlice of bedde we samod arisaþ nihte gedefre tide þæt we biddan wunda fram þe læcedom ealraon þam facne swa hwæt deofla on nihtum we agiltan adrige þæt heofonlice þines miht wuldresne ne lichoma wunige horig vel ful ne slæwþ onwunige heortena & leahtres besmitennysse acolige bryne gastesfor þy o eala þu alysend we biddaþ gefell mid þinum us leohte þurh þæt dægena embrynum nanum we hreosan on dædumo eala þu ece heofones wuldor eadig hiht deadlicra þæs hean ælmihtigan o eala þu ancænneda & clæne tudder vel bearn mædenessyle swiþran arisendum arise eac swilce mod sefre & byrnende on lofe godes þances hit agylde neadwiseupasprungen scinþ dægsteorra & geondstred leoht he cyþ fealþ dimnyss nihta leoht halig us onleohte& wunigende urum andgitum nihte he adræfe worulde & ælcan ændan dæges afeormoda he gehealde breostbegeten eallunga ærest geleafa awyrtwalige deopum andgitum gesundfullod hiht samod blissige þanne mare þunie soþ lufuscyppend mannes o eala þu god þu þe ealle þing ana geendeberdiende moldan þu hætst forðateon slincendes & wilddeores cynnþu þe micele gescæfta lichomena on cwidu bebeondendes libbende þæt hi þeowian be endebyrdnysse underþeodende þu sealdest mannadræf fram þeowum þinum swa hwæt swa þurh unclænnysse oþðe on þeawum hit tiht oþþe on dædum hit betwuxsettesyle gefeana meda syle gyfa lac tolys sace bendas gepriþ sibbe wære vel weddhealicra o eala god mildheortnysse & middaneardes wyrhta seares vel cræftes an myhtylice & þrylic hadeliceure arfæst mid lofsangum wopas welwillendlice underfoh on þam heortan clænre fram horwum þe we brucon cystiglicorlendenu & lifre adlige forbærn mid fyre þæslicum begerde þæt hi beon ecelice gælsan asindrodum þære wyrstanþæt we þe tida nyhta nu hleoþrigende we tobrycaþ mid selenum eadiges eþeles we beon gewelgode ealle genihtsumliceeorendel eallunga geondstret heofon eorþum dæg onasihþ leohtes swege stræle vel leoma aweggewite ælc þing slipores vel fulesgedrimor nihte fealle modes scylde vel senne hreosa swa hwæt swa þeostrum ladlic niht brohte gylte fealleþæt ærmergen se ytemesta þæne we anbidiað eadmode on leohte us flowe vel becume þænne he þæt mid dreame hleoþraþcyning ece o eala ðu drihten gesceafta scyppend ealra þu ðe wære ær worulde æfre mid fædor sunuþu ðe middaneardes on fruman gesceope mann þam þinre anlicnysse andwlitan þu sealdest gelicneþæne deoful beswac feond mennisces cynnes þurh æppel treowes þæs ealdan deaðes scencende drencse ðe beclesed on þeostrum geomrode on witum þæs þu hiw lichoman geniman gemedemod þu wæreþæt mann þu alysdest þæne ær eallunga þu gesceope þæt us gode þu geðeoddest þurh flæsces gemænnysseþæne acennedne of fæmnan forhtað ælc sawul þurh ðæne & we arisan estfullum mode we gelefaðþu ðe us þurh fulluhta forgæfe forgyfennysse þe wæron numene mid bendum gebundne ingehedesþu ðe rode for menn onfon gemedemod wære þu sealdest þin blod ure hæle wurþwuldor sy þe þrynnys gelic o an godcundnyss ær ealle wurolde & nu & on ecnysse si hit swascyppend o eala þu halga tunglena ece leoht gelyfendra o eala þu crist alysend ealra þinga gehyr bena eadmodraþu þe besarigende on forwerde deaþes losian worulde þu gehældest middaneard adligne forgyfende scyldigum læcedomonsigendum middaneardes æfene swa swa brydguma of bredbure ut agan arwurþosta mædenes moder clysingaþæs strangre mihte cneowe synt gebigede ealle þing heofonlice eorþlice andyttaþ mid mihte underþeoddesetlgang sunne healdende se mona blacunge healdende beortnyss on tunglum scinende gewisse healdende gemæruþe we biddað o eala þu halga crist towearde dema worulde geheald us on tide feondes fram flanum geleafleaselof wyrðmynt miht wuldor gode fæder & suna samod mid þam halgan gaste on ece woruldeword uplic forþ stæppende fram fæder gefyrn gewitende þu þe acænned embhwerfte gehelpst onryne aurnenre tideonleoht nu breost & þinre lufe forswæl gehyrdre þæt bodunge beon utanydde æt nextan slipornysse& dema þænne siþþan þu ætbist smegan dæda breostes agyldende gewrixl for dyglum & rihtwisum rice for godumna ætnextan we beon genyrwode mid yfelum for gehwilcnysse leahtras ac mid eadigum wilfægene we beon ece heofonbigendestefn beorht efne swegþ forsworcennyssa gehwilce heo þreaþ hwo adræfe feorran swefnu fram rodere crist scinþmod eallunga arisa þæt slawe þæt mid horuwe wunaþ gewæht tungel scinþ nu niwe þæt hit nyme ælc þing derigendlicesufane lamb ys asænd forgyfan togyfes gylt ealle for miltsunge stefne uton sellan mid tearumoþer siþan þæt þænne scinþ & middaneard oga befehþ na for scylde he gewitnige ac arfæst us þænne he gescildeus efne dæg endebyrdnysse mid gedafenlicre cymð nu bryme beorht luflic on þam sigriend ofer hege astah gehende tungludrihtnes halig aspotol & broðor ealdres æðelys ealdor sylf werlic efenhlytta on martyrdome he wæsfiscere wæs þær æfter begen onfengon embehwyrft & weredu berypton brymmas middaneardes & ricu & hi togetugon heofenesþa hi crist gesiðan on gangum & gelice he begeaton samod lara hi gegaderudon hys deað hi folgedon & forswaðu þurh rodeo eala þu crist alysend ealra of fæder fæderes ancænneda ana ær anginne acænned unasacgendliceþu eart leoht þu eart bryhtnyss fæderes þu eart hiht ece ealra begem þa þa asendaþ bena þine geon embhwyrftgemen þu hæle o eala þu ealdor þæt ures gefyrn lichoman of ungewæmmedum mædene acænnende hiw þu underfengeswa andweard ys geseþed dæg yrnende geond gæres ymbrene þæt þu ana fram setl fæderes middaneardes hæl þu comeþysne heofon & eorþe þisne sæ þisne eall þæt on heom ys ealdor tocymes þines hyrað blissigende mid lofsangeþe eac swilce we þe halgum þinum alysede synt mid blode for dæge gebyrdtide þinre lofsang niwne we samod heloþriaþwuldor þe drihten þu þe acænned eart of mædene mid fæder & þam halgan gaste on ece woruldaarisende to þe drihten sweartre nihte on swigeangehyr o eala þu alysend þeoda gebyrdtide þinre wuldor ut agan fram gode geeacuung mædeneso eala þu crist mihta drihten na of werlicum sæde godcundnysse anre & efenlytta þæs halgan gastesþu eart mihtig ealra hæl on þe gelyfende alys strang æghwær on gewinne us synfullan genereacænnedne god of gode we wundriað on þisum lichoman mannan gode gelicne geryne wunderlicnu we swa swa halige gelyfaþ wundriað eac swilce ænglas on clænan acænnedne lichoman hyrde of mægþe iudanleoht ageotende forspilledum ordfruman heretogan clæne hrepunga flæsclicre beon þæt þæt þu woldest þu eartgebyrdtyde þinre gefea þæt þæt mann acænned of gode ealle we andettað suna rice fæderlic þurwunigendeece lofu we secgaþ fæder gode mid sunan se is geciged of egypto lande þurh his þenas godgeedcynnede of þam halgan gaste leoht we geseoþ lace swa þe feligende drihten hale we beoþ ealne weg wuldor þe drihtencum o eala þu alysend þeoda ætyw geeacunnge mædenes wundrað eall worulde swilc gedafenað geeacnungna of werlicum sæde ac of gerynelicum blæde vel gaste word godes geworden flæsc & wæstm innoþes scanrif toþand mædenes clysing clænnysse þurhwunaþ guþfanan mihta scinaþ drohtnaþ on temple godforþ stæppende of bredbure his clænnyssa heall cynelic getwinre ormæte edwiste glæd þæt he yrne wegutfæreld his fram fæder ongeancyme his to fæder & utrene to helle ongeancyme to setle godesgelic þan ecan fæder lichoman mid sige befon untrumnyssa ures lichoman mihte getrymmende ecerebinn eallunga scinþ þin & leoht niht eþað niwe þæt nan niht betwuxsende & geleafan singalum scine wuldor þe drihtenlofsang uton singan drihtne lofsang cyðere criste swa swa cyninge ealra swa swa fyrmstum cyðereswa swa fæderes anlicum suna swa swa þeowe criste gode & menn swa haligum menncriste þæt middenearde acenned þæt dead criste þæt lif he tobrohte þæt he deað þoludecriste þæt he nyðerastah þæt he upastah criste þæt he eorðan geneasude þæt he heofenas geferdesi lof gode fæder unacennedum lof suna ancennedum lof si haligum gaste swa mæregendiendum cyðereo eala þu halga godes deorwurþe se forma cyþere þu þe on mihte soþre lufe underwreoþod æghwanone drihten for feondlicum þu gebæde folceasynd bena for estfullum þe nu gefyrrædene þæt þinre gemiltsod mid þingrædene drihten us afeormode fram synne geþeode heofones cæster gewarumwuldor & wurþment gode oþ ðam hehstan samod fæder & suna & þam æþelan frofer gaste þæs wyrþment & miht geond ece woruldaeallunga glitenaþ halig dæg & beorht þearle on þam is middanearde gewurþod on eallum se forma þrowærewitodlice dæg se georstenlica god besceawede on wangum acænnedne þes healicre acende nerxnewangeþes wurþe geearnungum & æþelborenysse him þæt nama swegð scinþ gewuldor beagod on wurþmenteblodige gemængende trepas vel werodu mid þeode reþre þes sigefæste geearnode beorhte ongeanbringan sigasus eadmode þrowære o eala þu stemenda þe we biddaþ ealle þæs egeslican þæt ðu do feondes aidlian awyrgedesyrwunga & þa forgyfenysse for slæge þu agyldst urum þas wommum eadmodum ongeanbring muðe we biddaþ& swa gode acænnedum þu forgyfe geþeodan þam heofonlican þam sy mærlice mægen & wurðment butan ændese hælend scan ealra arfæst alysend þeoda eall cynn geleaffulra lofu breme herungaþænne steorra acænnedne scinende geswutelaþ scinende on rodere & tungelwitegan he gelædde foresteppende his to cildcradelehi feallende cild mid cildclaðum gebædon bewunden soþne hi andettan & god lac berende ryneliceteonfealdum þriwa geara ymbrenum eallunga on dæle þeonde wæter he gefor fulluhtes eallum þoliende besmitennyssese sæliga besæncan hine beofode on flode mihtig his se mid blode his synna middaneardes adriganstefn eornostlice tudder of heofonum geseþde healices fæderes miht & ætwæs haliges gastes haligre forgifestre gyfeus o eala þu crist mid eadmodre bene we biddaþ ealle gescild þu þe bebeodst readian mihtlyce wæterfatu wæteresgetiþa welwillendne geornfullum frofer fultume & ædbrodene us of helle rixian do mid þe on heofonanlof þrynessa neadwis wurðment miht wuldor ecelice sy ealla geond worulda woruldfram þære sunnanupspringes anginne oþ eorðan gemære criste uton herigan ealdre ancænnedne of mædeneeadig ealdor worulde þeowtlicne lichoman embscredde þæt lichoma lichoman alysende þæt he ne forlure þa ðe he gescopclæne moder innoþas heofonlic inferde gyfe wamb mædenes gebær digelnysse þæt heo ne cuþehus clænes breostes tempel færlice wæs geworden godes ungewæmmed nytende wer mid worde heo geeacnode sunaacende hyseberþre þæne þe foresæde þæne þe meder on rife hoppetende beclysed undergeatstreowe licgean ðolude binne na aþracude gehwædre meolce ðolude þurh ðæne na fugel hingraðgeblissað wered heofonlicra & englas singað gode & openlice byð hyrdum hyrde scyppend ealrawuldor þe drihten þu þe aþwogen eart on eafeond o arlease crist cuman to hwi ondrædst þu ne gegripþ deadlice se þe ricu selþ heofonliceferdan tungewitegan þi hi gesawon steorran folgiende forestæppendne leoht hi sohton mid leohte god hi andettan mid laceheap moddra swegð forcorfene bewepende tuddra þæra wælhreow þusenda criste gehalgode offrungeþwealu clænes wæles þæt heofonlice lamb æthran senna þe he ne brohte us afeormigende he ætbrædwundrum sealde geleafan habban hyne god fæder untrume gehælende lichaman & aweccende licuniwe cynn mihte wæteres readodon wæterfatu & win gehaten ageotan awænde yþ ordfruman wuldor þe drihten þu þe aþwogenfram fæder ancænned to us he com þurh mæden fulluht on rode gehalgiende ealle gelaffulle acænnendeof heofonan healic he forð stop he underfeng hiw mannes gescæft mid deaþe alysende gefean lifes syllendeþæt þe o eala þu alysend we biddaþ onaslid mylde & beorht urum sefum leoht gearce geleaffullumwuna mid us drihten nihte deorce asyndra ælcne gylt afeorma arfæste læcedom forgyfþæne nu cuman we cunnon gehwerfan eft we gelefaþ þu cynegyrd þine æþele mid þinum bewere scylde wuldor þe drihten þu ðe aþwogen eartþæt werod scopa arwurþe gefern mid þam halgan gaste gyddode gefylled on godes geworden cynnestran wunað beonþeos god heofones & drihten eorþan mæden heo geeacnode & heo acænde mæden & æfter cenninge heo geearnode wunigen ungewæmmedþæne se ealde rihtwis on earmum on huse underfengc drihtnes fægnigende for þy gewiscodne geseon mid eagan cristþu lustbære gewilnungum we biddan biddende kynges þæs ecan cennestre gefultuma þu & beorht þæs healican healdende roderes ricu þu ferdestsy gode uran wlite & miht sy hæl ece sy wurðment ece se þe heofones healicra sitt on heahnysse þrylic & anmyrige leoþ & stefn ece gefean lof wynsum ys werodum heofonlicum þæne singaþ godes wunigende on huse geond woruldabliþe mater cæstergewara stefn þinra cæstergewara blissigendra utlagan us wepan neadiaþ flodþe ne geearniaþ nu ecelice singan us scylde neadaþ forlætan tima onwunað on þæm gefremedan we heofigan leahtrasforþi herigende we biddaþ þe o eala þu eadige þrynnes þæt þinne us geseon eastran þau selle on rodore on þam þe bliþe we singaþ godes lof ecelice swa hit gewurðemid arfæstum geyppaþ lofum cæstergewaran rodorlice singaþ caflice ece geyppað mid lofumheonon eow eces leohtes inlendan hit nime swegnede lofbærum weordum ece geyppað mid lofumeow burh healice underfo godes seo bliþum swegþ sangum astyrod ecegesæligum geancyrre gefean nimaþ ageldende drihtne wuldorfulle lofu eceþe o eala þu crist breme wuldor stefnum urum o eala þu ælmihtiga mid þisum þe we secgaþ ece geyppaþ mid lofumhaligne tunglenes eallunga eþeles wlite o sigefæstan heafedes on þam dream ys singal ece geyppað mid lofumþæt gewæhtum rest þæt mete & drenc gelustfulligende geon werefende hladungum genihtsumum eceus þe mid swet swegum o eala þu scyppend genihtsumlice gescæfta leoþum & lofe we geyppað ece þe o eala þu crist breme wuldor stefnumgodes on geleafan on þam we libbaþ on hihte ecan on þam we gelyfað þurh soþre lufe gyfe criste uton singan wuldorse gelædd on tida þære þriddan to þrowunge onsægednysse rode berende hynþe scæp ongeanbrohte forloranwe biddað eornostlice underðeodde alysednysse frige þæt he generige fram worulde þa ðe he tolysde fram handgewritewuldor sy þe þrynnes gelic o an godcundnyss ær ealle worulda & nu & on ecnessaon midne dæg to gebiddenne ys & crist to halsigenne ys þæt he hate us etan of hys hangan lichomanþæt he sy herigendlic on eallum folcum se sylfa hefona drihten se ðe sytt on heanyssum& selle us fultum þurh ænglas wundorlice þa æfre us gehealdan on eallum life worulde wuldor þe þrynnesfulfremedum þreofealdum getæle on þrym fealdum tidena geendungum lofu singende neadwise nonsang secgende we singaðhalige godes gerynu on clænum healdende breoste lareowes regol mid tacne hæle geyppodne& uton we singan on gaste to geþeodende þam apstolum þa þe fotwelmas habbað wanhale cristes mid mihte hi gerihtlæcan wuldor sy þe þrynnyssþus ðriwa feower ys getogen tidum dæg to æfene setlgang sunne gecyðende nihte ongengehwyrfan tidawe eornostlice mid tacne drihtnys uton bewerian clusan breosta þæt na næddre seo wætige intoganne onginne ingangac mid wæpnum clænnysse mod underfgeher o eala þu welwillenda scyppend ure bena mid wopum on þisum halgan fæstene geondgeotene feowertigum fealdumsmeagend o eala þu halige heofena untrumnysse þu wast mægena to þe gecyrredum gearca forgyfenysse gyfemicclum witodlice we sengodon ac ara andettendun to lofe þines naman forgyf læcedom adligum vel seocumswa lichoma wiþutan beon tobrytt sele þurh forhæfednyssa fæste þæt mod syfre fram wæmme eallunga leahtragetiþa o eala þu eadige þrynnes forgyf o eala þu anfealde annyss þæt beon andfænge fæstena lac si hit swao eala þu hælend feowertigfealdre gehalgigend forhæfednysse þu þe for hæle moda þis gehalgodest fæstenon þam nearxnewange þu ageafe gehealdenre forhæfednysse þa þe þanon giuernysse hidor forspenning adræfdeæt beo þu nu gelaþunge æt beo þu behreowsunge seo þe for heorum forgægednissum gebitt mid agotenum tearumþu onbæcgedonne leahtras mid þinre forgyf gyfe & fram toweardum gearce hyrdrædene liþestaþæt afeormode gearlicum fæstena onsægednyssum we efstan to easterlice wurþfullice to wurþigenne gefeangetiþa o eala þu fæder þurh suna getiþa þurh þæne halgan gast mid þysum ecelice þreofealdum an god on naman sy hit swabeorht wlite fæstenes is geswutelod embhwerfte heofonlice þæt crist fosterfæder ealra þinga fram mettum gehalgode forhæbbendeþæt leof gode & æ syllend wæs geworden þæt geond lyftu cræte utahof on fyrenumheonon gerynu sygefæst leona geseah þurh þæt freond inlica cristes scanþas us fylgian selenu god bisena forhæfednysse þu strængð geec moda syllende gastlice gefean getiþa fæder þurh sunao eala þu healica syllend mede hiht þu þe eart ancænned middaneardes bena begem þeowena to þe estfullan cleopigendraure þe ingehyd hefelice ætspurnan geswutelaþ þa ðu geclænsa we biddaþ fram eallum manumgyf þu wiþsæcst hwa forgyfð gemiltsa for þam þe mihtig þu eart gyf on heortan we biddan clænre gewisslice þu scealt of behateeornostlice underfoh ure þu þe gehalgodes fæsten on þam rynelice easterlice we underfon gerynuseo halice us þæt þurhteo vel forgyfe on godcundnysse þrynnyss on þæra wuldraþ an geond ealla worulda godo eala þu crist halgena wlite & myht lif & hiw weg leoht & ealdor eadmoddra behat & samod lofsang underfoh mildheortþu ðe þinne gefern to þe teonde wunderlice asindrodest middanearde þæt ðwernyssa worulde wiþsacan leornigende þe þæt he folgodeþæs estfull mod cildes gyfe gearcigende geleafan swiþrian on þam swiþrigende wundorlice mid benum he gefremode on mode geleaflicesiþþan astreccende fot on asindrodum heahnyssa he astah cwilmigan swiþorwillende lichoman liðe cildlice byrnende on clænre lufehe tyde syþþan menn eadige regoles nearonyssum mod ætstentan & geoce simle drihtne heofona underþeodan swuranwuldor fæder uton singan ealle & þe crist ancennede o eala þu heofonlica mid þam se halga samod & scyppend gast rixaþþæt þines lifes lofu nu þine wurðfullice þenas singan we heortan unclænre wom þu gelimplice toles mid beneþu muneca fæder & lareow heofonlic lif o eala þu halga þu forðatuge & lare gibisnunga mid tacnum þu self afandodeeala þu swiþe gesælig fæder þu halga æfre ængel on life on gaste witega fæderum on tacnum drihtnes þenum gelic on gebisnungumhit ys halig oþre cuman & heora criste saula gestreonan o eala þu fæder halga eowde mid hundfealdra þu geneosast tunglafyrdwyrcu geond embhwerft mid sange swegaþ & þinum gewritum sawle beoþ gestrinode betwux þisum & us samod beon amearcode halga bideþæt fæder getiþige þæt ilce fæderes ancenned bearn him selfum efenece þæt se halga blæd an god on ælcere tide weoruldeþam mæran singende gearlice nu lofsangas þæt we brucan þissere æþelan freolstide mid gefeanse scan swa swa tungel niwe middan eardlice adræfende genipu ylde on þam selfon gemære he forseah ylde wæstmbære þingwundra foremihtig gehrepod mid halgum blæde he scan on forebecnum toweardre bodigendena ær woruldum cuþ nihte leoma scan on þam eall embhwerft wæs gesewensy þrynnesse wuldor sy ece & healicnyss fæt scinende he forgeaf ure woruldeþæne eorþe brym roderas wurðiaþ gebiddaþ bodiaþ þryfealene gewissigendne seare vel cræft clysing gebærþam mona sunna & ealle þing þeowiaþ geond tida geondgoten heofones gyfa bæran mædenes innoþaswundriað eornostlice worulda þæt ængel brohte sæd þæt mid earan mæden geeacnode & on heortan gelefende heo cændeeadig moder mid lace þæs upplica cræfeca vel wyrhta middan eard mid feste healdend wambe under earce wæs beloceneadig heofones bodunge ecne mid þam halgan gaste gewilnod þeodum þære þurh rif wæs geondsændeala þu wuldorfulle fæmne healic ofer tungla se þe þe gescop foregleawlice þu sycst halgum breosteþæt þe unrot ædbræd þu agyldst haligre spryttinge infaran þæt tungla woplican heofones eahþerl þu eart gewordenþu eart cynges healic geat & infereld leohtes scinende lif forgifen þurh mæden þeoda alysede fægniaþ wuldor þe drihtenhal sy þu sæ steorra godes moder halig & æfre mæden gesælig heofones geatnimende þæt hal sy þu of muðe sænd us on sibbe awændende namatolys bendas scyldigum forð bring leoht blindum yfelu ure adræf godu ealle bidegeswutela þe beon moder & nime þu self bene se þe for us acenned underfeng beon þinlif gearca clæne siþfæt gearca orsorh þæt geseonde þone hælend æfre we samod blissiganmæden anfealde betwux eallum liþe us mid gyltum tolysede liþe do & clænesy lof gode fæder healic criste wlite gaste þam halgan wurþmynt þrym an sy hit swaguþfanan cynges forþsteppaþ scinað rode geryne on þam flæsce flæsces scyppend wæs ahangen on gealganafestenode mid næglum innoþas aþenigende handa fotswaþu alysednysse forgyfe wæs geoffrod onsægednysson þære he wæs gewundod þær toecan swurde heardan speres þæt us he aþwoge fram leahtre utfleow vel arn yþ of blodegefyllede synt þa þing þe hleoþrode mid geleaffullum leoþe secgende mægþum rixode fram treowe godtreow wlitig & scinende gefrætewod cynges mid godewebbe gecoren wurþfullum boge swa halige lima hreppaneadig þæs on earmum wurð hangode worulde wæge geworden lichoman & uþe vel reaflac he æbbræd helleageotende wyrtbræð of rinde ofer swiþende swæce hunigteare ecne on wæstme wæstmbærum berende sige æþelnehal sy þu o weofud hal sy þu o onsægednyss be þrowunge wuldre on þam lif deaþ þolode for deaþe lif he agæfo eala þu ealdor hæle ancænned middaneardes alysend æþele þu o crist us gearlic rode gesundfulla wuldorþu spatlu spurplættas bendas & reþe þu þrowodest swingla rode willende þu astige ure hæle for intinganheanon mid deaþe deaþ towurpende & lif mid life forgyfende deaþes þen facenfulne þu oferswiðdest deafolnu on fæderes swiþþran halige scinende onsægednyssa gehyr we biddaþ liflicum mid þinum alysedum blodeon þam þe fyligende eallum þeawa mid forðstæppinga worulde ongean eall æswicunga rode we beran guð fana tiþa o eadige þrynnesto æfengereordunga lambes foregleawes & mid gyrlum hwitum scinendum æfter oferfærelde sæ readre criste uton singan ealdreþæs haligne lichoman on weofode rode gebrædne mid blode his readum onbyrgendum we libbaþ godegescilde eastran on æfen fram awestendum ængle generode of þam heardestan deofles anwealdeeallunga eastran ure crist is se þe geoffrod lamb is syfernysse wearf flæsc his wæs geoffrodeala þu soþlice wurðfull onsægednyss þurh ða tobrocene synt helle alysed folc gehæft agyfan lifes medeþænne arisþ crist on byrgene sigefæst he gehwerfde of helle wæll hreowne bescufende bend & geopenigende neoxnewangewe biddaþ o eala þu ealdor ealra on þissere easterlican gefean fram ælcum deaþes onræse þin þu bewerige folcwuldor þe o drihten þu ðe arise fram deadum mid fæder & þan halgan gaste on ece worulda sy hit swao eala þu hælend ure alysednyss lufu & gewilnung god scyppend ealra mann on ænde tidenahwilc þe oferswiðde mildheortnyss þæt ðu bære ure leahtras wællhreowne deaþ þoligende þæt us fram deaþe þu ætbrudehelle clesinga þurh farende þine hæftlingas alysende sigefæst mid sige æþelum to swiþran fæder þu sitstseo selfe þe neadað arfæstnyss þæt yfele ure þu oferswiðdest arigende & wil fægene us mid þinum anwlitan þu geweldest wuldor þe o drihtendægrima leohtes glitenaþ heofon mid herungum swegþ middaneard blissigende fægnaþ geomriende hell þoteraðþænne cing se strængesta deaþes tobrocenum mægenum mid fet fortredende helle he tolysde racentegan eormingashe se þe beclysed mid stane wæs gehealdan under cæmpan sigoriende mid glengan æþelan sigefæst he aras of hwreawetolysedum eallunga geomrungum & helle sarum for þam þe aras drihten scinende cleopaþ ængelunrote wæran þa apostolas of cwale hera drihtnes þæne wite deaþes wællhreowes reþe fordemdan arleasanon worde geswæsum ængel foresæde wifum on galilea lande drihten to geseonne ys hrædlicorþa þa ðe heo eodon hrædlice þam apostolum þæt secgan geseonde hine libban heo geeadmettan fet drihtnesþam oncnawenum leorningcnihtas on galilea lande ofestlice eodon geseon ansine gewilnode drihtnescyng o crist þu mildheortesta þu heortan ure geahna þæt þe lofu neadwise we agyldan on ælcere tide wuldor þe o drihtenlofsang uton singan drihtne lofsanges niwan nu swegað crist niwum mid siðfæte to fæderes astah þrymsetleapostolas þa rynelices on dunan standende crisman mid meder byrhtum mædene þæs hælendes gesawon wuldorþa sprecende ænglas to hwi tungla standende behealde ge hælend þes is hi cwædon hælend mid sige æþelum& swa toweardne hi sædon swa swa þisne hi gesawon healice heofona heahnyssa astigan þone hælend scinendewuldor þe o drihten þu ðe astihst ofer tungla mid fædergewiscod mid gewilnungum ealra þinga halig onleohte dæg on þam middaneardes hiht crist god astah heofonan sticolemiceles mid sige gewinnes middaneardes ofslegenum ealdre fæderes andweardiende andwlitum sigefæstes lichoman wuldoreala micel eallum gefea þæt bearn ures mædenes æfter spatle swingla æfter rode fæderlicum setle ys geþeoduton don eornostlice þancas ure hæle wrecendum urne þæt he lichoma up awæh healicne to heofones wuldrenu gelængdum dædum crist ambidian us gedafenað & life swilcum libban on þam he mage heofonan astigen wuldor þe o drihteno eala þu ece cyng þu hehsta alysend eac swilce geleaffulra on þam deaþ tolysed losode is geseald sige gyfeastigende domsetl swiðran fæderes miht ealra forgyfen ys þam hælende heofonlice seo þe næs mænniscliceþæt þreofeald gescæft seara vel cræft heofonlicra eorþlicra & hellicra gesceapen gebige cneow nu underþeodbifiaþ geseonde ængles awend gewrixl deadlicra leahtrað flæsc afeormaþ flæsc rixaþ god godes flæscþu o eala crist ure gefea wunigende on rodore gewelegod middaneardes gewissat þu ðe getimbrunge middaneardlice oferswiþende blissaheonon þe biddende we biddað gemiltsa gyltum eallum & heortan upp upahefe to þe midheofonlicre gyfeþæt þænne readiendum þu onginst scinan genipe deman wite þu adræfe neadwisa þu agyfe cynehelmas forlorene þu beo ure gefea wuldor þe o drihtencum o eala þu scyppend gast mod þinra geneosa gefyll mid heofonlicra gyfe þe ðe gesceope breostþu ðe frofer gast eart gesæd selene godes þæs hehstan wyll liflic fyr soþlufu & gastlic smerungþu seofonfealdre heowe lace vel gyfe swiðran godes þu eart finger þu eart rihtlice behat fæderes spræce þu gewelgas þrotanonæl leoht sefum onasænd lufe heortum untrumnyssa ures lichoman mid mihte getrymende ecerefeond þu adræfe feorran & sibbe þu selle þær rihtes latteope swa þe forestæppendum þæt we forbugan ælc derigendlicesþurh þe we cunnon sele fæder we oncnawan & suna þe æghwæþeres gast we gelyfan on ælcere tidagefyrn halige breoste mid þinre þu gefeldest gyfe forgyf nu senna & sele gedefa tidasy lof fæder mid suna begra & frofer gaste bearn swa swa þisne he behet us & nu he forgyfe sy hit swaeadiga us gefean geares ongeanbrohte hweollast þa ða gast frofer scan on leorningcnihtumfer ræscendum leohte tungan hiw brohte wordum þæt hi wæron genihtsume & on soþre lufe weallendemid gereordum hi spræcon ealra mænigu forhtiaþ hæþenra niwum wine druncnian tellaþ þa ðe gast gefyldewæron gefremode þas gerynelican þing eastran geendodre tide on halgum dagena getæle on þære æ wæs geworden forgyfenyssþe nu o eala þu god arfæstesta mid andwlitan þe biddaþ eadmodum on aslid us heofonlice forgyf selene gastesgefyrn halig breoste sy lof fæder mid sunaeallunga crist tungla astah ongeangecyrred þanon þe he com behatenre fæderes lace haligne to sellenne gastsimbel onsah dæg on þam geryne seofonfealdre embhwerfte betrndum seofonsiðan getacnaþ eadige tidaþænne tid eallum seo þridda færlice middaneard swegð gebiddendum apostolum god cuman kyþendegefern halig breoste sy lof fæder mid sunaof fæderes eornostlice leohte wlitig fyr halig is on þam getriwa cristes breost of hætan wordes gefeldegefellede blissodon innoþas geondblawenum halgum leohte stefna mistlice swegdan heo spræcon godes mærðaof ælcere þeode wæron gegæderode grecisces lydenwaru hæþen & eallum wundriendum mid gereordum hi spræcon ealragefyrn halig breoste sy lof fæder mid sunaiudeisc þa ungeleaffull gewitleasum mænigu gaste balcettan niwes wines oferfelle foster cild cristes þreaðac on tacnum & on mihtum ongean com & lærde leasunga spræcon geleafleasan gewittnysseþes o eala þu crist nu frofer gast þurh þe arfæsta us geneoseþ eorþan & neowiende anseon gyltum tolysedumgefyrn halig breoste sy lof fæder mid sunahal sy ðu biscopa tungel & wlite scinende leoht þæt soþe þeode ængliscre & to gode latteow forestæppendeþu eart hopa þinra se mæsta weorodnyss eac swylce incunde orþiende wyrtbræþa swetnyssa liflicra hunig sweteþe o fæder we gelefað þam þe naht wensumlicor to þe handa we astreccaþ þe bena we ageotaþscep þine heorde þu arfæsta swurde þeode hæþenreoffra o sacerd onsægednysse criste bena þa gecwemestan mid þam glæd leahtra he tolyse racentega iseneþurh þa ængliscra gemærum & gelaþunge bearnum & mægþe geleaflease & cwyld abugan derigendliceþurh þe o fæder hiht ancænned þurh þe bearn sib ancenned & gast leoht ancænned æt sy us on woruldeþæt hi magon tolætenum swegan æddrum wundra dæda þenas þinra tolys besmitenys weleres scylde o eala þu halgabydel of hean cumende rodore þe fæder mæran wesan to acennenne nama & lifes endeberdnysse adreogenlices be endebyrdnys geyptehe behates twiniende heofonlices forspilde hrædlice dreamas spræce ac þu geedstawelodest acænned ofslægenre dreamas stefnewambe on diglum geled bedde þu undergæte cyngc on bredbure wunigende heonon fæder vel moder bearnes geearnungum æghwæþer digolnyssa geyptescræfu westenes gungum under gearum cæstergewara heapas forfleonde þu þæt ðu ne mid leahtre huru þinga geweman lif spræce þu mihtestgearcode ruhne wæfels olfend liþum halgum gyrdel scep þam burne drenc fodan hunigum gærstapumoþre þæt an giddodan witegena heortan forewitegendra leoman toweardre þu witodlice middaneardes scylde afyrsigende mid scetefingre þu gebecnestnæs widgilles fæc geond embhwerftes haligre ænig acenned se man worulde geearnode þweandne bedyppan on wæterumeala þearle gesælig & geearnungum healic netende wom snawitre clænnysse fore mihtig þrowære & wæstenes bigenc þu mæsta witeganacynehelmas þreowa on teonfealdum oþre gewuldorbeagiað geiht geeacnungum getwifeld sume þryfealdum mid hundfealdum gemænigfyld wæstme þe halig gefrætewiaþnu mihtiga ures geearnungum genihtsumum breostes hearde stanas adræf clincig gesmeþiende siþfæt & gebigede gerihtlæc stigeþæt arfæst middaneardes hæland & alysend modum utadræfedum horuwe clænum rihtlice gemedemige cumende halige settan færeldumid lofum cæstergewaru bremaþ heofonlice þe o god anfeald & samod þrynen eadmod & us forgyfennysse we biddaþ ara alysedumsy gode uran wlite & miht sy hæl ece sy wurðment eces se þe heofonas healicra sitt on heahnysse þrylic & an si hit swamid ænlicum leohte & wlite rosenum leoht leohtes ealle þu geondgute worulde gewlitigende heofonan mid æþelum martyrdome on þisum halgan dæge þe he selð scyldigum forgifenyssegeatweard heofones lareow embhwerftes samod deman worulde soþe middaneardes leohta þurh rode oþer oþer mid swurde sigerode lifes rædgyft gewuldorbeagode hi ahniaþnu o eala þu gode heorde mildheort underfoh behat biddendra & senne bendas tolys þe anwealde betæhtum mid þam eallum heofonan mid worde þu beclyst þu geopenastlareow o eala þu æþele þeawas ty & on mode heofonan us gebringe hoga oþ þæt fulfremed sy forgyfen fullicor geidlod þæt we be dæle doþeala ge elebeames getwinne arfæstnysse ancænnedre on geleafan estfulle on hyhte strange swiþost mid welle gefellede soþre lufe twifealdre æfter deaþe lichoman biddaþ libbansy þrynnysse ece wuldor wyrðment miht & fægnung on annysse þam wunaþ cynedom heanon forð & nu geond ece woruldeþrowæres cristes we wurþiað sige gearlicne timaneala hwu wuldorfullum leohte þu scinst cynrenes dauidlices cynelic tudder healic sittende mæden ofer heofancennede roderes ealleþu mid mædenlicum moder wurðmente ængla hlæfdige breostes lofsang halgum innoþum clæne þu gearcodest acænned heonon god is lichoman cristþæne ealla arwurþiende embhwerft gebitt þam nu rihtlice cneow is gebiged ælc fram þam we biddaþ þe cumendre aworpenum þeostrum gefean leohtesþæt forgyf fæder leohtes ælces suna þurh agenne mid gaste halgum se þe mid þe scinende leofaþ on rodere rixiende & gemeagende worulda eallemoder drihtnes þæs ecan fæderes suna bring spede us eallum to þe samod becumendumgod of gode acænnedne þu acendest suna se þe næfð anginn of ðe he underfeng anginnþisne suna to wundorlicne & æfre samod geherigendlicne gefyrn witegan samod geddunge heo spræcon mid benegodes heah engel ure hæle bydel he swegde swa gegretende þa halgastanhal sy ðu æðele þu full godes gyfe þu geeacnast þurh gast & þu acensteala þu mæden eadigosta ofer heofnan gebletsod gebide for muneca estfullum werode eadmodraheofones cwen on halignysse wuldorfull geher bena þena & gebida drihtense ðe ealne middaneard gescop on ðe gehiwod vel sceapen wunoð þæne eall middaneard ne befehð on þinum innoðe lægþysne us beon acenned he foregewissode fram deaðe us he generode for us he sylf wæs dead & we þurh hine libbaðmæden mædena gehyr behad þeowena geornfulre bene us geheald & ðe wurðigende helpwe þristlæcað eadmode biddan gehyran ure gemedema on þinum lofu wurðmynte & for us þingageþeod werodum engelicum us gehæl mid mundbyrdum þæt ecelice mid burhleodum we blissian heofonlicum wuldor ðe o eala ðu drihtenwæs geworden geat cristes þurhfere gefylled full mid gyfe & þurhfor cyng & þurhwunode clysing swa swa heo wæs geond wuroldacynn upplices godes vel mihte forðstop healle mædenes byrdguma alysend scyppend his ormæde gelaðungewurðmynt moder & gefea mycel hiht gelefendra þurh swearte deaðes drencfatu he tolysde ure leahtras gode fæder sy wuldorgeryne tacenbora heofonlicra o eala þu heah ængel þe halsigende we biddaþ þæt us glæd þu geneosigeþu sylf mid halgum ænglum mid rihtwisum mid apostolum onleoht stowe ealneweg on þære nu biddende we drohtniaðclænnestra ealra larewa & biscopa for us bena genihtsuma estfull offra drihtnefeond he adræfe þæt þæne reþan & spede sibbe gerihtlæce & ure samod breosta geleafa fulfremed geondscineastigan ure þær rihtes to þrymsetle stefna wuldres & mod ure he uparære se þe on setl scinð scinendumher miht his wunige her fæst vel trum byrne sowlufu her to hæle behefnyssa his he becume þenumgedwyld ealle he afyrsige & worigende sefan he þreage & he gerihtlæce fotswaþu ure sibbe þurh siþfætleohtes on heahnysse scinendre þas halgan he awrite leoþ & ure samod naman on bec lifes he gesetteþe o eala þu crist beorhtnyss fæderes lif & miht heortena on geseohþe ængla mid gewilnungum stefne we singaþ wrixliende hleoþriende lofu we sellaþ mid stefnumwe samod herigað arwurþigende ealle heofones cempan ac healicost ealdor heofonlices werodes on mihte to brytendne deoful vel scuccanmid þam hyrde feor adræf cyng o eala crist þu arfæstesta ælc man feondes clæna heortan & lichoman neorxnewange agyf þinre us mid anre mildheortnyssawuldor fæder gedrymum uton swegan mid stefnum wuldor criste uton singan wuldor þam frofer gaste se þe god þrynen & an wunað ær worulda sy hit swao eala ðu crist halgena wlite ængla ealdor mænnisces & cynnes reccend us ece forgyf welwillende astigan riceængel sibbe to þissere heofonlice beon asend uton biddan healle us þæt gelomlice cuman & weaxan gesundfulnyssa ealleængel se stranga þæt feond he adræfe þæne ealdan he fleo fram heahnysse oft rædlice tempel he cume & þisum geneosigan ureængel us læce hæle asænd of heofonum þæt ealle hæle adlige & samod ure he gerihtlæce dædaheonon godes ures cynnystre eall & us werod ængla æfre ætwunige samod & seo eadige gegaderung eall getiþige þæt usfreols woruldum is gewurðod dæg halgena ealra þa ðe rixiað on heofonlicum o eala ðu hælend mid þe gesæligliceþas we ciaþ eadmode & þe o eala þu alysend ealra heom & þe eadmode bena geomriende we ascendaðo eala ðu hælend alysend worulde alysedum mid spede gehylp & o eala ðu arfæsta godes cynnestra hæle bide earmingumwerodu ealle ængellice heahfædera heapas & witegena geearnunga us biddan forgifenyssafulluhttera cristes se fore stæppende & cægbora se roderlica mid oþrum apostolum us hi tolysan fram bende leahtreswerod halig þrowæra andetnysse sacerda & seo mædenlice clænnys us fram sennum hi afeormianmuneca helpas & ealle cæstergewara heofonlice hi tiþian benum eadmodra & lifes hi biddan medelof wurþment miht wuldor gode fæder & sunan samod mid þam halgan gaste on ece worulda si hit swao eala þu crist alysend ealra þinga geheald þine þenas eadiges æfre mædenes glæd halgum benumeadige eac swilce werode heofonlicra gasta forðgewitene andwyrde towearde yfelu adræfaðscopas þæs ecan deman & apostolas drihtnes eadmodlice we biddað beon gehælede eowrum benumþrowæres godes æþelan & andetteras scinende eowrum benum us underfoþ on heofonlicum þingumwerod haligra mædena & muneca ealra samod mid halgum eallum yfenlyttan cristes doþþeode afersiaþ geleaflease gelefendra of gemærum þæt cristes lofu neadwise we gelæstan glædliceeala þu þrynnes eala þu annys ætbeo þu halsigendum & ængla mid lofum underfoh þæt þæt we gelæstan sy hit swaþu leoht & eala þu eadige þrynnes & eala þu ealdorlic annes onageot leoht on urum heortum forðan þe nu aweggewit fyren sunne þe we biddað on ærnemergen & þe we biddað on æfenne mid leoða lofa herie ure eadmode wulder þe geond ealne weorulde sy wulder god fæder & his anum sunu mid þam frofergaste & nu ða & on ecnysse sy hit swa ameneala þu god scyppend eallra manna & wissigend heofonan þu eart ymbscrydende dæg mid wlitigum leohte & nihte mid gife slæpes þæt agife rest þa toslopenan liða heora bryce & he geleþewæce þa gewehtan mod & he tolyse þa angsuman heofunga we gelæstað þancunge geendedum dæge singende lofsang & we gelæstað bena of anginne nihte þæt þu gefultumie þa scyldigan mid gewilnungum þe leoðrian þa incundan heortan þe hleoðrie gedreme stemn þe lufie clæne lufu þe gebidde syfre mod þæt onlihte þeos niht geleafan & þæt nyte se geleafa þystru þonne beclysð deop dimnys nihta dæg ne geðafe þu slæpan þæt mod þæt þu oncnawa slæpan gylt & þæt gemetegie se geleafa æþm slæpes acelende þa clænan þæt swefnien deopnysse heorta þe unscrydde sliperum andgite & þæt ne awecce oga þa styllan mid facne þæs æfestian fynd utan biddan crist & fæder & gast þæs fæder & cristes eala þu þrinnys an mihtig god geond ealle þingc hleowe þa biddendan si hit swa amenutan arisan ealle hrædlicor utanyddum sleacnyssum feor & utan secan ðone arfestan god swa swa we witan þone witegan hine secan hwanne on ðam forman dæge ealra daga on ðam wunað middaneard gescepen oððe on ðam þe alysde scyppend us arisende oferswyðdum deade þæt he gehyre ure bena & þæt he aræce his swyðran hand & agife ða afeormodon of horwum hwam setlum heofona þæt he gelacige mid eadigum gifum we þe singað on ðan halgostan tide þisses dæges on gedefum tidum eala þu fæderlice beorhtnys we biddað þe nu ða getyngcelice þæt aweggewite seo horwiende galnys & ælc derigendlic dæd þæt ne sy gefeg ures lichaman ful oððe sliper þurh hwæt we sylfe be on forswælde teartlicor mid fyrum helle eala ðu alysend forþan þæt þu adilegie ure man & þæt þu ðurhteo welwillende us tydda þæs ecan lifes þæt we sylfe singan lofa wuldres gewordene clæne ælþeodige for dæde flæsces swa swa we anbidiað eadmode ende urne eala þu arfæsta fæder & þu anlica gelica þæs fæder getyða þis mid ðam frofergaste rixiende an god geond ealne weorulde sy hit swa ameneala þu ece scyppend eallra þinga þu þe gewisast nihte & dæg & þu sylst tida tida þæt ðu geliðewæce æmelnysse swegð bydel dæges nuþa þurhwacol deopre nihte asyndrigende nihte fram nihte he is nihtlic leoht wegferendum tolysð se leohtbora þa heofonan fram dimnysse aweht mid þissum bydele forlæt ælc werod dwylda weg to derianne mid þissum bydele gaderað reðra mægna mid þyssum & liðewecað brymmas sæs adilegode se sylfa stan gelaðunge gylt singendum mid þyssum bydele eornostlice utan risan stranglice awrecð se hana þa licgendan & he þreað þa slæpolan ðreað se hana þa wiðsacendan arisan gehwyrfð hiht crawendum cocce byð agengoten hæl adligum byð behyd sweord ðæs scæðan byð agengewend geleafa aslidenum eala þu hælend beheald ða aslidenan & gerihtlæc us geseonde feallað slidas gif þu behyldst & byð tolysed gylt mid wope eala þu leoht þu geondscin urum andgitum & toscac slæp modes þæt swege ura stemn þe ærest & þæt we gelæstan behat þe eala ðu ece gesceafta scyppend nihte dæig & þu þe gewissat & tidena ut alleves fastidium utan wacigan ealle arisende on nihte & utan smeagen mid eallum mægnum symble on sealmsangum utan singan lofsangas drihtne werodlice þæt we geearnian infaran healle heofonan singende þam arfæstan kingce samod mid his halgum & adreogan eadig lif samod mid heom getyðige seo eadige godcundnys þis us þæs fæder & þæs sunu & samod þæs halgan gastes þæs wuldor hlynð on eallum middanearde efne is aþynnod eallunga scadu nihte glitenað dægrima leohtes glitniende utan biddan ealle þone ælmihtigan mid eallum hogungum þæt utanydde god ælce angsumnysse ofrowen ure & he forgife hæle & sylle us ricu heofona anre arfæstnysse utan biddan god eadmode upasprungenum tungle leoht nu ða þæt he gehealde us on dægðærlicum dædum fram deriendlicum þingum & utan biddan þæt he gemetgie tungan gewyldende þæt ne swege oga geflites & þæt heofon wreo gesihðe hleowgende þæt hit ne hlade idelnysse beon þa incundan heortan clæne & aweggewita gewitlyst tobrytte gehwædnys drynces & metes modignys flæsces þæt we sylfe singan wuldor clæne þurh forhæfednysse þonne aweggewit dæg ongænlæt hlyt nihte eala þu halga gast an þæs fæder mid þam sunu gemedema beon belæd nu ða us geondgoten caf ure breoste swegð muð tunga mod andgitt strengð andytnesse byrne soð lufu fyre onæle bryne neoxtan eala þu mihtiga gewissend & eala þu soðsagala god þu ðe gemetegast gewrixl þinga þu getimbrest ærnemergen mid beorhtnys & middæg mid fyrum adwæsc ligas geflita afyrre hetan deriendlicra þurhteo hæle lichama na & soðe sibbe heortana eala þu god þinga þu eart fæsthafol strengð þurhwuniende unastyrod on þe sylfum geendiende tide dægðerlices leoht æfterfylgendlicum tida fecum forgif beorhtne æfen þæt næfre ne fealle lif ac þonne stande ece wuldor mede haliges deaðes eala þu scyppend þinga we biddað þe ær geendunge leohtes þæt þu sy wealdend to hyrdrædene gewunelicra mildheortnysse gewitan swefnu feor & scinhyh nihta & ofþryc urne feond þæt ne beon besmitene lichaman eala þu ælmihtiga fæder getyþa þis þurh hælend crist ure drihten se þe ricsað mid ðe mid þam halgan gaste on ecnysse eala þu crist þu þe eart leoht & dæg þu oferwrihst ðystra & þu eart gelyfed leoht leohtes bodiende eadig leoht eala þu halga drihten we biddað bewera us on þissere nihte sy rest us on þe forgif us gedefe nihte þæt on ne hreose swær slæp ne ne undercreope se feond us ne ne gesette ure flæsc us sylfe scyldige þe geþafiende him underfoð ure eagan slæp wacie ure heorte symble to þe gescylde þin swyðra þenas þa ðe lufiað þe eala þu ure beweriend beheald & ofðrye þa syrwiendan begym þine þenas þa ðe þu gebohtest mid þinum blode eala þu drihten gemun ðu ure on ðyssum swæran lichaman eala drihten þu þe eart beweriend sawle ætbeo þu us eala þu sælesta scyppend leoht forþbringende leoht daga gearcigende ordfruman middaneardes on anginne nywan leohtes þu þe bebytst beon gecigd dæg ærnemergen geþeodne æfen gehyr bene mid wopum forþan onslit sweart þrosm þæt ne sy mod gehefegod mid leahtre ne hit ne sy ælþeodig fram lace ecan lifes þonne naht ne þencð ecelice & hit gewrið hit sylf mid gyltum cnysse hit þæt incunde heofona genime hit liflice mede utan forbugan ælc þingc deriendlices utan afeormian eall þæt wyrreste we arisað gereordedum lidum mid slæpe forsewenum cleofum eala fæder we biddað þe ætwesan us singendum hleoðrie tunge þe ærest gewilnie bryne modes þe þæt þu sy eala ðu halga drihten angin æfterfylgendra dæda abugan þeostru leohte & abuge niht dægþerlicum tidum þæt aslide gylt mid lace leohtes þonne þe onbelædde niht we biddað eadmode eft þæt þu ofaceorfe ealla dara þæt þu sy gehyre d on ecnysse mid muðe heriendra þe eala þu beorhtnys fæderlices wuldres forðbringende leoht of leohte þu eart leoht of leohte & wyl leohtes & þu eart dæg daga onlihtende ealle dagas & eala þu soðe sunne sy þu onsliden on us glitniende mid ecere beorhtnysse & onageot leoman þæs halgan gastes urum andgitum þæt we þe cegan fæder ealles godes willan mid gewilnungum & fæder eces wuldres & fæder mihtigne gife hwi þæt se halga gast gewwiþe sliperne gylt & þæt he begyme strange dæda & þæt he astynte teð þæs æfestas fynd & gesundfullie tearte ryras & sylle gife to dreogenne & þæt he begyme ure mod & gewissige on clænum lichaman & getrywum & þæt wealle ure geleafa mid hætan & nyte he attru facnes & sy cris mete us & sy geleafa ure drync utan drincan bliðe syfre druncennysse þæs halgan gastes gewite þes dæg bliðe & sy sydefulnys swylce ærmorgen & sy ure gele afa swilce middæg & nyte ure mod þeostrunge forðhebbe dægrima rynas forðsteppe eall dægrima is eall se sunu on þam fæder & is eall se fæder on ðam worde þæt is on ðam sunu eala þu ormæte scyppend heofon þu þe sealdest heofonum gemære todælende flod wæter þæt hig ne gemengdon þa gemengdon getrymmende stowe mid heofonlicum & samod mid riðum eorðe þæt gemetgode yð ligas þæt heo ne tostencte moldan eorðan ealu þu arfæsta god onageot nu ða sylena ecere gife þæt ne tobrytte þæt ealde gedwyld us mid ryrum nywan facnys gemete ure geleafa leoht & swa he bere leoman leohtes afære þes geleafa ealle idelu & nane leasunga ne ofðryccan ðisne geleafan eala þu efenhlytta fæderlices leohtes þu sylfa leoht & dæg leoht we tobrecað nihte singende ætwæs ðu biddendum afyrre þeostru moda afleg heapas deofla & utanyd slæpolnysse þæt heo ne ofhreose þa slaciende eala þu crist swa þu forgif eallum us gelyfendum on þe þæt fremie us biddendum þæt we singað hleoðriende bodað fugel boda dæges gehende leoht & cegð crist awreccend moda eallunga us to life he clypað eala ge solcenan afyrsiað bedd & adlige slæpes & waciað clænlice & rihtlice & syferlice forðan ðe ic eom gehende oððe nyhst utan cegian mid stefnum wepende biddende syferlice forðan þe forbyt geornful halsung slæpen þa clænan heortan eala crist toscac þu slæp tobrec þu bendas niht tolys þu ða ealdan synne & þu onbelæd nywan leoht eala þu ormæta scyppend eorðan þu þe sealdest eorðan unastyriendlice generiende moldan middaneart utanyddum hefigtemnyssum wæteres þæt heo wunode wæstmbære mid wæstme & þæt heo agulde ðancwurðne fodan forðbringende gelimplice spryttingce wlitig mid hæwenum blostme afeorme mid strengðe gife wunda forswælede modes þæt adilegie mod dæda mid wope & þæt hit tobrytte ðweore steorunga & þæt hit gehyrsumige þinum hæsum & þæt hit ne genealæce ænigum yfelum ac þæt hit blissige beon gefyllede mid godum mihtum & nyte hit dæda deaðes eala þu sælosta scyppend þinga & eala ðu ure wissiend beheald & alys us fram þære deriendlican stilnysse besencte on slæpe eala ðu halige crist þe we biddað gemiltse þu leahtrum we arisað to herianne ðe & we tobrecað yldunga nihte we upahebbað ure mod & handa swa swa bebytt se witega david us to donne on nihtum & swa swa astealde mid dædum þu gesihst þæt yfel þæt we adrugan we geyppað ure digla forgif þæt þæt we syngodon forðan þe we ageotað bena geomriende þu niht & ge ðeostru & genywa & þa gemengdan drofnyssa middaneard gewitað forþan þe nu is toclofen dymnys eorðan geslagen mid stræle sunnan & nu gehwyrfð bleoh þingum mid andwlitu scinendes tungles eala crist þe ænne we cunnan þe we biddað mid hluttrum mode & anfealdum weopende singende begym ure andgytum synt feola ðingc begleddade mid eagum þa beon afeormade mid ðinum leohte eala þu leoht easterlices tungles onliht us mid þinum smyltum andwlitam eala þu halgesta god heofones þu þe mest scinende trændel heofon geycende wlitige leoht mid fyrene beorhtnysse gesettende ligen hweowl sunna on ða feorðan dæge þu þe sylst widsc riðele ongeanrynas tungle hwam endebyrdnysse monan hwy þæt þæt he sealde þæt cuðoste tacn nihtum oððe dæge & geendunge todales & on anginnum monða onliht heortan manna adryg horwa moda unbind bænd gyltes toweorp hefas leahtra oferwrihð sweart niht bleoh eallra þinga eorðan us we biddað þe eala þu rihtwisa dema heortan andettende oððe heriende þæt ðu abryd man & þæt ðu ðrea horwa modes & þæt ðu sylle eala crist gife þæt syn genearwode leahtras & efne sleaceð arleas mod þæt toterð deriendlic gylta gewilnað deorca mod ætbredan ða deriendlican & secan ðe eala þu alysend utanyd ðu dimnyssa swiþest ða wiðinnan þæt blissige ure mod him beon gelogod on eadigum leohte efne ariseð gylden leoht ateorie seo blacigende blindnysse se þe teah us sylfe lange on hryre mid dwollicum gedwylde þurhteo þis leoht smyltnysse & hit gearcige us clæne him þæt we ne sprecan ænig ðing facnfullic þæt we ne trahtnian naht forsworcen swa aryrne eal ðæs dæges þæt we ne syngian leas tunge ne handa oþþe slipere eagan þæt ne besmite dara urum lichamanætis sceawere wiðupan se ðe behylt us on eallum dagum & ure dæda fram ðam forman leohte oð æfen eala god mycelre mihte þu ðe forlæst upasprungen kynn of wætere dælmælum wæla þu upahefest dæl to lyftum onbesettende on wæterum þa besenctan onbelædende to heofonum þa upahafenan þæt hi underfon mistlice stowe forðastapene of anum stofne forgif eallum þeowtlingum þa ðe afeormað yð blodes nytan slidas leahtra ne ne forberen æmelnysse deaþes þæt nænne ne ofðrycce gylt & þæt nænne idel gylp ahebbe & þæt ne fealle forscrenct mod ne ne hreose upahafen mod eala ðu annys ðrynnys þu þe gewisast ymbhwyrft mihtiglice begym lofsangas lofa þe we singað waciende soðes we samodarisað of beddingce on gedefe tide niht þæt we gewilnian læcedom eallra wunda æt ðe þæt adrige miht þines wuldor heofonlice þæt swa hwæt swa we agylton on nihtum mid deofla þæt ne sy ure lichaman horig ne ne on ne stande sleacnysse heortane & wlacige bryne gast mid besmitennysse leahtras eala þu alysend we biddað forðan gefyl us mid þinum leohte þurh þæt we ne hreosan on ænigum dædum on ymbrynum daga eala þu ece wuldor heofonan & eala ðu eadiga hiht deadlicre & eala þu ancendan ðæs hean ælmihtigan & eala þu tudder clænes mædenes syle ðine swyðran arisendum & uparisað ure mod syfre & hit agylde neadwise ðancunge byrnende on lofe godes scinð upasprungen dægsteorre & bodað geondstred leoht fealle dimnys nihta onlihte halig leoht us & hit utanyde nihte weorulde wuniende on urum andgitum & gehealde ða afeormadan breost on ælcum ende dæge gewyrtrumige gesoht geleafa eallunga ærest on deopum andgitum & samodblissie gesundfull hiht & wunie soð lufu mare on urum andgitum eala þu god wryhta manna þa þe hæst moldan forðateon kynn slincendes & wilddeores geendebyrdiende ana ealle þingc þu ðe sealdest mycele lichama þinga liflice mid cwide hatendes underðeodende menn þæt hi þeowien þurh endebyrdnesse utanydd fram ðinum þeowum oððe swa hwæt swa lærð hine on ðeawum þurh unclænnysse oððe swa hwæt swa betwuxsæwð hit on dædum syle heom meda gefeana lac gifa unbind bændas geflites gewrið wæra oþþe wedd sibbe eala god healicre mildheortnysse & wryhta cræftas middaneard an mihtiglice & þrylic hadlice underfo arfæst welwillendlice ure wopas mid lofsangum þæt we brucan þe rumlicor on clænre heortan fram horwum forswæl mid geðæslicum fyre ure lendenu & ure adligan lifre þæt hi beon ymbgyrde ecelice framascirede þære wyrstan gælsan þæt we beon gewelegode ealle genihtsumlice mid gifum eadiges eðeles we ðe tobrecað tida nihta hleoþriende nu ða geondstret eallunga dægrima heofonan onaslideð dæg eorðan scylð streal leohtes gewite ælc ðingc sliperes fealle scinhis nihte hreose gylt modes fealla swa hwæt swa brohte niht gyltes anðræclic mid ðeostrum þæt onbeflowe se ytemesta ærmorgen us to leohte þone we anbidiað eadmode þonne hleoðrað gedreme þis eala þu halga scyppend tungla & eala ðu ece leoht gelyfendra & eala ðu crist alysend eallra manna gehyr bena eadmodra þu þe hældest adligne middaneard forgifende læcedom scyldigum samodsargiende weorulde on forwyrd deaðes þu utfore ðu eart of ðam arwurðostan fæstena mædenes þin moder ahyldum æfenne middaneard swa swa brydguma of brydbure synt ealle heofonlice ðingc & ealle eorðlice ðingc gebigende heora cneow strangre mihte þæs & hi andetaþ mid hæse underðeodde andet sunna healdende niðersige andet mona healdende blacunge andet beorhtnysse sunnan scinende on tunglum begymende gewisse gemæru eala þu halga þe we biddað & eala ðu towearde dema weorulda geheald us on tide fram flane þæs leafleasan fynd sy lof & wurðmynt & miht & wuldor gode fæder & his sunu samod mid ðam halgan gaste on ecum weoruldum eala þu upplice word forðsteppende fram þam fæder farende hwilum of heofonum þu ðe gehylpst ymbhwyrfte acenned onryne ahyldre tide onlæht ure breost nu ða & forswæl hi mid ðinre lufe þæt beon slipe rnyssa utanydde æt nihstan gehyredre bodunge & we ne beon genearwode mid yfelum æt nehstan for gehwillicnysse leahtras ac we beon ece clæne wilfægne mid eadigum þonne ðu ætbist dema syððan asmeagen dæda breostes & agyldende gewrixl for digelnyssum & rice rihtwisum for godum dædum efne swegð beorht stemn & heo ðreaþ gehyrfe forsworcenan þæt he utanydeð swefnu feorr glitenað crist fram rodere arise sleac mod eallunga þæt þe wunade gewundad mid horwe scinð eallunga nywe tungel þæt hit ætbryde ælc þingc deriendlices is asend lamb ufan forgifan gylt sylfwilles utan syllan ealle stem ne mid tearum forgifennysse synna þæt he ne witnige us for gylt ac þæt he gescylde arfæst us ðonne þonne he scinð oþre siðan & þonne ymbgyrdað oga middaneard us efne dæg ændebyrnysse mid gedafenlicre cymð nu bryme breoht luflic on þan sigriend ofer hege astaah gehænde tunge drihtnes halig ærendraca broþer & petres ealdres æþeles ealdor sylf werlic efynhlytta on martyrdome he wes fiscere wæs peter & andreas þæræfter begen onfengen ymbhwyrfte & werudu beryptan brymmes middaneardes þa hi crist gesiðan on gangum & gelice hio begeatan samod lara hi gegæderedon eala þu crist alysend eallra & eala þu ancenda þæs fæder acenned ana of ðam fæder ær anginne middaneardes unasecgendlice þu þe eart leoht & þu þe eart ece hiht eallra manna begym bena ða ðe ageotaþ þine ðenas geond ymbhwyrft eala þu ealder hæle gemun ðu þæt þu underfenge hiw ures lichaman hwilon to acennanne of ungewemmedum mædene þus segð þæs andwearde dæg yrnende geond ymbryne geares þæt ðu tobecome ana fram setle þæs fæder hæl middaneard herað heofon & eorðe þisne dæg & herað sæ þisne dæg & herað ælc ðingc þæt þe is on heom blissiende mid lofsange on tocyme heora ealdres & we hleoðriað eac swilc niwne lofsang for dæge þinre gebyrdtide we ðe syndon alysde mid þinum halgan blode eala drihten þu þe eart acynd of mædene maria sy wuldor þe mid þam fæder & mid ðam halgan gaste on ecum weoruldum amenarisende to ðe drihten sweartre nihte on swigen on wecce wæ gehyrsumiað fædera filigende y ændebyrde þæne us forletan iure hereditario þenigende of bædde þe halig frefrigende gelic mid fæder breoht þu eart mid criste smeaþacal mycel mænifeald & gast cyningc renisc ancnawan tydre flæsc besyoh þa se þa wyrrestan his beswaac þinum teohmægnum eowod þin þu sealdest ne syo ymbhæfd mid leahtre þæne þine crist mid blode þu woldest alysen scep dweligende forecum heorde god arfæste to healle heanysse þinum ongeanber exlum aswunden geworden & forworden gewite ealdor deofle forspille hyþe of gomum þeof ungedafenlic gredicg gefægnie crist drihten singe wered æglic lof swegende on organo þreowa halig cweþe drihtne wuldor þe we secgað fæder anum mid suna samod mid halgan gast on þriofealda lofe swege swa hit gewurðe ameneala þu alysend þeoda gehyr wuldor þinre gebyrdtide þu utfore fram gode to bethleem sunu mædenes eala drihten crist mihta & efenhlytta þæs halgan gastes anre godcundnyssa ne of werlicum sæde þu eart mihtig hæl eallra alys þa gelyfendan on ðe ðu eart strang æghwær on gefeohte genera us synfullum we weorðiað acennedne god of gode acennedne on þissum lichaman & mannan gelicne gode mid wunderlicum geryne we gelyfað swa swa halgan & wafiað englas acennedne hyrde of clænum lichaman of mægða ðu eart ongængeotende leoht forlorenum þu læst ordfruman þæt þu þu woldest beon & ðu eart clæne fram flæsclicum æthrine þu eart gefea þinre gebyrdtide & ðu eard man acenned of gode we andetað ealle þone sunu þurhwuniende fæderlic rice we secgað ece lofa gode fæder mid þam sunu se god is ongenlæd of egifta þurh his þenas we geseoð leoht laces geendcende of þam halgan gaste eala drihten we beoð gehealdene singallice fylgende þe swa eala þu alysend þeoda cum & æteowe þe wesan þin sunu mædenes & wundre oððe mærsige eall weoruld gedafenað god swilc sunu gewearð word godes flæsc & bleow wæst innoðes na of werlicum sæde ac of gerynelicre onorðunga toðand innoð mædenes marian & þurhwunað fæsten sydefulnessa glitniað sigebeacnu mihte drohtnað god on temple his moder he forðstæp of his brydbure of cynelicra healle sidefulnessa ent getwinre edwiste þæt he geyrne weg glæd is his utfær fram þam fæder & is his ongeanfær to þam fæder & is his utryne oð helwarum & ongeanryne to setle godes þu eart gelic þam ecan fæder si ðu ymbgyrt mid sigore flæsces trymmende mid ecere mihte þa untruman ure lichaman scinð eallunga þin binn & ordað þeos niht niwe leoht þæt ne toweorpe ænig niht ac hit scine mid singalum geleafan utan singan lofsang drihten & utan singan lofsang ðam cyþere & criste swa cyncge eallra ðinga swa swa þam forman cyþere utan singan crist þæt he is acenned middanearde & forðan þe is dead & crist þæt he brohte lif & þæt he forðyldegode deað utan singan crist forðan ðe he niðerastah forðan ðe he upastah & crist þæt he gefor eorðan þæt he gefor heofonas sy lof þam unacynnedum fæder & sy lof þam acynnedum sunu & sy lof þam halgan gaste getyþiendum swa mycele ðingc þam cyðere eala ðu haliga godes deorwurde se forme cyþere þu þe on mihte soðre lufe underwreoþod æghwanone drihten for feonlicum þu gebæde folce agyot bene for estfullum þe nu gefyrrædene þæt þinre gemildsod mid þingrædene drihten us afeormode fram synne geþeode heofnes ceastergewaram wuldor & wurþmynt gode oð þam hehstan samod fæder & suna & þam æþelan froforgast þæs wurþmynt & mihta þurh ece wurulda glitnað þes gehalgoda dæg & he is swiðe beorht on ðam is geweorðad se forma cyðere on eallum middanearde & soþes geseah gysternlic dæg god acennedne on wongum acende þæs dæg þam healicum neorxnawonge ðæs wyrþe wulderbeagas be geearnungum & he scinð gewlitegod mid ðam wurðmynte þæt ðe swegð his nama geearnode þes sigefæst ongenbringan beorhte sigoras gemencgende blodige truman wið reoþre þeode eala stemenda cyðera us ealle biddað þe eadmodlice þæt ðu do aidli an þa awyrgedan syrwunga þæs anðræcan fynd and we biddað mid alotenum andwlitan bring þas forgifennyss urum wommum þe þu agyltst agylde for slæge & we biddað þæt þu forgife us swa geþeodan þam ancendan gode on upplicum ðam sy miht mærlice & wurðmynt butan ende scan arfæst alysend eallra þeode mærsige eall cynn geleaffulra lofa herunga þone geswutelode acendne scinende steorra glitniende on roderum & he lædde þa tungelwitegan foresteppende to his cildcradelum hig gebæden niðerfeallende bewundenne lytling mid clutum & hi andetan soðne god bringende gerynelice lac he gefor wæter fulluhtes ðoliende eallum besmitennysse þeonde þa on dæle lichaman on ymbrynum geare þrittigum forhtode se gesæliga bedypan hine on flode se þe is mihtig adryg an synna middaneardes mid his halgan blode eornostlice gesæðde stemn þæs healican fæder of heofonum tudder & ætwæs miht þæs halgan gastes syllestre haligre gife eala crist we biddað mid eadmodre bene gescyld us ealle þu þe bebytst mihtiglice readian wæterfatu wæteres getyða welwillendne frofer mid singalum fultume & do us rixian mid ðe on heofonan ætbrodene fram cwicsusle sy neadwis lof þære ðrynnysse & wurðmynt & miht & wuldor ecelice geond ealle weoruld weorulda utan singan acynnedne crist of mædene ealdor fram gemære upspryngces sunnan oþ gemære eorðan ymbscrydde eadig ealdor weorulde þeowotlicne lichaman alysende flæsc mid his flæsce þæt he ne spilde þæt he gescop infor heofonlic gifu þa clænan innoðas his moder bær innoð þæs mædenes digelnyssa þæt heo ne cuðe gewearð hus sydefulles breostes tempel godes færlice hio geeacnode sunu mid worde ungewemmed nytende wer acynde hysebyrðre ðone þe foresæde þone ongeat beclysed hoppetende on innoðe his moder streawa licgean þolode binne ne aþracude gehwædra meolce þolode þurh þæne na fugel hyngrað blissað werod hoefenlicra & ænglas singað gode open byð hyerdum hyrda scyppend ealra eala þu arlease fynd la hwæt ondrædest ðu cuman crist na ætbrytt deadlice ricu se þe sylð þa heofonlican foran tungelwitegan fylgende forestæppendum steorran þe hi gesaw on hi sohton leoht mid leohte hi andetan god mid lace heap moddra swægð forcorfene bewepende tuddra þæra wælreow þusenda criste gehalgode ofrunge æthran þæt heofonlice lamb þwealas hluttres weales he ætbræd synne þa þa he ne brohte aðweande us wundrum sealde geleafan habban hyne god fæder untruma gehælende lichaman & weccende licu wæs niwe cynn mihte & readodan wæterfatu wæteres þa þa awende yð hyre ordfruman gehaten ageotan win com se ancenda fram þam fæder to us þurh mæden gehalgiende fulwiht mid his rode geedcennende ealle geleaffulle he forðstop healic of heofonum he underfeng hiw mannes alysende gesceaft mid his deaðe forgifende gefean lifes eala ðu alisend we biddaþ þe þæt sy ðu onasliden milde & geare beorht leoht urum getrywum andgitum eala drihten wuna mid us framascyre forsworcene niht aþwea ælcne gylt forgif arfæstne læcedom we gelyfað gewendan eftsona þone þe we witan cuman bewera þu þinne æþelan cynedom mid þinum scylde swutel is wesan geworden on cennestran godes þæt ðe gyddade hwilon þæt arwurða weorad witegane gefylled mid ðam halgan gaste geeacnode þis mæden god heofon & hlaford eorðan & heo acende mæden & heo geearnode wunian ungewemmed æfter bearneacnunga þone underfengc se rihtwisa ealda on his earmum on huse drihtnes geblissad forþan he geearnode geseon gewiscedne crist mid eagum eala þu cennestre þæs ecan kynges we biddað biddande gefultuma þu lustbære gewilnungum þu ðe gefore scinende þa beorhtan ricu þæs hean roderas sy wlite & miht & sy ece hæl & sy ece wurðmynt ure gode se þe sitt ðrylic & an on healicum ypplene heofonan is werod leoð & stemn eces gefean & is wynsum lof heofonlicum weorodum þone singað þa wuniendan on huse godes geond weorulda is bliðe moder & ceastergewara heofonlices & is stemn þinra blissiendra ceastergewara geneadiað flod þære burh us weopan ælðeodige ne geearnian we singan nu þa ecelice geneadað scyld us forlætan onstent time þæt we heofian gefremeda leahtras eala þu eadige þrynnys forðan we biddað heriende þe þæt þu sylle us geseon þine eastran on rodere þæt we singan bliðe þe ecelice eala þu gerodorlice ceastergewara singað mid arfæstum lofum & singað caflice & singað ecelice mid arfæstum lofan genime he swegende mid lofbærum weorodum eow heonan inlænde eces leohtes singað ecelice arfæste lofsangas underfo seo hælica burh godes eow seo swegð awreht mid bliðum sangum underfoþ gefea ungesæligum ongenhwyrfte ageldende wulderful lof drihtne eala crist mærsiað wuldor on urum stefnum & we secgað þe eala þu ælmihtiga eala ge sigefæstan ge underfoð nu ða haligne wlite tungellices eþeles þær is singal dream is þis rest awæhtum & is þis mete & drync þu ongenlætst gelustfulliende mid genihtsumum dryncum oþþe laþungum eala ðu scyppend þinga we heriað oððe yppað þe mid swetswegum leoðum getingcelic & mid lofe utan singan wuldor criste on geleafan godes on þam geleafan we libbað & on ecum hihte mid ðam we gelyfað þurh gife soðre lufe se crist wæs gelædd to onsægnysse þrowunga æt þære þriddan tida he ongenbrohte þæt forlorene sceap forðyldiende hanglan rode eornostlice utan biddan underðeodde freo þurh alysednysse þæt he generie fram weorulde þa þa he alysde fram handgewrite eala þu ðrinnes & eala þu gelice an godcundnyss sy wuldor þe ær ealle woruld & nu þa & on ecnysse hit is to gebiddanne on middandæge & is to biddanne hit is crist þæt he hate us etan of his halgan lichaman þæt he sy heriendlic on eallum folcum se sylfa drihten heofona se þe sitt on ðam hyhstum & þæt he sylle fultum þurh ða wunderlican ænglas ða þe gehealdað us symle on eallum life weorulda we singað cweþende nonsang singende neadwisa lofa fulfremedum þrymfealdum getele mid þrym geændigum tida healdende halige geryne godes on clænum breoste & geyppendne regol sancte petres þæs lareowes mid tacne hæle & we singað on gaste geðeodende ðam apostolum þæt hi gewissian mid mihte cristes þa þe habbað wanhale fotwylmas þus þreowa feower is getogen tidum dæg to efene setlgang sunne gecyþende nihte ongeangehwirfan tida we eornostlice mid tacne drihtnes utan bewerian clusan breosta þæt ne næddre seo wrecenda in to gune ongynne ingang ac mid wæpnum clænnysse mod underf eala þu welwillenda scyppend gehyr ure bena agotena mid wopum on ðyssum halgan feowertigfealdan fæstene eala þu halga smeagend heortana þu canst untrymða ura mægna gearca gife forgifennysse genceard to þe we syngodon witodlice swiðe ac ara andetendum þurhteo læcedom adligum to lofe þines naman forgif swa beon tobryt urne lichaman wiðutan þurh forhæfednysse þæt fæste þæt syfre mod fram slide leahtra eallunga eala þu eadige þrinnys getyða & eala þu anfealde annys getyðe þæt beon lac fæstena wæstmbære þinum þenum gehyr eala ðu welwillende scyppend ure bena mid wopum on þysum halgan fæstene geondgotene feowertigum fealdum smeagedd eala ðu halige heortana untrumnysse þu wast mægena to ðe gecyrredum gearce forgyfenysse gyfe micclum witodlice we singodon ac ara anddettendum to lofe þines naman forgyf læcedom adligum swa lichaman wiþutan beon tobrytte syle þurh forhæfeadnys fæste þæt mod syfre fram wæmme eallunga leahtra getiþa eadige þrynnys forgyf eala ðu anfealda annyss þæt beon andfenge fæstena lac halgiend feowertigfealdre forhæfednysse þu gesettest þis fæsten for hæle mode hu ðonne þæt þu agulde neorxnewonge gehealdenre wrænnysse þa þe utanydde forspænningc gifernysse þanon hider ætbe þu gelaðunge nu ða ætbeo ðu dædbote seo gebit agotenum tearum for hire forgægednyssum forlæt þu ða gefredan leahtras beæftan mid þinre gife & geeacna uel gesete hyrdrædene ðam toweardum eala ðu mildesta þæt we onetan to þam easterlicum gefea to weorðienne weorðfull afeormode mid gearlicum onsægdnyssum fæstene is geswutelod beorht wlite fæstenes ymbhwyrfte heofonlice þæt gehalgode crist fosterfæder eallra ðinga forhæbbende hine fram mettum gewearð leof gode & syllend æ þurh þis fæsten upahof þis mid fyrenum cræte geond þa lyft geseah sigefæst geryna ðara leona heonan scan incund freond ðæs brydguman þurh ðis eala god syle us fylgan ðas bysna swærnyssa geeacna þu strengðe mode syllende gastlicne gefean eala þu fæder getyða þis þurh ðone sunu & getyða þurh ðone halgan gast an god þrymfealdum agenum naman mid þissum æfre vel ecelice o eala ðu halga syllend mede hiht þu þe eart ancænned middaneardes bena begem þeowena to þe estfullan clyopigendra ure þe ingehyd hefilice ætspurnan gesputelaþ þa ðu geclænsa we biddað fram eallum manum gif þu wiðsæcst hwa forgyfð gemildsa forðam þe mihtig þu eart þe on heortan we biddan clænre do us we biddað drihten eornostlice underfon ure þu þe gehalgodes fæsten on ðam rynelice easterlice we underfon gerynu seo healice us þæt forgyfe on godcundnysse þrynnysse on þære wuldriað an þurh ealla worulda god blissað se mære cempa nu ða mid drihtne mid ecere mede scinende wunderlic on manegum geearnungum he gelyfde drihtne on heortan tobrytenne onæl flæsces forseonde ealle gewitendlice þingc mid þenunga soðre lufe he gefylde bliðe beboda æ drihtnes mid weorce he wæs gehyrod lustbære cystig leohtflowend on geearnungum he dyde flowan flod mid tacne eces wylles þær þær næron gesawane ænige fotswaþu lytles wylles he unband tungan fram bendum gewriðene on langsumre tide heo forðateah æcer we biddan of stanihtre eorðan on gehræddre tide utan cweðan his ecan fultum þæt we geearnian cweðan mid blisse butan ende eala þu crist þu eart wlite & miht & lif & hiw & weg & leoht & ealdor þinra halgana underfoh eala þu milda god behat eadmodra & lofsang samod þu ðe asyndradest hwilum þinne benedicte fram middaneard toteonde to ðe wundorlice þæt he gefylgede þe leorniende wiðsacan þa ðweoran þisses middaneardes getyðiende þurh gife geleafan þisses cnapan swyðrian his estfulle mod mid ðam geleafan he gefremede swyðriende wundorlice mid benum on getrywum mode he astah syððan sticelnyssa astreccende his fot to westernlicum stowum swyðor willende cwylmian liðas iunglices lichaman byrnende on clænre lufe he getydde syððan eadige menn astyntan heora mod stiðre rihtincge & underþeodan heora sweoran symble ioce drihtnes heofona ateah maure carefull þen an of ðam þone cnapan of sæ upahofene of burnan gebrohtne on wæle hyrsumiende his ealdre benedicte eala þu halga unbind þu wom unclænre heortan gewunelice mid bene þæt we singan nu ða þine þenas weorðfullice lofa halige lifes eala þu halga fæder & lareow muneca þu gestaþelodest clæne lif & þu sylf afandodest gebysnunga lare mid tacne eala þu halga fæder swiðe gesælig symble ængel on life witega on gaste þu eart gelic fæderum on tacnum & þenum drihtne on larum hit is genoh halig cuman sume & gestryna heora sawla crist eala þu halga fæder þu gefærst tungla nu ða mid hundfealdre eowde scyllað fyrdwicum mid sange geond ymbhwyrft & syn gestrynde sawla mid þinum gewrite eala þu halga benedicte bide & us gemearcon samod betwux þysum getyþige se fæder þis & getyþige se ancende sunu þæs fæder þys sylfe & getyþige se halga gast þis efenece him an god on ælcere tide weorulde uta brucan gefean þyses æþelan freolses singend gearlice lofsanges nu ða þam mæran se scan swa swa niwe tungel utanydende þa middaneardlican geniwe he forseah þa blowendan þingc þyssere worulde on anginne his ylde he scan foremihtig on forebeacnum wundra ablawen mid healicum blæde bodiende towearde þingc þissere weorulde scan leoma on nihte na cuð woruldum ær on þa wæs geseowen eall ymbhwyrft & wæs behealden þeos eorðe sy wuldor & sy ece healicnys þære þrynnys seo þe sealde þis scinende leohtfæt ure timan abær innoð oððe fæsten mædenes gewissiend þryfealdne cræft þone weorðiað gebiddað gebodiaþ eorðe sæ roderas abæron innoðas þære fæmnan geondgotene mid gife heofon þam þe ðeowiaþ mona & sunna & ealle þing geond tide eornostlice wundrian weorulda þæt brohte se encgel sæd & wundrian worulda þæt þæt mæden geeacnode mid earen & þæt hio acende gelyfende on heortan heo is eadig moder mid lace forþan ðe beclysed wæs se upplica cræfta under loca innoðes þære se þe is healdende middaneard mid his fyste heo is gebletsod mid bodunga & heo is wæsmbære of ðam halgan gaste forþan ðe is se gewilnade þeodum agoten þurh innoð ðære eala þu wuldorfulle fæmna healic ofer tungla þu sycst mid gehalgodum breoste se þe gescop þe gleawlice þu eart geworden eahðyrl þæt infaran þa woplican to tunglum hu þonne þu agifst mid haligre spyttingce þæt þe ætbræd unrot þu eart gæt þæs heanlican cyngces & scinende gæt leoht eala ge alysdan þeoda fægniað geseald lif þurh mæden eala þu steorra sæ hal wes þu halig moder godes & mæden symble & gesælig gæt heofonan unbind þæt sy þu hal of muþe sænd us on sibbe awændende nama unbind bændas scyldigum þurhteoh leoht blindum utanyd ure yfelu & bide ealle godu geswutela þe wesan moder þæt underfo bene þurh þe se þe forbær wesan þin sunu for us getyða clæna lif gearca ymbtrymd siðfæt þæt we samodblissian symble geseonde ðone hælend mæden anfealdan betweox eallum liþe us mid gyltum tolysede bilewite do & clæne sy lof gode fædere & sy healic wlite criste & þam halgan gaste & sy an weorðmynt him ðrym forstæppað sigebeacnu þæs kyncges scinð gerynu rode on ðam gealgan wæs ahangen scyppend flæsces mid flæsce is þæs geoffrod onsægdnyssa for intigan alysednyssa aþeniende his handa & fotswaða & þa gefæstnodan innoðas mid næglum he wæs gewundod þærtoeacan on ðam gealgan mid reðum orde sperum & fleow yð ob blode þæt he aðwoge us fram leahtre syndon gefyllede þa þingc þe geddode mid getrywum leoðe secgende þeodum sicsade god fram treowe eala þu weofod hal wes ðu & eala ðu ansægdnyssa be wuldre ðrowunga on ðam forbær lif deað & he agæf lif mid his deaðe eala þu treow þu eart wlitig & scinende gefrætewod mid purpuran þæs kynges gecoren of weorðfullum stybbe æthrinan swa halige lima is eadig treow on ðæs earmum oððe bogum hangode weorð weorulde hit is geworden pundern lichaman & hit abræd huðe cwicsusl þu ageotst wyrtgemang mid rinde þu oferswiðst ælcne swæc mid weorodnysse þu eart wynsum on wæstmbærum wæstme þu fægnast mid æþelum sigore eala crist gesundfulla þu gearlic wulder þinre rode us forðan þe þu eart anlic ealdor hæle & æþel alysend middaneardes þu astige rode wyllende for gife ure hæle geþrowod spatlu & earplættas & bendas & reðe swingla þu oferswiðdest þone deofol facnfullne þen deaðes heonan towerpende deað mid þinum deaðe & forgifende lif mid life eala þu halgoda onsægdnyssa þu eart scinende on swyðran hand þæs fæder we biddaþ gehyr þa alysdan mid þinum liflicum blode þæt we beran guðfanan rode togeanes ælcere æswicunge fylgiende þe on eallum þingum on forðstapa þeawa weorulde utan singan criste ealdre æt æfengereorde þæs foregleawan lambes scinendes on hwitum gyrlum æfter oferfære ðære readan sæ we libbað gode onbyrgende haligne lichaman þæs gebrædne on weofode rode mid his rosenum blode generede on æfenne eastran fram þam awestendum engle & generede fram ðam heardestan bebode þæs kyncges nu is crist ure eastran se ðe is geoffrad lamb wæs geoffrad his flæsc ðeorf syfernysse eala ðu soðlice weorðfull onsægdnys þurh hi syndan cwicsusla tobrocene & is gehæft ðeod alysend mede lifes agifenne gehwearf sigefæst of cwicsusle þa þa he uparas of byrgenne bescufende þone scuccan on bend & geopniende neorxnawong eala þu ealdor eallra manna we biddað on ðysum easterlicum gefeaum þæt ðu bewerige þin folc fram ælcum onræse deaðes eala drihten þu ðe uparise fram deaðe sy wuldor þe mid ðam fæder & þam halga gaste on ecere weorulda ameneala þu hælend ure alysend & eala þu lufu & gewilnung & eala god scyppend eallra & eala þu man on ende tida la hwylc mildheortnyss oferswidde ðe þæt þu forðyldegodest ure leahtras ðoliende wælreowne deað þæt þu ætbrude us fram deaðe þu sitst æt swyðran þines fæder mid æþelum sigore þurhfarende fæstnessa helle & alysde ðine hæftlingas genyodode seo sylfa arfæstnys ðe þæt ðu oferswiðdest ure yfelu ari ende & þu gefylst us mid ðinum andwlitan begytene sylfwilles glitnað dægrime leoht swegð heofon mid lofum fægnað middaneard blissiende þoterað hell geomriende hwanne þa þa se strengsta kyng alysde earmingas fram wite fortredende cwicsusle mid his fet tobryttum mægnum deaðes he wæs gehealdan under cæmpan se ðe wæs beclysed mid stane & he aras sigefæst of ræwe sigriende mid æðelum glængce clypeda scinende engcel þæt aras drihten toslopenum geomrungum eallunga & sarum helle wæron unrote be cwale heora hlafordes ðone geniðrodan þa reðan wælhreowan arleaslice mid wite deaðes foresæde se engcel þam wifum mid swæsre spræce is drihten to geseonne on hrædlicor hig cyston fet godes geseonde hine libban þa þa hi eodon hrædlice secgan þis ða eodon þa leorningcnihtas þam oncnawendum ofestlice geseon gewilnod ansyne drihtnes scan sunne middaneard mid beorhtum leoman on easterlicum gefea þa þa beheoldan eallunga ða mid lichamlicre gesihðe utan singan lofsang wulder swegað nywa lofsangas nu þa forðan ðe astah to ðrymsetle his fæder mid nywum siðfæte gesawon þa wuldor ðæs hælendes standende ða on dune gerynelices smyrelses mid meder beorhtum mædene cwædon gesprecende þa hwæt behealde ge to tunglum standende þes hælend is hælend se þe astah mid æþelum sigore & hi geseðdon wesen ðysne hælend toweardne swa swa swa hi gesawon hine astigan þa healican scinendan ypplena heofona eala syle us onettan ðider mid carefulra estfulnesse þær þær we gelyfað þe sittan mid ðam fæder on ypplene rices onlihte gehalgod dæg gewilnad mid gewilnungum eallra on ðam astah hiht middaneardes þa sticolan heofonas geandwerdiende wuldor sigefæstes flæsces andwlitan his fæder ofslagenum ealdre middaneard mid sigore myceles gefeohtes eala mycel gefea is þæt is geþeod bearn ures mædenes fæderlicum setle æfter spatla æfter swinglum æfter rode eornostlice utan don þancunga geahniendum ure hæle þæt he upawæh urne lichaman to ðam uplican rice heofon gedafenað us anbidian crist mid foretihtum dædum & libban mid swylcum life þe mage astigan heofonas þu ece & eala þu hehsta alysend geleaffulra is geseald sige gife ðær ðær losode toslopen deað is forgifen ða miht eallra þinga heofonlice seo þe næs mennisclice astigende domsetl swiðran hand his fæder & gebigde nu ða þryfeald cræft þinga gesceapena hwylc þingc cneow underðeodde þæt is heofonlicra heriga & eorðlicra & hellicra agylte flæsc afeormað flæsc rixað god flæsc godes forðam bifiað englas geseonde awend wrixl deadlicra manna eala ðu crist þu eart ure bliss wuniende gewelgod on rodere þu þe gewissast getimbrunga middaneard oferswiðende middaneardlice gefea we biddað biddende þe heonan gemiltsa eallum gyltum & upahef ure heortan up to þe mid uplicra gife & we biddað þæt þu utanyde neadwise witu & þæt þu agif ða forlorenan wulderbeagas þonne ðu onginst scinan readiendum wolcne deman eala þu gast scyppend cum geneosa mod þinra þena gefyll breost þa ðe þu gescope mid uplicra gife ðu eart seofonfeald on lace ðu eart finger swyðran hand godes þu gewelegast þrotan gewunelice mid behatenre spræce ðæs fæderes onæl leoht andgitum onageot lufe urum heortum getrymmende mid ecere mihte þa untruman ure lichaman swa we forbugan ælc ðingc deriendlices þe forestæppendum latteowe þæt ðu utanyd ðone feond feorr & þu sylle sibbe þærrihte syle & we cunnan ðone fæder þurh ðe & þæt we oncnawan ðone sunu þurh ðe & þæt we gelyfan heora ægðres on ælcere tide ongenlædde ymbryne vel hweol geares eadig gefean us þa þa scan se halga frofergast on ða leorningcnihtas he brohte hiw tungan ræscendum leohte fyres þæt hi wæron nihtsume on wordum & weallende on soðre lufe hi spræcon mid tungum eallra manna & forhtodon seo mæniu hæðenra hi talodon druncnian mid muste þa þa gefylde se halga gast syndon ðas geryna gefremade aganre tide eastran on halgan getela fiftigra daga on ðam wæs forgifennys æ astah eallunga to tunglum ongenhworfen þanon þe he com to syllanne þone halgan gast mid behatenre lac þes fæder onstod symbel dæg mid ðam he getacnað mid seofonfealdre geryne ða eadigan tida awyltum ymbhweorfte seofon siðum swegde middaneard færlice þa þa wæs seo þridda tid eallum mannum cyðende cuman god gebiddendum eornostlice is halig fyr wlitig of leohte þæs fæder mid þam he gef ylde þa getruwan breosta þa apostola mid hæton wordes blissodon gefylde innoðas ablawene mid halgum blæde samodswegdon mistlice stemn & hi spræcon mærða godes wæs samodcuman of ælcere þeode greciscman & romanisc & uncuð spræca & spræcon ða mid gereordum eallra eallum mannum wundriendum heloþrode þa seo ungeleaffulla iudeisc mæniu mid gewitleasum gaste bealcettan fostercild oferfylle niwes wines ac ongean & lærde mid tacnum & mid mihtum sprecan þa geleaffleasan leasunga geseþende mid ioheles gewitnysse þu gefyldest hwilon ða gehalgodan breost mid þinre gife forlæt nu ða synna & syle gedefe tida sy lof þam fæder mid ðam sunu & frofergaste heora begra & forgife se sunu nu ða us ðisne gast swa swa he behet eala þu halga unbind gylt besmitenes weleres þæt magon þenas swegan wundra ðinra dæda toslopenum æddrum geypte boda cumende of hean rodore þe wesan to acennanne þam mæron fæder & geypte naman & endebyrdnysse adreogendlices lifes endebyrdlice he forleas dreamas hræddre spræce tweoniende ðæs upplican behates ac ðu geedstaðelodest dreamas ofslagenre stemne acenned þu undergeate wuniendne cyngc on brydbure gelogod on fordyttum cleofan innoðas geypte ægðer moder digla heora suna heonan be geearnungum utan swegan ealle uplica acenda mid ðam rixað se halga gast & scyppend samod eala ðu halga þu gefore scræfa westenes under merewum gearum forfleonde heapas ceasterwara þæt ðu ne mihtest besmitan þin lif furðum mid leohtre spræce gearcode olfend stiðne gyrlum his halgum liðum & gearcodo sceap gyrdel þam & burna gearcode
