drenc & gearcodon gefylde huni mid feldwyrtum fodan gyddedon oðre witegana toweardne leoman þæt an on forwittigre heortan ðu geypst witodlice mid scitefingre ætbredend gylt middaneardes næs ænig acenned haligre geond fæc brades ymbhwyrftes se geearnode bedypan on wæterum aðwean mann weorulda eala ðu swyðe gesælig & eala ðu healica be gearnungum nytende won snawhwittre clænnysse & eala ðu mihtiga cyðere & eala ðu biggengca westenes & ðu mæsta witegana gewuldorbeagiað sume witegana kyneheolmas geyhta mid þrittigum geeacnungum & gewuldorbeagiað sume witegana wuldorbeagas getwifylde mid þrittigum geeacnungum & ðe gefrætewiað eala ðu halga ðryfealde wuldorbeagas geeacnode mid hundfealdum wæstme eala ðu mihtiga mid genihtsumum geearnungum utanyd ða heardan stanas nu ða ures breostes & gewisa þa gebigdon siðfatu smetliende teart siðfæt þæt gemedmie se arfæsta scyppend & alysend middaneard gesettan gehalgode stapas cumende gewunelice utanyddræ fulnesse of clænum mode eala ðu leoht leoht ðu geondgute ealle weorulde mid gyldenum leohte & mid readum wlite gelitegende heofonas mid æþelum martyrdome se sylð forgifennysse scyldigum on ðisum halgan dæge is geatweard heofonan & lareow ymbhwyrftes & hi syndon deman weorulde samod & soðe leoht middaneard & hi geahniað ealdordom lif gewuldorbeagode sigriende se oðer þurh rode & se oder mid sweorde eala þu milda god hyrde underfoh nu ða behat biddendra & unbind bendas synne betæhtum anwealde þe mid ðam þu geopenast heofonan eallum & belycst heofonan mid þinum wordum eala þu æþele lareow getymbre þeawas & hoga gebringan us to heofonan on mode oþ þæt sy forgifen fullicor & þæt fulfremede aidlededum þæt þe we dreogað nu ða be dæle eala git getwinnan elebeamas anre arfæstnysse biddað libban æfter deaðe flæsces þa estfullan on geleafan & swyðost þa strangan on hihte & þa gefyldan mid wylle getwinre soðre lufe sy ece wulder & weorðmynt & miht & fægnung ðære halgan þrinnysse ðæra wunað anweald on annyssa æfre herto & nu ða & heonon forð æfre eala þu mæden la hu wulderful leohte þu glitenast kynelic tudder davidlicre mægðe sittende healic ofer ealle heofonbuendum roderas þu garcodest lofsang drihtne engla on halgum innoþum breostes clæna moder mid mædenlicum wurðmente wæs acenned crist god heonon mid lichaman þone gebit eall ymbhwyrft arwurðigende þam is gebiged ælc cneow nu þa rihtlice æt þam we biddað gefea leohtes awegaworpenum þeostrum ðe cumendre oððe þingiendre eala þu fæder ælces leohtes forgif þis þurh ðinne agenre sunu mid þam halgan gaste se þe leofað mid ðe on scinendum rodera rixiende & gemetgiende ealle worulda moder drihtnes þæs ecan fæderes sunu bring spede us eallum to þe samodbecumendum god of gode acennedne ðu acendest suna se ðe næfþ anginn of ðe he underfeng anginn þisne suna towunderlicne & æfre samodherigedlicne gefyrn witegan samodgeddunge heo sprecan mid bene þurh gabriel heahængel of heofenan com bode gecoran godes suna spræcende wæs þurh ændebyrde godes heahængel ure hæle bydel he swegie swa gegretende þa syo þu gesund syo þu gesund æþele þu full godes gyfe þe geeacnast þurh gast & þu acænst suna eala ðu mæden eadigosta ofer heofonam gebletsod gebide for munecha estfulla werode eadmodra heofenes cwen on halinysse wuldorful gehyr bena þena & gebide drihten se þe ealne middaneard gescop on þe sceapen wunat þæne eall middan eard ne befehþ on þinum o innoþe læg þisne us beon acænned he fore fram deaþe us he generode for us he sylf wæs deað & us þurh hine libbaþ þu heahengcel tacenbora heofonlicra geryne þe we biddað halsiende þæt ðu geneosige us glæd þu sylf onliht mid halgum englum & mid rihtwisum & mid ðam halgum apostolum ðas stowe singallice þær þær we drohtniað nu ða gebiddende estful genihtsume bena for us eallra þære clænesta larewa & biscopa þæt se sylfa drihten utanydde ðone reða feond & gewissige spede sibbe & þæt wunige fulfremed geleafa on ure breoste upastigan ure stemn þærrihte to ðrymsetl wuldres & uprære ure mod se þe scinð on scinendum setl wunie his miht her byrne fæst soð lufa her ongenyre he his þenum to hydðum hæle ætbrede he ealle gedwylde & he gerihtlæce þa widscriðolan andgitum & gewissige ure fotswaðu þurh pæð sibbe awrite he þas halgan leoð on scinendum ypplene leoht & he gelogige ure naman samod on bec lifes eala þu beorhtnys þæs fæder ðu eart lif & miht heortana we singað þe mid stemn gewilnunga on gesihðe ængle & we syllað lofa mid stemnum wrixliende hleoðriende we samodheriað ealle cæmpan arwurðiende ac healicost heafodhebban heofonlices heriges tobryttend scuccan on mihte godes arfæstoste cyngc utanyd ælc man ðæs fynde feorr mid þam hyrd & agif us þinum neorxnawonge mildheortnysse anre clæne on heortan & lichaman utan swegan wuldor þam mid lofbærum stemnum & utan singan & utan singan ðam frofergaste se ðe wunað þrylic & an ær weorulda halgana þu eart wlite engla & ealdor & wissiend mennisces cynnes forgif us welwillende astigan þa ecan heofonan we biddað beon asend engcel sibbe heofonlice to ðissere healle þæt cuman & weaxan gelomlice ealla speda us flicrige se stranga fram heanysse þæt he utanyde þone ealdan feond & cume he to þissum urum temple geneosian gelomlicor asend us of heofonum læce hæle þæt he gehæle ealle adligan & þæt he gewissige ure dæda samod ætstande cennestre ures godes & eall weorod engla heonan symble & eall se eadig gesamnung eallra halgana samod is geweorþod weoroldum freols dæg þa ðe rixiað on heofonlicum eala ðu hælend mid ðe gesæliglice we cegað ðas alotene & þe eala ðu alysend eallra & we ageotað bena heom geomriende & ðe eadmode eala þu hælend hælend worulde help alysdum mid spede þinre welwillendnysse & þu arfæsta cennestre bide hæle earmingum biddan ealle ængcellice weoroda & heapas heahfædera & geearnunga witegana forgifnysse us unbindan us fram cnottum leahtres se forestæppendan fulluhtere christes & se roderlica cægbora mid ðam oðrum afeormian us fram synnum þæt gehalgode weorod cyðera & andetnyssa haligra sacerda & mædenlic clænnyss getyþian fultumes haligra munecena & ealle heofonlice ceasterware gewilnungum eadmode & biddan hi meda lifes geheald þine þenas geglæded mid halgum benum ðære eadigan æfre mædenes eala ge eadigan heapas heofonlicra gasta utanydað eac swilce þa forþgewitenan yfela & þa andweardan & þa toweardan eala ge witegan þæs ecan deman & ge apostolas we biddað eadmodlice us beon gehælede mid eowrum benum eala ge æþelan cyþeras & eala ge scinende andetteras feriað us on þa heofonlican mid eowrum gebedum eala þu weorod haligra mædena & eallra munecana doð us hefonhlyttan cristes samod mid eallum halgum afyrsiað geleafleasan þeode of gemærum gelyfendra þæt we gelæstan neadwise lofa glædlice  templhalgunga þæt is symbelnessa hyra eardungstowa we na ne begymaþ for þon þe eardungstow godes his halgan synt on þam he eardaþ on ecnesseisidore sententiae: rhodes 1889 226-36 corrected against msbe forestihtingetwyfeald ys forestihtung sam þe gecorenra to reste sam þe wiþercorenra to deaþe ægþer mid godcundum ys gedon dome þæt symle gecorene upplice & innemyste fyligean heo do & symle wiþercorene þæt untrume & yttran geblissigan forlætende geþafigeswa swa nat mann gemære leohtes & þystra oþþe æniges þinges hwylc ende sy eallswa fullicur nat hwylc ær hys ende leohte rihtwisnysse sy forecumen oþþe hwylc synfull mid þystrum oþ his ende si aþystrud oþþe hwylc æfter slide þystra gecyrred arise to leohte ealle þas gode geopeniað mann soþlice bemiþaþþeah þe rihtwisra drohtnung on þisum life afandigendlic sy ungewis swa þeah mannum ys to hwylcum syn ende forestihtude ac ealle beoþ gehealdene þam towerdum domewunderlic dihtnung ys upplices todales þurh þa her rihtwis ma ys gerihtwisud arleas ma ys befyled yfel to gode hwilon byþ gecyrred god to yfele hwilon byþ ongeangebiged wyle gehwylc beon god & he na mæg wyle oþer beon yfel & him na byþ geþafud forwurþan byþ geseald þam se þe wyle beon god oþer ne he nele ne him na byþ geseald þæt he sy god þes ys acenned on gedwylde & he swylt se on gode on þam he ongan oþ ende he þurhwunaþ swa lange þes stent oþ þæt he fealle se lange yfele lybbende on ende byþ gehæled & besceawud byþ gecyrredwyle framian on gode rihtwis ne he na mæg wyle derian yfel & he mæg þes wyle gode geæmtian & mid worulde he byþ gelet se mid ceapum beon befealden gewilnaþ ne him na byþ geþafudwealt yfel gode god byþ genyþerud for arleasum arleas byð gewurþud toforan rihtwisum & on þyssere swa micelre deorcnysse na mæg mann godcunde þurhsmeagean dihtnunge & digle forestihtunge understandan endebyrdnyssebe gemetumtwam gemetum synn byþ gefremmed þæt ys oþþe mid grædignysse oþþe mid forhtunge eges þænne oþþe wyle begytan þæt he gewilnaþ oþþe he ondræt þæt he na onbeyrne þæt he ondrætfeower gemetum byþ gefremmed synn on heortan feower byþ gefullfremmed on weorce byþ togesend on heortan mislare deofla mid gegladunge flæsces mid geþwærunge geþances mid bewerunge uppahafennysse byþ gefremmed mid weorce hwilon dearnunga hwilon openlice hwilon on gewunan hwilon on ortruwunge þysum eornostlice stæpum & heortan byþ agylt & weorce yfelnyss byþ gefremmedþrim gemetum synn byþ gedon þæt ys nytenysse untrumnysse geornfullnysse nytenysse witodlice gemete syngude on neorxna wonge swa se apostol sæde wer nys beswicen wif soþlice beswicen on forgægednysse wæs eornostlice syngude mid nytenysse soþlice mid geornfullnysse forþi þe he næs beswicen ac witende & snoter he syngude se soþlice byþ beswicen hwæt he geþwærige gesewenlice he nat of untrumnysse soðlice agylte þa he æt ege axigendre þinene crist wiþsoc & æfter synne he biterlicust weophefelicur ys on untrumnysse þænne on nytenysse ænigne agyltan & hefelicur on geornfullnysse þænne on untrumnysse syngian on geornfullnysse witodlice syngaþ se mid biggencge & mid freodome geþances yfel deþ on untrumnysse soþlice se þe mid fylle oþþe mid nyþerhryre agylt manfullicur soþlice & of geornfullnysse syngiaþ þa na þæt an na wel lybbað ac gyt & wel lybbende gif hi magon fram soðfæstnysse gehwyrfaðsynd soðlice þa þe nytendlice syngiað & synd þa þe witendlice & synd eac swylce þa þe for nytenysse mid beladunge witan nellaþ þæt hi hwon gyltige beon hæfde þa swa þeah hi sylfe na beweriaþ ac ma hi beswicaðnytan anfealdlice to nytenysse belimpð nellan soðlice witan to toþundenre ofermodignysse willan witodlice agenes hlafordes willan nytan hwæt ys hit elles þænne wyllan hlaford ofermodigende forhogian nænig witodlice be nytenysse hyne beladige forþi god na þæt an þa demð þa fram oncnawincge hyra beoþ ongeangecyrrede ac eac swylce þa þa þe nytan geseþendum þam sylfum drihtne þurh witigan ic tostrede he cwyð menn fram ansyne eorþan & þa þe synd framawende fram bæce drihtnes & þa þe na sohtan drihten ne hi na asmeadan hyne swa se sealm cwyþ utasend yrre þin on þeoda þa þe na oncneowonmænige lif butan leahtre habban magon butan synne hi na magon witodlice þeah þe on þyssere worulde mid micelre rihtwisnysse gehwylc beorhtnysse scine næfre swa þeah to clænum synna fylþum þolaþ geseþendum se segð gif we secgað þæt we synne nabbað sylfe us we beswicaþ & soþfæstnyss on us nyssume synd gelice synnum ac gif hi godum mode gewyrþan hit na synd synna swylce ic swa cweþe miht gif heo na hi to wrecenne mid grædignysse ac ma to þreagenne mid biggencge wrece unscyldigneeft synd synna leohte þa fram anginnendum mid dæghwamlice dædbot synd afeormode þa swa þeah fram fulfremedum werum swylce micele leahtras synd forbogene hwæt soþlice menn be micelum scyldum don scylon þænne eac swylce fulfremede leohte gehwylce gyltas swylce hefeguste heofiaðna þæt an hefige ac leohte synd to warnigenne synna fela soðlice leohte ane hefige gefremmaþ ealswa gewuniað of lytlum & læstum dropum ormæte flodas wexan getelfull soðlice on an gegæderud yþigende gefremþ genihtsumnyssesynna þa unwisum leohte synd fulfremedum werum hefige beoð getealdeswa micele soþlice mare ys oncnawen beon synn swa micele mare swa se þe syngaþ byþ hæfd wyxst soþlice gyltes heap æfter endebyrdnysse geearnunga & oft þæt on læssum na byþ oncnawen mid marum byþ ætwitenbeoð gedonebeoð afundene læssan synna þæt hi heardlicur beon geslegene for micelum scyldum þa þe be lytlum beon gestyrede noldon mid dome soþlice godcundum on scylde wyrsan beoþ aslidene þa þe unwriþan hyra dæda læssan forhogiaþmænige of leahtre feallaþ on leahter þa godes oncnawincge hæbbende ege his forgymeleasiaþ & þæne þe hi cuþan þurh inngehyd þurh dæde hi na arwurþiað & forþi hi synd ablende mid godcundum dome to witnigenne forgyltan & on wite gefremedes manes man wyrse togeiceanoft synn oþre synne intinga ys seo þænne byþ gefremmed oþer of hyre swylce hyre cnosl byþ uppsprungen swa hit gewurþan gewunaþ beon acenned galnysse of ormætre wambe oferfylleof wite soþlice synne synn byþ forlæten þænne for geearnunge gehwylcere synne gode forlætendum on oþre synne byþ faren wyrsan of þære ma se forlæt byð befyled eornostlice forestæppende synn intinga ys æfterfyligendre synne æfterfyligende soþlice synn wite ys forestæppendes gyltes forestæppende witodlice synna æfterfyligendra synd leahtra intinga þæt þa þe æfterfyliaþ syn forestæppendra witeforestæppendra synna wite þæt ys geclypud ahyrdincg cumende of godcundre rihtwisnysse þanon ys þæt segð witega þu ahyrdest heortan ure þæt we na ondredan þe na soþlice swa hwylce swa rihtwise synd fram gode beoþ genydde þæt hi yfele wyrþan ac þænne hi yfele eallunga synd hi beoþ ahyrde þæt hi wyrsan wunian eallswa se apostol segð þæt hi soþfæstnysse godes na onfencgon þæt hi hale wurdon onsende him gast god gedwyldes deþ eornostlice god sume syngian ac on þam eallunga swylce synna forestæppaþ þæt rihtwisum dome his hi gearnian on wyrse faran swylce witodlice synna forestæppendum oþrum synnum beoþ aslidene on wite þæt wite synna geearniaþ sume of yrre godes cumaþsume of yrre godes cumaþ synna þa be geearnunge oþra beoþ wiðmetene synna þanon eac se witega efne cwyð þu yrre eart & we syngudon on þam we weron symle swylce he cwæde forþi we symle on synnum wæron yrre þu eart þæt we wyrs syngudonhwæt soþlice sy yrre godes geearnian hwæt soþlice forþgeclypian snoter rædere scyl witan hefigre witodlice yrre ys þæt byþ forþgeclypud þænne þæt þe byþ geearnud witodlice we geearniaþ þænne we nytende syngiað we forðclypiað þænne we witan god don ne we nellaðnu yrre godes þa hwile þe we lybbað forbugan we magon uton ondrædan eornostlice þæt na cumendum þam egesan domes beon ongyten mæge beon forbogen na mægmaran gyltes ys openlice þænne diglice syngian twyfealdlice soðlice scyldig ys se þe openlice agylt forþi ge he deð ge he lærð be þylcum se witega segð & synna hyra swylce bodudan ne hi na bedigludanmænige soðlice openlice agyltende butan ænigre gehealdsumnysse hyra manu bodiað ne hi na ænigre brucað gyltes sceamesum soðlice eallunga rihtwisnysse dæl ys unrihtwisnysse his menn behydan & on him sylfum be synnum agenum sceamiansynne fullfremman leahter ys synne bodian hream ys be þam eac swylce segð se apostol & hream sy afyrred fram eow mid ealre yfelnysse þæt ys mid þam synnumof þam sylfum þe gehwylc synne þe he deþ behyd gebicnaþ hyne to demenne forþi hi na forsceamudon buton be ingehydes gylte eornostlice & of þam sylfum þe gehwylc be dæde his forsceamað he him sylfum eallunga dema biðbe gefyllednysseelleshwæt ys na syngian mid lufe freondscypes godes elleshwæt mid ege susles se þe soþlice for lufe soþre lufe godes na syngaþ he aþracað ælc yfel beclyppende rihtwisnysse god ne hyne gegladaþ synn þeah þe gyltes unwitnung sy behaten se þe soþlice mid sylfum wite susles on him leahtras gewylt þeah he na gefylle weorc synne leofaþ swa þeah on him willa to syngienne & besargað him unalyfed þæt lagu forbeodan ys oncnawen se eornostlice mede godes weorces onfehþ se lufigende rihtwisnysse deð na se þe þa mid sylfum ege wita genydd gehealtsume & lufiað synne ge doð sume lufiað þæt an & na doð fela soþlice doþ þæt an & na lufiað wel fela synne na doð & swa þeah rihtwisnysse hi hatiað hefelicur soþlice syngaþ se na þæt an synne lufað ac eac deð þænne se þe na deð & lufað & hefelicur gemang þam þe lufað & na deþ þænne se þe deð & hatað ealra hefegust ys na þæt an don ac eac lufian synnewitodlice synd sume þa þe þarrihte adrogenum mane beoþ gescynde & synd þa na þæt an na besargiað hi don yfel ac eac swylce of þam yfele weorce gylpað & swa to wiðmetincge yfeles yfel byþ wyrse þænne be leahtrum geblissigende beoþ uppahafene on wyrse be þylcum segð þa geblissiað þænne hi yfele doð & hi gefægniað on þingum wyrstumepistle of jerome to damasus (li): skeat 1871-87 1-onginneð forerim l tal l saga tenu ðara canona l regulraniwe wrec gewyrce mech neddes of alde ðæt aefter bissena wuritta alle ymbhyrft tostrogden swa vel swelc oðer doema ic sitto & forðon betwih him fagas vel fagegas hwæt aron ða ða mið gregisc efnegeðohton vel of soðe vel mið ic ymbðohte vel ic sundradearwyrðe werc vel winn ah froecenlic foreonfong vel dearfscip ængum to doemenne of oðrum ðene from allum gedoemed aldum geswiga ða tunga & ðe harwelle vel harne middengeard to ðæm frummum vel to onginnum eft to tea vel ðara lyttelra velhwelc forðon gelaered aetgeadre oððæ unlaered miððy in hond boc vel gefalden boc to onfoes & ða salt wælla vel of saltwælla ðone aene indranc geseað vel sceawað to telenna vel ðæt he reða ne mægæ ne hraðe vel sona slittað vel lugcna in stefn meh leasne vel meh ceigendæ þæt ic sie godes wracco ðe ich darr huelc hwoego in aldum bocum to eccanne vel ic toecade geswiga vel gegema velwið ðaem æfist twufald intinge vel meh efnefroefres ðæt & ðu ðu heh sacerd arð doa hates vel hehtes & soð ne see ðæt fagas & gee vel wutetlice ðara gewergedra setness efnegecunnes vel acunngif forðon latinum bisenum lufu is to gefanne ondweardað of ðæm swæ monig aron bissena vel æthwon swa monige boecgif wuted soð is is to soeccenna of monigum forhwon nis to grecis from frumma hea eftgecerras ða ða vel of flitendum trachterum yfle geworht vel gihuerfde from dearflicum vel from gidyrsgindum unwisum eftgeboetat vel girihtæ wiðirweardnis vel wyrs vel of vel from boecerum vel punderum slependum vel geecad vel gehuerfde arun vel ymbcerred we gemes vel boetes uehrihðne hweðre ic of alde tosceade vel setnessa ðæt from unsefuntig aldum vel in grecisc sprec gecerred ðirde had to us wið ðerhcwomne soeco ic hwæt ceorles noma hwæt ceorles noma hia oncnawæð l hogað forhwon ceorles noma bitwih niuum & aldum middel l to middes ineade eodi sie ða soð intrahtung l reccenise ðaem l þæt ða apostolas gecunnedunof niwe nu ic spreco setness vel cyðnise ðæt crecisc sie vel were nan dwala is butan ðæm apostol matheus ðe ærist in iudea godspell cristes vel ðæs gecorenes ebriscum stafum geworhte vel acendeðis wutetlice miððy in usra vel word toslittað & ða unefne vel ungelico burna trametas vel woegas vel stige gelaeded anum of espryngc to soecanne vel isic forleto ða boec ða from lucianus & hesichio twoe cearla noma genemnedo lythwon monna gesaegde vel wiðirworda vel flitta vel afulic geflit of ðæm wutetlice ne in aldum gehrine vel æe æfter unseofuntigum trahteras vel recceras eftniwige vel girihte hwæt scean vel ne in niwe for ænig wæs vel ængum to boetanne vel to rihtannæ vel giboeta miððy monigra cynn sprec writ vel uurit aer oferlæded gelæreð leasa were vel sie ða geeced vel acenned arunforðon ðis ondweard foresægdnis vel gehatten bið vel gehaten is fewer ana godspelleras ðara endebrednis ðes is boc criecna geboetat vel girihtad efnegelæded ah & aldða vel ne monig gecoren latines gewunelic geteldon vel swa mið pinn vel vrittsæx we gehehtun ðæt of ðæm ana ða ðoht gesegon gecerde vel gevixla gemendum ða æfterra gewuna we ondetað ðæt he weronða talo vel reglas ec ða eusebius ða cæsariensisca biscop ðone alexander i biscop gefuilgide vel gelaerde ðe biscop ammonium in tenum talum geendebrednade swelce in crecis habað we gedryhton vel ue auritti ðæt gif hwelc of ðæm idlum wellæ wutta ða in godspellum vel in aan vel oðer vel vel ane biðon heora gescead conn velmicil gif hwelc ðes in usum bocum dwola gewæx miððy ðæt in an ðing oðer godspellere mara saeges in oðer forðon leasse woendon togeecton vel vel mið ðy ilco ðoht oðer suindir geðryde vel aurat he seolf ðe an & ða feower ðe forma redas to his bisen oðer ec he woende geboettande velðona gewarð vel gilamp ðæt mið us giblonden gimencged aron alle & in marc moniga lucas & ec matheies eft vel eft on bæcgling in math ioh & mar & ða oðera æfterra ða oðrum suindrig arun ða bigetne vel gimoetid sintmið ðy ðonne ða regulas ðu redes ða underbeged vel underðiodid arun ðæs sceomaes vel telnisses dwala underlaeded & gelicra vel gilic alra witte ðu & suindrigum his sua hwælc ðu eftsettes vel ðu niueas vel ðu boetasin tal l in regel ðone forma gegeadriges l efnesæcgas feuero in regula ða æfterra ðrea in tal l regla ða ðirda ðrea in regele ða fearða ðrea in tal ða fifta twoe in regula ða scista twoege in tal ða seofunda twoege in regula ða aehteða twoege in tal ða niða twoege in regula ða teiða suindrig an eghwelc ða ne habbas in oðrum gecendon lswindrigum godspellum of aanum onginnes wið ende ðara boca unefne vel ungilic tal onwæxesðis vel her blaccum hiwe ðerhwritten under him hæfis oðer of neude tal unhiwed vel ungelices hiues ðe to tenum wið forecyme tæcnes ærest vel ðe forma tal in ðæm bið vel sie regula to soecannemið ðy wutedlice untuned boc swæ oðer bisen ðæt vel ðæt forecwide gewite ðu welle his vel ðæs regel sie sona of ðem under rim ðu gelæres & eft gearn to ðæm frummum in ðæm talum his gesceaden vel todæled gesomna ðu vel gisomnung ðæt ilca ec sona rim of tacon onsiones begeten gimoeton hine ðene ðu gesohtes rim ðæs ilca godspelleres ðe e he seolf of inwritting gemercad bið ðu infindes and ec of ðæm æfterrum oðrum tramitum vel woegum vel stigum inscewungum ða talo on efne habas togemerca& mið ðy gewit ðu eftgeiorn to bocum suindrigum & buta tuia gefundena rimas ða ær ðu gebecnades onfindes & stowa in ðæm vel ðe ilco vel ða æfterra gecwoedunic ceasa ic onn ðæt in crist ðu getreowfæstnig & gemyndga mines papa ðu eadgajeromes prologue to matthew (li): skeat 1871-87 5-monige werun ða ðe godspellas awritton & ðe godspellere getrymmeð cwoeðende forðon soðlice monigæ gecunnate sint geendebrednege ða sago ðinga ða in usic gefylled sindun suæ gesaldon us ða ðe from frumma ða ilco vel hia gesegon word & geembihtatun him & ðerhwunadun wið to ondword tit fæstnunga bærlice æteawdon ða wið vel from wiðerwordum larwum geworht unefenlicra vel ungemetlicra erfewaerd hine broemende frumma swæ is ðæt æt ægiptum & & & twoelfa ðara apostola & & ða æfterra vel ða oðera ða to talanna longsum is miððy ðis ana in ondwuæardra nede vel booflic is to cwoeðenne ofstode ðara sum ða ðe buta gaast & geafa gecunnad sint swiðor geendebrednege ða sago ðaem soðsaga gescildon soðfæstnisefrom ðæm rehtlice swæ mæg ðæt witgiung geceasa wæ ðæm ða ðe witgas of heorta hiora ða ðe gæs æfter gaast hiora ða ðe cwoeðas ðas cwoeð drihten & drihten ne sende heafrom ðæm & haelend in godspell sprecæs alle ða ðe aer meh cwommun ðeafas weron & sceacarasða ðe cwomun ne ða ðe sended arunhe seolf forðon cwoeð hia cymas & ic ne sende hiain cummenum foreonfong dearfscipes ungesendena embichta ðeadomes iscirica wutedlice ðiu vel ða ofer staðolfæst stan drihtnes stefn geseted is ða inngelaede cyning in inne his & to ðaem ðerh ðyril ofgestignisse gedeglice sende hond his ongelic & hearta fewer streamas neirxna wonga ongelic gespranc fewere & hwommas & hringas haefis ðerh ða swa ðerh aerca cyðnisse vel setnesse & haldend ae drihtnes trewum styrendum vel cerrendum he gelædesærest vel forma alra is bærsuinnig his cuðnoma vel his noma lesincg ðe godspell in iudea ebrisc word geworhte for hiora vel ðe maaste inthingc ða ðe in hælende gelæfdon of iudæm & ne hwæt ða aes shya undercwom godspelles soðfæstnisse bihealdonðirdda lece geboren sirisc ðara burug ðæs lof vel herenis in godspell ðe & ðe vel he discipulus apostoles daelum boc efnegeworhte vel gesette sum oðer hera eftsohte & ðaet he in ðoht ondetað gehered maa ðon gesege of vel fromawratlaetmest & godspellere ðone ðe haelend gelufade monigfallice ðe ofer brest drihtnes gehlionade vel geræste claenust ðara lara flownisa vel esprynca gebaer vel lædde & ðe ana of rode geearnade þæt he geherde heno moder ðinðes mið ðy wæs & ge vel wutetlice ða vel in ðæm tid wiðerwordra larwas seda geseawun ceorles noma ceorles noma & ða oðera ða ðe onsaccas in lichoma gecomae ða & he in oferwurit his bifore vel anticrist cliopas vel ceigas vel ceið & ðe apostol symle vel oft ðerhslaeð geðreatad vel geneded is from allum buta lytlum ða vel in ðæm tid biscop & monigra cirica hergum godcunde haelendes hero vel heista awrita & to ðæm vel to him þæt vel suæ ðus ic saego godes word ne swæ swiðe vel vel no swiðor dearfe vel dyrstige ðon seles dearfscipe vel bældo foreiorne vel bicymo þæt ciricalicra saegde soðspell vel soðsaga mið ðy from broðrum were geneded ðæt awritta swæ were geworden vel ðus geworht ondworde gif inboden fæsten in gemænnisse alle god gebedon vel biddende weronof ðæm were gefylled from vel of onwrihnise geendad in ðæt mearda to vel of heofne cwom loceteð vel gesprang in fruma waes word & word waes mið gode & god wæs word ðis wæs in frumma mið godeðas cuðlice vel soðlice fewer godspelles monig aer forecwoeden vel forecwida ðæs witges ec boc soðeð vel fæstnagið vel costaið in ðæm ðy forma gesihðnis ðus bið gedegled & in middum swæ vel swælce bisen fewer netra & onsion hiora ondwlita vel hioful monnes & ondwlita vel onsion leas & ondwlita cælfes & ondwlita earnesðy forma monnes ondwlita forðon swæ vel swælce from menn ongann awritte boc cneorese vel cynnrecenisse hælendes cristes sunu dauides sunu abrahamæfter marc in ðæm stefn leas in woestern roeðe vel rarende vel bellende gehered bið stefn ceigende in woestern vel in unbyedum londæ gearwas woeg drihtnes recta doas vel wircas stiga vel streta hisðirdda celfes of ðon vel of ðæm ðe godspellere lucas from zacharia meaessapreoste infeing vel ingann frumma foregebecnadefearða iohannis ðe godspellere ðe onfeing feðra earnes & to ðæm heistum i bodum geoefistade vel oefistende & of word godes doemeð vel tosceadeðða oðera ða æfterfylgeð in ðon ilco ðocht foregewoxumsceonca hiora recta & feðrihtæ foet & swa hwidir gaast gaæs hea gæð & ne eftcerras vel wendas & hryuic hiora fullæ egum & gloetas & ðæccillas in middum utiornenda & hwel in huelum in suindrigum feuer onsiones biðon& ðy boc æfter getal tuoentig feuer aldra vel uðwutana ða haldas hearpas & fato tobiddes vel geheras lomb godes inbrohte leigeðslaehtas & ðunera & seofo gastas & ymbiornas & sae glaesen & feuer netna vel wihta fulle egum cwoeðende vel sægde neten vel wiht ðe forma ongelic leas & ðe aefterra ongelic celfes & ðe ðirdda ongelic monnes & ðe fearða ongelic earnes flegende& æfter lytle hwile fulle saegde þæt hia wero egum & raest nabbas daeg & næht hia cwoeðas vel cweðenda halig halig halig drihten god allmæhtig ðe wæs & ðe tocymende vel toword isof ðæm allum clænlice vel bærlice vel lutorlice æteawas fewr ana vel noht mara se reht godspellas to onfoanne & alle wiðerweardra gedwola deada swiðor slitenum ðon ciricendum hlifiendum singendumonginnes foresægdnise eusebieseusebius ðe carpianisca ðæm broðer in drihten haelogelaered sum oðer alexandrinesca mið micile bigeong & ec hogahscipe enne vel an us fore feower godspellum offorleort& forðon ðrea godspellas vel ðara godspellera bisen vel ðoht buta ðæm ongelicum & ða bihaldne matheis godspell swelce to anum efnegewordena vel geworhta tocnuicte swæ þæt hiora vel ðara ilca swæ feolo to gebyres redes æfterfylges utuetlice bituihtoslitten sie geseensoð vel ah butean þæt hal lichoma oððe geadrung oðerra ðis vel þæt is godspell suyndriga & ða hamcuða stowa of ðæm gelic vel ilca & swae gelic gecuedon gewutta ðu mæht & mið soðe gesæcca onfenge buta tua of ðæm forsegden/ uer gesetnesa oðera rehtnissa teno of tal ðe mercas vel tacnas ic gemercadeðara ærest feuer in him gehaldæs tala in ðæm gelicra of allum gecueden aronæfterra in ðæm ðreaðirda in ðæm ðreafearða in ðæm ðreafifta in ðæm tuogeseista in ðæm tuoegeseofonda in ðæm tuegeeahteða in ðæm tuegenioða in ðæm tuoegeteiða in ðæm suindrige of oðrum sundurlice awuritunof ðon ec ðara underra mercunga þæt is rehtsmeawung berhta soðlice hiora sago ðys is& forðon ðerh syndriga stowa godspella oððer tal gesegen bið togesetet heartlice vel lyt huon onginnes from forma æfter ðon ðy æfterra siðða ðrea & ðerh endebrednisse ðara bocana ende wið foregaes vel gefæresðonne ðerh suindriga talo tal ðerh bischead innbigeates vel infindas insetena gebecnas vel getacnas to chwæm of tenum mercum togesetet tal oncnawesswælce soðlice ærest wutetlice is in ðæm forma gif ec in ðæm æfterra & ða ilca wisa wið to tenumgif soðlice fromymbcerred an suæ huelc of feour godspellum suæhuelcum foruearde vel heafodueard ðu wælla instonde & eftgeuuta ða ðe gelic sægdon & stowa vel styde sundria oncnawa anra gehwelc in ðæm gelic aron forespreconæfter anum ðoht swæ hwæs haldes ðu eftredende foregeseted tal & is to soecanne hine in foremercunc ðene æteawes mercunces undermercad sona gewuta ðu mæht of oferwritenum ðas in foruuard foregenotad ðu infindes forðon ðæt swa monig of ðæm ða ðu insoecas gelicra cwedoncymeð gee vel ec soð to oðrum godspella ðerh ðon ilco tal ðene nimmende ðu gesist togesetedo vel gegeadrad ðerh sundrigo talo & ec ða in hiora suindrigum stydum vel stowum ongelica gecwedon ðu onfindesgesægd is foresægdnisse eusebieshiervs herenise l lof on earðeheono esne min ic vnderfoe hine gicoren min giarwyrðigeð ðec savel mindriht god min ic worðigo ðec lof ic sello nome ðinvm ðv ðe doest wvndvrlic ðing giðæht ðin aldgeddvng soð siedriht heh is arm ðin god alles herges sigbeg hyhtes ðiv gifreatvad is to wvldrewynsvmiað woesten giwynsvmiað vnbyengo iordan & folc min gisene bið heannisse driht& megewlit godesðas cvoeð driht ic vntyno in morvm streamas in middvm feldvm espryngo ic toslito & earðe ðyrstende bvtan vætre ic scendoheono cnæht min wynsvmmende bið & vpahefen bið & hehðvngen bið sviðeeft somnvngcvido in bæðdæggod ðv ðe longsvmne  ancende ðin cynnvm stearre latva aedeavades fgef rvmmodlice þætte ða ðe gie ðec of lvfa we ongeton oðþæt to ymbsceawge megwlite ðines heannis ve sie ðerhlæded ðerhgod inlihtend allra cynno sel folcvm ðinvm ece sibbe gifeage & þæt leht scinende indæl heartvm vsvm þætte ðrea tvngelcræftigo ðohtvm ðv ableawegod ðæs ancende in vnstondennisse l vser lichomes ædeawde gionn we biddas þætte ðerh hine ðone gilic vs vta we ongeton innabord þætte we se eft nivado ve giearnigo se ðe ðec miðallm ece god gileaffvllra berhtnisse savla ðv ðe ðas symbbeltid gicorenscipes cynno frvmcendo ðv gihælgedest fyll middangeard wvldor ðin & vnderðiodo ðe folcvm ðerh lehtes ðines aedeava þæt berhtnissegilef allm god þætte halwende ðin nive heafna lehte wvndvrlic þæt to hælo middangdes ece symbelnis soðcvom vsvm symle in niwvngvm heartvm sie arisen ðerhsel vs ve bid driht meodomlice gimersiga degla giryne þæt in vsver halwendes l hælendes cildhad wvndrvm licxændvm is giberhtad & mennisscniss ðerhgionn ve bid allm god þætte hælendes middang stearre latva giypedo acennisse ðohtvm vsvm eft se ædeawde symle & gewæxegeinlihte driht ve bid folc ðin & lixvnge wvldres ðines hearte his symle giinliht þætte halwende sinvm & vnablinnendlice ongette & soðlice togigripe se ðe ðec mic svoelce wingeard ic wæstmede svoetnis gistences & blostmo mines wæstm gistencnis & fegernisic moder fegernis lvfsvmnis ondesnis & micelnis& hælges hygtes in mec geafa alles lifes & soðfæstnis in me ælc hyht lifes & mæhtesoferfæreð to me alle ða ðe giwilnigað mec & from cynnvm minvm gie sie gifylledo gast fðon min of hvniges svoet & erfeweardnis min of hvnig & biobread gimynd mino in gecneoreso worvldogicysse mec cysse mvðes sines fðon betro aron tido ðino wine & stengcnis smirenis ðinra of allo gimongo wyrtana l wyrteno gimongefeger is levr l hagospind ðin mego min svæ tvrtvres svire ðin svælce svirbeg bvlas gyldenno gidoe ve ðe giberbedo svlfereheono ðv feger arð mego min heonv ðv feger ego ðino cvlframið ðy vere cynig in his gireste l sinvm nebb min min salde l gisalde stencgnis sin fawlit l recelces leof min me bitven titto mino giwvneð lgilær ve bid driht folc ðin & ða ðe vta gerlico giseleð oeste þæt ve se giworðiad innveardlic from him l gifylge geafæ ðines lehte gilef ðerh drihtallm ece god mægenðrym ðin giðoncle l ve biddað þæt svæ ancen svnv ðin ecelic  mið vser lichome bisene in temple is giondveardad sva vs gidoe giclænsadvm ðe ðohtvm ve se giondvardedo ðerhðerhendig in vsig ve bidd driht gefe ðin ðv ðe soðfæstes simeones onbasnvng ðv gifyldest þæt svæ he deað ne gisege ær þæt ðone gicoren driht gisea giearnade svæ æc vs l ve lif gihalda we ece ðerhðas cvoeð driht gicerreð gie to me in allre hearte iero in feastne & vope & hreame l & cleafað hearta ivero & no voedo iverogicerrað to driht god iver fðon rvmmod & mildheart is giðyldig & monigfald miltheart & vnnend l fgefend ofer yfelgiornisseceig l clioppa ne blin svælce bema vpahef stefne ðin & gisægi folce minvm hehsynna hiara & hvse iacob synno hiara mehc & fðon of  in  soecað & givta vegas mino vallaðmið ðy ðv ageatas ðæm hvngrige savel ðin & sawel awoerdedo l asvoenc ðv gifylldest ariseð in ðiostrvm leht ðin & ðiostro ðino biðon svoelce mid heono ne is giscyrtedo hond driht þætte hæle ðy læs mægi ne æc gihefigad is eare his þætte ne giherebroðro nvton gie þæt ða ða ðe in spyrde iornað allo wvted iornað ah an onfoað ðone sig svæ iornað gie þætte gie gigripabroðro ælc se ðe in erning giflitað l giteð from allvm hine bihalde & þa wvt þæt sceomlic sigbeg hia onfoe ve wvt vnsceomlicbroðro ic cvðlice sva ic iorne no svælce in vnwvted svæ ic fehto no svoelce lyft ðerscende ah bego l clænsigo lichoma min & in nedhernise l in ðeadome ic bego ðy læs mið oðrvm ic mersigo seolfa fcyðed ic sie gifremmadbroð lvstlice ic wvldrigo in vntrymnissvm minvm þætte inbye in mec mægn cristesbroð mið ðy ic væs lytel ic spræc svæ lytel ic hogade suæ lytel ic giðohte svæ lytel ða wvt aworden ic am voer ic giidlade ða ðe voeron lytlesbroð nv wvt wvnað lvfv l gileafa hyht godes lvfv ðrim ðas mara wvt ðisra is broðerlvfvbroð menn ne ængvm gie gidæfnað bvtan þætte bitwien gie lvfige se ðe fðon lvfað ðone neste æ gifylleðbroð gif þæt is bibod in ðissvm worde eft is giboeted lvfa ðv ðone neste ðin svæ ðec seolfnebroð lvfv ðæs nestes yfel ne wyrceð fylnisse fðon æes isbeado folces ðines ve bid drih rvmmodlice giher þætte ða ðe soðlic fe synnvm vsvm ve biðon asvoencde fe ðines nome wvldre miltheartlice ve sie friadogod ðv ðe gisceawast fðon of nængvm vser dede ve gitrivadon gilef rvmmodlice þætte wið wiðirwordniso allo larwes hæðinra scildnise ðinvm ve sie gitrymmedogibeado vsra ve bid drih rvmmodlice giher & æc from synna bendvm vnbvndeno from ælcvm vsig wiðirwordnissvm gihald drgod ðv ðe ðerh vnasæcgendlic bihaldnise halges gihrynes ðeana ðinra fegearwast willo geafvm gefe ðines hearta vsra giclænsig þætte hælgo is oeste to smeanne smyltvm ðohtvm ve gifylga drgilef ve bidd allm god tederniss vser cvoemlic giðafende þæt his eftnivuwvnges tohigvng & arfæst lifbrycgvng gilehta & mið wynsvmnis vnderfoeafirr from vs driht ve bid vnrehtvisso vsra þætte to halgo hælgana clænvm we giearniga ðohtvm inngeongagod ðv ðe vsig in miclvm froecelnisvm gisetedo uast tedernise ne mægi vnderbeara sel vs hælo ðohtes & lichomes þætte ða ða ðe fe synnvm vsvm ve giðoligað ðec fvltemmende fesviðe veallm ece god vntrymmnise vsa mildelice biseh & æc to scildnise vsig sviðra ðines mægenðrymmesgiricsa ve bid driht folc ðin & gefe ðines in ðæm geafo gimonigfalda þætte from allvm frio ondspyrnisvm & tidlicvm ne sie asvndrad l fvltvmvm & ecelicvm gifeaga insetenvmgilef vs driht fvltvmo compdomes cristin halgvm onginna festinvm þætte ongægn gastlico vnrehtviso gifehtendo bihaldennis ve sie afæstnado fvltemvmgionn driht gileaffvllvm ðinvm þætte fæstinra is ða arwyrðo hehtido & gibyredlicvm arfæst hia onfoe & sorgleasvm oeste hie ðerhiornegiscild driht folc ðin & from allvm synnvm rvmmodlice giclænsig feðon nængo him l gisceðeð uiðerwordnise gif nængo gionvældeð vnrehtvisegod ðv ðe synno ondspyrnas l mið hreovnisse gicvoemes l gicvoemed bist beado folces ðines biddendes rvmmodlice biseh & svyppa ðines vraððo ðio l ða ðe fore synnvm vsvm ve giearnia ymbwoend ðða onginnendo fæsteno ve bidd driht godlicvm mersvnge fefylg þætte bihaldennisse þæt lichomlice ve agefe ðohtvm ve mægi gifylle smyltlic ðsel ve bid drihtvm ðinvm fæstinvm eastorlicvm gibyredlice þæt ve se coreno þætte onfengo symbellice clænsvnge lichomes allvm to væstme givæxe savla ðdo vs ve bid driht hælo vsra intingo & oestvm symle giniwia ðeadomes & oestlice eft bigeonga aldorlice agvnneno ðgihelp vsig god vser þætte agvnneno fæstino worðlice eft nivando oestlicvm ðohtvm gifylga wegibedes ðisses gerlic mersvnge gladiendo ve bidd driht þætte eastorlic woercvm onðiodendo fvllvm his gifremmissvm gigladia ve ðtocym l driht gibeadvm vsvm þætte ðis hehtid fæstin þæt ðohtvm lichomvm æc gemendvm halwoendlice gisetted is oestlic hernise ve gimersiaðas cvoeð driht god heono ic seolf eft soeca scip mino & ic soeco l hia svae giniosað hiorde ede his on dægi ðonne bið in middvm scipa hiora tostrogdenraic giniosige scip mino & ic fria hia of allvm stovm in ðæm tostrogdeno veron on dægi volcenes & mistesic gilese scip mino & ic hia giresta dom cvoeð drihtver gife bið soðfæst & gedoeð dom & soðfæstnisin bibodvm minvm gigæð & domas mino gihaldeð þætte gidoe soðfæstn ðes soðfæst is life gilifeð cvoeð drihtve syngadon vnrehtvisnise ve dydon driht in alle soðfæst ðin se ymbuoended ic biddo wræðo ðin & wælm ðin from ceastre ðin hierusalem & from more halgum ðinumsvnv gif ðv hæfeð wel doe ðec mið & gode wyrðo asægdnisse gibreng gimyndig wæs ðv fðon deað ne lattað & cyðnise hellvarana fðon ædeawad is ðesvnv gicerr to gode & flet synno ðino gibidde wvt ondwliote his & wona þæt ondspyrnisbroð giseað gie ðy les aenig  yfel fe yfle ængvm agelda ah symle þætte god is fylgeð gie bitven & in allvmbroð symle gefeað bvtan bitvihblinnisse gibiddað in allvm ðoncvnco doeð gie ðis is fðon villo godes in criste hælende in allvm ivihbroð wosað gie bitven vel rvmmodo miltheorto gefendo bitvien svæ æc god in criste salde ivhbroð symle vsig ða ðe ve lifigað in deað ve biðon sald fe ðæm hælende þætte æc lif hælendes giypped se in lichoma vsra deadlicvmbroð alle vsig þæt ve sie giyppedo gidæfnað bifan hehseðle cristes þætte gibrenga an eghvoelc syndrigo dedo lichomes svæ dyde oððe god oððe yfelbroð sibb cristes giwynsvmiga in heartvm ivr in ðæm æc gie giceigdo aron in anvm lichome & giðoncolo wosað gie word cristes gibye in ivih monigfaldlicebroð all þæt svæ hvædd gie gidoe in worde in woerce alle in nome driht hælendes doað gie ðoncvnga doendo gode & feder ðerh ðonegod ðv ðe cirica ðin gerlicvm fæstnlic bihaldnisse ðv giclænsas gionn ðivonvm ðinvm l higo ðine þætte þæt from ðe gihalda mið fhæftnise bið gicostad ðisvm godvm woercvm we gifylgagibeodo vsra ve bid driht rvmmodlice giher & ongægn allo vs wiðirwordnis sviðre ðines mægenðrym giræc ðoest folces ðines ve bid driht rvmmod bihald þætte ða ðe ðerh fhæfnise awonad biðon in lichoma ðerh wæstem godes woerces hia sie giriordado in ðohte ððohto vsra ve bid driht lehtvm ðines brehtnises gieondfær l þætte gisea ve mægi ða ðe doendo aron & ða ðe rehto sint gidoa ve mægidedo vsra ve bid driht & ða inbolgeno facym & mið helpe gifylga þætte allo wyrcengo & from ðe symle onginne & ðerh ðec ða onfoendo sie giendadogod ðv ðe bisiist ælc vsig mæhte gisceadest bitvih l bina bvtan æc gihald æc þæt from allvm wiðirweardnissvm ve sie gitrymmed in lichome & fro woewvm giðohtvm ve sie giclænsado in ðohte ðerhgionn ve bidd allm god þætte higo ðin ða ðe hia mið woerdnise l flæsc from giriordvm gihaldað mið fylginge soðfæstnise from synne gifeasta ðerhsel ve bid driht vsvm gifremnisse fæstinvm halwoende þætte clænsvnge lichomes ondfoengo to vsra ymbwoending l ofliora savla ðhiorad ðin ve bid driht mið symlinga arfæstn giheald þætte ða in anra hyht gefes heofonlices inn bið gicosted heofonlicvm wvt giscildnise we sie gitrymmed ðheortvm vsvm we bid driht rvm ondæl þætte svæ from giriordvm lichomlicvm we bihalda vsig sig ðoht æc ðon vsra from woerdnisvm eft we sie afirred from farvmgod ðv ðe in woestigvm londe monigfaldnisse folces ðinvm mæhte giriordest in ðisses æc ðon vorvldes giliorendlices from erninge giriord vs gastlic ðy læs we aspringa agef ðgod ðv ðe & soðfæst mearda ðara earnvnge & synnvm ðerh fæstinvm fgefnise ðv givnna gimilsa giðoncvm l ðinvm þætte agyltinges vsra ondetnisse fgefnisse gitrvmma onfoa synn ðofer mor mistig l ahefað becon gihebbað stefne ahefað hond & inngæ ða gæto aldormenðas cvoeð driht ic am ic am ðe ðe ic gidilga vnrehtwisn ðino fe mec & synna ðinra no eft ic gimyndgain tide gicvoemlicvm ic giherde ðec & on  hæles helpend am ðinesalle we svoelce scipo we gidwaladon an eghvoelc on weg his giwærlde & driht gisette on hine vnrehtwisn allra vsra agefen wæs fðon he seolf walde & ne vntynde mvð hisgihæl mec driht & ic biom hæled hal mec do & hal ic biom fðon herenisse min ðv arðdæl min driht cvoeð savel min feðon ic bido hine god is driht hyhtendum on hine sawle soecende hinein tide gicwoemlicvm ic giherde ðec & on hæles helpend am ðines & ic heald ðec & salde ðec in sibbe folces þætte ðv awoece l awoehtest eorðe & ðv giagnige erfwardniso gispilledo þætte ðv cvoeðe ðæm ða ðe gibvndeno aron faras gie & ðæm ða ðe on ðiostrvm eft vnawriað giebroð crist to stondende hehsceaware l bisc towardra god fvllvnga l & wistfæstlice hvs l no hondgiwoerc þæt is ðisses giscæppes ne æc ðerh blod heffera & calfera ah ðerh agenligc blod inn foerde aene in halga eco lesinge gimoetedbroðro criste cvðlice mið ðy giðrowade in lichome & gie ðæm ilca smeawnge ivih giwoepnigað fðon se ðe ðrowende is in lichome fleten bið floren from synnvmbroð god wvt ælces gefe se ðe gicliopade vsig in eco his wvldre in criste hælende lytel giðrowade ðe ilca ðerhgiendiga & gitrymma & gistaðolfæstniga ðæm wvldvr & onwæld in worlda world soðlicebroð mið ðy ðageane synnfvllo we woeron crist f vsig dead is micle mara eft giðingado halo we biðon in lif ðæsallm ece god ðv ðe menniscvm cynne to gilicanne l eðmodnis bisin hælend vserne lichome onfoa & rod vn gaa dyde gilef rvmmodlice þætte æc giðyldes ðæs ilca habba laro & erestes gilytto we giearniga ðsel ve bid allm god þætte ða ðe in feolo wiðirweardnisvm of vsra vntrymn we aspringað giðingande l ancendes svnv ðines ðrownges we sie friado se ðegihelp vsig god halwoende vser & to welgidoeno eft bigengo l ðæm vsig eft giboeta gimeadomad arð ræc cyme gifeando ðgod ðv ðe fe vs svnv ðin rodes galgatre vndergaa ðy waldest þætte fiondas from vsig afirdest mæht gilef vs ðiwvm ðinvm þætte erestes gefe we gifylga ðgef ðohtvm vsvm alm god þætte ðerh tidlicvm bearnes ðines deað þæt is giryno arwyrðo biðon gitrymmedo lif vs gisalde ece gitriwa we ðbisih driht we bid of ðas higo ðin fe ðæm driht vs hæl crist ne gitvieda hondvm þæt woere sald scyldigra & rod vngaa pinung ðsel milthearta god þætte þæt in ðines bearnes ðrownge middang bieade halwoende vs gitriwalice ve gifoelabroð wvtas gie þæt ne sceondlicvm seolfre l golde gileseno aron gie of idlvm ivere wosa l fadorlices giselenisses ah diorwyrðvm blode svoelce lombes vnawidlades & vnawoemmed cristbro gif gie girioson mið criste ða ðe vpp sindon soecað hver crist is on sviðre godes sittende ða ðe vpp sint hogað gie no ða ðe of eorðe aronbro deado aron gie & lif iwero gideglad is mið criste on gode mið ðy fðon crist ædeawað lif ivero ða l ðon& gie biðon ædeawado mið ðæm in wvldrebro giclænsað gie ða alde dærsto þætte gie sie niwvnge gistrogdnisse & æc fðon eastro vsra agefen is cristleafa crist aene fe synnvm vsvm dead is soðfæst fore vnsoðfæstvm þætte vsig asægde gode gideðed soðlice l lichome giliffæsted wvt gastebr crist giðrowad is fe vs ivh fletende bisin þæt gie folgiga swæðe his se ð synn ne dyde ne gimoeted is facon in mvðe hisbroð in ðis crist dead is & eft aras þætte æc deadra & lifigiendra giricsaðbro giboht aron gie worðe miclvm wvldrigað & bearað gie god in lichome ivervmbro crist eft aras from deadvm frvmcend slependra þætte fðon ðerh monno deað & ðerh monno erist deadra & svae in adam allo biðon deado l deadigað sva æc in criste alle biðon giliffæstedobro god wvt sibbes se ðe oflædde from deadvm hiorde micil scipa on blode gicyðniss æces driht vserne hæl crist gicease ivih in ælcvm gode þætte gie gidoe willa his doende in ivih þæt gicweme bifa him  ð h cleafa ælc þæt acenn is from gode fsuiðeð middang & ðios is þæt sig ðio fsuiðeð middan gileafa vsra hvoelc is wvt se ðe ofsvið middang bvtan ðe ðe gilefes þætte hæl is bearn godesleafa ælc gefe gicoren & ælc geafo wisfæst vfa is ofdvne stigende from feder lehta æd l mið ðæm ne is ofymbwoendnise ne æc hvoerflvnges fascywvng lvstvme gicende vsig worde soðfæst þætte ve sie frvma hvoelchvoegv giscæftes hisbro gifroefrað gie bitvien & gitimbrað on ba halfa in criste hæl driht vsvmbro wosað gie doendo wordes & no herendo þæt an bisvicendo ivih seolfabro se ðe ðerhbisið in ae wisfæst friodomes & ðerhwvnað no lysnere ofgeotul wyrcend ah wyrcend woerces ðes eadig in ded his biðbroð æfæstnis clæne & vnawoemmedo æd gode & fæder ðios is giniosiga steapcildo & widvas in costvnge hiore & vnawoemmed hine gihalde from ðissvm worldegilef ve bid allm god þætte ða ðe erestes drihtenlices symbeltido ve bigaað in niwang  ðines gastes from deaðe sawles eft ve arisa ðgionn we bid allm god þætte ða ðe eristes drihtlices symbeltido we bigeongað ginerenise vser onfoa glædnisse ve giearniga ðgionn we bid allm god þætte ða ðe gefe drihtlices eristes we ongeton ðerh lvfv gast from deaðe sawles we arise ðgilef ve bid driht sym vsig ðerh giryno eostorlico þæt ve giðoncage þætte gibearsciopo vser eftniwawnges wyrcing eco vs sie intinga glædnis ðgod ðv ðe symbelnis eostorlic middangde lecedomas gibrohtes folc ðin we bid heofonlic gefe gifylga þætte æc wisfæst friodom gifylga giearniga & to life giðii eceræc we bid allm god þætte ðiðer aðenne cristes oestes tohigvng ðona ðec mið is vsra vnderstondennisgod ðv ðe missenlice cynno on ondetnisse ðines nome gigeadridest sel þætte eftacennedvm esprynge fwlwihtes anasie lvfv ðohto & arfæst dedana ðgod ðv ðe vs to gimersanne eastorlic halgo giryno gifriolico giðohtas giwðes l lær vsig & giscynia þæt ðv iorsia & lvfiga þæt ðv hates l ðeft adrif driht giwritt synnes ae hondgiwrit þæt in vsig ða eostorlicvm hernis ðerh erest ðines bearnes giidladest se ðegod ðv ðe to ece life in cristes erest vsig eft niwas gifyll arfæstnis ðines vnasæcgendlic clæne giryno þætte mið ðy in mægenðryme his hælend vserne tocymeð ða dydest fwlwihte þætte eft were l sie acennedo gido ðv eadign vnawoemmedlicvm þætte hia sie ðdo allm god þætte ða ðe eastorlicvm lecedomvm giinniwado onlicnisse earðcvndes aldores we wiðeadon to bisine heofonlices of we sie broht scependes ðgod ðv ðe vsig dydest ecelicvm  eostorlico symbeltido gimers do vs we bid in heofne ric gifea ðhigo ðin we bid driht sviðre ðin ecelice ymbselle fvltvme þætte eostorlic fegiðingendvm symbeltid from ælcvm wvoe l wiðirmoednise giscilded geafvm heofonlicvm gifylgagod ðu ðe fe hælo middang hvsvl l eostorlic þætte fegiðingende fa vsig biscop heh l ðe hesta vsig ðerh þæt þæt vser is gilic eft giðingiga ðerh þæt þæt ðe is gilic ontyne se ðe ðec mgod ðv ðe to ece lif in cristes erist vsig eft nivas ahef vsig to ðæm efne sittende on sviðre ðin vser hæles frvmwyrhta þætte se ðe fe vs doemend tocvom fe vs doemend bið tocyme se ðe ðec mið liofaðede ðin hiorde god ve bid driht gicvoemlic bihald & scip ða diorwyrðvm blode ðinvm eft gilesdest diowlica ne flet ðv onernige þætte ve sie tosliteno se ðec mþæt is on firi dagasðas cvoeð driht ymhwarfað woegas hierv & bihaldað & gisceawað & soecað in plægiword l on plæcum l gimoeton gie woer doende dom & soecende lvfv & milsend ic biom hisgefeðoncgvnco gidoe ve driht haelga fæder allm ece god ðv ðe vsig oferdoene l næhtes rvne to morgenlicvm tidvm ðerhlæde gimeodvmad arð ve bid þætte ðv gefe vs ðiosne bvtan synne offara oðþæt to eferne ðe gode geafo eft ve brenga ðarisendo of boetingvm vsvm fvltvme gefe ðinræ morgenlicvm beadvm gihreme ve þætte ascæccenvm diostrvm synna l gionga ve giearniga in leht mægnaðec leht soð & lehtes frvmwyrhte driht ve bid þætte ðv gimeodomia from vs ðiostro afirra woerdendra & gigibrehta vsig lehte mægnainlihta driht ve bid on ðec hearta gilefendra þætte ðinvm symle gifæstnvnge & ðinvm fvltvmme ve sie giscildadgiher vsig miltheart god & ðohtvm vsvm gefe ðinræ leht ædeawagiec in vsig driht we bid lvfv ðin & gastes halges leht in vs symle giberngeafona ðoncvncgo vnasæcgendlicvm arfæstnise ðinvm alm god ðv ðe vsig fdrifenvm vs miste to ðissvm fveard l frvmma gilæddest & mið afirredvm vnwisdomes l dvoles blendnise to bigeongle ðines nome & æc wisdom eft giceidest onvorp l ðohtvm vsvm allm faeder þætte in bibodana l ðinra lehte steppende ðec latva ve fylga & aldormonn ðgifvltvma driht folce ðinvm þætte hælgades oestes ðiiende on wæstvm & ðinvm symle ðinge sie giricsad & to lesinges ecelices ðerhgibyre ðec lædende gihlyttosel folce ðinvm ve bid driht gast soðfæst & sibbes þætte & allvm ðohte ongett & ða ðe ðe aron cvoemlico allvm hearte gifylgasel vs driht ve bid þætte æc middanges erning sibsvm vs ðinvm endebrednisse sie girihtad & cirica ðin smyltlicvm oest sie glædo ðgiher ve bid driht boensendra beado & ondettendra ðe spær synnvm þætte ædgeadre vs fgefnisse giræce ðv rvmmodlice & sib ðgiher driht hream folces ðines ne æc fðor mið ðec mægi ondspyrnisse agyltendra ðon miltheart ðin vnnende l agefeno l gilefeno wopvm boensandragiher driht folc ðin all ðe ðohte vndeðioded þætte lichome & ðohte giscilded þæt arfæstlice gilefeð ðinvm gefe gifylgagod ðv ðe vsig gisiist in sva monigvm gistyrenisvm ne mægi vnderstonda gisvoencendra hream rvmmodlice eft bihald & yflo alle ða ðe ve giearniað ymbwoendgod ðv ðe syngendra savlo nylt ðv loesia ah synno gihald þæt ve giearnia iorra & þæt ve biddas of vsig dæl rvmmodnise þætte of rotnise glædnise l gifea ðinræ miltheartnise þætte ve gifylga ve giearniagibed vsra ve bid allm god velrvmlice giher & ðæm boensendes ðv giwvnne gifremmnise ræc scildnisse fvltvmegisvoenc hiorodes ðines ve bid driht bihald cvoemlic þætte agefeno fgefnisse synna of ðinvm velfremnisvm symle ve sie wvldrad ðerh drihtfrom allvm vsig ve bid driht synnvm mildelice vndo þætte ðerhondfoendvm fgefnise synna alesadvm ðe ðohtvm gihere ve ðehfvltvma driht soecendvm milsendvm ðin & to gefnise ondetendvm spær boensandvm þætte ða ðe vsvm earnvngvm ve se asvngeno ðinvm milsæ ve se hæledovnderðioded ðe folc ve bid driht mildelice ded heofonlic gisomniga & ðinvm symle doe gihere bibodvm ðoe arfæst ðin ve bid driht vnderðiode ðe folces tohigvng & miltheortnise ðin halde þæt ðin ginyhtsgimyndig voæs ðv ue bid driht asvvncgennisse mennisc & ða ðe l ðv ðe rehtlice ðv ðersces synfvllo spær mildelice ðæm asvoenctvm ðarioson svmmo of ðær somnvnge ðio is giclioppad libertin & cyrinenti & alexan & ðara ða ðe veron from cilicia & asia flittende mið & ne maehton viðs de snytro & gaste ða ðe ves spreccenmið ðy væs stefan fvll gaste halgvm in heofne gisæh wvldvr godes & hælend stondende to sviðrvm godes & cvoeð heono ic sivm heofnas vntyndo & svnv monnes stondende to sviðrvm godesgod ðv ðe vsig ancendes ðines rvmmodlice inlichomvng eft gilesdest sel vs fadorlica symlinga halgvara ðæm ginioma ve maegi halwoendes hælges giryne dael ðgeafona ðoncvnca ve doað driht monigfaldvm ymb vsig milsvm l miltheartnisvm ðinvm ðv ðe & bearnes ðines acennisse vsig hæles & eadges ðrovres stefanes gibede ðv vnderwreððes ðbroð gibloedsad god & faeder driht vs hæl crist se ðe gibloedsade vsig in ælcvm gibloedsvnge gastlicvm in heofnvm in criste hæl driht vsvmeadig ver se ðe in snytro his bið wnigende l & se ðe in soðfæstnis bið smeande & in ðohte giðohte l giðenceð ymbsceawvng godesgiriordade hine hlafe lifes & ondgetes & wætre snytres halwoendes gidrenceð hine driht god vsergod se ðe ðerh eadges apostol ðines ioh vordes ðines vs gidegla eft ðv onlece gionn ve bid þætte þæt he vsvm earvm syndirlice l indælde ondgetes biddendes l gigivendes lare onfoe ve l ginimme ðallm ece god ðv ðe ðisses  arwyrðne haligne æc glæd eadges apostol ðines ioh & godspeller symbeltide gisaldes sel ciricae ðinre ve bid & lvfia þætte lvfade & bodia þæt gilærdeðas aron ða ðe gicvomon of costvnge micle & aðvogon gigerela hiora & gihvidadon hia in blode lombes fðon aron bifa hehsedle godes & giherað him  & næht in temple his ic giherde stefen of heofne cvoeðende awritt eadgo deado ða ðe in drihtne biðon deadeða vs driht ve bid gigiviga hia ðohta clænnisse ðara vnscyldignisse to symbellice gimersiga vesel ve bid allm god þætte eadges silvest ondeteres ðines & æc hehbiscopes arwyrðo symbeltido & oest vs giece & hælogilef ve bid allm god þætte to ðæm betra life halga wara ðinra biseno vsig gicliopia ða hvile l oð þæt ðara symbeltido ve doeð wvt dedvm ve bisen ginimevntrymnise vsa eft bihald allm god & forðon byrðen agenlices dedes vsig hefigað eadges fabian ðrovres ðines & æc hehbisco feðingunge wuldrigo vsig giscilde ðgod ðv ðe eadgvm sebastian ðrovre ðin mægne stydfæstnise in ðrovnge gitrymmedest of his vs gilicbisene l sel fe lvfe ðinvm gimoedo l wala middanges gitela & nængo his wiðirweardo onscyniagod ða ðevsig gerlicvm eadges ag ðrovres ðines symbelnis gigladias sel ve bid þætte þæt ilca ve worðiað hernisse wvt arfæst giwosa l ve gifylga bisene ðgod ðv ðe bitvin oðro mæhtes ðines wvndra wvt in giscæp tederlicvm sig ðrovnges gibrohtest gilef rvmlice þætte ðære symbel ve bigaað ðerh ðær to ðe biseno gistepe vegionn ve bid allm god þætte ða ðe halga wara ðinra tibvr & valeria & maxi symbeltido ve bigaað hiora wvt mægno ve gibisnia ðgod ðv ðe vsig eadges georg ðrovres ðines earnvngvm & ðingvnge gigladias gilef rvmlice þætte ða ðe his velfremnis ve givgað giselenise gefes ve gifylgagivnne vve bid alm god þætte ða ðe halga wara ðinra symbeltido ve bigaas from allvm yflvm onbiotendvm ðara l hiora ðingvngvm ve sie afriadgod ðv ðe bisiist þætte vsig eghvona yflo vsra ðerhstyriað gearva ve bid þætte eadges ioh apl ðines ðingvnge wvldrig vsig giscildesel ve bid allm god þætte ða ðe eadges vrban ðroveres ðines & æc hehbisco symbeltido ve bigaað his mið ðec ðingvngvm ve sie aholpen ðgod ðv ðe vsig gerlico eadigra & ðrovra ðinra symbeltid ðv gigladas gearvig ve bid þætte ðara ve gifeað earnvngvm ve gicegað sie bisenvmdo vsig driht ve bid haligra ðinra & symle symbeltido þætte ve gifylga ðara fvltvmmum scildnise ðines geafo ve gifoela ðgod ðv ðe gerlico halga va ðinra & symbeltid ðv gigladas gilef rvmlice þætte ðara ve gifeaiga earnvngvm ve sie giberned bisenvmon dagvm ðæm aworden væs word drihtnes to me cvoeðende aer þæt ðec ic gisceope in hrife ic wiste ðec & ær þæt gieadest of vombe ic gihalgade & witge in cynnvm ic gisalde ðe& cvoeð driht to me nælle ðv gicvæða þætte cnæht am fðon to allvm svæ hvidder ic sende ðec ðv gæst & allo ða ðe ic bibeade ðe ðv gispreces ne ondred ðv from onsione hiora fðon ðec mið am þætte ic genere ðec cvoeð drihtcyningas giseað & arisað aldormenn & giworðigað fe driht gode ðinne & halig irl se ðe giceas ðecgearvig ve bid allm god þætte higo ðin ðerh woeg hæles ingae & eadges ioh feiornere gitrymniso fylgincgo to hine ðone fe cvoeð sorgleas ðerhcymegilef ve bid allm god þætte ða ðe eadges ioh bæchere symbel ve bigað his mið ðec ðingvnge ve sie gitrymedallm & milthearta god ðv ðe ðone eadge ioh bæcere ðinre fesceavnge gisvndradest þætte visfæst folc criste driht fegearvade sel ve bid þætte higo ðin ðisses ðingvnge merseres l & from synnvm allvm sie bireafad & to ðæm ðone givitgade gicyme ve giearniave bid allm god þætte vsig tvifallico glædniso ecelic dæg symbeln he onfoe ða ðe of eadigra & wvldrvng soðcvom ða þæt ilca lvfv & ðrovng soðlice dyde þætte vere rehtgibroðroin dægvm ðaem salde hond ðæm vife ahof hia & mið ðy gicliopade ða halga war & ða widvo togimercade hia lifiende cvð wvt aworden væs ðerh allne iop & gilefdon monigo in drihtnefæstlice haldende væs in carc gibed wvt væs bvtan bitvin fletnise from cirica to gode fe hineengel driht ætgistod & leht eft scean in wvnvnise carce & mið ðy gislog side l petres awoehte hine cvoeðende aris hræðlice & gifeallon ða racentego of hondvm hisgod ðv ðe cirica ðin apl ðines lvfe & nome gihælgadest ðv ðe æc ðone eadge ðæm pavl to bodian hæðnvm wvldvr ðin gigeadriga gimeodvmad arð gilef þætte alle ða ðe to ap ðinra symbeltido gicvomon gastlicvm eftgeafvnge hie awlencedo sie l giwoelgadogearwig ve bid allm god þætte nængvm vsig ðv giletas styrenissvm þætte ve sie asceæccen ða in ap giondetnisses pet gitrymedestgod ðv ðe apost ðinvm pet gilædedvm cægvm rices heofnes gibvndennises & æc vndoenise biscophad gisaldest gilef þætte ðingvnge his fvltvme from synna vsra gicnyccvm ve biðobroð cvð ivh ic dom godspell þæt ic bodade ivh þæt & gie onfengon in ðon æc gie stondas ðerh þæt æc gie biðon gihæledogilef ve bid driht ap ðino giðingage fe vs fðon ðon vsig þætte ve sie gehæledo mægi ve gitrivað gif hiora beodvm ðin sie gistiored cirica ðæm ðec gisettende aldormap vsig driht ve bid eadigra & toginim fvltvmmvm þætte svæ feolo tederlico we sindon svæ suiðe strongrvm helpvm ve sie aholpengiscild driht folc ðinne & ap ðinra fadorlico ðing gitrivnde ecelicvm giscildnise gihaldallm ece god ðv ðe vsig eadigra ap & monigfallic doest mersvnge gifeaia sel ve bid ðara oftor giboetado l symbel vser sie giscildnisses ofeceðingvnge vsig driht ve bid eadges benedictes abbvdes gifæstnia þætte vsvm earnvngvm ve ne magon fadorlico ðingo ve gifylgavoes ðv driht folce ðinvm hælgare & haldend þætte apl ðines iacob gifæstnado mið fvltvmvm & ymbvoending gicvoeme & sorgleas giheregilef bliðelice þætte allo ða ðe ðrovnges his earnvngo ve worðia ðingvngvm his from ecelicvm tintges byrnvm ve sie alesadsel vs ve bid allm god synna vsra lego gidrysne ðv ðe eadgvm lavr gisaldest pinvnga hiora inbyrno ofsviðesel vs allm god þætte eadges ðroveres ðines arwyrðe symbeltid & oest vs giece & hælogod ðv ðe vsig eadges ondeteres ðines gerlic symbeltid ðv gigladas gilef mildelice þætte ðaes symbelcennise ve bigaað ðerh his to ðe bisinvm ve gistepasvæ cynnam & þæt recilc svotstencende stenc ic gisalde svæ recilc gicoren ic gisalde svotnise l stencesgod ðv ðe hehstallic hall eadges marie in ðon ðv giwvnedest gicease gimeodvmad arð sel ve bid þætte his vsig giscildnise gitrymmedo wynsvmo gidoe sinvm bitvien vosa symbel se ðe liofaðmicil ist driht æt rvmmodnise ðinvm godes svnvcennic gibed þæt fðon of ondveardvm vorvlde ðv oflædest þætte fe synnvm vsvm mið ðe ballice giðingagevndercyme driht folce ðinvm godes bearncen gibed þæt & ðæh fe giwyrd lichomes foerde ve ongeton in heofunlicvm wvldre mið ðec fe vs gibidde ve gifoelagearvig ve bid alm god þætte eadges mari symle hehstald gilomlica symbeltido & ondveard lifes vs gibrenga lecedomas & meardo fgefe ecogiboetadvm symbel eadges lav symbelcen ve worðiga ða ðe in heofnvm eadignise giscina we wvton ecohalges ioh bæcer & ðrovres ðroes driht ve bid arwyrðe symbel halwoendes fvltvmes vs giwnne fremnisemægenðrymme ðin driht boensando ve biddas þætte svæ vsig symlinga halga vara ðinra gimynd glada ðv svæ symle boene scild ðvan is cvlfra mino visfæsto mino an is moeder his gicoren gicennice his gisegon hia dohtoro & eadge hia bodadon cvoeno & cefissa giheredon hiahvoelc is ðios ðio gifæres soelce arlic morgen arisende feger sva mona gicoren svæ svnna ondeslic soelce gifeht giendebredadboene ðeana ðinra god milsend giher þætte ða ðe acennise godes acennic & hehstald ve gisomniað his ðingvngvm gicvoemlic from ðec of instondvm froecelnisvm ve sie gineredallm ece god ðegnas ðino sviðra ðines mæhtes from allvm giscild froecelnissvm & eadga maria symle hehstalde giðingende do hia ondveardlic gifeaiga vale l & toveardoeadges marie symle hehstald driht ve bid giðii vs eghvoer gibed þætte þæt oestig folc ðin arwyrðed hernisse þæt ve sie aholpeno hir arfæstvm symlinga sie aypped fvltvmmeic gifeall fa fotvm engles þætte ic vorðade hine & cvoeð me gisih þætte ðv ne doe efne esne ðin am & broðra ðinra hæbbendra gicyðnisse hæl god worðigaheono hvs godes mið monnvm & gibyað mið ðæm & bið hiora god & ða folc his biðon & he driht mið ðæm bið hiora godgod ðv ðe wvndurlicvm endebred engla hernisso monna æc giraedes gilef mildelice þætte ðæm ðe embehtendvm on heofne symle gistondes from ðæm on earðe vsa lif ve sie gitrymmedwoes ðv folce ðinvm milthearta god & þætte gefe ðinre velfremniso mæhtigo ðerhfoe eadges hehengles do boensvm gibeadvm þætte ve sie vnderlihtadogiher driht ve bid beodo vsa & giðingende eadgvm marc ondetere ðinvm & æc hehbiscop boeno vsra gicvoemlic bihaldgilef ve bid allm god þætte svæ apla ðinra & wvldrig symbelcenn ve fecvome svæ to ðinvm voelfremnis giearnado mægenðrymmo ðin fe vs ða fecymoeadges ðroveres ðines driht vsig ve bid earnvngo gifylga & ðin vs fgefnise symle gihrema hiasel ve bid driht gileaffvllvm folcvm alra halga vara symle worðvnge þætte ue gladia & hiora ecelicvm giboene þætte ve sie gitrymmedoallm ece god ðv ðe vsig allra halga wara ðinra monigfaldvm doest mersvnge gifeaia gilef ve bid þætte svæ hiora gymende tidlicvm ve giðoncia hernisse svæ ecvm ve gifeaia sceavngevoes ðv god folce ðinvm gicvoemlic & rvmmod þætte hiora giboene ða ðe ðinræ gicvoemdon arfæst ðec gefende to life ðerhcyme ecedo vsig driht god hæl mari symle hehstald fvltvmmvm þætte ve sie nvmeno & wvldrig eadigra apla ðrov ondet& æc hehstalda alle æc gilic halga va scildnis þætte ve sie scildad þætte ve hiora ætgeadre dæghvoemlice symbel ve mersia hiora ætgeadre dæghvæmlice from allvm viðirmoednisvm ve sie ascildad fvltvmewoes ðv driht boenvm vsvm & giðingvnge allra halga vara ðinra ece vs miltheart rvmlice agefgod ðv ðe vsig eadges ðroveres ðines ondetnise wvldrigvm ðv ymbseles & scildes gionn vs his gilicbisnvng giðia & gibede þæt ue sie vnderwreðedgilef vs ve bid allm god toveard eadges ondeter ðines & æc hehbiscob symbeltid gibyredlic gicyme worðvnge & cymmende wyrðo gimersia oestgod ðv ðe folce ðinvm eces hæles eadig ðegin ðv gileortest gionn ve bid þætte ðone larv lifes ve hæfdon on eorðvm ðingere symle habba ve giearnia in heofnvmgiher driht folc ðin allvm ðe ðohte vnderðioded & eadges marti hehbisco boene gihald þætte lichome & hearte giscildado þæt arfæstlice gilefde gigivia & þæt soðlice hyhtað gihaldaallm ece god symbeltid dæges ðisses mildelice gisceavia & cirica ðin ðingvnge eadges mar hehbisco & æc ondeter ðines gilomlicvm do gimersvngvm gifeaia allra ec on ðec gilefeð hine oesto ðerhenda ðvgod ðæm eadga cecil svæ hygdignis l clæn oeste gicvoemde þætte gibedde sinvm & broðer his ðe gidyde þætte vere gihalgad fðon & engle brengende lixendra stengcbrengendra blostmana sigbego pælm & æc ðrovvnges onfengon ve biddað þætte giðingende fe vs uoelfremnisse ðines ðinges onfoa ve giearniagod ðv ðe vsig gerlic eadges cle ðrovres ðines & æc hehbisco symbel gladias gilef mildelice þætte ðæs symbelcenn ve bigað mægen æc to ðon ðrovvnges ve bisin ginimeon lvfv & bilvitnisse ðæs halig dyde hine & giceas hine of aelcvm flæsce salde him bodo & ae lifes & ðeadscipes & heh gidyde hinegisette him cyðnisse ece ymbgyrde hine gyrdilse soðfæstnises & gigeride hine driht sigbeg vvldresbroð hearte fðon bið gilefed to soðfæstnis mvðe wvt ondetnise bið to hælo cvoeð fðon ðio vrit eghvoelc se ðe gelefeð on hine ne bið sceomiendesel vs ve bid driht god vsa ead ðines and ðingvnga þæt ve sie vnderhefen þætte ðerh ða cirica ði heistes ðincges niva lar gisaldest ðerh hia fvltvmo eces hæles agefgiher driht folc ðin mið halges ðines fadorlico ðing boensande þætte ðinvm symle fvltvme sorgleas ðe mægi oeste giheresel vs ve bid driht eadges ðines tho symbeltidvm þæt ve wvldrige þætte his symle æc fadorlicvm ðingvm ve sie vnderhefenðone soðfæsta gilædde driht ðerh woegas rehto & ædeavade him ric godes & salde him wisdom halga waragiheald hine from fiondvm & from esvicvm l giscilde hine & gifeht strong salde him þætte fcvome þætte viste fðon allra maehtigvst is snytrobloetsvnges ðines gefe driht giðingende eadgvm onfoe ve þætte ðæs mið fecyme gefe gimersiga ve boene fvltvme gifoele veeadges ðines we bid driht boen cvoemlic & gefnise vs giræc & lecedomas eco gilefead ðines driht beadvm ve sie holpeno þætte þæt ve mægi l mæhto vsa his vs giðingvnge sie saldbroð anvm eghvoelc vsra sald is gefe æft gimett giselenisse cristes fe þæt cvoeð astigende on heanisse feng gilædde gifeng saldebroð god salde svmo soðlice ap svmo wvt witgo oðro hvoeðre godspelleras oðro wvt hiordo & larvas to giendanne l halga vara in woerc hernisses in gitimbernisse lichomes cristgod ðv ðe ðerh eadgo ap ðino to ondgettnise ðines nom cyme gisaldest sel vs hiora wvldvr ece& mið ðynge gimersia & mersvnge giðiagiher driht beodo vsa & halig ap ðinra symtido symbellice gimersia gilomlicvm ve sie aholpen fvltvmvmsel ve bid driht gileaffvllvm folcvm haligra ap symle worðvnge ve gigladia & hiora ece boene ve sie trymmedogiriordade hine hlafe lifes & ondgettes & wætres snyttres halvoendes gidrencde hine & gitrymmed bið in ðæm & ne bið gifalden & bið gihalden l hine & ne bið giscended & ahefeð hine mið ðæm ginestvm sinvm in nome ðæs heste gierfevardeð hine driht god vsernesoðfæsta hearta his giselið to vacene arlice l to gode se ðe dyde l hine & in onsione ðæs heista boensande bið vntyneð mvð his in gibede & fe synnvm his gibiddaðgif driht vælle gaste ondgetes eft gifylleð hine & he svoelce smolt regn l gisendeð giriodo snytr his giondetað drihtgod ðv ðe hælgo vs ðisses symbel fe gimynd eadges ðrov ðin l ðrovnge dydest uoes hiorodes ðines beodvm & sel þætte ðæs to  symb gimersia his earnvngvm & ðingvngvm ve sie aholpenhal ðrov ðin driht vsig gibed halig gifoega se ðe halgvm mægnvm arwyrðe eft giscinegiscineð soðfæsto & svoelce gloedo in dryge sprott hreðe giiornað gidoemað cynno & gionvældas folcvm & giricsað driht hio in ecnisgionn ve bid allm god þætte svæ eadigra ðrovra symbel ve fecvom svæ earo miltheart ðines fe vs symle ða fecymogimicla ðv driht eadigra ðrovra ðinra ðara symb eft ve nivaia l ða gearvvm heartvm giornende & ve onfoe & gi rycge ve l meardvmto scildnise gileaffvllra driht ve bid sviðre ðines mægenðry giræc & þætte ece arfæst scildnise hia sie gitrymedo ðingvnge fe ðæm ne sie wona ðrovra gilomlica haligheono sacerd micil se ðe in dagvm his gicvoemde gode & gimoeted uæs soðfæst & in tide wræððes avorden væs eftðingvng næs gimoeted gilic him se ðe gihealde ae ðæs heistawoes ðv driht beadvm vsvm ða in halges ondeteres ðines gimynde ve tosceadon þætte ða ðe vsræ soðfæst baeldo ne abba ve his se ðe ðe gicvoemde beadvm ve sie holpenhalges ondeteres ðines vsig ve bid driht scild fvltvmvm þætte his symle ðingvngvm ve sie aholpenallm ece god ðæm alle giherað giscæfto giðingende fe vs eadvm ondetere ðinvm giher mildelice gibed vsa & giræc vs miltheart ðin & svæ hvæd ðv gihates þætte ve gidoe he gihelp þætte gifylle ve mægibroð ðvslic gibyrede þætte vere hehbisc halig vnscyldig vnwidlad asceaden from synnfvllvm herra heofnv aworden se ðe næfde dægihvoelc nedðarf hvv sacerdas ærist fe hiora synnvm geafo cvico gibrenga sið ða fe folces ðis forðon dyde aene hine mið gefe l driht vser hælend cristbroð ve habbað hehbisc micil se ðe begætt heofnas hæl svnv godes halda ve ondetnissebroð ne habba ve hehbisc se ðe ne mægi giðrovia vntrymnissvm vsvm gicosted wvt ðerh allo fe gilicnis lichomes bvtan synnehaligra ondetera vsig driht ve bid gihelpe diorwyrðe ondetnise & arfæstlic symlinga ðingvng giscildebloetsvnges ðines gefe driht folc cristinlic onfoe þætte haligra earnvnga diorwyrðo mersande vorðvnges ðines væstm eft gibrenga arfæstnissvm symbeltid biscophadsoðfæsto in ecnisse liofað & mið driht is meard hiora & smeavng ðara mið ðone hesteofoeð halga varas ric vlittes & mind l mgwlit of honde driht fðon sviðra his giscilde hia & earme halgum his giscilde hiabroð ve wvton þætte ðæm lvfendvm god alle efne giwyrcað on god ðæm ða ðe æft girædenne giceigdo aron halga vaallm ece god ðv ðe in haliga ðinra heartvm leg ðinre lvfv gibernes sel ðohtvm vsvm þæt ilca lvfv & godes lvfv mægn þætte ðara gifeaia ve sigfæstnissvm giðii ve bisinvmgionn driht ve bid þætte svæ haligra ðinra vsig symbelcen gimersando ne fletas svæ symlinga fvltvmvm gifoerscipeðgod ðv ðe ancen ðin driht vs hæl crist diorwyr blode mennisc cynn eft alesa gimeodvm arð gilef mildeldelice þætte ða ðe to worðanne liffæste l rod tocymað from synnvm hiora gicnycgvm sie hia alesedogod ðv ðe ancend bearn ðines diorwyrðvm blode cvices l rodes tacon gihalgiga valdest gilef ve bid ða ða ðe ðære ilca hælga rodes gifeað worðvnge ðinvm aec ðon eghvoer giscildnise gifeaiagod ðv ðe ðerh rode & blode blodes ðines driht vs gisaldest sibb monnm & hoeofonl engla sel vs & ðines sibbes ginyhtsvm þætte ve sie afylled & to engelices gifoerscipes annis þætte ve gladia ðallm ece god eft besigh mildelice of ðiosne esne ðin ðone to niva scæres gefe giceiga gimeodvmad arð sel him fgefnise allra synna & æc heofonlic geafona gihlytto wossa bodanagionn ve bid allm god þætte esne ðin ðæs to  givæld heafdes his fe godcvnde lvfv ve bid l voe ofscyvfon þætte on ðinvm lvfv wvnia & hine bvtan vomme on ecnisse gihald ðvallm ece god eft besih mildelice of ðiosne ðea ðin ðone to niva sceares gefe giceia gimeodvmad arð sel him eftfgefnise allra synna & æc heof geafona gihlytto vossa l þætte se bodanagod ðv ðe tocyme bearnes ðines driht vs alle ðinvm giclænsadest gileaffvllvm voes ðv mildelice giceigingcvm vsvm & ðas fetelsco l ða ðin fgefnisse arfæstnis æft firsto l tidana from frymðe earðe ginvmen menniscvm giwvnvnissvm eft saldest gefe ðin ginyht giclænsascildend gileaffvlra god vnderðiodende ðe synna byend ve bid þætte ðv giclænsia smyltlicvm ðin arfæst ðas fato svæ giinlihte ðv gimeodomest þætte gistige of ða gefe ðinræ bloedsvng monigfald & mið halvoende bruccendvm ða he ðerh gefe ðin hia giearnia fato gifremme clænsiagod ðv ðe ðassvm tree æppilberende ðinvm hæse & fesceavnge væxende vosa l þætte ðv waldest nv wvt þæt ilca gibloetsia & gihalgia ðv gimeodvm ve bidd þætte se ðe svæ hvoelc of ðær onfoeð hæghalo vosa mægongibloedsa driht ðisne væstim nive æpilra þætte ða ða ðe gibrvcað of ðæm sie gihælgadogibloedsa driht giscæft ðios hlaf nives svæ gibloedsadest fifo lafo on voestne þætte driht ðæs ilca ginyhtsvm on gere giriord birgende ða ðe of ðæm hia onfoe svæ lichomes suæ ðohtes l savles hæloðas cvðlice asægdnise ðioen ðinræ ðe brengeð fe acennise hire in ðæm hia ðe gifoerscip l gifoegnise halgvm wriilcse giscilde gimeodvmad arð ve bid driht mildelice gihalga þætte ðe drihtne & brydegvme hire cymende mið ðæccille his vnadrysnend l cvoemlica giiorne gearnia dagas æc vsra giher vsig allm& milthearta god þætte hvæd vsvm gihersvmaiað hernise ðinvm bloedsvnge mildelice sie gifylled sie sceomfvll hefig l hygdignisse arwyrðe larvm heofonlicvm gilæred sie berende on teame sie costedo & vnscyldig& to eadigra & æc to heofna rico ðerhcyme & gisii bearnas bearna hire oð þæt on ðirðan & feorða cneorise & to gicorenvm ðerhcyme ældo sib driht sie symle ivih mið gibloedsa driht leger ðis & alle byendo in ðæm þætte sie on ðæm halignis& clænnis & bilwitnis & fullnis driht god allm in ðassvm tide arlica æftra ðerh næhtlica misto ðerhcyme dydest gihald vsig to ðerh alle tido rvmo & ðerh vvtedo sgytila tides & fe ðinræ miltheartnise symle do vsig ðerhwvniga vnascendado hal do folc ðin driht& gebloedsa erfevardnise ðinræ & gericsa ða ilco & ahef hia við in ecnisse gif bigeonga ðec ðv wæll on godcvndvm herenis gesingonginneð forwueard l heafudwueard ðara reda æfter matheuscneuresuu l cynnresuu & feortig tuu from l to crist endebrednise gesaegd iscennisse hælendes cristes of brydguma hire of engel ædeauade foregecueden isgecenned tungulcræftiga stearra him hlatuu gesægde gebreingendum oððe geafendum mið ðingum togebedonðe angel foregelærde oððe foregetahte mið crist gefleh in egipt & ofslog ða cildesof forebod oððe of forelar bæðcere þæt stefn cliopende oððe ceigende sie hrewonise wyrcas gieof fulwiht cristes from iohanne & tacon trinise fadres buta tua his in stefn & tuufallice gast in culfreof feortig daga faestern & diul ðrifald costung oferswidedeftforleort ða burg forebodas eorðu zabulones & æfter oððe æt witgiung ðæs witges hreunisse gedo oððe gewyrce hatesceigeð fisceras ða sona gefylgdon hineðerh alle forebodas alle mið hælo untrumigein mor ðeignas gelaeras seofo eadignisse & ðy aehteða oehtnisses gelaereððeignas salt eorðu & middengeardes leht geheht oððe genemde foregeheht in lixung wundra oððe werca faeder to wuldranneforegefylnisse aes gecwome he cwoðend gelaeres soðfeastnisse ofersuiðed & monslaga l morðurslaga ae gee ðing to brenganne oððe to geafanne broðres gehates eftforegefnissegeðafsumnisse on weg ðæm wiðerworde ne synngige gelaerde hates synne l lichoma buta under noma ego l ðy suiðra ðæs ondspyrnise gecearfaðæt sie ðe ðe gebed l wif buta lustgeornnisse l ðing forleites forebeadas ec sod næfræ gesueriga laeres ne ðæm sloegende ne ðæm reafende ne ðæm ðreaddende ne ðæm l suiga wiðstondato lufanne ðone nesto mið ae getrymmas gee ða fiondas geheht to lufianneða allmissa laeras deiglige to doanne ðy winstra ne witta þæt is giornisse lofes oððe herenis menniscesgebedes ongelicnes in seofum willniungum gesalde cueð synna buta forgefendum nere forgefenlaeres buta unrotnise to fæstanne ne to strionanne on eorðoðæccille lichomas ðy ego geheht ne tuoem hlaferdum mæg gehera ne bisignisse mettes & woedes hæbende ah ric godes allum fore læras ne rehtlic is bisig sie in morgenof gemet domæs cwæð lytles strees oððe micles beames to oððe mið efennisse gewordeno lærað ærist ða aganlico oððe ða syndrio & æfter ðon broðres schyldo forgeafannehalig hundum & bergum ne is sellennde ah ðæm biddenda ðæm socenda ðæm cnyllenda & foregemercade l getachteðerh brad woeg monige ðerh neruu oððe unrum hwon oððe unmonige inngae getrymes & leaseras oððe legeras to bihaldanne sie oððe sint witgo mið noma ec ðon on wæstma godra & yfelra trewna laeres forðon ne yfel willo goda ne god werc mæge gewyrca willo yfelane ða ceigendo noma drihtnes ne ða mæhto in his noma wyrcenda ah ða fyllennda willo godes inngae cweð oððe sæges in ric heofna to geafanne mið efennisse getimbres hus ofer carr oððe ofer sondðone licðrower mið braeda hond & ec foresoðscip wordes ic willo geclaensadeðæs centures þæt is hundraðes monna hlafard cnæht gehælde ða iudeas of ric in ðon cynna geheht tocymmende sægeð fordrifenaswear petres drihtenlica hond ða gehran hæleð he geembihtæs & monigo monigfalde untrummige gehæled biðoncwoeðende ic fylgo ðe naebbende he cuoeð hwoer heafud gehlutes oððe gebege & gefraignenda ðeign from faederlica forbead byrgenin scip slepende from frohtendum gewaehten wæs smyltnisso mið word eftgeboedtein eorðe ðara lioda halum monnum diobles fara ðerhgelefde oððe sende in bergumin burug oððe in port his eorðcryppel hæleð ærest forgefenise synnaceigas & of ðara bærsynnigra bearscip cweð yfle hæbbendum woerc sie lece ongelic & ec wines oððe byttana gesettegeeade & eftwæccende dohter ðæs aldormonnes þæt wif of herning blodes hæleð geweht & þæt maedenoferfor oððe oferfærende twoe blindæ inlihtas & ðæm dumbe tunga fordrifen oððe gescyfen diubolalle unhælo gelecnade ða wyrcendo foremonig sint ðeignas mið mæhtum oððe wundrum & lar getrymmeð oððe gefæstnigeðswilce scip bitwih oððe himong uulfum sende þæt hea ne ondreda him oððe ða uulfas ða ðe lichoma ofslaeð rumlice foretacnas oððesuord hine ne frið on earðo gesenda cwoeð ne lufa gie ðone fæder oððe moder ofer hine geheht eftondfoende ec ðon soðfæstes mearda soðfaestes ondfoe aedeawassende to ðæm hælend ða ðe sende erendraca moniga of him ðreatum sægde oððe saegesburgas oððe portas ða hrewunisse gee oððe wutotlice wordnum mið hine maehtum ne dydonondetnise lofes hælendes gesægd is tom feder & ðreatuncg & hefignise ðæra byrðenra & wyrcendra to resteðæra ðegna sunnedæg ehera niomendra eftforfundeno mið bisseno dauiðes & mið ymbcyrf eftbicueð oððe wiðstodin somnung hond drui hæles & lar oððe ðæhtung wið hine doendum oððe wyrcendum monige lecneð oððe hæles & witgiung of him gefylled oððe geendad gemyndgad biðblind & dumb haeles from dioble freweð & in diobla aldur hia cwoedon þæt gewyrce mið ondsuare his toslat cueð ebalsung in halig gast ne forletta ðone treu ec ðon of wæstim mæg eaða ongeota & rehtnisse of word idlum in dæge domes forgeldabecon biddendum iones becon sella bodade oððe sægde ðaem burgwarum & ðy cwoen suðerne gemyndgade & of gast unclaene seofofallice on menn eftgewende wiðstodeðy moder & broðre ðeignas cwoeð oððe alle ðe ðe fadres his wyrcas willosett ofer sae bisin cueð wæstm oððe ðrittiges sexteiges & hundrades ðone sundor gesægde oððe getrahtade ðeignumbisin of winnuncum gesette ecgeecte of corn senapes & huuete æfter ðon sægde winnunga oððe sifðena bisen ðegnum betuih husstriones bisen oððe meregrotta bigetna efennise foresetna gelic ðon bisin of segna fiscum hine gehriordum ofgesægdewundradun oððe wundrandum hine ðone witga cueð worðung in his fadoroeðel næbfdefrom geslaegen heafod gesald gesægd is in discof fif hlafum & of twæm fiscum fif weara ðusend weron gefylde oððe gehriordadgeongende oððe geeade ofer sae ðone peter ðruncnende ahefes & in ðær ðeade monige wgloana miððy gehran gehaeled weronsoecendum of unðweanum ðara ðeigna hondum ða ilca cwoeð ðone monno ða of heorta gaes unclaensiaðy channanesca dohter from dioble geheras from modres lufu oððe leafa gehældemonige in stow unbyid oððe woestig weron gehaeled feuor wera ðusend seofo sint hlafum weron gefylledec oððe eft biddendum sealla of heofnum becen iones rehtra were sella foresægdeðaerstes mið noma is to behaldenna geheht from largefraigende drihtne hwelcne hine cuedon menn were ondetnisse petres heofna from him mið cægum gemonigfalded wæsgeðrouende hine foresægde ðe wiðercwedna petrus & alle willo to fylgenna hine læreð onsaca hine seolfnecweð sume oðera ne gesego deað wið oððe ða huile geseas hine cymende in ric sona gesægd is ofergemercad wes in morðone cnæht bræcceic hæled & ðeignum of his unmaeht soecendum cweð cynn ðæt mið gebed & mið fæstern to fordrifennenedgaefel ðæm caseri wecg oððe woeg in muðe fisces begeten oððe gefunden gesealla geheht & hine heeist oððe maast sie geworden ðe ðe hine suelc lytel cild geeðmodade laerde cueð ne lyttel ondspyrnisse & ec liomana mið noma scylda oððe megas gememelease heht forhycganneof scip dwoelende & mið gemnisse broðres ec sægde & ðæm ðencendum oððe ðafendum cueð gebeden were gesald & ðæm ðe synges hundseofuntig seofo siða heht forgeafa ec tosægde bisina ðeas oððe ðræles scyldiga ðe onsæcca ðæm gefero oððe ðæm efneðea milsia oððe forgefnisemið rehtnise of boec forletnise ðæm cunnendum oððe costendum foregulde ðrea were cynna gelærde huastanaforegeheht brengende him bloedsende lytla ne wiðsacaðy æfterra drihtnes ondsuere of lifes efneunrotnise ðæm telendum fore him lytla huilæ monigfallice oððe hunteantig siða & lif geheht ecebisen of ðæm wyrcendum in wingeard tid ungelic oððe unefne efnegebrohtun to brenganne an & gelic cueð hea onfeingon meardeforesægde hine ðrouende ðær moder sunana sebedæis biddende sæccendum sedlum cueð forsuiðed were ærest suæ mæhte rehtra were ðea oððe esneeec oðræ tuoe blindas geseton æt stret oððe oeg weron geinlihted gefylgdon hineæfter gewritt witgiunges set ofer assales fola & inneade tempul gewurpp ða bibyccenda uer hæles blindas & halte clioppendum lytlum la hæl usic sunu dauiðesdrug gewarð þæt ficbeam mið word wundrendum cueð alle ða biddes ða gelefes ondfoagefrasende weron in huelc mæht wundra geendade oððe dyde of fuluiht gefrasas ec gefylles bisin fadores in wingeard suna ðæs gesendnes efnegefestnade in godes ric mesapreastas from portcuenum to foregeongannebisin oððe bispell of uinwirccendum gesette ða ðe latuas sende to him ðeas gee sunu ofslogunbisin of ðæm telendum to farmum oððe to gereordum weron gelaðat oððe gehatengecunnedon of ðæm gaefel l gyld cæseres to seallanne ofer inwurittena l licnessa mið frasung gefældeof wife l hlafe seofa broðra gecunnadun eristes ungelefenra forcyðdeof micle aes bobode gecunned geonduearde lufæ godes & ðæs neista forðmest weregefraignende drihtne hues sune were crist miððy
