geonduearde ða dauið geherde hundraðes ðæs nioða salmes of forueard gesuigdonne ða wyrcas ah ða cueðas geheht to doenne monigfullice l oððe forcyðas of of aðe of camele ðæm deare & of flege caelcas & byrgennum & ða ilco geefnade uthuitumec forcyðas oððe geðreatas þæt hia getimbredon byrgenna ðara witgena & to hierusalem cweð ðu stænas ða ða ðe to ðe gesended aronðeignum fregnendum becon tocyme & endes woruldes moniga to biðencanne oððe to bihaldenne gehehtto wæccenne foresægde ðæm ðe nyston oððe neuton tid tocyme his geecte bisin of teum hehstandumbisin cueð monnes ðrim ðeignum cræfta ungelic oððe unefne bodendesof allum cynnum in dom togesettes he forecueð scipa on suiðra ticceno on wynstraforesægeð eastro æfter tuæm dogrum & hine sellende & geteled is ðæhtung ðæra iudea & of smirinise of ðon þæt wif wonnendæ ðerhgedælde oððe þæt iudas ðrittig seolferne hine gelicade were bibohttal ðrounges & ec were gesægd to stow ðer sægde oððe cueðes gefeastnadon þæt byrgenn gemearcadon ðone stan mið haldendum oððe gemendumeristes gelic ðon endebrednise from efernes sabates wið to stow ðer cueð & gemersad is word ðis mið wið ðæm longe dægeællef ðegna in mor worðendum fulwihtes tacon salde & his him wið ende woruldes ondueardnisse geheht oððe gehatesgesaegd aron heafudwearda oððe foruearda ðara redaærist accennise drihtnesto meassa eoungðæra cildaæfter ðæra æfterra sunnedæg wodnesdæg of tocymeonginneð forecuido ðara redacyðnise engel þæt is erenwreca bið genemned & forebod his & fulwiht asaegd iscrist bodade gefulwad bið ðer ðæs ðrinise ædeawad biðof ceigeng petres ðara fiscerain somnunga of menn gaast unclæne frohtende & ondetenda fordraf his from monnum mið mæht hered biðfrom swoer petres of feber mið word & mið ded fordraf behrto alle in untrymnisse gegemdereof oððe licðrower mið word miððy cuoeð ic willo geclænsad bið & mið leicnung ðæn eorðcryple mið eftforgefnise gesald is synnaseðe & of geceigd wæs & fore bærsynnigra gebear oððe fordrifnise fihles ðæs alde & wines oððe bytta mið ceping gesægd biðfore ðara ehera in sunnadæg mið numenne ðæm telendum geðreatnum gefylged æfter ðon honda dryge mið eftboeteng oððe eftboeteðæntung wið hine hia doað geherdo ðer scipp gehrinon him ungelicum oððe monigfaldum untrymnissum unhale gehæled biðontuoel ðegnas to bodanne mið word mið gebrohtum mæhtum sendeð on beelzebub hine mæge cueðende onsoc werere cuoeð in gaast halig ebolsong & ða moder & broðer hia ceigað se ðe ðæs fædores doeð willolærde foresette bispell ðæs sawendes & his ða ilca syndrige gesætte breht ædeawnise ðegnumleht under mitto oððe fæt ne is to settenna oððe slepende menn his gewæxe & of corn senepis cueðþæt unsmyltnise mið word adrysnede & diowles fordraf gegeonga oððe to geonganne lefde in bergumfoerende ða deada gewæcca dohter iares ðæt wif from blodiorne oððe blodes gytt hælde wæccað sona & þæt maedenwundradon hia oððe hia wundrande þæt lar & mæhto ðæs wrihtes sunu vel smiðes sunu cuoeðað herdon from him ne were witge buta worðung nymðe in oeðel hissende twoelfe boderes mið bodum læreð gebroht gefea haelo oððe halrahaldend ðone iohannem dæge his accennis ofslog & heafud his plæges meard in disc ðær doehter saldeof fif hlafum & tuæm fiscum fif wæra ðusend gefyldeðiu feorða næht wacan cuom to ðegnum geongende ofer oððe bufa sætelað oððe niðrað ðegnas unðuegnum hondum ettende & weron geðreaten from him of strionendra oððe ældra in forletnisse oððe of oðrum mið ðy gesette ða ðe magon ðone monno widlegaðæs wifes docter from dioble friaðdumbe & deaf stefne eftsette cuoeð untynof seofa hlafum & hwon lytle fiscas feor monna ðusend gefyldebecon oððe tacon soecendum sealla onsoc & lar hiora geheht under ðærstes noma fore tobehaldenneðone blindo heartlice gemeð & þæt nængum cuoeða oððe cuoede geheht oððe hætðæm fraignendum huecl hine hia cuede godes ondetað & sona forðon drihtne ðrowende him cuoeðende wiðcuoeð sie geðread oððe bið geðreatadseðe losas cuoeð sawel his fore mec begæt hia ne hia þæt gebirigdon oððe gesupedon weron sume oðer ðone deað wið oððe oðð hia gesea hine in ric his & sona oferhiwade wæs inlaeded & iohannis weron ðrowende he gelicra ðrowende cuoeðeghuælc folc gesæh drihten geriordade & gearn hælo bead & sunu sume ungeleaffullnise his biddende from dioble gefriað biðsellende hine foresægde & ða ðegnas huæt on wæg getrahtadon fraignende læreð foruost oððe aldordom ne sie to soecannemæht in his noma doende ne gelefes forbeades & of ymbcyrf liomana ondspyrendra oððe ondspurnendra gastlice oððe megwlitlice læreð mæht in his noma doendeof wife forgefnisa soecenda moises cyðnese efne gecerde & ða cild from him forbeodend bloedsaðec forecueð hine slaende sedlo giuwende ðone iacob ðreað oððe ðreatað & of aldordom haedno forebeadend gelicad oððe gebis hersumnise mið bisene ædeawedblind giude oððe bæd inlihteð wæs & fylgedesende to ðæm ðegne to asalde to ðær sittende herde from ðæm menigum la hæl usicgefoerde of temple to ficbeame yfle cueð & foerde ficbeam wundrandum cueð biddendum mið geleafa to onfoanne ða giuendoof mæht ðerhfregnendum he of fulwuiht mið fraignung ofercuom oððe gecerde & of wingeard & ðæm yrrestum buendum bispell settecunnende of gyld æs cæseres geselenne æfterfylged of ofermercunc l of onlicnese sceomiagaðof wife seofa broðra lafe cunnendum fore ungehleaffullnisse eristes forcueð oððe telaðða boecere of bod æs fregnende twufald lufes ædeawde & huæs sie sunu crist fregnende læreð of forueard ðæs salmes nigoða & hunteantiges groeteng ec hiora in sprec ðone ymbgeong cyðaððone oððe ða ðorfend widwa tuege lytla senden allum geofa licendum forebrohtegetimbro temples eawendum foresægde ða gefaello & of ungelicum l brehtum l fagungum ðæs hlætmesto tides mið cunnungum towærdnum on longsum tosceade merrunga læreð fore tobehaldanoðone doege to cyme ane ðone faeder wiste cueðende unwitendo hia ðea wæcca heht & gebiddaof stæne fæt smirinise oððe behleing iuðæs ðæs sellendes & miðgearwing oððe foregearuung eastres asaegd is ne ðon læs & færme his runlice oððe deoplice ædeawed bið oððe haligdom oððeselenise & ðrowunges his wundra asægd biðonerest his ðerh ðona sceortlice mið soðfæstnise biðon ædeawed hiora sum ungeleaffullnise trumlice geðreað bið & astignise & to suiðrum godes gesæt oððe ðegnna forebodung becnum æfterfylgendum gesægd isasægd is æfter marcðe seternes dæg halig arlig æfter fifteigdæg fæstern wodnes doege doeghwæmlice doeg drihtenlica of forgefnise ðroung drihtnes user hæl cristes frige doeg of ðæm hwitum eostresæfter lucas ðus mercong ælces godspelles ðe ontuoelmonað byres on lucases dælonginnað ða mercungamið fora saga lucas ðeofi godspell saegeð oððe becneð ðerh endebrednise were gesceadensacerdhad soðfæstes zacharie asægd bið oððe is æc ða gesihðo in temple ofðon him sunu ðe engel ædeaude gehaten wæs þætte were accenned ðæs uutedlice ecnung oððe accennise gemyndged isgesended wæs engel to maria þætte were accenned spreces ðone hælend miððy sona acenned wæs gegroeted wæs from elizabeth gefeande in innað miððy iohanne huona æfter ðriim moneðum eftgecerred wæs in hus hiremiððy acenned wæs iohannes mið stefne gespreca ðæm dumbe gesald wæs ðæm feder sona witgende se cnæht in wæstern is oðð on dæge ædeaudnise his to israelæc asægd is þæt bod ðæs caseras & accennise cristes ðæm hiordum from engel asægd bið l wæs ofðon l miððy þæt heofonlic cempo ða menigo singeð wulder l gefea sie in heonisum godeenglum of dune stigendum ða hiordo færende ðone hælend in binne gesetted gemoetdn god ofer ðæm ðaða gesegon efnegeheredonðe æhtaðe dæge ymbcorfnise his witgong ondueardes semeones ðæs soðfæstes oððe annæs witgan gesægd istueolfwintro he eftwunade from his fostrum in temple soecende meoderes cuoeðende on ðæm ðaðe fadores mines sint gerises me þætte ic seðio fifeiðo ger tiberes ðæs caseres iohannis miððy aras bod acuoeden is of ðon alle to hreownise getrymed bið & sceowum drihtnes hine geondetade unwyrðeherodes to caercherne seles iohannem & ðrittig wintra mið ðio gefuulwad drihtne ðrinise on fulwiht asægdnise oððe tosceaded is cynno & hundseofontig seofon of criste upp woende wið to god endebrednis gegeadred bið oððe gewoefenfeortig dagana feastern & þæt ðrifald costong diofles þætte ofersuiðet wæs ædeaued ismersung eftfærende in galileam geteled is & þætte esaias boc onfenge of him gefylede wæs cuoeð he ne hæfde ðe witga ar in oeðel his eftasægd soðlice oððe æc ðio widua of serapta oððe ðæs licðroueres neman syri mið clænsunge þætte ðerh middum hiora seðe hine of more foreglendra waldon oferfoerde asægd isondetande in somnunge ðone diowel fordraf of mennswer petres & monigra untrymmia þæt folc gehælde oððe gehæled wæs & ondetung diola forboden istuæm sciopum feng fisca in word drihtnes feerlice wero gefylde ondo frohtendes petres foerano ðaðe his asægd ishreaf wæs geclænsed monigo mið mægne drihtnes gegemed woeron untrymigioðone eorðcrypel miððy gehreafad wæs hus forleton before him & from synnum & from crypelnise gemeð l gehæleðleui seðe & matheus of teloneo geced is hia lycedon of bærsynnigra gebearscip oððe of fæstern forbodeno ðæm brydgum æc woedes & wines niwes mið ceping becuoeðsoecende of niming hera in sabatum eftasægd dauid bisen forcuomon somnung hond drugi hælde gefylde woeron in unwisdom ælaruasðerhwæcende in gebed arlic tuoelfo apostolas nemneð ða hrinendo him gehæled biðon unhaleðorfendo ðurstendo woependo oehtnise ðolende ða eadgo ceigeð wæ ðæm wloncum & ðæm hlæhendum cuoeð æc oððe gee ða fiondas bebead to lufanne & slægendum oððe ðæm nacode lytle to forstondanneof mote & beam of tree æc goda & yfla & æc of ðæm hus getimberde geddunga setteðcenturiones ðræl gemeð biddendum fore hine ældrum & megumsunu ancende widues moder dead gee to ceastre gebroht of beere aweht isðæm færendum iohannis erendwrecum monigo of his micelnise gespræc & cnæhtum sittendum in ðingstowe cneureso gemacade oððe gemacað iudeahlingende drihtne foet þæt wif mið tearuum aðoað & ælaruas smeung geddung tuoera geðread is scyldigraðæm bodande drihtne & ðegnum his wifo of hiora acuoeden is wælum embehtade geddung æc ðon ðæsauende & wæstm foresette & gesette oððe sægdeþæt lehtfæt under fæte ne to settanne & ða þæt moder & broðro ceigendo cuoeð ðaðe fadores doende willoin scip slepende awæht wæs from frohtendum & unwoeder sæs mið word gestiordemonno from diowla here agemde ðaðe in bergum gegeonga gelefdefoerde to dohter iares were awoeht þæt wif of iorning blodes hæled aueccende ðæm mægdne gesald were bebead geeattamið gebrochtum mæhtum sendeð tuoelfom þætte bodande wero halwoendum bodum insetenomersunc his herodes geherde asægd is & apostolas gecuoeden sint ðaðe dydon eftbrohte oððe sægdonfif hlafum & tuæm fiscum fif monno ðusendo gefyldegefrægnende ða ðegnas ðone oððe huoelcne hine cuoeden menn petrus geonduearde criste godes soð he foresægde hine ðrouendelæreð þætte hine ælc oððe sua huelc fylgende hine woere onsæca hine seolfne & sume ne gesego hia cuoeð deað wið þæt geseas ric godes sona in is asægd oferhiuade wæs on morsume sunu of diule ðreatað oððe miððy wæs geðreatad cneoreses from ungeleafulnise gegemdeefter sona cuoeð hine ðrouande were toweard & of aldordom smeaunga hiora gesettet wæs in middum cnæht forbead eðmodnise læreð & ne to forbeadane mæhto on his noma doendefyr of heofne ofer telendo oððe hniðriendo gebida wilnando ðegnas ðreatað & ðæm cuoeðende ic gylfo ðec foxas holo habbað getrymade esne fylgende forgeafa oððe forleta ða deado & ðone haldond sulh ne eftlocia on bæcofgemærcade æc oðrum tuæm & unseofontigum ðeadum sileð bodo ðæm gerises bodage sona ða ungeleaffulloco geðreadas oððe ða ceastro tuæm & unseofuntigum eftcerrendum & ðæm gefeandum bebead ne of underdrifenise diowla ah of hiora in heofne noma mið awrittne gefeaondetnise hernises in gefea asægd is to feder æfter ðon insægeð ac ða forðmesto soðfæste ðaðe geseað ða ðegnas ne gesego hiaæs ðæm wise of lif ecce soecende & hua his were ðe neesta fraignende inlædeð geddung ðæs wundes ðæm gebroht from samaritanum miltheortnise bebead gebisenedðæs embehtmonnes of suoester ne hia helpende gecoren hia oððe ða ilco dæl gecease mið cuis stiordeþæt bisene gebedes fifo giunga were gebeden from ðegnum gesaldefrionde ðrio hlafas æd middernæht ðæm biddende þæt getdung sette giwende soecende & cnylsende ðerhgebiddesðone dumba diulas mið ðy geboette gemeð þæt sprec & in diobla aldor ðuslico hine mæge cuoeðende from wepenberend strongum forcummen & of gast unclæne seofofullice on menn eftfærende forcuoeððæm ceigende wife eadig were þæt innoð seðe hine gebere & geonduorde þætte were ðe eadig seðe gehealde word godes & of becon ionæs cuoeð ðio cuoen suðdæles gemyndgadeþæt lehtfæt cuoeðende ne were under mitte to gesettanne þæt ego læreð bliðe were gerisnelicmið ælarua gehriordage gebeden wæs smeande oððe ðencende from iudisca fulwihte becnade oððe cydde & wæ seofa siða cuoeð monigo hiora yfla æc geðreadeðegnum bebead & from dærstum esuicnise to behaldane & ða ðaðe lichoma acuellas ne scyniga ne þæt in oehtnise huætd hia wero sprecendo geðencæðæm wilnande sum ðing bituih him & broðer his were todæled erfe geddung gesette from welige ðæm gitsare sona & ðegnum gemnise mettes & woedes forgaes fuglas bebead to behaldannelytlo edo ric geheht to hæbbendo oððe agnage fore ælmiso to bebscane & sido ymbgyrdeno & lehtfato beornendo were gerisnelic hateð to wæccenne æc ðon ðræles godes & yfles gemynd aworden oððe awærð bebead esne wittende willa drihtnes monigom ðone uncyðig oððe unwittende æc huonum gemersia gefæstnuiðfyr innueard hine cuoeð ðærflicra todælnise woere gesended & onsione heofnes cunnande rehtlice were tid to oncnauanne eawunga & æc geðiodsumnise to ðæm fionde on woeg foresægeðweron gesægd sum oðero from pylate ofslægeno cuoeð alle buta hreonise doað gelic þætte hia woero deado oððe sua ða tene & æhto feallo torres foretreden geddung æc ðon of unberendum trees fic settende sægeð oððe tæcnað hreonis tosceadadon & þæt wif from wintrum tenum & æhto gescryncan ahof of gemnise mið bisseno oxes to wætranne æfsægeð gefeande folc of his wundrum wuldorlicumric godes corn sinapis geefnade & to dærsto from naroneðe æc ðon lifes woeg lytla oððe lytelra sprecend woeron cuoeð ða forðmesto hlætmest & ða hlætmesto forðmæstoherodem fox nemneð & hierusalem geðreaðe oðrum his gescilde onsæccendegegemde suelce of seaðe gefreod lycoedon asales oððe oxes on ðæm fælles oftrahtung gescende edmodnise æc ðon to fylgene lærde on gebearscip ðæt forma hræst bebead ne sohte oððe nere to soecane ne weligo ah ða dorfendo ðaðe ne eftseleð were to foedanneseteð geddung of ðæm laðendum seðe hine forcuoede gearuande oððe geteledon symbel ne woeron wyrðelaðum ða nedlicum mið ðon & sauel his & ondfenge rode gefylgendo woero þæt gelic getimbrendes torres & of gefeht cyninga tuoege gesceadeð & ne sie hwælc oððe ænig salt ah eoro habbað to heranneof synna gebearscip geddung scipes & cæsering setteð begetne bebead þæt gefea from hreownisum hælo tocymendegeddung gesette from wæstmo & ðæm argæ sunum þæt eftcerr behofe to feder hælo sægeð ðæra hreonisefrom geroefa unrehtwisnise from ungelicnise seðe þæt scyld hlaferdes his hogascipe inneade oððe lædene mæhte gode here ænig & gitsaras geðrað ða ælaruas & æ cuoeð oððe witgo wið to iohannem & þætte forleorte suahua wif gesyngadeðe unmiltheortne welige gehiuadne i mið felle & ðone ðorfe inlædde ædeaude hulco wero ðrouendo hreaferas sua geearnadon þætte hia were gepined scearplicewæ cuæ ðæm ondspyrnende ðeæm hræwende æc broðer uutedlice undseofontig siða seofa siða heht þætte were forgefengeece him bedon ða apostolas & geherdon of foresaga oððe trees eðnise & geseteno mið bisene from esne herende oððe foedende læreð þæt ða idlo hia gee gefyldon ðaðe beboden woeron geondetad sinttea oððe teno hreafo geclænsade an nomaa & ðis utacund cynn to ðongunge gewoende þætte woero tosæccennewæs frægnend from tid rices godes geonduearde ne mið gehald tocymende & hine to ðuneri geefnade niomande oððe hia cuoeð menn sua on dagum noes & loth & of tuæm on hus on coern & on lond suindrio to onfoanne & ða syndrio foresægeð to forletennoto symble biddanne geddung from widua setteð wraco from wiðeruarde his from unrehtwis doeme giwigendeof gebed ðæs ælaruas on temple & bærsynnig foregesettet læreð ne to worpanne ða merdo ah to ondetende synnoða lytlo from him hia adrifa forebead eðmodnise under hiora noma mercað to haldennegefrægn ðone weligo from to byenna lif ece ðiu æfterra onsuare unrod gecearf & forletrum fore noma his lytlo drihten ece hehtgesald he woere to hierusalem & woere geðrowende forecuoeðæt hiericho blinde ðorfende leht on onduearde eftsetteðerheode hiericho ðone aldormono unband seðe cuom hal gedoe þætte losadebispell sette ðegna from hlaferdo his of þætte hia gebohte from him & fiondas rices his foresægeð ðerhgelicadeofer fola asales sætt allum cuoeðendum sibb on heofne & gefea on heanisum & of ðreatendum ðegnum his cuoeð gif ðas sægdon stanes cliopadongesæh ða ceastra gewæp ofer hia foresægde ofacerred of temple bebyccendo fordraf uðuutum setendum of folce lustlice wæs geheredfrægnende of mæhte his huoerflice of frægnende of iohannes fulwihte efne forcumen woerongeddong cuoeð from buendum wingeardum seðe laferd his & esnes & sunu ofslogoncostende of gæfel cæsares to forgeldanne penninges onwriting forcuomfrom seofa broðero hlafe soecendum erist & ec moises mið cyðnise getrymaðsoecað huu crist sunu sie dauið mið drihtno from him wære geceged in psalme hunteanteige nioða upphepbing æc ðon uuðutana geðreade widua tuoge lyf sendende forðor allum were gefæstnadhergiendum getimbres tempel forecuoeð sona ðæs toslitnitnese & frægnendum of ende geonduærde yflo monigo forescyniga ne foresmeande huæd gesald gesprecen weron ah in geðyld his hia agnagað sauela hioraymbsellenne from here hierusalem & wæ ðæm berendum suord æc ðon & þæt ðeodom & tunglas heofnæs toweardo & hine tocymende on wolcen mið mæhte micla & mið ðrym forecuoeðlocas cuoeð þætte togeneolecde oððe togemeolecað lesnise iuera from druncene æc ðon & gemnisum þisses lifes forbead to wæccenne bead & to biddanneþætte neh eostro is to redenneiuðas sipbade mearde geruað ða ðegnas eostro geryno færma drihtnes oððe drihtenlico gemersad aronþæt geflit ðegna hine seolfne ðæra embehtmonn gefælde genom ðæm ric geheht cuoeð æfter oðera to petre getrym broðro ðino ðio redo mæge on sua huælc tid cuoeðaðrounges deda asægd biðon ðer bituih oðero æc ðon ðio earliprece ðone ðæm cnæhte petrus gecurfe ðio hond his miððy gesette l eftgeboetteðæm hoendum forgefnise from feder ofgebæd æc an from ðæm sceaðum hongende oððe g ondedende unbandarise hine ðarfo ðio engelica ædeaunise ongeton & petrus to ðær byrgenne gearn & gesæh þætte aworden wæs gewundraðof tuæm þæt is & foera his ðæs noma geswigeð is ðæm geongendum in ceastre þætte ða wæs geceiged æfter þæt efnesprec longe on dælnise hlafes ongeten biðefnesprecendum ðegnum astod on middum cuoe sibb iuh & ða get forhtende & þæt gaast woendon ædeadnise oferfæsto hondo & fota gefæstnaðe gebræc fore ðæm dæl fisces brededes & biobread wyniges læreð hia þæt hat fadores walde gesenda hine cuoeð astag on heofneðios redo on ðære uica eostres miððy bið gereded geendad bið on stoue ðer cuuoeð ða huile we biðon gegearuud mið ðæm heigra mæht miððy uutedlice in astignise gereded bið oðero stoue onginneð ðer cuoeð ðegnum ðas sint wordo ðaðe spreccend wæs iuh miððy get ic wæs mið iuh wið ende godspellesasægd aron ða merconga æfter lucasonginnas forueardmercunga æfter iohannemin fruma l in forma uord l crist uæs god mið gode ðerh ðone ilca geworht weron alle & iohannes þæt woere gesended gesægd is ær l befora him ðaðe eft onfoas þæt hia se gewyrces suno goddes ðerh geafa hisðæm frasendum iudeum iohannes onsæcces hine þæt he sie crist ah þæt gesendet were heseolf before ðæm æc stefn þætte he were clioppendes in uoestern æfter isaias ðæm uitga gesaegeð ðe ilca uutetlice geondete lomb lacdende l niomende synno middangeardes æc fuluande in halge gaste forðon ðe ilca sie l is on ufa allum l ofer alloof tuæm iohannes ðegnum ðaðe fylgendo uerun ðæm drihten an tolædde broder his seðe petrus from ðæm uæs genemned æc ðon uæs geceiged bearn godes gebecnas seðe sona betuih oðrum ðe ilca godes sunu bið geondetadin ðæm færmum þæt uæter ymbcerde l gecerde in win miððy uæs auorden cuðlice gesene þætte ðer heseolf uæs gehaten uin nedðærf sie þætte gescyrte ðæra farmamiððy geneolicde eastro iudeana auarp ða cependo l of temple & ðæm frasendum l huæt l becon gesalde to undoanne tempul l þæt tacnas his aganes lichoma erest & ym ðrim dagum wæccennes clæn run l godes degelnise setteððæm ðegne bituih menigo cuoeð buta sie eft accenned in ric godes ingeonga ne mæge l þætte ne doema ah haele gecuome/ midgeard & þæt woere aedeauad cuæð ueorc ða ðe in gode aron gewordnein ðæm stoue fuluande is gecuoeden ðone hælend fulguge ðe ilca brydguma þætte sie & gedoefenlic is þæt gewox hine hueðre lytlige & ðe ilca ufa & on ufa allum were æc to gelefanne in hine þætte hæfde lif ece ofer ðone ungeleaffulle uutedlico uræððo geunia getrymeð oððe gefæstnaðæt uaelle iacobes ðæm uife samaritanisca wæs ædeaued mið menigum deglum runum spræc & monigo ðara samaritaniscana lioda gelefeð on hine cuoedendo ðis is soðlice haelend middangeardesregluordes sunu sum oðer untrymiende ondueardnesse drihten stefne gehaeled bið cuoeðendes feder his gaa sunu ðin liofað gelefde ðe ilca & hus his allmonno eahtu & ðritðeih uintra hæbende in untrymnisse his miððy gecuoed aris nim bere ðine & geong in sunnedoeg haeled efne gelic hine þæt uæs doende godeþæt sunu suælce fader auoehte deado sie geliclic arwyrðe in ðæm gelefdon oferleorað of deaðe to life tocymende æc ðon soðsæges ðio tid ðona of byrgennum godo æc ða yflo eft arisaðfore cyðnise his iohannem ðæccille ceigeð & æc ðone faeder & geuriotto of him cyðnisse getrymeð iudæos oðerne eft foendo oððe of him uutedlico moysi miððy aurat gefæstnademiððy geneolecde eastro iudeana of fif hlafum & tuæm fiscum & fif ðusendo monno gefylde fore ðæm tacne miððy to cyninge hine uallað doa oððe gewyrca geflæh & geeade oððe geongende onufa ðæm sæ forohtandum ðegnum cuoeð ic hit am nallað gie ondredefrom ðreatum gesoht wæs & miððy gemoeted uæs cuðæ wyrcas mett seðe ne losas & hlaf of heofnum soð cuoeð gesealla hlif middangeardehlaf lifes hine cueð & ða gelefendo on him eft wæccende þæt he uere on ðæm hlætmæste dæg is to redanne fore deadum oððe unlifiendumhwisprendo oððe tuispreccendo oððe hine sunu cuoðað soð he bituih menigo lichoma his hlaf hine seolfne cuoeð fore middangeardes lif & ða oðero gelic menigo of hlafe & lichoma his gesoðadewordo his gast & lif foresægeð & enne of tuolfum diubul geceigesiudæum to cearfanne hine soecendum astag deiglice to dæg halgum ðer ungelico from him & of ðæm gecuoeden biðon & soecendo hine to gegrioppanne ne maehtun fore ðon ne ða get cuom tid hismenigum of ðreat gelefendum menigo spreceð bituih ðæm cuæð seðe ðyrstes cyme to me & dringað ðæm ðegne æc ðon fore ðæm of hernise cuoeðende uiðstonden bið from ðæm ældum sint to redanne in fæsternþæt uif in argscipe oððe begrippene oððe forrepene & to him togelaeded uæs ne from henendum oððe fordoemendum gedoemedo oððe geniðrad heseolf under wyrd ðona leng þætte ne syngade untyndeleht middangeardes þæt he uere cuoeð of soðre cyðnise gefeande forcuoæð dom his soð uoere gefæstnadecuoeð to iudeum & gie in synne iure gie biðon deade of ðæm uæs gefrognen huælc woere fruma þæt he uere geonduearde togecde miððy gie upp app ahefes sunu monnes ðonne gie ongeattas forðon ic amiudeum gelefendum cuæð gif gie gelefeð oððe wunað in word minum soðfæstnisse gefriað iuih ðæm ondsuærendum þæt he wero frio cueð ðeðe wyrcað synne ðrael oððe ðea is synnes & bituih oðro menigo diobul monnslaga & leasunges ðone fæder tobecnaðseðe word cuoeð min gehaldes deað ne gesiið in ecnisse & bituih odro menigo ær abraam þætte were cuæð geeade of ðæm templeðone blindo from frumacennise gehæled uæs leht middangeardes he cuæð ðone miððy inlichtade menigo ða aeldo mið unsibsumnise l gedroefedo uoeron soecendum he from ðæm inlichtet cyðig geworðad uæsseðe ne ingaeð cuæð in scipa locc ðerh duru ðaef is & he uere cuoeð duru & hiorde scipa fore ðæm he his sauel þæt he ualde gesete & oðero scip to gelædanne foresægde þætte sie an ede l scipaloc enne hiordamæht hæfde he cuæð setnesse & eft to onfoanne sauel his geuarð æc ðon niuæs timbredes huses halgum bituih menigum ða ðe frasendum saegde cuæð ic & fader an we sindon & menigo gelefdon in himlatzarum feoðor doger dead mið ðy hine awoehte slepe cuoeð ðone l ðe illca micla stefne mið ceigunge auoecce ic ualde geheht & from geonga menigum gelefendum of iudaeumða biscopas ongeaegn oððe uið hine somnung gegeadredon in ðæm an oððe enne gedæfneð þætte sie dead fore ðæm folce gewitgade & ær sex dagas eastres mið smirinise foet drihtnes uoeron ðerhgotteno of ðæm uorðe iudas toslitnise oððe forcuoeden biðþæt ðreat mið tuiggum palma gearn ceigeð la hæl usig he uutedlico ofer þæt fole aseldes gesæt ðæm ældum cuoeðendum all middangeard æfter him foerdesæccendum hædnum hine gesea uilnandum tid his gebrehtnis hine cuæð & corn huætes dead monigfald uæstem soðsæges tobrengende embehtande æc ðon him arwyrðlicne oððe foresendeð from federsauel his gestyredo þætte sie ðæm cuoeðende & gebrehtnige hine from feder gewigende stefn of heofnum cuoeð ic gebrehtade ðas menigo forefylgeð betuih ða hine ne to doemenne ah to haelanne middangeard gecuome gecyðed biðaras from farma foet geðuoh ðara ðeigna bisene gesalde hine cuæð þætte hia efnum ðegnum doað ðætte allra drihten þæt geworhte soðadonne uere esne mara hlaferde cueð æfter cyðnise writtes in hrining hlafes mið ræcing gebecnade & ða ðegnas monigfaldlice getrymed biðne sie gestyred hearta iuerre cuæð ðæm ðegnum ic am uoeg soðfæstnisse & lif seðe gesiið mec gesiið æc ðone fæder ic in feder & fader in mec suæ huæd gio gegiauað in noma minum ðis ic doamlufandum hine ðegnum & bibodo haldendum rummod geheht from feder uoere gesended & wunande mið him in ecnese & hine sib gesealla him & sib forleta gehaten bið oððe ishine seolfne & ðone fader londbuænd cuæðende & ða ðeig palmo buta hine noht hia geuyrca mæge getrymeð & menigum reordana costum l uisum tuifallice him lufu inbecnað ðæs hearnunge magon suæ huæd hia gebiddas begeattaða ilca lufu suiðe fæst bebead to forhygcanne læreð fiunge middangeardes forecuoæð huluco fore his noma uoeron ðrouende & þæt forcuoedne middangeard from rumode of synne of soðfæstnise & of dome ædeaueðlytle huile & gesene were hine cuæð from him & eftersona lythuon & ne uere gesene of ðon soecendum ðegnum ongelic wifes æfter acennise unrotnises fore glædnise ne eftgemyndig inlædeð ða ilca & from feder to lufanne gebecnas getrimað hine eft forletno cuoeð in middangeard ofersuiðung gie habað ah gelefað ic forcuom oððe middangeardto faeder of brehtnise/ his gespræc ðegnas longunga & monigfallice foreæfterfylging bebeadas throuung sona miððy gebiotateselenises & ðrouunges his ðerh endebrednise uundra oððe dedo asaegd aroneristes gelic aedeaunise oððe asceadan is oððe forðon maria ðio magdalenisca & saegeð underniomane lichoma of byrgenne ðæm iornendum & eftcerrendum ða ilca æfter ðære angelica gesihðo gesene from hir drihten hiu woende lecuord miððy sona uæs ongeten gehaten is ðegnum gesaeccannemiððy duro uoeron tyndo cuomon to ðæm ðegnum sibb gebrohte mið hondum & ðegla miððy ædeaude of ðæm in inblauing gebecnað gast halig eft æfter dagum æhtuu insceaunge oððe mið rining oððe miððy gehran ðæm sidum honda efnegetrymed uæs þæt geherde eadgo biðon ðaðe ne gesegon & gelefdonædeaude hine eftersona to sae tiberiaðes seofanum ðegnum in feng ðæra fiscana hundrað fiftih ðriu miððy eft aras from deadumuið ðiu ðirde cuoeð petre lufas ðu mec forðon ðria hine onsoce & foedendo oððe ða scipo gelic ðirdæ beadande mið racing honda tahte oððe him þætte rodes deaðe uere toueard mið ðrounge gesigfæstnadgefultimige seo þrinis seo annis ðære annisse gemildsa me seo þrinnisgefultimige ic bidde me gesettum saes micles swaswa in fræcennisseþætte nalæs mid heo teo mec seo deaðlicnes ðeoses geares ne ðyses middangeardes idelnes& ðæt ilce ic bidde from þæm hyhstum þæs heofonlican compwerodes mægenumðylæs mec forlæten to slitenne feondum ac gescilden soðlice wæpnum strongumþætte heo mec foregongen in feðan ðæs heofonlican weorudes wigþreatas/wisdomes gefylnes & godes lufu onbernes mid cæmppum swa swa god & godes strengu gelicumic wisce þrymseld þa lyfiendan heahenglas aldordomas & duguðmehte ænglasþætte mec þicce gescyldende weorode feond ic mæge gefyllansyþþan æfter þan oðre cæmpan heahfæderas feower siðan feower witeganond apostolas christes scipes steoran þroweras alle ic bidde godes cæmpanþætte mec þurh heo þære ecean hælo ymbsylle & æghwylc yfel from me gewitecrist mid me were fæste trume gefæstnige ege fyrhto ða sweartan weorud abregegod unþurhsceotendlicre gescyldnesse æghwonan mec gescild ðinre mæhtemines lichoman lewera alle alæs gesundum plegscylde gescyldendum anra gehwylcþætte nalæs ða sweartan deoblu in mine sidan leligen swaswa gewuniað scytas flanasþone hnoll ða heafodpannan mid þæm loccum ond eagan ondwleotan tungan teð & ða næsþyrluswiran hryncg sidan lendenu ðyoh micgernan ond ða twa hondaminum soþlice mid gescyldrum hneccan helm hælo beoðo westo heafdehneofolan eagum ond exon þære ðryfealdan nebbe weolure onseone ðunwongancinne bearde oferbruum earum heagospindum smerum betwin þæm næsgristlan/seonum eahringum bræwum bruum toðreoman oroðe ceacum/ cinbanum & gomantoðum tungan muðe hræctungan hracan þrotbollan & undertungeðrum swiranheafodlocan brægene gristlan swiran arfæst ætbeoðu gescyldnesseæfter þon beoðu me byrne seo gehealdfæstesðe ymb min leomu ymb mine innoðasþætte ðu ascufe from me ða ungesewenlican slega næglas ða fæstniað ða laðwendangescyld soðlice god strongre byrnan mid gescyldrum eaxle ond earmasgemundbyrd elne mid þan elnbogan & hondum fyste folme fingras mid þæm næglumgescyld þone hringc & ða ribb mid ðæm liðum bæc hringc & ða sionwe mid ðæm banumgescyld ða hyd blod mid ðæm ædrum ða hypban ða earsenda mid ðæm þeohsconcumgescyld homme scotliran ða þeohgeweald mid þæm þeohweorfan þa hweorfan & ða cneogemundbyrd telgan efenwexende tyne mid þæm taum næglas twiga fifegescyld ða hælan mid þæm sceonum oððe sconcum & sporum sceoncan fet þara ila mid þæm stepum oððe gongumgescyld breost ðearmwind breostban tittas oððon sponan magan & þone neabulangescyld ða wombe þa lendenu þa acænnendlican lyomu & hrif & ðære heortan þa liflicangescyld þa þriofealdan libre & rysele sweotan & burse lundlagan snædelþearm mid þære nettangescyld readan feleferð mid ðære lungene edre smælþearmas geallan mid þy hyorthomangescyld þæt flæsc oððe lichoman ða scare mid þæm mergum þone milte mid þæm gebægdum eosenum & roppumgescyld blædran gelynd ond alle þara gefoga þa unarimdan ændebyrdnessegescyld hær & þa oþre leomu þæra swæ wen is ic biferde oððe forleort nomangescyld alne mec mid fif ondgeotum & mid ten smicre geworhtum durumþætte from þæm hælum oð ðæs heafdes heannesse nængum lime minum utan innan ic geuntrumigeþylæs of minum mæge lif ascufan wolnes fefor ece adl sar lichomanærðon soðlice gode syllendum ic gealdige & mine synne mid godum ic adilgieþætte of lichoman utgeongende ðeosum neolum ic ðolige oððe ic mæge geþolian & to þæm hean gefligan oððe geferan ic mæge& gemilsigendum gode to þæm readorlicum bliðe ic sy gewegen rices coelnesse soðliceeala drihten god ælmihtig ece & unasecgendlic þæne ðrynenne on annesse & ænne on ðrynnesse we andettað þe ænne ic geeadmede þe ic herige & þe ic wuldrige þinre mildheortnesse & miltse ðancas ic gerecce þu me unscrydne nihte ortrywðe & gedwyldes dælnimend beon þu sealdest gyfe þinregefremm ic halsige ongunnen on me weorc mildheortnesse þinre & forgyf me ðencean specan & don þa gecweme synd þe & mid gecwemre me æghwar arfæstnesse gehealdende do me unwyrðne & earming æt sumum sæle to þinre becuman gesyhðeðu þe ana on ðrynnesse fullfremedre leofast & rixast godeala drihten hælend crist cyning fæmnena ansundnesse lufigend bewera heortan mine fram eallum flanum & searwum feondes & adwæsc on me ealle atendnesse galnesse & syle soðe eadmodnesse & smyltnesse geþyldes breoste minumonæl mod min þinre soðre lufe mid tihtingum þæt on hatunge hæbbende ealne weg unrihtwisnesse ic mage on eallum dagum lifes mines gelician þegod ælmihtig of ægðrum fæder & suna forðstæppende leoht soð onlyhtende ælcne mann cumendne on þysne middaneard onlyht ic halsige blindnesse heortan minre & onæl on me fyr hætan þinre& forgif me geleafan rihtne hopan gewissne soðe lufe fullfremede & oðre mægnu þurh þa ic ongyte þe ondrædan þe lufian & þine bebodu gehealdanþæt ðænne me dæg se ytemesta getimað englas sibbe me onfon & on anwealde deofles generian þæt on midwiste haligra þinra ic geearnige eadigre reste brucan gefultumigendum fæder & suna se on þe haligum gaste an god leofað & rixaðeala drihten hælend crist ic geeadmede þe on rode astigendne ic bidde þe þæt seo rod alyse me fram engle sleandumla drihten ic geeadmede þe on rode gewundudne ic bidde þe þæt þa wunda syn læcedom sawle minreon byrgene geledne ic bidde þe þæt se deað si lif min ecenyðer astigendne to hellwarum alysendne gehæfte þæt ðu na geþafige me ðyder innganfram deadum arisendne & to heofenum astigendne þæt ðu me fram synnum alyse & heofen astigan þu dotoweardne & to demenne þæt on þinum tocyme ðu inn na ga on þæne dom mid me synnfullum ac þæt ðu ærþam me ealle synna forgyfe ðænne ðu deme hælend middaneardes þu ðe leofasteala drihten hælend crist wuldorfullusta scyppend middaneardes þu þænne ðu eart beorhtnyss wuldres efenece fæder & haligum gasteforþi þu gemedemudest flæsc niman of ungewemmedre fæmnan & wuldorfulle handa þine on rode galgan þu geðafudest feæstnian þæt ðy clusan tostenctest helle & mennisc cynn þæt ðu alysdest of deaðebeseoh & gemiltsa me earmum ofsettum mana mid hefe & mid manegra scylda womme besmitenumgehyr me astrehtne beforan geeadmedendre rode þinre & syle me gyfe þine þæt ic geearnige þe clæne wiðstandan & gelician gesihðe þinreeala god ælmihtig þu ðe þine haligan handa for us on rode aðenudest & mid þinum haligum blode us alysdest asend on me sefan & andgyt hu ic hæbbe soðe dædbote & gode þurhwununge on eallum dagum lifes minesþu þe for menniscum cynne rode galgan þoludest & blod þin for hæle ure ealra þu agute beseoh on me & gemiltsa min& syle me forgyfenesse & forlætenesse ealra synna & geheald me drihten heononforð þurh sigebeacn haligre rode fram bigswicum scinncræftiges & gelæd me to þam ecean lifeþurh wuldor & mægen haligre rode þinre þin tacn me ic ongesette on heortan & on lichaman gehæl meþæne feond & wæpnu & attru hys ealle anyd fram me gewilnunga flæsclice adyd on megyfa þine geliffæst on/ meunder sceade fiðera þinra gescyld meþurh þiss tacn eac haligre rode þinre fram adlum mislicum & cwyldum mænigfealdum & frecenyssum dæghwamlicum alys meac þu ma la goda hælend crist on mildheortnysse þinre na hatheortnysse þrea me & locehwar ic worige ongenclypa me to þe & me ongengeclypodne mid fæderlicre arfæstnysse symble geheald to wuldre naman þines se si gebletsud on woruldeeala ælmihtiga & lufwendusta god la haligusta & lufigendusta hælend ic halsige þe þurh unacennedne fæder ðinne drihten ælmihtigne & þurh gast haligne þe efenecne& þurh tacn halwendre rode þinre ic bidde & ic halsige þæt me næfre þu forlæte na þu na fylle on anweald feonda minra na her na on toweardre worulde& si þe wurðmynd anweald vel miht & anweald gynd ealle woruldafor haligre rode þinre mid me þu si þæt ðu me bewerigefor gebletsudre rode þinre innon me þu si þæt ðu me geweorðigefor eadigre rode þinre abuton me þu si þæt ðu me gehealdefor wuldorfulre rode þinre beforan þæt ðu me gelædefor arwurðre rode þinre bæftan me þu si þæt ðu me begymefor mærre rode þinre on me þæt ðu ealne weg me on andwerdum gehealde & to heofenlicum rice þu gelædegehyr gebed min þæt eallunga ic oncnawe timan minne gehende beon getiða me drihten wisdom & andgyt & onlyht heortan mineþæt ic oncnawe þe symle on eallum dagum lifes mines forþi þu eart god & nys oðer buton þe buton þu sylf þu þe nyðer astige of heofene & þu onlyhtest of gaste haligumic bidde þæt ðu onlyhte heortan mine forþi synna mine unatellendlice synd swyðeeftsona þe ic bidde & halsige þæt ðu gehyre bene mine & mine gewilnunge æfter gyfe þinre on welgecwemum þinum eallum timan þu gefremme þæt ic to þinre mildheortnesse mid haligum geleaffullum þinum becuman mæge þu ðe mid fæder & haligum gaste leofast & rixasteala god untwynigendre mildheortnesse ormætre arfæstnesse scyppend & edniwigend mennisces cynnes þu ðe andettendra þe heortan afeormast & wregende hi sylfe ætforan gesyhðe godcundre miltse þinre fram eallum bende unrihtwisnesse þu unbinst mægen þin mid eallum ic bidde geomerungumþæt ðu æfter mycelnesse miltsunga þinra be eallum unrihtwisnessum minum be þam wregð inngehyd min clæne me beforan þe forgyfe don andetnesse & soðe of eallum þam & þæslice me þu sylle dædboteþurh hælend crist ancennedan sunu þinne hælend urne se mid þe mid gaste haligum ana leofað & rixað god þurh undeadlice woruldaeala drihten hælend crist þu on þysne middaneard for us synnfulle of bosme fæder tocome þæt of adames synne us þu alysdest forþi ic wat & ic gelyfe þæt na for rihtwise ac for synnfulle on eorðan eardian þu woldestgehyr me synnfulne & gyltigne unwyrðne & forscyldigudne & on bebodum þinum gymeleasne milde ongengecylpa to behreowsungeþæt fram eallum synnum afeormud & gastes þines mid gyfe mode & on geðance onliht to mildheortnysse eadigre & ecere gesyhðe þinre ic mæge becuman hælend middaneardesic andette þe drihten forþi ic syngude ðearle beforan þe & beforan englum þinumic syngude þurh gymeleaste beboda þinra þurh ofermodignysse & uppahafenysse þurh forligr & unrihthæmed þurh gytsunge & ydel wuldor þurh yrre & unrotnysse& slapulnesse andan & hatungeac þu drihten þu eart arfæst & mildheort me syle fulle mildheortlice forgyfenesse & forlætincgeic andette þe drihtne gode heofenes ealle synna mine forþi ic syngude ðearle beforan þe & halgum þinum on geðance on spræce on besmitenesse modes & lichaman & on eallum weorce yfelumforþi ic bidde þe þurh sunu þinne & þurh gast haligne fæder & þurh ðingrædenne haligre godes cennestran & ealra halgena þinraþæt þu gemiltsige min ælmihtig drihten god & þæt ðy forgyfe me ealle synna mine þu alyse me fram eallum yfele þu gehealde me on eallum gode & þu gelæde me to life ecumgast halig seofonhiwe ofer me cume & mægen þæs heahustan ofersceadewige me mid heofenlicre bletsunge þæt he me buton synne gehealde & to life ecum gelædeic andette þe drihten ealle synna mine þa ðe ic dyde on eallum dagum lifes minesgod þu me/ gesceope þu canst ealle synna mineforgyf me forþi ðearle on þe ic syngude drihtengemiltsa min þurh ðingrædenne ealra halgena engla & heahenglagemiltsa me þurh þingrædenne haligra apostola cyðera andettera & fæmnenaþe ic bidde gemiltsa mindrihten gehnehsa heortan mine hearde & stænene & gehæl me slæpendne & geheald wæccendne þæt her gesæliglice lybban ic mæge & mid þinum ic geearnige habban lif eceeala mildesta god þu me/ unnytne þeow þinne ær mildheortlice to anlicnesse þinre æfter sawle þu gesceope & eft mid synnum befyledne & deadne arlice & mildelice/ þu geedniwudestic herige & þe mid ealre estfulnesse for þinum unasecgendlicum godum me ungeearnedum forgyfenum eaðmodust ðancas ic secgeme soðlice þurh ealle ic tæle & on gesihðe mægenðrymmes þines on ælce wisan ic wrege & eallum synnum & leahtrum me forgyltne & scyldigne ic beclypigeac eac swa lange on andwerdre worulde yrmðe ic lybbe þu drihten on godum weorce þurhwuniendlicne agyld swa þæt lencg na ic nelle na ic na mæge þe & halgan þine on nahte gebylian ac to hyra midwunungum æt sumum sæle ic geearnige becuman þe fylstendum þu þe leofastdrihten god min þu ðe næfst hlaford ac ealle þinre synd dihtnunge underþeodde þe ic bidde & halsige la mildesta fæder þæt me þu gemedemige synna mine forgyfan þa fram geoguðe minre æfter ðwæale wylles ic agyltena forseoh ðy me unwyrðne ðeow þinne drihten god ac on getæle halgena þinra þa fram frymðe þe gelicudon me midgetellan gemedema & na forlæt me drihten on eallum dagum lifes minesac swa swa þu wylt & swa swa þu wast swa gemiltsa min drihtengod þu eart rihtwisra wuldor & synnfulra mildheortnes arfæstnesse þine eadmodre bene ic bidde þæt me þeow þinne welwyllende þu behealde & arfæstnesse þinre heordrædenne me æghwar þu forgife þæt of ealre heortan & of eallum mode þe ic þeowige& under þinre symle gescyldnesse ic wunige & þænne me ytemest dæg & ende lifes tocymð geferscype haligra þinra ic underfo mid þam unasecgendlices wuldres gyfa brucan ic geearnige þe geunnendumunderfo arfæstnes þin drihten god min eadmodnesse minre bena & þurh ðingunga & earnunga eadigre & wuldorfulre & symble fæmnan & godes cennestran & ealra halgena þinra genera& alys me/ þeow þinne of handum feonda minra & of annwealde satanes & þena hys & of flæsclicum lichaman mines gewilnungum & of eallum þyssere worulde idelnessumalys me drihten þæt þe gemiltsigendum ecera ligeas tintregena ætwindan ic mage & to ecere eadignesse ic geearnige becuman þe gefultumigendumgehæl me drihten cyning eces wuldres þu ðe miht gehælan & syle me gyfe þæt ic wylle wyrcean & gefremman þa þe liciað & me to hæle fremiandrihten halig fæder ælmihtig god syle me on gedrefednesse fultum on ehtnesse frofur & on eallum timan costunge mægen& swa hwæt swa ðæt is þæt min ungesælhþ fram þe gyrnan ne cann oþþe ne dear þæt þu drihten for þinre miltse & mægenþrimme me syle forþi þu eart frofor & gescildnes & begimend lifes mines on ælcere tide þu þe leofastla þu halige & wuldorfulle godes moder & simble mæden ðu middanearde gearnudest cennan hælend gehyr me & gemiltsa min nu & æfre for wyrþscipe haligre & oferhlifigendestran mædenhades þinesþe ic bidde eadmodlice beo þu me ic bidde hælestre & fultumgestre mid gode ælmihttigum ðæt he milde fram synna minra wommum aclænsige & fram helle þystrum generige to life ecean gelædese ðurh mildheortnysse his foreþinggendre on þisse worulde gehælan & gehealdan gemedemige & æfter ende þisses liues ateorigendlices sumne dæl ecere eadinysse on haligra geferscipe he forgife þe leofaðla þu haliga heahengel þu þe come to helpe folce godes gehelp me sinfullum mid þam heastan deman þæt he me sylle forgyfenysse synna minra for micelan miltse hys & menifealdnysse gemiltsunga hisþærtoeacan ic halsige beorhtne wlitigne uplicre godcundnysse þen þæt on þam ytemestan dæge mildelice þu onfo saule mine on bosme þinum haligustan & gelæde hi on stowe gebeorges leohtes & sibbe þær haligra saula mid blisse & unasecgendlicum wuldre toweardne dom & blisse eadigran æriste geanbidiaðla þu haliga fulluhtere foreþinga for synnum minum ðu þe gearnodest middaneardes hælend fullian þinum handumbeo ðu me milde gescildend & strang fynd mine gesewenlice & ungesewenlice & gewera þæt ne nimon þystru helle ac þæt ic gearnige becuman to ecum wuldre haligra & gecorenra godes getiþigendum drihten þam wyrþscipe & wuldorþu ðe nyþeraworpene uparæst & eadmedum sylst gife & þu ðe geortreowode ongencigest on synnum aslidende gehealdest getiþala þu mildosta fæder ðurh foreþingrædene haligra apostola þinra tyddernysse minre bote & geswicenysse þa na æfter gearnunge minre þe ic bidde ac for mycelan mildheortnysse þinrelæcedomas halwende me forgyf & bena mine þa ic þe unwyrþe tobringe wyrþe þe beon forgif ðæt foreþingiendum þinum samod mid geleaffullum þinum butan murcnunge on geferscipe haligra þinra geferlæcean þu gemedemige þu ðe leofastdrihten hælend þu sealdest anweald þinum untrume gehælan deade aweccean hreoflige afeormian deoflu afyrsian syle me soþe eadmodnysse & geleafan trumne & hæle geþances & lichamanonorþa drihten heortan minre geþancas halige & gelæd to wege sibbe þæt ic hæbbe on drohtnunge rihtwisnesse on ðeawum lare & on eallum angin wisdomes þæt is ege þinneaclænsa gehæl gescild on þisum andwerdan life gelæd to þam ecan life þær mid eallum þinum ic bruce wuldre gesihþe þinre geond woruldala þu haliga se æresta drihtnes wuldorfulla frumsceat halig þu eart wuldorful geond weredu þrowera þu þe come to drihten þurh micele gedrefednessa ehtnesse geþrowud for rihtwisnessebide for earmun & synfullum þu for feondum þinum gebæde þæt ðurh bisna geþyldes eadmonesse þinre ic geearnie frynd lufian on gode & fynd for gode to geferscipe on heofenlicum gesæliglice becumanla ge haligan wurþustan & oþre hira geferan þe strange þurhwunedun on gecampe þrowunge eow ic bidde& halsie foreþingiaþ for me unwyrþum & earmestum þæt ic mage on andweardre worulde andettan soþlice ealle synna mine & soþe dædbote for þam sylfan synnum don eallum dagum lifes minesic halsige þe mildheortusta þæt þurh foreþingrædene & his geferena & ealra haligra þu gemiltsige min & forgif þu me ealle synna mine & gelæd þu to life þam ecan þu þe leofast & rixtastgeþanca & lusta oþþe willena minra þe ic cyþe saru & uneaþnessa gecorena haliga fæder and wisce of muþe welerum atellan ic mihte of hu micelum incundan heortan willan þe bena ic forþsende & mildheortnesse miltse fram gode þe foreþingiendum ic gyrne& þus ðurhwunigende for me foreþingiendum getiþigendum to ecum ic geearnige becuman blissum þær hæl lif & gesæhlþ þurhwunaþ eallum gode gecorenumgod soþre lufe & sibbe þu for hæle cynnes mennisces rode hohinge þe ðoludest & blod ðin for alysednesse ure ut letegetiþa ic bidde mildheortesta fæder þurh foreþingrædena haligra þinra & ealra haligra bena mine gegladod & mildelice onfoh & mildheortnesse þine me earmum forgyfðæt þonne of lichaman utgan þu hatest dæl unrihtwis on me næbbe anweald ac englas þine betwix & gecorene þine gelogien þær leoht þurhwunað & lif rixaþ geond ealle woruldaic halsige eadigosta gecorena foreþinga for me þene þinum & for þysse ealre geferrædene & for eallum under þinum lareowdome winnendum eac & eallum folce cristenumþæt us eallum he sylle sibbe & mildheortnesse & forgyfenesse ealra synna uraic bidde halsa for ðeowan þinum þæt aclænsige heortan mine & muþ fram eallum leahtrum & forgyfe gehealdan ealle þe ðu bebude& halgan stige gehealdan þæne ic to gehealdenne behet ðæt to þære ecan gesælþe geearnige becuman getiþigendumla haliga & eadigostiga hlaford & fæder us sealde mundboran hyrde foreþingiend þæt for us þu foreþinge & us ear mingas gode gesibsumigeac mid þinum gefylst foreþingugum & eac þara liclafa synd hæfede on andweardre stowe geearnunga syndon arwurþude reste ece begitan ic gearnige mid eallum halgumic halsige eow la eadigustan anddetteras & lareowas & ealle eowic bidde & halsige þæt ge gemedmigen foreþingian for me synnigum toforan gesyhþe þæt me forgife gehealdan þa þing þe ge tehton & on eowrum gedo geferscipe on heofenlicum butan ende geblissianon heortan & on muþe & ælcum getruwan ic gyrne fultum þinre foreþingrædene þu haligoste mægden & þrowyestre þu for hæle sawle þire onsceonudest ateorigendlice flæsces gelustfullunge & anne lifes þu begete ealdorðæt mildestre moder on werednesse þu sceawige hæle earmre sawle minre & singalum benum ðu bidde drihten for menifealdum unnytwyrþnessum minre untrumnesse& eallra haligra mædena gefultumgendum gearnungum þam mid þe on heofenum we geearnigen to beon geþeodde þæne & nu mid englum swa hweder swa he færþ geblissigende þu fyligestealle mædena æ wuldorfulle þam vel eow fram gode is gyfen eac swilce on hade tyddrum sige clænnesse halsiað for me unwyrþum & mid eallum synnum besetne þæt þurh eowre þingunga ic gearnige begytan ðæt ic minum gearningum nateshwon mæg begytanhælend ealra drihten ic bidde þæt þurh foreþingunge & geearnunga mædena & ealra haligra þinra þu alyse & beweardige & gescylde on þisse worulde fram ælcum yfele & to life þam ecan gelædeðurh geearnunga ealra haligra þinra & gebedu foreþingunga & ðrowunga mundbyrda þrynnes mildheortuste gehyrþe anne on ðrynnesse þrynenne on annesse ic andytte & ic geeadmede ælmihtigne godgemiltsa min alys bewera geheald & mid gaste ealdorlicum getrymsyle heortan onbryrde & clæne þæt vel seo ðe geseo be þe ðence on þe gelyfe & geriht andgitu mine & geþancas on þinum willan& to þinre on sumne sæl do becuman mildheolrtnesse se on þrynnessegehelpað ic bidde ealle to þara ic earmost & synni mundbyrd ic tofleogescildaþ me ærþam deaþ fornime ærþam yrre tostence hell forswelgela þu eadige moder gehyr gehæl geheald begyt me geleafan rihtne soþelufe fulfremede eadmodnesse clænnesse sidefulnessegehelpaþ ealle halgan & gecorenan godes þæt ðurh eow becuman ic mage to eow geunnendum drihten se þrynen & an rixaþalysend sawla middaneardes alysend eca & undeadlic ic halsige synful þurh þine micelan miltse & mildheortnesse þine & þurh dream gebeda þe ic unwyrþa & synful sang alys sawle mine fram ælcere synneafeorma heortan mine of eallum yfelumgenera fram þeowdome synneaweg ado fram me gewilnunge flæsclice& gelæd to blissum heofenlices wuldres mid eallum halgumealmihtiga goda & rihtwisa & sawla læce mildheortesta scyldig ic andette þe ealle synna mine þe ic worhte on wordum on dædon on geþance & on spræce & on besmitenesse geþances & lichaman & on oðrum unatellendlicum yfelum þa nu me to gemynde ne becumanþu wast ealle asmeagende heortan & æddran þi ic bidde þe ðurh halgan flæscnyminge & þrowunge þinegewyrþe þi mildheortnes þin ofer swa swa ic þence to þe þu leofast mid samodecum fæder on þrynnesse fulfremedre þurh ungeendodedrihten woldend god ælmihtig þu ært þrines an feder on sunu and sunu in feder mid ðæm halgan gastic eam unwyrþe and ungeselig mon hwa gefreolsaþ me of deaþes lichoman þissa synna buton gefe usses drihtnes hælendes cristesælmihtig & milheort go arfæstnesse þine eadmodlice ic bidde þæt me þeowan þinne þe getryulice þeowian þu forgif & þurhwunungnesse gode & gesælige geendunge me forgiuan þu gemedmige & þysne saltere þa on ansyne þinre asang to hæle & to læcedome saule minre & ealra þara hit fremige on ecnesse þæt si besmitenessa smugaþ þa sylfan gefean wundesyllende mægna lac sylle forgyfenessegodcundra wurca digle oncnawan intingan menniscum nis aræfniendlic orþancummid sumre sceawunge sceawaþ oferwrigene se fala þæt ðæt lutian wat gelicianon gemetum on getelum hefum hiscunnan habban his gesealdto ortruwienne ac hi beon gecnyrdlicor to biddenne þi þe getel haligra of getele geiht ærleasraþa while on adligum lichaman life wunaþ swa ðweorum hleahtra hefe gehefedum haligra ærfastness is to gearcygenne gebedagerihtwisiendreto gegripenne lar betwyh gedrefednesse ðreohnessum earfoþlice biþ oncnawenþeowwracanheortan on gedefre beon begyten on reþre þreohnessegenedod forlætan hwilwendlicewehsan na gewilniendeutan halgianfaran tyddress lima middaneardes wanian losian beon ashlidengrædige idelnessa mod hiwe teaþ idelumla whær nu þa anlicnes þinga isla whær sind speda riccra þam gebysgian gehæfte sawla wæs willaþæt getwinne mage habban oxanon crætum gynd byrig land æmtig gewehtum adlig gefærð fotumbat gehwædne astihþ he sylf styrþstede æcerum ne burgum ænigumealle on ende besceowene hreosaþysene cwylde hungre bendum cyle hætan mid þusend gemetum þa earman deaþ gegripþ an mennæghwanan gefeoht grimettaþ ealle hatheortnes awehþ mid wapnum onnhigaþ cyningas cyningum ungerimumwett ungeðwærnesgeendunge lifes gewhylcne behealdan hisþæt oferswiddan woruld þæt on hira þurhwunedan blosmige land stowumtide cuma ic drogebecume rest langsum on gedeorfe sceortumhearde laga þa reþan heortan wenaþ nis soþlice swære manðwæran byrþen rhigge ne na deraþ geswæse þa liþan sweoran iucmid eallum mode god mid ealre strengþe beon gelufad is beboden þeo caru oþer manneshim ænig nele beon na onbelæde ænigum wræce/ gederod na cunne ofgangedæf on gewhædum forbuge healic beon gehæfdgeþyld byð middes eafreond deah feor ge neah byð near nyttraæt þearfe man sceal freonda cunniannafað ænig mann freonda to fealabeforan his freonde biddeþ se þe his wædle mæneþgod ger byþ þonne se hund þam hrefne gyfeðoft on sotigum bylige searowa licgaðhwilum æfter medo menn mæst geþyrsteðæfter leofan menn langað swiðostnu hit ys on swines dome cwæð se ceorl sæt on eoferes hricgene swa þeah treowde þeah þu teala eode cwæþ se þe geseah hægtessan æfter heafde geoeall on muðe þæt on modegemæne sceal maga feohman deþ swa he byþ þonne he mot swa he wilene saga sagan cwæð se geseah hwer fulne healena seoþaneaðe man mæg witan spell & eac secganblind byþ bam eagum se þe breostum ne staratða ne sacað þe ætsamne ne beoðwe deah eall soþ asæd ne eall sar ætwitengyf þu well sprece wyrc æfter swasoþ hit sylf acyþeðearh mæg þæt an þæt he him ondrædene sceal man to ær forht ne to ær fægenforworht mann friþes behofaðselre byþ þæt man hund heona gesece þonne man hund hynþa geþoliene byð þæt fele freond se þe oþrum facn heleðswa cystigran hiwan swa cynnigran gystasgyfena gehwilc under bæc besihþne wat swetes ðanc se þe biteres ne onbyrgeðto nawihte ne hopað se to hame ne higeðeall here byþ hwæt þonne se lateow byþ hwætwide timbreð se þe wegferendun hyreðtiligera hus lencgest standaþmete gæþ on banan handleana forleosaþ se þe hit lyþran deðseo nydþearf feala læreðbetere byþ oft feðre þonne oferfeðrecræfta gehwilc byþ cealde forgoldenciggendra gehwilc wile þæt hine man gehereweard seteð se þe wæccendum wereðne sceall se for horse murnan se þe wile heort ofærnanswa fulre fæt swa hit mann sceal fægror beranne mæg man muþ fulne melewes habban & eac fyr blawanwide ne biþ wel cwæþ se þe gehyrde on helle hrimanage þe se þe æfter cige cwæþ se þe geseah hungor of tune faranhwan gelpeð se þe wide siþaðher godes swyðra forbead abrahame þæt he his sunu ne ofsloge swa him beboden wæs ac funde him anne ram gode to geoffrigenneher ðas fif kynegas bereafodon loth æt his æhtonher abraham ferde æfter ðam kynegon ðe loth bereafodonher abraham gewunnenum sige ferde ongean mid lothe his mægeher abraham geaf ðam kincge melchisedech ða teoðunga of ðam ðingon ðe he gewunnen hæfde and se melchisedech wæs ægðer ge kincg ge godes sacerdher æteowdon ðry englas abrahame on ðam dene ðe mambre wæs hatenher prudentius hine gebitt on namanher se geleafa fiht ongean ða deofolgyldher se geleafa æfter gewunnenum sige gewuldorbeagað ða mihtaher seo clænnys fiht ongean ða galnysseher seo clænnys wyrpð þa galnysse mid staneher seo clænnys ðurhðyð þa galnysse mid swurdeher seo clænnys ðreað þa adwescedan galnysseher seo clænnys aðwoh hyre swurd on ðære ea iordaneher seo clænnys behyt hyre swurd on ðam templeher þæt geðyld stent unforht betweonan ðara leahtra trumanher þæt yrre slihð þæt geðyld mid his spereher þæt yrre ðreað þæt geðyldher þæt yrre scyt his spere ongean þæt geðyldher synd ða wæpna tobrocene ðe þæt yrre scet ongean þæt geðyldher slihð þæt yrre þæt geðyldher wæs ðæs yrres swurd tobrocen in ðæs geðyldes heafdeher þæt yrre ofslihð hit sylf mid his swurde beforan ðam geðyldeher þæt geðyld ðreað þæt deade yrreher þæt geðyld mid iobe ðam halgan ðurhferde ðara leahtra trumanher þæt geðyld sprecð to iobeher þæt geðyld oferswiððum leahtrum sprecð to ðam mihtonher seo modinys rit into þæt folc on ungemidlodon horseher seo modinys rither seo modinys on horse ðywð þæt folc ac seo eadmodnys and se hiht standað unforhteher seo modinys wyle offeallan ða eadmodnysse and ðone hihther seo modinys fealð on ðone seaðher seo eadmodnys gebysmrað þa licgendan modinysseher seo modinys lið and se hiht byt his swurd ðære eadmodnysseher seo eadmodnys heawð of ðære modinysse heafodher seo eadmodnys byt ðan hihte ðære modinysse heafodher se hiht ðreað þa adwæscedan modinysseher seo eadmodnys astihð to heofonan ðam oðrum mihtum wundrigendumher seo galnys sit on hyre gebeorscipeher seo galnys arn to gefeohte ða heo ða byman gehyrdeher þæt folc wundrað hu seo galnys færð on hyre cræteher seo galnys bepæcð ða mihta mid hyre geswæsnyssumher þæt folc lede his wæpna and filide ðære galnysseeal þæt gaderunge mid gewende tacen to ðe galnesse forher sy syfernesse ðam folce mid worde geðreaðher seo seofernysse bereð cristes rode ongean ðeas galnesses cræteher seo syfernesse werpð ða galnesse mid staneher seo galnese tytrode hir cyn on hire sylfreher se iytsereher hi sufher abraham bysene onstealde geleaffullum þa he wolde his agen bearn acwellan swa him seo stefen bead of heofonumher þa fif cyningas mit huðe læddan loth gebundenneher abram æfter þæreher abram oferwunnenum feondum onfeng loth and mid sige gehwearfher abram his teoþan sceattas offrede and melchisedec offrede habrahe hlaf and win melchisedec wæs cyningc and mæssepreost þæs hean godesher seo gleawnes heo gebither se goda geleafa ærest ongean þæt deofolgyld winðher se geleafa ofertret þæt deofolgyldher se geleafa æfter þam sige cynehelmode þa mægnuher seo clænnes mid wæpnum winð ongean þa fulnesseher seo clænnes þa fulnesse mid flinte torfaðher nesher seo clænnes þa fulnesse ofercumene þreaðseo halige clænnes þæt sweord feormaðseo clænnes hyre sweord under þam weofode on þam temple hyther werodeher þæt yrre þæt geþyld mid þam sceafte slihðher þæt yrre þæt geþyld stent þreaðher þæt yrre hys spere scotað ongean þæt geðyldher þa wæp/ weorða to cene þe þæt yrre sende ongean þæt geðyldþæt yrre þæt geðyld mid sweorde slohsweord þæs yrres tobrocen wearð on heafde þæs geðyldesher þæt yrre hit sylf mid flane ofstangþæt geðyld oferswiðende þæt yrre dead hit þreadeþæt geðyld mid iobe on middeweardum werode forþæt geðyld wið iob spræcþæt geðyld ofercumenum leahtrum to þam mægnum spræcseo ofermodnes on heape ungemidledum horse fleahher seo ofermodnes radseo ofermodnes on horse þywde þæt folc seo eaðmodnes and hopa unfor/ daðseo ofermodnes stellan wile ofer eaðmodnesse and þone hopanher seo ofermodnes feol þæt heo on þone fulan seað lægseo eaðmodnes hloh þære ofermodignesse fyllesse hopa aræhte sweord þære eaðmodnesseseo eaðmodnes of acearf heafod þære ofermodignesseseo eaðmodnes heafod þære ofermodignesse aræhte þam hopanoferwunnenre þære ofermodignesse se hopa heo þreadeseo eaðmodnes astah on heofon and þa mægnu wundredon hyreseo galnes æt hyre æfengereordum sittseo galnes gehyrendum byman to þam gefeohte arnþære galnesse wundredon weras on þam cræteseo galnes swæsum wordum þa mægnu beswacher weras aworpenum wæpnum fylgedon þære galnesseeal werod gehwyrfedum tacnum to þære biswicenesse foronher seo syfernes þreade þæt werod cweðende þæt hit ne fyligde þære galnesseseo syfernes drihtnes rode brohte ongean þære galnesse cræteseo syfernes mid stane wearp þa galnesse on þone muð þæt heo fleah þæt heo lægseo syfernes þreade þa galnesse ofercumeneher þara cymbala stow aworpen wæsseo lufu þære grædignesse cocor and bogan and flan forlet fleondese woruldwela his frætewunga aweorpende fleahseo gelustfullung gewundedum fotum þurh þa þornas fleahseo syfernes and oðre mægnu forhæfdon heo fram herereafeher seo gytsung hyre gold betweoh þa wæterædran rætseo gytsung hyre reaf on þære wynstran sidan scyltmicel leahtra menigeo seo gytsung sweartre meolce fether seo gytsung manega ofertret and oðre blinde dwelian læther seo gytsung þonne heo ænigne godne ongit mid stræle heo þonne stician wileher seo gytsung manega bescyfð on fyrher seo gytsung gehiwod wæs weorðlice on gegyrelanher seo gytsung leas spel sægde þam folceher seo gytsung wrað þa þe heo ær leas spel sægdeher þam mægnu tweonedon be þære gytsunge þæt hio fullice hio ne oncnewonher seo rumgifolnes winð ongean þa gytsunge and hyre reaf hio þearfum behether seo gytsung wundrede hyre geteorodnesseher seo rumgyfolnes þa gytsunge wraðher seo rumgyfolnes þa gytsunge mid cneowum and mid fotum hio ofertrædher seo rumgyfolnes reaf þære gytsunge þearfum dældeseo rumgyfolnes mid gefean to þam folce spæcher seo gesibsumnes com and fleah se ege and þæt geswinc and seo strengðher þa byman swigedon and þa sweord on hiora sceaðum behydde wæronher þa mægnu þære æwfæstnesse blissiað þæs gewunnenan sigesher seo geþwærnes het beran þa guðfanan in on ða ceastreþis is þæt hleoðrigende folc ridende and eac fotum gangendeher þa mægnu in on þa burh gangaðher seo ungeðwærnes dygollice wundode þa geðwærnesseher seo ungeðwærnes þa mægnu syrwde and gehæfteher se geleafa þara mægna wið þæt werod specðse geleafa and seo lufu mæton þone stede hwær hio drihtnes tempel ræran woldanher is drihtnes templþis is þæt hus þær se wisdom on innan sither seo gleawnes deð gode þancse wuldorfulla witudlice cristes gefultumigendre gyfe engliscra & oþra þeoda wiðinnan embhwyrft brittisces iglandes wunigendra cincg æðelboren fram ongimendre hys cyldhades ylde þeah þe swa swa seo gewunaþ yld myslicum bruce ðeawum & swa þeah gesyhþe mid godcundre æthrinen abbude sumon geornfullum mynegiendum & cynelicne rihtes geleafan weg geswuteligendum ongann mærlice god ondrædan lufian & wurþianscinendum litlun l æthwega geleafan spearcan ydelnysse mid slæwðe adiligud acwunce mid hwylcum haligra worca gearnungum on hatne fullfremednysse wylm beon onæled he mihte geornfullice asmeagian carfull he ongannafundenum gewislice þæt þa halgan mynstru on myslicum hys cynerices stowum tororene & fornean drihtnes ures hælendes cristes þeowdom forlætene gymeleaslice ættredon drihtnes onbryrd mid gyfe mid micelre modes blisse efstende æighwar stowa gerysenlice geendstalude & ut adræfdum gymeleasra preosta fylþum na þæt an munecas ac eac mynecyna eac fæderum & moddrum gesettum to godes þeowdome æghwar geond swa mycele hys rices rymþe estfullice he gesette & mid godum eallum gegodiendum bliþe he gewelegudecynelicre witudlice gebrocen þenunge swa swa hyrda hyrde carfull fram reaflum ortrywra geaglum swylce gynigendum wulfa gomum l hracum þa sceap þe drihtnes forgyfendre gyfe geornfull he gegaderude bewerigende he generude & his gemæccean mynecyna mynsterclusan swa unearges mid gewunan hyrdes heo bewerude swyþe wærlice he bebead þæt witudlice wæpnmann wæpnmann wifmann wifmannum buton ænigre wenan twynunge geheolperegullicre witudlice haliges fæder rihtincge wyrþlice onfangenre ge abbudas swyþe manega ge eac abbutissan mid him underþeoddum gebroþra & swystra geferscypum halgena fylian fotswaþu mid anum geleafan na swa þeah mid anum þeawes gewunan to geflites mid mycelre hygdan geblissungemid þylcum witudlice & þus mycelum bigendge þes foresæda cyncg mærlice gegladud diglu gehwylce mid geornfulre care smeagende synoþlice gemot æt wintanceastre beon gedemde & þar word mynegyendlice & gesibsume on bocfelle hluttorlice awritenne swyþe eadmod he asende & ealle cristes onbryrd mid gyfe he mynegude þæt hi efenþwære mid gelicum þeawas gewunan halige & acos geefenlæcende fædras regullice bebodu mid fæstum geþances ancran gehealdende nate hwon twyiccende ungeþwærudon þæt na ungelic & mislic anes regules & anes eþeles gewuna bysmorlice tale haligre drohtnunga ongebrohteðyses heahyldestan cyncges mid smeagre mynegunge gastlice onbryrde na þæt an bisceopas ac eac swylce abbudas & abbutissan þæt swylcne & swa micelne hi geearnudon habban lareow upp astrehtum to roderum handum ormæte heahsittendum þancas willfægene gereccean hy na yldonwitud sona hys hæsum mid ealre modes smeaunge bliþelice hyrsumigende & haliges ealdres ures lara mid þam þæne eadigan mynian he higde þæt na þæt an romaniscra ac eac swilce frenciscra wyrþlice cyrcena gewunan niwre engla cyrcean gewlitegende he gesette wyrþigende togeclipedum floriscum monecum þæs eadigan & eac þæs healican mynstres þæt brymum ys genemned naman munecum æghwylce of wyrðum hyra þeawum wurþfulle gegadriende swa swa beon hunigcamb teares mid mislicum felda blostmum on anre hyfe swa þas þeawa gewunan to lifes wyrþnysse & regulicre gehealtsumnesse werednesse þæt fram þam þe weg cynelicne beboda drihtnes buton gylpes leahtre mealcliþe nu gyt eadmodlice stæppað ut anyddre snoffan æmylnysse buton ceorunge æwlice drence beon abyrged mid lufwendum & grædige mid luflicre hi mihton beon gefyllede estfulnesse gemetlice mid mycelum & fremfullum gesceades todale cristes middaneardes hælendes gefultumigendre gyfe on þysse gehwædan gesetton becþæt na witudlice syndrige gif hi hyra þæt na gewyrþe fyndele on hyra wisan þristfulle gecuran þæne mærustan halige hyrsumnysse wæstm sumre wyþerwyrdnesse wrytan on unnet beswicene earmlice forleton & oððe neah ma þænne munecas oþþe menn wæron geþuhte æwlice behat drihtne urium hælendum criste anmode hy beheton & mid wedde gastlicum hi gefæstnudan hi life gesiþan geoce regules underþeodde þas amearcudan þeawa gewunan mid gemænelicre openlice healdan drohtnungeoþer æghwylc on diglum gebedhuses stowum on swa micelum swa haliges gastes gyfe mildelice ontiht synderlypum gewitan gode mid godra weorca wæccean rædlice bruce gebedumþæt to soþan se æþela þyses eþeles ærcebisceop mid forewitigum þurhblawen gaste to getrymmenne þæs foresædan sinoþlicre gegaderunge gemot gleawlice & wislice togehihte þæt gewislice nænig muneca oððe æniges heahran hades wer oþþe neoþeran diglu mynecyna dyrstig ingan farendra geþristlæhtegif hi weorc habban gecnucedre tabulan yldra fylst ærest clypige godcundne secgende þriwa gebroþru þæt sylfe andswarigendum && se sona of asceacenum slæpe bidde forgyfenesse mid cneowunge & gegripenum þam leohtfæt abutan fare ge he þæne chor & gif he ænigne þuss geradum adle slæpes gewæhtne fint do þam swa eac him gedon wæs & hwyrfe ongean on stowe hys4 gif ænige yldran gewitendum belifan se æftra abbud swa þæs haligan gastes gyfu ongebrincþ na þam magon flæsclicum oððe ricum weoruldlicum æfter ðæs ærran dihte dælende ac neodum gebroþra & þearfena helpende sciftende mid gebroþra geþeahte wislice dihte wenan arwur nyss geþancge on bilewytnyse ure tida we nea wependlice toppas ic wene sopp cumen gesceorene loccad ealle bliðe reþe pylewer bolstor ræc lage gesettlan hwettstan bordclað warpan oðð þiss beþence þe no ofersceadewad sona lange æxe cumb geseowade heaweð gnudda sustro lyre forwyrd pæti þyrne fil di medewyrt næp tunsing gru hels held per argen stre hors hind mucg weald gar buc wæter spyr þi vel dag sy tu wiþsacan ic no mæi no ac swican ic wille heononforþ nimaþ & swa eow bet bryce gaf br do sticce ard fram cycene estmet we fæs here herto etan drin unswyðe he unwren butan tyrninga stunte raca sacful awerpeð unðanc ci sy gefyrn ær blede nea cif rum cy þig bicgað swype man æfri if swa hit æfre gelim ine þa neras ec gearwitelum luf sylflicre lu gelaðedre styrtear abrerdnysse gemanadgetiht forne forfeþ se toforlætenbefæst ce geswysnysse æswæpe fyrmþa feormunga licamlicere gælse forspennenc wiþsacende wiþsacen ingehede clænre camphade þancwurþre gleawnysse forgencgaforstæppend sicetungum hloccetunge sicci ceorigum murcnungum toblawene be are ancwælgnysse of frecenfulre forliþennysse & onhnigendre reþes stormeshreoþ yste betwux sandhriccan geswelge swyliendes eadwindan þeh þe æthware tobrettum gehealdenum frecennysse swa micele leas heofunga onwunian mid dropum stormum wætan wlotta smyttena wyrdingum awlætte syndran speccan vel blæccan gefylede swa micle ma mid dæwigum wylsprince dreori fihten ne geswicaþ swa hi gemunaþ stiþnysse tocwedene forþi vel fylþe ran swelgestran mid emfare forbugþ heafodlicra lehtra vel healic vel cynelicere to wealdenne & riciter to geteon tweogendliceretwununge þrydungeemhidinysse spillendra mid gesiþum emhlenned wiþersacena emset seaþhellegrut tintegre hreosendlic frumscapene niwes neorxna wanges tilia ealre eorðcundre gesceafte þæt tyrnincg befehemhæfð smærumm lippum & mid grædigum vel on geswelge seo upcundra engla cestregewarene gemanan godcundlicre bescawunge dælnimendnysse hu micle swiþerma gehwædeste heo be gestreonum toblawen toþint clænnesse of senderlicere hlisan herewurd underfeh bure cempum egislic ættrigeia diofla mid slitendumterendum toþreomum & gehwilce wæpenlease halsberga targa unscridde grilice tosliten mid strangum mægnum gastlicere weapnunge hisenum barsperum þioxum fromlicesprinlice eargra cempana on þeawegewunan byman truþhornes earhliceniþlice þam hreþestum feondum tudenarda randbeaum we ne gearciengeþeoden campdomes we wæpenboren & cempan geinseigled deorsterlice wiþerwinnena budendeongean berende wiglice tol þa a mecehiltinc & unoferwinnendlice cerclicere racegerecenysse þa iunges cildhades emhedighohful he wæs gefrefred for femhadlicum ingehede larlicre bigengre fæmnlices hy synden gerehte wuldurbege of unc of rædelse beon undergiten þisum gecneordnyssum rihtlic gife þære ytemiste hlytesdales getincnysse on foresprece beladiendlicre se bremeste campadonisce scir cappadoniscre scire gelice tingcum larum bisne edlæcendum cartena gewrita befrinungum smeaiungum mid gewrixere stafana swiðe swutelice openlice gleawnysse forþ ateahgesette acende weox vel of spæce rædels reccendes bannendra maþeliendra on gemotstowe rædelse unilicum hade swilce agenum hadumnamum brucað hade ablicgedum hlystendum & nitendum hlosnerum bemiþendem beþenda fordette þinc swuteliaþ mid foresæda wordlian sidefulnysse orceasnysse to geearnienne ræddre anhwealhnysse mihte wrænsan weld þeftan awolfigewoffie mid mihtun geþræstgehæft mænlicere mid leofre ferrædene he togeþeode feorhbanana sulhandla syla sædere felh ear cornbærum eglum earum þanen forþ mi gendflowendum wæterum edlæcendum fealde gilman dyncgum þonne þreowthwile breorht gedrihtu todæledum ateoredum la hu ne gewidmærsede fulfremedlicor anfealdre fram leasum aþume bepechtumne geypt ealdorlicere wæs gewæht forþam furþer geþread leasuhta bepæcunge to ascunelicum andsætum meltrestrumhuse dryra drira iugulera scinlacgedwelde æfgælþaidelnysse wem bewarede fyrenum adum vel hryseles gehwædummedemlicum wuldrað stricum wogere geþinþe adræfen unlibwyrhta wiccecræft scinlaca galdra hiwung litig hiwungegedwimore scinlac hiwodanliccetan swa swa gewitende smyc forscran ic acwince heo wæs tolesedtoslopen se galdras iugelera is gereht geþeoddum searaþancum swicdoma feallum to werlicum gemanan þære wiþerwurdra ut adræfende ic ayte swa eallunge vel haligere on circlicere halsunge gehealgod gecristnad acennendlicere of innoþe on fuluhtbæþe gelaðod wære iugulere searecræftorþanscipes forsawe heofenlicra unærh geflitful wiþersace ac eac swilce heo ne geswac tintregena pinungum staleþunga sandig strand ceoslum hider & þider tealtriendumgliddriendum arærde getimbrunge swaswa þæne þe spæc þam strenste stane healle heo onsette hreawum slegum þollanthollam smeruwe on swilcere pinunge þæt iunqe forbærnd þam eadmodum & þam abrerdum gehelpende he gemilseþ ofþrihte þæt is acweinte onsigendum be hwerescyteles utsiþe forsiðe piniendum bebodum neadiendum galdre getyddumgegodedun biscopdomes gebyldum þurhhaliges blodes reinysse readnysse heo readede of boclicum stafum clysyncg þeawas fifwintre swiganstilnysse stærleornera leornera wordsnoterum gehalsed wogere of æþelum acynnedum geberdum gebeded mæran æswepa befyled sot blæc of scoc wiþsoc modorlicum wunungebosme fælerde wæne incniht gligman forspillendra þena getwinnum heo lices gecampes gewin na wiflice fexa loccum efensunge wunde clænnysse insegle mercelse geanlæht ealre gehændnyscneores hiredlicre þenrædene gehyþe hywcuþ carfulnys nid gesæligum ferlicugesælicum gelimpum gidenan cweddunge cwyddiaþ mid unalyfendlicum pricelsum ic onþydde onþidden hogede swa geisnedum beladiendlicre ware wiðþyddende astyntende leasere wrohte arwan gafelucas atogene wæran gescotene ongeanscætongean hwyrfde swa æghwæþra gesælinyssum gewyrdelice emne geemnetyn geþæslæcan upplic gyt togeanes awægde teona hospe þæne forþilþildiaþ gemæte geliclicgewrixl on lande nedþearflic þæt ge onhyriendras forsawendres þæs ilcan mædenlicere geþinþe geferrædene gesiþum gecyþlæhð cyþlæce foghere þæt he gewilnede gesenscipes grypan adelseaþes syle wine forhradad beweddede he befengc glitiniendum wimple goldgerefe fægernysse unrihthæmedes forligenes hus laþ unclænnys woffode nebwlatful scrættena æwiscnes wæs belisnadforlegen to æwisclicum to æwisclicum ungerisne ungerisne bismer gebyrda glitiendre webbum feondlicere gehealdenre brynum antend he ineode fule bismerunga wemmincge gewemmyngce ofersprecelum þæt he budeonbelædde graman rædlice ceac gefurede gelogede repian unirisnysse gebyrdafreonda æalderlicnessa þa unalefdan gemana scæwugcge þus geraddere buian & gehertan geholedum rindum flugulum renum & widgillum flihtum gewrixla ælelendiscne ut adræfedna heriea yroda to ælþyodinessa eðhelde ic byfryne ongederedes fæhades & gewilsuman þyowedte werede þætigene þe oferþyo ealle ysta sanda stymendes swæcces wortgemanc breð forlætenre synderlicnessa middengeatlicre werednesse genihsumre wenne gelustfullunge on belæd geþyoddra ful swutol gebycnunc wunað onbesmitenes fæhadlicum hamæn gewælgedr þæted ne sy afered þyoda & geswitliende swa winsumlice geplatod corn fylminum swetnesse þearle onwidmetenlice forðeon anfealte onsmeðre netwearnes stið sleandre slecge forhogot freatorht þa etemestan wæle fortþerty ahweruedum siþæte to gemagum gefeocte begripat geetstaþoliat geedwuicede gewin þe a cwelmbere gewemmincce ettre niwum geburum swau sy etwescet se wælreuw netdre & acneres of heolestrum fereldum & diglum ut adræfet feþa graduum besencedum & forðresmedon þruh þa is gehiwot wereda gastlice þe hiwedon forwordes frecces deaðes tenbebodes getremincgum gehlette landgemæres mægþ gecyneornessa ecum rictum to ægenne hirtcynihttes ðongene cmpa þes angetelen on læmenum fæte fæcne gewæh þeslicum gewyrde gaual hlydan halidome blowende hilces dihtende þere stiþestan þus geradum þætince fule horewes æddrum endum race cyseles þa tostrydd gebricu gebede ambyriendum yrlicere retnessa blac ende gesuntfulnessa æaldere blodigum handum & styrne hetelnessa unteworpanlice twi ne ah camplicere mihte giftlicum wedde ægiwern boca hlise singalre ac æmhidinessæ æhþrot is wisdom boca be ge gesette wid wedende widtlæste swa swa gedwolan ofþe gemyndlæs pannan tyhtnesse hipsfulre gebismugce aswæarted lyffeterum æt þam gylde æt þæm wegelætan oþðe æhyðum swynenan & æt sceaplican & æt fearlc caæpena færelde hunfealde for arwe swiðost hunfealdum æfestre beona to wanienne gewilsume nedendre ealdordom arwerðnesse bilifena swecces to gemanescipe anweald manna unwiðmetenlice mid arwurðnesse æfwerdlan swiðost unahladenum toforen onhergende cleðan frecces hersumie hissas gewundað metlice wæþere ðeh gesette þa manfullan blod witelice þes ytemeste domes toscades wæge þus & te cyrme þus clangetug geswelgum witehuses geþyodde sitþan to  gemene  bære  gewin  weredum  færlicu  gelimpum gecyndelic sæd þræs cempa asoden win awyrd win i lindan hyste & grut & edwindan smittena syndran gewlætte fyhtan wlætta hran on gewinne on spilra smærum edwindan fram recede of þam þystorfullon diglum medwyrhtena nebsealfe is for vel scale wo hyllceas drycræftas iulstrie i mearciserne cistmelum of his gydde s felch of gifre frecinesse branda on cioslegom i mundboran ealuclyfum forbodenne edcyr & geredde hals crypel þæne nateþeshwon þolode fram swa fyrnfullum lahgtrumgyltum rudu lela fece & to unhlisan gyd swa beardleasum rince sceawendrum on wauungstowe bydena swefles flane i gewyldum gehihte heueldum wæron wulode worsm scortlice æwisnes fram æghwær onbutan wi bora sylen andelbære tide tanas lencte for silwil ceoslas fetels stilre forewere aegþer ge and rand þeow mund bene swa burhwista wande gehwidum þege scræuf dome funde enlea fæcn scerenum fyra swurde wyscendlicne scota swifte ryna swætu ypplenu
