orþancscipe sweg wri mearcerum ascyledum ealdwriterum remmingce wæs gelengced toþenednyssum wrædes þeos yldfulle letting behaten gewrit hlecen tocinen bat earma rowette late gleawnysse upcundum helpe segelgyrdena mæsta swylce betwyx stanhricgum munt gruttes stæfleahtres swelgend rapum scylpige elleohtes torres emleohtes edwinde stæfcræftigera gymene bescufende racum gewyr gewyrda hefies flyhtas ær þece fealewum colre awyrþ gewyrdinesse geendebyrd gleawnesse spræce geswet win fram hluttrum wine bleohga anlic læfrum under fultum tealtrian mandæda heres hyrwendlic wigsteal aberede nacudwraxleres eogra reðnesse bremendlicum  mægðrædena  bosmigum  of æðyllicum  emhæfd oððe emhlæned  plihtere  & dynegendum  nowendes  hamure  asoden win  awyrd wyn  i lindan  uplicum andgite  acenned  doh  womlustas  and bereafiendre  yste  and grut swelgendes  syndran  atrume  gewlætte  wætan  wlættan  on gewinne  onspillendra  se frumsceapena  niwes oððe  smærum gifrum  edwindan  reðum  & geæt toðreomum  brædnes  eofursputum  saxonice geðrece  synt ge  mid  mana  ætegare  heah  hi sint onbrirde  gesomnunge  of wade  wolcreadun wurman oþþe wealhbasu  ungelicum wurman  i petalum læver  gimrodur  selran  byþ bedæled  nebsealve  linum  gery  dihta  wæs  rædelse  of tole  bre  cnosle  tytdriendum  ahsiende  & ryn  beorhtruma  synt  seg  wytuma  on fyðer to  stanrocca ceoslas  staninclu  of sanegum ceoslum  deaðe  slawyrm  bifigiende  bisceopdomas  ðenne  i gemagum  lastðwerdas  laga  iu  and of ilpenre  iuht midlum  geleafhlystendra  wyccena  bereafigende  fram wealwyrhtan  wæs  kaertena  gedryhtu  swa swa sæd  mærum  hlisum  ærðam  hunggrigre gneðelicnesse  gyfre frecennesse oððe wasende  fram  branda  on upspric on sænegum  on ceoselbærum sandum  antswara  gyddes  laðes  inbroht  bletsunge  smyltum belimpum  mundboran  of geswegum  dreme  geswegre  dremes  & cneoresse  æfter steorwiglunge  mægcuþre sybbe  i smerwe  wole  fæcne  & swa ðrogum  lime  crypel  facnu ðolude  mihtigne  overdryvene  ðone hio gewede  of ðron  æfðancan  digle  to hiredlicum gesetum  wiglum  ðæslic  of tolum  & eall adla  stærblinde  witestenges  eorðgemet  terdnysse  liðnysse  brydleoðes  forspa  gyddenlic  templicre æfgælðe  unfæle  samlinga  scincræfte  ðam fulestum  & eal  anginnum  on frymðyldre  sprindne  of rammum  læla  swa swa beardleasum rince  æfgælðe  bydena  swefles  hefeldum  galiende  ðrotbollan  genihðe  bereavedon  cnotmælum & be sumund&le  æwisce  ham  of hnilan  of spinle & gespunnen  cwyldsene  i oððe ahwedere oferðæt oððe  on spelde  wiobora  i gyve  i sylen  i andelbærre tide  gecyrnlude  tanas  on lænctyn  croppum  of wra  i ciclum  tacor  late  i atol  i tearte  bugintð  buruhleod  speldum  oððe regole  i myltesterne  ðæt gænigfyldon  i ac forweornnedon  of cynnegum  gecnytne  ne ne anhylde  galdras  sprytte  he geteohode  bocfellum  wiste  i andluman  cytelas  i hweras  cocorpannan  gesmittad  heah  unclænre  i anginnum  oretstowe  i tune  edniwan  gores  & stanc  wode  swican  sceapa  i mædre  witcwyð  þeodisse  an  i gydde  wæuelse  on solre  wahrefte  monaþ fulne  & galnysse  i stincge  ge & wlatude  sceamleaste  ofermetto  nunnena  on hirede  for þam anum  i ornatu glenge  þam twinen  heafodsmæl  i handstocu  i gestefnode  syn emblærg  foreloccas  þunwange na  i loccas  wymplum  oþancleow  i to side  won  spyrrince  tale  andigean  i ænlype  wyswyrdan  clusan  gerimcræft  eorðgemet  soncræft  tungelæ  tungelgescead  & orðanscip  gescead  yldinge  letting  baldlice  mestum  gewyrda  let  colgendre  asolcennesse  gewrit  gewyrdelicnesse  reamwin  wine  sandhri smittena frecum cat byldam gif i scale acen li tac mid onbyrgedum i utaidan uel latode egores wiglum on hrofe i mearca locu i locu hylum gyfte i estsona i dome i ridendum is i on on is crætum beardlease meder sete cypan hathert bile gif bed rude teng scleag ende gemang hwee hefe cole stemde scel forligrum dægrim ausum æger scriddum reade leoman dreamum lufwyndre sage mæclican anten galre sinccetuncge ides digle fer for e burh cy ny seaþas slang ste ofrian mece weo pyfte gast i dine æt i for vel ofeten i felga tælanuituperare soles i ides i ides ðeodend slæuð cylcende cwudu for sweglhorn orum stanflorum sceoc frecnesse gifre pælas mæsþum dih felga witnode breg swyp godes hlynnum c selas dwolma hyrtinge næ ut adrifende tem unwemme lad ðeawas bysmergle landleode ða bræc men aðum onhyscan ge ða i cospa cosp i migeðan æthran grywe i wræd þa witnedan æfterbora i bydena ceacan spinle i huru croppas cicelum i sanda wylie i galgan handlian wode healfcwice gemyscan wom bæl i oretfelda foresettan i ides þyder his þened sanda dyne spedig aþumb dema i ides lyttan geyp spanan i moras rypeð ður i for vel ofæte i laga æwiscu egesgrimana getæl bi swa puca gebyrstum risiendum stemendre readum gewiðelode rosbeddum rot hefonwealdend to geare fyrrsum warum hrime felaæte enta westernes windes mush angeltwicce rensnægl byrdlingc tordes scernwibba snædelðearmum mid geglencdum þrewelspinle gemæstra swina rysele þonne hig gemæstað bectreow swanas xenhyrdas mid hlænnesse wann þurhsyne scirre flæð befehð grundleas seað clyne sinew hwyrflede ðoð seoloken toppa to þynnum ic eom tobrædd sæfiscehrane gnæhð ciwþ handwyrme scimerað brodað dustswerme oðð mote mælscaua feða wallendre hæteswoloðan ferscre ic hwearwlie wlite laðlic benæmed i lim i limes dæl hi geþoht of swa beoð i webb sint finnum cinum unsmeþust ic gyrre mid haswre hwoðrunge gecyrnode cambas suderborene þwancgas hyda assirisce ican ic þy hindergenga geryflodre unsoðe feðriað geþuf þu tyrninge wa cnosle cynnes clyþan gearwe wegan goldwyrt hwearft asigan wambe undeð staðum kene ge wole fylle mugan wo dennfereldu ceuwð syfeda ða swe to aset hit wunað upli hel næssas wælwyrt on hit on circe forsceop ða wif þet hi of þem æspringum gewiton in sæ & wurdon to hundum scilla ðet is sæhund gecweden ge tunsinwyrt brunba weolcscille reocende suðernes on gewalcudum of wolcspinle sinewea swa seolcen ðræd mote ða hondweorm þy ohelde ling iu swa ne bit hige monan storg untodælendlice gesibb uithlaes wægbraða fyf leaue attercoppen hænnewol neddærwert nedderwert ðeueles clufðunge swylas clufðunge clufwert mucgwyrt cyrnlu on gewealde docce clyðe feldwyrt swinewert smerewyrt wærgbredan tuncerse cerse swilas nebcorn handsar bamfarri uel glofweart cleure tobresed hegðornes leaf harhune liðasar geþind teter foxesfot cwiðan sigilhwerue flewsan mader humele humele halswert cneholen haranhyge æðelferðincwert hindheleðe fleawert hennevole eouorðrote dolghrune brocminte cammoc sperewert eorðnaflan sundcorn eorðiuig organe giðcorn merce dile synfulle eorðnauala in uolla caul wude nædderwyrt fleo wert medrum unforoted boþe gorst banwert pumerole heselwert læcewyrt suðerne wude banecce fresnele uel mædwert sprincwert wildewise to sunnandæge monan dæge to tiwersdæge to wodnesdæge to þunres dæge to frige dæge to sæters dæ ferliþon strina swutulud hwilcum gemete sy eallunga þu ræde heo þæt þu gemune þu habbe efste toscades þu dwola worhta þis be talu boccysta weorcfulran cygaþ hy belimpþ þam brucon swutulnesse unþæslic þæt sy fangen þæslic furþan ne boden vel ungehefegude oþþe swæðelyne heane to behofe sace of fered wedle lifed blace stormas suþan suþan west sof re swug steng gþen unfligge bære n dw waru leng luce niþer f ð fost neb to stih understanden brod g grip stafc he lyre soð vel welung lam tog i miht spreot sweorsaga of ongrynt oððe ongratað swing i posa incoþa hracasnofol on healfne mile x mila westrihte togenes wealig leaxe ond hele sealas hron & hualas & reades & beswes & hæwes & grenes hæwmængedes hiowes ðurh ða eastdælas agnodan mid micle brime gesecende ðæte seldan orlete heorata cnearrum monnes ðeoes greate arasad adaeglad gislum in were biteh tu fen forefengnisse ðaet wealigoste to rennianne in onwalde to delende in deað in ða gescildnisse resunge mid searacræfte gemynd onhyrgan mid to ðaem herne aet ðaem wi mid willan ond frecednissum heran wereged ferelde þi hradost gefera mid ða gedæfenestan afæd emnesse fore ðæm gesettan megwlite fegernesse utgange heahre mægene bringan hogde ðorhtogene compe etende swutol gafol byf efstende mislimpes frumne wete gescrepe nyd generede of ðeare ripan milse ðes ungeweran sua hit g under ater wes aðilgad ongin wyfcinde reetnesse liðe on unwær werganne ðam gebrece butan tweon tosomne becomon brime hleafas wiþerdynum singalum forþatyddrede ungewune næs na ieldrum his foregengena ræd in onwald hyd wited suæ suæ þara ufen maenden of getæle beon adilgade wepnedmonnes ond ðy sadele nifte wægn ic deema ðæs hæðelan weres to ðæm liðe wæs demede cunnadan warde baema hrofa magata utlæden genixsume hemsald eaðelnesse mere onwece myðels unwerig wynsum æðelran gehugde æðelra leason gemalice nyðernesse bel ðes beel gewelgade berdan on ise f suole scire cunnonga westenselte westenlicum aldermen in mere wraslicra ðeghen cura frinomon gemearce arasede munstra in rehtnes yfilicum spyrede folc niosian willum growines hreodes oneardan bisene geðafede afeded bocland gesette maanlice gehewenre feohtende soocne foresprec sprecende wes suut east hero anwilnesse cueðan to ðem doman asuorben wiste hic ne ablinno domas sprecundum hatum gemote neeðnesse timbran aanfalde hæra his geferan gonende medmicel gerece wyod lafe rendwricon hire dæle gehæpie galdermonnum gelaðadne papan ealonde forðon in ðem lond ferde aldermon to gefeccenne weende erende legetscer ðunur fæste mode eorðbendes suearm gesomnede ðoncful ðes hetenan hæmid unclænes to hæmds wrixlade gesoden ðolade we atuccedan ðrug folme heawende fingra pylwere afylde onhyrgan fæstenne wongum wæsmum gelærednisse brædu liðran tuegan sæs ofer ðone muðan wæs lidene bismitnisse faðu ðy lide suile wete reehtan ðy bibode husul foregewis ongeotan oferleorde hardran gelomp his gefremenisse forecumeme ascrifenum ða heahan ge ða lessan in oferwesnesse wefendum hera hadas slægene awogan aidladon lyfesne to his bibode ond mid ungelærednisse wican ond mid anfaldan trumnisse folde eðre frofre firð ægum geðoftan gofata wreethende uneðelice leomo wreethende gebetende gebetende wyrta beðenum to nsiðenne gelehag wæ gelered ne ða geroðor tolene ðy gebrece ða aðundnan ða gesyngan first mid bearwum medmiclum ond hreofle ond scyrf bi ðære cyne ond flod suiðe stiðe æ in hellenbogan ðolian truma ic wæs onfunden deaðes ond bradne læde men flitan tyrf ðynre ðuman ic wæs ednew ic spau hincan ðære hafudpannan mid ðy liiflican se fæst wælreaf aldormen wallas fyr læfde ða luttran ðone scinendan leoman glideð ðæs edcuican rifnisse of ðæm yfemestan brimas geðeodlic onwalda ðes alga a grecisce segde ða lutran stigende gehyyðum sylh stige norð fresan gerefan weran onmunenne firstmearce ðæs seaðes ic sceawede mid rece speowende ful nerwad tongan aweht ondweg alæd blætesunge growinra blostmana gesomnunge blætesunge demende fræce ða wetan ond ða caldan reðran ðy læs heo hine abetigen unmætre ond hin heapunga ofermistede oððe ænge ðing se ærista ungewis wallum medmicle walle scræf bineðan sume ðrage seonewald onefn on ða suðeasthalfe ðæra tola wyngeardum elebeum storm aldorbu gesmeðedre yflicran noht feor stofn geweorces fegernisse feðende ongeat eames ripnisse westerne wind fyrhtu reade golde frecennessum monigheoulice bochus ngean norðestroder swa sunnan upgang bið to middan sumera suðeast swa sunne on wintra up gæð stede greðe credic pylu helme mundboran i of werdstowum wanhaledan unfælum wena manful ænetlif orhlite & he gewerþ gescyrte deoflicum gastum forbead gemanan eorðlicum æccere wyrpendlicum stanum ac mihte æcer ðince eles þænne friþode cytancot gecuemre ontihte mailroscisum weredes belaf deopðanculum muþe geþafodegetiþode forðstop forþi begitenon hrofe þeah þe geboden forþaurnenum ymbrene heahfexende leoman piohta onwinnedum scotta oroþode on tyriscum he recþ getacnigendum hearplicum slege ferode hu oft fornumene wædliende þurh westena fleah ogha æfwyrdan ic hicge piohta gedemed na wel mænie fleowon reþe cwale bodude geweordenne æfwerd geseah gemæne onihude brucende helme hrurulne tolysedum onacennendum lytlan & lytlan sare wicum ceastrum geswæslæhtum gehide gegrinu welan hangað stede þa þa eft & hi begetan & togeihte þæt þrymwealden rice onbu pæht ascæþ oþþe tobryt fram þam frymþelican blosme sar forþgewitenre tide þon bileofan bodaþ hreohnes framaþ amearcode neadgild agilde þæt he weorni færcumen hæl adreah aspende & trymede & onsette under ceoriendum lofe of besceauegum nihtlices forwened alegenre hreohnesse hearplicum fence wæron geyte swylce healices ne scean swa ic gemunde gecwemne wiþufan mundboran þæt adlies ofnes mundboran gemanan heafodhrægel alætene underwriþode mergenlice agifan þere ærran æmtodbedæled gliteniendum efenlæcaþ gewegde engliscan norþeasternes windes forþbroht þreatas cynedomas hu wæs ateli geswelle fuliende sæ cyrm gecynde under scada i coppe i on ðære i weard weardude fleon on fæþme healf gemyn stif on ofre hu steþþi he sy gefaran þone heahhelman leoman docincel se anbleu genummen æmælnessa þer þer weste swynsiendum ogan uphafnum þa þurhunrotan win hu atelicum geswelle efen fereden ohealde nu ic geseh wod sæ beþunge gestepde he framcyrde þa hy bræddan þrydægþyrne i cyrm arod gecynde under scada inbyrdlingas vel dennum gecynde hearplicum i slege þar upber neb coppe sef strengum heahþungum gedrefum ongean geyrnende & inferlæt gedrymum cyrmum swegum on þære weard weardude fleon on fæþme healf gemyn getyrged & synt wundrude læl swælende i onsecgende efen sæ vel unfælum ænetlif gewiton swiþre weornnodon gestrangudum sinum nu sæ cyrm gecynde under scada coppe on ðære weart weardude fleon on fæþme healf gemyn stif læl swælende of geþungenysse of werede hæf gehelpan na tælende festena þæt hi beheton fram sice waccran seouene geornfulnysse leoht cwyð eom for þi for gebetendnysse to fyrstan synt gelætene dendra widgenge þæt ac we sind & on rep nfulnesse witel bedfelt heafd bolstel sceat is worpen gefiðeradra and bereafiað swa reafiað bodað hi clepað and gewilniað and hatiað efne nu ic forð brenge forðam ic geceide ic hlihe ðonne swæið onbricþ onscunede and hio teldan and he brecð atogenum ege nih ðe farende and ealne godna siðfet ðurh ðriostrie weogas ða geblissiað on werstum ðingum unhlisie sio hnescað hire meiðhades siðfatu ne forleton ðinre hraca and ne getrua ðu and gewit þinum nafelan and leccinc of gesundfulnesse þine winwringan and genihsumiað ne awearp ðu ne ðu ne atiara þonne þu bist ðread and gelicað swelhð and ne magon bion wiðmetene þe hefð gestaðelade up abrycan of deauwe ne aflowan and ne etspernð ne forta ðu of ferlican ogan ðet ðu ne sio gripen forbiodon gif ðu meht and ðu self tela do ne sege ðu to morgen ne þenðu ne flit ðu on idel ne ðu ne onhere ne ðu ne geefenlæc æl bismeriend his wordlunc myra and gestrion gegrip ðu bist gewuldrad eacan myrlic cynehelm ne gelustfulla ðu and forlet and ne bið gegripen buton hi beswican hi etað hlest ne gewitan lif ðara forðam forð gewit fram astere ðinum brewum and sin gestaðelade wat forhwerfede he deð þet ðu and ge scinendre twiicce niðer and farað woriende and unasperiendlic and ne gewit ðu ne sele ðu and ðu giomras for hwe onscunede ic and ne geðafede ic ra fornion werede of ðinum seaðe sint gereahte and todel ðu ane ðin edra and geblissa ðinre giogeðe eala ðu liofeste hind and gecwemest hindcealf ginddrencað and gelustfulla for hwi eart ðu beswicen and ðu bist gestrangad and he besceawað gegripað and he bið gewriðen of and he bið beswicen gif ðu behete ðu afesnadest ðu eart gegrinad and geheft hrure irnn ne hneppian si ðu ut alened hind hireres to emet n lateau ne bodiend hit gerewað on sumere gehwede hneppast ðu on arets swa wiferend and ermð swa gewepned wer nusleac ðweran gebeacnað he trepeð tionan feringa and he bið forbret lecedom and onscunoð up ahafene saarwiende forð brengende leasa gewitnesse ðane unðwernesse gewrið and uton ymbsele ðinre hraca hi faran and fram swesere tungan uton cumenre ge ðe les ðu sio gegripen hiora onwaldum forlegese uneaðe ðet ne byrnan his fotwelme swa ne bið ðonne ethrinð anfunden unrihthemere ermðe folnesse and ne bið adilegad forðam ne arað ne hio ne geþafoð eniges benum manega giofa and behed swa sion ða werede ðurh crepelas ic ge gionne dysine færð on forsworcenan geæfenedan deige ongen arn hlud and widscriðel na megende wunian hio searwað gegripen and hio cyst gemagnum andwlitan and hio sweslecð onsegednesse ic scolde ic ageald and ic gemete ic wef gemetum tepedum ic giondstreide cum of udrum and wuton brucon ge oððet onliohte ðam lengestan wig sæc hio nam les monan hio e te swesendum and hio teah and swa plegende lamp and nat þet togen oððet afestnige his lifere oððe swa efst fugel be frecednesse þet hit s don ne sio atogen ne þu ne sio beswicen gehwilce stongeste hire farende on ða inran on ðam forðtege ic and ongiotað be mestum ðingum siont ondone ðet hio bodian min hraca and onsc að ne forhwerfed eallum dior all gewilnienlic bion wiðmeten gelereddum geðancum and ic betw eam u e esse twispecne muð and ic onscunige scepttenras gescadað bebiodað rica ofermode prede and diorweorðum stane and mine ciðas ðet ic geweolegie and ic gefelle ahte on fruman enig ðinc er ðon ðe he dede ic eam geendebyrd of ealdum and er ðan ðe gewurde ne ða get weron grundas geeacnad ne ða get up brecon ahefegum hefe ne ða get asette weron is wes geeacnad and hearran ða he gegearwade ic etwes emhferte ða he gestrangade roderas wæi þet hi ne oferferdan wei ealle geglengende and ic wes gelusfullad plegende et minum gatum and begemð stuðe minre dure and he hlet dereð dan hio forcearf hio offrede hiore ansegednesse hio gemende to burge and to wealle forletað telend se ðe ðreað cynð wam sele intigan and si geaht bioð bismeriend ðu byrst and hlud on forspanegum eallunga hio sit ofer setol ge and ferende hio siðfate gedwolenum ðiofende weteru and wensure and hio nat and hiora gebiorscipes ne fromiað ne geswenð and he gehwerf wedle worhte aslacad hand ra weolan gegearwað se ðe hret oferwrihð and forrotað bið swungen getrioulice se ðe gesweotelað se ðe gebeacnað bið swungen edra and ontenð bið se ðe wedlat to gehealdene na wana bið of ne geferlecð bið sald eced ne bið astered eacnað and forweorð anmitta wiht tiona gerecð biswic berefat hreosþ and bioð gribene dum ymbhedigra lecetere beswicð biodh alesede of on forspillednesse swigað facenlice diohla getriowe bediolað gelt bit geswenced warat orsorh gefol wif welhriou magos aweorpð unstaðolfest weorc sawondum efterfelgnic gelden trendel fe anbidinc todeleð agene weliogarn and bioð se ðe drin bit drucen hwetes bið wereged cypendra speriend bið ahriosð growende leaf ah ðiowað ce ne bið gestrangad and ne bið astered forrotadnes medeme ðinc se ðe det acyrað of his lare bit ancwawen modleas openað wat his netena se ðe werð getremminc fremet forflioh bið and bid golden forberet leti wat wegð facenful gewita se behet and bið witnod ra geþiod ðe onginnað geðeaht belipmð of leti mon bediolað trifetum gafel and he bið siðfet beswicð facenful gestrion welise unbesceawad wercendra onscunoð and he bið gescend he is bioð gereahte geonet sped bið gewanad litlum and litlum þe bið geeld geswenð cumede gewilung enigum ðince gewrið drohtnat swelgend letig deð untenð boda and netenes ðam se ðe forlet se ðe geðafeð gif hio bið gefelled gelusfullað onscuniað ðe flioð and he bið geworden felð and bið golden and neofan and bid gehealden on dengum and bioð gesamnode se ðe areð anredlice lerð unaseðendlic timbrunga fram ðam on unhlisum wige manega ecyras facynful cyðere ra eðre bepæcð wunað growað endas bið letig werð letig wær hatol se ðe forsiohð dwoliað gegearwiað ficol i pretti on gehwednese is begemed bana se ðe hespð hespð his wertan hine up ahefð hnesce andswore heard spec stunra wapolað besceawiað ungemetegead tirhð wærra bið and gedrefednes tosawað ungelic forletendum ðe ðreað ne he ne geð gegladað on gnornunga modes bið aworpen and bið fed of ungleaunesse swa singal gebiorscipe and unaseðenlic to wertum ðonne to fettum stiorce awehte haga buto otspernince and forsioð sin tostente sint on cwide selest ofer geleredne fegerest se ðe felð god hlisa amest ra wunað forsioð se ðe geðafeð agend and forð gewit punderngeo elc upahafenes is alesed and he bið aheld þonne liciað gedihnað pund mas wilung ne dwolað cynesetl bið and gegladað smelt hagol ta b gelered gemet bit genemned mare onfehð and to geecð geglengede bana genet and birð forhwerfed saca werdi and toscereð secet areahtum slitende fulfremet werðnes bit gemet is mode burga ac hio bioð gemetgode drege bite onsegednessum hersumað and hersumað hespð eldra ne glenget glengede wegende welere gim gecwemest anbidincges bediolað freondscipas gehyðlæct toscereð gesibbade fremet byrene oðbrodenum hwelpum getriowende and forlet and bið afandan hafet ðwerre hiortan se ðe cyrð and befelð on his netenesse ac ne blissað blowende elde on geledan ne slean se ðe gemetegað gelered diores gast bið geteald gif he gewelt intigan afadodlic ðu ðe drohniað forhegeð eðienðe burne on gemengað of sacum twispeces inran and toslacad tostencendes strengest irnð stran and weorðne uðerwreoðað his untrumnesse to iorsienne ra gefe tobræt fec wrehten his selfes smeað wiðercwidas ofðrect hlet and tosced ðe is gefultumad scetelas mid halsungum stiðlice lufwendlic wer ðreagende hred on welð his mod to geæcað ðæ habbað bioð toscerede and ne aflið weorðiað of todelendes earmne monnon ðer to eacan fior and gewiton se ðe felð ne riseð ne wealdan forgeman i forbugon gremetunc werta his glednes driopende hrof sacful wif sint sealde senderlice glea wif sleuþ oððe scleacnes mamor asclacad and hinrað bið cwelmed lenð ne his gewricl ne georwen ðu to his cwale henðo ðonne he gegrip and to geset on ðinum endum beðearfende mon and hio wunað buton niosunga metestum ne he ne geþiod geswungen gif ðu dreast ungewis and ungeselig ne ablin ðu teld and forswelð gerewe sint telerum and sleande slicc maðeli swa grimetung se toscereð fram flitum herian he wedlat bioð ge wiðeftan on his begemene and sio ðu beccen ðonne he gewit and hit and diorrest fet borhhond wunade of griosne and sint gestrangade to smyagenne to ðam ðe hit efts wes ðolað hefe forswelgan efter behate and gebegð ða orð bið ra ra harnes lela adreið on deohlum todal he aweget and hio oðsperð telað dan ðuer wig hi gewitnodum cwilde ðenð þet he ut atio se fordett et and ne bið gehered behed lac mestan ebylhð ferht se ðe gedweleð on weorede wunað wiste fetto ne bið geweolegad ðonne mid secfullan wife gewilniendlic goldhord tostencð strangere strenð and up ahafen ofsleað and gegernð and ne ablinð ðe bioð brohte leas gewitnes sum sige geaplice afestnað gerecð hors is gegearwad werhta letig and is geswenced of henðe on dreorum wige bicwide iunges ðonne he ealdað bebiot to borge lened of and he bið fornumen arod he ut aweorpð and utgeð and beoð beswicene of to ofslanne diop seað on ahreasð is gegederad and bið afligð þet he geæce weolegrum and he wedlað ra to gesete hio ðriofeealdlice trumnesse ðam strenðe ne forbrec ðu and ofsticoð hathort were ðe les ðu liornie ðe afestniað borhhande for geltum hwonon agelts ðu ðinga his nime oferbredels ne oferstepe ðu ealde gemero settan beforan eðelborenum scær ne gewilnadi of þet ðu sio geweolugad gemet ne ðu up ne arer wærde ne et ðu dreas wiccan for ðam ðe he wenð þet hi nat ðu ðine fegeran specce ne ðu ne ethrin in ga mygð in ga ation gif ðu slehst of he and du alest edran ne onherie þin anbidinc oferætum þa bregað ge hearpan ðe bioð fornume bið rest bege nað ceið sie nie neare pyt unuuere agotenes ðam drunendum calice glitenat scinð blio hit lufwedlice slawerm togiot þ swefed ic gemete dehtnunge bið ongunnen h bið is teled gif ðu georwenst aslidenum þe sion ledde þe sin togene megene ne gehelpaþ weard wegð r þane searw þ reafa ge mid telendum gegearawa and bega þet ðu getimbrige gæl of netelan litel witodlice gehwæde lithwon ðu on asets swa renel and þerflicnes ða rehton bedeahlian smegan hom þonne þet ðu sio geniðerad ne ep ðu gebetan ðe les ðu ne meige ðonne ðu gearweorðas and ne onwrih ðu and he ne ablinð æppel gylden earspinl bið geliðgod gar forrotad toð and forlet wefels lioð gleda huses ðanne mid flitgeornan wife and gewemmed weteredre bið ofðreced open burh geweldan ungerisenu hwider forð broht on enine and bridel fegere scacan swa si oncenned windruncynes endað swigan ðe geedlecð wildior swe forhwerfed bið on hiore hyrran under his oxne cwidas anfunden plegende abrodenum gedwilde and gerestað desiges to incundum swil gif ðu wille lemen fet ðindendende weleras geferlehte ðonne he underðiod se ðe werð se ðe welt twisprece atewð herie stan byrdenmete hefegre asterede acuman tret misselicum sweccum and bið geweorðleht forðelgiað leras þe behet driopende hrofas flitgeor sint wiðmetene wind swa se ðe helt is scerped and scerpð se ðe helt swa swa scinað behealdenra unaseðenlic is blawen on smiððan ðeh ðu þercce swa berecorn ðerccedum georlice ac is seald geheige sint gegaderade nenegum ehtende is gegearwod i wesan oþþe eteras geheapað and of frilicum gestrione flio ahriosð forlet angað gelpð awecþ beðearf erða ne felhð nimþ forleose befelt forð on ongen coman ðreal he arærð estas witedom estelice fram cnihthade fet forðloten bið up ahafen wuniendum and ic cuðe wastu ðe nasðu ferentarga ne geæcðu and ðu sio ðread and ðu sio gemet ne forwern ðu minre anlifene ðe les ic sio forspanen to wiðsacenne and ic stele and ic swerige ne ðu ne wrei of his cintoðum lyces bren bryn unaseðenlice genoh is se ðe hyspð and se ðe forsiohð eacnunga up adelfað earfoðu eallunga nedran on giohðhade dregende hatol on gesinscipe lyssan wisran emetan ða gearwiað haran unstran se ðe gestaðelað his den and ut geð ðurh heapas hryremus he geð on hofum gað ne stepð ram and se ðe ateauð seoððan he hup ahafen bið up i heah ut to ationne ofðrecð swetelað se ðe melcð and ut atiohð and forð gelet twirednesse eala ðu min gecorena enig deahle and hio wendan bior grnorniendum sares and ne sint gemunene and ðinc ðe gewitað toscad wullai cypan huðe hiore gehusan and andlifene and hi bohte to strenran spinle of twifealdum gebliod reaf of twine reaf eðelboren scetan gerdels and hio hlihð ðu oferstope þem ascadendum ascoben afeoll berende dolgsuaþhe forsceta on geheplicnissum gemyndelic þa gingan eletriow granodeasten hordern from milcum adoen onhrernisse quemde on saltne mersc sliet smolt regn suþrador tinde bogan in wedr on welgum min wrecscype grimmeþ ablysien he acyrde þæt he acyrde hi acyrdon acyrrendum adunestigaþ æbylgnesse æbylgnis æbylgnisse on æfenne þu geblissast æfter menigo æhta ælc gemetinc ælce þa ælfremedan ælfremedra æryndrican ætrene þa beoð begalene he afyrde age þu ageald ageot ageot ut flane ageotaþ on agrafenum anlicnessum hy ahofon ahyld uel afyl ahyldon ahyldon se alædeð altras se alyseð of þu ameredest on an anæl ligræscas anælede of fyre & adolfenre andetten andwalde heo andwyrde him on wege mægenes his on angnisse hy anhyredon anhyrnede on anmittum anmod anmode of ansyne he anydde he anydde þu anyddest he arærð aris arise on asædnessum of ascununga asendeð asete þu asettest he aspende astigaþ asyndriende awendednis awest awriþe awurtwalude awyrp awyrtwalað he aþenede aþeniende þone ic behæfde on bearme beheald beheald hy beheoldon na behylt behylt bogan on bellum beluc ic ne beo onscunod beon astyred beoð afyrrede beoð gesceapene beoð getrymede beoð herede beoð todræfed we besencton betuyh cy þu bewruge þa bilewittan biþ na bið astyred na biþ gemunen bið gereht bleow blewþ blisse blissiað blissiaþ blissie blissunga beorgas beoð ymgyrde blosma æceres bodiaþ hi bodiað on bogan þweorne borhgiend breadru brohte burnan on suðdæle fram byrþenum bysmredon on bytole byð geæbylged on cafertunum cealf geong uel neowe cedera cederbeam cederbeamas ceocan cnihtas cuma ic cwæþ of cweade arærende cwed uel meox cwyð he cwyð þæt þu cyddest hy cyþan cyþað on denum deopnes dondes drencende on drige land drincaþ drupon eahslum edlean on edleanunga ege & fyrhto eodon on drium ic eom biddende eorre eouor þæt he eteð of fætnysse hwætes fættiað endas hy fandedon faraþ fareð feawoste on felda fell of feondum feor þu feredest feþera under feþerum flana fram flane fleondre flewþ hy fliton on flode ic forbær ic hit forbere witodlice on forcirringe fordonra he fordyde fordytt forecynrene foresette foretacn forgnad þu forgnide forgnidene forgnidene & ne þu ne forhafa he forhygde he na forhygde forswelge forswelgeð fortrædon ne forwan forwandung þæt hi forwurþon swa forwyrþen forþgecigaþ oð forðgewite forþon hy tyrgdon forþon on gesihðe hy ofþrihton forþrystrede fræt fremede geworden fremedne frofr frofr frox frumsceattas frumsceattas on frymðe gange ganotes geahlas geandetten on gearyne gearo gebiddeþ gebiged gebundene gebundenra ne gecig þu gecir gecweme he gecyrde gecyþ gedafenre gedrefede on gedrefednyssum gedrenctest on gefægenunga gefeogað gefeogiað on gefere gefiþerede gefylstan to gegearwunga his oþ to æfenne geglengde gegrip gegripe gegripennis gegyred gehat gehlystaþ gehwædnesse gehwearf gehyrnisse minre gehyþelicre þu geic gelast geleccende gelicat gemenifyld cneorissa fram gemetinge on gemetinge gemicliað ic gemiclice gemiclod gemiclode hu gemiclode hu gemiclode gemiclunga gemiclunge gemolten gemun þu drihten dauidis he gemunde he gemyltet gemyndige genihtsumnisse of genihtsumnisse hwætes on genihtsumnysse genihþsumere of genihðsumnysse geniwa & na genyrwe geogaþ ic gereht wæs geriseð gescamien gescamien & wandien of gesceafte þinre gescyldend on gescyldnesse on gesomnunga goda þæt he gesomodlæcð gestreon fram gestreone gangendum geswinc of geswince geteld þara eorlicra getreowe getrymed oþþe getrymed wære getrymede getrymede geweliggian gewistfullien ne gewit þu gewitende gewuldorbeagað geþoht geþoht þinne gif witodlice gleawlice gligbeam on gligbeame & wynwerede on gode gremedon hi gristbitoton grund grund grundas grundas of grunde of grundum hæbbendum hæftned hælend hælo on hagule haligern halignesse haligre halsunga handfulla þa þe hatedon of hatiendum heahnesse fram heahnesse on heahnessum on heahnessum of heahnysse se heahsta þu heahsta þæs heahstan heahstne þu settest frofr þinne on heannisse in fidelium congregatione hefige hefigmode heofanas heofona heononforð & oþ on woruld heora on woruld heorras heriað hiw þu hiwodest hlyte hi hnescodon hoh hospes hrede uel nere hreohnisse hricc hricg se hrinð fram hryre & deofle suþernum hu lange demað ge hundene hundes fleoge huntgendra hwa acymð hwa acymþ hwelc seceð hwelpa hy hwetton hwylce dæge þu hyrfeweardast þæt na hyspen hyspendra þone hyspton idel hælo se ilca selfa ilum on incleofum ic inga hi ingaþ on þa neoþeran inran is on kafertunum la hu oft hy gremedon he lædde he lædde lænþ ne lata þu lease cristene lease cristene lugon mægena on mægþum hu mænigfealdlice þæs mæran on mere mærum on mærþum medemnesse þinre medmiclu & miclu fram medmiclum mode & hreohnisse menigo þu metsast micelnesse on middele on midlene ceastra on midline mihtige of mægene miltsiende on muþan nædran nædran nædran neahgeburum niwe plantunga hy nyston þa nyþerlican on ofearmunga þæt hi na ofergaþ ofergytan oferwin onwinnende þe oferwinnað he ofsloh ælcne frumcennendne fram ofþriccednysse ogana fram onarisendum onbryrde onbyrgað þæt ic na onclyfie oneardiað oneardiað on þam ongalendra onhruron onsægnessa geswetlehta onsanda þurh ærendracan hy onscunedon on onwealdum orgeldreame pæl palmtwig bloweþ on rædnysse ran on rapincle todales reafiað renge rice acworren riceter rihsodon rihtwis rihtwise gerist samodhering rihtwisum soþes rotnys rynelas sæmust uel wyrst on saltere & harpan he sceadewede scep of scylde scylfas scype scyrseax scearp sealm sealm on sealmglige sealmleoð & hearpsweg secgaþ on sefan sege he sent gicelstan setlgang se sett genip upstige settende sien ofðystred sien todræfed singaþ singaþ of frymþe monþes of byman slidornis spræc spricð staþolfæstnesse sticelas stige æfter þam stincendum storm on storme þu stredest suþerne wind suþerne wind swa micclum swa tostent eastdæl fram westdæle swegdon on swege þæs swencendan ne swiga þu swindeþ sy mid sybbe þæt sylþ deus leofum his slæp syn gecyrred syn gecyrrede underbæclinc synne hyrendra syrwiað tealgras þu telest ic temprede on teonan geþyldgendum þu tobræce tobræd hi tobræddon tobricð tocnaweð todihtnodon togenealæcð togesete tosetteþ he toslat he tostredeþ trendel trymede on trymnesse twigu tyn strenga hy tyndon on tynstrengedum saltere tyrging tyring þa uferan of þam uferum on ungefarenum on ungefarenum & on wæterigum of ungewisse unrihtu unspedigne upahefe upahefð upstige utgang dægeredes on utgange uton forspillan on utrynas utrynas wætera wædlan wæstm wæterædrena his ware on fyrytte weal wealles hy wehton hy wehton ofer wer weras bloda & facenfulle na healfe getillað ofer westdæl wilsume witodlice he wiðceoseð he wiðcist wiþercwedolnisse wiðercwedulnisse on wiþercwedulnisse wiþerweardum wopene wreccan he wunaþ on wylegan on wyndreame wyndreames mid wynsumnesse fram wyrcendum wyrmas yhte on ylde genyhtsumre ymbgerenode ysta on þa yttran yþa yþgunga þa þæslice þæsþe is on þam þa þa se man on wurþmynte wæs he hyt ne understod ac wæs wiþmeten stuntum nytenum & him gelic geworden þegnas þeos sæ micel & rum þonne þu færst þonne þu utgæst he þreade þusend þusenda fram swiðran þy læs æfre þu ætspurne for þysse is on gehþu god ðu adrife us & tobrece þe geriseð lofsang god on sion & folc min lageeweæ mine god helo minre & gyþ æx & heafodburg ameal aþ nænig þu hit sege hit fyrþ & hlydende menio ham hla heo oferwrigen þæt ne beo geopenad snore swegre her wade seo feþan awæ witum to ge þa siþon seofon siþon worhte hwylce þære hæl þæne ge wiþcuron ofer þæne þe he gefylþ mæstling to wege ongun mynet hwilces wif biþ heo heora wrædas mic þa forman hlinunga þa yldstan on ceap gnæt disc cwylda ic mid gemete facne wurþe þe hi hwene þæt hi mihton he lo þa ymhwerfte & aruata on hamstealle oþ in þe synd agen weorpene ear slegum of þeowenum wiþsacan gequeman wæran hwæm ac ne gewit of þissum næs naman þa þa he hine sune maran wæran wendan magan sear hefgityme dile cume to cepienne comm agenre sawan we cuman to sumum swahwilcne foþ þreatas to wirþe þænnu hine forþge nabbaþ twam twam hund wendan unclænum leahtredon unclæn man midde gemæru unrihtan him sillene gegrap hi of þæm est gemunan hold meru biþ þætte se ahongen him of þyss þeodcynnes wine aræfnaþ ge com on his cseþe & gegearwede ðas to hwon gewilnigen we wære þu to þyssum & þes wæs hine þætte cyðan morgentide se brhte to us ongen bohtan gewyrde gewunode mærne mon ic wæs farende getriwe hysptan oþere & þyssum mearcigende weardean waciaþ & tosomne geaderigend gehæplic we læraþ & orsorge & gewidmerde sume onginnende syndan sægdan wæs from þæm æfylgendum of endebyrdnesse þu btsta of gewricsle gongende onsædnesse sete þære onbærnes beforan gongeþ incful dribenis buta intigu holun giseandi ingancnum aehtande mærnæ fromadæ ræglæ intingan racæ ten sænan tuane hwet eþre frem hur sigore witan hwilwend scinhwe steppaþ witena weorþiaþ guþgerne wiþsace ne wastu enegum gele togelþe þu wi earfoþlice unednessum unriht is gearawiaþ uþe besuiceþ gunnan mægþe he ne weneþ onsun wes forþfære agen gescir & slaw mid westme feran & gegearw lerdon þes temples rif & orsorgen gesema & cyþan openli þa openedon fulne lor biswic hwelpeþ forþon geara is we geanlici ne bel oft gebritie þes heah wis gefomnunga & tocyrdan leahtredon lome weorþi git bedyhlan onsac beho & asah beclypte onleow gewune fac redan londbegen & þu ne gimest ge beoþ swungene æghwilces weorces feringe min nedþearf bist afyr eft & geleaflice leaslice ongeane on hu fela þingum se þe mid flite gecweman sumne swahwilc gefeng hine niþerdon belehycge geboht ongefeol heowigum þohton þinga ungelefe gum æþm upscinende þæt wære towri þæs tow gecyndelim biþ wiþcweden lareowa sariende brehmhwile becnoden beorscip bewrog gewistfulli gedyhtedum in ceopstoue bi gemænsumnissæ riclicum waclicum unhlisfull witan ne ne gedeð æhte mid ðam he bewerige synd geferude forirnest rymet on ansyne misbret & na begit ætbret derð dælð gewilnað behat to ascienne þa ansundum elles gehwæðrum geswe lung þæt þu wilt sum oððe getelade ungeðwæred gefegud næfð geðuhte on oðrum steordalce forðon ne beginð begitan angin oferstigað farendlic þær ne belife ongean lið fulfremedlic he ne ætbret genydde anweal wælhreow gif bið mid gemanan geðoledum abisegan & geungeþwær wisdomes þus bið gestiðod gefadunge gehende þon he forðbrengð syldsyne gegæderude gegæderung gefealden on gefandunge gefilð faran afæstnað nanre gesamnunge tælle newan geræddan gehwæde gefæste eriende unforþoht unbeþoht geþwærnes geancumendum geþwæreð afæstnian fæstnunge cyst felnessum eacnunge felnes betweoh felnesse felnes inggehid wiðme gewilnest arærað segelgerd rinde on fyld werð genipen to tobredenne on geblawan wealcehdes ðu bewæpnast þe ge  þet þersib gebiddan for ure feder þu eart in heofenum se is gehalgad þin noma to cyme þin rice sie willa þin swe in heofenum & on eorþan  hlaf ur deghweamlice sele us to deg  & forgef us scylda ussa swe & us forgef scylde ure  & nu is in læde in costunge ales us from yfele  petrus cweþ ic gelefu on god feder almahtigne andre cweþ on hælende crit sunu his on ancendan drihten ur iocobus se geecnad wes se halga gast & mariam þere fæmnan  cweð iohennas cweð philippus cweð bartholomeus cweð tomas cweð matheus cweð iacobus cweð simon tatheus mathias gebletsad þu eart se me no segon þa gelefdon  god almahtig & drihten ur hælend christus & se halga gast gehald me on dege on næhte lichoman & saule her & þer hwer on ecnisse weoruld  bletsa me drihten & gehald me eteaw þem drihten his onsiene me & gemildsige me  gecer drihten ondwlite his to me & sele me sibbe & hælo swi swe  myclaþ mine saule drihten & gefihð min gast in gode þinre halwendan forþon gelocaþ eaðmodnisse his megden  sihþe soþlice of þissum eadige me cweoðað alle cneorissa forþon dyde me micel þu mæhtig eart & halig his noman & his mildheortnisse from cynne in cyn ondreddende hine  dyde mæhtige on his earme tostencð oferhydge mode his heorte  he asette ða mæhtiggan of setle & up hof þa eadmodan  þa hyngriendan gefylleð mid godum & þa weolan forlet idelhende  he onfeong israhel his cniht wes gemyndig wes his mildheortnisse swe he wes sprecende to urum fædrum habrame & his sede in weorulde  gebletsung drihten god forþon sæde & dyde alesnisse he gefylde & he us up rerde horn hælo us in huse dauiðes his cnihtes swe he wes sprecende þurh muþ his haligra witgena witgena his þa þe from weoruld  & lesseþ us from urum feondum & from hodum allra ðe us feodon to dege to donne mildheortnisse mid urum federum & gemunan his halig cyðnisse ðonne swergendan að þe he swor to habrahame urum feder beon us sellende þet butan ege of hondum ure feonda gefreode ðeowende him in halignisse & rehtwisnisse beforan him alle dagas ure  & þu cniht bist gecged he witga geceged þu forgonges soþlice ær onseone drihtnes gearwien his weg to sellenne wisdom hælo gefyð hio in heara synna forletnisse þorh innoþas mildheortnisse uses drihtnes on þæm he usic neosade ufan cumende hænisse inlehtan þissum þa þe sittaþ in ðeostrum scuan sittaþ to gereccenne ure fet in sibbe wege  bletsiat alle werc drihtnes drihtne hergiat & ofer up hebbað hine in weorulde  bletsiat angela drihtnes drihtne heregaþ & ofer up hebbaþ hine in weorulde  bletsiat heofenas drihtne hergaþ & ofer up hebbaþ hine in weoruld  bletsiat weter þa þe ofer heofenas sint drihtne hergaþ & ofer up hebbaþ hine in weoruld  bletsiat alle megne  bletsiat sunan & monan drihtne heregiaþ & ofer  þet os alle ic gecege o on minne fultum  geb mid allum  sele me drihten þines eges heortan  alle soþlice  all  be þæm towea þa ianuarius se mona biþ onæled et middre neht februarius se mona biþ onæled biþ on betwih middre niht & honccrede martius biþ onæled et honccrede a ædig weoruld  wryxle gesælþ for misdede medeme spendig for þat iuelspreces tæl weregat se idele spendig inoget glidet gitsinge wiþerwarde þam lise sumwilce þinc forsceaw þu þas limpes lihtere widerward niþerlæten cueme mid gehærede gelimp wat genealeh filge þu þu s þe læs þe þu lice cara leoþ fremfulle þing wlipse solcenesse slauþe on þam is geboren seocet sleuþe carum unniding þes wedlaces þes beþrid gefanded des timbret gret forspilet ateret geestæþelet spar hire emne arfastnesse mahlinges ne greme deriat underfoð wedliat fremfulle þine geþaf brice unwar habben hælen utfaret þancfullic strenful smea þu gewislice wuniet sea alre earest athealt fordemetlice forgiuen mare beon swiþe strange strencþes wisige gif þu mid gelimpe to secenne of þinum weorcum begitenum gitseres on þam gewilcum ealde forsceaw þu stillice naþelæs þeh þe haue underfangen limpes forhoien coþes cunnen lust clæne beclip þu niderlætene stille mid gelimpe depere þam þu on ungelimpe murchnian gif gelimpat werpinge forlæten limpe ster þu þær of fordeme þu wedlaces þancfulre on wicen underga spill wicen þam ondredde þan þu bicgest brices hu rædlic inting fordfaret æt vii beltidum gemelte dmælum forhogien agimeleasien ilding geþoftsc eorðe bocland suling ordel bocland foraþ tuxl cinban mæri grin þurhbeorht fram þysre worulde ascyredasyndrod tin bil wec hiwan bytel sul scær þeh he beo swiðe gebeden gerim be mæislæhte and broðerslælte tuiccat wregendro min sar me benet to segen and min unrihtwisnesse me ðræð þæt ic swige sar me for ædi soðlice ðe him silue i cline pice clyne dyre i sunbogan arwan locu writiende æsceue weornodon hwol þe liþewacum sigeas fræte hasgrumelum hlyþan scriccettan bile foremere þohte fæcne þa fore gedonan facenful þuhte fangen wigheapum yrnende deorc hebban facenfulle hlowende fennegan hopu dy hynðo fo & swa gfor swiþ asend loc or þus witleas hlo æthrinan est hwyrf oþer gewittigre forescea behet curon sticel glau fyr gear cwæþ se forma monandæg forwenednes spiwdrenc segelgyrdum burgrunan hamme fornesta ne nyddan wanunge hula hunc rap dolh byt ceac fæþelas ne geblinað wilniað mid wriðum to bebeodene olecendum bene bliðe olehtiend cild ðurh liðe beðinge forþacende gecynde ðreað in þære ðurh getwyunge wenað unsceamlice efenðio mislicaþ netlice gecoplicor mernesse clependum unendebyrdlice ðurhfestnað beon forsewen oð ofermettu unwreonde ðrowun to earuoð ða neðeran tostred oferswiðdum gedered wisce amearode underslicende manifellecore stereð licetunge bið geholpen bið geopened gebregden sumu hwile slitende gescot geheappien wyrsan tohawiende tohawiendum heringum ungesælinesse nearelice beoð hæfde fultumeð ðæs gebregnan he ofslegeð mearwum gebregde gesundlicor abædað wiðsacað serwaþ harun nefte cicena mete helde saðrige organa merce wegbræde undestunge clofþunc siue þelneþunc smerewyrt i crop i galluc i ribbe i luuestice bisceopwirt hundes berian simaringuuert i alferthiguert i eorðeppel wið þam þe nebbe forþgang to utsichte i neddærwyirt i beowyrt i leonfot i clufwyrt clufðunge wuduclate i gos baldsmiðe heopbrembel i cneowholen to angbreoste eorþ leach wuderoue geolca brunewurt gekrungen clefr eoferfearn i mildseocum blodspuinga sigesante i gebrec i liferseoc hindheleða helde mugwurt heauocwurt sundcorn wegbrade garcliua thunge liðeleaf halswurt hypsar cneusar gyhþe whitleadteauer wiþ poccas wiþ whoste to lyuersic unfortredde wiþ monaþblod of wyue brymel wiþ pocca wyþ posa lyuer ropwerc wiþ gedrif wiþ cyrnles wenne wiþ sydwerc wiþ langkesar wiþ lugene wiþ scær lungena liuer gealla maga millte rusel ungel innoþ ma thearmas utsiht i berie i croppes brembel clate warance osmunda simaeringport et cauli crop et urtice crop et henep crop et sulfelæ et galloc et betonicam et warance he sahtlede underieoden unwar norþ suþ agene stor scuneden þæt ne losode þu leoht eadig þrinnys & ealder annys mereswin seolas mereswin seolas muþan gerecum herdu her vel ongebrohte wiþersaca edspellung tæsan hland bedreaf fyrr þefanþorn halsberigold cyniuiddan steopsunu uuf hrooc ciae osle uuf arfestnisse had facennisse oncnaws þu onweg gehalden ða riht megenu lac oferswið egse scilde cwacung ða niðrunge ðeh geðreataþ geheftad frecennisse mid cospum cwelmnissa scrudned wiþerat orhlet efenwyrþe susle suslum gifine unclænnisse ðet ongewuæd gestaðela derit framsy mihtelic forþ anrururon bidende suand cnysedon driara nierodon andredat gebunden bendum slietnes blod unoene unforeseun þuvanhalast bieldu þufortlete vacnisse þinum flanum uunea uernis gefreas is geinbryrded inbrydded is geinbryrded eftscepe inscande insacie ne geum þu getiolian fultum holun unstiln geboran byð geleanod foresette on kynedome begen butu gyldenhiwe wodnysse becume gedwolum speon windbere steorsetl ankersetl swanas metta mawaþ underhnigan hindcalf i s berbiz ewelomb bor i bere hund whelpes fox swan roc gushafoc wrenne i fincg i geolofincg i ruddoc stær secgescara lepwinkel i sni higre i i þrostle dora drane flehge louste bærs i perche slihg i tenche gerynelic fægernysse geglencged fægernysse on swate andwlitan ðines ðu scealt brucan hlafes ðines behreowsygende synna ðine mid geðylde mycclon her onginð seo endebyrdnyss hu man sceal embe þone untruman don þonne man gesyhð þæt his geendung genealæceð þonne onginnon þa geleaffullan and þa gastlican gebroðru to synganne hyra seofan sealmas and letanias and ræde man syððan cristes þrowunge ofer hine and oþre halie gewritu oð þonne fyrst þe seo saul fram þam lichaman acirred beo þonne onginne se mæssepreost þysne antifen þe her æfter gewriten is and fo se mæssepreost on þas collectan bidde her se preost þæt man singe þære saule gebed and cweþe anhebbe man þæt lic æfter þysum collectan and bere to þære stowe þær hit man healdan wylle oððæt hit man to þære stowe ferige þær hit beon sceall þonne hit man ferian wille þonne singe man þisne responsorium and oþre swilce þu wille  þonne man cume neah cirican duru þæt hit to sceal þonne singe man þisne antifen ðe her is gemearcod  and rod cristes and water gebletsod huslbox storcellan stores stores licrest be suðan be norðan stor to middes þam lictune candelstæf mid tapere & æmtig winhorn gemiltsa sio þrynes sio annes þære annesse gemiltsa ic bidde me gesettum sæs micles swa swa on frecennesse þætte no mid him getio me wol þyses geares ne middangeardes idelnes & ðæt ilce ic bidde from þam hyhstan þam hiofondcundan compwerodes mægnum þylæs me forlæton to teorenne fiondum ac gescylden soþlice wæpnum strangum ðæt hio me foregangan on feþan þæs hiofenlican werodes wig þreatas wisdomes gefylnes & godes lufan onbærnnes strengeo godes gelicum ic wysce þrym setles ða lifigendan heh englas ealdordomas & duguðmihta englas þæt me ðicce gescyldende werode fionda ic mæge gefyllan syþþan þonan oðere cempan heahfæderas & þa feower siðan fiower scipes stioran ic bidde cempan þæt me þurh hio ymbsylle & eal yfel from me gewite were trume fæstnie & þa sweartan werod abrege god mid þy unþurhsciotendlicre gescyldnesse æghwanan gescyld me mid mihte mines lichoman leower ealne gefria ðine plæg sceldæ gescyldendum anra gehwylc þæt þa sweartan dioflu on minre sidan cueccen swa swa gewuniað scytas hnoll heafud ponnan mid loccum & ða egan onwlite tungan toeð & ða næs ðyrel swiran breost sidan lendana ðeeoh midirnan & twa honda minum soþlice hneofulan egan & brægene þam þryfealdan nebbe weolure onsyne ðunnwengan cinne bearde ofer bruum earum heagospinnum smerum næsgristlan nosu sion eghringum brawan oferbruum toðreomum oroðe ceacum & goman hrectungan hræcean ðrot bollan tung eðrum swioran heafudponnan swiran gristlan gescyldnesse þonan wes ðu byrne sio gehealdfæste ymb lioma mine innoðas þætte þu ascufe from me ða ungesewenlican slegeas næglas ða fæstniað þa hatiendan gescyld strongre eaxla mid gescyldrum & earma ða elna mid fæðmum fyste hond bryda fingras mid þam næglum ðone hrycg & ða rib mid þam lioðum bæc hrycg & sina mid ðam banum ða hyd lund leogum hupp baan ersendu mid þam ðeohgelætum homme speoruliran genitalia mid þam cniewum baanum þa hwiorfban & þa cniowa helan sconcum helum sconcan fet illa mid þam stæpum telgam emnweaxende mid tanum næglas twiga fife ðearmgewind briostban briost magan þone nafelan þa wambe & þa gecyndlica lima & hrif & þære heortan þa liflican þa þryfealdan lifre & rysle bursan lund leogan snedel ðearm nettan readan feolu ferð mid lungenne ædran smæl ðearmas geallan mid þy heorthoman þa sceare mid þam meargum milte gebegdum isernum ða blædran gelynd & alle þara gefoga ða unarimedan endebyrdnes hær & þa oðre lima forlæten ðara wen is ic beferde ongytum smicre geworhtum durum þætte from þam ilum oð þæs heafdes heanesse nænegum limo ic geuntrumige ascufan wolnes fefor ald ær þan soðlice utfarende ic mæge gefliogan to ðam hean gefliogan ic mæge & gode miltsiendum to ðam roderlican bliðe ic sio wegen rices celnessa sy swa mug aueroine uel suþernewude  vel weremot netele garlec weibrodeplanteine ribbelanceleie rude appellef smeorewirt harehuneroil ysope horselneenele ache holihocceuuimauue anete betonie sauine kaliac kersunkerse wret sot gorr fyrcruce iuli waterriðe an and hund neogentig dagas fisc hrædd ram se forma dæg emniht eastermonoð fear ðrymylce sumor getwisan liða crabba liða haredagas leo weodmonoð hærefest mæden haligmonð her geendioð þa haredagas wagan emniht six ðusendum winterfylledmonoð ðrowend blodmonoð wintres angin sceotere ðæs monan hlyp iolmonoð endung gat oððe gate horn sunstede nu æfter þas senne deplice her beginneþ þæt is erest ofermodnesse swa hit gewriten is on from þe ealle senne ofermodnesse of hwam orieten lest wuldor ofþanc yrre les worold dryrinese þis woruld festenesse wambe oferfylnesse lichamnan lustgeornesse se þe bið his fæder slaga þeh he beo swiðe gebeden gerim twihæmed þæt is se þe tuwa wifað þryhæmed se þe þriwa wifað ortrywða se ceorl untymende unfæger stincende wac weamod unwis gifre teonful yfelwyrde sylting uel werednys uel lucrum þeonde of þryht hroemgum eorðe demaealdorman aswunden asolcen gisel fram þam frumcennedan þe gewuna is ic halsige geclænsa gehæl gescyld nærfre heafod deorcaþ gesihð wecsð sar heafdes feallaþ teþ cwaciaþ lima hreosað ealle færeld ures huses þæs becepð se wyrsta feond helwara secende forstulen sawla swaswa se litige ðeof eala þu stranga god þu ðe begymst mannan þu gescope & alysdest mid agena blod alys me þelæsþe blissie min feond on ænde ðæsðe ic anbidie toslit bendas for minum ðusend synnum þa gewriðaþ me lacna þusend wunda þa stinceð wiðinnan me & forgif nu me þusend siðan þusend synna ic oncnawe me syngian þe anum ne betec þu me þam wyrstan spir hula langlice nahwæder naþer anes betwux twam eft sona fæstlice on þreo geyht pin fic distæf spinl hula swearm mæþlice beheonan naþeranes betux twam þyder æftsone on ðreo geght wynsumre butan agelde fandung scildgum wærd agiue sibsumaþ þæt we sawað þæt we repað fremming wunan lustfulnessa lacniendes swese pricles fremmede wunden tregod unasegendlic gemene þing tindere onfestrod ripþ socne letted gremian þeodscipe lyftendra scewie mah pecunges temeð incofun wræcsið brædas tyn embrynas heorr gewitendlicum life under smyllendum gyrdum weop seþþan wella of fylþum & of fenne yfele anwille tua lagena oþþe æa we begymdun burglage near myd hys þan nexþtum adreg onbefeol harnys ungemyndigne gearcynges wintras oþþe ger hwitnys geswutelaþ swa hwæt swa þæt ys dil fornymþ si þu þe hyt syswa hwylc swa hyt byst þæs þu ert on þam ytemesþam gesingalie uerkompan ongelæde bringe þæt ic geleore gewite spircan swyþe læt byð bedcofan hlydað abysegode sleaces & ungemyndig wandrigende pucan sume onforgtigan & aweg fleon laþ gehendnys teganre þicnyse gehendes & her tobrogte utawundenne gylt oþþe utaslidene synne of aslidinge embe hand hrædlice somninga sona þærrigte genunga geþynnige emb stemn þærgemang loc hwæt to lafe beo ende bewacige betothecd besægedum deop ahryrþ idalalinga we dydun utan awæcnian gewittig unwrigene litig & pætig beon oferheled gedafenlice fracodum fyrenhycga me sceamaþ manfullice þonne byð swæm sidefullice bysmor geglengeaþ of sidelicre ansyne hygeþ scypreþra wyrhta yrþling mangere uplendisc ricceter wylcþ scypgefeoht cypa & se ceorl þenceaþ gestreunes & hyre oþþe wæstmscettes to specenne nytynde oþþe ungleawe we begytaþ of þysum geomorungum whitnysse of þurhbeorhtre of meolchwyttre cristallan on deorcre ungemaca lef geweald feor inn on lifre gyf he ne æbigþ wiþerwinnende wraxliendum geteorie ela rodbora goda leohtsawend ealre sceafte fæder milda wordcennend la þu geborena halbære glæd oþþe bliþe onfinden on bleda plegan stemþ hunitearenne of sangpipe yuiteru of þam þu gewun ert smeaþancollice wriþan oþþe cnottan cræftelicum welhoren inlendisce inborena þæslicor þonne þæt hyt ðær togenys singe gedrymyd abered litig gegrinaþ gefehþ wealtum nettum geclemede lime of rindenum tanas feþerbære reogyrde eares wintreowige mearum win berige hyrsumigaþ hulu fambige melcingfata of stricele cyslybbu togædere gerynþ on lytlum fæte nywe beobred gindypþ boþene asceacen of nyþerhreossendre þicnysse & hyt nyþertorfaþ gehrepud rices þæt awealþ beo of fuhtre wætre gehiwygiende on lefhelmigum stempþ bleofage fyþerfledendre ea ic forgyfe dysig yfelonbecweþende oþþe yfellærrende gemæne gesiwude sceamlim gecyndlim forscamung wæs ut ascofen wiflic alyfyd & unalyfed toþunden of brydlicum of hwyttre unrot lusaþ of wundorgehwerfte fesignede earnas gynian geedhyrte þæt hi underwreþigen aweg si þu feor onorþigendum gelogod & gefeged ærre ansyn rynnendum moldstowe stowlicrere moldan witodlice of ligespiwelum flode æþmmigende fulstincende weroda god findend gewyldend hlihcaþ ingedrincaþ swift hof deorclice stincþ hatigendre synne on bosme & on ingehyde oþ sædnysse of gneþumof lytlum mettum alihte gehyþegode þenunge hasswege þone agotennan god to asworfenum oran ares fostorcild þeaflic fram hys æcerweorce leohtlice gebigde gedrefendum ufan wærun ingeræhte ofermod ricetere tobringe ofhingrode onfindend & gemetend cynehof riscene weocan beþrawene tigle sep of bedrypedum claþe of gedrypydre claþweocan acuma beswæled of styrigendlicum hofu gelæcende toslitenum webbe uppwyllynde gynd westnu þær geeodun astyrede fyrdwic scypbyman sorglice gescotum of egiptisceom wæs gemænigfyld fleogende hweowlu ontoblawenum dracum liþende readum gewislice hluttrum wæterum æhiwe betæcean deopre myd swiftre yste ofstige swegle deor gestint beon gewylde rusele oheal emnum buruhleoda spærhynde byrððinenu tidgenge embutan þrungun dumbes muþes ungetingfullum hrofes & gomena ofacearf spreawlige stamaraþ dreamum ungeswegium atrahtnige gesutulað gehruxlu ceaw tosettum onstynt stod slita stið grimm unglædlic gerefa hogcende intingum to cyrcean of haligernum wibed ascylfan dura gebicnigend oferhlifinge wiþerwyrd to domsetlum anwille abarude caf weccend blæse gebigde wites cwelres twysnesum to terende inbræc bydelum ascuniendlica astyrigend folclices unstæfwis breostbydyn hus to holdigenne to befleanne awlum sedon fyrmestne cyrlisc bæc lede miclum todælð hagele ledene do æfæstnys misboren mægþe wyrþscype cyþere mærne wara wiðerwyrda toslopen ic for naht læte exa sotelas scyrtan tunecan domern anlicnyssa ge begynnað wylna hwæte ylpenbenum berend anlicnyssa geclyfte scridum getunecude to ferienna on cræte forefarende þenas geslegene loce nu ahwæt andwlitefull capiende stið deaþes stiþes campa gesiblingas stala hatigaþ smeoce far ic fylde befyled leof gehyrud geþolod belisnud ofacorfene digle haftud ganet gangas sceottet are gewexenne ofergyrdum wudewasan pucelas wæterlice lagu ydelnyssa windruncene ahwær gemenge þes leces eolene wibedu auur lec sticul lec gedolfenum godelic þeninghusum mihtig stifne bewint swyrfþ næddrum cyrpsaþ wisligendre næddran tællan leohtlice huntigendre gecyrpsudum geotenlic ceasbill fægere glyrendum onsittaþ geblawen sanda gemylte folcum fah gligmann ydele toþleasera awegen recce untidlic hæfð wealdendas æfensteorra cludas nytenu æte elcum hiwe sylena liflicne towyrpendlicne mislicum dura ofercæfedu hwite unsceþinesse persica gegladudne wiþer heriendlice flæscene mægþa eorþlice geholedum sticcum deadlice he seaþ geyrsud eacnude aspaw haliges la æ cynelicre teraþ aurnene þæt ic na secge arie hearga moder oferwinnende sigriende hæþenne gewunan þu oferswyþdest þu gewyldest feondlicum iuc wana wæs glengfulre burge mærþum utanumenreutfyrredre þæt eo gewylde fulne of weamodum on unblodium gefeohte cystig rumgifol under engetreowe læt ic forestæppe þu æfter cymst æftemyst spæc naþing leag of hwylcum gereorde race awritende singe ic on hade furþra locum haligern geþohte tolnewe gegaderode he axode hyplas bemænan ofer mæþe fram ys yrsiende bliþlice & gefædlice agenes þances ongengan geowrum cyrcþenungum þæt ofriað hi secgaþ reocan gesette taporas mæst caru wunungum feona agene waclicum dyrfingum bereafod gesamnode þu wealst gafolgyld bizantas sagode hord casere hefum trumlicor endebyrdlice sumdæl gelogad weddodon ymbferde leapas hole forþteonde forestapulum sceancan corfenum healffeþe fotwylm wæs wundihtum wæs an elmbogan gesamnode caflice hwommas pundum unfratewode weredu gedolfene oran ameraþ grotig aseoþan biþ gewemmed sæd mægenleas gesamnie cyre betæc feriaþ gesamnaþ fliht gynd forligeru getogen openlice manaþ þurst gruncaþ plicged puducas horie wundie totræglion gehylp geedyppole forbrodenum spatlum siwenege biþ anbeset nytene glencg biþ frætwod gewelgod þæs þonne æhte we syndon tælede butan wite feondulf hospas gliwlicre hyspinge gliwere recest gesydod sypigende gepinodes dyrnmaga geheawen hlyna ælagol & awlæht ætbræt ungeþyldig forþbrohte fordyt bewrigen fægrum drecþ geciwde glæd gewunlicre wæde orþancas anrædum geuþe geræd gesybbode an soþne geleafan geþwærat toscyrede gesamnian romaniscne wurþmynt wlæccan dyrlingas twynebbe & meoxine bysmor gislas geleaffulnys awlættre fordytte trume forscyttende scyttellas piuigende in mearga gindbleaw gemear acolode cweccende gyrlgyden dwællice gewunelices blotorc blodorc gehufud ofer scittisce cneppas & ofer þa pirescan cnollas rædgifan glæras gyrlan untamcul reafol plicet meolchwitum & openlic gerec agen þætþær togeanes wiþerwynna geswutela clifrunga glædnys gewitt cræftlicre bylium spæcleasedume wygleras træglian gewite gleawe fordyttat gylpe bloteras tohricedum hiscend gliwode ealdorlice forhogas rædgifte ealdordom tohlocene tospringe gypigendum heolstru orþige mægenleaslice ablan earmas me sceamaþ he wiþsæcþ gepinod gefremmed gegadan geþwærie gerunnenes hrycigende forbryte docgena inylma ræc to lapa wenan cwale bescyred cryccen swa hwylcum gryllendum wæs toclifrod hwylsaþ gleawnys bolster trametas tohricod swypu bicnole sot gorette ut sy gefremmed ceoruncg forhradode to cwealmstede gemengdon gewrinclode sydung gereorde cwice wapolode orþunge spyrcinge brastlode gebrastles stundum gemenged þrosm gefegede climprum gehæfte gehylcedum reordgynde bæftan scearda ruwe unclæmodum scearpnyssa unhiwe grymme slæpleas sidan þoddetton geanulum pinere sceoccan licetunga gynung cyppes cinum tosprang gleawra geefenlæhte endeleasum gegadan geþeod tohricod cinan weard clifra puddas he ciste æftergencgum agend cweartenweard þæs þe rechþ fordyttum scyttylsum ungewunelices anælend þurste aclænsod gehylded bolstrum socodon grymme reþnyssa genam to trægelgenne geferlic grylde betwix seccas swylce eac flyhte afliged hwyrfde neagum spyrrynde anydde gearwe wiþgehæftan arian þeotende gesawene uncamprofes swylcu gesidode mildode gladode wealcol under swegendum cludum sticule scylpas betwux cludige heollstru adræfan roðre niwum cleofan gedrofum bate bewunden ryplen cylle sigende flocgest fuhtum handbrede wælgrim began raplic gebred gesidode besiwodon gewealcon & micel ut awearp dæfte tohlidan drige styllum bærum næssum curnstanes famm weddes spyrteþruh flotorode scypmen geferede of ormæton liþelice byre & blæde steorsceofle cleofan flotorodon to hnesscere wununge brohte gedryfen hyþ gegearcode þam æfteran ofercumenon ræste rihtlicewurþlice innemystan gelogodne gecwylmdon neahne forþsiþ hwæt swylces cwellend tocorfene lyttuccas sage wearp acorfene ut atogene forþfærs caf forspeca clifras þurh cweartenlice cyp scerden wrece help gefera geþolode samodgesiþ to gemote pearruc reocende hlecum lest hohyldo þyrnan teafre & gecyrte mægeþblædd freolice timlicne genydd gehylde wilnincel afylan gif þu wylt openlice dreorinyssa framlece tolcendlicor tydrum wæs sceacen pyrte samstorfenne liclicum wordum & gefrem weallende an mamman swa swa hrædlicor upferde gelogodne idel unnetnys þurst cambas cenepes gehnæcþ an wolcne six siþum tynfeald hi gefratwode inþinen ælewealdene fæder muþes miltsigendlic ælc wiht biþ clæne ungeþwære winterlic lagoflod scypbrucules scymriendes wæles fleotende gesah gedrehte renlicum hegum drira earmas sprota samod bæron wearme fyr gegadrode softnysse gesamnian & geþycfyldan hypum cram lutode nædre sprotum slitas lices clyuiende gewearmode untrywfæst hwyrfde gecwehton gram geættroddre ac godes bodan rumigende nædre brastlode todyde gypunga totorene flogoþa fæge þa þa he sprencde anbewearp wintre gedyrfed afæred aþenedon segle ferode wundlicne hefityme geypte befealdon anlutungum healum stearcode ceaw antende gramigende gedeorfleasum gewrites geypte smyltre gereste getaccodon rapum reþran lande toslat dreorilic frecednys helpendlicum ældon forylde forste seare unnytte twige gesamnod þufum wudihtes orþode cwylm astah & cweccan wolice muþes orþunga an utewerdre horrat romanisces mihtigre gehæle gif hit gifeþe is anbrucolne æbrucolon dwæs ic halsie cofgodas wlæffetera dælþ lybben hræde dreamas & tyrnende swegas wædlan to helpe fotlic hwommas agrafen ceac læmen micel & rum metfæt ylpenbænene sume geholode besutod ytemystan swa hwæt swa þæt gelympð geweargode mid idelum gescotum forspanende space wifreð holod gyre of ylpebane stif befeht uuarre behefe underfeht beon unge gefiþerod fla spacana blaciende galre wæpnbærum earmum geolowum haswigum hæwenum growendre earmas beon gewriþene fex werlic geolowum mid gecrowed sealfe drage gedræge flowan unþurhfærne wanan gewæt utateah lætcumen ylde langtog þæt bremesta hræppan orwyrðede on geedgunnenu gefohte eftnewiode gesworenan feala unsiþe crætwisa hnipiende winciende lælum handfæstnunge æwylman totogenes upflora ifig læfrum eaxe se ytra boge este hwystlian bysmer siþetogen þa drymendan ðæs lude lote onbelædde geglencdre gehiwod utewerd gemærcede gemeng sæ bendlic græft hunder ed bigelsse se witigenda gebohcte of stofne degudum onbeseo bewundene asodenum on top loccas stefnincg toþindendum reþnesse softum wende æftyrnde riht scyfe ofansætum lytig cræftg þurhfor bealcet ablæce þa haswegan slidriendum ferad gehoh ateorie began ofdrycð ofghrefed winnend gelomlycum wooddnesse rurel wiltidum syle fenne sælicum togædere rnan nydendum gelaþung gemænifeld emsette hiwcuðlic þeod fremd efenlices twæm þusgegædere gewed ealan þu on beleape unluftyme gewilnatha toblæd gyltas nyþerst gewilnat angmod luttrum feþerhamade welreoum grimmum gelimpe se æþelborne & git swyþer be gesund weriges fæder reoc wætelum in salnesse weh emfered cundes herias fæstenu togefleo hyrne geholed frymbyrdlc cole gehende byr þær to hecan hristrunge dwelet forhæuednessum witleasnes on wuniendre deaþ top gefangenne urh aþidde blædes swelh lustfulnes spurnende strenges gliwingmanna geolwum wræde manfulre fered tyrning underscyte cydende oferfenges gelicað pohhan clifrode herebyme belimp utewardre hyde ne ne ðurhtyhþ ðurhstrange græftas wraþlice geeuenlæhte wæt hy holdlices bedydrode gripeð onrire ouyrcom spreulede flances wecgc moþþum seodes fornumene gyuernis aflygde nyðer asah hrædne gang wohe hornas aledum to ingangum of lote seowede hringum hem blyccyt underðeod gesmægeð egslic grimeteð ædwist timbreð heltes forfangenre & swencaþ gesamnede hors abroþen þæt is disme cinn sema cermende gewis gestrenged ageaf to hearmfullum hyppede geræhte hearme wisan mid earmlicum of dincge for genumenan werede tostrædaþ on æblæcan andwlitan redendan stripligan bead scinlac ofermicle afeallað ofermodgast gestrangað dom þearcs befencg swæpð awritene sint scettels on þam weagesyþ bereafre ealswa bysmraþ wealdun þa glæd gemetta arefna awlas unnitnes ætinge openum asceotende geswungen ongean firigende hand slitera sumum grema mangere fyþerflowendre ea swær tosomne geganre blæde fæder ealda feder þridda fæder feorða fæder fifta fæder sixta fæder fædera faðu sweger snoru sweor syxta fæder þridda fæder æalda fæder sunu næfa þridda sunu feorþa sunu fifta fæder feorþa fæder v sunu vi sunu moddrig tacor fæderansunu moddriansunu aþum gyuli solmonað reðmonð eastermonð þrymilce liða liða weodmonð haligmonð winterfilleð blodmonð giuli giuli solomonath redmonath eastermonath thrimilci liða liða weodmonað haligmonað winterfilleð blodmonað giuli plegmen hæwen weolcread wealhbasumædre mid hwitum twine on niwun wæne wæn mid þam wæne byrst scipe ic geclænsie gehrew gorstas þornas bion gesægde hwethwugu forslegenre æder þurhwunian fæsthafulnesse twion gemeþgud ic forhtige tohaldra areccan & gehealdaþ to forsacenne to smeagenne gesededlice þu gedele winnan þurredenne erfes gewintrad giguþlice ielde swiþe gebyrde healicum trahttape onginen swa hwelc swa þu gebeor symblu gemedamad hlinansittan ræstum alege onhild gesec merthu lustbere gif thu bist etwuenied gereordan gereordum cennþ tunglu somed scinaþ ermum togeseted wyrt swiðswoge glengan buclice gehlowe bismere myndgunge & þam rihte gewuna larewlice boccestum gewunad arwurþlice andweald euenlic dædlic gesniceþ land lælte helle wynsyme spryttince grenan wongas burnan wateru gelifeste berna fleose rihte hæse middewardum forstum gehleapan read win landum winwringe muþas arecet drincendan forste caldan þa calendan gehlinade forþferde beorgende orle þa þufbæran stemna wæternædre teleran þurfere feþemannum wæge ingefealle londum smeðum secge swetmete þa fæstend stanas gelandum geieldum æuenne nebbe bitum hwiogl in setgang widan watru gerowende godgild þæt caldisce deað gesah wod feld fellice gresu neata geand þa heallelican fretenum gedemed wildrum halgan geweorc swa oft fram inneweardum hors þonne geweorc weos wirsan onscunaþ gedwes gerynum gescrif geheawene genidedum tha hean rofa fyrum swetmettum borg gildaþ geweald sceamaþ unriht þisþel fyres þurhfere nide niwan geferan crymbam ungeferan he belaf hlafrades se þe hanlicede cild seolf se feder gecnyrdnes eldran mere thus theh þeoþe mislice onfeohton abarede gleawe þeawlice in þa wiþerdynan seo hlafordlice borene hindrum gestonde steores ruman xii twelffeald price wiopan deaþ wa la þæt sarlic ungeniwiendlic geanwyrfede hamlædene speede geþingad gesibbad stem mehte æghwþrne geberendan ungewissum hyrdum fram þære eastan genipu unhalre ungefera stowa afand ætt scep grimma snaþ cild widrumum coren þes fleogenda brucende tyde fordas burnan þa wætrendan þæt ealice faran eglum cenþ onsliðnum þu bires gelustfullode & þæt unrihte scinn geslyhtum gonges oþspornan in fel gelacnade þurheten palstre hlafrodas oferspyriaþ myndgunge adwolednum geþafaþ & emne æfterfylgaþ unriht wætrnædre yðgiende dægmete þis is wærscipe ancnawieþ þrestendum þonne na þet nide gelede gefæstnedan smele þes tung a todæledu þet fare þa gesynan unacendum seaþas in ða fellendan gerefa neosode cynedom eftlifgan heahcæstre felds hus þrope wic earm swegrum dædlicre wodne þa sæ liþre hlæstas fleot blæst genided gimeleasa yþe bord þa sciplican waroð allinga rest hrædlice eldende feohtendæ anstyredon aspringende grund brimn cwilde & on fulstincendum brungen forlætne gewanod bære wegend gewanede giniendum becumen piperas slæp awundrodon aflih unceaþunga befæste andlifon asette swutol creft læld ater forþgan gegrapudum foraldung single anweg anweg alædde fretendum se cyninge gerefa sæltn þæs widan stream sæs scipberende hyþ wegferend foldan singale gleawum cwican bion gereordad welhwær ernn tygas tyrf wera intinga mittan leohtfæt rume muþe wrigelse geweorþade hergere swogen wið geðreatadan gildan obdune onsendum upweard hwerfende onfalde bedolfen brungen for þam wanungum wederu weallas ge ednese þa ilca þecene getelgod stofne telgan foge wyrtwalan stofn besengdum fægrum libanisca cedr ufewardum hlafordlice on lytlum hwilstyce yþe receleasre hwa þu eart swignum openian gewitan unriht ofergende lesende þyrelu dura þing anlec hwon in scipe fram þam wate wæterleode ungemet þa scipu niþergemetenan  manugum licþeg licþegnungum idlum hræw stæpa se andega deaðe latede cucu hyrende gefera eftcyrrendre þa geferde heapedu hringum on þuhrferne & þy læs gemenifealdre lete fæm gegite þrowend þrowendran feond wiðerede underlicge lugon geanlicadon memfitsicn ædre galdrum gemearcunge þurhsenre þa gecnedan þindende hlænnes þære wambe sio watersiocnes adl gesitten cwild wom spot mihtie scinhiu foretacnu þa wletlicum fulum ungebleoh ungehiw fulum æmtat ænge fages bescawedan mag gelæua fulre gewildu sceande earga se onræs forgeaf farende gesittan cniorisse gidrima hægespind gewemmed molsne liþa eft acwican bridelgymhurst hwam æghwær in neaweste genipu & ne gen swa cwist þu gereorde ut asceade on sefan ful gescraf æcum æfst arisan swa micel gif he hit aberan mihte geþi genided þisterra ðiwende gedefenlic nangum feþerberenda hana yslum wlitelease welhwær ungedon reafum gewryttenes gripes weganberan becnend setlum clænan cennende wæterfata lifgende forsette hatende swa hold gesylte eom genyrwed ic wære onfohten ænig getæse witan her on hier gehwæþru to þam gesetv geþeondre beotvm swet mete steorste fisce gehære hat hyrtadon gereord geweald gesawan sliþor west cild feldlic s healh ær geand ætwære fyrdwic his wighearde gemynde cvnnan his agen geweorc surum geofstigan byrhtu berend cyning arædend hætte dearnunga wedes beotas recelsu leahtor for hwilcum gslitne forlet gecerrende geehteð welan dwes fisc wæteres fruma begangne ag oferswiþaþ þa unhyran þæs blod mis beforan womspot somod se sæ nyrwede wis ripe slæp eagan hæþene wundrie behindan dohtor twifyld sio sioce feaum stream berendan druncen hyrteþ hwiða bvtv wæg beot reþnes þær bearme gymende læppan wic sohten gesittende to þam þurhwegum spigþan to þære siliscan yþe gsibb setgang stan wege riddan ungelic þeah geglenged gearlic aswind unriht arleas mearca godwræc leahter sniþende bære gebyrsta gebærnede þyrlan gefeonde bearn bron seglas ær ametene ofreode feged ofunnenderum leogerum gewyrcan gewirce bec of ænigre sinderlice gife swa micele mægn gleawestum iungwiga oferirne ic wisce þæt ic beladige na ne to smelte mid gecwemere begymendum æni na forliþenesse on bisgod ungewyldendlices foresceawung na netwerþlicnes betæhte stæflice þa beon he besargode ingehyd of bredde stred sona þæt swa forlet ðyflies to gehæge blowendes & ic ongewende fet selran onlihtes of geþristlæcinge swa micelre hefe togenimende aloten wiþ estfulnesse wened swigan na ne þolian carfulles modes tobringan gif ic ne forwerne ce beon geþede menniscan ic wæs generwed eft modes gedrefedes sicinge þæt styrede wiste liht þeon tæcende æni spearcan tindre gehwæde earfoþlice utlæt hwedes of & ic tealde stilre for fæsthafelnesse beon todeled befeste mycelnesse hyddes þæt hylces gelogian gebyrde hwonon geþincþe hades hylcas cræftboce estfulra feldes byrnend dypte gelengde þweor asend furþon top læt ægc þu biotast of þot clifrode hionon forð hrycges fromacnyslien sciman uneaþe waras wæs becumen styrne of snædum digle berend hangode ðefra eft bo helmum gehiwedum fixoþ swif niowel wæteradl himbe gecynde gefyl æftergenga fnæ byrðene com reþelice unrihtre ceapunge gemyndleste abliþc ræpedum gewriðende toslitennesse togegane licþenungum helwaran feþ on bæc hellice his gerehten getelþ dagas wyrtgmanges þæs þu ongemæng col of awende gelengde reccean of nigan ny sæde west norþ unne and spiwan cyres for þurhteon mid tyhtin eac swylce ænig tostent aslacedrum cempa gespræcea getrywes ingehydes on campdome of earfoþlicre wið eac þæt wealcstodys gegodode agenre smeaunge geþread gedafenlicre andsware mid þurhtogenessum beladunge stedig dæl hreoh ðurstige frecennyssa telegra benæcod unandwerdes brymmes adreah aettum þære ungeendod mid buton he forgeafe wryhð ealle cenninga mid hrepunge splottigan atelicum scryðum afeorma ðu hearpslege kyrpte sweordes mid egce abrodenes hearpslege crypte ecge abrodenes var dirnin bel scel vlisp scip boc crop fultim gristle ðrotae first stan nraf ceol gif it tan hinnele cneopholen saluie sundcorn vad sylfhele unfortreden hrefneslec rude eoforthrote cypeleac grundesvilige brade lec sinfulle brunvyrt beolene gledene sigelhveorua solesege se unbrade thistel galluc vudecearfille nefle cingesvyrt clufthunge brocminte helde vingre singrene cravelec eacessure reade cleaure libcorn gorst foxesgloua electre brunvyrt berbena smerovyrt feltvyrt peruince banvyrt earuuigga stigu alterholt uaar laam steeli aesil uncenos an ba halbae faerscribaen thrauu spaldr huitfot meeli aldot scaldthyflas hramsa hramsa crop faag hynnilaec geacaes surae laec uuegbradae uuermod boog breer hindberiæ sibaed fraam setungae bisceredae fultemendi staefnendra gihiodum snel tilgendum soergendi misbyrd gidyrstig gitsung facni hraecli tyctendi scirde uuraec streamrad aethm uuraec an uueg aferidae segnas to nyttum gerlicae fultemendum tohald gitiungi aend suilcae uuildae ginumni thegn binumni fetod binumini gefetodnae sceptloum fleotas fosturbearn faestinnum segilgaerd
